haste | dadhāno | nṛmṇā | viśvānyame | devāndhādguhā | niṣīdan |
vidantīmatra | naro | dhiyaṁdhā | hṛdā | yattaṣṭānmantrām̐ | aśaṁsan |
ajo | na | kṣāṁ | dādhāra | pṛthivīṁ | tastambha | dyāṁ | mantrebhiḥ | satyaiḥ |
priyā | padāni | paśvo | ni | pāhi | viśvāyuragne | guhā | guhaṁ | gāḥ |
yeṁ | ciketa | guhā | bhavantamā | yaḥ | sasāda | dhārāmṛtasya |
vi | ye | cṛtantyṛtā | sapantādidvasūni | pra | vavācāsmai |
vi | yo | vīrutsu | rodhanmahitvota | prajota | prasūṣvantaḥ |
cittirapāṁ | dame | viśvāyuḥ | sadmeva | dhīrāḥ | saṁmāya | cakruḥ |
śrīṇannupa | sthāddivaṁ | bhuraṇyuḥ | sthātuścarathamaktūnvyūrṇot |
pari | yadeṣāmeko | viśveṣāṁ | bhuvaddevo | devānāṁ | mahitvā |
āditte | viśve | kratuṁ | juṣanta | śuṣkādyaddeva | jīvo | janiṣṭhāḥ |
bhajanta | viśve | devatvaṁ | nāma | ṛtaṁ | sapanto | amṛtamevaiḥ |
ṛtasya | preṣā | ṛtasya | dhītirviśvāyurviśve | apāṁsi | cakruḥ |
yastubhyaṁ | dāśādyo | vā | te | śikṣāttasmai | cikitvānrayiṁ | dayasva |
hotā | niṣatto | manorapatye | sa | cinnvāsāṁ | patī | rayīṇām |
icchanta | reto | mithastanūṣu | saṁ | jānata | svairdakṣairamūrāḥ |
piturna | putrāḥ | kratuṁ | juṣanta | śroṣanye | asya | śāsaṁ | turāsaḥ |
vi | rāyāurṇodduraḥ | purukṣuḥ | pipeśa | nākaṁ | stṛbhirdamūnāḥ |
śukraḥ | śuśukvām̐ | uṣo | na | jāraḥ | paprā | samīcī | divo | na | jyotiḥ |
pari | prajātaḥ | kratvā | babhūtha | bhuvo | devānāṁ | pitā | putraḥ | san |
vedhādṛpto | agnirvijānannūdharna | gonāṁ | svādmā | pitūnām |
jane | na | śevāhūryaḥ | sanmadhye | niṣatto | raṇvo | duroṇe |
putro | na | jāto | raṇvo | duroṇe | vājī | na | prīto | viśo | vi | tārīt |
viśo | yadahve | nṛbhiḥ | sanīḻāgnirdevatvā | viśvānyaśyāḥ |
nakiṣṭaitā | vratā | minanti | nṛbhyo | yadebhyaḥ | śruṣṭiṁ | cakartha |
tattu | te | daṁso | yadahantsamānairnṛbhiryadyukto | vive | rapāṁsi |
uṣo | na | jāro | vibhāvosraḥ | saṁjñātarūpaściketadasmai |
tmanā | vahanto | duro | vyṛṇvannavanta | viśve | svardṛśīke |
vanema | pūrvīraryo | manīṣāgniḥ | suśoko | viśvānyaśyāḥ |
ā | daivyāni | vratā | cikitvānā | mānuṣasya | janasya | janma |
garbho | yo | apāṁ | garbho | vanānāṁ | garbhaśca | sthātāṁ | garbhaścarathām |
adrau | cidasmāntarduroṇe | viśāṁ | na | viśvo | amṛtaḥ | svādhīḥ |
sa | hi | kṣapāvām̐ | agnī | rayīṇāṁ | dāśadyo | asmāraṁ | sūktaiḥ |
etā | cikitvo | bhūmā | ni | pāhi | devānāṁ | janma | martām̐śca | vidvān |
vardhānyaṁ | pūrvīḥ | kṣapo | virūpāḥ | sthātuśca | rathamṛtapravītam |
arādhi | hotā | svarniṣattaḥ | kṛṇvanviśvānyapāṁsi | satyā |
goṣu | praśastiṁ | vaneṣu | dhiṣe | bharanta | viśve | baliṁ | svarṇaḥ |
vi | tvā | naraḥ | purutrā | saparyanpiturna | jivrervi | vedo | bharanta |
sādhurna | gṛdhnurasteva | śūro | yāteva | bhīmastveṣaḥ | samatsu |
upa | pra | jinvannuśatīruśantaṁ | patiṁ | na | nityaṁ | janayaḥ | sanīḻāḥ |
svasāraḥ | śyāvīmaruṣīmajuṣrañcitramucchantīmuṣasaṁ | na | gāvaḥ |
vīḻu | ciddṛḻhā | pitaro | nokthairadriṁ | rujannaṅgiraso | raveṇa |
cakrurdivo | bṛhato | gātumasme | ahaḥ | svarvividuḥ | ketumusrāḥ |
dadhannṛtaṁ | dhanayannasya | dhītimādidaryo | didhiṣvo | vibhṛtrāḥ |
atṛṣyantīrapaso | yantyacchā | devāñjanma | prayasā | vardhayantīḥ |
mathīdyadīṁ | vibhṛto | mātariśvā | gṛhegṛhe | śyeto | jenyo | bhūt |
ādīṁ | rājñe | na | sahīyase | sacā | sannā | dūtyaṁ | bhṛgavāṇo | vivāya |
mahe | yatpitreṁ | rasaṁ | dive | karava | tsaratpṛśanyaścikitvān |
sṛjadastā | dhṛṣatā | didyumasmai | svāyāṁ | devo | duhitari | tviṣiṁ | dhāt |
svā | yastubhyaṁ | damā | vibhāti | namo | vā | dāśāduśato | anu | dyūn |
vardho | agne | vayo | asya | dvibarhā | yāsadrāyā | sarathaṁ | yaṁ | junāsi |
agniṁ | viśvābhi | pṛkṣaḥ | sacante | samudraṁ | na | sravataḥ | sapta | yahvīḥ |
na | jāmibhirvi | cikite | vayo | no | vidā | deveṣu | pramatiṁ | cikitvān |
ā | yadiṣe | nṛpatiṁ | tejānaṭ | chuci | reto | niṣiktaṁ | dyaurabhīke |
agniḥ | śardhamanavadyaṁ | yuvānaṁ | svādhyaṁ | janayatsūdayacca |
mano | na | yo'dhvanaḥ | sadyaityekaḥ | satrā | sūro | vasveśe |
rājānā | mitrāvaruṇā | supāṇī | goṣu | priyamamṛtaṁ | rakṣamāṇā |
mā | no | agne | sakhyā | pitryāṇi | pra | marṣiṣṭhābhi | viduṣkaviḥ | san |
nabho | na | rūpaṁ | jarimā | mināti | purā | tasyābhiśasteradhīhi |
ni | kāvyā | vedhasaḥ | śaśvataskarhaste | dadhāno | naryā | purūṇi |
agnirbhuvadrayipatī | rayīṇāṁ | satrā | cakrāṇo | amṛtāni | viśvā |
asme | vatsaṁ | pari | ṣantaṁ | na | vindannicchanto | viśve | amṛtāmūrāḥ |
śramayuvaḥ | padavyo | dhiyaṁdhāstasthuḥ | pade | parame | cārvagneḥ |
tisro | yadagne | śaradastvāmicchuciṁ | ghṛtena | śucayaḥ | saparyān |
nāmāni | ciddadhire | yajñiyānyasūdayanta | tanvaḥ | sujātāḥ |
ā | rodasī | bṛhatī | vevidānāḥ | pra | rudriyā | jabhrire | yajñiyāsaḥ |
vidanmarto | nemadhitā | cikitvānagniṁ | pade | parame | tasthivāṁsam |
saṁjānānopa | sīdannabhijñu | patnīvanto | namasyaṁ | namasyan |
ririkvāṁsastanvaḥ | kṛṇvata | svāḥ | sakhā | sakhyurnimiṣi | rakṣamāṇāḥ |
triḥ | sapta | yadguhyāni | tve | itpadāvidannihitā | yajñiyāsaḥ |
tebhī | rakṣante | amṛtaṁ | sajoṣāḥ | paśūñca | sthātṝñcarathaṁ | ca | pāhi |
vidvām̐ | agne | vayunāni | kṣitīnāṁ | vyānuṣakchurudho | jīvase | dhāḥ |
antarvidvām̐ | adhvano | devayānānatandro | dūto | abhavo | havirvāṭ |
svādhyo | divā | sapta | yahvī | rāyo | duro | vyṛtajñājānan |
vidadgavyaṁ | saramā | dṛḻhamūrvaṁ | yenā | nu | kaṁ | mānuṣī | bhojate | viṭ |
ā | ye | viśvā | svapatyāni | tasthuḥ | kṛṇvānāso | amṛtatvāya | gātum |
mahnā | mahadbhiḥ | pṛthivī | vi | tasthe | mātā | putrairaditirdhāyase | veḥ |
adhi | śriyaṁ | ni | dadhuścārumasmindivo | yadakṣī | amṛtākṛṇvan |
adha | kṣaranti | sindhavo | na | sṛṣṭāḥ | pra | nīcīragne | aruṣīrajānan |
rayirna | yaḥ | pitṛvitto | vayodhāḥ | supraṇītiścikituṣo | na | śāsuḥ |
syonaśīratithirna | prīṇāno | hoteva | sadma | vidhato | vi | tārīt |
devo | na | yaḥ | savitā | satyamanmā | kratvā | nipāti | vṛjanāni | viśvā |
purupraśasto | amatirna | satyātmeva | śevo | didhiṣāyyo | bhūt |
devo | na | yaḥ | pṛthivīṁ | viśvadhāyopakṣeti | hitamitro | na | rājā |
puraḥsadaḥ | śarmasado | na | vīrānavadyā | patijuṣṭeva | nārī |
taṁ | tvā | naro | damā | nityamiddhamagne | sacanta | kṣitiṣu | dhruvāsu |
adhi | dyumnaṁ | ni | dadhurbhūryasminbhavā | viśvāyurdharuṇo | rayīṇām |
vi | pṛkṣo | agne | maghavāno | aśyurvi | sūrayo | dadato | viśvamāyuḥ |
sanema | vājaṁ | samitheṣvaryo | bhāgaṁ | deveṣu | śravase | dadhānāḥ |
ṛtasya | hi | dhenavo | vāvaśānāḥ | smadūdhnīḥ | pīpayanta | dyubhaktāḥ |
parāvataḥ | sumatiṁ | bhikṣamāṇā | vi | sindhavaḥ | samayā | sasruradrim |
tve | agne | sumatiṁ | bhikṣamāṇā | divi | śravo | dadhire | yajñiyāsaḥ |
naktā | ca | cakruruṣasā | virūpe | kṛṣṇaṁ | ca | varṇamaruṇaṁ | ca | saṁ | dhuḥ |
yānrāye | martāntsuṣūdo | agne | te | syāma | maghavāno | vayaṁ | ca |
chāyeva | viśvaṁ | bhuvanaṁ | sisakṣyāpaprivānrodasī | antarikṣam |
arvadbhiragne | arvato | nṛbhirnṝnvīrairvīrānvanuyāmā | tvotāḥ |
īśānāsaḥ | pitṛvittasya | rāyo | vi | sūrayaḥ | śatahimā | no | aśyuḥ |
etā | te | agnocathāni | vedho | juṣṭāni | santu | manase | hṛde | ca |
śakema | rāyaḥ | sudhuro | yamaṁ | te'dhi | śravo | devabhaktaṁ | dadhānāḥ |
upaprayanto | adhvaraṁ | mantraṁ | vocemāgnaye |
āre | asme | ca | śṛṇvate |
yaḥ | snīhitīṣu | pūrvyaḥ | saṁjagmānāsu | kṛṣṭiṣu |
arakṣaddāśuṣe | gayam |
uta | bruvantu | jantavodagnirvṛtrahājani |
dhanaṁjayo | raṇeraṇe |
yasya | dūto | asi | kṣaye | veṣi | havyāni | vītaye |
dasmatkṛṇoṣyadhvaram |
tamitsuhavyamaṅgiraḥ | sudevaṁ | sahaso | yaho |
janāhuḥ | subarhiṣam |
ā | ca | vahāsi | tām̐ | iha | devām̐ | upa | praśastaye |
havyā | suścandra | vītaye |
na | yorupabdiraśvyaḥ | śṛṇve | rathasya | kaccana |
yadagne | yāsi | dūtyam |
tvoto | vājyahrayo'bhi | pūrvasmādaparaḥ |
pra | dāśvām̐ | agne | asthāt |
uta | dyumatsuvīryaṁ | bṛhadagne | vivāsasi |
devebhyo | deva | dāśuṣe |
juṣasva | saprathastamaṁ | vaco | devapsarastamam |
havyā | juhvānāsani |
athā | te | aṅgirastamāgne | vedhastama | priyam |
vocema | brahma | sānasi |
kaste | jāmirjanānāmagne | ko | dāśvadhvaraḥ |
ko | ha | kasminnasi | śritaḥ |
tvaṁ | jāmirjanānāmagne | mitro | asi | priyaḥ |
sakhā | sakhibhyeḍyaḥ |
yajā | no | mitrāvaruṇā | yajā | devām̐ | ṛtaṁ | bṛhat |
agne | yakṣi | svaṁ | damam |
kā | topetirmanaso | varāya | bhuvadagne | śaṁtamā | kā | manīṣā |
ko | vā | yajñaiḥ | pari | dakṣaṁ | tāpa | kena | vā | te | manasā | dāśema |
ehyagneha | hotā | ni | ṣīdādabdhaḥ | su | puraetā | bhavā | naḥ |
avatāṁ | tvā | rodasī | viśvaminve | yajā | mahe | saumanasāya | devān |
pra | su | viśvānrakṣaso | dhakṣyagne | bhavā | yajñānāmabhiśastipāvā |
athā | vaha | somapatiṁ | haribhyāmātithyamasmai | cakṛmā | sudāvne |
prajāvatā | vacasā | vahnirāsā | ca | huve | ni | ca | satsīha | devaiḥ |
veṣi | hotramuta | potraṁ | yajatra | bodhi | prayantarjanitarvasūnām |
yathā | viprasya | manuṣo | havirbhirdevām̐ | ayajaḥ | kavibhiḥ | kaviḥ | san |
evā | hotaḥ | satyatara | tvamadyāgne | mandrayā | juhvā | yajasva |
kathā | dāśemāgnaye | kāsmai | devajuṣṭocyate | bhāmine | gīḥ |
yo | martyeṣvamṛta | ṛtāvā | hotā | yajiṣṭhetkṛṇoti | devān |
yo | adhvareṣu | śaṁtama | ṛtāvā | hotā | tamū | namobhirā | kṛṇudhvam |
agniryadvermartāya | devāntsa | cā | bodhāti | manasā | yajāti |
sa | hi | kratuḥ | sa | maryaḥ | sa | sādhurmitro | na | bhūdadbhutasya | rathīḥ |
taṁ | medheṣu | prathamaṁ | devayantīrviśopa | bruvate | dasmamārīḥ |
sa | no | nṛṇāṁ | nṛtamo | riśādāgnirgiro'vasā | vetu | dhītim |
tanā | ca | ye | maghavānaḥ | śaviṣṭhā | vājaprasūteṣayanta | manma |
evāgnirgotamebhirṛtāvā | viprebhirastoṣṭa | jātavedāḥ |
saiṣu | dyumnaṁ | pīpayatsa | vājaṁ | sa | puṣṭiṁ | yāti | joṣamā | cikitvān |
abhi | tvā | gotamā | girā | jātavedo | vicarṣaṇe |
dyumnairabhi | pra | ṇonumaḥ |
tamu | tvā | gotamo | girā | rāyaskāmo | duvasyati |
dyumnairabhi | pra | ṇonumaḥ |
tamu | tvā | vājasātamamaṅgirasvaddhavāmahe |
dyumnairabhi | pra | ṇonumaḥ |
tamu | tvā | vṛtrahantamaṁ | yo | dasyūm̐ravadhūnuṣe |
dyumnairabhi | pra | ṇonumaḥ |
avocāma | rahūgaṇāgnaye | madhumadvacaḥ |
dyumnairabhi | pra | ṇonumaḥ |
hiraṇyakeśo | rajaso | visāre'hirdhunirvāteva | dhrajīmān |
śucibhrājoṣaso | navedā | yaśasvatīrapasyuvo | na | satyāḥ |
ā | te | suparṇāminantam̐ | evaiḥ | kṛṣṇo | nonāva | vṛṣabho | yadīdam |
śivābhirna | smayamānābhirāgātpatanti | mihaḥ | stanayantyabhrā |
yadīmṛtasya | payasā | piyāno | nayannṛtasya | pathibhī | rajiṣṭhaiḥ |
aryamā | mitro | varuṇaḥ | parijmā | tvacaṁ | pṛñcantyuparasya | yonau |
agne | vājasya | gomateśānaḥ | sahaso | yaho |
asme | dhehi | jātavedo | mahi | śravaḥ |
sedhāno | vasuṣkaviragnirīḻenyo | girā |
revadasmabhyaṁ | purvaṇīka | dīdihi |
kṣapo | rājannuta | tmanāgne | vastorutoṣasaḥ |
sa | tigmajambha | rakṣaso | daha | prati |
avā | no | agnotibhirgāyatrasya | prabharmaṇi |
viśvāsu | dhīṣu | vandya |
ā | no | agne | rayiṁ | bhara | satrāsāhaṁ | vareṇyam |
viśvāsu | pṛtsu | duṣṭaram |
ā | no | agne | sucetunā | rayiṁ | viśvāyupoṣasam |
mārḍīkaṁ | dhehi | jīvase |
pra | pūtāstigmaśociṣe | vāco | gotamāgnaye |
bharasva | sumnayurgiraḥ |
yo | no | agne'bhidāsatyanti | dūre | padīṣṭa | saḥ |
asmākamidvṛdhe | bhava |
sahasrākṣo | vicarṣaṇiragnī | rakṣāṁsi | sedhati |
hotā | gṛṇītokthyaḥ |
itthā | hi | somenmade | brahmā | cakāra | vardhanam |
śaviṣṭha | vajrinnojasā | pṛthivyā | niḥ | śaśāhimarcannanu | svarājyam |
sa | tvāmadadvṛṣā | madaḥ | somaḥ | śyenābhṛtaḥ | sutaḥ |
yenā | vṛtraṁ | niradbhyo | jaghantha | vajrinnojasārcannanu | svarājyam |
prehyabhīhi | dhṛṣṇuhi | na | te | vajro | ni | yaṁsate |
indra | nṛmṇaṁ | hi | te | śavo | hano | vṛtraṁ | jayāpo'rcannanu | svarājyam |
nirindra | bhūmyādhi | vṛtraṁ | jaghantha | nirdivaḥ |
sṛjā | marutvatīrava | jīvadhanyemā | apo'rcannanu | svarājyam |
indro | vṛtrasya | dodhataḥ | sānuṁ | vajreṇa | hīḻitaḥ |
abhikramyāva | jighnate'paḥ | sarmāya | codayannarcannanu | svarājyam |
adhi | sānau | ni | jighnate | vajreṇa | śataparvaṇā |
mandānendro | andhasaḥ | sakhibhyo | gātumicchatyarcannanu | svarājyam |
indra | tubhyamidadrivo'nuttaṁ | vajrinvīryam |
yaddha | tyaṁ | māyinaṁ | mṛgaṁ | tamu | tvaṁ | māyayāvadhīrarcannanu | svarājyam |
vi | te | vajrāso | asthirannavatiṁ | nāvyānu |
mahattendra | vīryaṁ | bāhvoste | balaṁ | hitamarcannanu | svarājyam |
sahasraṁ | sākamarcata | pari | ṣṭobhata | viṁśatiḥ |
śatainamanvanonavurindrāya | brahmodyatamarcannanu | svarājyam |
indro | vṛtrasya | taviṣīṁ | nirahantsahasā | sahaḥ |
mahattadasya | pauṁsyaṁ | vṛtraṁ | jaghanvām̐ | asṛjadarcannanu | svarājyam |
ime | cittava | manyave | vepete | bhiyasā | mahī |
yadindra | vajrinnojasā | vṛtraṁ | marutvām̐ | avadhīrarcannanu | svarājyam |
na | vepasā | na | tanyatendraṁ | vṛtro | vi | bībhayat |
abhyenaṁ | vajrāyasaḥ | sahasrabhṛṣṭirāyatārcannanu | svarājyam |
yadvṛtraṁ | tava | cāśaniṁ | vajreṇa | samayodhayaḥ |
ahimindra | jighāṁsato | divi | te | badbadhe | śavo'rcannanu | svarājyam |
abhiṣṭane | te | adrivo | yatsthā | jagacca | rejate |
tvaṣṭā | cittava | manyavendra | vevijyate | bhiyārcannanu | svarājyam |
nahi | nu | yādadhīmasīndraṁ | ko | vīryā | paraḥ |
tasminnṛmṇamuta | kratuṁ | devaujāṁsi | saṁ | dadhurarcannanu | svarājyam |
yāmatharvā | manuṣpitā | dadhyaṅdhiyamatnata |
tasminbrahmāṇi | pūrvathendrokthā | samagmatārcannanu | svarājyam |
indro | madāya | vāvṛdhe | śavase | vṛtrahā | nṛbhiḥ |
taminmahatsvājiṣūtemarbhe | havāmahe | sa | vājeṣu | pra | no'viṣat |
asi | hi | vīra | senyo'si | bhūri | parādadiḥ |
asi | dabhrasya | cidvṛdho | yajamānāya | śikṣasi | sunvate | bhūri | te | vasu |
yadudīratājayo | dhṛṣṇave | dhīyate | dhanā |
yukṣvā | madacyutā | harī | kaṁ | hanaḥ | kaṁ | vasau | dadho'smām̐ | indra | vasau | dadhaḥ |
kratvā | mahām̐ | anuṣvadhaṁ | bhīmā | vāvṛdhe | śavaḥ |
śriya | ṛṣvopākayorni | śiprī | harivāndadhe | hastayorvajramāyasam |
ā | paprau | pārthivaṁ | rajo | badbadhe | rocanā | divi |
na | tvāvām̐ | indra | kaścana | na | jāto | na | janiṣyate'ti | viśvaṁ | vavakṣitha |
yo | aryo | martabhojanaṁ | parādadāti | dāśuṣe |
indro | asmabhyaṁ | śikṣatu | vi | bhajā | bhūri | te | vasu | bhakṣīya | tava | rādhasaḥ |
mademade | hi | no | dadiryūthā | gavāmṛjukratuḥ |
saṁ | gṛbhāya | purū | śatobhayāhastyā | vasu | śiśīhi | rāyā | bhara |
mādayasva | sute | sacā | śavase | śūra | rādhase |
vidmā | hi | tvā | purūvasumupa | kāmāntsasṛjmahe'thā | no'vitā | bhava |
ete | tendra | jantavo | viśvaṁ | puṣyanti | vāryam |
antarhi | khyo | janānāmaryo | vedo | adāśuṣāṁ | teṣāṁ | no | vedā | bhara |
upo | ṣu | śṛṇuhī | giro | maghavanmātatheva |
yadā | naḥ | sūnṛtāvataḥ | karādarthayāsa | idyojā | nvindra | te | harī |
akṣannamīmadanta | hyava | priyādhūṣata |
astoṣata | svabhānavo | viprā | naviṣṭhayā | matī | yojā | nvindra | te | harī |
susaṁdṛśaṁ | tvā | vayaṁ | maghavanvandiṣīmahi |
pra | nūnaṁ | pūrṇavandhuraḥ | stuto | yāhi | vaśām̐ | anu | yojā | nvindra | te | harī |
sa | ghā | taṁ | vṛṣaṇaṁ | rathamadhi | tiṣṭhāti | govidam |
yaḥ | pātraṁ | hāriyojanaṁ | pūrṇamindra | ciketati | yojā | nvindra | te | harī |
yuktaste | astu | dakṣiṇota | savyaḥ | śatakrato |
tena | jāyāmupa | priyāṁ | mandāno | yāhyandhaso | yojā | nvindra | te | harī |
yunajmi | te | brahmaṇā | keśinā | harī | upa | pra | yāhi | dadhiṣe | gabhastyoḥ |
uttvā | sutāso | rabhasāmandiṣuḥ | pūṣaṇvānvajrintsamu | patnyāmadaḥ |
aśvāvati | prathamo | goṣu | gacchati | suprāvīrindra | martyastavotibhiḥ |
tamitpṛṇakṣi | vasunā | bhavīyasā | sindhumāpo | yathābhito | vicetasaḥ |
āpo | na | devīrupa | yanti | hotriyamavaḥ | paśyanti | vitataṁ | yathā | rajaḥ |
prācairdevāsaḥ | pra | ṇayanti | devayuṁ | brahmapriyaṁ | joṣayante | vareva |
adhi | dvayoradadhokthyaṁ | vaco | yatasrucā | mithunā | yā | saparyataḥ |
asaṁyatto | vrate | te | kṣeti | puṣyati | bhadrā | śaktiryajamānāya | sunvate |
ādaṅgirāḥ | prathamaṁ | dadhire | vayeddhāgnayaḥ | śamyā | ye | sukṛtyayā |
sarvaṁ | paṇeḥ | samavindanta | bhojanamaśvāvantaṁ | gomantamā | paśuṁ | naraḥ |
yajñairatharvā | prathamaḥ | pathastate | tataḥ | sūryo | vratapā | venājani |
ā | gājaduśanā | kāvyaḥ | sacā | yamasya | jātamamṛtaṁ | yajāmahe |
barhirvā | yatsvapatyāya | vṛjyate'rko | vā | ślokamāghoṣate | divi |
grāvā | yatra | vadati | kārurukthyastasyedindro | abhipitveṣu | raṇyati |
asāvi | somendra | te | śaviṣṭha | dhṛṣṇavā | gahi |
ā | tvā | pṛṇaktvindriyaṁ | rajaḥ | sūryo | na | raśmibhiḥ |
indramiddharī | vahato'pratidhṛṣṭaśavasam |
ṛṣīṇāṁ | ca | stutīrupa | yajñaṁ | ca | mānuṣāṇām |
ā | tiṣṭha | vṛtrahanrathaṁ | yuktā | te | brahmaṇā | harī |
arvācīnaṁ | su | te | mano | grāvā | kṛṇotu | vagnunā |
imamindra | sutaṁ | piba | jyeṣṭhamamartyaṁ | madam |
śukrasya | tvābhyakṣarandhārā | ṛtasya | sādane |
indrāya | nūnamarcatokthāni | ca | bravītana |
sutāmatsurindavo | jyeṣṭhaṁ | namasyatā | sahaḥ |
nakiṣṭvadrathītaro | harī | yadindra | yacchase |
nakiṣṭvānu | majmanā | nakiḥ | svaśvānaśe |
yaika | idvidayate | vasu | martāya | dāśuṣe |
īśāno | apratiṣkutendro | aṅga |
kadā | martamarādhasaṁ | padā | kṣumpamiva | sphurat |
kadā | naḥ | śuśravadgirendro | aṅga |
yaściddhi | tvā | bahubhyā | sutāvām̐ | āvivāsati |
ugraṁ | tatpatyate | śavendro | aṅga |
svādoritthā | viṣūvato | madhvaḥ | pibanti | gauryaḥ |
yendreṇa | sayāvarīrvṛṣṇā | madanti | śobhase | vasvīranu | svarājyam |
tāsya | pṛśanāyuvaḥ | somaṁ | śrīṇanti | pṛśnayaḥ |
priyendrasya | dhenavo | vajraṁ | hinvanti | sāyakaṁ | vasvīranu | svarājyam |
tāsya | namasā | sahaḥ | saparyanti | pracetasaḥ |
vratānyasya | saścire | purūṇi | pūrvacittaye | vasvīranu | svarājyam |
indro | dadhīco | asthabhirvṛtrāṇyapratiṣkutaḥ |
jaghāna | navatīrnava |
icchannaśvasya | yacchiraḥ | parvateṣvapaśritam |
tadvidaccharyaṇāvati |
atrāha | goramanvata | nāma | tvaṣṭurapīcyam |
itthā | candramaso | gṛhe |
ko | adya | yuṅkte | dhuri | gā | ṛtasya | śimīvato | bhāmino | durhṛṇāyūn |
āsanniṣūnhṛtsvaso | mayobhūnyaiṣāṁ | bhṛtyāmṛṇadhatsa | jīvāt |
keṣate | tujyate | ko | bibhāya | ko | maṁsate | santamindraṁ | ko | anti |
kastokāya | kebhāyota | rāye'dhi | bravattanve | ko | janāya |
ko | agnimīṭṭe | haviṣā | ghṛtena | srucā | yajātā | ṛtubhirdhruvebhiḥ |
kasmai | devā | vahānāśu | homa | ko | maṁsate | vītihotraḥ | sudevaḥ |
tvamaṅga | pra | śaṁsiṣo | devaḥ | śaviṣṭha | martyam |
na | tvadanyo | maghavannasti | marḍitendra | bravīmi | te | vacaḥ |
mā | te | rādhāṁsi | mā | totayo | vaso'smānkadā | canā | dabhan |
viśvā | ca | nopamimīhi | mānuṣa | vasūni | carṣaṇibhyā |
pra | ye | śumbhante | janayo | na | saptayo | yāmanrudrasya | sūnavaḥ | sudaṁsasaḥ |
rodasī | hi | marutaścakrire | vṛdhe | madanti | vīrā | vidatheṣu | ghṛṣvayaḥ |
tokṣitāso | mahimānamāśata | divi | rudrāso | adhi | cakrire | sadaḥ |
arcanto | arkaṁ | janayantendriyamadhi | śriyo | dadhire | pṛśnimātaraḥ |
gomātaro | yacchubhayante | añjibhistanūṣu | śubhrā | dadhire | virukmataḥ |
bādhante | viśvamabhimātinamapa | vartmānyeṣāmanu | rīyate | ghṛtam |
vi | ye | bhrājante | sumakhāsa | ṛṣṭibhiḥ | pracyāvayanto | acyutā | cidojasā |
manojuvo | yanmaruto | ratheṣvā | vṛṣavrātāsaḥ | pṛṣatīrayugdhvam |
pra | yadratheṣu | pṛṣatīrayugdhvaṁ | vāje | adriṁ | maruto | raṁhayantaḥ |
utāruṣasya | vi | ṣyanti | dhārāścarmevodabhirvyundanti | bhūma |
ā | vo | vahantu | saptayo | raghuṣyado | raghupatvānaḥ | pra | jigāta | bāhubhiḥ |
sīdatā | barhiruru | vaḥ | sadaskṛtaṁ | mādayadhvaṁ | maruto | madhvo | andhasaḥ |
te'vardhanta | svatavaso | mahitvanā | nākaṁ | tasthururu | cakrire | sadaḥ |
viṣṇuryaddhāvadvṛṣaṇaṁ | madacyutaṁ | vayo | na | sīdannadhi | barhiṣi | priye |
śūrevedyuyudhayo | na | jagmayaḥ | śravasyavo | na | pṛtanāsu | yetire |
bhayante | viśvā | bhuvanā | marudbhyo | rājāneva | tveṣasaṁdṛśo | naraḥ |
tvaṣṭā | yadvajraṁ | sukṛtaṁ | hiraṇyayaṁ | sahasrabhṛṣṭiṁ | svapāvartayat |
dhattendro | naryapāṁsi | kartave'hanvṛtraṁ | nirapāmaubjadarṇavam |
ūrdhvaṁ | nunudre'vataṁ | taujasā | dādṛhāṇaṁ | cidbibhidurvi | parvatam |
dhamanto | vāṇaṁ | marutaḥ | sudānavo | made | somasya | raṇyāni | cakrire |
jihmaṁ | nunudre'vataṁ | tayā | diśāsiñcannutsaṁ | gotamāya | tṛṣṇaje |
ā | gacchantīmavasā | citrabhānavaḥ | kāmaṁ | viprasya | tarpayanta | dhāmabhiḥ |
yā | vaḥ | śarma | śaśamānāya | santi | tridhātūni | dāśuṣe | yacchatādhi |
asmabhyaṁ | tāni | maruto | vi | yanta | rayiṁ | no | dhatta | vṛṣaṇaḥ | suvīram |
maruto | yasya | hi | kṣaye | pāthā | divo | vimahasaḥ |
sa | sugopātamo | janaḥ |
yajñairvā | yajñavāhaso | viprasya | vā | matīnām |
marutaḥ | śṛṇutā | havam |
uta | vā | yasya | vājino'nu | vipramatakṣata |
sa | gantā | gomati | vraje |
asya | vīrasya | barhiṣi | sutaḥ | somo | diviṣṭiṣu |
ukthaṁ | madaśca | śasyate |
asya | śroṣantvā | bhuvo | viśvā | yaścarṣaṇīrabhi |
sūraṁ | citsasruṣīriṣaḥ |
pūrvībhirhi | dadāśima | śaradbhirmaruto | vayam |
avobhiścarṣaṇīnām |
subhagaḥ | sa | prayajyavo | maruto | astu | martyaḥ |
yasya | prayāṁsi | parṣatha |
śaśamānasya | vā | naraḥ | svedasya | satyaśavasaḥ |
vidā | kāmasya | venataḥ |
yūyaṁ | tatsatyaśavasāviṣkarta | mahitvanā |
vidhyatā | vidyutā | rakṣaḥ |
gūhatā | guhyaṁ | tamo | vi | yāta | viśvamatriṇam |
jyotiṣkartā | yaduśmasi |
pratvakṣasaḥ | pratavaso | virapśino'nānatāvithurā | ṛjīṣiṇaḥ |
juṣṭatamāso | nṛtamāso | añjibhirvyānajre | ke | cidusreva | stṛbhiḥ |
upahvareṣu | yadacidhvaṁ | yayiṁ | vayeva | marutaḥ | kena | citpathā |
ścotanti | kośopa | vo | ratheṣvā | ghṛtamukṣatā | madhuvarṇamarcate |
praiṣāmajmeṣu | vithureva | rejate | bhūmiryāmeṣu | yaddha | yuñjate | śubhe |
te | krīḻayo | dhunayo | bhrājadṛṣṭayaḥ | svayaṁ | mahitvaṁ | panayanta | dhūtayaḥ |
sa | hi | svasṛtpṛṣadaśvo | yuvā | gaṇo'yeśānastaviṣībhirāvṛtaḥ |
asi | satya | ṛṇayāvānedyo'syā | dhiyaḥ | prāvitāthā | vṛṣā | gaṇaḥ |
pituḥ | pratnasya | janmanā | vadāmasi | somasya | jihvā | pra | jigāti | cakṣasā |
yadīmindraṁ | śamyṛkvāṇāśatādinnāmāni | yajñiyāni | dadhire |
śriyase | kaṁ | bhānubhiḥ | saṁ | mimikṣire | te | raśmibhista | ṛkvabhiḥ | sukhādayaḥ |
te | vāśīmanteṣmiṇo | abhīravo | vidre | priyasya | mārutasya | dhāmnaḥ |
ā | vidyunmadbhirmarutaḥ | svarkai | rathebhiryāta | ṛṣṭimadbhiraśvaparṇaiḥ |
ā | varṣiṣṭhayā | neṣā | vayo | na | paptatā | sumāyāḥ |
te'ruṇebhirvaramā | piśaṅgaiḥ | śubhe | kaṁ | yānti | rathatūrbhiraśvaiḥ |
rukmo | na | citraḥ | svadhitīvānpavyā | rathasya | jaṅghananta | bhūma |
śriye | kaṁ | vo | adhi | tanūṣu | vāśīrmedhā | vanā | na | kṛṇavantordhvā |
yuṣmabhyaṁ | kaṁ | marutaḥ | sujātāstuvidyumnāso | dhanayante | adrim |
ahāni | gṛdhrāḥ | paryā | vāgurimāṁ | dhiyaṁ | vārkāryāṁ | ca | devīm |
brahma | kṛṇvanto | gotamāso | arkairūrdhvaṁ | nunudrotsadhiṁ | pibadhyai |
etattyanna | yojanamaceti | sasvarha | yanmaruto | gotamo | vaḥ |
paśyanhiraṇyacakrānayodaṁṣṭrānvidhāvato | varāhūn |
eṣā | syā | vo | maruto'nubhartrī | prati | ṣṭobhati | vāghato | na | vāṇī |
astobhayadvṛthāsāmanu | svadhāṁ | gabhastyoḥ |
ā | no | bhadrāḥ | kratavo | yantu | viśvato'dabdhāso | aparītāsodbhidaḥ |
devā | no | yathā | sadamidvṛdhe | asannaprāyuvo | rakṣitāro | divedive |
devānāṁ | bhadrā | sumatirṛjūyatāṁ | devānāṁ | rātirabhi | no | ni | vartatām |
devānāṁ | sakhyamupa | sedimā | vayaṁ | devā | nāyuḥ | pra | tirantu | jīvase |
tānpūrvayā | nividā | hūmahe | vayaṁ | bhagaṁ | mitramaditiṁ | dakṣamasridham |
aryamaṇaṁ | varuṇaṁ | somamaśvinā | sarasvatī | naḥ | subhagā | mayaskarat |
tanno | vāto | mayobhu | vātu | bheṣajaṁ | tanmātā | pṛthivī | tatpitā | dyauḥ |
tadgrāvāṇaḥ | somasuto | mayobhuvastadaśvinā | śṛṇutaṁ | dhiṣṇyā | yuvam |
tamīśānaṁ | jagatastasthuṣaspatiṁ | dhiyaṁjinvamavase | hūmahe | vayam |
pūṣā | no | yathā | vedasāmasadvṛdhe | rakṣitā | pāyuradabdhaḥ | svastaye |
svasti | nendro | vṛddhaśravāḥ | svasti | naḥ | pūṣā | viśvavedāḥ |
svasti | nastārkṣyo | ariṣṭanemiḥ | svasti | no | bṛhaspatirdadhātu |
pṛṣadaśvā | marutaḥ | pṛśnimātaraḥ | śubhaṁyāvāno | vidatheṣu | jagmayaḥ |
agnijihvā | manavaḥ | sūracakṣaso | viśve | no | devāvasā | gamanniha |
bhadraṁ | karṇebhiḥ | śṛṇuyāma | devā | bhadraṁ | paśyemākṣabhiryajatrāḥ |
sthirairaṅgaistuṣṭuvāṁsastanūbhirvyaśema | devahitaṁ | yadāyuḥ |
śataminnu | śarado | anti | devā | yatrā | naścakrā | jarasaṁ | tanūnām |
putrāso | yatra | pitaro | bhavanti | mā | no | madhyā | rīriṣatāyurgantoḥ |
aditirdyauraditirantarikṣamaditirmātā | sa | pitā | sa | putraḥ |
viśve | devāditiḥ | pañca | janāditirjātamaditirjanitvam |
ṛjunītī | no | varuṇo | mitro | nayatu | vidvān |
aryamā | devaiḥ | sajoṣāḥ |
te | hi | vasvo | vasavānāste | apramūrā | mahobhiḥ |
vratā | rakṣante | viśvāhā |
te | asmabhyaṁ | śarma | yaṁsannamṛtā | martyebhyaḥ |
bādhamānāpa | dviṣaḥ |
vi | naḥ | pathaḥ | suvitāya | ciyantvindro | marutaḥ |
pūṣā | bhago | vandyāsaḥ |
uta | no | dhiyo | goagrāḥ | pūṣanviṣṇavevayāvaḥ |
kartā | naḥ | svastimataḥ |
madhu | vātā | ṛtāyate | madhu | kṣaranti | sindhavaḥ |
mādhvīrnaḥ | santvoṣadhīḥ |
madhu | naktamutoṣaso | madhumatpārthivaṁ | rajaḥ |
madhu | dyaurastu | naḥ | pitā |
madhumānno | vanaspatirmadhumām̐ | astu | sūryaḥ |
mādhvīrgāvo | bhavantu | naḥ |
śaṁ | no | mitraḥ | śaṁ | varuṇaḥ | śaṁ | no | bhavatvaryamā |
śaṁ | nendro | bṛhaspatiḥ | śaṁ | no | viṣṇururukramaḥ |
tvaṁ | soma | pra | cikito | manīṣā | tvaṁ | rajiṣṭhamanu | neṣi | panthām |
tava | praṇītī | pitaro | nendo | deveṣu | ratnamabhajanta | dhīrāḥ |
tvaṁ | soma | kratubhiḥ | sukraturbhūstvaṁ | dakṣaiḥ | sudakṣo | viśvavedāḥ |
tvaṁ | vṛṣā | vṛṣatvebhirmahitvā | dyumnebhirdyumnyabhavo | nṛcakṣāḥ |
rājño | nu | te | varuṇasya | vratāni | bṛhadgabhīraṁ | tava | soma | dhāma |
śuciṣṭvamasi | priyo | na | mitro | dakṣāyyo | aryamevāsi | soma |
yā | te | dhāmāni | divi | yā | pṛthivyāṁ | yā | parvateṣvoṣadhīṣvapsu |
tebhirno | viśvaiḥ | sumanāheḻanrājantsoma | prati | havyā | gṛbhāya |
tvaṁ | somāsi | satpatistvaṁ | rājota | vṛtrahā |
tvaṁ | bhadro | asi | kratuḥ |
tvaṁ | ca | soma | no | vaśo | jīvātuṁ | na | marāmahe |
priyastotro | vanaspatiḥ |
tvaṁ | soma | mahe | bhagaṁ | tvaṁ | yūna | ṛtāyate |
dakṣaṁ | dadhāsi | jīvase |
tvaṁ | naḥ | soma | viśvato | rakṣā | rājannaghāyataḥ |
na | riṣyettvāvataḥ | sakhā |
soma | yāste | mayobhuvotayaḥ | santi | dāśuṣe |
tābhirno'vitā | bhava |
imaṁ | yajñamidaṁ | vaco | jujuṣāṇopāgahi |
soma | tvaṁ | no | vṛdhe | bhava |
soma | gīrbhiṣṭvā | vayaṁ | vardhayāmo | vacovidaḥ |
sumṛḻīko | nā | viśa |
gayasphāno | amīvahā | vasuvitpuṣṭivardhanaḥ |
sumitraḥ | soma | no | bhava |
soma | rārandhi | no | hṛdi | gāvo | na | yavaseṣvā |
maryeva | svaukye |
yaḥ | soma | sakhye | tava | rāraṇaddeva | martyaḥ |
taṁ | dakṣaḥ | sacate | kaviḥ |
uruṣyā | ṇo | abhiśasteḥ | soma | ni | pāhyaṁhasaḥ |
sakhā | suśevaidhi | naḥ |
ā | pyāyasva | sametu | te | viśvataḥ | soma | vṛṣṇyam |
bhavā | vājasya | saṁgathe |
ā | pyāyasva | madintama | soma | viśvebhiraṁśubhiḥ |
bhavā | naḥ | suśravastamaḥ | sakhā | vṛdhe |
saṁ | te | payāṁsi | samu | yantu | vājāḥ | saṁ | vṛṣṇyānyabhimātiṣāhaḥ |
āpyāyamāno | amṛtāya | soma | divi | śravāṁsyuttamāni | dhiṣva |
yā | te | dhāmāni | haviṣā | yajanti | tā | te | viśvā | paribhūrastu | yajñam |
gayasphānaḥ | prataraṇaḥ | suvīro'vīrahā | pra | carā | soma | duryān |
somo | dhenuṁ | somo | arvantamāśuṁ | somo | vīraṁ | karmaṇyaṁ | dadāti |
sādanyaṁ | vidathyaṁ | sabheyaṁ | pitṛśravaṇaṁ | yo | dadāśadasmai |
aṣāḻhaṁ | yutsu | pṛtanāsu | papriṁ | svarṣāmapsāṁ | vṛjanasya | gopām |
bhareṣujāṁ | sukṣitiṁ | suśravasaṁ | jayantaṁ | tvāmanu | madema | soma |
tvamimauṣadhīḥ | soma | viśvāstvamapo | ajanayastvaṁ | gāḥ |
tvamā | tatanthorvantarikṣaṁ | tvaṁ | jyotiṣā | vi | tamo | vavartha |
devena | no | manasā | deva | soma | rāyo | bhāgaṁ | sahasāvannabhi | yudhya |
mā | tvā | tanadīśiṣe | vīryasyobhayebhyaḥ | pra | cikitsā | gaviṣṭau |
eto | tyoṣasaḥ | ketumakrata | pūrve | ardhe | rajaso | bhānumañjate |
niṣkṛṇvānāyudhānīva | dhṛṣṇavaḥ | prati | gāvo'ruṣīryanti | mātaraḥ |
udapaptannaruṇā | bhānavo | vṛthā | svāyujo | aruṣīrgāyukṣata |
akrannuṣāso | vayunāni | pūrvathā | ruśantaṁ | bhānumaruṣīraśiśrayuḥ |
arcanti | nārīrapaso | na | viṣṭibhiḥ | samānena | yojanenā | parāvataḥ |
iṣaṁ | vahantīḥ | sukṛte | sudānave | viśvedaha | yajamānāya | sunvate |
adhi | peśāṁsi | vapate | nṛtūrivāporṇute | vakṣosreva | barjaham |
jyotirviśvasmai | bhuvanāya | kṛṇvatī | gāvo | na | vrajaṁ | vyuṣāvartamaḥ |
pratyarcī | ruśadasyādarśi | vi | tiṣṭhate | bādhate | kṛṣṇamabhvam |
svaruṁ | na | peśo | vidatheṣvañjañcitraṁ | divo | duhitā | bhānumaśret |
atāriṣma | tamasaspāramasyoṣocchantī | vayunā | kṛṇoti |
śriye | chando | na | smayate | vibhātī | supratīkā | saumanasāyājīgaḥ |
bhāsvatī | netrī | sūnṛtānāṁ | divaḥ | stave | duhitā | gotamebhiḥ |
prajāvato | nṛvato | aśvabudhyānuṣo | goagrām̐ | upa | māsi | vājān |
uṣastamaśyāṁ | yaśasaṁ | suvīraṁ | dāsapravargaṁ | rayimaśvabudhyam |
sudaṁsasā | śravasā | yā | vibhāsi | vājaprasūtā | subhage | bṛhantam |
viśvāni | devī | bhuvanābhicakṣyā | pratīcī | cakṣururviyā | vi | bhāti |
viśvaṁ | jīvaṁ | carase | bodhayantī | viśvasya | vācamavidanmanāyoḥ |
punaḥpunarjāyamānā | purāṇī | samānaṁ | varṇamabhi | śumbhamānā |
śvaghnīva | kṛtnurvijāminānā | martasya | devī | jarayantyāyuḥ |
vyūrṇvatī | divo | antām̐ | abodhyapa | svasāraṁ | sanutaryuyoti |
praminatī | manuṣyā | yugāni | yoṣā | jārasya | cakṣasā | vi | bhāti |
paśūnna | citrā | subhagā | prathānā | sindhurna | kṣodorviyā | vyaśvait |
aminatī | daivyāni | vratāni | sūryasya | ceti | raśmibhirdṛśānā |
uṣastaccitramā | bharāsmabhyaṁ | vājinīvati |
yena | tokaṁ | ca | tanayaṁ | ca | dhāmahe |
uṣo | adyeha | gomatyaśvāvati | vibhāvari |
revadasme | vyuccha | sūnṛtāvati |
yukṣvā | hi | vājinīvatyaśvām̐ | adyāruṇām̐ | uṣaḥ |
athā | no | viśvā | saubhagānyā | vaha |
aśvinā | vartirasmadā | gomaddasrā | hiraṇyavat |
arvāgrathaṁ | samanasā | ni | yacchatam |
yāvitthā | ślokamā | divo | jyotirjanāya | cakrathuḥ |
ā | norjaṁ | vahatamaśvinā | yuvam |
eha | devā | mayobhuvā | dasrā | hiraṇyavartanī |
uṣarbudho | vahantu | somapītaye |
agnīṣomāvimaṁ | su | me | śṛṇutaṁ | vṛṣaṇā | havam |
prati | sūktāni | haryataṁ | bhavataṁ | dāśuṣe | mayaḥ |
agnīṣomā | yo | adya | vāmidaṁ | vacaḥ | saparyati |
tasmai | dhattaṁ | suvīryaṁ | gavāṁ | poṣaṁ | svaśvyam |
agnīṣomā | yāhutiṁ | yo | vāṁ | dāśāddhaviṣkṛtim |
sa | prajayā | suvīryaṁ | viśvamāyurvyaśnavat |
agnīṣomā | ceti | tadvīryaṁ | vāṁ | yadamuṣṇītamavasaṁ | paṇiṁ | gāḥ |
avātirataṁ | bṛsayasya | śeṣo'vindataṁ | jyotirekaṁ | bahubhyaḥ |
yuvametāni | divi | rocanānyagniśca | soma | sakratū | adhattam |
yuvaṁ | sindhūm̐rabhiśasteravadyādagnīṣomāvamuñcataṁ | gṛbhītān |
ānyaṁ | divo | mātariśvā | jabhārāmathnādanyaṁ | pari | śyeno | adreḥ |
agnīṣomā | brahmaṇā | vāvṛdhānoruṁ | yajñāya | cakrathuru | lokam |
agnīṣomā | haviṣaḥ | prasthitasya | vītaṁ | haryataṁ | vṛṣaṇā | juṣethām |
suśarmāṇā | svavasā | hi | bhūtamathā | dhattaṁ | yajamānāya | śaṁ | yoḥ |
yo | agnīṣomā | haviṣā | saparyāddevadrīcā | manasā | yo | ghṛtena |
tasya | vrataṁ | rakṣataṁ | pātamaṁhaso | viśe | janāya | mahi | śarma | yacchatam |
agnīṣomā | savedasā | sahūtī | vanataṁ | giraḥ |
saṁ | devatrā | babhūvathuḥ |
agnīṣomāvanena | vāṁ | yo | vāṁ | ghṛtena | dāśati |
tasmai | dīdayataṁ | bṛhat |
agnīṣomāvimāni | no | yuvaṁ | havyā | jujoṣatam |
ā | yātamupa | naḥ | sacā |
agnīṣomā | pipṛtamarvato | nā | pyāyantāmusriyā | havyasūdaḥ |
asme | balāni | maghavatsu | dhattaṁ | kṛṇutaṁ | no | adhvaraṁ | śruṣṭimantam |
imaṁ | stomamarhate | jātavedase | rathamiva | saṁ | mahemā | manīṣayā |
bhadrā | hi | naḥ | pramatirasya | saṁsadyagne | sakhye | mā | riṣāmā | vayaṁ | tava |
yasmai | tvamāyajase | sa | sādhatyanarvā | kṣeti | dadhate | suvīryam |
sa | tūtāva | nainamaśnotyaṁhatiragne | sakhye | mā | riṣāmā | vayaṁ | tava |
śakema | tvā | samidhaṁ | sādhayā | dhiyastve | devā | haviradantyāhutam |
tvamādityām̐ | ā | vaha | tānhyuśmasyagne | sakhye | mā | riṣāmā | vayaṁ | tava |
bharāmedhmaṁ | kṛṇavāmā | havīṁṣi | te | citayantaḥ | parvaṇāparvaṇā | vayam |
jīvātave | prataraṁ | sādhayā | dhiyo'gne | sakhye | mā | riṣāmā | vayaṁ | tava |
viśāṁ | gopāsya | caranti | jantavo | dvipacca | yaduta | catuṣpadaktubhiḥ |
citraḥ | praketoṣaso | mahām̐ | asyagne | sakhye | mā | riṣāmā | vayaṁ | tava |
tvamadhvaryuruta | hotāsi | pūrvyaḥ | praśāstā | potā | januṣā | purohitaḥ |
viśvā | vidvām̐ | ārtvijyā | dhīra | puṣyasyagne | sakhye | mā | riṣāmā | vayaṁ | tava |
yo | viśvataḥ | supratīkaḥ | sadṛṅṅasi | dūre | citsantaḻidivāti | rocase |
rātryāścidandho | ati | deva | paśyasyagne | sakhye | mā | riṣāmā | vayaṁ | tava |
pūrvo | devā | bhavatu | sunvato | ratho'smākaṁ | śaṁso | abhyastu | dūḍhyaḥ |
tadā | jānītota | puṣyatā | vaco'gne | sakhye | mā | riṣāmā | vayaṁ | tava |
vadhairduḥśaṁsām̐ | apa | dūḍhyo | jahi | dūre | vā | ye | anti | vā | ke | cidatriṇaḥ |
athā | yajñāya | gṛṇate | sugaṁ | kṛdhyagne | sakhye | mā | riṣāmā | vayaṁ | tava |
yadayukthāruṣā | rohitā | rathe | vātajūtā | vṛṣabhasyeva | te | ravaḥ |
ādinvasi | vanino | dhūmaketunāgne | sakhye | mā | riṣāmā | vayaṁ | tava |
adha | svanāduta | bibhyuḥ | patatriṇo | drapsā | yatte | yavasādo | vyasthiran |
sugaṁ | tatte | tāvakebhyo | rathebhyo'gne | sakhye | mā | riṣāmā | vayaṁ | tava |
ayaṁ | mitrasya | varuṇasya | dhāyase'vayātāṁ | marutāṁ | heḻo | adbhutaḥ |
mṛḻā | su | no | bhūtveṣāṁ | manaḥ | punaragne | sakhye | mā | riṣāmā | vayaṁ | tava |
devo | devānāmasi | mitro | adbhuto | vasurvasūnāmasi | cāruradhvare |
śarmantsyāma | tava | saprathastame'gne | sakhye | mā | riṣāmā | vayaṁ | tava |
tatte | bhadraṁ | yatsamiddhaḥ | sve | dame | somāhuto | jarase | mṛḻayattamaḥ |
dadhāsi | ratnaṁ | draviṇaṁ | ca | dāśuṣe'gne | sakhye | mā | riṣāmā | vayaṁ | tava |
yasmai | tvaṁ | sudraviṇo | dadāśo'nāgāstvamadite | sarvatātā |
yaṁ | bhadreṇa | śavasā | codayāsi | prajāvatā | rādhasā | te | syāma |
sa | tvamagne | saubhagatvasya | vidvānasmākamāyuḥ | pra | tireha | deva |
tanno | mitro | varuṇo | māmahantāmaditiḥ | sindhuḥ | pṛthivī | uta | dyauḥ |
dve | virūpe | carataḥ | svarthe | anyānyā | vatsamupa | dhāpayete |
hariranyasyāṁ | bhavati | svadhāvāñchukro | anyasyāṁ | dadṛśe | suvarcāḥ |
daśemaṁ | tvaṣṭurjanayanta | garbhamatandrāso | yuvatayo | vibhṛtram |
tigmānīkaṁ | svayaśasaṁ | janeṣu | virocamānaṁ | pari | ṣīṁ | nayanti |
trīṇi | jānā | pari | bhūṣantyasya | samudraikaṁ | divyekamapsu |
pūrvāmanu | pra | diśaṁ | pārthivānāmṛtūnpraśāsadvi | dadhāvanuṣṭhu |
kemaṁ | vo | niṇyamā | ciketa | vatso | mātṝrjanayata | svadhābhiḥ |
bahvīnāṁ | garbho | apasāmupasthānmahānkavirniścarati | svadhāvān |
āviṣṭyo | vardhate | cārurāsu | jihmānāmūrdhvaḥ | svayaśopasthe |
ubhe | tvaṣṭurbibhyaturjāyamānātpratīcī | siṁhaṁ | prati | joṣayete |
ubhe | bhadre | joṣayete | na | mene | gāvo | na | vāśropa | tasthurevaiḥ |
sa | dakṣāṇāṁ | dakṣapatirbabhūvāñjanti | yaṁ | dakṣiṇato | havirbhiḥ |
udyaṁyamīti | saviteva | bāhūbhe | sicau | yatate | bhīma | ṛñjan |
ucchukramatkamajate | simasmānnavā | mātṛbhyo | vasanā | jahāti |
tveṣaṁ | rūpaṁ | kṛṇutottaraṁ | yatsaṁpṛñcānaḥ | sadane | gobhiradbhiḥ |
kavirbudhnaṁ | pari | marmṛjyate | dhīḥ | sā | devatātā | samitirbabhūva |
uru | te | jrayaḥ | paryeti | budhnaṁ | virocamānaṁ | mahiṣasya | dhāma |
viśvebhiragne | svayaśobhiriddho'dabdhebhiḥ | pāyubhiḥ | pāhyasmān |
dhanvantsrotaḥ | kṛṇute | gātumūrmiṁ | śukrairūrmibhirabhi | nakṣati | kṣām |
viśvā | sanāni | jaṭhareṣu | dhatte'ntarnavāsu | carati | prasūṣu |
evā | no | agne | samidhā | vṛdhāno | revatpāvaka | śravase | vi | bhāhi |
tanno | mitro | varuṇo | māmahantāmaditiḥ | sindhuḥ | pṛthivī | uta | dyauḥ |
sa | pratnathā | sahasā | jāyamānaḥ | sadyaḥ | kāvyāni | baḻadhatta | viśvā |
āpaśca | mitraṁ | dhiṣaṇā | ca | sādhandevāgniṁ | dhārayandraviṇodām |
sa | pūrvayā | nividā | kavyatāyorimāḥ | prajājanayanmanūnām |
vivasvatā | cakṣasā | dyāmapaśca | devāgniṁ | dhārayandraviṇodām |
tamīḻata | prathamaṁ | yajñasādhaṁ | viśārīrāhutamṛñjasānam |
ūrjaḥ | putraṁ | bharataṁ | sṛpradānuṁ | devāgniṁ | dhārayandraviṇodām |
sa | mātariśvā | puruvārapuṣṭirvidadgātuṁ | tanayāya | svarvit |
viśāṁ | gopā | janitā | rodasyordevāgniṁ | dhārayandraviṇodām |
naktoṣāsā | varṇamāmemyāne | dhāpayete | śiśumekaṁ | samīcī |
dyāvākṣāmā | rukmo | antarvi | bhāti | devāgniṁ | dhārayandraviṇodām |
rāyo | budhnaḥ | saṁgamano | vasūnāṁ | yajñasya | keturmanmasādhano | veḥ |
amṛtatvaṁ | rakṣamāṇāsainaṁ | devāgniṁ | dhārayandraviṇodām |
nū | ca | purā | ca | sadanaṁ | rayīṇāṁ | jātasya | ca | jāyamānasya | ca | kṣām |
sataśca | gopāṁ | bhavataśca | bhūrerdevāgniṁ | dhārayandraviṇodām |
draviṇodā | draviṇasasturasya | draviṇodāḥ | sanarasya | pra | yaṁsat |
draviṇodā | vīravatīmiṣaṁ | no | draviṇodā | rāsate | dīrghamāyuḥ |
evā | no | agne | samidhā | vṛdhāno | revatpāvaka | śravase | vi | bhāhi |
tanno | mitro | varuṇo | māmahantāmaditiḥ | sindhuḥ | pṛthivī | uta | dyauḥ |
apa | naḥ | śośucadaghamagne | śuśugdhyā | rayim |
apa | naḥ | śośucadagham |
sukṣetriyā | sugātuyā | vasūyā | ca | yajāmahe |
apa | naḥ | śośucadagham |
pra | yadbhandiṣṭhaiṣāṁ | prāsmākāsaśca | sūrayaḥ |
apa | naḥ | śośucadagham |
pra | yatte | agne | sūrayo | jāyemahi | pra | te | vayam |
apa | naḥ | śośucadagham |
pra | yadagneḥ | sahasvato | viśvato | yanti | bhānavaḥ |
apa | naḥ | śośucadagham |
tvaṁ | hi | viśvatomukha | viśvataḥ | paribhūrasi |
apa | naḥ | śośucadagham |
dviṣo | no | viśvatomukhāti | nāveva | pāraya |
apa | naḥ | śośucadagham |
sa | naḥ | sindhumiva | nāvayāti | parṣā | svastaye |
apa | naḥ | śośucadagham |
vaiśvānarasya | sumatau | syāma | rājā | hi | kaṁ | bhuvanānāmabhiśrīḥ |
ito | jāto | viśvamidaṁ | vi | caṣṭe | vaiśvānaro | yatate | sūryeṇa |
pṛṣṭo | divi | pṛṣṭo | agniḥ | pṛthivyāṁ | pṛṣṭo | viśvauṣadhīrā | viveśa |
vaiśvānaraḥ | sahasā | pṛṣṭo | agniḥ | sa | no | divā | sa | riṣaḥ | pātu | naktam |
vaiśvānara | tava | tatsatyamastvasmānrāyo | maghavānaḥ | sacantām |
tanno | mitro | varuṇo | māmahantāmaditiḥ | sindhuḥ | pṛthivī | uta | dyauḥ |
jātavedase | sunavāma | somamarātīyato | ni | dahāti | vedaḥ |
sa | naḥ | parṣadati | durgāṇi | viśvā | nāveva | sindhuṁ | duritātyagniḥ |
sa | yo | vṛṣā | vṛṣṇyebhiḥ | samokā | maho | divaḥ | pṛthivyāśca | samrāṭ |
satīnasatvā | havyo | bhareṣu | marutvānno | bhavatvindrotī |
yasyānāptaḥ | sūryasyeva | yāmo | bharebhare | vṛtrahā | śuṣmo | asti |
vṛṣantamaḥ | sakhibhiḥ | svebhirevairmarutvānno | bhavatvindrotī |
divo | na | yasya | retaso | dughānāḥ | panthāso | yanti | śavasāparītāḥ |
taraddveṣāḥ | sāsahiḥ | pauṁsyebhirmarutvānno | bhavatvindrotī |
so | aṅgirobhiraṅgirastamo | bhūdvṛṣā | vṛṣabhiḥ | sakhibhiḥ | sakhā | san |
ṛgmibhirṛgmī | gātubhirjyeṣṭho | marutvānno | bhavatvindrotī |
sa | sūnubhirna | rudrebhirṛbhvā | nṛṣāhye | sāsahvām̐ | amitrān |
sanīḻebhiḥ | śravasyāni | tūrvanmarutvānno | bhavatvindrotī |
sa | manyumīḥ | samadanasya | kartāsmākebhirnṛbhiḥ | sūryaṁ | sanat |
asminnahantsatpatiḥ | puruhūto | marutvānno | bhavatvindrotī |
tamūtayo | raṇayañchūrasātau | taṁ | kṣemasya | kṣitayaḥ | kṛṇvata | trām |
sa | viśvasya | karuṇasyeśaiko | marutvānno | bhavatvindrotī |
tamapsanta | śavasotsaveṣu | naro | naramavase | taṁ | dhanāya |
so | andhe | cittamasi | jyotirvidanmarutvānno | bhavatvindrotī |
sa | savyena | yamati | vrādhataścitsa | dakṣiṇe | saṁgṛbhītā | kṛtāni |
sa | kīriṇā | citsanitā | dhanāni | marutvānno | bhavatvindrotī |
sa | grāmebhiḥ | sanitā | sa | rathebhirvide | viśvābhiḥ | kṛṣṭibhirnvadya |
sa | pauṁsyebhirabhibhūraśastīrmarutvānno | bhavatvindrotī |
sa | jāmibhiryatsamajāti | mīḻhe'jāmibhirvā | puruhūtaivaiḥ |
apāṁ | tokasya | tanayasya | jeṣe | marutvānno | bhavatvindrotī |
sa | vajrabhṛddasyuhā | bhīmograḥ | sahasracetāḥ | śatanītha | ṛbhvā |
camrīṣo | na | śavasā | pāñcajanyo | marutvānno | bhavatvindrotī |
tasya | vajraḥ | krandati | smatsvarṣā | divo | na | tveṣo | ravathaḥ | śimīvān |
taṁ | sacante | sanayastaṁ | dhanāni | marutvānno | bhavatvindrotī |
yasyājasraṁ | śavasā | mānamukthaṁ | paribhujadrodasī | viśvataḥ | sīm |
sa | pāriṣatkratubhirmandasāno | marutvānno | bhavatvindrotī |
na | yasya | devā | devatā | na | martāpaścana | śavaso | antamāpuḥ |
sa | prarikvā | tvakṣasā | kṣmo | divaśca | marutvānno | bhavatvindrotī |
rohicchyāvā | sumadaṁśurlalāmīrdyukṣā | rāya | ṛjrāśvasya |
vṛṣaṇvantaṁ | bibhratī | dhūrṣu | rathaṁ | mandrā | ciketa | nāhuṣīṣu | vikṣu |
etattyattendra | vṛṣṇokthaṁ | vārṣāgirābhi | gṛṇanti | rādhaḥ |
ṛjrāśvaḥ | praṣṭibhirambarīṣaḥ | sahadevo | bhayamānaḥ | surādhāḥ |
dasyūñchimyūm̐śca | puruhūtaivairhatvā | pṛthivyāṁ | śarvā | ni | barhīt |
sanatkṣetraṁ | sakhibhiḥ | śvitnyebhiḥ | sanatsūryaṁ | sanadapaḥ | suvajraḥ |
viśvāhendro | adhivaktā | no | astvaparihvṛtāḥ | sanuyāma | vājam |
tanno | mitro | varuṇo | māmahantāmaditiḥ | sindhuḥ | pṛthivī | uta | dyauḥ |
pra | mandine | pitumadarcatā | vaco | yaḥ | kṛṣṇagarbhā | nirahannṛjiśvanā |
avasyavo | vṛṣaṇaṁ | vajradakṣiṇaṁ | marutvantaṁ | sakhyāya | havāmahe |
yo | vyaṁsaṁ | jāhṛṣāṇena | manyunā | yaḥ | śambaraṁ | yo | ahanpiprumavratam |
indro | yaḥ | śuṣṇamaśuṣaṁ | nyāvṛṇaṅmarutvantaṁ | sakhyāya | havāmahe |
yasya | dyāvāpṛthivī | pauṁsyaṁ | mahadyasya | vrate | varuṇo | yasya | sūryaḥ |
yasyendrasya | sindhavaḥ | saścati | vrataṁ | marutvantaṁ | sakhyāya | havāmahe |
yo | aśvānāṁ | yo | gavāṁ | gopatirvaśī | yāritaḥ | karmaṇikarmaṇi | sthiraḥ |
vīḻościdindro | yo | asunvato | vadho | marutvantaṁ | sakhyāya | havāmahe |
yo | viśvasya | jagataḥ | prāṇataspatiryo | brahmaṇe | prathamo | gāvindat |
indro | yo | dasyūm̐radharām̐ | avātiranmarutvantaṁ | sakhyāya | havāmahe |
yaḥ | śūrebhirhavyo | yaśca | bhīrubhiryo | dhāvadbhirhūyate | yaśca | jigyubhiḥ |
indraṁ | yaṁ | viśvā | bhuvanābhi | saṁdadhurmarutvantaṁ | sakhyāya | havāmahe |
rudrāṇāmeti | pradiśā | vicakṣaṇo | rudrebhiryoṣā | tanute | pṛthu | jrayaḥ |
indraṁ | manīṣābhyarcati | śrutaṁ | marutvantaṁ | sakhyāya | havāmahe |
yadvā | marutvaḥ | parame | sadhasthe | yadvāvame | vṛjane | mādayāse |
atā | yāhyadhvaraṁ | no | acchā | tvāyā | haviścakṛmā | satyarādhaḥ |
tvāyendra | somaṁ | suṣumā | sudakṣa | tvāyā | haviścakṛmā | brahmavāhaḥ |
adhā | niyutvaḥ | sagaṇo | marudbhirasminyajñe | barhiṣi | mādayasva |
mādayasva | haribhirye | tendra | vi | ṣyasva | śipre | vi | sṛjasva | dhene |
ā | tvā | suśipra | harayo | vahantūśanhavyāni | prati | no | juṣasva |
marutstotrasya | vṛjanasya | gopā | vayamindreṇa | sanuyāma | vājam |
tanno | mitro | varuṇo | māmahantāmaditiḥ | sindhuḥ | pṛthivī | uta | dyauḥ |
imāṁ | te | dhiyaṁ | pra | bhare | maho | mahīmasya | stotre | dhiṣaṇā | yattānaje |
tamutsave | ca | prasave | ca | sāsahimindraṁ | devāsaḥ | śavasāmadannanu |
asya | śravo | nadyaḥ | sapta | bibhrati | dyāvākṣāmā | pṛthivī | darśataṁ | vapuḥ |
asme | sūryācandramasābhicakṣe | śraddhe | kamindra | carato | vitarturam |
taṁ | smā | rathaṁ | maghavanprāva | sātaye | jaitraṁ | yaṁ | te | anumadāma | saṁgame |
ājā | nendra | manasā | puruṣṭuta | tvāyadbhyo | maghavañcharma | yaccha | naḥ |
vayaṁ | jayema | tvayā | yujā | vṛtamasmākamaṁśamudavā | bharebhare |
asmabhyamindra | varivaḥ | sugaṁ | kṛdhi | pra | śatrūṇāṁ | maghavanvṛṣṇyā | ruja |
nānā | hi | tvā | havamānā | janeme | dhanānāṁ | dhartaravasā | vipanyavaḥ |
asmākaṁ | smā | rathamā | tiṣṭha | sātaye | jaitraṁ | hīndra | nibhṛtaṁ | manastava |
gojitā | bāhū | amitakratuḥ | simaḥ | karmankarmañchatamūtiḥ | khajaṁkaraḥ |
akalpendraḥ | pratimānamojasāthā | janā | vi | hvayante | siṣāsavaḥ |
utte | śatānmaghavannucca | bhūyasotsahasrādririce | kṛṣṭiṣu | śravaḥ |
amātraṁ | tvā | dhiṣaṇā | titviṣe | mahyadhā | vṛtrāṇi | jighnase | puraṁdara |
triviṣṭidhātu | pratimānamojasastisro | bhūmīrnṛpate | trīṇi | rocanā |
atīdaṁ | viśvaṁ | bhuvanaṁ | vavakṣithāśatrurindra | januṣā | sanādasi |
tvāṁ | deveṣu | prathamaṁ | havāmahe | tvaṁ | babhūtha | pṛtanāsu | sāsahiḥ |
semaṁ | naḥ | kārumupamanyumudbhidamindraḥ | kṛṇotu | prasave | rathaṁ | puraḥ |
tvaṁ | jigetha | na | dhanā | rurodhithārbheṣvājā | maghavanmahatsu | ca |
tvāmugramavase | saṁ | śiśīmasyathā | nendra | havaneṣu | codaya |
viśvāhendro | adhivaktā | no | astvaparihvṛtāḥ | sanuyāma | vājam |
tanno | mitro | varuṇo | māmahantāmaditiḥ | sindhuḥ | pṛthivī | uta | dyauḥ |
tattendriyaṁ | paramaṁ | parācairadhārayanta | kavayaḥ | puredam |
kṣamedamanyaddivyanyadasya | samī | pṛcyate | samaneva | ketuḥ |
sa | dhārayatpṛthivīṁ | paprathacca | vajreṇa | hatvā | nirapaḥ | sasarja |
ahannahimabhinadrauhiṇaṁ | vyahanvyaṁsaṁ | maghavā | śacībhiḥ |
sa | jātūbharmā | śraddadhānaujaḥ | puro | vibhindannacaradvi | dāsīḥ |
vidvānvajrindasyave | hetimasyāryaṁ | saho | vardhayā | dyumnamindra |
tadūcuṣe | mānuṣemā | yugāni | kīrtenyaṁ | maghavā | nāma | bibhrat |
upaprayandasyuhatyāya | vajrī | yaddha | sūnuḥ | śravase | nāma | dadhe |
tadasyedaṁ | paśyatā | bhūri | puṣṭaṁ | śradindrasya | dhattana | vīryāya |
sa | gāvindatso | avindadaśvāntsauṣadhīḥ | so | apaḥ | sa | vanāni |
bhūrikarmaṇe | vṛṣabhāya | vṛṣṇe | satyaśuṣmāya | sunavāma | somam |
yādṛtyā | paripanthīva | śūro'yajvano | vibhajanneti | vedaḥ |
tadindra | preva | vīryaṁ | cakartha | yatsasantaṁ | vajreṇābodhayo'him |
anu | tvā | patnīrhṛṣitaṁ | vayaśca | viśve | devāso | amadannanu | tvā |
śuṣṇaṁ | pipruṁ | kuyavaṁ | vṛtramindra | yadāvadhīrvi | puraḥ | śambarasya |
tanno | mitro | varuṇo | māmahantāmaditiḥ | sindhuḥ | pṛthivī | uta | dyauḥ |
yoniṣṭendra | niṣade | akāri | tamā | ni | ṣīda | svāno | nārvā |
vimucyā | vayo'vasāyāśvāndoṣā | vastorvahīyasaḥ | prapitve |
o | tye | narendramūtaye | gurnū | cittāntsadyo | adhvano | jagamyāt |
devāso | manyuṁ | dāsasya | ścamnante | nā | vakṣantsuvitāya | varṇam |
ava | tmanā | bharate | ketavedāva | tmanā | bharate | phenamudan |
kṣīreṇa | snātaḥ | kuyavasya | yoṣe | hate | te | syātāṁ | pravaṇe | śiphāyāḥ |
yuyopa | nābhiruparasyāyoḥ | pra | pūrvābhistirate | rāṣṭi | śūraḥ |
añjasī | kuliśī | vīrapatnī | payo | hinvānodabhirbharante |
prati | yatsyā | nīthādarśi | dasyoroko | nācchā | sadanaṁ | jānatī | gāt |
adha | smā | no | maghavañcarkṛtādinmā | no | magheva | niṣṣapī | parā | dāḥ |
sa | tvaṁ | nendra | sūrye | so | apsvanāgāstvā | bhaja | jīvaśaṁse |
māntarāṁ | bhujamā | rīriṣo | naḥ | śraddhitaṁ | te | mahatendriyāya |
adhā | manye | śratte | asmādhāyi | vṛṣā | codasva | mahate | dhanāya |
mā | no | akṛte | puruhūta | yonāvindra | kṣudhyadbhyo | vayāsutiṁ | dāḥ |
mā | no | vadhīrindra | mā | parā | dā | mā | naḥ | priyā | bhojanāni | pra | moṣīḥ |
āṇḍā | mā | no | maghavañchakra | nirbhenmā | naḥ | pātrā | bhetsahajānuṣāṇi |
arvāṅehi | somakāmaṁ | tvāhurayaṁ | sutastasya | pibā | madāya |
uruvyacā | jaṭharā | vṛṣasva | piteva | naḥ | śṛṇuhi | hūyamānaḥ |
candramāpsvantarā | suparṇo | dhāvate | divi |
na | vo | hiraṇyanemayaḥ | padaṁ | vindanti | vidyuto | vittaṁ | me | asya | rodasī |
arthamidvo | arthinā | jāyā | yuvate | patim |
tuñjāte | vṛṣṇyaṁ | payaḥ | paridāya | rasaṁ | duhe | vittaṁ | me | asya | rodasī |
mo | ṣu | devādaḥ | svarava | pādi | divaspari |
mā | somyasya | śaṁbhuvaḥ | śūne | bhūma | kadā | cana | vittaṁ | me | asya | rodasī |
yajñaṁ | pṛcchāmyavamaṁ | sa | taddūto | vi | vocati |
kva | ṛtaṁ | pūrvyaṁ | gataṁ | kastadbibharti | nūtano | vittaṁ | me | asya | rodasī |
amī | ye | devāḥ | sthana | triṣvā | rocane | divaḥ |
kadva | ṛtaṁ | kadanṛtaṁ | kva | pratnā | vāhutirvittaṁ | me | asya | rodasī |
kadva | ṛtasya | dharṇasi | kadvaruṇasya | cakṣaṇam |
kadaryamṇo | mahaspathāti | krāmema | dūḍhyo | vittaṁ | me | asya | rodasī |
ahaṁ | so | asmi | yaḥ | purā | sute | vadāmi | kāni | cit |
taṁ | mā | vyantyādhyo | vṛko | na | tṛṣṇajaṁ | mṛgaṁ | vittaṁ | me | asya | rodasī |
saṁ | mā | tapantyabhitaḥ | sapatnīriva | parśavaḥ |
mūṣo | na | śiśnā | vyadanti | mādhyaḥ | stotāraṁ | te | śatakrato | vittaṁ | me | asya | rodasī |
amī | ye | sapta | raśmayastatrā | me | nābhirātatā |
tritastadvedāptyaḥ | sa | jāmitvāya | rebhati | vittaṁ | me | asya | rodasī |
amī | ye | pañcokṣaṇo | madhye | tasthurmaho | divaḥ |
devatrā | nu | pravācyaṁ | sadhrīcīnā | ni | vāvṛturvittaṁ | me | asya | rodasī |
suparṇaita | āsate | madhyārodhane | divaḥ |
te | sedhanti | patho | vṛkaṁ | tarantaṁ | yahvatīrapo | vittaṁ | me | asya | rodasī |
navyaṁ | tadukthyaṁ | hitaṁ | devāsaḥ | supravācanam |
ṛtamarṣanti | sindhavaḥ | satyaṁ | tātāna | sūryo | vittaṁ | me | asya | rodasī |
agne | tava | tyadukthyaṁ | deveṣvastyāpyam |
sa | naḥ | satto | manuṣvadā | devānyakṣi | viduṣṭaro | vittaṁ | me | asya | rodasī |
satto | hotā | manuṣvadā | devām̐ | acchā | viduṣṭaraḥ |
agnirhavyā | suṣūdati | devo | deveṣu | medhiro | vittaṁ | me | asya | rodasī |
brahmā | kṛṇoti | varuṇo | gātuvidaṁ | tamīmahe |
vyūrṇoti | hṛdā | matiṁ | navyo | jāyatāmṛtaṁ | vittaṁ | me | asya | rodasī |
asau | yaḥ | panthādityo | divi | pravācyaṁ | kṛtaḥ |
na | sa | devātikrame | taṁ | martāso | na | paśyatha | vittaṁ | me | asya | rodasī |
tritaḥ | kūpe'vahito | devānhavatotaye |
tacchuśrāva | bṛhaspatiḥ | kṛṇvannaṁhūraṇāduru | vittaṁ | me | asya | rodasī |

rathaṁ | na | durgādvasavaḥ | sudānavo | viśvasmānno | aṁhaso | niṣpipartana |
tādityā | ā | gatā | sarvatātaye | bhūta | devā | vṛtratūryeṣu | śaṁbhuvaḥ |

yendrāgnī | citratamo | ratho | vāmabhi | viśvāni | bhuvanāni | caṣṭe |
tenā | yātaṁ | sarathaṁ | tasthivāṁsāthā | somasya | pibataṁ | sutasya |
yāvadidaṁ | bhuvanaṁ | viśvamastyuruvyacā | varimatā | gabhīram |
tāvām̐ | ayaṁ | pātave | somo | astvaramindrāgnī | manase | yuvabhyām |

tīvraiḥ | somaiḥ | pariṣiktebhirarvāgendrāgnī | saumanasāya | yātam |

yadabravaṁ | prathamaṁ | vāṁ | vṛṇāno'yaṁ | somo | asurairno | vihavyaḥ |

tanno | mitro | varuṇo | māmahantāmaditiḥ | sindhuḥ | pṛthivī | uta | dyauḥ |
vi | hyakhyaṁ | manasā | vasyecchannindrāgnī | jñāsota | vā | sajātān |
nānyā | yuvatpramatirasti | mahyaṁ | sa | vāṁ | dhiyaṁ | vājayantīmatakṣam |
aśravaṁ | hi | bhūridāvattarā | vāṁ | vijāmāturuta | vā | ghā | syālāt |
athā | somasya | prayatī | yuvabhyāmindrāgnī | stomaṁ | janayāmi | navyam |
mā | cchedma | raśmīm̐riti | nādhamānāḥ | pitṝṇāṁ | śaktīranuyacchamānāḥ |
indrāgnibhyāṁ | kaṁ | vṛṣaṇo | madanti | tā | hyadrī | dhiṣaṇāyopasthe |
yuvābhyāṁ | devī | dhiṣaṇā | madāyendrāgnī | somamuśatī | sunoti |
tāvaśvinā | bhadrahastā | supāṇī | ā | dhāvataṁ | madhunā | pṛṅktamapsu |
yuvāmindrāgnī | vasuno | vibhāge | tavastamā | śuśrava | vṛtrahatye |
tāvāsadyā | barhiṣi | yajñe | asminpra | carṣaṇī | mādayethāṁ | sutasya |
pra | carṣaṇibhyaḥ | pṛtanāhaveṣu | pra | pṛthivyā | riricāthe | divaśca |
pra | sindhubhyaḥ | pra | giribhyo | mahitvā | prendrāgnī | viśvā | bhuvanātyanyā |
ā | bharataṁ | śikṣataṁ | vajrabāhū | asmām̐ | indrāgnī | avataṁ | śacībhiḥ |
ime | nu | te | raśmayaḥ | sūryasya | yebhiḥ | sapitvaṁ | pitaro | nāsan |
puraṁdarā | śikṣataṁ | vajrahastāsmām̐ | indrāgnī | avataṁ | bhareṣu |
tanno | mitro | varuṇo | māmahantāmaditiḥ | sindhuḥ | pṛthivī | uta | dyauḥ |
tataṁ | me | apastadu | tāyate | punaḥ | svādiṣṭhā | dhītirucathāya | śasyate |
ayaṁ | samudreha | viśvadevyaḥ | svāhākṛtasya | samu | tṛpṇuta | ṛbhavaḥ |
ābhogayaṁ | pra | yadicchantāitanāpākāḥ | prāñco | mama | ke | cidāpayaḥ |
saudhanvanāsaścaritasya | bhūmanāgacchata | saviturdāśuṣo | gṛham |
tatsavitā | vo'mṛtatvamāsuvadagohyaṁ | yacchravayantāitana |
tyaṁ | ciccamasamasurasya | bhakṣaṇamekaṁ | santamakṛṇutā | caturvayam |
viṣṭvī | śamī | taraṇitvena | vāghato | martāsaḥ | santo | amṛtatvamānaśuḥ |
saudhanvanā | ṛbhavaḥ | sūracakṣasaḥ | saṁvatsare | samapṛcyanta | dhītibhiḥ |
kṣetramiva | vi | mamustejanenam̐ | ekaṁ | pātramṛbhavo | jehamānam |
upastutopamaṁ | nādhamānāmartyeṣu | śravecchamānāḥ |
ā | manīṣāmantarikṣasya | nṛbhyaḥ | sruceva | ghṛtaṁ | juhavāma | vidmanā |
taraṇitvā | ye | piturasya | saścira | ṛbhavo | vājamaruhandivo | rajaḥ |
