nānaukāṁsi | duryo | viśvamāyurvi | tiṣṭhate | prabhavaḥ | śoko | agneḥ |
jyeṣṭhaṁ | mātā | sūnave | bhāgamādhādanvasya | ketamiṣitaṁ | savitrā |
samāvavarti | viṣṭhito | jigīṣurviśveṣāṁ | kāmaścaratāmamābhūt |
śaśvām̐ | apo | vikṛtaṁ | hitvyāgādanu | vrataṁ | saviturdaivyasya |
tvayā | hitamapyamapsu | bhāgaṁ | dhanvānvā | mṛgayaso | vi | tasthuḥ |
vanāni | vibhyo | nakirasya | tāni | vratā | devasya | saviturminanti |
yādrādhyaṁ | varuṇo | yonimapyamaniśitaṁ | nimiṣi | jarbhurāṇaḥ |
viśvo | mārtāṇḍo | vrajamā | paśurgātsthaśo | janmāni | savitā | vyākaḥ |
na | yasyendro | varuṇo | na | mitro | vratamaryamā | na | minanti | rudraḥ |
nārātayastamidaṁ | svasti | huve | devaṁ | savitāraṁ | namobhiḥ |
bhagaṁ | dhiyaṁ | vājayantaḥ | puraṁdhiṁ | narāśaṁso | gnāspatirno | avyāḥ |
āye | vāmasya | saṁgathe | rayīṇāṁ | priyā | devasya | savituḥ | syāma |
asmabhyaṁ | taddivo | adbhyaḥ | pṛthivyāstvayā | dattaṁ | kāmyaṁ | rādhā | gāt |
śaṁ | yatstotṛbhyāpaye | bhavātyuruśaṁsāya | savitarjaritre |
grāvāṇeva | tadidarthaṁ | jarethe | gṛdhreva | vṛkṣaṁ | nidhimantamaccha |
brahmāṇeva | vidathokthaśāsā | dūteva | havyā | janyā | purutrā |
prātaryāvāṇā | rathyeva | vīrājeva | yamā | varamā | sacethe |
mene | iva | tanvā | śumbhamāne | daṁpatīva | kratuvidā | janeṣu |
śṛṅgeva | naḥ | prathamā | gantamarvākchaphāviva | jarbhurāṇā | tarobhiḥ |
cakravākeva | prati | vastorusrārvāñcā | yātaṁ | rathyeva | śakrā |
nāveva | naḥ | pārayataṁ | yugeva | nabhyeva | nopadhīva | pradhīva |
śvāneva | no | ariṣaṇyā | tanūnāṁ | khṛgaleva | visrasaḥ | pātamasmān |
vātevājuryā | nadyeva | rītirakṣīva | cakṣuṣā | yātamarvāk |
hastāviva | tanve | śaṁbhaviṣṭhā | pādeva | no | nayataṁ | vasyo | accha |
oṣṭhāviva | madhvāsne | vadantā | stanāviva | pipyataṁ | jīvase | naḥ |
nāseva | nastanvo | rakṣitārā | karṇāviva | suśrutā | bhūtamasme |
hasteva | śaktimabhi | saṁdadī | naḥ | kṣāmeva | naḥ | samajataṁ | rajāṁsi |
imā | giro | aśvinā | yuṣmayantīḥ | kṣṇotreṇeva | svadhitiṁ | saṁ | śiśītam |
etāni | vāmaśvinā | vardhanāni | brahma | stomaṁ | gṛtsamadāso | akran |
tāni | narā | jujuṣāṇopa | yātaṁ | bṛhadvadema | vidathe | suvīrāḥ |
somāpūṣaṇā | jananā | rayīṇāṁ | jananā | divo | jananā | pṛthivyāḥ |
jātau | viśvasya | bhuvanasya | gopau | devākṛṇvannamṛtasya | nābhim |
imau | devau | jāyamānau | juṣantemau | tamāṁsi | gūhatāmajuṣṭā |
ābhyāmindraḥ | pakvamāmāsvantaḥ | somāpūṣabhyāṁ | janadusriyāsu |
somāpūṣaṇā | rajaso | vimānaṁ | saptacakraṁ | rathamaviśvaminvam |
viṣūvṛtaṁ | manasā | yujyamānaṁ | taṁ | jinvatho | vṛṣaṇā | pañcaraśmim |
divyanyaḥ | sadanaṁ | cakroccā | pṛthivyāmanyo | adhyantarikṣe |
tāvasmabhyaṁ | puruvāraṁ | purukṣuṁ | rāyaspoṣaṁ | vi | ṣyatāṁ | nābhimasme |
viśvānyanyo | bhuvanā | jajāna | viśvamanyo | abhicakṣāṇaiti |
somāpūṣaṇāvavataṁ | dhiyaṁ | me | yuvābhyāṁ | viśvāḥ | pṛtanā | jayema |
dhiyaṁ | pūṣā | jinvatu | viśvaminvo | rayiṁ | somo | rayipatirdadhātu |
avatu | devyaditiranarvā | bṛhadvadema | vidathe | suvīrāḥ |
vāyo | ye | te | sahasriṇo | rathāsastebhirā | gahi |
niyutvāntsomapītaye |
niyutvānvāyavā | gahyayaṁ | śukro | ayāmi | te |
gantāsi | sunvato | gṛham |
śukrasyādya | gavāśirendravāyū | niyutvataḥ |
ā | yātaṁ | pibataṁ | narā |
ayaṁ | vāṁ | mitrāvaruṇā | sutaḥ | soma | ṛtāvṛdhā |
mamediha | śrutaṁ | havam |
rājānāvanabhidruhā | dhruve | sadasyuttame |
sahasrasthūṇāsāte |
tā | samrājā | ghṛtāsutī | ādityā | dānunaspatī |
sacete | anavahvaram |
gomadū | ṣu | nāsatyāśvāvadyātamaśvinā |
vartī | rudrā | nṛpāyyam |
na | yatparo | nāntarādadharṣadvṛṣaṇvasū |
duḥśaṁso | martyo | ripuḥ |
tā | nā | voḻhamaśvinā | rayiṁ | piśaṅgasaṁdṛśam |
dhiṣṇyā | varivovidam |
indro | aṅga | mahadbhayamabhī | ṣadapa | cucyavat |
sa | hi | sthiro | vicarṣaṇiḥ |
indraśca | mṛḻayāti | no | na | naḥ | paścādaghaṁ | naśat |
bhadraṁ | bhavāti | naḥ | puraḥ |
indrāśābhyaspari | sarvābhyo | abhayaṁ | karat |
jetā | śatrūnvicarṣaṇiḥ |
viśve | devāsā | gata | śṛṇutā | memaṁ | havam |
edaṁ | barhirni | ṣīdata |
tīvro | vo | madhumām̐ | ayaṁ | śunahotreṣu | matsaraḥ |
etaṁ | pibata | kāmyam |
indrajyeṣṭhā | marudgaṇā | devāsaḥ | pūṣarātayaḥ |
viśve | mama | śrutā | havam |
ambitame | nadītame | devitame | sarasvati |
apraśasteva | smasi | praśastimamba | naskṛdhi |
tve | viśvā | sarasvati | śritāyūṁṣi | devyām |
śunahotreṣu | matsva | prajāṁ | devi | didiḍḍhi | naḥ |
imā | brahma | sarasvati | juṣasva | vājinīvati |
yā | te | manma | gṛtsamadā | ṛtāvari | priyā | deveṣu | juhvati |
pretāṁ | yajñasya | śaṁbhuvā | yuvāmidā | vṛṇīmahe |
agniṁ | ca | havyavāhanam |
dyāvā | naḥ | pṛthivīmaṁ | sidhramadya | divispṛśam |
yajñaṁ | deveṣu | yacchatām |
ā | vāmupasthamadruhā | devāḥ | sīdantu | yajñiyāḥ |
ihādya | somapītaye |
kanikradajjanuṣaṁ | prabruvāṇeyarti | vācamariteva | nāvam |
sumaṅgalaśca | śakune | bhavāsi | mā | tvā | kā | cidabhibhā | viśvyā | vidat |
mā | tvā | śyenodvadhīnmā | suparṇo | mā | tvā | vidadiṣumānvīro | astā |
pitryāmanu | pradiśaṁ | kanikradatsumaṅgalo | bhadravādī | vadeha |
ava | kranda | dakṣiṇato | gṛhāṇāṁ | sumaṅgalo | bhadravādī | śakunte |
mā | naḥ | steneśata | māghaśaṁso | bṛhadvadema | vidathe | suvīrāḥ |
pradakṣiṇidabhi | gṛṇanti | kāravo | vayo | vadanta | ṛtuthā | śakuntayaḥ |
ubhe | vācau | vadati | sāmageva | gāyatraṁ | ca | traiṣṭubhaṁ | cānu | rājati |
udgāteva | śakune | sāma | gāyasi | brahmaputreva | savaneṣu | śaṁsasi |
vṛṣeva | vājī | śiśumatīrapītyā | sarvato | naḥ | śakune | bhadramā | vada | viśvato | naḥ | śakune | puṇyamā | vada |
āvadam̐stvaṁ | śakune | bhadramā | vada | tūṣṇīmāsīnaḥ | sumatiṁ | cikiddhi | naḥ |
yadutpatanvadasi | karkariryathā | bṛhadvadema | vidathe | suvīrāḥ |
somasya | mā | tavasaṁ | vakṣyagne | vahniṁ | cakartha | vidathe | yajadhyai |
devām̐ | acchā | dīdyadyuñje | adriṁ | śamāye | agne | tanvaṁ | juṣasva |
prāñcaṁ | yajñaṁ | cakṛma | vardhatāṁ | gīḥ | samidbhiragniṁ | namasā | duvasyan |
divaḥ | śaśāsurvidathā | kavīnāṁ | gṛtsāya | cittavase | gātumīṣuḥ |
mayo | dadhe | medhiraḥ | pūtadakṣo | divaḥ | subandhurjanuṣā | pṛthivyāḥ |
avindannu | darśatamapsvantardevāso | agnimapasi | svasṝṇām |
avardhayantsubhagaṁ | sapta | yahvīḥ | śvetaṁ | jajñānamaruṣaṁ | mahitvā |
śiśuṁ | na | jātamabhyāruraśvā | devāso | agniṁ | janimanvapuṣyan |
śukrebhiraṅgai | rajātatanvānkratuṁ | punānaḥ | kavibhiḥ | pavitraiḥ |
śocirvasānaḥ | paryāyurapāṁ | śriyo | mimīte | bṛhatīranūnāḥ |
vavrājā | sīmanadatīradabdhā | divo | yahvīravasānānagnāḥ |
sanātra | yuvatayaḥ | sayonīrekaṁ | garbhaṁ | dadhire | sapta | vāṇīḥ |
stīrṇāsya | saṁhato | viśvarūpā | ghṛtasya | yonau | sravathe | madhūnām |
asthuratra | dhenavaḥ | pinvamānā | mahī | dasmasya | mātarā | samīcī |
babhrāṇaḥ | sūno | sahaso | vyadyauddadhānaḥ | śukrā | rabhasā | vapūṁṣi |
ścotanti | dhārā | madhuno | ghṛtasya | vṛṣā | yatra | vāvṛdhe | kāvyena |
pituścidūdharjanuṣā | viveda | vyasya | dhārāsṛjadvi | dhenāḥ |
guhā | carantaṁ | sakhibhiḥ | śivebhirdivo | yahvībhirna | guhā | babhūva |
pituśca | garbhaṁ | janituśca | babhre | pūrvīreko | adhayatpīpyānāḥ |
vṛṣṇe | sapatnī | śucaye | sabandhūbhe | asmai | manuṣye | ni | pāhi |
urau | mahām̐ | anibādhe | vavardhāpo | agniṁ | yaśasaḥ | saṁ | hi | pūrvīḥ |
ṛtasya | yonāvaśayaddamūnā | jāmīnāmagnirapasi | svasṝṇām |
akro | na | babhriḥ | samithe | mahīnāṁ | didṛkṣeyaḥ | sūnave | bhāṛjīkaḥ |
udusriyā | janitā | yo | jajānāpāṁ | garbho | nṛtamo | yahvo | agniḥ |
apāṁ | garbhaṁ | darśatamoṣadhīnāṁ | vanā | jajāna | subhagā | virūpam |
devāsaścinmanasā | saṁ | hi | jagmuḥ | paniṣṭhaṁ | jātaṁ | tavasaṁ | duvasyan |
bṛhantedbhānavo | bhāṛjīkamagniṁ | sacanta | vidyuto | na | śukrāḥ |
guheva | vṛddhaṁ | sadasi | sve | antarapārorve | amṛtaṁ | duhānāḥ |
īḻe | ca | tvā | yajamāno | havirbhirīḻe | sakhitvaṁ | sumatiṁ | nikāmaḥ |
devairavo | mimīhi | saṁ | jaritre | rakṣā | ca | no | damyebhiranīkaiḥ |
upakṣetārastava | supraṇīte'gne | viśvāni | dhanyā | dadhānāḥ |
suretasā | śravasā | tuñjamānābhi | ṣyāma | pṛtanāyūm̐radevān |
ā | devānāmabhavaḥ | keturagne | mandro | viśvāni | kāvyāni | vidvān |
prati | martām̐ | avāsayo | damūnānu | devānrathiro | yāsi | sādhan |
ni | duroṇe | amṛto | martyānāṁ | rājā | sasāda | vidathāni | sādhan |
ghṛtapratīkorviyā | vyadyaudagnirviśvāni | kāvyāni | vidvān |
ā | no | gahi | sakhyebhiḥ | śivebhirmahānmahībhirūtibhiḥ | saraṇyan |
asme | rayiṁ | bahulaṁ | saṁtarutraṁ | suvācaṁ | bhāgaṁ | yaśasaṁ | kṛdhī | naḥ |
etā | te | agne | janimā | sanāni | pra | pūrvyāya | nūtanāni | vocam |
mahānti | vṛṣṇe | savanā | kṛtemā | janmañjanmannihito | jātavedāḥ |
janmañjanmannihito | jātavedā | viśvāmitrebhiridhyate | ajasraḥ |
tasya | vayaṁ | sumatau | yajñiyasyāpi | bhadre | saumanase | syāma |
imaṁ | yajñaṁ | sahasāvantvaṁ | no | devatrā | dhehi | sukrato | rarāṇaḥ |
pra | yaṁsi | hotarbṛhatīriṣo | no'gne | mahi | draviṇamā | yajasva |
iḻāmagne | purudaṁsaṁ | saniṁ | goḥ | śaśvattamaṁ | havamānāya | sādha |
syānnaḥ | sūnustanayo | vijāvāgne | sā | te | sumatirbhūtvasme |
vaiśvānarāya | dhiṣaṇāmṛtāvṛdhe | ghṛtaṁ | na | pūtamagnaye | janāmasi |
dvitā | hotāraṁ | manuṣaśca | vāghato | dhiyā | rathaṁ | na | kuliśaḥ | samṛṇvati |
sa | rocayajjanuṣā | rodasī | ubhe | sa | mātrorabhavatputreḍyaḥ |
havyavāḻagnirajaraścanohito | dūḻabho | viśāmatithirvibhāvasuḥ |
kratvā | dakṣasya | taruṣo | vidharmaṇi | devāso | agniṁ | janayanta | cittibhiḥ |
rurucānaṁ | bhānunā | jyotiṣā | mahāmatyaṁ | na | vājaṁ | saniṣyannupa | bruve |
ā | mandrasya | saniṣyanto | vareṇyaṁ | vṛṇīmahe | ahrayaṁ | vājamṛgmiyam |
rātiṁ | bhṛgūṇāmuśijaṁ | kavikratumagniṁ | rājantaṁ | divyena | śociṣā |
agniṁ | sumnāya | dadhire | puro | janā | vājaśravasamiha | vṛktabarhiṣaḥ |
yatasrucaḥ | surucaṁ | viśvadevyaṁ | rudraṁ | yajñānāṁ | sādhadiṣṭimapasām |
pāvakaśoce | tava | hi | kṣayaṁ | pari | hotaryajñeṣu | vṛktabarhiṣo | naraḥ |
agne | duvecchamānāsa | āpyamupāsate | draviṇaṁ | dhehi | tebhyaḥ |
ā | rodasī | apṛṇadā | svarmahajjātaṁ | yadenamapaso | adhārayan |
so | adhvarāya | pari | ṇīyate | kaviratyo | na | vājasātaye | canohitaḥ |
namasyata | havyadātiṁ | svadhvaraṁ | duvasyata | damyaṁ | jātavedasam |
rathīrṛtasya | bṛhato | vicarṣaṇiragnirdevānāmabhavatpurohitaḥ |
tisro | yahvasya | samidhaḥ | parijmano'gnerapunannuśijo | amṛtyavaḥ |
tāsāmekāmadadhurmartye | bhujamu | lokamu | dve | upa | jāmimīyatuḥ |
viśāṁ | kaviṁ | viśpatiṁ | mānuṣīriṣaḥ | saṁ | sīmakṛṇvantsvadhitiṁ | na | tejase |
sodvato | nivato | yāti | veviṣatsa | garbhameṣu | bhuvaneṣu | dīdharat |
sa | jinvate | jaṭhareṣu | prajajñivānvṛṣā | citreṣu | nānadanna | siṁhaḥ |
vaiśvānaraḥ | pṛthupājāmartyo | vasu | ratnā | dayamāno | vi | dāśuṣe |
vaiśvānaraḥ | pratnathā | nākamāruhaddivaspṛṣṭhaṁ | bhandamānaḥ | sumanmabhiḥ |
sa | pūrvavajjanayañjantave | dhanaṁ | samānamajmaṁ | paryeti | jāgṛviḥ |
ṛtāvānaṁ | yajñiyaṁ | vipramukthyamā | yaṁ | dadhe | mātariśvā | divi | kṣayam |
taṁ | citrayāmaṁ | harikeśamīmahe | sudītimagniṁ | suvitāya | navyase |
śuciṁ | na | yāmanniṣiraṁ | svardṛśaṁ | ketuṁ | divo | rocanasthāmuṣarbudham |
agniṁ | mūrdhānaṁ | divo | apratiṣkutaṁ | tamīmahe | namasā | vājinaṁ | bṛhat |
mandraṁ | hotāraṁ | śucimadvayāvinaṁ | damūnasamukthyaṁ | viśvacarṣaṇim |
rathaṁ | na | citraṁ | vapuṣāya | darśataṁ | manurhitaṁ | sadamidrāyemahe |
vaiśvānarāya | pṛthupājase | vipo | ratnā | vidhanta | dharuṇeṣu | gātave |
agnirhi | devām̐ | amṛto | duvasyatyathā | dharmāṇi | sanatā | na | dūduṣat |
antardūto | rodasī | dasmeyate | hotā | niṣatto | manuṣaḥ | purohitaḥ |
kṣayaṁ | bṛhantaṁ | pari | bhūṣati | dyubhirdevebhiragniriṣito | dhiyāvasuḥ |
ketuṁ | yajñānāṁ | vidathasya | sādhanaṁ | viprāso | agniṁ | mahayanta | cittibhiḥ |
apāṁsi | yasminnadhi | saṁdadhurgirastasmintsumnāni | yajamānā | cake |
pitā | yajñānāmasuro | vipaścitāṁ | vimānamagnirvayunaṁ | ca | vāghatām |
ā | viveśa | rodasī | bhūrivarpasā | purupriyo | bhandate | dhāmabhiḥ | kaviḥ |
candramagniṁ | candrarathaṁ | harivrataṁ | vaiśvānaramapsuṣadaṁ | svarvidam |
vigāhaṁ | tūrṇiṁ | taviṣībhirāvṛtaṁ | bhūrṇiṁ | devāseha | suśriyaṁ | dadhuḥ |
agnirdevebhirmanuṣaśca | jantubhistanvāno | yajñaṁ | purupeśasaṁ | dhiyā |
rathīrantarīyate | sādhadiṣṭibhirjīro | damūnābhiśasticātanaḥ |
agne | jarasva | svapatyāyunyūrjā | pinvasva | samiṣo | didīhi | naḥ |
vayāṁsi | jinva | bṛhataśca | jāgṛvośigdevānāmasi | sukraturvipām |
viśpatiṁ | yahvamatithiṁ | naraḥ | sadā | yantāraṁ | dhīnāmuśijaṁ | ca | vāghatām |
adhvarāṇāṁ | cetanaṁ | jātavedasaṁ | pra | śaṁsanti | namasā | jūtibhirvṛdhe |
vibhāvā | devaḥ | suraṇaḥ | pari | kṣitīragnirbabhūva | śavasā | sumadrathaḥ |
tasya | vratāni | bhūripoṣiṇo | vayamupa | bhūṣema | damā | suvṛktibhiḥ |
vaiśvānara | tava | dhāmānyā | cake | yebhiḥ | svarvidabhavo | vicakṣaṇa |
jātāpṛṇo | bhuvanāni | rodasī | agne | tā | viśvā | paribhūrasi | tmanā |
vaiśvānarasya | daṁsanābhyo | bṛhadariṇādekaḥ | svapasyayā | kaviḥ |
ubhā | pitarā | mahayannajāyatāgnirdyāvāpṛthivī | bhūriretasā |
samitsamitsumanā | bodhyasme | śucāśucā | sumatiṁ | rāsi | vasvaḥ |
ā | deva | devānyajathāya | vakṣi | sakhā | sakhīntsumanā | yakṣyagne |
yaṁ | devāsastrirahannāyajante | divedive | varuṇo | mitro | agniḥ |
semaṁ | yajñaṁ | madhumantaṁ | kṛdhī | nastanūnapādghṛtayoniṁ | vidhantam |
pra | dīdhitirviśvavārā | jigāti | hotāramiḻaḥ | prathamaṁ | yajadhyai |
acchā | namobhirvṛṣabhaṁ | vandadhyai | sa | devānyakṣadiṣito | yajīyān |
ūrdhvo | vāṁ | gāturadhvare | akāryūrdhvā | śocīṁṣi | prasthitā | rajāṁsi |
divo | vā | nābhā | nyasādi | hotā | stṛṇīmahi | devavyacā | vi | barhiḥ |
sapta | hotrāṇi | manasā | vṛṇānenvanto | viśvaṁ | prati | yannṛtena |
nṛpeśaso | vidatheṣu | pra | jātābhīmaṁ | yajñaṁ | vi | caranta | pūrvīḥ |
ā | bhandamāne | uṣasopāke | uta | smayete | tanvā | virūpe |
yathā | no | mitro | varuṇo | jujoṣadindro | marutvām̐ | uta | vā | mahobhiḥ |
daivyā | hotārā | prathamā | nyṛñje | sapta | pṛkṣāsaḥ | svadhayā | madanti |
ṛtaṁ | śaṁsanta | ṛtamittāhuranu | vrataṁ | vratapā | dīdhyānāḥ |
ā | bhāratī | bhāratībhiḥ | sajoṣeḻā | devairmanuṣyebhiragniḥ |
sarasvatī | sārasvatebhirarvāktisro | devīrbarhiredaṁ | sadantu |
tannasturīpamadha | poṣayitnu | deva | tvaṣṭarvi | rarāṇaḥ | syasva |
yato | vīraḥ | karmaṇyaḥ | sudakṣo | yuktagrāvā | jāyate | devakāmaḥ |
vanaspate'va | sṛjopa | devānagnirhaviḥ | śamitā | sūdayāti |
sedu | hotā | satyataro | yajāti | yathā | devānāṁ | janimāni | veda |
ā | yāhyagne | samidhāno | arvāṅindreṇa | devaiḥ | sarathaṁ | turebhiḥ |
barhirnāstāmaditiḥ | suputrā | svāhā | devāmṛtā | mādayantām |
pratyagniruṣasaścekitāno'bodhi | vipraḥ | padavīḥ | kavīnām |
pṛthupājā | devayadbhiḥ | samiddho'pa | dvārā | tamaso | vahnirāvaḥ |
predvagnirvāvṛdhe | stomebhirgīrbhiḥ | stotṝṇāṁ | namasyokthaiḥ |
pūrvīrṛtasya | saṁdṛśaścakānaḥ | saṁ | dūto | adyauduṣaso | viroke |
adhāyyagnirmānuṣīṣu | vikṣvapāṁ | garbho | mitra | ṛtena | sādhan |
ā | haryato | yajataḥ | sānvasthādabhūdu | vipro | havyo | matīnām |
mitro | agnirbhavati | yatsamiddho | mitro | hotā | varuṇo | jātavedāḥ |
mitro | adhvaryuriṣiro | damūnā | mitraḥ | sindhūnāmuta | parvatānām |
pāti | priyaṁ | ripo | agraṁ | padaṁ | veḥ | pāti | yahvaścaraṇaṁ | sūryasya |
pāti | nābhā | saptaśīrṣāṇamagniḥ | pāti | devānāmupamādamṛṣvaḥ |
ṛbhuścakreḍyaṁ | cāru | nāma | viśvāni | devo | vayunāni | vidvān |
sasasya | carma | ghṛtavatpadaṁ | vestadidagnī | rakṣatyaprayucchan |
ā | yonimagnirghṛtavantamasthātpṛthupragāṇamuśantamuśānaḥ |
dīdyānaḥ | śucirṛṣvaḥ | pāvakaḥ | punaḥpunarmātarā | navyasī | kaḥ |
sadyo | jātauṣadhībhirvavakṣe | yadī | vardhanti | prasvo | ghṛtena |
āpeva | pravatā | śumbhamānoruṣyadagniḥ | pitrorupasthe |
udu | ṣṭutaḥ | samidhā | yahvo | adyaudvarṣmandivo | adhi | nābhā | pṛthivyāḥ |
mitro | agnirīḍyo | mātariśvā | dūto | vakṣadyajathāya | devān |
udastambhītsamidhā | nākamṛṣvo'gnirbhavannuttamo | rocanānām |
yadī | bhṛgubhyaḥ | pari | mātariśvā | guhā | santaṁ | havyavāhaṁ | samīdhe |
iḻāmagne | purudaṁsaṁ | saniṁ | goḥ | śaśvattamaṁ | havamānāya | sādha |
syānnaḥ | sūnustanayo | vijāvāgne | sā | te | sumatirbhūtvasme |
pra | kāravo | mananā | vacyamānā | devadrīcīṁ | nayata | devayantaḥ |
dakṣiṇāvāḍvājinī | prācyeti | havirbharantyagnaye | ghṛtācī |
ā | rodasī | apṛṇā | jāyamānota | pra | rikthādha | nu | prayajyo |
divaścidagne | mahinā | pṛthivyā | vacyantāṁ | te | vahnayaḥ | saptajihvāḥ |
dyauśca | tvā | pṛthivī | yajñiyāso | ni | hotāraṁ | sādayante | damāya |
yadī | viśo | mānuṣīrdevayantīḥ | prayasvatīrīḻate | śukramarciḥ |
mahāntsadhasthe | dhruvā | niṣatto'ntardyāvā | māhine | haryamāṇaḥ |
āskre | sapatnī | ajare | amṛkte | sabardughe | urugāyasya | dhenū |
vratā | te | agne | mahato | mahāni | tava | kratvā | rodasī | ā | tatantha |
tvaṁ | dūto | abhavo | jāyamānastvaṁ | netā | vṛṣabha | carṣaṇīnām |
ṛtasya | vā | keśinā | yogyābhirghṛtasnuvā | rohitā | dhuri | dhiṣva |
athā | vaha | devāndeva | viśvāntsvadhvarā | kṛṇuhi | jātavedaḥ |
divaścidā | te | rucayanta | rokoṣo | vibhātīranu | bhāsi | pūrvīḥ |
apo | yadagnośadhagvaneṣu | hoturmandrasya | panayanta | devāḥ |
urau | vā | ye | antarikṣe | madanti | divo | vā | ye | rocane | santi | devāḥ |
ūmā | vā | ye | suhavāso | yajatrāyemire | rathyo | agne | aśvāḥ |
aibhiragne | sarathaṁ | yāhyarvāṅnānārathaṁ | vā | vibhavo | hyaśvāḥ |
patnīvatastriṁśataṁ | trīm̐śca | devānanuṣvadhamā | vaha | mādayasva |
sa | hotā | yasya | rodasī | cidurvī | yajñaṁyajñamabhi | vṛdhe | gṛṇītaḥ |
prācī | adhvareva | tasthatuḥ | sumeke | ṛtāvarī | ṛtajātasya | satye |
iḻāmagne | purudaṁsaṁ | saniṁ | goḥ | śaśvattamaṁ | havamānāya | sādha |
syānnaḥ | sūnustanayo | vijāvāgne | sā | te | sumatirbhūtvasme |
pra | yāruḥ | śitipṛṣṭhasya | dhāserā | mātarā | viviśuḥ | sapta | vāṇīḥ |
parikṣitā | pitarā | saṁ | carete | pra | sarsrāte | dīrghamāyuḥ | prayakṣe |
divakṣaso | dhenavo | vṛṣṇo | aśvā | devīrā | tasthau | madhumadvahantīḥ |
ṛtasya | tvā | sadasi | kṣemayantaṁ | paryekā | carati | vartaniṁ | gauḥ |
ā | sīmarohatsuyamā | bhavantīḥ | patiścikitvānrayividrayīṇām |
pra | nīlapṛṣṭho | atasasya | dhāsestāvāsayatpurudhapratīkaḥ |
mahi | tvāṣṭramūrjayantīrajuryaṁ | stabhūyamānaṁ | vahato | vahanti |
vyaṅgebhirdidyutānaḥ | sadhasthaikāmiva | rodasī | ā | viveśa |
jānanti | vṛṣṇo | aruṣasya | śevamuta | bradhnasya | śāsane | raṇanti |
divorucaḥ | suruco | rocamāneḻā | yeṣāṁ | gaṇyā | māhinā | gīḥ |
uto | pitṛbhyāṁ | pravidānu | ghoṣaṁ | maho | mahadbhyāmanayanta | śūṣam |
ukṣā | ha | yatra | pari | dhānamaktoranu | svaṁ | dhāma | jariturvavakṣa |
adhvaryubhiḥ | pañcabhiḥ | sapta | viprāḥ | priyaṁ | rakṣante | nihitaṁ | padaṁ | veḥ |
prāñco | madantyukṣaṇo | ajuryā | devā | devānāmanu | hi | vratā | guḥ |
daivyā | hotārā | prathamā | nyṛñje | sapta | pṛkṣāsaḥ | svadhayā | madanti |
ṛtaṁ | śaṁsanta | ṛtamittāhuranu | vrataṁ | vratapā | dīdhyānāḥ |
vṛṣāyante | mahe | atyāya | pūrvīrvṛṣṇe | citrāya | raśmayaḥ | suyāmāḥ |
deva | hotarmandrataraścikitvānmaho | devānrodasī | eha | vakṣi |
pṛkṣaprayajo | draviṇaḥ | suvācaḥ | suketavoṣaso | revadūṣuḥ |
uto | cidagne | mahinā | pṛthivyāḥ | kṛtaṁ | cidenaḥ | saṁ | mahe | daśasya |
iḻāmagne | purudaṁsaṁ | saniṁ | goḥ | śaśvattamaṁ | havamānāya | sādha |
syānnaḥ | sūnustanayo | vijāvāgne | sā | te | sumatirbhūtvasme |
añjanti | tvāmadhvare | devayanto | vanaspate | madhunā | daivyena |
yadūrdhvastiṣṭhā | draviṇeha | dhattādyadvā | kṣayo | māturasyopasthe |
samiddhasya | śrayamāṇaḥ | purastādbrahma | vanvāno | ajaraṁ | suvīram |
āre | asmadamatiṁ | bādhamānocchrayasva | mahate | saubhagāya |
ucchrayasva | vanaspate | varṣmanpṛthivyādhi |
sumitī | mīyamāno | varco | dhā | yajñavāhase |
yuvā | suvāsāḥ | parivītāgātsa | u | śreyānbhavati | jāyamānaḥ |
taṁ | dhīrāsaḥ | kavayonnayanti | svādhyo | manasā | devayantaḥ |
jāto | jāyate | sudinatve | ahnāṁ | samaryā | vidathe | vardhamānaḥ |
punanti | dhīrāpaso | manīṣā | devayā | viprodiyarti | vācam |
yānvo | naro | devayanto | nimimyurvanaspate | svadhitirvā | tatakṣa |
te | devāsaḥ | svaravastasthivāṁsaḥ | prajāvadasme | didhiṣantu | ratnam |
ye | vṛkṇāso | adhi | kṣami | nimitāso | yatasrucaḥ |
te | no | vyantu | vāryaṁ | devatrā | kṣetrasādhasaḥ |
ādityā | rudrā | vasavaḥ | sunīthā | dyāvākṣāmā | pṛthivī | antarikṣam |
sajoṣaso | yajñamavantu | devordhvaṁ | kṛṇvantvadhvarasya | ketum |
haṁseva | śreṇiśo | yatānāḥ | śukrā | vasānāḥ | svaravo | nāguḥ |
unnīyamānāḥ | kavibhiḥ | purastāddevā | devānāmapi | yanti | pāthaḥ |
śṛṅgāṇīvecchṛṅgiṇāṁ | saṁ | dadṛśre | caṣālavantaḥ | svaravaḥ | pṛthivyām |
vāghadbhirvā | vihave | śroṣamāṇāsmām̐ | avantu | pṛtanājyeṣu |
vanaspate | śatavalśo | vi | roha | sahasravalśā | vi | vayaṁ | ruhema |
yaṁ | tvāmayaṁ | svadhitistejamānaḥ | praṇināya | mahate | saubhagāya |
sakhāyastvā | vavṛmahe | devaṁ | martāsotaye |
apāṁ | napātaṁ | subhagaṁ | sudīditiṁ | supratūrtimanehasam |
kāyamāno | vanā | tvaṁ | yanmātṝrajagannapaḥ |
na | tatte | agne | pramṛṣe | nivartanaṁ | yaddūre | sannihābhavaḥ |
ati | tṛṣṭaṁ | vavakṣithāthaiva | sumanāsi |
praprānye | yanti | paryanyāsate | yeṣāṁ | sakhye | asi | śritaḥ |
īyivāṁsamati | sridhaḥ | śaśvatīrati | saścataḥ |
anvīmavindannicirāso | adruho'psu | siṁhamiva | śritam |
sasṛvāṁsamiva | tmanāgnimitthā | tirohitam |
ainaṁ | nayanmātariśvā | parāvato | devebhyo | mathitaṁ | pari |
taṁ | tvā | martāgṛbhṇata | devebhyo | havyavāhana |
viśvānyadyajñām̐ | abhipāsi | mānuṣa | tava | kratvā | yaviṣṭhya |
tadbhadraṁ | tava | daṁsanā | pākāya | cicchadayati |
tvāṁ | yadagne | paśavaḥ | samāsate | samiddhamapiśarvare |
ā | juhotā | svadhvaraṁ | śīraṁ | pāvakaśociṣam |
āśuṁ | dūtamajiraṁ | pratnamīḍyaṁ | śruṣṭī | devaṁ | saparyata |
trīṇi | śatā | trī | sahasrāṇyagniṁ | triṁśacca | devā | nava | cāsaparyan |
aukṣanghṛtairastṛṇanbarhirasmādiddhotāraṁ | nyasādayanta |
tvāmagne | manīṣiṇaḥ | samrājaṁ | carṣaṇīnām |
devaṁ | martāsendhate | samadhvare |
tvāṁ | yajñeṣvṛtvijamagne | hotāramīḻate |
gopā | ṛtasya | dīdihi | sve | dame |
sa | ghā | yaste | dadāśati | samidhā | jātavedase |
so | agne | dhatte | suvīryaṁ | sa | puṣyati |
sa | keturadhvarāṇāmagnirdevebhirā | gamat |
añjānaḥ | sapta | hotṛbhirhaviṣmate |
pra | hotre | pūrvyaṁ | vaco'gnaye | bharatā | bṛhat |
vipāṁ | jyotīṁṣi | bibhrate | na | vedhase |
agniṁ | vardhantu | no | giro | yato | jāyatokthyaḥ |
mahe | vājāya | draviṇāya | darśataḥ |
agne | yajiṣṭho | adhvare | devāndevayate | yaja |
hotā | mandro | vi | rājasyati | sridhaḥ |
sa | naḥ | pāvaka | dīdihi | dyumadasme | suvīryam |
bhavā | stotṛbhyo | antamaḥ | svastaye |
taṁ | tvā | viprā | vipanyavo | jāgṛvāṁsaḥ | samindhate |
havyavāhamamartyaṁ | sahovṛdham |
agnirhotā | purohito'dhvarasya | vicarṣaṇiḥ |
sa | veda | yajñamānuṣak |
sa | havyavāḻamartyośigdūtaścanohitaḥ |
agnirdhiyā | samṛṇvati |
agnirdhiyā | sa | cetati | keturyajñasya | pūrvyaḥ |
arthaṁ | hyasya | taraṇi |
agniṁ | sūnuṁ | sanaśrutaṁ | sahaso | jātavedasam |
vahniṁ | devākṛṇvata |
adābhyaḥ | puraetā | viśāmagnirmānuṣīṇām |
tūrṇī | rathaḥ | sadā | navaḥ |
sāhvānviśvābhiyujaḥ | kraturdevānāmamṛktaḥ |
agnistuviśravastamaḥ |
abhi | prayāṁsi | vāhasā | dāśvām̐ | aśnoti | martyaḥ |
kṣayaṁ | pāvakaśociṣaḥ |
pari | viśvāni | sudhitāgneraśyāma | manmabhiḥ |
viprāso | jātavedasaḥ |
agne | viśvāni | vāryā | vājeṣu | saniṣāmahe |
tve | devāsairire |
indrāgnī | ā | gataṁ | sutaṁ | gīrbhirnabho | vareṇyam |
asya | pātaṁ | dhiyeṣitā |
indrāgnī | jarituḥ | sacā | yajño | jigāti | cetanaḥ |
ayā | pātamimaṁ | sutam |
indramagniṁ | kavicchadā | yajñasya | jūtyā | vṛṇe |
tā | somasyeha | tṛmpatām |
tośā | vṛtrahaṇā | huve | sajitvānāparājitā |
indrāgnī | vājasātamā |
pra | vāmarcantyukthino | nīthāvido | jaritāraḥ |
indrāgnīṣa | ā | vṛṇe |
indrāgnī | navatiṁ | puro | dāsapatnīradhūnutam |
sākamekena | karmaṇā |
indrāgnī | apasasparyupa | pra | yanti | dhītayaḥ |
ṛtasya | pathyānu |
indrāgnī | taviṣāṇi | vāṁ | sadhasthāni | prayāṁsi | ca |
yuvoraptūryaṁ | hitam |
indrāgnī | rocanā | divaḥ | pari | vājeṣu | bhūṣathaḥ |
tadvāṁ | ceti | pra | vīryam |
pra | vo | devāyāgnaye | barhiṣṭhamarcāsmai |
gamaddevebhirā | sa | no | yajiṣṭho | barhirā | sadat |
ṛtāvā | yasya | rodasī | dakṣaṁ | sacantotayaḥ |
haviṣmantastamīḻate | taṁ | saniṣyanto'vase |
sa | yantā | vipraiṣāṁ | sa | yajñānāmathā | hi | ṣaḥ |
agniṁ | taṁ | vo | duvasyata | dātā | yo | vanitā | magham |
sa | naḥ | śarmāṇi | vītaye'gniryacchatu | śaṁtamā |
yato | naḥ | pruṣṇavadvasu | divi | kṣitibhyo | apsvā |
dīdivāṁsamapūrvyaṁ | vasvībhirasya | dhītibhiḥ |
ṛkvāṇo | agnimindhate | hotāraṁ | viśpatiṁ | viśām |
uta | no | brahmannaviṣoktheṣu | devahūtamaḥ |
śaṁ | naḥ | śocā | marudvṛdho'gne | sahasrasātamaḥ |
nū | no | rāsva | sahasravattokavatpuṣṭimadvasu |
dyumadagne | suvīryaṁ | varṣiṣṭhamanupakṣitam |
ā | hotā | mandro | vidathānyasthātsatyo | yajvā | kavitamaḥ | sa | vedhāḥ |
vidyudrathaḥ | sahasasputro | agniḥ | śociṣkeśaḥ | pṛthivyāṁ | pājo | aśret |
ayāmi | te | namaüktiṁ | juṣasva | ṛtāvastubhyaṁ | cetate | sahasvaḥ |
vidvām̐ | ā | vakṣi | viduṣo | ni | ṣatsi | madhyā | barhirūtaye | yajatra |
dravatāṁ | toṣasā | vājayantī | agne | vātasya | pathyābhiraccha |
yatsīmañjanti | pūrvyaṁ | havirbhirā | vandhureva | tasthaturduroṇe |
mitraśca | tubhyaṁ | varuṇaḥ | sahasvo'gne | viśve | marutaḥ | sumnamarcan |
yacchociṣā | sahasasputra | tiṣṭhābhi | kṣitīḥ | prathayantsūryo | nṝn |
vayaṁ | te | adya | rarimā | hi | kāmamuttānahastā | namasopasadya |
yajiṣṭhena | manasā | yakṣi | devānasredhatā | manmanā | vipro | agne |
tvaddhi | putra | sahaso | vi | pūrvīrdevasya | yantyūtayo | vi | vājāḥ |
tvaṁ | dehi | sahasriṇaṁ | rayiṁ | no'drogheṇa | vacasā | satyamagne |
tubhyaṁ | dakṣa | kavikrato | yānīmā | deva | martāso | adhvare | akarma |
tvaṁ | viśvasya | surathasya | bodhi | sarvaṁ | tadagne | amṛta | svadeha |
vi | pājasā | pṛthunā | śośucāno | bādhasva | dviṣo | rakṣaso | amīvāḥ |
suśarmaṇo | bṛhataḥ | śarmaṇi | syāmagnerahaṁ | suhavasya | praṇītau |
tvaṁ | no | asyoṣaso | vyuṣṭau | tvaṁ | sūrodite | bodhi | gopāḥ |
janmeva | nityaṁ | tanayaṁ | juṣasva | stomaṁ | me | agne | tanvā | sujāta |
tvaṁ | nṛcakṣā | vṛṣabhānu | pūrvīḥ | kṛṣṇāsvagne | aruṣo | vi | bhāhi |
vaso | neṣi | ca | parṣi | cātyaṁhaḥ | kṛdhī | no | rāyośijo | yaviṣṭha |
aṣāḻho | agne | vṛṣabho | didīhi | puro | viśvāḥ | saubhagā | saṁjigīvān |
yajñasya | netā | prathamasya | pāyorjātavedo | bṛhataḥ | supraṇīte |
acchidrā | śarma | jaritaḥ | purūṇi | devām̐ | acchā | dīdyānaḥ | sumedhāḥ |
ratho | na | sasnirabhi | vakṣi | vājamagne | tvaṁ | rodasī | naḥ | sumeke |
pra | pīpaya | vṛṣabha | jinva | vājānagne | tvaṁ | rodasī | naḥ | sudoghe |
devebhirdeva | surucā | rucāno | mā | no | martasya | durmatiḥ | pari | ṣṭhāt |
iḻāmagne | purudaṁsaṁ | saniṁ | goḥ | śaśvattamaṁ | havamānāya | sādha |
syānnaḥ | sūnustanayo | vijāvāgne | sā | te | sumatirbhūtvasme |
ayamagniḥ | suvīryasyeśe | mahaḥ | saubhagasya |
rāyeśe | svapatyasya | gomateśe | vṛtrahathānām |
imaṁ | naro | marutaḥ | saścatā | vṛdhaṁ | yasminrāyaḥ | śevṛdhāsaḥ |
abhi | ye | santi | pṛtanāsu | dūḍhyo | viśvāhā | śatrumādabhuḥ |
sa | tvaṁ | no | rāyaḥ | śiśīhi | mīḍhvo | agne | suvīryasya |
tuvidyumna | varṣiṣṭhasya | prajāvato'namīvasya | śuṣmiṇaḥ |
cakriryo | viśvā | bhuvanābhi | sāsahiścakrirdeveṣvā | duvaḥ |
ā | deveṣu | yatatā | suvīryā | śaṁsota | nṛṇām |
mā | no | agne'mataye | māvīratāyai | rīradhaḥ |
māgotāyai | sahasasputra | mā | nide'pa | dveṣāṁsyā | kṛdhi |
śagdhi | vājasya | subhaga | prajāvato'gne | bṛhato | adhvare |
saṁ | rāyā | bhūyasā | sṛja | mayobhunā | tuvidyumna | yaśasvatā |
samidhyamānaḥ | prathamānu | dharmā | samaktubhirajyate | viśvavāraḥ |
śociṣkeśo | ghṛtanirṇikpāvakaḥ | suyajño | agniryajathāya | devān |
yathāyajo | hotramagne | pṛthivyā | yathā | divo | jātavedaścikitvān |
evānena | haviṣā | yakṣi | devānmanuṣvadyajñaṁ | pra | tiremamadya |
trīṇyāyūṁṣi | tava | jātavedastisrājānīruṣasaste | agne |
tābhirdevānāmavo | yakṣi | vidvānathā | bhava | yajamānāya | śaṁ | yoḥ |
agniṁ | sudītiṁ | sudṛśaṁ | gṛṇanto | namasyāmastveḍyaṁ | jātavedaḥ |
tvāṁ | dūtamaratiṁ | havyavāhaṁ | devākṛṇvannamṛtasya | nābhim |
yastvaddhotā | pūrvo | agne | yajīyāndvitā | ca | sattā | svadhayā | ca | śaṁbhuḥ |
tasyānu | dharma | pra | yajā | cikitvo'thā | no | dhādhvaraṁ | devavītau |
bhavā | no | agne | sumanopetau | sakheva | sakhye | pitareva | sādhuḥ |
purudruho | hi | kṣitayo | janānāṁ | prati | pratīcīrdahatādarātīḥ |
tapo | ṣvagne | antarām̐ | amitrāntapā | śaṁsamararuṣaḥ | parasya |
tapo | vaso | cikitāno | acittānvi | te | tiṣṭhantāmajarāyāsaḥ |
idhmenāgnecchamāno | ghṛtena | juhomi | havyaṁ | tarase | balāya |
yāvadīśe | brahmaṇā | vandamānemāṁ | dhiyaṁ | śataseyāya | devīm |
ucchociṣā | sahasasputra | stuto | bṛhadvayaḥ | śaśamāneṣu | dhehi |
revadagne | viśvāmitreṣu | śaṁ | yormarmṛjmā | te | tanvaṁ | bhūri | kṛtvaḥ |
kṛdhi | ratnaṁ | susanitardhanānāṁ | sa | ghedagne | bhavasi | yatsamiddhaḥ |
stoturduroṇe | subhagasya | revatsṛprā | karasnā | dadhiṣe | vapūṁṣi |
agniṁ | hotāraṁ | pra | vṛṇe | miyedhe | gṛtsaṁ | kaviṁ | viśvavidamamūram |
sa | no | yakṣaddevatātā | yajīyānrāye | vājāya | vanate | maghāni |
pra | te | agne | haviṣmatīmiyarmyacchā | sudyumnāṁ | rātinīṁ | ghṛtācīm |
pradakṣiṇiddevatātimurāṇaḥ | saṁ | rātibhirvasubhiryajñamaśret |
sa | tejīyasā | manasā | tvotota | śikṣa | svapatyasya | śikṣoḥ |
agne | rāyo | nṛtamasya | prabhūtau | bhūyāma | te | suṣṭutayaśca | vasvaḥ |
bhūrīṇi | hi | tve | dadhire | anīkāgne | devasya | yajyavo | janāsaḥ |
sā | vaha | devatātiṁ | yaviṣṭha | śardho | yadadya | divyaṁ | yajāsi |
yattvā | hotāramanajanmiyedhe | niṣādayanto | yajathāya | devāḥ |
sa | tvaṁ | no | agne'viteha | bodhyadhi | śravāṁsi | dhehi | nastanūṣu |
agnimuṣasamaśvinā | dadhikrāṁ | vyuṣṭiṣu | havate | vahnirukthaiḥ |
sujyotiṣo | naḥ | śṛṇvantu | devāḥ | sajoṣaso | adhvaraṁ | vāvaśānāḥ |
agne | trī | te | vājinā | trī | ṣadhasthā | tisraste | jihvā | ṛtajāta | pūrvīḥ |
tisro | te | tanvo | devavātāstābhirnaḥ | pāhi | giro | aprayucchan |
agne | bhūrīṇi | tava | jātavedo | deva | svadhāvo'mṛtasya | nāma |
yāśca | māyā | māyināṁ | viśvaminva | tve | pūrvīḥ | saṁdadhuḥ | pṛṣṭabandho |
agnirnetā | bhageva | kṣitīnāṁ | daivīnāṁ | deva | ṛtupā | ṛtāvā |
sa | vṛtrahā | sanayo | viśvavedāḥ | parṣadviśvāti | duritā | gṛṇantam |
dadhikrāmagnimuṣasaṁ | ca | devīṁ | bṛhaspatiṁ | savitāraṁ | ca | devam |
aśvinā | mitrāvaruṇā | bhagaṁ | ca | vasūnrudrām̐ | ādityām̐ | iha | huve |
imaṁ | no | yajñamamṛteṣu | dhehīmā | havyā | jātavedo | juṣasva |
stokānāmagne | medaso | ghṛtasya | hotaḥ | prāśāna | prathamo | niṣadya |
ghṛtavantaḥ | pāvaka | te | stokāḥ | ścotanti | medasaḥ |
svadharmandevavītaye | śreṣṭhaṁ | no | dhehi | vāryam |
tubhyaṁ | stokā | ghṛtaścuto'gne | viprāya | santya |
ṛṣiḥ | śreṣṭhaḥ | samidhyase | yajñasya | prāvitā | bhava |
tubhyaṁ | ścotantyadhrigo | śacīvaḥ | stokāso | agne | medaso | ghṛtasya |
kaviśasto | bṛhatā | bhānunāgā | havyā | juṣasva | medhira |
ojiṣṭhaṁ | te | madhyato | medodbhṛtaṁ | pra | te | vayaṁ | dadāmahe |
ścotanti | te | vaso | stokādhi | tvaci | prati | tāndevaśo | vihi |
ayaṁ | so | agniryasmintsomamindraḥ | sutaṁ | dadhe | jaṭhare | vāvaśānaḥ |
sahasriṇaṁ | vājamatyaṁ | na | saptiṁ | sasavāntsantstūyase | jātavedaḥ |
agne | yatte | divi | varcaḥ | pṛthivyāṁ | yadoṣadhīṣvapsvā | yajatra |
yenāntarikṣamurvātatantha | tveṣaḥ | sa | bhānurarṇavo | nṛcakṣāḥ |
agne | divo | arṇamacchā | jigāsyacchā | devām̐ | ūciṣe | dhiṣṇyā | ye |
yā | rocane | parastātsūryasya | yāścāvastādupatiṣṭhantāpaḥ |
purīṣyāso | agnayaḥ | prāvaṇebhiḥ | sajoṣasaḥ |
juṣantāṁ | yajñamadruho'namīveṣo | mahīḥ |
iḻāmagne | purudaṁsaṁ | saniṁ | goḥ | śaśvattamaṁ | havamānāya | sādha |
syānnaḥ | sūnustanayo | vijāvāgne | sā | te | sumatirbhūtvasme |
nirmathitaḥ | sudhitā | sadhasthe | yuvā | kaviradhvarasya | praṇetā |
jūryatsvagnirajaro | vaneṣvatrā | dadhe | amṛtaṁ | jātavedāḥ |
amanthiṣṭāṁ | bhāratā | revadagniṁ | devaśravā | devavātaḥ | sudakṣam |
agne | vi | paśya | bṛhatābhi | rāyeṣāṁ | no | netā | bhavatādanu | dyūn |
daśa | kṣipaḥ | pūrvyaṁ | sīmajījanantsujātaṁ | mātṛṣu | priyam |
agniṁ | stuhi | daivavātaṁ | devaśravo | yo | janānāmasadvaśī |
ni | tvā | dadhe | varā | pṛthivyeḻāyāspade | sudinatve | ahnām |
dṛṣadvatyāṁ | mānuṣāpayāyāṁ | sarasvatyāṁ | revadagne | didīhi |
iḻāmagne | purudaṁsaṁ | saniṁ | goḥ | śaśvattamaṁ | havamānāya | sādha |
syānnaḥ | sūnustanayo | vijāvāgne | sā | te | sumatirbhūtvasme |
agne | sahasva | pṛtanābhimātīrapāsya |
duṣṭarastarannarātīrvarco | dhā | yajñavāhase |
agneḻā | samidhyase | vītihotro | amartyaḥ |
juṣasva | sū | no | adhvaram |
agne | dyumnena | jāgṛve | sahasaḥ | sūnavāhuta |
edaṁ | barhiḥ | sado | mama |
agne | viśvebhiragnibhirdevebhirmahayā | giraḥ |
yajñeṣu | yo | cāyavaḥ |
agne | dā | dāśuṣe | rayiṁ | vīravantaṁ | parīṇasam |
śiśīhi | naḥ | sūnumataḥ |
agne | divaḥ | sūnurasi | pracetāstanā | pṛthivyota | viśvavedāḥ |
ṛdhagdevām̐ | iha | yajā | cikitvaḥ |
agniḥ | sanoti | vīryāṇi | vidvāntsanoti | vājamamṛtāya | bhūṣan |
sa | no | devām̐ | eha | vahā | purukṣo |
agnirdyāvāpṛthivī | viśvajanye | ā | bhāti | devī | amṛte | amūraḥ |
kṣayanvājaiḥ | puruścandro | namobhiḥ |
agnendraśca | dāśuṣo | duroṇe | sutāvato | yajñamihopa | yātam |
amardhantā | somapeyāya | devā |
agne | apāṁ | samidhyase | duroṇe | nityaḥ | sūno | sahaso | jātavedaḥ |
sadhasthāni | mahayamānotī |
vaiśvānaraṁ | manasāgniṁ | nicāyyā | haviṣmanto | anuṣatyaṁ | svarvidam |
sudānuṁ | devaṁ | rathiraṁ | vasūyavo | gīrbhī | raṇvaṁ | kuśikāso | havāmahe |
taṁ | śubhramagnimavase | havāmahe | vaiśvānaraṁ | mātariśvānamukthyam |
bṛhaspatiṁ | manuṣo | devatātaye | vipraṁ | śrotāramatithiṁ | raghuṣyadam |
aśvo | na | krandañjanibhiḥ | samidhyate | vaiśvānaraḥ | kuśikebhiryugeyuge |
sa | no | agniḥ | suvīryaṁ | svaśvyaṁ | dadhātu | ratnamamṛteṣu | jāgṛviḥ |
pra | yantu | vājāstaviṣībhiragnayaḥ | śubhe | saṁmiślāḥ | pṛṣatīrayukṣata |
bṛhadukṣo | maruto | viśvavedasaḥ | pra | vepayanti | parvatām̐ | adābhyāḥ |
agniśriyo | maruto | viśvakṛṣṭayā | tveṣamugramavemahe | vayam |
te | svānino | rudriyā | varṣanirṇijaḥ | siṁhā | na | heṣakratavaḥ | sudānavaḥ |
vrātaṁvrātaṁ | gaṇaṁgaṇaṁ | suśastibhiragnerbhāmaṁ | marutāmojemahe |
pṛṣadaśvāso | anavabhrarādhaso | gantāro | yajñaṁ | vidatheṣu | dhīrāḥ |
agnirasmi | janmanā | jātavedā | ghṛtaṁ | me | cakṣuramṛtaṁ | māsan |
arkastridhātū | rajaso | vimāno'jasro | gharmo | havirasmi | nāma |
tribhiḥ | pavitrairapupoddhyarkaṁ | hṛdā | matiṁ | jyotiranu | prajānan |
varṣiṣṭhaṁ | ratnamakṛta | svadhābhirādiddyāvāpṛthivī | paryapaśyat |
śatadhāramutsamakṣīyamāṇaṁ | vipaścitaṁ | pitaraṁ | vaktvānām |
meḻiṁ | madantaṁ | pitrorupasthe | taṁ | rodasī | pipṛtaṁ | satyavācam |
pra | vo | vājābhidyavo | haviṣmanto | ghṛtācyā |
devāñjigāti | sumnayuḥ |
īḻe | agniṁ | vipaścitaṁ | girā | yajñasya | sādhanam |
śruṣṭīvānaṁ | dhitāvānam |
agne | śakema | te | vayaṁ | yamaṁ | devasya | vājinaḥ |
ati | dveṣāṁsi | tarema |
samidhyamāno | adhvare'gniḥ | pāvakeḍyaḥ |
śociṣkeśastamīmahe |
pṛthupājāmartyo | ghṛtanirṇiksvāhutaḥ |
agniryajñasya | havyavāṭ |
taṁ | sabādho | yatasrucetthā | dhiyā | yajñavantaḥ |
ā | cakruragnimūtaye |
hotā | devo | amartyaḥ | purastādeti | māyayā |
vidathāni | pracodayan |
vājī | vājeṣu | dhīyate'dhvareṣu | pra | ṇīyate |
vipro | yajñasya | sādhanaḥ |
dhiyā | cakre | vareṇyo | bhūtānāṁ | garbhamā | dadhe |
dakṣasya | pitaraṁ | tanā |
ni | tvā | dadhe | vareṇyaṁ | dakṣasyeḻā | sahaskṛta |
agne | sudītimuśijam |
agniṁ | yanturamapturamṛtasya | yoge | vanuṣaḥ |
viprā | vājaiḥ | samindhate |
ūrjo | napātamadhvare | dīdivāṁsamupa | dyavi |
agnimīḻe | kavikratum |
īḻenyo | namasyastirastamāṁsi | darśataḥ |
samagniridhyate | vṛṣā |
vṛṣo | agniḥ | samidhyate'śvo | na | devavāhanaḥ |
taṁ | haviṣmanteḻate |
vṛṣaṇaṁ | tvā | vayaṁ | vṛṣanvṛṣaṇaḥ | samidhīmahi |
agne | dīdyataṁ | bṛhat |
agne | juṣasva | no | haviḥ | puroḻāśaṁ | jātavedaḥ |
prātaḥsāve | dhiyāvaso |
puroḻāgne | pacatastubhyaṁ | vā | ghā | pariṣkṛtaḥ |
taṁ | juṣasva | yaviṣṭhya |
agne | vīhi | puroḻāśamāhutaṁ | tiroahnyam |
sahasaḥ | sūnurasyadhvare | hitaḥ |
mādhyaṁdine | savane | jātavedaḥ | puroḻāśamiha | kave | juṣasva |
agne | yahvasya | tava | bhāgadheyaṁ | na | pra | minanti | vidatheṣu | dhīrāḥ |
agne | tṛtīye | savane | hi | kāniṣaḥ | puroḻāśaṁ | sahasaḥ | sūnavāhutam |
athā | deveṣvadhvaraṁ | vipanyayā | dhā | ratnavantamamṛteṣu | jāgṛvim |
agne | vṛdhānāhutiṁ | puroḻāśaṁ | jātavedaḥ |
juṣasva | tiroahnyam |
astīdamadhimanthanamasti | prajananaṁ | kṛtam |
etāṁ | viśpatnīmā | bharāgniṁ | manthāma | pūrvathā |
araṇyornihito | jātavedā | garbheva | sudhito | garbhiṇīṣu |
divediveḍyo | jāgṛvadbhirhaviṣmadbhirmanuṣyebhiragniḥ |
uttānāyāmava | bharā | cikitvāntsadyaḥ | pravītā | vṛṣaṇaṁ | jajāna |
aruṣastūpo | ruśadasya | pājeḻāyāsputro | vayune'janiṣṭa |
iḻāyāstvā | pade | vayaṁ | nābhā | pṛthivyādhi |
jātavedo | ni | dhīmahyagne | havyāya | voḻhave |
manthatā | naraḥ | kavimadvayantaṁ | pracetasamamṛtaṁ | supratīkam |
yajñasya | ketuṁ | prathamaṁ | purastādagniṁ | naro | janayatā | suśevam |
yadī | manthanti | bāhubhirvi | rocate'śvo | na | vājyaruṣo | vaneṣvā |
citro | na | yāmannaśvinoranivṛtaḥ | pari | vṛṇaktyaśmanastṛṇā | dahan |
jāto | agnī | rocate | cekitāno | vājī | vipraḥ | kaviśastaḥ | sudānuḥ |
yaṁ | devāseḍyaṁ | viśvavidaṁ | havyavāhamadadhuradhvareṣu |
sīda | hotaḥ | svo | loke | cikitvāntsādayā | yajñaṁ | sukṛtasya | yonau |
devāvīrdevānhaviṣā | yajāsyagne | bṛhadyajamāne | vayo | dhāḥ |
kṛṇota | dhūmaṁ | vṛṣaṇaṁ | sakhāyo'sredhantetana | vājamaccha |
ayamagniḥ | pṛtanāṣāṭ | suvīro | yena | devāso | asahanta | dasyūn |
ayaṁ | te | yonirṛtviyo | yato | jāto | arocathāḥ |
taṁ | jānannagnā | sīdāthā | no | vardhayā | giraḥ |
tanūnapāducyate | garbhāsuro | narāśaṁso | bhavati | yadvijāyate |
mātariśvā | yadamimīta | mātari | vātasya | sargo | abhavatsarīmaṇi |
sunirmathā | nirmathitaḥ | sunidhā | nihitaḥ | kaviḥ |
agne | svadhvarā | kṛṇu | devāndevayate | yaja |
ajījanannamṛtaṁ | martyāso'sremāṇaṁ | taraṇiṁ | vīḻujambham |
daśa | svasāro | agruvaḥ | samīcīḥ | pumāṁsaṁ | jātamabhi | saṁ | rabhante |
pra | saptahotā | sanakādarocata | māturupasthe | yadaśocadūdhani |
na | ni | miṣati | suraṇo | divedive | yadasurasya | jaṭharādajāyata |
amitrāyudho | marutāmiva | prayāḥ | prathamajā | brahmaṇo | viśvamidviduḥ |
dyumnavadbrahma | kuśikāsairira | ekaeko | dame | agniṁ | samīdhire |
yadadya | tvā | prayati | yajñe | asminhotaścikitvo'vṛṇīmahīha |
dhruvamayā | dhruvamutāśamiṣṭhāḥ | prajānanvidvām̐ | upa | yāhi | somam |
icchanti | tvā | somyāsaḥ | sakhāyaḥ | sunvanti | somaṁ | dadhati | prayāṁsi |
titikṣante | abhiśastiṁ | janānāmindra | tvadā | kaścana | hi | praketaḥ |
na | te | dūre | paramā | cidrajāṁsyā | tu | pra | yāhi | harivo | haribhyām |
sthirāya | vṛṣṇe | savanā | kṛtemā | yuktā | grāvāṇaḥ | samidhāne | agnau |
indraḥ | suśipro | maghavā | tarutro | mahāvrātastuvikūrmirṛghāvān |
yadugro | dhā | bādhito | martyeṣu | kva | tyā | te | vṛṣabha | vīryāṇi |
tvaṁ | hi | ṣmā | cyāvayannacyutānyeko | vṛtrā | carasi | jighnamānaḥ |
tava | dyāvāpṛthivī | parvatāso'nu | vratāya | nimiteva | tasthuḥ |
utābhaye | puruhūta | śravobhireko | dṛḻhamavado | vṛtrahā | san |
ime | cidindra | rodasī | apāre | yatsaṁgṛbhṇā | maghavankāśiritte |
pra | sū | tendra | pravatā | haribhyāṁ | pra | te | vajraḥ | pramṛṇannetu | śatrūn |
jahi | pratīco | anūcaḥ | parāco | viśvaṁ | satyaṁ | kṛṇuhi | viṣṭamastu |
yasmai | dhāyuradadhā | martyāyābhaktaṁ | cidbhajate | gehyaṁ | saḥ |
bhadrā | tendra | sumatirghṛtācī | sahasradānā | puruhūta | rātiḥ |
sahadānuṁ | puruhūta | kṣiyantamahastamindra | saṁ | piṇakkuṇārum |
abhi | vṛtraṁ | vardhamānaṁ | piyārumapādamindra | tavasā | jaghantha |
ni | sāmanāmiṣirāmindra | bhūmiṁ | mahīmapārāṁ | sadane | sasattha |
astabhnāddyāṁ | vṛṣabho | antarikṣamarṣantvāpastvayeha | prasūtāḥ |
alātṛṇo | valendra | vrajo | goḥ | purā | hantorbhayamāno | vyāra |
sugānpatho | akṛṇonniraje | gāḥ | prāvanvāṇīḥ | puruhūtaṁ | dhamantīḥ |
eko | dve | vasumatī | samīcīndra | ā | paprau | pṛthivīmuta | dyām |
utāntarikṣādabhi | naḥ | samīkeṣo | rathīḥ | sayujaḥ | śūra | vājān |
diśaḥ | sūryo | na | mināti | pradiṣṭā | divedive | haryaśvaprasūtāḥ |
saṁ | yadānaḻadhvanādidaśvairvimocanaṁ | kṛṇute | tattvasya |
didṛkṣantoṣaso | yāmannaktorvivasvatyā | mahi | citramanīkam |
viśve | jānanti | mahinā | yadāgādindrasya | karma | sukṛtā | purūṇi |
mahi | jyotirnihitaṁ | vakṣaṇāsvāmā | pakvaṁ | carati | bibhratī | gauḥ |
viśvaṁ | svādma | saṁbhṛtamusriyāyāṁ | yatsīmindro | adadhādbhojanāya |
indra | dṛhya | yāmakośābhūvanyajñāya | śikṣa | gṛṇate | sakhibhyaḥ |
durmāyavo | durevā | martyāso | niṣaṅgiṇo | ripavo | hantvāsaḥ |
saṁ | ghoṣaḥ | śṛṇve'vamairamitrairjahī | nyeṣvaśaniṁ | tapiṣṭhām |
vṛścemadhastādvi | rujā | sahasva | jahi | rakṣo | maghavanrandhayasva |
udvṛha | rakṣaḥ | sahamūlamindra | vṛścā | madhyaṁ | pratyagraṁ | śṛṇīhi |
ā | kīvataḥ | salalūkaṁ | cakartha | brahmadviṣe | tapuṣiṁ | hetimasya |
svastaye | vājibhiśca | praṇetaḥ | saṁ | yanmahīriṣāsatsi | pūrvīḥ |
rāyo | vantāro | bṛhataḥ | syāmāsme | astu | bhagendra | prajāvān |
ā | no | bhara | bhagamindra | dyumantaṁ | ni | te | deṣṇasya | dhīmahi | prareke |
ūrveva | paprathe | kāmo | asme | tamā | pṛṇa | vasupate | vasūnām |
imaṁ | kāmaṁ | mandayā | gobhiraśvaiścandravatā | rādhasā | paprathaśca |
svaryavo | matibhistubhyaṁ | viprendrāya | vāhaḥ | kuśikāso | akran |
ā | no | gotrā | dardṛhi | gopate | gāḥ | samasmabhyaṁ | sanayo | yantu | vājāḥ |
divakṣāsi | vṛṣabha | satyaśuṣmo'smabhyaṁ | su | maghavanbodhi | godāḥ |
śunaṁ | huvema | maghavānamindramasminbhare | nṛtamaṁ | vājasātau |
śṛṇvantamugramūtaye | samatsu | ghnantaṁ | vṛtrāṇi | saṁjitaṁ | dhanānām |
śāsadvahnirduhiturnaptyaṁ | gādvidvām̐ | ṛtasya | dīdhitiṁ | saparyan |
pitā | yatra | duhituḥ | sekamṛñjantsaṁ | śagmyena | manasā | dadhanve |
na | jāmaye | tānvo | rikthamāraikcakāra | garbhaṁ | saniturnidhānam |
yadī | mātaro | janayanta | vahnimanyaḥ | kartā | sukṛtoranya | ṛndhan |
agnirjajñe | juhvā | rejamāno | mahasputrām̐ | aruṣasya | prayakṣe |
mahāngarbho | mahyā | jātameṣāṁ | mahī | pravṛddharyaśvasya | yajñaiḥ |
abhi | jaitrīrasacanta | spṛdhānaṁ | mahi | jyotistamaso | nirajānan |
taṁ | jānatīḥ | pratyudāyannuṣāsaḥ | patirgavāmabhavadekendraḥ |
vīḻau | satīrabhi | dhīrātṛndanprācāhinvanmanasā | sapta | viprāḥ |
viśvāmavindanpathyāmṛtasya | prajānannittā | namasā | viveśa |
vidadyadī | saramā | rugṇamadrermahi | pāthaḥ | pūrvyaṁ | sadhryakkaḥ |
agraṁ | nayatsupadyakṣarāṇāmacchā | ravaṁ | prathamā | jānatī | gāt |
agacchadu | vipratamaḥ | sakhīyannasūdayatsukṛte | garbhamadriḥ |
sasāna | maryo | yuvabhirmakhasyannathābhavadaṅgirāḥ | sadyo | arcan |
sataḥsataḥ | pratimānaṁ | purobhūrviśvā | veda | janimā | hanti | śuṣṇam |
pra | ṇo | divaḥ | padavīrgavyurarcantsakhā | sakhīm̐ramuñcanniravadyāt |
ni | gavyatā | manasā | sedurarkaiḥ | kṛṇvānāso | amṛtatvāya | gātum |
idaṁ | cinnu | sadanaṁ | bhūryeṣāṁ | yena | māsām̐ | asiṣāsannṛtena |
saṁpaśyamānāmadannabhi | svaṁ | payaḥ | pratnasya | retaso | dughānāḥ |
vi | rodasī | atapadghoṣaiṣāṁ | jāte | niṣṭhāmadadhurgoṣu | vīrān |
sa | jātebhirvṛtrahā | sedu | havyairudusriyāsṛjadindro | arkaiḥ |
urūcyasmai | ghṛtavadbharantī | madhu | svādma | duduhe | jenyā | gauḥ |
pitre | ciccakruḥ | sadanaṁ | samasmai | mahi | tviṣīmatsukṛto | vi | hi | khyan |
viṣkabhnantaḥ | skambhanenā | janitrī | āsīnordhvaṁ | rabhasaṁ | vi | minvan |
mahī | yadi | dhiṣaṇā | śiśnathe | dhātsadyovṛdhaṁ | vibhvaṁ | rodasyoḥ |
giro | yasminnanavadyāḥ | samīcīrviśvendrāya | taviṣīranuttāḥ |
mahyā | te | sakhyaṁ | vaśmi | śaktīrā | vṛtraghne | niyuto | yanti | pūrvīḥ |
mahi | stotramavāganma | sūrerasmākaṁ | su | maghavanbodhi | gopāḥ |
mahi | kṣetraṁ | puru | ścandraṁ | vividvānāditsakhibhyaścarathaṁ | samairat |
indro | nṛbhirajanaddīdyānaḥ | sākaṁ | sūryamuṣasaṁ | gātumagnim |
apaścideṣa | vibhvo | damūnāḥ | pra | sadhrīcīrasṛjadviśvaścandrāḥ |
madhvaḥ | punānāḥ | kavibhiḥ | pavitrairdyubhirhinvantyaktubhirdhanutrīḥ |
anu | kṛṣṇe | vasudhitī | jihāte | ubhe | sūryasya | maṁhanā | yajatre |
pari | yatte | mahimānaṁ | vṛjadhyai | sakhāyendra | kāmyā | ṛjipyāḥ |
patirbhava | vṛtrahantsūnṛtānāṁ | girāṁ | viśvāyurvṛṣabho | vayodhāḥ |
ā | no | gahi | sakhyebhiḥ | śivebhirmahānmahībhirūtibhiḥ | saraṇyan |
tamaṅgirasvannamasā | saparyannavyaṁ | kṛṇomi | sanyase | purājām |
druho | vi | yāhi | bahulādevīḥ | svaśca | no | maghavantsātaye | dhāḥ |
mihaḥ | pāvakāḥ | pratatābhūvantsvasti | naḥ | pipṛhi | pāramāsām |
indra | tvaṁ | rathiraḥ | pāhi | no | riṣo | makṣūmakṣū | kṛṇuhi | gojito | naḥ |
adediṣṭa | vṛtrahā | gopatirgāntaḥ | kṛṣṇām̐ | aruṣairdhāmabhirgāt |
pra | sūnṛtā | diśamāna | ṛtena | duraśca | viśvāvṛṇodapa | svāḥ |
śunaṁ | huvema | maghavānamindramasminbhare | nṛtamaṁ | vājasātau |
śṛṇvantamugramūtaye | samatsu | ghnantaṁ | vṛtrāṇi | saṁjitaṁ | dhanānām |
indra | somaṁ | somapate | pibemaṁ | mādhyaṁdinaṁ | savanaṁ | cāru | yatte |
prapruthyā | śipre | maghavannṛjīṣinvimucyā | harīha | mādayasva |
gavāśiraṁ | manthinamindra | śukraṁ | pibā | somaṁ | rarimā | te | madāya |
brahmakṛtā | mārutenā | gaṇena | sajoṣā | rudraistṛpadā | vṛṣasva |
ye | te | śuṣmaṁ | ye | taviṣīmavardhannarcantendra | marutastaujaḥ |
mādhyaṁdine | savane | vajrahasta | pibā | rudrebhiḥ | sagaṇaḥ | suśipra |
tennvasya | madhumadviviprendrasya | śardho | maruto | yāsan |
yebhirvṛtrasyeṣito | vivedāmarmaṇo | manyamānasya | marma |
manuṣvadindra | savanaṁ | juṣāṇaḥ | pibā | somaṁ | śaśvate | vīryāya |
sā | vavṛtsva | haryaśva | yajñaiḥ | saraṇyubhirapo | arṇā | sisarṣi |
tvamapo | yaddha | vṛtraṁ | jaghanvām̐ | atyām̐ | iva | prāsṛjaḥ | sartavājau |
śayānamindra | caratā | vadhena | vavrivāṁsaṁ | pari | devīradevam |
yajāmennamasā | vṛddhamindraṁ | bṛhantamṛṣvamajaraṁ | yuvānam |
yasya | priye | mamaturyajñiyasya | na | rodasī | mahimānaṁ | mamāte |
indrasya | karma | sukṛtā | purūṇi | vratāni | devā | na | minanti | viśve |
dādhāra | yaḥ | pṛthivīṁ | dyāmutemāṁ | jajāna | sūryamuṣasaṁ | sudaṁsāḥ |
adrogha | satyaṁ | tava | tanmahitvaṁ | sadyo | yajjāto | apibo | ha | somam |
na | dyāvendra | tavasastaujo | nāhā | na | māsāḥ | śarado | varanta |
tvaṁ | sadyo | apibo | jātendra | madāya | somaṁ | parame | vyoman |
yaddha | dyāvāpṛthivī | āviveśīrathābhavaḥ | pūrvyaḥ | kārudhāyāḥ |
ahannahiṁ | pariśayānamarṇaujāyamānaṁ | tuvijāta | tavyān |
na | te | mahitvamanu | bhūdadha | dyauryadanyayā | sphigyā | kṣāmavasthāḥ |
yajño | hi | tendra | vardhano | bhūduta | priyaḥ | sutasomo | miyedhaḥ |
yajñena | yajñamava | yajñiyaḥ | sanyajñaste | vajramahihatyāvat |
yajñenendramavasā | cakre | arvāgainaṁ | sumnāya | navyase | vavṛtyām |
yaḥ | stomebhirvāvṛdhe | pūrvyebhiryo | madhyamebhiruta | nūtanebhiḥ |
viveṣa | yanmā | dhiṣaṇā | jajāna | stavai | purā | pāryādindramahnaḥ |
aṁhaso | yatra | pīparadyathā | no | nāveva | yāntamubhaye | havante |
āpūrṇo | asya | kalaśaḥ | svāhā | sekteva | kośaṁ | sisice | pibadhyai |
samu | priyāvavṛtranmadāya | pradakṣiṇidabhi | somāsendram |
na | tvā | gabhīraḥ | puruhūta | sindhurnādrayaḥ | pari | ṣanto | varanta |
itthā | sakhibhyeṣito | yadindrā | dṛḻhaṁ | cidarujo | gavyamūrvam |
śunaṁ | huvema | maghavānamindramasminbhare | nṛtamaṁ | vājasātau |
śṛṇvantamugramūtaye | samatsu | ghnantaṁ | vṛtrāṇi | saṁjitaṁ | dhanānām |
pra | parvatānāmuśatī | upasthādaśve | iva | viṣite | hāsamāne |
gāveva | śubhre | mātarā | rihāṇe | vipāṭ | chutudrī | payasā | javete |
indreṣite | prasavaṁ | bhikṣamāṇe | acchā | samudraṁ | rathyeva | yāthaḥ |
samārāṇe | ūrmibhiḥ | pinvamāne | anyā | vāmanyāmapyeti | śubhre |
acchā | sindhuṁ | mātṛtamāmayāsaṁ | vipāśamurvīṁ | subhagāmaganma |
vatsamiva | mātarā | saṁrihāṇe | samānaṁ | yonimanu | saṁcarantī |
enā | vayaṁ | payasā | pinvamānānu | yoniṁ | devakṛtaṁ | carantīḥ |
na | vartave | prasavaḥ | sargataktaḥ | kiṁyurvipro | nadyo | johavīti |
ramadhvaṁ | me | vacase | somyāya | ṛtāvarīrupa | muhūrtamevaiḥ |
pra | sindhumacchā | bṛhatī | manīṣāvasyurahve | kuśikasya | sūnuḥ |
indro | asmām̐ | aradadvajrabāhurapāhanvṛtraṁ | paridhiṁ | nadīnām |
devo'nayatsavitā | supāṇistasya | vayaṁ | prasave | yāmorvīḥ |
pravācyaṁ | śaśvadhā | vīryaṁ | tadindrasya | karma | yadahiṁ | vivṛścat |
vi | vajreṇa | pariṣado | jaghānāyannāpo'yanamicchamānāḥ |
etadvaco | jaritarmāpi | mṛṣṭhā | yatte | ghoṣānuttarā | yugāni |
uktheṣu | kāro | prati | no | juṣasva | mā | no | ni | kaḥ | puruṣatrā | namaste |
o | ṣu | svasāraḥ | kārave | śṛṇota | yayau | vo | dūrādanasā | rathena |
ni | ṣū | namadhvaṁ | bhavatā | supārādhoakṣāḥ | sindhavaḥ | srotyābhiḥ |
ā | te | kāro | śṛṇavāmā | vacāṁsi | yayātha | dūrādanasā | rathena |
ni | te | naṁsai | pīpyāneva | yoṣā | maryāyeva | kanyā | śaśvacai | te |
yadaṅga | tvā | bharatāḥ | saṁtareyurgavyangrāmeṣita | indrajūtaḥ |
arṣādaha | prasavaḥ | sargataktā | vo | vṛṇe | sumatiṁ | yajñiyānām |
atāriṣurbharatā | gavyavaḥ | samabhakta | vipraḥ | sumatiṁ | nadīnām |
pra | pinvadhvamiṣayantīḥ | surādhā | vakṣaṇāḥ | pṛṇadhvaṁ | yāta | śībham |
udvormiḥ | śamyā | hantvāpo | yoktrāṇi | muñcata |
māduṣkṛtau | vyenasāghnyau | śūnamāratām |
indraḥ | pūrbhidātiraddāsamarkairvidadvasurdayamāno | vi | śatrūn |
brahmajūtastanvā | vāvṛdhāno | bhūridātrāpṛṇadrodasī | ubhe |
makhasya | te | taviṣasya | pra | jūtimiyarmi | vācamamṛtāya | bhūṣan |
indra | kṣitīnāmasi | mānuṣīṇāṁ | viśāṁ | daivīnāmuta | pūrvayāvā |
indro | vṛtramavṛṇocchardhanītiḥ | pra | māyināmaminādvarpaṇītiḥ |
ahanvyaṁsamuśadhagvaneṣvāvirdhenākṛṇodrāmyāṇām |
indraḥ | svarṣā | janayannahāni | jigāyośigbhiḥ | pṛtanābhiṣṭiḥ |
prārocayanmanave | ketumahnāmavindajjyotirbṛhate | raṇāya |
indrastujo | barhaṇā | viveśa | nṛvaddadhāno | naryā | purūṇi |
acetayaddhiyemā | jaritre | premaṁ | varṇamatiracchukramāsām |
maho | mahāni | panayantyasyendrasya | karma | sukṛtā | purūṇi |
vṛjanena | vṛjināntsaṁ | pipeṣa | māyābhirdasyūm̐rabhibhūtyojāḥ |
yudhendro | mahnā | varivaścakāra | devebhyaḥ | satpatiścarṣaṇiprāḥ |
vivasvataḥ | sadane | asya | tāni | viprokthebhiḥ | kavayo | gṛṇanti |
satrāsāhaṁ | vareṇyaṁ | sahodāṁ | sasavāṁsaṁ | svarapaśca | devīḥ |
sasāna | yaḥ | pṛthivīṁ | dyāmutemāmindraṁ | madantyanu | dhīraṇāsaḥ |
sasānātyām̐ | uta | sūryaṁ | sasānendraḥ | sasāna | purubhojasaṁ | gām |
hiraṇyayamuta | bhogaṁ | sasāna | hatvī | dasyūnprāryaṁ | varṇamāvat |
indrauṣadhīrasanodahāni | vanaspatīm̐rasanodantarikṣam |
bibheda | valaṁ | nunude | vivāco'thābhavaddamitābhikratūnām |
śunaṁ | huvema | maghavānamindramasminbhare | nṛtamaṁ | vājasātau |
śṛṇvantamugramūtaye | samatsu | ghnantaṁ | vṛtrāṇi | saṁjitaṁ | dhanānām |
tiṣṭhā | harī | rathā | yujyamānā | yāhi | vāyurna | niyuto | no | accha |
pibāsyandho | abhisṛṣṭo | asme | indra | svāhā | rarimā | te | madāya |
upājirā | puruhūtāya | saptī | harī | rathasya | dhūrṣvā | yunajmi |
dravadyathā | saṁbhṛtaṁ | viśvataścidupemaṁ | yajñamā | vahātendram |
upo | nayasva | vṛṣaṇā | tapuṣpotemava | tvaṁ | vṛṣabha | svadhāvaḥ |
grasetāmaśvā | vi | muceha | śoṇā | divedive | sadṛśīraddhi | dhānāḥ |
brahmaṇā | te | brahmayujā | yunajmi | harī | sakhāyā | sadhamādāśū |
sthiraṁ | rathaṁ | sukhamindrādhitiṣṭhanprajānanvidvām̐ | upa | yāhi | somam |
mā | te | harī | vṛṣaṇā | vītapṛṣṭhā | ni | rīramanyajamānāso | anye |
atyāyāhi | śaśvato | vayaṁ | te'raṁ | sutebhiḥ | kṛṇavāma | somaiḥ |
tavāyaṁ | somastvamehyarvāṅchaśvattamaṁ | sumanāsya | pāhi |
asminyajñe | barhiṣyā | niṣadyā | dadhiṣvemaṁ | jaṭharendumindra |
stīrṇaṁ | te | barhiḥ | sutendra | somaḥ | kṛtā | dhānāttave | te | haribhyām |
tadokase | puruśākāya | vṛṣṇe | marutvate | tubhyaṁ | rātā | havīṁṣi |
imaṁ | naraḥ | parvatāstubhyamāpaḥ | samindra | gobhirmadhumantamakran |
tasyāgatyā | sumanā | ṛṣva | pāhi | prajānanvidvānpathyānu | svāḥ |
yām̐ | ābhajo | marutendra | some | ye | tvāmavardhannabhavangaṇaste |
tebhiretaṁ | sajoṣā | vāvaśāno'gneḥ | piba | jihvayā | somamindra |
indra | piba | svadhayā | citsutasyāgnervā | pāhi | jihvayā | yajatra |
adhvaryorvā | prayataṁ | śakra | hastāddhoturvā | yajñaṁ | haviṣo | juṣasva |
śunaṁ | huvema | maghavānamindramasminbhare | nṛtamaṁ | vājasātau |
śṛṇvantamugramūtaye | samatsu | ghnantaṁ | vṛtrāṇi | saṁjitaṁ | dhanānām |
imāmū | ṣu | prabhṛtiṁ | sātaye | dhāḥ | śaśvacchaśvadūtibhiryādamānaḥ |
sutesute | vāvṛdhe | vardhanebhiryaḥ | karmabhirmahadbhiḥ | suśruto | bhūt |
indrāya | somāḥ | pradivo | vidānā | ṛbhuryebhirvṛṣaparvā | vihāyāḥ |
prayamyamānānprati | ṣū | gṛbhāyendra | piba | vṛṣadhūtasya | vṛṣṇaḥ |
pibā | vardhasva | tava | ghā | sutāsendra | somāsaḥ | prathamoteme |
yathāpibaḥ | pūrvyām̐ | indra | somām̐ | evā | pāhi | panyo | adyā | navīyān |
mahām̐ | amatro | vṛjane | virapśyugraṁ | śavaḥ | patyate | dhṛṣṇvojaḥ |
nāha | vivyāca | pṛthivī | canainaṁ | yatsomāso | haryaśvamamandan |
mahām̐ | ugro | vāvṛdhe | vīryāya | samācakre | vṛṣabhaḥ | kāvyena |
indro | bhago | vājadāsya | gāvaḥ | pra | jāyante | dakṣiṇāsya | pūrvīḥ |
pra | yatsindhavaḥ | prasavaṁ | yathāyannāpaḥ | samudraṁ | rathyeva | jagmuḥ |
ataścidindraḥ | sadaso | varīyānyadīṁ | somaḥ | pṛṇati | dugdho | aṁśuḥ |
samudreṇa | sindhavo | yādamānendrāya | somaṁ | suṣutaṁ | bharantaḥ |
aṁśuṁ | duhanti | hastino | bharitrairmadhvaḥ | punanti | dhārayā | pavitraiḥ |
hradeva | kukṣayaḥ | somadhānāḥ | samī | vivyāca | savanā | purūṇi |
annā | yadindraḥ | prathamā | vyāśa | vṛtraṁ | jaghanvām̐ | avṛṇīta | somam |
ā | tū | bhara | mākiretatpari | ṣṭhādvidmā | hi | tvā | vasupatiṁ | vasūnām |
indra | yatte | māhinaṁ | datramastyasmabhyaṁ | taddharyaśva | pra | yandhi |
asme | pra | yandhi | maghavannṛjīṣinnindra | rāyo | viśvavārasya | bhūreḥ |
asme | śataṁ | śarado | jīvase | dhāsme | vīrāñchaśvatendra | śiprin |
śunaṁ | huvema | maghavānamindramasminbhare | nṛtamaṁ | vājasātau |
śṛṇvantamugramūtaye | samatsu | ghnantaṁ | vṛtrāṇi | saṁjitaṁ | dhanānām |
vārtrahatyāya | śavase | pṛtanāṣāhyāya | ca |
indra | tvā | vartayāmasi |
arvācīnaṁ | su | te | manota | cakṣuḥ | śatakrato |
indra | kṛṇvantu | vāghataḥ |
nāmāni | te | śatakrato | viśvābhirgīrbhirīmahe |
indrābhimātiṣāhye |
puruṣṭutasya | dhāmabhiḥ | śatena | mahayāmasi |
indrasya | carṣaṇīdhṛtaḥ |
indraṁ | vṛtrāya | hantave | puruhūtamupa | bruve |
bhareṣu | vājasātaye |
vājeṣu | sāsahirbhava | tvāmīmahe | śatakrato |
indra | vṛtrāya | hantave |
dyumneṣu | pṛtanājye | pṛtsutūrṣu | śravaḥsu | ca |
indra | sākṣvābhimātiṣu |
śuṣmintamaṁ | notaye | dyumninaṁ | pāhi | jāgṛvim |
indra | somaṁ | śatakrato |
indriyāṇi | śatakrato | yā | te | janeṣu | pañcasu |
indra | tāni | tā | vṛṇe |
agannindra | śravo | bṛhaddyumnaṁ | dadhiṣva | duṣṭaram |
utte | śuṣmaṁ | tirāmasi |
arvāvato | nā | gahyatho | śakra | parāvataḥ |
u | loko | yaste | adrivendreha | tatā | gahi |
abhi | taṣṭeva | dīdhayā | manīṣāmatyo | na | vājī | sudhuro | jihānaḥ |
abhi | priyāṇi | marmṛśatparāṇi | kavīm̐ricchāmi | saṁdṛśe | sumedhāḥ |
inota | pṛccha | janimā | kavīnāṁ | manodhṛtaḥ | sukṛtastakṣata | dyām |
imo | te | praṇyo | vardhamānā | manovātādha | nu | dharmaṇi | gman |
ni | ṣīmidatra | guhyā | dadhānota | kṣatrāya | rodasī | samañjan |
saṁ | mātrābhirmamire | yemururvī | antarmahī | samṛte | dhāyase | dhuḥ |
ātiṣṭhantaṁ | pari | viśve | abhūṣañchriyo | vasānaścarati | svarociḥ |
mahattadvṛṣṇo | asurasya | nāmā | viśvarūpo | amṛtāni | tasthau |
asūta | pūrvo | vṛṣabho | jyāyānimāsya | śurudhaḥ | santi | pūrvīḥ |
divo | napātā | vidathasya | dhībhiḥ | kṣatraṁ | rājānā | pradivo | dadhāthe |
trīṇi | rājānā | vidathe | purūṇi | pari | viśvāni | bhūṣathaḥ | sadāṁsi |
apaśyamatra | manasā | jaganvānvrate | gandharvām̐ | api | vāyukeśān |
tadinnvasya | vṛṣabhasya | dhenorā | nāmabhirmamire | sakmyaṁ | goḥ |
anyadanyadasuryaṁ | vasānā | ni | māyino | mamire | rūpamasmin |
tadinnvasya | saviturnakirme | hiraṇyayīmamatiṁ | yāmaśiśret |
ā | suṣṭutī | rodasī | viśvaminve | apīva | yoṣā | janimāni | vavre |
yuvaṁ | pratnasya | sādhatho | maho | yaddaivī | svastiḥ | pari | ṇaḥ | syātam |
gopājihvasya | tasthuṣo | virūpā | viśve | paśyanti | māyinaḥ | kṛtāni |
śunaṁ | huvema | maghavānamindramasminbhare | nṛtamaṁ | vājasātau |
śṛṇvantamugramūtaye | samatsu | ghnantaṁ | vṛtrāṇi | saṁjitaṁ | dhanānām |
indraṁ | matirhṛdā | vacyamānācchā | patiṁ | stomataṣṭā | jigāti |
yā | jāgṛvirvidathe | śasyamānendra | yatte | jāyate | viddhi | tasya |
divaścidā | pūrvyā | jāyamānā | vi | jāgṛvirvidathe | śasyamānā |
bhadrā | vastrāṇyarjunā | vasānā | seyamasme | sanajā | pitryā | dhīḥ |
yamā | cidatra | yamasūrasūta | jihvāyāgraṁ | patadā | hyasthāt |
vapūṁṣi | jātā | mithunā | sacete | tamohanā | tapuṣo | budhnaitā |
nakireṣāṁ | ninditā | martyeṣu | ye | asmākaṁ | pitaro | goṣu | yodhāḥ |
indraiṣāṁ | dṛṁhitā | māhināvānudgotrāṇi | sasṛje | daṁsanāvān |
sakhā | ha | yatra | sakhibhirnavagvairabhijñvā | satvabhirgānugman |
satyaṁ | tadindro | daśabhirdaśagvaiḥ | sūryaṁ | viveda | tamasi | kṣiyantam |
indro | madhu | saṁbhṛtamusriyāyāṁ | padvadviveda | śaphavanname | goḥ |
guhā | hitaṁ | guhyaṁ | gūḻhamapsu | haste | dadhe | dakṣiṇe | dakṣiṇāvān |
jyotirvṛṇīta | tamaso | vijānannāre | syāma | duritādabhīke |
imā | giraḥ | somapāḥ | somavṛddha | juṣasvendra | purutamasya | kāroḥ |
jyotiryajñāya | rodasī | anu | ṣyādāre | syāma | duritasya | bhūreḥ |
bhūri | ciddhi | tujato | martyasya | supārāso | vasavo | barhaṇāvat |
śunaṁ | huvema | maghavānamindramasminbhare | nṛtamaṁ | vājasātau |
śṛṇvantamugramūtaye | samatsu | ghnantaṁ | vṛtrāṇi | saṁjitaṁ | dhanānām |
indra | tvā | vṛṣabhaṁ | vayaṁ | sute | some | havāmahe |
sa | pāhi | madhvo | andhasaḥ |
indra | kratuvidaṁ | sutaṁ | somaṁ | harya | puruṣṭuta |
pibā | vṛṣasva | tātṛpim |
indra | pra | ṇo | dhitāvānaṁ | yajñaṁ | viśvebhirdevebhiḥ |
tira | stavāna | viśpate |
indra | somāḥ | suteme | tava | pra | yanti | satpate |
kṣayaṁ | candrāsendavaḥ |
dadhiṣvā | jaṭhare | sutaṁ | somamindra | vareṇyam |
tava | dyukṣāsendavaḥ |
girvaṇaḥ | pāhi | naḥ | sutaṁ | madhordhārābhirajyase |
indra | tvādātamidyaśaḥ |
abhi | dyumnāni | vaninendraṁ | sacante | akṣitā |
pītvī | somasya | vāvṛdhe |
arvāvato | nā | gahi | parāvataśca | vṛtrahan |
imā | juṣasva | no | giraḥ |
yadantarā | parāvatamarvāvataṁ | ca | hūyase |
indreha | tatā | gahi |
ā | tū | nendra | madryagghuvānaḥ | somapītaye |
haribhyāṁ | yāhyadrivaḥ |
satto | hotā | na | ṛtviyastistire | barhirānuṣak |
ayujranprātaradrayaḥ |
imā | brahma | brahmavāhaḥ | kriyantā | barhiḥ | sīda |
vīhi | śūra | puroḻāśam |
rārandhi | savaneṣu | ṇaiṣu | stomeṣu | vṛtrahan |
uktheṣvindra | girvaṇaḥ |
matayaḥ | somapāmuruṁ | rihanti | śavasaspatim |
indraṁ | vatsaṁ | na | mātaraḥ |
sa | mandasvā | hyandhaso | rādhase | tanvā | mahe |
na | stotāraṁ | nide | karaḥ |
vayamindra | tvāyavo | haviṣmanto | jarāmahe |
uta | tvamasmayurvaso |
māre | asmadvi | mumuco | haripriyārvāṅyāhi |
indra | svadhāvo | matsveha |
arvāñcaṁ | tvā | sukhe | rathe | vahatāmindra | keśinā |
ghṛtasnū | barhirāsade |
upa | naḥ | sutamā | gahi | somamindra | gavāśiram |
haribhyāṁ | yaste | asmayuḥ |
tamindra | madamā | gahi | barhiḥṣṭhāṁ | grāvabhiḥ | sutam |
kuvinnvasya | tṛpṇavaḥ |
indramitthā | giro | mamācchāguriṣitetaḥ |
āvṛte | somapītaye |
indraṁ | somasya | pītaye | stomairiha | havāmahe |
ukthebhiḥ | kuvidāgamat |
indra | somāḥ | suteme | tāndadhiṣva | śatakrato |
jaṭhare | vājinīvaso |
vidmā | hi | tvā | dhanaṁjayaṁ | vājeṣu | dadhṛṣaṁ | kave |
adhā | te | sumnamīmahe |
imamindra | gavāśiraṁ | yavāśiraṁ | ca | naḥ | piba |
āgatyā | vṛṣabhiḥ | sutam |
tubhyedindra | svaukye | somaṁ | codāmi | pītaye |
eṣa | rārantu | te | hṛdi |
tvāṁ | sutasya | pītaye | pratnamindra | havāmahe |
kuśikāso | avasyavaḥ |
ā | yāhyarvāṅupa | vandhureṣṭhāstavedanu | pradivaḥ | somapeyam |
priyā | sakhāyā | vi | mucopa | barhistvāmime | havyavāho | havante |
ā | yāhi | pūrvīrati | carṣaṇīrām̐ | aryāśiṣa | upa | no | haribhyām |
imā | hi | tvā | matayaḥ | stomataṣṭendra | havante | sakhyaṁ | juṣāṇāḥ |
ā | no | yajñaṁ | namovṛdhaṁ | sajoṣendra | deva | haribhiryāhi | tūyam |
ahaṁ | hi | tvā | matibhirjohavīmi | ghṛtaprayāḥ | sadhamāde | madhūnām |
ā | ca | tvāmetā | vṛṣaṇā | vahāto | harī | sakhāyā | sudhurā | svaṅgā |
dhānāvadindraḥ | savanaṁ | juṣāṇaḥ | sakhā | sakhyuḥ | śṛṇavadvandanāni |
kuvinmā | gopāṁ | karase | janasya | kuvidrājānaṁ | maghavannṛjīṣin |
kuvinma | ṛṣiṁ | papivāṁsaṁ | sutasya | kuvinme | vasvo | amṛtasya | śikṣāḥ |
ā | tvā | bṛhanto | harayo | yujānārvāgindra | sadhamādo | vahantu |
pra | ye | dvitā | diva | ṛñjantyātāḥ | susaṁmṛṣṭāso | vṛṣabhasya | mūrāḥ |
indra | piba | vṛṣadhūtasya | vṛṣṇā | yaṁ | te | śyenośate | jabhāra |
yasya | made | cyāvayasi | pra | kṛṣṭīryasya | made | apa | gotrā | vavartha |
śunaṁ | huvema | maghavānamindramasminbhare | nṛtamaṁ | vājasātau |
śṛṇvantamugramūtaye | samatsu | ghnantaṁ | vṛtrāṇi | saṁjitaṁ | dhanānām |
ayaṁ | te | astu | haryataḥ | somā | haribhiḥ | sutaḥ |
juṣāṇendra | haribhirnā | gahyā | tiṣṭha | haritaṁ | ratham |
haryannuṣasamarcayaḥ | sūryaṁ | haryannarocayaḥ |
vidvām̐ścikitvānharyaśva | vardhasendra | viśvābhi | śriyaḥ |
dyāmindro | haridhāyasaṁ | pṛthivīṁ | harivarpasam |
adhārayaddharitorbhūri | bhojanaṁ | yayorantarhariścarat |
jajñāno | harito | vṛṣā | viśvamā | bhāti | rocanam |
haryaśvo | haritaṁ | dhattāyudhamā | vajraṁ | bāhvorharim |
indro | haryantamarjunaṁ | vajraṁ | śukrairabhīvṛtam |
apāvṛṇoddharibhiradribhiḥ | sutamudgā | haribhirājata |
ā | mandrairindra | haribhiryāhi | mayūraromabhiḥ |
mā | tvā | ke | cinni | yamanviṁ | na | pāśino'ti | dhanveva | tām̐ | ihi |
vṛtrakhādo | valaṁrujaḥ | purāṁ | darmo | apāmajaḥ |
sthātā | rathasya | haryorabhisvarendro | dṛḻhā | cidārujaḥ |
gambhīrām̐ | udadhīm̐riva | kratuṁ | puṣyasi | geva |
pra | sugopā | yavasaṁ | dhenavo | yathā | hradaṁ | kulyevāśata |
ā | nastujaṁ | rayiṁ | bharāṁśaṁ | na | pratijānate |
vṛkṣaṁ | pakvaṁ | phalamaṅkīva | dhūnuhīndra | saṁpāraṇaṁ | vasu |
svayurindra | svarāḻasi | smaddiṣṭiḥ | svayaśastaraḥ |
sa | vāvṛdhānaujasā | puruṣṭuta | bhavā | naḥ | suśravastamaḥ |
yudhmasya | te | vṛṣabhasya | svarājograsya | yūnaḥ | sthavirasya | ghṛṣveḥ |
ajūryato | vajriṇo | vīryāṇīndra | śrutasya | mahato | mahāni |
mahām̐ | asi | mahiṣa | vṛṣṇyebhirdhanaspṛdugra | sahamāno | anyān |
eko | viśvasya | bhuvanasya | rājā | sa | yodhayā | ca | kṣayayā | ca | janān |
pra | mātrābhī | ririce | rocamānaḥ | pra | devebhirviśvato | apratītaḥ |
pra | majmanā | divendraḥ | pṛthivyāḥ | prorormaho | antarikṣādṛjīṣī |
uruṁ | gabhīraṁ | januṣābhyugraṁ | viśvavyacasamavataṁ | matīnām |
indraṁ | somāsaḥ | pradivi | sutāsaḥ | samudraṁ | na | sravatā | viśanti |
yaṁ | somamindra | pṛthivīdyāvā | garbhaṁ | na | mātā | bibhṛtastvāyā |
taṁ | te | hinvanti | tamu | te | mṛjantyadhvaryavo | vṛṣabha | pātavo |
marutvām̐ | indra | vṛṣabho | raṇāya | pibā | somamanuṣvadhaṁ | madāya |
ā | siñcasva | jaṭhare | madhvormiṁ | tvaṁ | rājāsi | pradivaḥ | sutānām |
sajoṣendra | sagaṇo | marudbhiḥ | somaṁ | piba | vṛtrahā | śūra | vidvān |
jahi | śatrūm̐rapa | mṛdho | nudasvāthābhayaṁ | kṛṇuhi | viśvato | naḥ |
uta | ṛtubhirṛtupāḥ | pāhi | somamindra | devebhiḥ | sakhibhiḥ | sutaṁ | naḥ |
yām̐ | ābhajo | maruto | ye | tvānvahanvṛtramadadhustubhyamojaḥ |
ye | tvāhihatye | maghavannavardhanye | śāmbare | harivo | ye | gaviṣṭau |
ye | tvā | nūnamanumadanti | viprāḥ | pibendra | somaṁ | sagaṇo | marudbhiḥ |
marutvantaṁ | vṛṣabhaṁ | vāvṛdhānamakavāriṁ | divyaṁ | śāsamindram |
viśvāsāhamavase | nūtanāyograṁ | sahodāmiha | taṁ | huvema |
sadyo | ha | jāto | vṛṣabhaḥ | kanīnaḥ | prabhartumāvadandhasaḥ | sutasya |
sādhoḥ | piba | pratikāmaṁ | yathā | te | rasāśiraḥ | prathamaṁ | somyasya |
yajjāyathāstadaharasya | kāmeṁ'śoḥ | pīyūṣamapibo | giriṣṭhām |
taṁ | te | mātā | pari | yoṣā | janitrī | mahaḥ | piturdamāsiñcadagre |
upasthāya | mātaramannamaiṭṭa | tigmamapaśyadabhi | somamūdhaḥ |
prayāvayannacaradgṛtso | anyānmahāni | cakre | purudhapratīkaḥ |
ugrasturāṣāḻabhibhūtyojā | yathāvaśaṁ | tanvaṁ | cakraiṣaḥ |
tvaṣṭāramindro | januṣābhibhūyāmuṣyā | somamapibaccamūṣu |
śunaṁ | huvema | maghavānamindramasminbhare | nṛtamaṁ | vājasātau |
śṛṇvantamugramūtaye | samatsu | ghnantaṁ | vṛtrāṇi | saṁjitaṁ | dhanānām |
śaṁsā | mahāmindraṁ | yasminviśvā | kṛṣṭayaḥ | somapāḥ | kāmamavyan |
yaṁ | sukratuṁ | dhiṣaṇe | vibhvataṣṭaṁ | ghanaṁ | vṛtrāṇāṁ | janayanta | devāḥ |
yaṁ | nu | nakiḥ | pṛtanāsu | svarājaṁ | dvitā | tarati | nṛtamaṁ | hariṣṭhām |
inatamaḥ | satvabhiryo | ha | śūṣaiḥ | pṛthujrayāminādāyurdasyoḥ |
sahāvā | pṛtsu | taraṇirnārvā | vyānaśī | rodasī | mehanāvān |
bhago | na | kāre | havyo | matīnāṁ | piteva | cāruḥ | suhavo | vayodhāḥ |
dhartā | divo | rajasaspṛṣṭordhvo | ratho | na | vāyurvasubhirniyutvān |
kṣapāṁ | vastā | janitā | sūryasya | vibhaktā | bhāgaṁ | dhiṣaṇeva | vājam |
śunaṁ | huvema | maghavānamindramasminbhare | nṛtamaṁ | vājasātau |
śṛṇvantamugramūtaye | samatsu | ghnantaṁ | vṛtrāṇi | saṁjitaṁ | dhanānām |
indraḥ | svāhā | pibatu | yasya | somāgatyā | tumro | vṛṣabho | marutvān |
oruvyacāḥ | pṛṇatāmebhirannairāsya | havistanvaḥ | kāmamṛdhyāḥ |
ā | te | saparyū | javase | yunajmi | yayoranu | pradivaḥ | śruṣṭimāvaḥ |
iha | tvā | dheyurharayaḥ | suśipra | pibā | tvasya | suṣutasya | cāroḥ |
gobhirmimikṣuṁ | dadhire | supāramindraṁ | jyaiṣṭhyāya | dhāyase | gṛṇānāḥ |
mandānaḥ | somaṁ | papivām̐ | ṛjīṣintsamasmabhyaṁ | purudhā | geṣaṇya |
imaṁ | kāmaṁ | mandayā | gobhiraśvaiścandravatā | rādhasā | paprathaśca |
svaryavo | matibhistubhyaṁ | viprendrāya | vāhaḥ | kuśikāso | akran |
śunaṁ | huvema | maghavānamindramasminbhare | nṛtamaṁ | vājasātau |
śṛṇvantamugramūtaye | samatsu | ghnantaṁ | vṛtrāṇi | saṁjitaṁ | dhanānām |
carṣaṇīdhṛtaṁ | maghavānamukthyamindraṁ | giro | bṛhatīrabhyanūṣata |
vāvṛdhānaṁ | puruhūtaṁ | suvṛktibhiramartyaṁ | jaramāṇaṁ | divedive |
śatakratumarṇavaṁ | śākinaṁ | naraṁ | giro | mendramupa | yanti | viśvataḥ |
vājasaniṁ | pūrbhidaṁ | tūrṇimapturaṁ | dhāmasācamabhiṣācaṁ | svarvidam |
ākare | vasorjaritā | panasyate'nehasaḥ | stubhendro | duvasyati |
vivasvataḥ | sadanā | hi | pipriye | satrāsāhamabhimātihanaṁ | stuhi |
nṛṇāmu | tvā | nṛtamaṁ | gīrbhirukthairabhi | pra | vīramarcatā | sabādhaḥ |
saṁ | sahase | purumāyo | jihīte | namo | asya | pradivaika | īśe |
pūrvīrasya | niṣṣidho | martyeṣu | purū | vasūni | pṛthivī | bibharti |
indrāya | dyāvauṣadhīrutāpo | rayiṁ | rakṣanti | jīrayo | vanāni |
tubhyaṁ | brahmāṇi | girendra | tubhyaṁ | satrā | dadhire | harivo | juṣasva |
bodhyāpiravaso | nūtanasya | sakhe | vaso | jaritṛbhyo | vayo | dhāḥ |
indra | marutveha | pāhi | somaṁ | yathā | śāryāte | apibaḥ | sutasya |
tava | praṇītī | tava | śūra | śarmannā | vivāsanti | kavayaḥ | suyajñāḥ |
sa | vāvaśāneha | pāhi | somaṁ | marudbhirindra | sakhibhiḥ | sutaṁ | naḥ |
jātaṁ | yattvā | pari | devābhūṣanmahe | bharāya | puruhūta | viśve |
aptūrye | marutāpireṣo'mandannindramanu | dātivārāḥ |
tebhiḥ | sākaṁ | pibatu | vṛtrakhādaḥ | sutaṁ | somaṁ | dāśuṣaḥ | sve | sadhasthe |
idaṁ | hyanvojasā | sutaṁ | rādhānāṁ | pate |
pibā | tvasya | girvaṇaḥ |
yaste | anu | svadhāmasatsute | ni | yaccha | tanvam |
sa | tvā | mamattu | somyam |
pra | te | aśnotu | kukṣyoḥ | prendra | brahmaṇā | śiraḥ |
pra | bāhū | śūra | rādhase |
dhānāvantaṁ | karambhiṇamapūpavantamukthinam |
indra | prātarjuṣasva | naḥ |
puroḻāśaṁ | pacatyaṁ | juṣasvendrā | gurasva | ca |
tubhyaṁ | havyāni | sisrate |
puroḻāśaṁ | ca | no | ghaso | joṣayāse | giraśca | naḥ |
vadhūyuriva | yoṣaṇām |
puroḻāśaṁ | sanaśruta | prātaḥsāve | juṣasva | naḥ |
indra | kraturhi | te | bṛhan |
mādhyaṁdinasya | savanasya | dhānāḥ | puroḻāśamindra | kṛṣveha | cārum |
pra | yatstotā | jaritā | tūrṇyartho | vṛṣāyamāṇopa | gīrbhirīṭṭe |
tṛtīye | dhānāḥ | savane | puruṣṭuta | puroḻāśamāhutaṁ | māmahasva | naḥ |
ṛbhumantaṁ | vājavantaṁ | tvā | kave | prayasvantopa | śikṣema | dhītibhiḥ |
pūṣaṇvate | te | cakṛmā | karambhaṁ | harivate | haryaśvāya | dhānāḥ |
apūpamaddhi | sagaṇo | marudbhiḥ | somaṁ | piba | vṛtrahā | śūra | vidvān |
prati | dhānā | bharata | tūyamasmai | puroḻāśaṁ | vīratamāya | nṛṇām |
divedive | sadṛśīrindra | tubhyaṁ | vardhantu | tvā | somapeyāya | dhṛṣṇo |
indrāparvatā | bṛhatā | rathena | vāmīriṣā | vahataṁ | suvīrāḥ |
vītaṁ | havyānyadhvareṣu | devā | vardhethāṁ | gīrbhiriḻayā | madantā |
tiṣṭhā | su | kaṁ | maghavanmā | parā | gāḥ | somasya | nu | tvā | suṣutasya | yakṣi |
piturna | putraḥ | sicamā | rabhe | tendra | svādiṣṭhayā | girā | śacīvaḥ |
śaṁsāvādhvaryo | prati | me | gṛṇīhīndrāya | vāhaḥ | kṛṇavāva | juṣṭam |
edaṁ | barhiryajamānasya | sīdāthā | ca | bhūdukthamindrāya | śastam |
jāyedastaṁ | maghavantsedu | yonistadittvā | yuktā | harayo | vahantu |
yadā | kadā | ca | sunavāma | somamagniṣṭvā | dūto | dhanvātyaccha |
parā | yāhi | maghavannā | ca | yāhīndra | bhrātarubhayatrā | te | artham |
yatrā | rathasya | bṛhato | nidhānaṁ | vimocanaṁ | vājino | rāsabhasya |
apāḥ | somamastamindra | pra | yāhi | kalyāṇīrjāyā | suraṇaṁ | gṛhe | te |
yatrā | rathasya | bṛhato | nidhānaṁ | vimocanaṁ | vājino | dakṣiṇāvat |
ime | bhojāṅgiraso | virūpā | divasputrāso | asurasya | vīrāḥ |
viśvāmitrāya | dadato | maghāni | sahasrasāve | pra | tirantāyuḥ |
rūpaṁrūpaṁ | maghavā | bobhavīti | māyāḥ | kṛṇvānastanvaṁ | pari | svām |
triryaddivaḥ | pari | muhūrtamāgātsvairmantrairanṛtupā | ṛtāvā |
mahām̐ | ṛṣirdevajā | devajūto'stabhnātsindhumarṇavaṁ | nṛcakṣāḥ |
viśvāmitro | yadavahatsudāsamapriyāyata | kuśikebhirindraḥ |
haṁseva | kṛṇutha | ślokamadribhirmadanto | gīrbhiradhvare | sute | sacā |
devebhirviprā | ṛṣayo | nṛcakṣaso | vi | pibadhvaṁ | kuśikāḥ | somyaṁ | madhu |
upa | preta | kuśikāścetayadhvamaśvaṁ | rāye | pra | muñcatā | sudāsaḥ |
rājā | vṛtraṁ | jaṅghanatprāgapāgudagathā | yajāte | varā | pṛthivyāḥ |
yeme | rodasī | ubhe | ahamindramatuṣṭavam |
viśvāmitrasya | rakṣati | brahmedaṁ | bhārataṁ | janam |
viśvāmitrārāsata | brahmendrāya | vajriṇe |
karadinnaḥ | surādhasaḥ |
kiṁ | te | kṛṇvanti | kīkaṭeṣu | gāvo | nāśiraṁ | duhre | na | tapanti | gharmam |
ā | no | bhara | pramagandasya | vedo | naicāśākhaṁ | maghavanrandhayā | naḥ |
sasarparīramatiṁ | bādhamānā | bṛhanmimāya | jamadagnidattā |
ā | sūryasya | duhitā | tatāna | śravo | deveṣvamṛtamajuryam |
sasarparīrabharattūyamebhyo'dhi | śravaḥ | pāñcajanyāsu | kṛṣṭiṣu |
sā | pakṣyā | navyamāyurdadhānā | yāṁ | me | palastijamadagnayo | daduḥ |
sthirau | gāvau | bhavatāṁ | vīḻurakṣo | meṣā | vi | varhi | mā | yugaṁ | vi | śāri |
indraḥ | pātalye | dadatāṁ | śarītorariṣṭaneme | abhi | naḥ | sacasva |
balaṁ | dhehi | tanūṣu | no | balamindrānaḻutsu | naḥ |
balaṁ | tokāya | tanayāya | jīvase | tvaṁ | hi | baladāsi |
abhi | vyayasva | khadirasya | sāramojo | dhehi | spandane | śiṁśapāyām |
akṣa | vīḻo | vīḻita | vīḻayasva | mā | yāmādasmādava | jīhipo | naḥ |
ayamasmānvanaspatirmā | ca | hā | mā | ca | rīriṣat |
svastyā | gṛhebhyāvasā | ā | vimocanāt |
indrotibhirbahulābhirno | adya | yācchreṣṭhābhirmaghavañchūra | jinva |
yo | no | dveṣṭyadharaḥ | saspadīṣṭa | yamu | dviṣmastamu | prāṇo | jahātu |
paraśuṁ | cidvi | tapati | śimbalaṁ | cidvi | vṛścati |
ukhā | cidindra | yeṣantī | prayastā | phenamasyati |
na | sāyakasya | cikite | janāso | lodhaṁ | nayanti | paśu | manyamānāḥ |
nāvājinaṁ | vājinā | hāsayanti | na | gardabhaṁ | puro | aśvānnayanti |
imendra | bharatasya | putrāpapitvaṁ | cikiturna | prapitvam |
hinvantyaśvamaraṇaṁ | na | nityaṁ | jyāvājaṁ | pari | ṇayantyājau |
imaṁ | mahe | vidathyāya | śūṣaṁ | śaśvatkṛtveḍyāya | pra | jabhruḥ |
śṛṇotu | no | damyebhiranīkaiḥ | śṛṇotvagnirdivyairajasraḥ |
mahi | mahe | dive | arcā | pṛthivyai | kāmo | mecchañcarati | prajānan |
yayorha | stome | vidatheṣu | devāḥ | saparyavo | mādayante | sacāyoḥ |
yuvorṛtaṁ | rodasī | satyamastu | mahe | ṣu | ṇaḥ | suvitāya | pra | bhūtam |
idaṁ | dive | namo | agne | pṛthivyai | saparyāmi | prayasā | yāmi | ratnam |
uto | hi | vāṁ | pūrvyāvividra | ṛtāvarī | rodasī | satyavācaḥ |
naraścidvāṁ | samithe | śūrasātau | vavandire | pṛthivi | vevidānāḥ |
ko | addhā | veda | keha | pra | vocaddevām̐ | acchā | pathyā | kā | sameti |
dadṛśraiṣāmavamā | sadāṁsi | pareṣu | yā | guhyeṣu | vrateṣu |
kavirnṛcakṣābhi | ṣīmacaṣṭa | ṛtasya | yonā | vighṛte | madantī |
nānā | cakrāte | sadanaṁ | yathā | veḥ | samānena | kratunā | saṁvidāne |
samānyā | viyute | dūreante | dhruve | pade | tasthaturjāgarūke |
uta | svasārā | yuvatī | bhavantī | ādu | bruvāte | mithunāni | nāma |
viśvedete | janimā | saṁ | vivikto | maho | devānbibhratī | na | vyathete |
ejaddhruvaṁ | patyate | viśvamekaṁ | caratpatatri | viṣuṇaṁ | vi | jātam |
sanā | purāṇamadhyemyārānmahaḥ | piturjaniturjāmi | tannaḥ |
devāso | yatra | panitāraivairurau | pathi | vyute | tasthurantaḥ |
imaṁ | stomaṁ | rodasī | pra | bravīmyṛdūdarāḥ | śṛṇavannagnijihvāḥ |
mitraḥ | samrājo | varuṇo | yuvānādityāsaḥ | kavayaḥ | paprathānāḥ |
hiraṇyapāṇiḥ | savitā | sujihvastrirā | divo | vidathe | patyamānaḥ |
deveṣu | ca | savitaḥ | ślokamaśrerādasmabhyamā | suva | sarvatātim |
sukṛtsupāṇiḥ | svavām̐ | ṛtāvā | devastvaṣṭāvase | tāni | no | dhāt |
pūṣaṇvanta | ṛbhavo | mādayadhvamūrdhvagrāvāṇo | adhvaramataṣṭa |
vidyudrathā | maruta | ṛṣṭimanto | divo | maryā | ṛtajātāyāsaḥ |
sarasvatī | śṛṇavanyajñiyāso | dhātā | rayiṁ | sahavīraṁ | turāsaḥ |
viṣṇuṁ | stomāsaḥ | purudasmamarkā | bhagasyeva | kāriṇo | yāmani | gman |
urukramaḥ | kakuho | yasya | pūrvīrna | mardhanti | yuvatayo | janitrīḥ |
indro | viśvairvīryaiḥ | patyamānobhe | ā | paprau | rodasī | mahitvā |
puraṁdaro | vṛtrahā | dhṛṣṇuṣeṇaḥ | saṁgṛbhyā | nā | bharā | bhūri | paśvaḥ |
nāsatyā | me | pitarā | bandhupṛcchā | sajātyamaśvinoścāru | nāma |
yuvaṁ | hi | stho | rayidau | no | rayīṇāṁ | dātraṁ | rakṣethe | akavairadabdhā |
mahattadvaḥ | kavayaścāru | nāma | yaddha | devā | bhavatha | viśvendre |
sakha | ṛbhubhiḥ | puruhūta | priyebhirimāṁ | dhiyaṁ | sātaye | takṣatā | naḥ |
aryamā | ṇo | aditiryajñiyāso'dabdhāni | varuṇasya | vratāni |
yuyota | no | anapatyāni | gantoḥ | prajāvānnaḥ | paśumām̐ | astu | gātuḥ |
devānāṁ | dūtaḥ | purudha | prasūto'nāgānno | vocatu | sarvatātā |
śṛṇotu | naḥ | pṛthivī | dyaurutāpaḥ | sūryo | nakṣatrairurvantarikṣam |
śṛṇvantu | no | vṛṣaṇaḥ | parvatāso | dhruvakṣemāseḻayā | madantaḥ |
ādityairno | aditiḥ | śṛṇotu | yacchantu | no | marutaḥ | śarma | bhadram |
sadā | sugaḥ | pitumām̐ | astu | panthā | madhvā | devauṣadhīḥ | saṁ | pipṛkta |
bhago | me | agne | sakhye | na | mṛdhyodrāyo | aśyāṁ | sadanaṁ | purukṣoḥ |
svadasva | havyā | samiṣo | didīhyasmadryaksaṁ | mimīhi | śravāṁsi |
viśvām̐ | agne | pṛtsu | tāñjeṣi | śatrūnahā | viśvā | sumanā | dīdihī | naḥ |
uṣasaḥ | pūrvādha | yadvyūṣurmahadvi | jajñe | akṣaraṁ | pade | goḥ |
vratā | devānāmupa | nu | prabhūṣanmahaddevānāmasuratvamekam |
mo | ṣū | ṇo | atra | juhuranta | devā | mā | pūrve | agne | pitaraḥ | padajñāḥ |
purāṇyoḥ | sadmanoḥ | keturantarmahaddevānāmasuratvamekam |
vi | me | purutrā | patayanti | kāmāḥ | śamyacchā | dīdye | pūrvyāṇi |
samiddhe | agnāvṛtamidvadema | mahaddevānāmasuratvamekam |
samāno | rājā | vibhṛtaḥ | purutrā | śaye | śayāsu | prayuto | vanānu |
anyā | vatsaṁ | bharati | kṣeti | mātā | mahaddevānāmasuratvamekam |
ākṣitpūrvāsvaparānūrutsadyo | jātāsu | taruṇīṣvantaḥ |
antarvatīḥ | suvate | apravītā | mahaddevānāmasuratvamekam |
śayuḥ | parastādadha | nu | dvimātābandhanaścarati | vatsaikaḥ |
mitrasya | tā | varuṇasya | vratāni | mahaddevānāmasuratvamekam |
dvimātā | hotā | vidatheṣu | samrāḻanvagraṁ | carati | kṣeti | budhnaḥ |
pra | raṇyāni | raṇyavāco | bharante | mahaddevānāmasuratvamekam |
śūrasyeva | yudhyato | antamasya | pratīcīnaṁ | dadṛśe | viśvamāyat |
antarmatiścarati | niṣṣidhaṁ | gormahaddevānāmasuratvamekam |
ni | veveti | palito | dūtāsvantarmahām̐ścarati | rocanena |
vapūṁṣi | bibhradabhi | no | vi | caṣṭe | mahaddevānāmasuratvamekam |
viṣṇurgopāḥ | paramaṁ | pāti | pāthaḥ | priyā | dhāmānyamṛtā | dadhānaḥ |
agniṣṭā | viśvā | bhuvanāni | veda | mahaddevānāmasuratvamekam |
nānā | cakrāte | yamyā | vapūṁṣi | tayoranyadrocate | kṛṣṇamanyat |
śyāvī | ca | yadaruṣī | ca | svasārau | mahaddevānāmasuratvamekam |
mātā | ca | yatra | duhitā | ca | dhenū | sabardughe | dhāpayete | samīcī |
ṛtasya | te | sadasīḻe | antarmahaddevānāmasuratvamekam |
anyasyā | vatsaṁ | rihatī | mimāya | kayā | bhuvā | ni | dadhe | dhenurūdhaḥ |
ṛtasya | sā | payasāpinvateḻā | mahaddevānāmasuratvamekam |
padyā | vaste | pururūpā | vapūṁṣyūrdhvā | tasthau | tryaviṁ | rerihāṇā |
ṛtasya | sadma | vi | carāmi | vidvānmahaddevānāmasuratvamekam |
pade | iva | nihite | dasme | antastayoranyadguhyamāviranyat |
sadhrīcīnā | pathyā | sā | viṣūcī | mahaddevānāmasuratvamekam |
ā | dhenavo | dhunayantāmaśiśvīḥ | sabardughāḥ | śaśayāpradugdhāḥ |
navyānavyā | yuvatayo | bhavantīrmahaddevānāmasuratvamekam |
yadanyāsu | vṛṣabho | roravīti | so | anyasminyūthe | ni | dadhāti | retaḥ |
sa | hi | kṣapāvāntsa | bhagaḥ | sa | rājā | mahaddevānāmasuratvamekam |
vīrasya | nu | svaśvyaṁ | janāsaḥ | pra | nu | vocāma | vidurasya | devāḥ |
ṣoḻhā | yuktāḥ | pañcapañcā | vahanti | mahaddevānāmasuratvamekam |
devastvaṣṭā | savitā | viśvarūpaḥ | pupoṣa | prajāḥ | purudhā | jajāna |
imā | ca | viśvā | bhuvanānyasya | mahaddevānāmasuratvamekam |
mahī | samairaccamvā | samīcī | ubhe | te | asya | vasunā | nyṛṣṭe |
śṛṇve | vīro | vindamāno | vasūni | mahaddevānāmasuratvamekam |
imāṁ | ca | naḥ | pṛthivīṁ | viśvadhāyopa | kṣeti | hitamitro | na | rājā |
puraḥsadaḥ | śarmasado | na | vīrā | mahaddevānāmasuratvamekam |
niṣṣidhvarīstauṣadhīrutāpo | rayiṁ | tendra | pṛthivī | bibharti |
sakhāyaste | vāmabhājaḥ | syāma | mahaddevānāmasuratvamekam |
na | tā | minanti | māyino | na | dhīrā | vratā | devānāṁ | prathamā | dhruvāṇi |
na | rodasī | adruhā | vedyābhirna | parvatā | niname | tasthivāṁsaḥ |
ṣaḍbhārām̐ | eko | acaranbibhartyṛtaṁ | varṣiṣṭhamupa | gāvāguḥ |
tisro | mahīruparāstasthuratyā | guhā | dve | nihite | darśyekā |
tripājasyo | vṛṣabho | viśvarūpota | tryudhā | purudha | prajāvān |
tryanīkaḥ | patyate | māhināvāntsa | retodhā | vṛṣabhaḥ | śaśvatīnām |
abhīkāsāṁ | padavīrabodhyādityānāmahve | cāru | nāma |
āpaścidasmāramanta | devīḥ | pṛthagvrajantīḥ | pari | ṣīmavṛñjan |
trī | ṣadhasthā | sindhavastriḥ | kavīnāmuta | trimātā | vidatheṣu | samrāṭ |
ṛtāvarīryoṣaṇāstisro | apyāstrirā | divo | vidathe | patyamānāḥ |
trirā | divaḥ | savitarvāryāṇi | divedivā | suva | trirno | ahnaḥ |
tridhātu | rāyā | suvā | vasūni | bhaga | trātardhiṣaṇe | sātaye | dhāḥ |
trirā | divaḥ | savitā | soṣavīti | rājānā | mitrāvaruṇā | supāṇī |
āpaścidasya | rodasī | cidurvī | ratnaṁ | bhikṣanta | savituḥ | savāya |
triruttamā | dūṇaśā | rocanāni | trayo | rājantyasurasya | vīrāḥ |
ṛtāvāneṣirā | dūḻabhāsastrirā | divo | vidathe | santu | devāḥ |
pra | me | vivikvām̐ | avidanmanīṣāṁ | dhenuṁ | carantīṁ | prayutāmagopām |
sadyaścidyā | duduhe | bhūri | dhāserindrastadagniḥ | panitāro | asyāḥ |
indraḥ | su | pūṣā | vṛṣaṇā | suhastā | divo | na | prītāḥ | śaśayaṁ | duduhre |
viśve | yadasyāṁ | raṇayanta | devāḥ | pra | vo'tra | vasavaḥ | sumnamaśyām |
yā | jāmayo | vṛṣṇecchanti | śaktiṁ | namasyantīrjānate | garbhamasmin |
acchā | putraṁ | dhenavo | vāvaśānā | mahaścaranti | bibhrataṁ | vapūṁṣi |
acchā | vivakmi | rodasī | sumeke | grāvṇo | yujāno | adhvare | manīṣā |
imo | te | manave | bhūrivārordhvā | bhavanti | darśatā | yajatrāḥ |
yā | te | jihvā | madhumatī | sumedhāgne | deveṣūcyatorūcī |
tayeha | viśvām̐ | avase | yajatrānā | sādaya | pāyayā | cā | madhūni |
yā | te | agne | parvatasyeva | dhārāsaścantī | pīpayaddeva | citrā |
tāmasmabhyaṁ | pramatiṁ | jātavedo | vaso | rāsva | sumatiṁ | viśvajanyām |
dhenuḥ | pratnasya | kāmyaṁ | duhānāntaḥ | putraścarati | dakṣiṇāyāḥ |
ā | dyotaniṁ | vahati | śubhrayāmoṣasaḥ | stomo | aśvināvajīgaḥ |
suyugvahanti | prati | vāmṛtenordhvā | bhavanti | pitareva | medhāḥ |
jarethāmasmadvi | paṇermanīṣāṁ | yuvoravaścakṛmā | yātamarvāk |
suyugbhiraśvaiḥ | suvṛtā | rathena | dasrāvimaṁ | śṛṇutaṁ | ślokamadreḥ |
kimaṅga | vāṁ | pratyavartiṁ | gamiṣṭhāhurviprāso | aśvinā | purājāḥ |
ā | manyethāmā | gataṁ | kaccidevairviśve | janāso | aśvinā | havante |
imā | hi | vāṁ | goṛjīkā | madhūni | pra | mitrāso | na | dadurusro | agre |
tiraḥ | purū | cidaśvinā | rajāṁsyāṅgūṣo | vāṁ | maghavānā | janeṣu |
eha | yātaṁ | pathibhirdevayānairdasrāvime | vāṁ | nidhayo | madhūnām |
purāṇamokaḥ | sakhyaṁ | śivaṁ | vāṁ | yuvornarā | draviṇaṁ | jahnāvyām |
punaḥ | kṛṇvānāḥ | sakhyā | śivāni | madhvā | madema | saha | nū | samānāḥ |
aśvinā | vāyunā | yuvaṁ | sudakṣā | niyudbhiśca | sajoṣasā | yuvānā |
nāsatyā | tiroahnyaṁ | juṣāṇā | somaṁ | pibatamasridhā | sudānū |
aśvinā | pari | vāmiṣaḥ | purūcīrīyurgīrbhiryatamānāmṛdhrāḥ |
ratho | ha | vāmṛtajādrijūtaḥ | pari | dyāvāpṛthivī | yāti | sadyaḥ |
aśvinā | madhuṣuttamo | yuvākuḥ | somastaṁ | pātamā | gataṁ | duroṇe |
ratho | ha | vāṁ | bhūri | varpaḥ | karikratsutāvato | niṣkṛtamāgamiṣṭhaḥ |
mitro | janānyātayati | bruvāṇo | mitro | dādhāra | pṛthivīmuta | dyām |
mitraḥ | kṛṣṭīranimiṣābhi | caṣṭe | mitrāya | havyaṁ | ghṛtavajjuhota |
