pra | ṇu | tyaṁ | vipramadhvareṣu | sādhumagniṁ | hotāramīḻate | namobhiḥ |
ā | yastatāna | rodasī | ṛtena | nityaṁ | mṛjanti | vājinaṁ | ghṛtena |
mārjālyo | mṛjyate | sve | damūnāḥ | kavipraśasto | atithiḥ | śivo | naḥ |
sahasraśṛṅgo | vṛṣabhastadojā | viśvām̐ | agne | sahasā | prāsyanyān |
pra | sadyo | agne | atyeṣyanyānāviryasmai | cārutamo | babhūtha |
īḻenyo | vapuṣyo | vibhāvā | priyo | viśāmatithirmānuṣīṇām |
tubhyaṁ | bharanti | kṣitayo | yaviṣṭha | balimagne | antitauta | dūrāt |
ā | bhandiṣṭhasya | sumatiṁ | cikiddhi | bṛhatte | agne | mahi | śarma | bhadram |
ādya | rathaṁ | bhānumo | bhānumantamagne | tiṣṭha | yajatebhiḥ | samantam |
vidvānpathīnāmurvantarikṣameha | devānhaviradyāya | vakṣi |
avocāma | kavaye | medhyāya | vaco | vandāru | vṛṣabhāya | vṛṣṇe |
gaviṣṭhiro | namasā | stomamagnau | divīva | rukmamuruvyañcamaśret |
kumāraṁ | mātā | yuvatiḥ | samubdhaṁ | guhā | bibharti | na | dadāti | pitre |
anīkamasya | na | minajjanāsaḥ | puraḥ | paśyanti | nihitamaratau |
kametaṁ | tvaṁ | yuvate | kumāraṁ | peṣī | bibharṣi | mahiṣī | jajāna |
pūrvīrhi | garbhaḥ | śarado | vavardhāpaśyaṁ | jātaṁ | yadasūta | mātā |
hiraṇyadantaṁ | śucivarṇamārātkṣetrādapaśyamāyudhā | mimānam |
dadāno | asmāmṛtaṁ | vipṛkvatkiṁ | māmanindrāḥ | kṛṇavannanukthāḥ |
kṣetrādapaśyaṁ | sanutaścarantaṁ | sumadyūthaṁ | na | puru | śobhamānam |
na | tāgṛbhrannajaniṣṭa | hi | ṣaḥ | paliknīridyuvatayo | bhavanti |
ke | me | maryakaṁ | vi | yavanta | gobhirna | yeṣāṁ | gopāraṇaścidāsa |
yeṁ | jagṛbhurava | te | sṛjantvājāti | paśvopa | naścikitvān |
vasāṁ | rājānaṁ | vasatiṁ | janānāmarātayo | ni | dadhurmartyeṣu |
brahmāṇyatrerava | taṁ | sṛjantu | ninditāro | nindyāso | bhavantu |
śunaścicchepaṁ | niditaṁ | sahasrādyūpādamuñco | aśamiṣṭa | hi | ṣaḥ |
evāsmadagne | vi | mumugdhi | pāśānhotaścikitveha | tū | niṣadya |
hṛṇīyamāno | apa | hi | madaiyeḥ | pra | me | devānāṁ | vratapovāca |
indro | vidvām̐ | anu | hi | tvā | cacakṣa | tenāhamagne | anuśiṣṭāgām |
vi | jyotiṣā | bṛhatā | bhātyagnirāvirviśvāni | kṛṇute | mahitvā |
prādevīrmāyāḥ | sahate | durevāḥ | śiśīte | śṛṅge | rakṣase | vinikṣe |
uta | svānāso | divi | ṣantvagnestigmāyudhā | rakṣase | hantavo |
made | cidasya | pra | rujanti | bhāmā | na | varante | paribādho | adevīḥ |
etaṁ | te | stomaṁ | tuvijāta | vipro | rathaṁ | na | dhīraḥ | svapātakṣam |
yadīdagne | prati | tvaṁ | deva | haryāḥ | svarvatīrapainā | jayema |
tuvigrīvo | vṛṣabho | vāvṛdhāno'śatrvaryaḥ | samajāti | vedaḥ |
itīmamagnimamṛtāvocanbarhiṣmate | manave | śarma | yaṁsaddhaviṣmate | manave | śarma | yaṁsat |
tvamagne | varuṇo | jāyase | yattvaṁ | mitro | bhavasi | yatsamiddhaḥ |
tve | viśve | sahasasputra | devāstvamindro | dāśuṣe | martyāya |
tvamaryamā | bhavasi | yatkanīnāṁ | nāma | svadhāvanguhyaṁ | bibharṣi |
añjanti | mitraṁ | sudhitaṁ | na | gobhiryaddaṁpatī | samanasā | kṛṇoṣi |
tava | śriye | maruto | marjayanta | rudra | yatte | janima | cāru | citram |
padaṁ | yadviṣṇorupamaṁ | nidhāyi | tena | pāsi | guhyaṁ | nāma | gonām |
tava | śriyā | sudṛśo | deva | devāḥ | purū | dadhānāmṛtaṁ | sapanta |
hotāramagniṁ | manuṣo | ni | ṣedurdaśasyantośijaḥ | śaṁsamāyoḥ |
na | tvaddhotā | pūrvo | agne | yajīyānna | kāvyaiḥ | paro | asti | svadhāvaḥ |
viśaśca | yasyātithirbhavāsi | sa | yajñena | vanavaddeva | martān |
vayamagne | vanuyāma | tvotā | vasūyavo | haviṣā | budhyamānāḥ |
vayaṁ | samarye | vidatheṣvahnāṁ | vayaṁ | rāyā | sahasasputra | martān |
yo | nāgo | abhyeno | bharātyadhīdaghamaghaśaṁse | dadhāta |
jahī | cikitvo | abhiśastimetāmagne | yo | no | marcayati | dvayena |
tvāmasyā | vyuṣi | deva | pūrve | dūtaṁ | kṛṇvānāyajanta | havyaiḥ |
saṁsthe | yadagneyase | rayīṇāṁ | devo | martairvasubhiridhyamānaḥ |
ava | spṛdhi | pitaraṁ | yodhi | vidvānputro | yaste | sahasaḥ | sūnohe |
kadā | cikitvo | abhi | cakṣase | no'gne | kadām̐ | ṛtacidyātayāse |
bhūri | nāma | vandamāno | dadhāti | pitā | vaso | yadi | tajjoṣayāse |
kuviddevasya | sahasā | cakānaḥ | sumnamagnirvanate | vāvṛdhānaḥ |
tvamaṅga | jaritāraṁ | yaviṣṭha | viśvānyagne | duritāti | parṣi |
stenādṛśranripavo | janāso'jñātaketā | vṛjinābhūvan |
ime | yāmāsastvadrigabhūvanvasave | vā | tadidāgo | avāci |
nāhāyamagnirabhiśastaye | no | na | rīṣate | vāvṛdhānaḥ | parā | dāt |
tvāmagne | vasupatiṁ | vasūnāmabhi | pra | mande | adhvareṣu | rājan |
tvayā | vājaṁ | vājayanto | jayemābhi | ṣyāma | pṛtsutīrmartyānām |
havyavāḻagnirajaraḥ | pitā | no | vibhurvibhāvā | sudṛśīko | asme |
sugārhapatyāḥ | samiṣo | didīhyasmadryaksaṁ | mimīhi | śravāṁsi |
viśāṁ | kaviṁ | viśpatiṁ | mānuṣīṇāṁ | śuciṁ | pāvakaṁ | ghṛtapṛṣṭhamagnim |
ni | hotāraṁ | viśvavidaṁ | dadhidhve | sa | deveṣu | vanate | vāryāṇi |
juṣasvāgneḻayā | sajoṣā | yatamāno | raśmibhiḥ | sūryasya |
juṣasva | naḥ | samidhaṁ | jātavedā | ca | devānhaviradyāya | vakṣi |
juṣṭo | damūnātithirduroṇa | imaṁ | no | yajñamupa | yāhi | vidvān |
viśvāgne | abhiyujo | vihatyā | śatrūyatāmā | bharā | bhojanāni |
vadhena | dasyuṁ | pra | hi | cātayasva | vayaḥ | kṛṇvānastanve | svāyai |
piparṣi | yatsahasasputra | devāntso | agne | pāhi | nṛtama | vāje | asmān |
vayaṁ | te | agnokthairvidhema | vayaṁ | havyaiḥ | pāvaka | bhadraśoce |
asme | rayiṁ | viśvavāraṁ | saminvāsme | viśvāni | draviṇāni | dhehi |
asmākamagne | adhvaraṁ | juṣasva | sahasaḥ | sūno | triṣadhastha | havyam |
vayaṁ | deveṣu | sukṛtaḥ | syāma | śarmaṇā | nastrivarūthena | pāhi |
viśvāni | no | durgahā | jātavedaḥ | sindhuṁ | na | nāvā | duritāti | parṣi |
agne | atrivannamasā | gṛṇāno'smākaṁ | bodhyavitā | tanūnām |
yastvā | hṛdā | kīriṇā | manyamāno'martyaṁ | martyo | johavīmi |
jātavedo | yaśo | asmāsu | dhehi | prajābhiragne | amṛtatvamaśyām |
yasmai | tvaṁ | sukṛte | jātavedo | lokamagne | kṛṇavaḥ | syonam |
aśvinaṁ | sa | putriṇaṁ | vīravantaṁ | gomantaṁ | rayiṁ | naśate | svasti |
susamiddhāya | śociṣe | ghṛtaṁ | tīvraṁ | juhotana |
agnaye | jātavedase |
narāśaṁsaḥ | suṣūdatīmaṁ | yajñamadābhyaḥ |
kavirhi | madhuhastyaḥ |
īḻito | agnā | vahendraṁ | citramiha | priyam |
sukhai | rathebhirūtaye |
ūrṇamradā | vi | prathasvābhyarkānūṣata |
bhavā | naḥ | śubhra | sātaye |
devīrdvāro | vi | śrayadhvaṁ | suprāyaṇā | notaye |
prapra | yajñaṁ | pṛṇītana |
supratīke | vayovṛdhā | yahvī | ṛtasya | mātarā |
doṣāmuṣāsamīmahe |
vātasya | patmannīḻitā | daivyā | hotārā | manuṣaḥ |
imaṁ | no | yajñamā | gatam |
iḻā | sarasvatī | mahī | tisro | devīrmayobhuvaḥ |
barhiḥ | sīdantvasridhaḥ |
śivastvaṣṭarihā | gahi | vibhuḥ | poṣota | tmanā |
yajñeyajñe | nodava |
yatra | vettha | vanaspate | devānāṁ | guhyā | nāmāni |
tatra | havyāni | gāmaya |
svāhāgnaye | varuṇāya | svāhendrāya | marudbhyaḥ |
svāhā | devebhyo | haviḥ |
agniṁ | taṁ | manye | yo | vasurastaṁ | yaṁ | yanti | dhenavaḥ |
astamarvantāśavo'staṁ | nityāso | vājineṣaṁ | stotṛbhyā | bhara |
so | agniryo | vasurgṛṇe | saṁ | yamāyanti | dhenavaḥ |
samarvanto | raghudruvaḥ | saṁ | sujātāsaḥ | sūrayeṣaṁ | stotṛbhyā | bhara |
agnirhi | vājinaṁ | viśe | dadāti | viśvacarṣaṇiḥ |
agnī | rāye | svābhuvaṁ | sa | prīto | yāti | vāryamiṣaṁ | stotṛbhyā | bhara |
ā | te | agnedhīmahi | dyumantaṁ | devājaram |
yaddha | syā | te | panīyasī | samiddīdayati | dyavīṣaṁ | stotṛbhyā | bhara |
ā | te | agna | ṛcā | haviḥ | śukrasya | śociṣaspate |
suścandra | dasma | viśpate | havyavāṭ | tubhyaṁ | hūyateṣaṁ | stotṛbhyā | bhara |
pro | tye | agnayo'gniṣu | viśvaṁ | puṣyanti | vāryam |
te | hinvire | tenvire | teṣaṇyantyānuṣagiṣaṁ | stotṛbhyā | bhara |
tava | tye | agne | arcayo | mahi | vrādhanta | vājinaḥ |
ye | patvabhiḥ | śaphānāṁ | vrajā | bhuranta | gonāmiṣaṁ | stotṛbhyā | bhara |
navā | no | agnā | bhara | stotṛbhyaḥ | sukṣitīriṣaḥ |
te | syāma | yānṛcustvādūtāso | damedameṣaṁ | stotṛbhyā | bhara |
ubhe | suścandra | sarpiṣo | darvī | śrīṇīṣāsani |
uto | notpupūryā | uktheṣu | śavasaspateṣaṁ | stotṛbhyā | bhara |
evām̐ | agnimajuryamurgīrbhiryajñebhirānuṣak |
dadhadasme | suvīryamuta | tyadāśvaśvyamiṣaṁ | stotṛbhyā | bhara |
sakhāyaḥ | saṁ | vaḥ | samyañcamiṣaṁ | stomaṁ | cāgnaye |
varṣiṣṭhāya | kṣitīnāmūrjo | naptre | sahasvate |
kutrā | cidyasya | samṛtau | raṇvā | naro | nṛṣadane |
arhantaścidyamindhate | saṁjanayanti | jantavaḥ |
saṁ | yadiṣo | vanāmahe | saṁ | havyā | mānuṣāṇām |
uta | dyumnasya | śavasa | ṛtasya | raśmimā | dade |
sa | smā | kṛṇoti | ketumā | naktaṁ | ciddūrā | sate |
pāvako | yadvanaspatīnpra | smā | minātyajaraḥ |
ava | sma | yasya | veṣaṇe | svedaṁ | pathiṣu | juhvati |
abhīmaha | svajenyaṁ | bhūmā | pṛṣṭheva | ruruhuḥ |
yaṁ | martyaḥ | puruspṛhaṁ | vidadviśvasya | dhāyase |
pra | svādanaṁ | pitūnāmastatātiṁ | cidāyave |
sa | hi | ṣmā | dhanvākṣitaṁ | dātā | na | dātyā | paśuḥ |
hiriśmaśruḥ | śucidannṛbhuranibhṛṣṭataviṣiḥ |
śuciḥ | ṣma | yasmātrivatpra | svadhitīva | rīyate |
suṣūrasūta | mātā | krāṇā | yadānaśe | bhagam |
ā | yaste | sarpirāsute'gne | śamasti | dhāyase |
aiṣu | dyumnamuta | śravā | cittaṁ | martyeṣu | dhāḥ |
iti | cinmanyumadhrijastvādātamā | paśuṁ | dade |
ādagne | apṛṇato'triḥ | sāsahyāddasyūniṣaḥ | sāsahyānnṝn |
tvāmagna | ṛtāyavaḥ | samīdhire | pratnaṁ | pratnāsotaye | sahaskṛta |
puruścandraṁ | yajataṁ | viśvadhāyasaṁ | damūnasaṁ | gṛhapatiṁ | vareṇyam |
tvāmagne | atithiṁ | pūrvyaṁ | viśaḥ | śociṣkeśaṁ | gṛhapatiṁ | ni | ṣedire |
bṛhatketuṁ | pururūpaṁ | dhanaspṛtaṁ | suśarmāṇaṁ | svavasaṁ | jaradviṣam |
tvāmagne | mānuṣīrīḻate | viśo | hotrāvidaṁ | viviciṁ | ratnadhātamam |
guhā | santaṁ | subhaga | viśvadarśataṁ | tuviṣvaṇasaṁ | suyajaṁ | ghṛtaśriyam |
tvāmagne | dharṇasiṁ | viśvadhā | vayaṁ | gīrbhirgṛṇanto | namasopa | sedima |
sa | no | juṣasva | samidhāno | aṅgiro | devo | martasya | yaśasā | sudītibhiḥ |
tvamagne | pururūpo | viśeviśe | vayo | dadhāsi | pratnathā | puruṣṭuta |
purūṇyannā | sahasā | vi | rājasi | tviṣiḥ | sā | te | titviṣāṇasya | nādhṛṣe |
tvāmagne | samidhānaṁ | yaviṣṭhya | devā | dūtaṁ | cakrire | havyavāhanam |
urujrayasaṁ | ghṛtayonimāhutaṁ | tveṣaṁ | cakṣurdadhire | codayanmati |
tvāmagne | pradivāhutaṁ | ghṛtaiḥ | sumnāyavaḥ | suṣamidhā | samīdhire |
sa | vāvṛdhānauṣadhībhirukṣito'bhi | jrayāṁsi | pārthivā | vi | tiṣṭhase |
tvāmagne | haviṣmanto | devaṁ | martāseḻate |
manye | tvā | jātavedasaṁ | sa | havyā | vakṣyānuṣak |
agnirhotā | dāsvataḥ | kṣayasya | vṛktabarhiṣaḥ |
saṁ | yajñāsaścaranti | yaṁ | saṁ | vājāsaḥ | śravasyavaḥ |
uta | sma | yaṁ | śiśuṁ | yathā | navaṁ | janiṣṭāraṇī |
dhartāraṁ | mānuṣīṇāṁ | viśāmagniṁ | svadhvaram |
uta | sma | durgṛbhīyase | putro | na | hvāryāṇām |
purū | yo | dagdhāsi | vanāgne | paśurna | yavase |
adha | sma | yasyārcayaḥ | samyaksaṁyanti | dhūminaḥ |
yadīmaha | trito | divyupa | dhmāteva | dhamati | śiśīte | dhmātarī | yathā |
tavāhamagnotibhirmitrasya | ca | praśastibhiḥ |
dveṣoyuto | na | duritā | turyāma | martyānām |
taṁ | no | agne | abhī | naro | rayiṁ | sahasvā | bhara |
sa | kṣepayatsa | poṣayadbhuvadvājasya | sātayotaidhi | pṛt-su | no | vṛdhe |
agnaujiṣṭhamā | bhara | dyumnamasmabhyamadhrigo |
pra | no | rāyā | parīṇasā | ratsi | vājāya | panthām |
tvaṁ | no | agne | adbhuta | kratvā | dakṣasya | maṁhanā |
tve | asuryamāruhatkrāṇā | mitro | na | yajñiyaḥ |
tvaṁ | no | agnaiṣāṁ | gayaṁ | puṣṭiṁ | ca | vardhaya |
ye | stomebhiḥ | pra | sūrayo | naro | maghānyānaśuḥ |
ye | agne | candra | te | giraḥ | śumbhantyaśvarādhasaḥ |
śuṣmebhiḥ | śuṣmiṇo | naro | divaścidyeṣāṁ | bṛhatsukīrtirbodhati | tmanā |
tava | tye | agne | arcayo | bhrājanto | yanti | dhṛṣṇuyā |
parijmāno | na | vidyutaḥ | svāno | ratho | na | vājayuḥ |
nū | no | agnotaye | sabādhasaśca | rātaye |
asmākāsaśca | sūrayo | viśvāśāstarīṣaṇi |
tvaṁ | no | agne | aṅgiraḥ | stutaḥ | stavānā | bhara |
hotarvibhvāsahaṁ | rayiṁ | stotṛbhyaḥ | stavase | ca | notaidhi | pṛtsu | no | vṛdhe |
janasya | gopājaniṣṭa | jāgṛviragniḥ | sudakṣaḥ | suvitāya | navyase |
ghṛtapratīko | bṛhatā | divispṛśā | dyumadvi | bhāti | bharatebhyaḥ | śuciḥ |
yajñasya | ketuṁ | prathamaṁ | purohitamagniṁ | narastriṣadhasthe | samīdhire |
indreṇa | devaiḥ | sarathaṁ | sa | barhiṣi | sīdanni | hotā | yajathāya | sukratuḥ |
asaṁmṛṣṭo | jāyase | mātroḥ | śucirmandraḥ | kavirudatiṣṭho | vivasvataḥ |
ghṛtena | tvāvardhayannagnāhuta | dhūmaste | keturabhavaddivi | śritaḥ |
agnirno | yajñamupa | vetu | sādhuyāgniṁ | naro | vi | bharante | gṛhegṛhe |
agnirdūto | abhavaddhavyavāhano'gniṁ | vṛṇānā | vṛṇate | kavikratum |
tubhyedamagne | madhumattamaṁ | vacastubhyaṁ | manīṣeyamastu | śaṁ | hṛde |
tvāṁ | giraḥ | sindhumivāvanīrmahīrā | pṛṇanti | śavasā | vardhayanti | ca |
tvāmagne | aṅgiraso | guhā | hitamanvavindañchiśriyāṇaṁ | vanevane |
sa | jāyase | mathyamānaḥ | saho | mahattvāmāhuḥ | sahasasputramaṅgiraḥ |
prāgnaye | bṛhate | yajñiyāya | ṛtasya | vṛṣṇe | asurāya | manma |
ghṛtaṁ | na | yajñāsye | supūtaṁ | giraṁ | bhare | vṛṣabhāya | pratīcīm |
ṛtaṁ | cikitva | ṛtamiccikiddhyṛtasya | dhārānu | tṛndhi | pūrvīḥ |
nāhaṁ | yātuṁ | sahasā | na | dvayena | ṛtaṁ | sapāmyaruṣasya | vṛṣṇaḥ |
kayā | no | agna | ṛtayannṛtena | bhuvo | navedocathasya | navyaḥ |
vedā | me | deva | ṛtupā | ṛtūnāṁ | nāhaṁ | patiṁ | saniturasya | rāyaḥ |
ke | te | agne | ripave | bandhanāsaḥ | ke | pāyavaḥ | saniṣanta | dyumantaḥ |
ke | dhāsimagne | anṛtasya | pānti | kāsato | vacasaḥ | santi | gopāḥ |
sakhāyaste | viṣuṇāgna | ete | śivāsaḥ | santo | aśivābhūvan |
adhūrṣata | svayamete | vacobhirṛjūyate | vṛjināni | bruvantaḥ |
yaste | agne | namasā | yajñamīṭṭa | ṛtaṁ | sa | pātyaruṣasya | vṛṣṇaḥ |
tasya | kṣayaḥ | pṛthurā | sādhuretu | prasarsrāṇasya | nahuṣasya | śeṣaḥ |
arcantastvā | havāmahe'rcantaḥ | samidhīmahi |
agne | arcantotaye |
agneḥ | stomaṁ | manāmahe | sidhramadya | divispṛśaḥ |
devasya | draviṇasyavaḥ |
agnirjuṣata | no | giro | hotā | yo | mānuṣeṣvā |
sa | yakṣaddaivyaṁ | janam |
tvamagne | saprathāsi | juṣṭo | hotā | vareṇyaḥ |
tvayā | yajñaṁ | vi | tanvate |
tvāmagne | vājasātamaṁ | viprā | vardhanti | suṣṭutam |
sa | no | rāsva | suvīryam |
agne | nemirarām̐ | iva | devām̐stvaṁ | paribhūrasi |
ā | rādhaścitramṛñjase |
agniṁ | stomena | bodhaya | samidhāno | amartyam |
havyā | deveṣu | no | dadhat |
tamadhvareṣvīḻate | devaṁ | martāmartyam |
yajiṣṭhaṁ | mānuṣe | jane |
taṁ | hi | śaśvanteḻate | srucā | devaṁ | ghṛtaścutā |
agniṁ | havyāya | voḻhave |
agnirjāto | arocata | ghnandasyūñjyotiṣā | tamaḥ |
avindadgāpaḥ | svaḥ |
agnimīḻenyaṁ | kaviṁ | ghṛtapṛṣṭhaṁ | saparyata |
vetu | me | śṛṇavaddhavam |
agniṁ | ghṛtena | vāvṛdhuḥ | stomebhirviśvacarṣaṇim |
svādhībhirvacasyubhiḥ |
pra | vedhase | kavaye | vedyāya | giraṁ | bhare | yaśase | pūrvyāya |
ghṛtaprasatto | asuraḥ | suśevo | rāyo | dhartā | dharuṇo | vasvo | agniḥ |
ṛtena | ṛtaṁ | dharuṇaṁ | dhārayanta | yajñasya | śāke | parame | vyoman |
divo | dharmandharuṇe | seduṣo | nṝñjātairajātām̐ | abhi | ye | nanakṣuḥ |
aṅhoyuvastanvastanvate | vi | vayo | mahadduṣṭaraṁ | pūrvyāya |
sa | saṁvato | navajātastuturyātsiṅhaṁ | na | kruddhamabhitaḥ | pari | ṣṭhuḥ |
māteva | yadbharase | paprathāno | janaṁjanaṁ | dhāyase | cakṣase | ca |
vayovayo | jarase | yaddadhānaḥ | pari | tmanā | viṣurūpo | jigāsi |
vājo | nu | te | śavasaspātvantamuruṁ | doghaṁ | dharuṇaṁ | deva | rāyaḥ |
padaṁ | na | tāyurguhā | dadhāno | maho | rāye | citayannatrimaspaḥ |
bṛhadvayo | hi | bhānave'rcā | devāyāgnaye |
yaṁ | mitraṁ | na | praśastibhirmartāso | dadhire | puraḥ |
sa | hi | dyubhirjanānāṁ | hotā | dakṣasya | bāhvoḥ |
vi | havyamagnirānuṣagbhago | na | vāramṛṇvati |
asya | stome | maghonaḥ | sakhye | vṛddhaśociṣaḥ |
viśvā | yasmintuviṣvaṇi | samarye | śuṣmamādadhuḥ |
adhā | hyagnaiṣāṁ | suvīryasya | maṁhanā |
tamidyahvaṁ | na | rodasī | pari | śravo | babhūvatuḥ |
nū | naihi | vāryamagne | gṛṇānā | bhara |
ye | vayaṁ | ye | ca | sūrayaḥ | svasti | dhāmahe | sacotaidhi | pṛtsu | no | vṛdhe |
ā | yajñairdeva | martyetthā | tavyāṁsamūtaye |
agniṁ | kṛte | svadhvare | pūrurīḻītāvase |
asya | hi | svayaśastarāsā | vidharmanmanyase |
taṁ | nākaṁ | citraśociṣaṁ | mandraṁ | paro | manīṣayā |
asya | vāso | arciṣā | yāyukta | tujā | girā |
divo | na | yasya | retasā | bṛhacchocantyarcayaḥ |
asya | kratvā | vicetaso | dasmasya | vasu | rathā |
adhā | viśvāsu | havyo'gnirvikṣu | pra | śasyate |
nū | neddhi | vāryamāsā | sacanta | sūrayaḥ |
ūrjo | napādabhiṣṭaye | pāhi | śagdhi | svastayotaidhi | pṛtsu | no | vṛdhe |
prātaragniḥ | purupriyo | viśaḥ | stavetātithiḥ |
viśvāni | yo | amartyo | havyā | marteṣu | raṇyati |
dvitāya | mṛktavāhase | svasya | dakṣasya | maṁhanā |
induṁ | sa | dhattānuṣakstotā | citte | amartya |
taṁ | vo | dīrghāyuśociṣaṁ | girā | huve | maghonām |
ariṣṭo | yeṣāṁ | ratho | vyaśvadāvannīyate |
citrā | vā | yeṣu | dīdhitirāsannukthā | pānti | ye |
stīrṇaṁ | barhiḥ | svarṇare | śravāṁsi | dadhire | pari |
ye | me | pañcāśataṁ | daduraśvānāṁ | sadhastuti |
dyumadagne | mahi | śravo | bṛhatkṛdhi | maghonāṁ | nṛvadamṛta | nṛṇām |
abhyavasthāḥ | pra | jāyante | pra | vavrervavriściketa |
upasthe | māturvi | caṣṭe |
juhure | vi | citayanto'nimiṣaṁ | nṛmṇaṁ | pānti |
ā | dṛḻhāṁ | puraṁ | viviśuḥ |
ā | śvaitreyasya | jantavo | dyumadvardhanta | kṛṣṭayaḥ |
niṣkagrīvo | bṛhadukthainā | madhvā | na | vājayuḥ |
priyaṁ | dugdhaṁ | na | kāmyamajāmi | jāmyoḥ | sacā |
gharmo | na | vājajaṭharo'dabdhaḥ | śaśvato | dabhaḥ |
krīḻanno | raśmā | bhuvaḥ | saṁ | bhasmanā | vāyunā | vevidānaḥ |
tāsya | sandhṛṣajo | na | tigmāḥ | susaṁśitā | vakṣyo | vakṣaṇesthāḥ |
yamagne | vājasātama | tvaṁ | cinmanyase | rayim |
taṁ | no | gīrbhiḥ | śravāyyaṁ | devatrā | panayā | yujam |
ye | agne | nerayanti | te | vṛddhograsya | śavasaḥ |
apa | dveṣo | apa | hvaro'nyavratasya | saścire |
hotāraṁ | tvā | vṛṇīmahe'gne | dakṣasya | sādhanam |
yajñeṣu | pūrvyaṁ | girā | prayasvanto | havāmahe |
itthā | yathā | totaye | sahasāvandivedive |
rāya | ṛtāya | sukrato | gobhiḥ | ṣyāma | sadhamādo | vīraiḥ | syāma | sadhamādaḥ |
manuṣvattvā | ni | dhīmahi | manuṣvatsamidhīmahi |
agne | manuṣvadaṅgiro | devāndevayate | yaja |
tvaṁ | hi | mānuṣe | jane'gne | suprītedhyase |
srucastvā | yantyānuṣaksujāta | sarpirāsute |
tvāṁ | viśve | sajoṣaso | devāso | dūtamakrata |
saparyantastvā | kave | yajñeṣu | devamīḻate |
devaṁ | vo | devayajyayāgnimīḻīta | martyaḥ |
samiddhaḥ | śukra | dīdihyṛtasya | yonimāsadaḥ | sasasya | yonimāsadaḥ |
pra | viśvasāmannatrivadarcā | pāvakaśociṣe |
yo | adhvareṣvīḍyo | hotā | mandratamo | viśi |
nyagniṁ | jātavedasaṁ | dadhātā | devamṛtvijam |
pra | yajñaitvānuṣagadyā | devavyacastamaḥ |
cikitvinmanasaṁ | tvā | devaṁ | martāsotaye |
vareṇyasya | te'vaseyānāso | amanmahi |
agne | cikiddhyasya | nedaṁ | vacaḥ | sahasya |
taṁ | tvā | suśipra | daṁpate | stomairvardhantyatrayo | gīrbhiḥ | śumbhantyatrayaḥ |
agne | sahantamā | bhara | dyumnasya | prāsahā | rayim |
viśvā | yaścarṣaṇīrabhyāsā | vājeṣu | sāsahat |
tamagne | pṛtanāṣahaṁ | rayiṁ | sahasvā | bhara |
tvaṁ | hi | satyo | adbhuto | dātā | vājasya | gomataḥ |
viśve | hi | tvā | sajoṣaso | janāso | vṛktabarhiṣaḥ |
hotāraṁ | sadmasu | priyaṁ | vyanti | vāryā | puru |
sa | hi | ṣmā | viśvacarṣaṇirabhimāti | saho | dadhe |
agnaiṣu | kṣayeṣvā | revannaḥ | śukra | dīdihi | dyumatpāvaka | dīdihi |
agne | tvaṁ | no | antamota | trātā | śivo | bhavā | varūthyaḥ |
vasuragnirvasuśravācchā | nakṣi | dyumattamaṁ | rayiṁ | dāḥ |
sa | no | bodhi | śrudhī | havamuruṣyā | ṇo | aghāyataḥ | samasmāt |
taṁ | tvā | śociṣṭha | dīdivaḥ | sumnāya | nūnamīmahe | sakhibhyaḥ |
acchā | vo | agnimavase | devaṁ | gāsi | sa | no | vasuḥ |
rāsatputra | ṛṣūṇāmṛtāvā | parṣati | dviṣaḥ |
sa | hi | satyo | yaṁ | pūrve | ciddevāsaścidyamīdhire |
hotāraṁ | mandrajihvamitsudītibhirvibhāvasum |
sa | no | dhītī | variṣṭhayā | śreṣṭhayā | ca | sumatyā |
agne | rāyo | didīhi | naḥ | suvṛktibhirvareṇya |
agnirdeveṣu | rājatyagnirmarteṣvāviśan |
agnirno | havyavāhano'gniṁ | dhībhiḥ | saparyata |
agnistuviśravastamaṁ | tuvibrahmāṇamuttamam |
atūrtaṁ | śrāvayatpatiṁ | putraṁ | dadāti | dāśuṣe |
agnirdadāti | satpatiṁ | sāsāha | yo | yudhā | nṛbhiḥ |
agniratyaṁ | raghuṣyadaṁ | jetāramaparājitam |
yadvāhiṣṭhaṁ | tadagnaye | bṛhadarca | vibhāvaso |
mahiṣīva | tvadrayistvadvājodīrate |
tava | dyumanto | arcayo | grāvevocyate | bṛhat |
uto | te | tanyaturyathā | svāno | arta | tmanā | divaḥ |
evām̐ | agniṁ | vasūyavaḥ | sahasānaṁ | vavandima |
sa | no | viśvāti | dviṣaḥ | parṣannāveva | sukratuḥ |
agne | pāvaka | rociṣā | mandrayā | deva | jihvayā |
ā | devānvakṣi | yakṣi | ca |
taṁ | tvā | ghṛtasnavīmahe | citrabhāno | svardṛśam |
devām̐ | ā | vītaye | vaha |
vītihotraṁ | tvā | kave | dyumantaṁ | samidhīmahi |
agne | bṛhantamadhvare |
agne | viśvebhirā | gahi | devebhirhavyadātaye |
hotāraṁ | tvā | vṛṇīmahe |
yajamānāya | sunvatāgne | suvīryaṁ | vaha |
devairā | satsi | barhiṣi |
samidhānaḥ | sahasrajidagne | dharmāṇi | puṣyasi |
devānāṁ | dūtokthyaḥ |
nyagniṁ | jātavedasaṁ | hotravāhaṁ | yaviṣṭhyam |
dadhātā | devamṛtvijam |
pra | yajñaitvānuṣagadyā | devavyacastamaḥ |
stṛṇīta | barhirāsade |
edaṁ | maruto | aśvinā | mitraḥ | sīdantu | varuṇaḥ |
devāsaḥ | sarvayā | viśā |
anasvantā | satpatirmāmahe | me | gāvā | cetiṣṭho | asuro | maghonaḥ |
traivṛṣṇo | agne | daśabhiḥ | sahasrairvaiśvānara | tryaruṇaściketa |
yo | me | śatā | ca | viṁśatiṁ | ca | gonāṁ | harī | ca | yuktā | sudhurā | dadāti |
vaiśvānara | suṣṭuto | vāvṛdhāno'gne | yaccha | tryaruṇāya | śarma |
evā | te | agne | sumatiṁ | cakāno | naviṣṭhāya | navamaṁ | trasadasyuḥ |
yo | me | girastuvijātasya | pūrvīryuktenābhi | tryaruṇo | gṛṇāti |
yo | meti | pravocatyaśvamedhāya | sūraye |
dadadṛcā | saniṁ | yate | dadanmedhāmṛtāyate |
yasya | mā | paruṣāḥ | śatamuddharṣayantyukṣaṇaḥ |
aśvamedhasya | dānāḥ | someva | tryāśiraḥ |
indrāgnī | śatadāvnyaśvamedhe | suvīryam |
kṣatraṁ | dhārayataṁ | bṛhaddivi | sūryamivājaram |
samiddho | agnirdivi | śociraśretpratyaṅṅuṣasamurviyā | vi | bhāti |
eti | prācī | viśvavārā | namobhirdevām̐ | īḻānā | haviṣā | ghṛtācī |
samidhyamāno | amṛtasya | rājasi | haviṣkṛṇvantaṁ | sacase | svastaye |
viśvaṁ | sa | dhatte | draviṇaṁ | yaminvasyātithyamagne | ni | ca | dhattetpuraḥ |
agne | śardha | mahate | saubhagāya | tava | dyumnānyuttamāni | santu |
saṁ | jāspatyaṁ | suyamamā | kṛṇuṣva | śatrūyatāmabhi | tiṣṭhā | mahāṁsi |
samiddhasya | pramahaso'gne | vande | tava | śriyam |
vṛṣabho | dyumnavām̐ | asi | samadhvareṣvidhyase |
samiddho | agnāhuta | devānyakṣi | svadhvara |
tvaṁ | hi | havyavāḻasi |
ā | juhotā | duvasyatāgniṁ | prayatyadhvare |
vṛṇīdhvaṁ | havyavāhanam |
tryaryamā | manuṣo | devatātā | trī | rocanā | divyā | dhārayanta |
arcanti | tvā | marutaḥ | pūtadakṣāstvameṣāmṛṣirindrāsi | dhīraḥ |
anu | yadīṁ | maruto | mandasānamārcannindraṁ | papivāṁsaṁ | sutasya |
ādatta | vajramabhi | yadahiṁ | hannapo | yahvīrasṛjatsartavo |
uta | brahmāṇo | maruto | me | asyendraḥ | somasya | suṣutasya | peyāḥ |
taddhi | havyaṁ | manuṣe | gāvindadahannahiṁ | papivām̐ | indro | asya |
ādrodasī | vitaraṁ | vi | ṣkabhāyatsaṁvivyānaścidbhiyase | mṛgaṁ | kaḥ |
jigartimindro | apajargurāṇaḥ | prati | śvasantamava | dānavaṁ | han |
adha | kratvā | maghavantubhyaṁ | devānu | viśve | adaduḥ | somapeyam |
yatsūryasya | haritaḥ | patantīḥ | puraḥ | satīruparaitaśe | kaḥ |
nava | yadasya | navatiṁ | ca | bhogāntsākaṁ | vajreṇa | maghavā | vi-vṛścat |
arcantīndraṁ | marutaḥ | sadhasthe | traiṣṭubhena | vacasā | bādhata | dyām |
sakhā | sakhye | apacattūyamagnirasya | kratvā | mahiṣā | trī | śatāni |
trī | sākamindro | manuṣaḥ | sarāṁsi | sutaṁ | pibadvṛtrahatyāya | somam |
trī | yacchatā | mahiṣāṇāmagho | māstrī | sarāṁsi | maghavā | somyāpāḥ |
kāraṁ | na | viśve | ahvanta | devā | bharamindrāya | yadahiṁ | jaghāna |
uśanā | yatsahasyairayātaṁ | gṛhamindra | jūjuvānebhiraśvaiḥ |
vanvāno | atra | sarathaṁ | yayātha | kutsena | devairavanorha | śuṣṇam |
prānyaccakramavṛhaḥ | sūryasya | kutsāyānyadvarivo | yātave'kaḥ |
anāso | dasyūm̐ramṛṇo | vadhena | ni | duryoṇāvṛṇaṅmṛdhravācaḥ |
stomāsastvā | gaurivīteravardhannarandhayo | vaidathināya | piprum |
ā | tvāmṛjiśvā | sakhyāya | cakre | pacanpaktīrapibaḥ | somamasya |
navagvāsaḥ | sutasomāsendraṁ | daśagvāso | abhyarcantyarkaiḥ |
gavyaṁ | cidūrvamapidhānavantaṁ | taṁ | cinnaraḥ | śaśamānāpa | vran |
katho | nu | te | pari | carāṇi | vidvānvīryā | maghavanyā | cakartha |
yā | co | nu | navyā | kṛṇavaḥ | śaviṣṭha | predu | tā | te | vidatheṣu | bravāma |
etā | viśvā | cakṛvām̐ | indra | bhūryaparīto | januṣā | vīryeṇa |
yā | cinnu | vajrinkṛṇavo | dadhṛṣvānna | te | vartā | taviṣyāsti | tasyāḥ |
indra | brahma | kriyamāṇā | juṣasva | yā | te | śaviṣṭha | navyākarma |
vastreva | bhadrā | sukṛtā | vasūyū | rathaṁ | na | dhīraḥ | svapātakṣam |
kva | sya | vīraḥ | ko | apaśyadindraṁ | sukharathamīyamānaṁ | haribhyām |
yo | rāyā | vajrī | sutasomamicchantadoko | gantā | puruhūtotī |
avācacakṣaṁ | padamasya | sasvarugraṁ | nidhāturanvāyamicchan |
apṛcchamanyām̐ | uta | te | māhurindraṁ | naro | bubudhānāśema |
pra | nu | vayaṁ | sute | yā | te | kṛtānīndra | bravāma | yāni | no | jujoṣaḥ |
vedadavidvāñchṛṇavacca | vidvānvahate'yaṁ | maghavā | sarvasenaḥ |
sthiraṁ | manaścakṛṣe | jātendra | veṣīdeko | yudhaye | bhūyasaścit |
aśmānaṁ | cicchavasā | didyuto | vi | vido | gavāmūrvamusriyāṇām |
paro | yattvaṁ | paramājaniṣṭhāḥ | parāvati | śrutyaṁ | nāma | bibhrat |
ataścidindrādabhayanta | devā | viśvāpo | ajayaddāsapatnīḥ |
tubhyedete | marutaḥ | suśevārcantyarkaṁ | sunvantyandhaḥ |
ahimohānamapāśayānaṁ | pra | māyābhirmāyinaṁ | sakṣadindraḥ |
vi | ṣū | mṛdho | januṣā | dānaminvannahangavā | maghavantsaṁcakānaḥ |
atrā | dāsasya | namuceḥ | śiro | yadavartayo | manave | gātumicchan |
yujaṁ | hi | māmakṛthādidindra | śiro | dāsasya | namucermathāyan |
aśmānaṁ | citsvaryaṁ | vartamānaṁ | pra | cakriyeva | rodasī | marudbhyaḥ |
striyo | hi | dāsāyudhāni | cakre | kiṁ | mā | karannabalāsya | senāḥ |
antarhyakhyadubhe | asya | dhene | athopa | praidyudhaye | dasyumindraḥ |
samatra | gāvo'bhito'navanteheha | vatsairviyutā | yadāsan |
saṁ | tendro | asṛjadasya | śākairyadīṁ | somāsaḥ | suṣutāmandan |
yadīṁ | somā | babhrudhūtāmandannaroravīdvṛṣabhaḥ | sādaneṣu |
puraṁdaraḥ | papivām̐ | indro | asya | punargavāmadadādusriyāṇām |
bhadramidaṁ | ruśamāgne | akrangavāṁ | catvāri | dadataḥ | sahasrā |
ṛṇaṁcayasya | prayatā | maghāni | pratyagrabhīṣma | nṛtamasya | nṛṇām |
supeśasaṁ | māva | sṛjantyastaṁ | gavāṁ | sahasrai | ruśamāso | agne |
tīvrendramamamanduḥ | sutāso'ktorvyuṣṭau | paritakmyāyāḥ |
aucchatsā | rātrī | paritakmyā | yām̐ | ṛṇaṁcaye | rājani | ruśamānām |
atyo | na | vājī | raghurajyamāno | babhruścatvāryasanatsahasrā |
catuḥsahasraṁ | gavyasya | paśvaḥ | pratyagrabhīṣma | ruśameṣvagne |
gharmaścittaptaḥ | pravṛje | yāsīdayasmayastamvādāma | viprāḥ |
indro | rathāya | pravataṁ | kṛṇoti | yamadhyasthānmaghavā | vājayantam |
yūtheva | paśvo | vyunoti | gopāriṣṭo | yāti | prathamaḥ | siṣāsan |
ā | pra | drava | harivo | mā | vi | venaḥ | piśaṅgarāte | abhi | naḥ | sacasva |
nahi | tvadindra | vasyo | anyadastyamenām̐ścijjanivataścakartha |
udyatsahaḥ | sahasājaniṣṭa | dediṣṭendra | indriyāṇi | viśvā |
prācodayatsudughā | vavre | antarvi | jyotiṣā | saṁvavṛtvattamo'vaḥ |
anavaste | rathamaśvāya | takṣantvaṣṭā | vajraṁ | puruhūta | dyumantam |
brahmāṇendraṁ | mahayanto | arkairavardhayannahaye | hantavo |
vṛṣṇe | yatte | vṛṣaṇo | arkamarcānindra | grāvāṇo | aditiḥ | sajoṣāḥ |
anaśvāso | ye | pavayo'rathendreṣitā | abhyavartanta | dasyūn |
pra | te | pūrvāṇi | karaṇāni | vocaṁ | pra | nūtanā | maghavanyā | cakartha |
śaktīvo | yadvibharā | rodasī | ubhe | jayannapo | manave | dānucitrāḥ |
tadinnu | te | karaṇaṁ | dasma | viprāhiṁ | yadghnannojo | atrāmimīthāḥ |
śuṣṇasya | citpari | māyāgṛbhṇāḥ | prapitvaṁ | yannapa | dasyūm̐rasedhaḥ |
tvamapo | yadave | turvaśāyāramayaḥ | sudughāḥ | pārendra |
ugramayātamavaho | ha | kutsaṁ | saṁ | ha | yadvāmuśanāranta | devāḥ |
indrākutsā | vahamānā | rathenā | vāmatyāpi | karṇe | vahantu |
niḥ | ṣīmadbhyo | dhamatho | niḥ | ṣadhasthānmaghono | hṛdo | varathastamāṁsi |
vātasya | yuktāntsuyujaścidaśvānkaviścideṣo | ajagannavasyuḥ |
viśve | te | atra | marutaḥ | sakhāyendra | brahmāṇi | taviṣīmavardhan |
sūraścidrathaṁ | paritakmyāyāṁ | pūrvaṁ | karaduparaṁ | jūjuvāṁsam |
bharaccakrametaśaḥ | saṁ | riṇāti | puro | dadhatsaniṣyati | kratuṁ | naḥ |
āyaṁ | janābhicakṣe | jagāmendraḥ | sakhāyaṁ | sutasomamicchan |
vadangrāvāva | vediṁ | bhriyāte | yasya | jīramadhvaryavaścaranti |
ye | cākananta | cākananta | nū | te | martāmṛta | mo | te | aṁhāran |
vāvandhi | yajyūm̐ruta | teṣu | dhehyojo | janeṣu | yeṣu | te | syāma |
adardarutsamasṛjo | vi | khāni | tvamarṇavānbadbadhānām̐ | aramṇāḥ |
mahāntamindra | parvataṁ | vi | yadvaḥ | sṛjo | vi | dhārāva | dānavaṁ | han |
tvamutsām̐ | ṛtubhirbadbadhānām̐ | araṁhodhaḥ | parvatasya | vajrin |
ahiṁ | cidugra | prayutaṁ | śayānaṁ | jaghanvām̐ | indra | taviṣīmadhatthāḥ |
tyasya | cinmahato | nirmṛgasya | vadharjaghāna | taviṣībhirindraḥ |
yaika | idapratirmanyamānādasmādanyo | ajaniṣṭa | tavyān |
tyaṁ | cideṣāṁ | svadhayā | madantaṁ | miho | napātaṁ | suvṛdhaṁ | tamogām |
vṛṣaprabharmā | dānavasya | bhāmaṁ | vajreṇa | vajrī | ni | jaghāna | śuṣṇam |
tyaṁ | cidasya | kratubhirniṣattamamarmaṇo | vidadidasya | marma |
yadīṁ | sukṣatra | prabhṛtā | madasya | yuyutsantaṁ | tamasi | harmye | dhāḥ |
tyaṁ | ciditthā | katpayaṁ | śayānamasūrye | tamasi | vāvṛdhānam |
taṁ | cinmandāno | vṛṣabhaḥ | sutasyoccairindro | apagūryā | jaghāna |
udyadindro | mahate | dānavāya | vadharyamiṣṭa | saho | apratītam |
yadīṁ | vajrasya | prabhṛtau | dadābha | viśvasya | jantoradhamaṁ | cakāra |
tyaṁ | cidarṇaṁ | madhupaṁ | śayānamasinvaṁ | vavraṁ | mahyādadugraḥ |
apādamatraṁ | mahatā | vadhena | ni | duryoṇāvṛṇaṅmṛdhravācam |
ko | asya | śuṣmaṁ | taviṣīṁ | varātaiko | dhanā | bharate | apratītaḥ |
ime | cidasya | jrayaso | nu | devīndrasyaujaso | bhiyasā | jihāte |
nyasmai | devī | svadhitirjihītendrāya | gāturuśatīva | yeme |
saṁ | yadojo | yuvate | viśvamābhiranu | svadhāvne | kṣitayo | namanta |
ekaṁ | nu | tvā | satpatiṁ | pāñcajanyaṁ | jātaṁ | śṛṇomi | yaśasaṁ | janeṣu |
taṁ | me | jagṛbhrāśaso | naviṣṭhaṁ | doṣā | vastorhavamānāsendram |
evā | hi | tvāmṛtuthā | yātayantaṁ | maghā | viprebhyo | dadataṁ | śṛṇomi |
kiṁ | te | brahmāṇo | gṛhate | sakhāyo | ye | tvāyā | nidadhuḥ | kāmamindra |
mahi | mahe | tavase | dīdhye | nṝnindrāyetthā | tavase | atavyān |
yo | asmai | sumatiṁ | vājasātau | stuto | jane | samaryaściketa |
sa | tvaṁ | nendra | dhiyasāno | arkairharīṇāṁ | vṛṣanyoktramaśreḥ |
yetthā | maghavannanu | joṣaṁ | vakṣo | abhi | prāryaḥ | sakṣi | janān |
na | te | tendrābhyasmadṛṣvāyuktāso | abrahmatā | yadasan |
tiṣṭhā | rathamadhi | taṁ | vajrahastā | raśmiṁ | deva | yamase | svaśvaḥ |
purū | yattendra | santyukthā | gave | cakarthorvarāsu | yudhyan |
tatakṣe | sūryāya | cidokasi | sve | vṛṣā | samatsu | dāsasya | nāma | cit |
vayaṁ | te | tendra | ye | ca | naraḥ | śardho | jajñānā | yātāśca | rathāḥ |
āsmāñjagamyādahiśuṣma | satvā | bhago | na | havyaḥ | prabhṛtheṣu | cāruḥ |
papṛkṣeṇyamindra | tve | hyojo | nṛmṇāni | ca | nṛtamāno | amartaḥ |
sa | nainīṁ | vasavāno | rayiṁ | dāḥ | prāryaḥ | stuṣe | tuvimaghasya | dānam |
evā | nendrotibhirava | pāhi | gṛṇataḥ | śūra | kārūn |
uta | tvacaṁ | dadato | vājasātau | piprīhi | madhvaḥ | suṣutasya | cāroḥ |
uta | tye | mā | paurukutsyasya | sūrestrasadasyorhiraṇino | rarāṇāḥ |
vahantu | mā | daśa | śyetāso | asya | gairikṣitasya | kratubhirnu | saśce |
uta | tye | mā | mārutāśvasya | śoṇāḥ | kratvāmaghāso | vidathasya | rātau |
sahasrā | me | cyavatāno | dadānānūkamaryo | vapuṣe | nārcat |
uta | tye | mā | dhvanyasya | juṣṭā | lakṣmaṇyasya | suruco | yatānāḥ |
mahnā | rāyaḥ | saṁvaraṇasya | ṛṣervrajaṁ | na | gāvaḥ | prayatāpi | gman |
ajātaśatrumajarā | svarvatyanu | svadhāmitā | dasmamīyate |
sunotana | pacata | brahmavāhase | puruṣṭutāya | prataraṁ | dadhātana |
ā | yaḥ | somena | jaṭharamapipratāmandata | maghavā | madhvo | andhasaḥ |
yadīṁ | mṛgāya | hantave | mahāvadhaḥ | sahasrabhṛṣṭimuśanā | vadhaṁ | yamat |
yo | asmai | ghraṁsota | vā | yodhani | somaṁ | sunoti | bhavati | dyumām̐ | aha |
apāpa | śakrastatanuṣṭimūhati | tanūśubhraṁ | maghavā | yaḥ | kavāsakhaḥ |
yasyāvadhītpitaraṁ | yasya | mātaraṁ | yasya | śakro | bhrātaraṁ | nāteṣate |
vetīdvasya | prayatā | yataṁkaro | na | kilbiṣādīṣate | vasvākaraḥ |
na | pañcabhirdaśabhirvaṣṭyārabhaṁ | nāsunvatā | sacate | puṣyatā | cana |
jināti | vedamuyā | hanti | vā | dhunirā | devayuṁ | bhajati | gomati | vraje |
vitvakṣaṇaḥ | samṛtau | cakramāsajo'sunvato | viṣuṇaḥ | sunvato | vṛdhaḥ |
indro | viśvasya | damitā | vibhīṣaṇo | yathāvaśaṁ | nayati | dāsamāryaḥ |
samīṁ | paṇerajati | bhojanaṁ | muṣe | vi | dāśuṣe | bhajati | sūnaraṁ | vasu |
durge | cana | dhriyate | viśvā | puru | jano | yo | asya | taviṣīmacukrudhat |
saṁ | yajjanau | sudhanau | viśvaśardhasāvavedindro | maghavā | goṣu | śubhriṣu |
yujaṁ | hyanyamakṛta | pravepanyudīṁ | gavyaṁ | sṛjate | satvabhirdhuniḥ |
sahasrasāmāgniveśiṁ | gṛṇīṣe | śatrimagnopamāṁ | ketumaryaḥ |
tasmāpaḥ | saṁyataḥ | pīpayanta | tasminkṣatramamavattveṣamastu |
yaste | sādhiṣṭho'vasendra | kratuṣṭamā | bhara |
asmabhyaṁ | carṣaṇīsahaṁ | sasniṁ | vājeṣu | duṣṭaram |
yadindra | te | catasro | yacchūra | santi | tisraḥ |
yadvā | pañca | kṣitīnāmavastatsu | nā | bhara |
ā | te'vo | vareṇyaṁ | vṛṣantamasya | hūmahe |
vṛṣajūtirhi | jajñiṣābhūbhirindra | turvaṇiḥ |
vṛṣā | hyasi | rādhase | jajñiṣe | vṛṣṇi | te | śavaḥ |
svakṣatraṁ | te | dhṛṣanmanaḥ | satrāhamindra | pauṁsyam |
tvaṁ | tamindra | martyamamitrayantamadrivaḥ |
sarvarathā | śatakrato | ni | yāhi | śavasaspate |
tvāmidvṛtrahantama | janāso | vṛktabarhiṣaḥ |
ugraṁ | pūrvīṣu | pūrvyaṁ | havante | vājasātaye |
asmākamindra | duṣṭaraṁ | puroyāvānamājiṣu |
sayāvānaṁ | dhanedhane | vājayantamavā | ratham |
asmākamindrehi | no | rathamavā | puraṁdhyā |
vayaṁ | śaviṣṭha | vāryaṁ | divi | śravo | dadhīmahi | divi | stomaṁ | manāmahe |
sā | gamadindro | yo | vasūnāṁ | ciketaddātuṁ | dāmano | rayīṇām |
dhanvacaro | na | vaṁsagastṛṣāṇaścakamānaḥ | pibatu | dugdhamaṁśum |
ā | te | hanū | harivaḥ | śūra | śipre | ruhatsomo | na | parvatasya | pṛṣṭhe |
anu | tvā | rājannarvato | na | hinvangīrbhirmadema | puruhūta | viśve |
cakraṁ | na | vṛttaṁ | puruhūta | vepate | mano | bhiyā | me | amateridadrivaḥ |
rathādadhi | tvā | jaritā | sadāvṛdha | kuvinnu | stoṣanmaghavanpurūvasuḥ |
eṣa | grāveva | jaritā | tendreyarti | vācaṁ | bṛhadāśuṣāṇaḥ |
pra | savyena | maghavanyaṁsi | rāyaḥ | pra | dakṣiṇiddharivo | mā | vi | venaḥ |
vṛṣā | tvā | vṛṣaṇaṁ | vardhatu | dyaurvṛṣā | vṛṣabhyāṁ | vahase | haribhyām |
sa | no | vṛṣā | vṛṣarathaḥ | suśipra | vṛṣakrato | vṛṣā | vajrinbhare | dhāḥ |
yo | rohitau | vājinau | vājinīvāntribhiḥ | śataiḥ | sacamānāvadiṣṭa |
yūne | samasmai | kṣitayo | namantāṁ | śrutarathāya | maruto | duvoyā |
saṁ | bhānunā | yatate | sūryasyājuhvāno | ghṛtapṛṣṭhaḥ | svañcāḥ |
tasmāmṛdhrā | uṣaso | vyucchānyendrāya | sunavāmetyāha |
samiddhāgnirvanavatstīrṇabarhiryuktagrāvā | sutasomo | jarāte |
grāvāṇo | yasyeṣiraṁ | vadantyayadadhvaryurhaviṣāva | sindhum |
vadhūriyaṁ | patimicchantyeti | yeṁ | vahāte | mahiṣīmiṣirām |
āsya | śravasyādrathā | ca | ghoṣātpurū | sahasrā | pari | vartayāte |
na | sa | rājā | vyathate | yasminnindrastīvraṁ | somaṁ | pibati | gosakhāyam |
ā | satvanairajati | hanti | vṛtraṁ | kṣeti | kṣitīḥ | subhago | nāma | puṣyan |
puṣyātkṣeme | abhi | yoge | bhavātyubhe | vṛtau | saṁyatī | saṁ | jayāti |
priyaḥ | sūrye | priyo | agnā | bhavāti | yendrāya | sutasomo | dadāśat |
uroṣṭendra | rādhaso | vibhvī | rātiḥ | śatakrato |
adhā | no | viśvacarṣaṇe | dyumnā | sukṣatra | maṁhaya |
yadīmindra | śravāyyamiṣaṁ | śaviṣṭha | dadhiṣe |
paprathe | dīrghaśruttamaṁ | hiraṇyavarṇa | duṣṭaram |
śuṣmāso | ye | te | adrivo | mehanā | ketasāpaḥ |
ubhā | devāvabhiṣṭaye | divaśca | gmaśca | rājathaḥ |
uto | no | asya | kasya | ciddakṣasya | tava | vṛtrahan |
asmabhyaṁ | nṛmṇamā | bharāsmabhyaṁ | nṛmaṇasyase |
nū | tābhirabhiṣṭibhistava | śarmañchatakrato |
indra | syāma | sugopāḥ | śūra | syāma | sugopāḥ |
yadindra | citra | mehanāsti | tvādātamadrivaḥ |
rādhastanno | vidadvasobhayāhastyā | bhara |
yanmanyase | vareṇyamindra | dyukṣaṁ | tadā | bhara |
vidyāma | tasya | te | vayamakūpārasya | dāvane |
yatte | ditsu | prarādhyaṁ | mano | asti | śrutaṁ | bṛhat |
tena | dṛḻhā | cidadrivā | vājaṁ | darṣi | sātaye |
maṁhiṣṭhaṁ | vo | maghonāṁ | rājānaṁ | carṣaṇīnām |
indramupa | praśastaye | pūrvībhirjujuṣe | giraḥ |
asmetkāvyaṁ | vacokthamindrāya | śaṁsyam |
tasmo | brahmavāhase | giro | vardhantyatrayo | giraḥ | śumbhantyatrayaḥ |
ā | yāhyadribhiḥ | sutaṁ | somaṁ | somapate | piba |
vṛṣannindra | vṛṣabhirvṛtrahantama |
vṛṣā | grāvā | vṛṣā | mado | vṛṣā | somo | ayaṁ | sutaḥ |
vṛṣannindra | vṛṣabhirvṛtrahantama |
vṛṣā | tvā | vṛṣaṇaṁ | huve | vajriñcitrābhirūtibhiḥ |
vṛṣannindra | vṛṣabhirvṛtrahantama |
ṛjīṣī | vajrī | vṛṣabhasturāṣāṭ | chuṣmī | rājā | vṛtrahā | somapāvā |
yuktvā | haribhyāmupa | yāsadarvāṅmādhyaṁdine | savane | matsadindraḥ |
yattvā | sūrya | svarbhānustamasāvidhyadāsuraḥ |
akṣetravidyathā | mugdho | bhuvanānyadīdhayuḥ |
svarbhānoradha | yadindra | māyāvo | divo | vartamānāvāhan |
gūḻhaṁ | sūryaṁ | tamasāpavratena | turīyeṇa | brahmaṇāvindadatriḥ |
mā | māmimaṁ | tava | santamatrerasyā | drugdho | bhiyasā | ni | gārīt |
tvaṁ | mitro | asi | satyarādhāstau | mehāvataṁ | varuṇaśca | rājā |
grāvṇo | brahmā | yuyujānaḥ | saparyankīriṇā | devānnamasopaśikṣan |
atriḥ | sūryasya | divi | cakṣurādhātsvarbhānorapa | māyāghukṣat |
yaṁ | vai | sūryaṁ | svarbhānustamasāvidhyadāsuraḥ |
atrayastamanvavindannahyanye | aśaknuvan |
ko | nu | vāṁ | mitrāvaruṇāvṛtāyandivo | vā | mahaḥ | pārthivasya | vā | de |
ṛtasya | vā | sadasi | trāsīthāṁ | no | yajñāyate | vā | paśuṣo | na | vājān |
te | no | mitro | varuṇo | aryamāyurindra | ṛbhukṣā | maruto | juṣanta |
namobhirvā | ye | dadhate | suvṛktiṁ | stomaṁ | rudrāya | mīḻhuṣe | sajoṣāḥ |
ā | vāṁ | yeṣṭhāśvinā | huvadhyai | vātasya | patmanrathyasya | puṣṭau |
uta | vā | divo | asurāya | manma | prāndhāṁsīva | yajyave | bharadhvam |
pra | sakṣaṇo | divyaḥ | kaṇvahotā | trito | divaḥ | sajoṣā | vāto | agniḥ |
pūṣā | bhagaḥ | prabhṛthe | viśvabhojājiṁ | na | jagmurāśvaśvatamāḥ |
pra | vo | rayiṁ | yuktāśvaṁ | bharadhvaṁ | rāyaiṣe'vase | dadhīta | dhīḥ |
suśevaivairauśijasya | hotā | ye | vaivā | marutasturāṇām |
pra | vo | vāyuṁ | rathayujaṁ | kṛṇudhvaṁ | pra | devaṁ | vipraṁ | panitāramarkaiḥ |
iṣudhyava | ṛtasāpaḥ | puraṁdhīrvasvīrno | atra | patnīrā | dhiye | dhuḥ |
upa | vaiṣe | vandyebhiḥ | śūṣaiḥ | pra | yahvī | divaścitayadbhirarkaiḥ |
uṣāsānaktā | viduṣīva | viśvamā | hā | vahato | martyāya | yajñam |
abhi | vo | arce | poṣyāvato | nṝnvāstoṣpatiṁ | tvaṣṭāraṁ | rarāṇaḥ |
dhanyā | sajoṣā | dhiṣaṇā | namobhirvanaspatīm̐roṣadhī | rāyaiṣe |
tuje | nastane | parvatāḥ | santu | svaitavo | ye | vasavo | na | vīrāḥ |
panitāptyo | yajataḥ | sadā | no | vardhānnaḥ | śaṁsaṁ | naryo | abhiṣṭau |
vṛṣṇo | astoṣi | bhūmyasya | garbhaṁ | trito | napātamapāṁ | suvṛkti |
gṛṇīte | agniretarī | na | śūṣaiḥ | śociṣkeśo | ni | riṇāti | vanā |
kathā | mahe | rudriyāya | bravāma | kadrāye | cikituṣe | bhagāya |
āpauṣadhīruta | no'vantu | dyaurvanā | girayo | vṛkṣakeśāḥ |
śṛṇotu | norjāṁ | patirgiraḥ | sa | nabhastarīyām̐ | iṣiraḥ | parijmā |
śṛṇvantvāpaḥ | puro | na | śubhrāḥ | pari | sruco | babṛhāṇasyādreḥ |
vidā | cinnu | mahānto | ye | vaivā | bravāma | dasmā | vāryaṁ | dadhānāḥ |
vayaścana | subhvāva | yanti | kṣubhā | martamanuyataṁ | vadhasnaiḥ |
ā | daivyāni | pārthivāni | janmāpaścācchā | sumakhāya | vocam |
vardhantāṁ | dyāvo | giraścandrāgrodā | vardhantāmabhiṣātārṇāḥ |
padepade | me | jarimā | ni | dhāyi | varūtrī | vā | śakrā | yā | pāyubhiśca |
siṣaktu | mātā | mahī | rasā | naḥ | smatsūribhirṛjuhasta | ṛjuvaniḥ |
kathā | dāśema | namasā | sudānūnevayā | maruto | acchoktau | praśravaso | maruto | acchoktau |
mā | no'hirbudhnyo | riṣe | dhādasmākaṁ | bhūdupamātivaniḥ |
iti | cinnu | prajāyai | paśumatyai | devāso | vanate | martyo | vā | devāso | vanate | martyo | vaḥ |
atrā | śivāṁ | tanvo | dhāsimasyā | jarāṁ | cinme | nirṛtirjagrasīta |
tāṁ | vo | devāḥ | sumatimūrjayantīmiṣamaśyāma | vasavaḥ | śasā | goḥ |
sā | naḥ | sudānurmṛḻayantī | devī | prati | dravantī | suvitāya | gamyāḥ |
abhi | neḻā | yūthasya | mātā | smannadībhirurvaśī | vā | gṛṇātu |
urvaśī | vā | bṛhaddivā | gṛṇānābhyūrṇvānā | prabhṛthasyāyoḥ |
siṣaktu | norjavyasya | puṣṭeḥ |
pra | śaṁtamā | varuṇaṁ | dīdhitī | gīrmitraṁ | bhagamaditiṁ | nūnamaśyāḥ |
pṛṣadyoniḥ | pañcahotā | śṛṇotvatūrtapanthāsuro | mayobhuḥ |
prati | me | stomamaditirjagṛbhyātsūnuṁ | na | mātā | hṛdyaṁ | suśevam |
brahma | priyaṁ | devahitaṁ | yadastyahaṁ | mitre | varuṇe | yanmayobhu |
udīraya | kavitamaṁ | kavīnāmunattainamabhi | madhvā | ghṛtena |
sa | no | vasūni | prayatā | hitāni | candrāṇi | devaḥ | savitā | suvāti |
samindra | ṇo | manasā | neṣi | gobhiḥ | saṁ | sūribhirharivaḥ | saṁ | svasti |
saṁ | brahmaṇā | devahitaṁ | yadasti | saṁ | devānāṁ | sumatyā | yajñiyānām |
devo | bhagaḥ | savitā | rāyo | aṁśendro | vṛtrasya | saṁjito | dhanānām |
ṛbhukṣā | vājota | vā | puraṁdhiravantu | no | amṛtāsasturāsaḥ |
marutvato | apratītasya | jiṣṇorajūryataḥ | pra | bravāmā | kṛtāni |
na | te | pūrve | maghavannāparāso | na | vīryaṁ | nūtanaḥ | kaścanāpa |
upa | stuhi | prathamaṁ | ratnadheyaṁ | bṛhaspatiṁ | sanitāraṁ | dhanānām |
yaḥ | śaṁsate | stuvate | śaṁbhaviṣṭhaḥ | purūvasurāgamajjohuvānam |
tavotibhiḥ | sacamānāriṣṭā | bṛhaspate | maghavānaḥ | suvīrāḥ |
ye | aśvadota | vā | santi | godā | ye | vastradāḥ | subhagāsteṣu | rāyaḥ |
visarmāṇaṁ | kṛṇuhi | vittameṣāṁ | ye | bhuñjate | apṛṇanto | nokthaiḥ |
apavratānprasave | vāvṛdhānānbrahmadviṣaḥ | sūryādyāvayasva |
yauhate | rakṣaso | devavītāvacakrebhistaṁ | maruto | ni | yāta |
yo | vaḥ | śamīṁ | śaśamānasya | nindāttucchyānkāmānkarate | siṣvidānaḥ |
tamu | ṣṭuhi | yaḥ | sviṣuḥ | sudhanvā | yo | viśvasya | kṣayati | bheṣajasya |
yakṣvā | mahe | saumanasāya | rudraṁ | namobhirdevamasuraṁ | duvasya |
damūnaso | apaso | ye | suhastā | vṛṣṇaḥ | patnīrnadyo | vibhvataṣṭāḥ |
sarasvatī | bṛhaddivota | rākā | daśasyantīrvarivasyantu | śubhrāḥ |
pra | sū | mahe | suśaraṇāya | medhāṁ | giraṁ | bhare | navyasīṁ | jāyamānām |
yāhanā | duhiturvakṣaṇāsu | rūpā | mināno | akṛṇodidaṁ | naḥ |
pra | suṣṭutiḥ | stanayantaṁ | ruvantamiḻaspatiṁ | jaritarnūnamaśyāḥ |
yo | abdimām̐ | udanimām̐ | iyarti | pra | vidyutā | rodasī | ukṣamāṇaḥ |
eṣa | stomo | mārutaṁ | śardho | acchā | rudrasya | sūnūm̐ryuvanyūm̐rudaśyāḥ |
kāmo | rāye | havate | mā | svastyupa | stuhi | pṛṣadaśvām̐ | ayāsaḥ |
praiṣa | stomaḥ | pṛthivīmantarikṣaṁ | vanaspatīm̐roṣadhī | rāye | aśyāḥ |
devodevaḥ | suhavo | bhūtu | mahyaṁ | mā | no | mātā | pṛthivī | durmatau | dhāt |
urau | devānibādhe | syāma |
samaśvinoravasā | nūtanena | mayobhuvā | supraṇītī | gamema |
ā | no | rayiṁ | vahatamota | vīrānā | viśvānyamṛtā | saubhagāni |
ā | dhenavaḥ | payasā | tūrṇyarthāmardhantīrupa | no | yantu | madhvā |
maho | rāye | bṛhatīḥ | sapta | vipro | mayobhuvo | jaritā | johavīti |
ā | suṣṭutī | namasā | vartayadhyai | dyāvā | vājāya | pṛthivī | amṛdhre |
pitā | mātā | madhuvacāḥ | suhastā | bharebhare | no | yaśasāvaviṣṭām |
adhvaryavaścakṛvāṁso | madhūni | pra | vāyave | bharata | cāru | śukram |
hoteva | naḥ | prathamaḥ | pāhyasya | deva | madhvo | rarimā | te | madāya |
daśa | kṣipo | yuñjate | bāhū | adriṁ | somasya | yā | śamitārā | suhastā |
madhvo | rasaṁ | sugabhastirgiriṣṭhāṁ | caniścadadduduhe | śukramaṁśuḥ |
asāvi | te | jujuṣāṇāya | somaḥ | kratve | dakṣāya | bṛhate | madāya |
harī | rathe | sudhurā | yoge | arvāgindra | priyā | kṛṇuhi | hūyamānaḥ |
ā | no | mahīmaramatiṁ | sajoṣā | gnāṁ | devīṁ | namasā | rātahavyām |
madhormadāya | bṛhatīmṛtajñāmāgne | vaha | pathibhirdevayānaiḥ |
añjanti | yaṁ | prathayanto | na | viprā | vapāvantaṁ | nāgninā | tapantaḥ |
piturna | putropasi | preṣṭhā | gharmo | agnimṛtayannasādi |
acchā | mahī | bṛhatī | śaṁtamā | gīrdūto | na | gantvaśvinā | huvadhyai |
mayobhuvā | sarathā | yātamarvāggantaṁ | nidhiṁ | dhuramāṇirna | nābhim |
pra | tavyaso | namaüktiṁ | turasyāhaṁ | pūṣṇota | vāyoradikṣi |
yā | rādhasā | coditārā | matīnāṁ | yā | vājasya | draviṇodota | tman |
ā | nāmabhirmaruto | vakṣi | viśvānā | rūpebhirjātavedo | huvānaḥ |
yajñaṁ | giro | jarituḥ | suṣṭutiṁ | ca | viśve | ganta | maruto | viśvotī |
ā | no | divo | bṛhataḥ | parvatādā | sarasvatī | yajatā | gantu | yajñam |
havaṁ | devī | jujuṣāṇā | ghṛtācī | śagmāṁ | no | vācamuśatī | śṛṇotu |
ā | vedhasaṁ | nīlapṛṣṭhaṁ | bṛhantaṁ | bṛhaspatiṁ | sadane | sādayadhvam |
sādadyoniṁ | damā | dīdivāṁsaṁ | hiraṇyavarṇamaruṣaṁ | sapema |
ā | dharṇasirbṛhaddivo | rarāṇo | viśvebhirgantvomabhirhuvānaḥ |
gnā | vasānauṣadhīramṛdhrastridhātuśṛṅgo | vṛṣabho | vayodhāḥ |
mātuṣpade | parame | śukrāyorvipanyavo | rāspirāso | agman |
suśevyaṁ | namasā | rātahavyāḥ | śiśuṁ | mṛjantyāyavo | na | vāse |
bṛhadvayo | bṛhate | tubhyamagne | dhiyājuro | mithunāsaḥ | sacanta |
devodevaḥ | suhavo | bhūtu | mahyaṁ | mā | no | mātā | pṛthivī | durmatau | dhāt |
urau | devānibādhe | syāma |
samaśvinoravasā | nūtanena | mayobhuvā | supraṇītī | gamema |
ā | no | rayiṁ | vahatamota | vīrānā | viśvānyamṛtā | saubhagāni |
taṁ | pratnathā | pūrvathā | viśvathemathā | jyeṣṭhatātiṁ | barhiṣadaṁ | svarvidam |
pratīcīnaṁ | vṛjanaṁ | dohase | girāśuṁ | jayantamanu | yāsu | vardhase |
śriye | sudṛśīruparasya | yāḥ | svarvirocamānaḥ | kakubhāmacodate |
sugopāsi | na | dabhāya | sukrato | paro | māyābhirṛtāsa | nāma | te |
atyaṁ | haviḥ | sacate | sacca | dhātu | cāriṣṭagātuḥ | sa | hotā | sahobhariḥ |
prasarsrāṇo | anu | barhirvṛṣā | śiśurmadhye | yuvājaro | visruhā | hitaḥ |
pra | vaite | suyujo | yāmanniṣṭaye | nīcīramuṣmai | yamya | ṛtāvṛdhaḥ |
suyantubhiḥ | sarvaśāsairabhīśubhiḥ | krivirnāmāni | pravaṇe | muṣāyati |
saṁjarbhurāṇastarubhiḥ | sutegṛbhaṁ | vayākinaṁ | cittagarbhāsu | susvaruḥ |
dhāravākeṣvṛjugātha | śobhase | vardhasva | patnīrabhi | jīvo | adhvare |
yādṛgeva | dadṛśe | tādṛgucyate | saṁ | chāyayā | dadhire | sidhrayāpsvā |
mahīmasmabhyamuruṣāmuru | jrayo | bṛhatsuvīramanapacyutaṁ | sahaḥ |
vetyagrurjanivānvāti | spṛdhaḥ | samaryatā | manasā | sūryaḥ | kaviḥ |
ghraṁsaṁ | rakṣantaṁ | pari | viśvato | gayamasmākaṁ | śarma | vanavatsvāvasuḥ |
jyāyāṁsamasya | yatunasya | ketuna | ṛṣisvaraṁ | carati | yāsu | nāma | te |
yādṛśmindhāyi | tamapasyayā | vidadyo | svayaṁ | vahate | so | araṁ | karat |
samudramāsāmava | tasthe | agrimā | na | riṣyati | savanaṁ | yasminnāyatā |
atrā | na | hārdi | kravaṇasya | rejate | yatrā | matirvidyate | pūtabandhanī |
sa | hi | kṣatrasya | manasasya | cittibhirevāvadasya | yajatasya | sadhreḥ |
avatsārasya | spṛṇavāma | raṇvabhiḥ | śaviṣṭhaṁ | vājaṁ | viduṣā | cidardhyam |
śyenāsāmaditiḥ | kakṣyo | mado | viśvavārasya | yajatasya | māyinaḥ |
samanyamanyamarthayantyetave | vidurviṣāṇaṁ | paripānamanti | te |
sadāpṛṇo | yajato | vi | dviṣo | vadhīdbāhuvṛktaḥ | śrutavittaryo | vaḥ | sacā |
ubhā | sa | varā | pratyeti | bhāti | ca | yadīṁ | gaṇaṁ | bhajate | suprayāvabhiḥ |
sutaṁbharo | yajamānasya | satpatirviśvāsāmūdhaḥ | sa | dhiyāmudañcanaḥ |
bharaddhenū | rasavacchiśriye | payo'nubruvāṇo | adhyeti | na | svapan |
yo | jāgāra | tamṛcaḥ | kāmayante | yo | jāgāra | tamu | sāmāni | yanti |
yo | jāgāra | tamayaṁ | somāha | tavāhamasmi | sakhye | nyokāḥ |
agnirjāgāra | tamṛcaḥ | kāmayante'gnirjāgāra | tamu | sāmāni | yanti |
agnirjāgāra | tamayaṁ | somāha | tavāhamasmi | sakhye | nyokāḥ |
vidā | divo | viṣyannadrimukthairāyatyoṣaso | arcino | guḥ |
apāvṛta | vrajinīrutsvargādvi | duro | mānuṣīrdevāvaḥ |
vi | sūryo | amatiṁ | na | śriyaṁ | sādorvādgavāṁ | mātā | jānatī | gāt |
dhanvarṇaso | nadyaḥ | khādoarṇāḥ | sthūṇeva | sumitā | dṛṁhata | dyauḥ |
asmokthāya | parvatasya | garbho | mahīnāṁ | januṣe | pūrvyāya |
vi | parvato | jihīta | sādhata | dyaurāvivāsanto | dasayanta | bhūma |
sūktebhirvo | vacobhirdevajuṣṭairindrā | nvagnī | avase | huvadhyai |
ukthebhirhi | ṣmā | kavayaḥ | suyajñāvivāsanto | maruto | yajanti |
eto | nvadya | sudhyo | bhavāma | pra | ducchunā | minavāmā | varīyaḥ |
āre | dveṣāṁsi | sanutardadhāmāyāma | prāñco | yajamānamaccha |
etā | dhiyaṁ | kṛṇavāmā | sakhāyo'pa | yā | mātām̐ | ṛṇuta | vrajaṁ | goḥ |
yayā | manurviśiśipraṁ | jigāya | yayā | vaṇigvaṅkurāpā | purīṣam |
anūnodatra | hastayato | adrirārcanyena | daśa | māso | navagvāḥ |
ṛtaṁ | yatī | saramā | gāvindadviśvāni | satyāṅgirāścakāra |
viśve | asyā | vyuṣi | māhināyāḥ | saṁ | yadgobhiraṅgiraso | navanta |
utsāsāṁ | parame | sadhastha | ṛtasya | pathā | saramā | vidadgāḥ |
ā | sūryo | yātu | saptāśvaḥ | kṣetraṁ | yadasyorviyā | dīrghayāthe |
raghuḥ | śyenaḥ | patayadandho | acchā | yuvā | kavirdīdayadgoṣu | gacchan |
ā | sūryo | aruhacchukramarṇo'yukta | yaddharito | vītapṛṣṭhāḥ |
udnā | na | nāvamanayanta | dhīrāśṛṇvatīrāpo | arvāgatiṣṭhan |
dhiyaṁ | vo | apsu | dadhiṣe | svarṣāṁ | yayātarandaśa | māso | navagvāḥ |
ayā | dhiyā | syāma | devagopāyā | dhiyā | tuturyāmātyaṁhaḥ |
hayo | na | vidvām̐ | ayuji | svayaṁ | dhuri | tāṁ | vahāmi | prataraṇīmavasyuvam |
nāsyā | vaśmi | vimucaṁ | nāvṛtaṁ | punarvidvānpathaḥ | puraeta | ṛju | neṣati |
agnendra | varuṇa | mitra | devāḥ | śardhaḥ | pra | yanta | mārutota | viṣṇo |
ubhā | nāsatyā | rudro | adha | gnāḥ | pūṣā | bhagaḥ | sarasvatī | juṣanta |
indrāgnī | mitrāvaruṇāditiṁ | svaḥ | pṛthivīṁ | dyāṁ | marutaḥ | parvatām̐ | apaḥ |
huve | viṣṇuṁ | pūṣaṇaṁ | brahmaṇaspatiṁ | bhagaṁ | nu | śaṁsaṁ | savitāramūtaye |
uta | no | viṣṇuruta | vāto | asridho | draviṇodota | somo | mayaskarat |
uta | ṛbhavota | rāye | no | aśvinota | tvaṣṭota | vibhvānu | maṁsate |
uta | tyanno | mārutaṁ | śardhā | gamaddivikṣayaṁ | yajataṁ | barhirāsade |
bṛhaspatiḥ | śarma | pūṣota | no | yamadvarūthyaṁ | varuṇo | mitro | aryamā |
uta | tye | naḥ | parvatāsaḥ | suśastayaḥ | sudītayo | nadyastrāmaṇe | bhuvan |
bhago | vibhaktā | śavasāvasā | gamaduruvyacāditiḥ | śrotu | me | havam |
devānāṁ | patnīruśatīravantu | naḥ | prāvantu | nastujaye | vājasātaye |
yāḥ | pārthivāso | yāpāmapi | vrate | tā | no | devīḥ | suhavāḥ | śarma | yacchata |
uta | gnā | vyantu | devapatnīrindrāṇyagnāyyaśvinī | rāṭ |
ā | rodasī | varuṇānī | śṛṇotu | vyantu | devīrya | ṛturjanīnām |
prayuñjatī | divaiti | bruvāṇā | mahī | mātā | duhiturbodhayantī |
āvivāsantī | yuvatirmanīṣā | pitṛbhyā | sadane | johuvānā |
ajirāsastadapeyamānā | ātasthivāṁso | amṛtasya | nābhim |
anantāsoravo | viśvataḥ | sīṁ | pari | dyāvāpṛthivī | yanti | panthāḥ |
ukṣā | samudro | aruṣaḥ | suparṇaḥ | pūrvasya | yoniṁ | piturā | viveśa |
madhye | divo | nihitaḥ | pṛśniraśmā | vi | cakrame | rajasaspātyantau |
catvāreṁ | bibhrati | kṣemayanto | daśa | garbhaṁ | carase | dhāpayante |
tridhātavaḥ | paramāsya | gāvo | divaścaranti | pari | sadyo | antān |
idaṁ | vapurnivacanaṁ | janāsaścaranti | yannadyastasthurāpaḥ |
dve | yadīṁ | bibhṛto | māturanye | iheha | jāte | yamyā | sabandhū |
vi | tanvate | dhiyo | asmāpāṁsi | vastrā | putrāya | mātaro | vayanti |
upaprakṣe | vṛṣaṇo | modamānā | divaspathā | vadhvo | yantyaccha |
tadastu | mitrāvaruṇā | tadagne | śaṁ | yorasmabhyamidamastu | śastam |
aśīmahi | gādhamuta | pratiṣṭhāṁ | namo | dive | bṛhate | sādanāya |
kadu | priyāya | dhāmne | manāmahe | svakṣatrāya | svayaśase | mahe | vayam |
āmenyasya | rajaso | yadabhrām̐ | apo | vṛṇānā | vitanoti | māyinī |
tātnata | vayunaṁ | vīravakṣaṇaṁ | samānyā | vṛtayā | viśvamā | rajaḥ |
apo | apācīraparāpejate | pra | pūrvābhistirate | devayurjanaḥ |
ā | grāvabhirahanyebhiraktubhirvariṣṭhaṁ | vajramā | jigharti | māyini |
śataṁ | vā | yasya | pracarantsve | dame | saṁvartayanto | vi | ca | vartayannahā |
tāmasya | rītiṁ | paraśoriva | pratyanīkamakhyaṁ | bhuje | asya | varpasaḥ |
sacā | yadi | pitumantamiva | kṣayaṁ | ratnaṁ | dadhāti | bharahūtaye | viśe |
sa | jihvayā | caturanīka | ṛñjate | cāru | vasāno | varuṇo | yatannarim |
na | tasya | vidma | puruṣatvatā | vayaṁ | yato | bhagaḥ | savitā | dāti | vāryam |
devaṁ | vo | adya | savitārameṣe | bhagaṁ | ca | ratnaṁ | vibhajantamāyoḥ |
ā | vāṁ | narā | purubhujā | vavṛtyāṁ | divedive | cidaśvinā | sakhīyan |
prati | prayāṇamasurasya | vidvāntsūktairdevaṁ | savitāraṁ | duvasya |
upa | bruvīta | namasā | vijānañjyeṣṭhaṁ | ca | ratnaṁ | vibhajantamāyoḥ |
adatrayā | dayate | vāryāṇi | pūṣā | bhago | aditirvastosraḥ |
indro | viṣṇurvaruṇo | mitro | agnirahāni | bhadrā | janayanta | dasmāḥ |
tanno | anarvā | savitā | varūthaṁ | tatsindhaveṣayanto | anu | gman |
upa | yadvoce | adhvarasya | hotā | rāyaḥ | syāma | patayo | vājaratnāḥ |
pra | ye | vasubhyevadā | namo | durye | mitre | varuṇe | sūktavācaḥ |
avaitvabhvaṁ | kṛṇutā | varīyo | divaspṛthivyoravasā | madema |
viśvo | devasya | neturmarto | vurīta | sakhyam |
viśvo | rāyeṣudhyati | dyumnaṁ | vṛṇīta | puṣyase |
te | te | deva | netarye | cemām̐ | anuśase |
te | rāyā | te | hyāpṛce | sacemahi | sacathyaiḥ |
ato | nā | nṝnatithīnataḥ | patnīrdaśasyata |
āre | viśvaṁ | patheṣṭhāṁ | dviṣo | yuyotu | yūyuviḥ |
yatra | vahnirabhihito | dudravaddroṇyaḥ | paśuḥ |
nṛmaṇā | vīrapastyo'rṇā | dhīreva | sanitā |
eṣa | te | deva | netā | rathaspatiḥ | śaṁ | rayiḥ |
śaṁ | rāye | śaṁ | svastayeṣaḥstuto | manāmahe | devastuto | manāmahe |
agne | sutasya | pītaye | viśvairūmebhirā | gahi |
devebhirhavyadātaye |
ṛtadhītayā | gata | satyadharmāṇo | adhvaram |
agneḥ | pibata | jihvayā |
viprebhirvipra | santya | prātaryāvabhirā | gahi |
devebhiḥ | somapītaye |
ayaṁ | somaścamū | suto'matre | pari | ṣicyate |
priyendrāya | vāyave |
vāyavā | yāhi | vītaye | juṣāṇo | havyadātaye |
pibā | sutasyāndhaso | abhi | prayaḥ |
indraśca | vāyaveṣāṁ | sutānāṁ | pītimarhathaḥ |
tāñjuṣethāmarepasāvabhi | prayaḥ |
sutendrāya | vāyave | somāso | dadhyāśiraḥ |
nimnaṁ | na | yanti | sindhavo'bhi | prayaḥ |
sajūrviśvebhirdevebhiraśvibhyāmuṣasā | sajūḥ |
ā | yāhyagne | atrivatsute | raṇa |
sajūrmitrāvaruṇābhyāṁ | sajūḥ | somena | viṣṇunā |
ā | yāhyagne | atrivatsute | raṇa |
sajūrādityairvasubhiḥ | sajūrindreṇa | vāyunā |
ā | yāhyagne | atrivatsute | raṇa |
svasti | no | mimītāmaśvinā | bhagaḥ | svasti | devyaditiranarvaṇaḥ |
svasti | pūṣāsuro | dadhātu | naḥ | svasti | dyāvāpṛthivī | sucetunā |
svastaye | vāyumupa | bravāmahai | somaṁ | svasti | bhuvanasya | yaspatiḥ |
bṛhaspatiṁ | sarvagaṇaṁ | svastaye | svastayādityāso | bhavantu | naḥ |
viśve | devā | no | adyā | svastaye | vaiśvānaro | vasuragniḥ | svastaye |
devāvantvṛbhavaḥ | svastaye | svasti | no | rudraḥ | pātvaṁhasaḥ |
svasti | mitrāvaruṇā | svasti | pathye | revati |
svasti | nendraścāgniśca | svasti | no | adite | kṛdhi |
svasti | panthāmanu | carema | sūryācandramasāviva |
punardadatāghnatā | jānatā | saṁ | gamemahi |
pra | śyāvāśva | dhṛṣṇuyārcā | marudbhirṛkvabhiḥ |
ye | adroghamanuṣvadhaṁ | śravo | madanti | yajñiyāḥ |
te | hi | sthirasya | śavasaḥ | sakhāyaḥ | santi | dhṛṣṇuyā |
te | yāmannā | dhṛṣadvinastmanā | pānti | śaśvataḥ |
te | spandrāso | nokṣaṇo'ti | ṣkandanti | śarvarīḥ |
marutāmadhā | maho | divi | kṣamā | ca | manmahe |
marutsu | vo | dadhīmahi | stomaṁ | yajñaṁ | ca | dhṛṣṇuyā |
viśve | ye | mānuṣā | yugā | pānti | martyaṁ | riṣaḥ |
arhanto | ye | sudānavo | naro | asāmiśavasaḥ |
pra | yajñaṁ | yajñiyebhyo | divo | arcā | marudbhyaḥ |
ā | rukmairā | yudhā | nara | ṛṣvā | ṛṣṭīrasṛkṣata |
anvenām̐ | aha | vidyuto | maruto | jajjhatīriva | bhānurarta | tmanā | divaḥ |
ye | vāvṛdhanta | pārthivā | yorāvantarikṣa | ā |
vṛjane | vā | nadīnāṁ | sadhasthe | vā | maho | divaḥ |
śardho | mārutamucchaṁsa | satyaśavasamṛbhvasam |
uta | sma | te | śubhe | naraḥ | pra | spandrā | yujata | tmanā |
uta | sma | te | paruṣṇyāmūrṇā | vasata | śundhyavaḥ |
uta | pavyā | rathānāmadriṁ | bhindantyojasā |
āpathayo | vipathayo'ntaspathānupathāḥ |
etebhirmahyaṁ | nāmabhiryajñaṁ | viṣṭārauhate |
adhā | naro | nyohate'dhā | niyutauhate |
adhā | pārāvateti | citrā | rūpāṇi | darśyā |
chandaḥstubhaḥ | kubhanyavotsamā | kīriṇo | nṛtuḥ |
te | me | ke | cinna | tāyavomā | āsandṛśi | tviṣe |
ya | ṛṣvā | ṛṣṭividyutaḥ | kavayaḥ | santi | vedhasaḥ |
tamṛṣe | mārutaṁ | gaṇaṁ | namasyā | ramayā | girā |
accha | ṛṣe | mārutaṁ | gaṇaṁ | dānā | mitraṁ | na | yoṣaṇā |
divo | vā | dhṛṣṇavaujasā | stutā | dhībhiriṣaṇyata |
nū | manvānaiṣāṁ | devām̐ | acchā | na | vakṣaṇā |
dānā | saceta | sūribhiryāmaśrutebhirañjibhiḥ |
pra | ye | me | bandhveṣe | gāṁ | vocanta | sūrayaḥ | pṛśniṁ | vocanta | mātaram |
adhā | pitaramiṣmiṇaṁ | rudraṁ | vocanta | śikvasaḥ |
sapta | me | sapta | śākinaikamekā | śatā | daduḥ |
yamunāyāmadhi | śrutamudrādho | gavyaṁ | mṛje | ni | rādho | aśvyaṁ | mṛje |
ko | veda | jānameṣāṁ | ko | vā | purā | sumneṣvāsa | marutām |
yadyuyujre | kilāsyaḥ |
aitānratheṣu | tasthuṣaḥ | kaḥ | śuśrāva | kathā | yayuḥ |
kasmai | sasruḥ | sudāse | anvāpayeḻābhirvṛṣṭayaḥ | saha |
te | māhurya | āyayurupa | dyubhirvibhirmade |
naro | maryārepasa | imānpaśyanniti | ṣṭuhi |
ye | añjiṣu | ye | vāśīṣu | svabhānavaḥ | srakṣu | rukmeṣu | khādiṣu |
śrāyā | ratheṣu | dhanvasu |
yuṣmākaṁ | smā | rathām̐ | anu | mude | dadhe | maruto | jīradānavaḥ |
vṛṣṭī | dyāvo | yatīriva |
ā | yaṁ | naraḥ | sudānavo | dadāśuṣe | divaḥ | kośamacucyavuḥ |
vi | parjanyaṁ | sṛjanti | rodasī | anu | dhanvanā | yanti | vṛṣṭayaḥ |
tatṛdānāḥ | sindhavaḥ | kṣodasā | rajaḥ | pra | sasrurdhenavo | yathā |
syannāśvā | ivādhvano | vimocane | vi | yadvartantainyaḥ |
ā | yāta | maruto | divāntarikṣādamāduta |
māva | sthāta | parāvataḥ |
mā | vo | rasānitabhā | kubhā | krumurmā | vaḥ | sindhurni | rīramat |
mā | vaḥ | pari | ṣṭhātsarayuḥ | purīṣiṇyasme | itsumnamastu | vaḥ |
taṁ | vaḥ | śardhaṁ | rathānāṁ | tveṣaṁ | gaṇaṁ | mārutaṁ | navyasīnām |
anu | pra | yanti | vṛṣṭayaḥ |
śardhaṁśardhaṁ | vaiṣāṁ | vrātaṁvrātaṁ | gaṇaṁgaṇaṁ | suśastibhiḥ |
anu | krāmema | dhītibhiḥ |
kasmādya | sujātāya | rātahavyāya | pra | yayuḥ |
enā | yāmena | marutaḥ |
yena | tokāya | tanayāya | dhānyaṁ | bījaṁ | vahadhve | akṣitam |
asmabhyaṁ | taddhattana | yadvemahe | rādho | viśvāyu | saubhagam |
atīyāma | nidastiraḥ | svastibhirhitvāvadyamarātīḥ |
vṛṣṭvī | śaṁ | yorāposri | bheṣajaṁ | syāma | marutaḥ | saha |
sudevaḥ | samahāsati | suvīro | naro | marutaḥ | sa | martyaḥ |
yaṁ | trāyadhve | syāma | te |
stuhi | bhojāntstuvato | asya | yāmani | raṇangāvo | na | yavase |
yataḥ | pūrvām̐ | iva | sakhīm̐ranu | hvaya | girā | gṛṇīhi | kāminaḥ |
pra | śardhāya | mārutāya | svabhānavemāṁ | vācamanajā | parvatacyute |
gharmastubhe | divā | pṛṣṭhayajvane | dyumnaśravase | mahi | nṛmṇamarcata |
pra | vo | marutastaviṣodanyavo | vayovṛdho | aśvayujaḥ | parijrayaḥ |
saṁ | vidyutā | dadhati | vāśati | tritaḥ | svarantyāpo'vanā | parijrayaḥ |
vidyunmahaso | naro | aśmadidyavo | vātatviṣo | marutaḥ | parvatacyutaḥ |
abdayā | cinmuhurā | hrādunīvṛtaḥ | stanayadamā | rabhasodojasaḥ |
vyaktūnrudrā | vyahāni | śikvaso | vyantarikṣaṁ | vi | rajāṁsi | dhūtayaḥ |
vi | yadajrām̐ | ajatha | nāveṁ | yathā | vi | durgāṇi | maruto | nāha | riṣyatha |
tadvīryaṁ | vo | maruto | mahitvanaṁ | dīrghaṁ | tatāna | sūryo | na | yojanam |
etā | na | yāme | agṛbhītaśociṣo'naśvadāṁ | yannyayātanā | girim |
abhrāji | śardho | maruto | yadarṇasaṁ | moṣathā | vṛkṣaṁ | kapaneva | vedhasaḥ |
adha | smā | no | aramatiṁ | sajoṣasaścakṣuriva | yantamanu | neṣathā | sugam |
na | sa | jīyate | maruto | na | hanyate | na | sredhati | na | vyathate | na | riṣyati |
nāsya | rāyopa | dasyanti | notaya | ṛṣiṁ | vā | yaṁ | rājānaṁ | vā | suṣūdatha |
niyutvanto | grāmajito | yathā | naro'ryamaṇo | na | marutaḥ | kavandhinaḥ |
pinvantyutsaṁ | yadināso | asvaranvyundanti | pṛthivīṁ | madhvo | andhasā |
pravatvatīyaṁ | pṛthivī | marudbhyaḥ | pravatvatī | dyaurbhavati | prayadbhyaḥ |
pravatvatīḥ | pathyāntarikṣyāḥ | pravatvantaḥ | parvatā | jīradānavaḥ |
yanmarutaḥ | sabharasaḥ | svarṇaraḥ | sūryodite | madathā | divo | naraḥ |
na | vo'śvāḥ | śrathayantāha | sisrataḥ | sadyo | asyādhvanaḥ | pāramaśnutha |
aṁseṣu | va | ṛṣṭayaḥ | patsu | khādayo | vakṣaḥsu | rukmā | maruto | rathe | śubhaḥ |
agnibhrājaso | vidyuto | gabhastyoḥ | śiprāḥ | śīrṣasu | vitatā | hiraṇyayīḥ |
taṁ | nākamaryo | agṛbhītaśociṣaṁ | ruśatpippalaṁ | maruto | vi | dhūnutha |
samacyanta | vṛjanātitviṣanta | yatsvaranti | ghoṣaṁ | vitatamṛtāyavaḥ |
yuṣmādattasya | maruto | vicetaso | rāyaḥ | syāma | rathyo | vayasvataḥ |
na | yo | yucchati | tiṣyo | yathā | divo'sme | rāranta | marutaḥ | sahasriṇam |
yūyaṁ | rayiṁ | marutaḥ | spārhavīraṁ | yūyamṛṣimavatha | sāmavipram |
yūyamarvantaṁ | bharatāya | vājaṁ | yūyaṁ | dhattha | rājānaṁ | śruṣṭimantam |
tadvo | yāmi | draviṇaṁ | sadyaūtayo | yenā | svarṇa | tatanāma | nṝm̐rabhi |
idaṁ | su | me | maruto | haryatā | vaco | yasya | tarema | tarasā | śataṁ | himāḥ |
prayajyavo | maruto | bhrājadṛṣṭayo | bṛhadvayo | dadhire | rukmavakṣasaḥ |

svayaṁ | dadhidhve | taviṣīṁ | yathā | vida | bṛhanmahāntorviyā | vi | rājatha |
utāntarikṣaṁ | mamire | vyojasā | śubhaṁ | yātāmanu | rathāvṛtsata |

na | parvatā | na | nadyo | varanta | vo | yatrācidhvaṁ | maruto | gacchathedu | tat |

mṛḻata | no | maruto | mā | vadhiṣṭanāsmabhyaṁ | śarma | bahulaṁ | vi | yantana |
adhi | stotrasya | sakhyasya | gātana | śubhaṁ | yātāmanu | rathāvṛtsata |

agne | śardhantamā | gaṇaṁ | piṣṭaṁ | rukmebhirañjibhiḥ |

yathā | cinmanyase | hṛdā | tadinme | jagmurāśasaḥ |

mīḻhuṣmatīva | pṛthivī | parāhatā | madantyetyasmadā |
ṛkṣo | na | vo | marutaḥ | śimīvām̐ | amo | dudhro | gauriva | bhīmayuḥ |
ni | ye | riṇantyojasā | vṛthā | gāvo | na | durdhuraḥ |
aśmānaṁ | citsvaryaṁ | parvataṁ | giriṁ | pra | cyāvayanti | yāmabhiḥ |
uttiṣṭha | nūnameṣāṁ | stomaiḥ | samukṣitānām |
marutāṁ | purutamamapūrvyaṁ | gavāṁ | sargamiva | hvaye |
yuṅgdhvaṁ | hyaruṣī | rathe | yuṅgdhvaṁ | ratheṣu | rohitaḥ |
yuṅgdhvaṁ | harī | ajirā | dhuri | voḻhave | vahiṣṭhā | dhuri | voḻhave |
uta | sya | vājyaruṣastuviṣvaṇiriha | sma | dhāyi | darśataḥ |
mā | vo | yāmeṣu | marutaściraṁ | karatpra | taṁ | ratheṣu | codata |
rathaṁ | nu | mārutaṁ | vayaṁ | śravasyumā | huvāmahe |
ā | yasmintasthau | suraṇāni | bibhratī | sacā | marutsu | rodasī |
taṁ | vaḥ | śardhaṁ | ratheśubhaṁ | tveṣaṁ | panasyumā | huve |
yasmintsujātā | subhagā | mahīyate | sacā | marutsu | mīḻhuṣī |
ā | rudrāsendravantaḥ | sajoṣaso | hiraṇyarathāḥ | suvitāya | gantana |
iyaṁ | vo | asmatprati | haryate | matistṛṣṇaje | na | divotsā | udanyave |
vāśīmanta | ṛṣṭimanto | manīṣiṇaḥ | sudhanvāneṣumanto | niṣaṅgiṇaḥ |
svaśvāḥ | stha | surathāḥ | pṛśnimātaraḥ | svāyudhā | maruto | yāthanā | śubham |
dhūnutha | dyāṁ | parvatāndāśuṣe | vasu | ni | vo | vanā | jihate | yāmano | bhiyā |
kopayatha | pṛthivīṁ | pṛśnimātaraḥ | śubhe | yadugrāḥ | pṛṣatīrayugdhvam |
vātatviṣo | maruto | varṣanirṇijo | yameva | susadṛśaḥ | supeśasaḥ |
piśaṅgāśvāruṇāśvā | arepasaḥ | pratvakṣaso | mahinā | dyaurivoravaḥ |
purudrapsāñjimantaḥ | sudānavastveṣasaṁdṛśo | anavabhrarādhasaḥ |
sujātāso | januṣā | rukmavakṣaso | divo | arkāmṛtaṁ | nāma | bhejire |
ṛṣṭayo | vo | maruto | aṁsayoradhi | sahaujo | bāhvorvo | balaṁ | hitam |
nṛmṇā | śīrṣasvāyudhā | ratheṣu | vo | viśvā | vaḥ | śrīradhi | tanūṣu | pipiśe |
gomadaśvāvadrathavatsuvīraṁ | candravadrādho | maruto | dadā | naḥ |
praśastiṁ | naḥ | kṛṇuta | rudriyāso | bhakṣīya | vo'vaso | daivyasya |
haye | naro | maruto | mṛḻatā | nastuvīmaghāso | amṛtā | ṛtajñāḥ |
satyaśrutaḥ | kavayo | yuvāno | bṛhadgirayo | bṛhadukṣamāṇāḥ |
tamu | nūnaṁ | taviṣīmantameṣāṁ | stuṣe | gaṇaṁ | mārutaṁ | navyasīnām |
yāśvaśvā | amavadvahantoteśire | amṛtasya | svarājaḥ |
tveṣaṁ | gaṇaṁ | tavasaṁ | khādihastaṁ | dhunivrataṁ | māyinaṁ | dātivāram |
mayobhuvo | ye | amitā | mahitvā | vandasva | vipra | tuvirādhaso | nṝn |
ā | vo | yantūdavāhāso | adya | vṛṣṭiṁ | ye | viśve | maruto | junanti |
ayaṁ | yo | agnirmarutaḥ | samiddhaitaṁ | juṣadhvaṁ | kavayo | yuvānaḥ |
yūyaṁ | rājānamiryaṁ | janāya | vibhvataṣṭaṁ | janayathā | yajatrāḥ |
yuṣmadeti | muṣṭihā | bāhujūto | yuṣmatsadaśvo | marutaḥ | suvīraḥ |
arevedacaramā | aheva | prapra | jāyante | akavā | mahobhiḥ |
pṛśneḥ | putropamāso | rabhiṣṭhāḥ | svayā | matyā | marutaḥ | saṁ | mimikṣuḥ |
yatprāyāsiṣṭa | pṛṣatībhiraśvairvīḻupavibhirmaruto | rathebhiḥ |
kṣodantāpo | riṇate | vanānyavosriyo | vṛṣabhaḥ | krandatu | dyauḥ |
prathiṣṭa | yāmanpṛthivī | cideṣāṁ | bharteva | garbhaṁ | svamicchavo | dhuḥ |
vātānhyaśvāndhuryāyuyujre | varṣaṁ | svedaṁ | cakrire | rudriyāsaḥ |
haye | naro | maruto | mṛḻatā | nastuvīmaghāso | amṛtā | ṛtajñāḥ |
satyaśrutaḥ | kavayo | yuvāno | bṛhadgirayo | bṛhadukṣamāṇāḥ |
pra | vaḥ | spaḻakrantsuvitāya | dāvane'rcā | dive | pra | pṛthivyā | ṛtaṁ | bhare |
ukṣante | aśvāntaruṣantā | rajo'nu | svaṁ | bhānuṁ | śrathayante | arṇavaiḥ |
amādeṣāṁ | bhiyasā | bhūmirejati | naurna | pūrṇā | kṣarati | vyathiryatī |
dūredṛśo | ye | citayantaimabhirantarmahe | vidathe | yetire | naraḥ |
gavāmiva | śriyase | śṛṅgamuttamaṁ | sūryo | na | cakṣū | rajaso | visarjane |
atyeva | subhvaścāravaḥ | sthana | maryeva | śriyase | cetathā | naraḥ |
ko | vo | mahānti | mahatāmudaśnavatkaskāvyā | marutaḥ | ko | ha | pauṁsyā |
yūyaṁ | ha | bhūmiṁ | kiraṇaṁ | na | rejatha | pra | yadbharadhve | suvitāya | dāvane |
aśvevedaruṣāsaḥ | sabandhavaḥ | śūreva | prayudhaḥ | prota | yuyudhuḥ |
maryeva | suvṛdho | vāvṛdhurnaraḥ | sūryasya | cakṣuḥ | pra | minanti | vṛṣṭibhiḥ |
te | ajyeṣṭhākaniṣṭhāsa | udbhido'madhyamāso | mahasā | vi | vāvṛdhuḥ |
sujātāso | januṣā | pṛśnimātaro | divo | maryā | no | acchā | jigātana |
vayo | na | ye | śreṇīḥ | papturojasāntāndivo | bṛhataḥ | sānunaspari |
aśvāsaiṣāmubhaye | yathā | viduḥ | pra | parvatasya | nabhanūm̐racucyavuḥ |
mimātu | dyauraditirvītaye | naḥ | saṁ | dānucitroṣaso | yatantām |
ācucyavurdivyaṁ | kośameta | ṛṣe | rudrasya | maruto | gṛṇānāḥ |
īḻe | agniṁ | svavasaṁ | namobhiriha | prasatto | vi | cayatkṛtaṁ | naḥ |
rathairiva | pra | bhare | vājayadbhiḥ | pradakṣiṇinmarutāṁ | stomamṛdhyām |
ā | ye | tasthuḥ | pṛṣatīṣu | śrutāsu | sukheṣu | rudrā | maruto | ratheṣu |
vanā | cidugrā | jihate | ni | vo | bhiyā | pṛthivī | cidrejate | parvataścit |
parvataścinmahi | vṛddho | bibhāya | divaścitsānu | rejata | svane | vaḥ |
yatkrīḻatha | maruta | ṛṣṭimantāpa | iva | sadhryañco | dhavadhve |
varevedraivatāso | hiraṇyairabhi | svadhābhistanvaḥ | pipiśre |
śriye | śreyāṁsastavaso | ratheṣu | satrā | mahāṁsi | cakrire | tanūṣu |
ajyeṣṭhāso | akaniṣṭhāsaite | saṁ | bhrātaro | vāvṛdhuḥ | saubhagāya |
yuvā | pitā | svapā | rudraiṣāṁ | sudughā | pṛśniḥ | sudinā | marudbhyaḥ |
yaduttame | maruto | madhyame | vā | yadvāvame | subhagāso | divi | ṣṭha |
ato | no | rudrota | vā | nvasyāgne | vittāddhaviṣo | yadyajāma |
agniśca | yanmaruto | viśvavedaso | divo | vahadhvottarādadhi | ṣṇubhiḥ |
te | mandasānā | dhunayo | riśādaso | vāmaṁ | dhatta | yajamānāya | sunvate |
agne | marudbhiḥ | śubhayadbhirṛkvabhiḥ | somaṁ | piba | mandasāno | gaṇaśribhiḥ |
pāvakebhirviśvaminvebhirāyubhirvaiśvānara | pradivā | ketunā | sajūḥ |
ke | ṣṭhā | naraḥ | śreṣṭhatamā | yaikaeka | āyaya |
paramasyāḥ | parāvataḥ |
kva | vo'śvāḥ | kvābhīśavaḥ | kathaṁ | śeka | kathā | yaya |
pṛṣṭhe | sado | nasoryamaḥ |
jaghane | codaiṣāṁ | vi | sakthāni | naro | yamuḥ |
putrakṛthe | na | janayaḥ |
parā | vīrāsaitana | maryāso | bhadrajānayaḥ |
agnitapo | yathāsatha |
sanatsāśvyaṁ | paśumuta | gavyaṁ | śatāvayam |
śyāvāśvastutāya | yā | dorvīrāyopabarbṛhat |
uta | tvā | strī | śaśīyasī | puṁso | bhavati | vasyasī |
adevatrādarādhasaḥ |
vi | yā | jānāti | jasuriṁ | vi | tṛṣyantaṁ | vi | kāminam |
devatrā | kṛṇute | manaḥ |
uta | ghā | nemo | astutaḥ | pumām̐ | iti | bruve | paṇiḥ |
sa | vairadeyetsamaḥ |
uta | me'rapadyuvatirmamanduṣī | prati | śyāvāya | vartanim |
vi | rohitā | purumīḻhāya | yematurviprāya | dīrghayaśase |
yo | me | dhenūnāṁ | śataṁ | vaidadaśviryathā | dadat |
taranteva | maṁhanā |
yeṁ | vahantāśubhiḥ | pibanto | madiraṁ | madhu |
atra | śravāṁsi | dadhire |
yeṣāṁ | śriyādhi | rodasī | vibhrājante | ratheṣvā |
divi | rukmevopari |
yuvā | sa | māruto | gaṇastveṣaratho | anedyaḥ |
śubhaṁyāvāpratiṣkutaḥ |
ko | veda | nūnameṣāṁ | yatrā | madanti | dhūtayaḥ |
ṛtajātārepasaḥ |
yūyaṁ | martaṁ | vipanyavaḥ | praṇetāretthā | dhiyā |
śrotāro | yāmahūtiṣu |
te | no | vasūni | kāmyā | puruścandrā | riśādasaḥ |
ā | yajñiyāso | vavṛttana |
etaṁ | me | stomamūrmye | dārbhyāya | parā | vaha |
giro | devi | rathīriva |
uta | me | vocatāditi | sutasome | rathavītau |
na | kāmo | apa | veti | me |
eṣa | kṣeti | rathavītirmaghavā | gomatīranu |
parvateṣvapaśritaḥ |
ṛtena | ṛtamapihitaṁ | dhruvaṁ | vāṁ | sūryasya | yatra | vimucantyaśvān |
daśa | śatā | saha | tasthustadekaṁ | devānāṁ | śreṣṭhaṁ | vapuṣāmapaśyam |
tatsu | vāṁ | mitrāvaruṇā | mahitvamīrmā | tasthuṣīrahabhirduduhre |
viśvāḥ | pinvathaḥ | svasarasya | dhenānu | vāmekaḥ | pavirā | vavarta |
adhārayataṁ | pṛthivīmuta | dyāṁ | mitrarājānā | varuṇā | mahobhiḥ |
vardhayatamoṣadhīḥ | pinvataṁ | gāva | vṛṣṭiṁ | sṛjataṁ | jīradānū |
ā | vāmaśvāsaḥ | suyujo | vahantu | yataraśmayopa | yantvarvāk |
ghṛtasya | nirṇiganu | vartate | vāmupa | sindhavaḥ | pradivi | kṣaranti |
anu | śrutāmamatiṁ | vardhadurvīṁ | barhiriva | yajuṣā | rakṣamāṇā |
namasvantā | dhṛtadakṣādhi | garte | mitrāsāthe | varuṇeḻāsvantaḥ |
akravihastā | sukṛte | paraspā | yaṁ | trāsāthe | varuṇeḻāsvantaḥ |
rājānā | kṣatramahṛṇīyamānā | sahasrasthūṇaṁ | bibhṛthaḥ | saha | dvau |
hiraṇyanirṇigayo | asya | sthūṇā | vi | bhrājate | divyaśvājanīva |
bhadre | kṣetre | nimitā | tilvile | vā | sanema | madhvo | adhigartyasya |
hiraṇyarūpamuṣaso | vyuṣṭāvayaḥsthūṇamuditā | sūryasya |
ā | rohatho | varuṇa | mitra | gartamataścakṣāthe | aditiṁ | ditiṁ | ca |
yadbaṁhiṣṭhaṁ | nātividhe | sudānū | acchidraṁ | śarma | bhuvanasya | gopā |
tena | no | mitrāvaruṇāvaviṣṭaṁ | siṣāsanto | jigīvāṁsaḥ | syāma |
ṛtasya | gopāvadhi | tiṣṭhatho | rathaṁ | satyadharmāṇā | parame | vyomani |
yamatra | mitrāvaruṇāvatho | yuvaṁ | tasmai | vṛṣṭirmadhumatpinvate | divaḥ |
samrājāvasya | bhuvanasya | rājatho | mitrāvaruṇā | vidathe | svardṛśā |
vṛṣṭiṁ | vāṁ | rādho | amṛtatvamīmahe | dyāvāpṛthivī | vi | caranti | tanyavaḥ |
samrājogrā | vṛṣabhā | divaspatī | pṛthivyā | mitrāvaruṇā | vicarṣaṇī |
citrebhirabhrairupa | tiṣṭhatho | ravaṁ | dyāṁ | varṣayatho | asurasya | māyayā |
māyā | vāṁ | mitrāvaruṇā | divi | śritā | sūryo | jyotiścarati | citramāyudham |
tamabhreṇa | vṛṣṭyā | gūhatho | divi | parjanya | drapsā | madhumanterate |
rathaṁ | yuñjate | marutaḥ | śubhe | sukhaṁ | śūro | na | mitrāvaruṇā | gaviṣṭiṣu |
rajāṁsi | citrā | vi | caranti | tanyavo | divaḥ | samrājā | payasā | nokṣatam |
vācaṁ | su | mitrāvaruṇāvirāvatīṁ | parjanyaścitrāṁ | vadati | tviṣīmatīm |
abhrā | vasata | marutaḥ | su | māyayā | dyāṁ | varṣayatamaruṇāmarepasam |
dharmaṇā | mitrāvaruṇā | vipaścitā | vratā | rakṣethe | asurasya | māyayā |
ṛtena | viśvaṁ | bhuvanaṁ | vi | rājathaḥ | sūryamā | dhattho | divi | citryaṁ | ratham |
varuṇaṁ | vo | riśādasamṛcā | mitraṁ | havāmahe |
pari | vrajeva | bāhvorjaganvāṁsā | svarṇaram |
tā | bāhavā | sucetunā | pra | yantamasmārcate |
śevaṁ | hi | jāryaṁ | vāṁ | viśvāsu | kṣāsu | joguve |
yannūnamaśyāṁ | gatiṁ | mitrasya | yāyāṁ | pathā |
asya | priyasya | śarmaṇyahiṁsānasya | saścire |
yuvābhyāṁ | mitrāvaruṇopamaṁ | dheyāmṛcā |
yaddha | kṣaye | maghonāṁ | stotṝṇāṁ | ca | spūrdhase |
ā | no | mitra | sudītibhirvaruṇaśca | sadhasthā |
sve | kṣaye | maghonāṁ | sakhīnāṁ | ca | vṛdhase |
yuvaṁ | no | yeṣu | varuṇa | kṣatraṁ | bṛhacca | bibhṛthaḥ |
uru | ṇo | vājasātaye | kṛtaṁ | rāye | svastaye |
ucchantyāṁ | me | yajatā | devakṣatre | ruśadgavi |
sutaṁ | somaṁ | na | hastibhirā | paḍbhirdhāvataṁ | narā | bibhratāvarcanānasam |
yaściketa | sa | sukraturdevatrā | sa | bravītu | naḥ |
varuṇo | yasya | darśato | mitro | vā | vanate | giraḥ |
tā | hi | śreṣṭhavarcasā | rājānā | dīrghaśruttamā |
tā | satpatī | ṛtāvṛdha | ṛtāvānā | janejane |
tā | vāmiyāno'vase | pūrvopa | bruve | sacā |
svaśvāsaḥ | su | cetunā | vājām̐ | abhi | pra | dāvane |
mitro | aṁhościdāduru | kṣayāya | gātuṁ | vanate |
mitrasya | hi | pratūrvataḥ | sumatirasti | vidhataḥ |
vayaṁ | mitrasyāvasi | syāma | saprathastame |
anehasastvotayaḥ | satrā | varuṇaśeṣasaḥ |
yuvaṁ | mitremaṁ | janaṁ | yatathaḥ | saṁ | ca | nayathaḥ |
mā | maghonaḥ | pari | khyataṁ | mo | asmākamṛṣīṇāṁ | gopīthe | noruṣyatam |
ā | cikitāna | sukratū | devau | marta | riśādasā |
varuṇāya | ṛtapeśase | dadhīta | prayase | mahe |
tā | hi | kṣatramavihrutaṁ | samyagasuryamāśāte |
adha | vrateva | mānuṣaṁ | svarṇa | dhāyi | darśatam |
tā | vāmeṣe | rathānāmurvīṁ | gavyūtimeṣām |
rātahavyasya | suṣṭutiṁ | dadhṛkstomairmanāmahe |
adhā | hi | kāvyā | yuvaṁ | dakṣasya | pūrbhiradbhutā |
ni | ketunā | janānāṁ | cikethe | pūtadakṣasā |
tadṛtaṁ | pṛthivi | bṛhacchravaeṣa | ṛṣīṇām |
jrayasānāvaraṁ | pṛthvati | kṣaranti | yāmabhiḥ |
ā | yadvāmīyacakṣasā | mitra | vayaṁ | ca | sūrayaḥ |
vyaciṣṭhe | bahupāyye | yatemahi | svarājye |
baḻitthā | deva | niṣkṛtamādityā | yajataṁ | bṛhat |
varuṇa | mitrāryamanvarṣiṣṭhaṁ | kṣatramāśāthe |
ā | yadyoniṁ | hiraṇyayaṁ | varuṇa | mitra | sadathaḥ |
dhartārā | carṣaṇīnāṁ | yantaṁ | sumnaṁ | riśādasā |
viśve | hi | viśvavedaso | varuṇo | mitro | aryamā |
vratā | padeva | saścire | pānti | martyaṁ | riṣaḥ |
te | hi | satyā | ṛtaspṛśa | ṛtāvāno | janejane |
sunīthāsaḥ | sudānavoṁ'hościdurucakrayaḥ |
ko | nu | vāṁ | mitrāstuto | varuṇo | vā | tanūnām |
tatsu | vāmeṣate | matiratribhyaiṣate | matiḥ |
pra | vo | mitrāya | gāyata | varuṇāya | vipā | girā |
mahikṣatrāvṛtaṁ | bṛhat |
samrājā | yā | ghṛtayonī | mitraścobhā | varuṇaśca |
devā | deveṣu | praśastā |
tā | naḥ | śaktaṁ | pārthivasya | maho | rāyo | divyasya |
mahi | vāṁ | kṣatraṁ | deveṣu |
ṛtamṛtena | sapanteṣiraṁ | dakṣamāśāte |
adruhā | devau | vardhete |
vṛṣṭidyāvā | rītyāpeṣaspatī | dānumatyāḥ |
bṛhantaṁ | gartamāśāte |
trī | rocanā | varuṇa | trīm̐ruta | dyūntrīṇi | mitra | dhārayatho | rajāṁsi |
vāvṛdhānāvamatiṁ | kṣatriyasyānu | vrataṁ | rakṣamāṇāvajuryam |
irāvatīrvaruṇa | dhenavo | vāṁ | madhumadvāṁ | sindhavo | mitra | duhre |
trayastasthurvṛṣabhāsastisṛṇāṁ | dhiṣaṇānāṁ | retodhā | vi | dyumantaḥ |
prātardevīmaditiṁ | johavīmi | madhyaṁdinoditā | sūryasya |
rāye | mitrāvaruṇā | sarvatāteḻe | tokāya | tanayāya | śaṁ | yoḥ |
yā | dhartārā | rajaso | rocanasyotādityā | divyā | pārthivasya |
na | vāṁ | devāmṛtā | ā | minanti | vratāni | mitrāvaruṇā | dhruvāṇi |
purūruṇā | ciddhyastyavo | nūnaṁ | vāṁ | varuṇa |
mitra | vaṁsi | vāṁ | sumatim |
tā | vāṁ | samyagadruhvāṇeṣamaśyāma | dhāyase |
vayaṁ | te | rudrā | syāma |
pātaṁ | no | rudrā | pāyubhiruta | trāyethāṁ | sutrātrā |
turyāma | dasyūntanūbhiḥ |
mā | kasyādbhutakratū | yakṣaṁ | bhujemā | tanūbhiḥ |
mā | śeṣasā | mā | tanasā |
ā | no | gantaṁ | riśādasā | varuṇa | mitra | barhaṇā |
upemaṁ | cārumadhvaram |
viśvasya | hi | pracetasā | varuṇa | mitra | rājathaḥ |
īśānā | pipyataṁ | dhiyaḥ |
upa | naḥ | sutamā | gataṁ | varuṇa | mitra | dāśuṣaḥ |
asya | somasya | pītaye |
ā | mitre | varuṇe | vayaṁ | gīrbhirjuhumo | atrivat |
ni | barhiṣi | sadataṁ | somapītaye |
vratena | stho | dhruvakṣemā | dharmaṇā | yātayajjanā |
ni | barhiṣi | sadataṁ | somapītaye |
mitraśca | no | varuṇaśca | juṣetāṁ | yajñamiṣṭaye |
ni | barhiṣi | sadatāṁ | somapītaye |
yadadya | sthaḥ | parāvati | yadarvāvatyaśvinā |
yadvā | purū | purubhujā | yadantarikṣā | gatam |
iha | tyā | purubhūtamā | purū | daṁsāṁsi | bibhratā |
varasyā | yāmyadhrigū | huve | tuviṣṭamā | bhuje |
īrmānyadvapuṣe | vapuścakraṁ | rathasya | yemathuḥ |
paryanyā | nāhuṣā | yugā | mahnā | rajāṁsi | dīyathaḥ |
tadū | ṣu | vāmenā | kṛtaṁ | viśvā | yadvāmanu | ṣṭave |
nānā | jātāvarepasā | samasme | bandhumeyathuḥ |
ā | yadvāṁ | sūryā | rathaṁ | tiṣṭhadraghuṣyadaṁ | sadā |
pari | vāmaruṣā | vayo | ghṛṇā | varantātapaḥ |
yuvoratriściketati | narā | sumnena | cetasā |
gharmaṁ | yadvāmarepasaṁ | nāsatyāsnā | bhuraṇyati |
ugro | vāṁ | kakuho | yayiḥ | śṛṇve | yāmeṣu | saṁtaniḥ |
yadvāṁ | daṁsobhiraśvinātrirnarāvavartati |
madhvo | ṣu | madhūyuvā | rudrā | siṣakti | pipyuṣī |
yatsamudrāti | parṣathaḥ | pakvāḥ | pṛkṣo | bharanta | vām |
satyamidvo | aśvinā | yuvāmāhurmayobhuvā |
tā | yāmanyāmahūtamā | yāmannā | mṛḻayattamā |
imā | brahmāṇi | vardhanāśvibhyāṁ | santu | śaṁtamā |
yā | takṣāma | rathām̐ | ivāvocāma | bṛhannamaḥ |
kūṣṭho | devāvaśvinādyā | divo | manāvasū |
tacchravatho | vṛṣaṇvasū | atrirvāmā | vivāsati |
kuha | tyā | kuha | nu | śrutā | divi | devā | nāsatyā |
kasminnā | yatatho | jane | ko | vāṁ | nadīnāṁ | sacā |
kaṁ | yāthaḥ | kaṁ | ha | gacchathaḥ | kamacchā | yuñjāthe | ratham |
kasya | brahmāṇi | raṇyatho | vayaṁ | vāmuśmasīṣṭaye |
pauraṁ | ciddhyudaprutaṁ | paura | paurāya | jinvathaḥ |
yadīṁ | gṛbhītatātaye | siṁhamiva | druhaspade |
pra | cyavānājjujuruṣo | vavrimatkaṁ | na | muñcathaḥ |
yuvā | yadī | kṛthaḥ | punarā | kāmamṛṇve | vadhvaḥ |
asti | hi | vāmiha | stotā | smasi | vāṁ | saṁdṛśi | śriye |
nū | śrutaṁ | mā | gatamavobhirvājinīvasū |
ko | vāmadya | purūṇāmā | vavne | martyānām |
ko | vipro | vipravāhasā | ko | yajñairvājinīvasū |
ā | vāṁ | ratho | rathānāṁ | yeṣṭho | yātvaśvinā |
purū | cidasmayustirāṅgūṣo | martyeṣvā |
śamū | ṣu | vāṁ | madhūyuvāsmākamastu | carkṛtiḥ |
arvācīnā | vicetasā | vibhiḥ | śyeneva | dīyatam |
aśvinā | yaddha | karhi | cicchuśrūyātamimaṁ | havam |
vasvīrū | ṣu | vāṁ | bhujaḥ | pṛñcanti | su | vāṁ | pṛcaḥ |
prati | priyatamaṁ | rathaṁ | vṛṣaṇaṁ | vasuvāhanam |
stotā | vāmaśvināvṛṣiḥ | stomena | prati | bhūṣati | mādhvī | mama | śrutaṁ | havam |
atyāyātamaśvinā | tiro | viśvāhaṁ | sanā |
dasrā | hiraṇyavartanī | suṣumnā | sindhuvāhasā | mādhvī | mama | śrutaṁ | havam |
ā | no | ratnāni | bibhratāvaśvinā | gacchataṁ | yuvam |
rudrā | hiraṇyavartanī | juṣāṇā | vājinīvasū | mādhvī | mama | śrutaṁ | havam |
suṣṭubho | vāṁ | vṛṣaṇvasū | rathe | vāṇīcyāhitā |
uta | vāṁ | kakuho | mṛgaḥ | pṛkṣaḥ | kṛṇoti | vāpuṣo | mādhvī | mama | śrutaṁ | havam |
bodhinmanasā | rathyeṣirā | havanaśrutā |
vibhiścyavānamaśvinā | ni | yātho | advayāvinaṁ | mādhvī | mama | śrutaṁ | havam |
ā | vāṁ | narā | manoyujo'śvāsaḥ | pruṣitapsavaḥ |
vayo | vahantu | pītaye | saha | sumnebhiraśvinā | mādhvī | mama | śrutaṁ | havam |
aśvināveha | gacchataṁ | nāsatyā | mā | vi | venatam |
tiraścidaryayā | pari | vartiryātamadābhyā | mādhvī | mama | śrutaṁ | havam |
asminyajñe | adābhyā | jaritāraṁ | śubhaspatī |
avasyumaśvinā | yuvaṁ | gṛṇantamupa | bhūṣatho | mādhvī | mama | śrutaṁ | havam |
abhūduṣā | ruśatpaśurāgniradhāyyṛtviyaḥ |
ayoji | vāṁ | vṛṣaṇvasū | ratho | dasrāvamartyo | mādhvī | mama | śrutaṁ | havam |
ā | bhātyagniruṣasāmanīkamudviprāṇāṁ | devayā | vāco | asthuḥ |
arvāñcā | nūnaṁ | rathyeha | yātaṁ | pīpivāṁsamaśvinā | gharmamaccha |
na | saṁskṛtaṁ | pra | mimīto | gamiṣṭhānti | nūnamaśvinopastuteha |
divābhipitve'vasāgamiṣṭhā | pratyavartiṁ | dāśuṣe | śaṁbhaviṣṭhā |
utā | yātaṁ | saṁgave | prātarahno | madhyaṁdinoditā | sūryasya |
divā | naktamavasā | śaṁtamena | nedānīṁ | pītiraśvinā | tatāna |
idaṁ | hi | vāṁ | pradivi | sthānamokeme | gṛhāśvinedaṁ | duroṇam |
ā | no | divo | bṛhataḥ | parvatādādbhyo | yātamiṣamūrjaṁ | vahantā |
samaśvinoravasā | nūtanena | mayobhuvā | supraṇītī | gamema |
ā | no | rayiṁ | vahatamota | vīrānā | viśvānyamṛtā | saubhagāni |
prātaryāvāṇā | prathamā | yajadhvaṁ | purā | gṛdhrādararuṣaḥ | pibātaḥ |
prātarhi | yajñamaśvinā | dadhāte | pra | śaṁsanti | kavayaḥ | pūrvabhājaḥ |
prātaryajadhvamaśvinā | hinota | na | sāyamasti | devayājuṣṭam |
utānyo | asmadyajate | vi | cāvaḥ | pūrvaḥpūrvo | yajamāno | vanīyān |
hiraṇyatvaṅmadhuvarṇo | ghṛtasnuḥ | pṛkṣo | vahannā | ratho | vartate | vām |
manojavāśvinā | vātaraṁhā | yenātiyātho | duritāni | viśvā |
yo | bhūyiṣṭhaṁ | nāsatyābhyāṁ | viveṣa | caniṣṭhaṁ | pitvo | rarate | vibhāge |
sa | tokamasya | pīparacchamībhiranūrdhvabhāsaḥ | sadamittuturyāt |
samaśvinoravasā | nūtanena | mayobhuvā | supraṇītī | gamema |
ā | no | rayiṁ | vahatamota | vīrānā | viśvānyamṛtā | saubhagāni |
aśvināveha | gacchataṁ | nāsatyā | mā | vi | venatam |
haṁsāviva | patatamā | sutām̐ | upa |
aśvinā | hariṇāviva | gaurāvivānu | yavasam |
haṁsāviva | patatamā | sutām̐ | upa |
aśvinā | vājinīvasū | juṣethāṁ | yajñamiṣṭaye |
haṁsāviva | patatamā | sutām̐ | upa |
atriryadvāmavarohannṛbīsamajohavīnnādhamāneva | yoṣā |
śyenasya | cijjavasā | nūtanenāgacchatamaśvinā | śaṁtamena |
vi | jihīṣva | vanaspate | yoniḥ | sūṣyantyeva |
śrutaṁ | me | aśvinā | havaṁ | saptavadhriṁ | ca | muñcatam |
bhītāya | nādhamānāya | ṛṣaye | saptavadhraye |
māyābhiraśvinā | yuvaṁ | vṛkṣaṁ | saṁ | ca | vi | cācathaḥ |
yathā | vātaḥ | puṣkariṇīṁ | samiṅgayati | sarvataḥ |
evā | te | garbhaijatu | niraitu | daśamāsyaḥ |
yathā | vāto | yathā | vanaṁ | yathā | samudraijati |
evā | tvaṁ | daśamāsya | sahāvehi | jarāyuṇā |
daśa | māsāñchaśayānaḥ | kumāro | adhi | mātari |
niraitu | jīvo | akṣato | jīvo | jīvantyādhi |
mahe | no | adya | bodhayoṣo | rāye | divitmatī |
