yathā | cinno | abodhayaḥ | satyaśravasi | vāyye | sujāte | aśvasūnṛte |
yā | sunīthe | śaucadrathe | vyauccho | duhitardivaḥ |
sā | vyuccha | sahīyasi | satyaśravasi | vāyye | sujāte | aśvasūnṛte |
sā | no | adyābharadvasurvyucchā | duhitardivaḥ |
yo | vyaucchaḥ | sahīyasi | satyaśravasi | vāyye | sujāte | aśvasūnṛte |
abhi | ye | tvā | vibhāvari | stomairgṛṇanti | vahnayaḥ |
maghairmaghoni | suśriyo | dāmanvantaḥ | surātayaḥ | sujāte | aśvasūnṛte |
yacciddhi | te | gaṇeme | chadayanti | maghattaye |
pari | cidvaṣṭayo | dadhurdadato | rādho | ahrayaṁ | sujāte | aśvasūnṛte |
aiṣu | dhā | vīravadyaśoṣo | maghoni | sūriṣu |
ye | no | rādhāṁsyahrayā | maghavāno | arāsata | sujāte | aśvasūnṛte |
tebhyo | dyumnaṁ | bṛhadyaśoṣo | maghonyā | vaha |
ye | no | rādhāṁsyaśvyā | gavyā | bhajanta | sūrayaḥ | sujāte | aśvasūnṛte |
uta | no | gomatīriṣā | vahā | duhitardivaḥ |
sākaṁ | sūryasya | raśmibhiḥ | śukraiḥ | śocadbhirarcibhiḥ | sujāte | aśvasūnṛte |
vyucchā | duhitardivo | mā | ciraṁ | tanuthāpaḥ |
nettvā | stenaṁ | yathā | ripuṁ | tapāti | sūro | arciṣā | sujāte | aśvasūnṛte |
etāvadveduṣastvaṁ | bhūyo | vā | dātumarhasi |
yā | stotṛbhyo | vibhāvaryucchantī | na | pramīyase | sujāte | aśvasūnṛte |
dyutadyāmānaṁ | bṛhatīmṛtena | ṛtāvarīmaruṇapsuṁ | vibhātīm |
devīmuṣasaṁ | svarāvahantīṁ | prati | viprāso | matibhirjarante |
eṣā | janaṁ | darśatā | bodhayantī | sugānpathaḥ | kṛṇvatī | yātyagre |
bṛhadrathā | bṛhatī | viśvaminvoṣā | jyotiryacchatyagre | ahnām |
eṣā | gobhiraruṇebhiryujānāsredhantī | rayimaprāyu | cakre |
patho | radantī | suvitāya | devī | puruṣṭutā | viśvavārā | vi | bhāti |
eṣā | vyenī | bhavati | dvibarhāviṣkṛṇvānā | tanvaṁ | purastāt |
ṛtasya | panthāmanveti | sādhu | prajānatīva | na | diśo | mināti |
eṣā | śubhrā | na | tanvo | vidānordhveva | snātī | dṛśaye | no | asthāt |
apa | dveṣo | bādhamānā | tamāṁsyuṣā | divo | duhitā | jyotiṣāgāt |
eṣā | pratīcī | duhitā | divo | nṝnyoṣeva | bhadrā | ni | riṇīte | apsaḥ |
vyūrṇvatī | dāśuṣe | vāryāṇi | punarjyotiryuvatiḥ | pūrvathākaḥ |
yuñjate | manota | yuñjate | dhiyo | viprā | viprasya | bṛhato | vipaścitaḥ |
vi | hotrā | dadhe | vayunāvidekenmahī | devasya | savituḥ | pariṣṭutiḥ |
viśvā | rūpāṇi | prati | muñcate | kaviḥ | prāsāvīdbhadraṁ | dvipade | catuṣpade |
vi | nākamakhyatsavitā | vareṇyo'nu | prayāṇamuṣaso | vi | rājati |
yasya | prayāṇamanvanyedyayurdevā | devasya | mahimānamojasā |
yaḥ | pārthivāni | vimame | saitaśo | rajāṁsi | devaḥ | savitā | mahitvanā |
uta | yāsi | savitastrīṇi | rocanota | sūryasya | raśmibhiḥ | samucyasi |
uta | rātrīmubhayataḥ | parīyasota | mitro | bhavasi | deva | dharmabhiḥ |
uteśiṣe | prasavasya | tvamekeduta | pūṣā | bhavasi | deva | yāmabhiḥ |
utedaṁ | viśvaṁ | bhuvanaṁ | vi | rājasi | śyāvāśvaste | savitaḥ | stomamānaśe |
tatsaviturvṛṇīmahe | vayaṁ | devasya | bhojanam |
śreṣṭhaṁ | sarvadhātamaṁ | turaṁ | bhagasya | dhīmahi |
asya | hi | svayaśastaraṁ | savituḥ | kaccana | priyam |
na | minanti | svarājyam |
sa | hi | ratnāni | dāśuṣe | suvāti | savitā | bhagaḥ |
taṁ | bhāgaṁ | citramīmahe |
adyā | no | deva | savitaḥ | prajāvatsāvīḥ | saubhagam |
parā | duṣṣvapnyaṁ | suva |
viśvāni | deva | savitarduritāni | parā | suva |
yadbhadraṁ | tannā | suva |
anāgaso | aditaye | devasya | savituḥ | save |
viśvā | vāmāni | dhīmahi |
ā | viśvadevaṁ | satpatiṁ | sūktairadyā | vṛṇīmahe |
satyasavaṁ | savitāram |
yeme | ubhe | ahanī | puraityaprayucchan |
svādhīrdevaḥ | savitā |
yemā | viśvā | jātānyāśrāvayati | ślokena |
pra | ca | suvāti | savitā |
acchā | vada | tavasaṁ | gīrbhirābhiḥ | stuhi | parjanyaṁ | namasā | vivāsa |
kanikradadvṛṣabho | jīradānū | reto | dadhātyoṣadhīṣu | garbham |
vi | vṛkṣānhantyuta | hanti | rakṣaso | viśvaṁ | bibhāya | bhuvanaṁ | mahāvadhāt |
utānāgeṣate | vṛṣṇyāvato | yatparjanyaḥ | stanayanhanti | duṣkṛtaḥ |
rathīva | kaśayāśvām̐ | abhikṣipannāvirdūtānkṛṇute | varṣyām̐ | aha |
dūrātsiṁhasya | stanathodīrate | yatparjanyaḥ | kṛṇute | varṣyaṁ | nabhaḥ |
pra | vātā | vānti | patayanti | vidyutodoṣadhīrjihate | pinvate | svaḥ |
irā | viśvasmai | bhuvanāya | jāyate | yatparjanyaḥ | pṛthivīṁ | retasāvati |
yasya | vrate | pṛthivī | nannamīti | yasya | vrate | śaphavajjarbhurīti |
yasya | vratauṣadhīrviśvarūpāḥ | sa | naḥ | parjanya | mahi | śarma | yaccha |
divo | no | vṛṣṭiṁ | maruto | rarīdhvaṁ | pra | pinvata | vṛṣṇo | aśvasya | dhārāḥ |
arvāṅetena | stanayitnunehyapo | niṣiñcannasuraḥ | pitā | naḥ |
abhi | kranda | stanaya | garbhamā | dhodanvatā | pari | dīyā | rathena |
dṛtiṁ | su | karṣa | viṣitaṁ | nyañcaṁ | samā | bhavantūdvato | nipādāḥ |
mahāntaṁ | kośamudacā | ni | ṣiñca | syandantāṁ | kulyā | viṣitāḥ | purastāt |
ghṛtena | dyāvāpṛthivī | vyundhi | suprapāṇaṁ | bhavatvaghnyābhyaḥ |
yatparjanya | kanikradatstanayanhaṁsi | duṣkṛtaḥ |
pratīdaṁ | viśvaṁ | modate | yatkiṁ | ca | pṛthivyāmadhi |
avarṣīrvarṣamudu | ṣū | gṛbhāyākardhanvānyatyetavo |
ajījanauṣadhīrbhojanāya | kamuta | prajābhyo'vido | manīṣām |
baḻitthā | parvatānāṁ | khidraṁ | bibharṣi | pṛthivi |
pra | yā | bhūmiṁ | pravatvati | mahnā | jinoṣi | mahini |
stomāsastvā | vicāriṇi | prati | ṣṭobhantyaktubhiḥ |
pra | yā | vājaṁ | na | heṣantaṁ | perumasyasyarjuni |
dṛḻhā | cidyā | vanaspatīnkṣmayā | dardharṣyojasā |
yatte | abhrasya | vidyuto | divo | varṣanti | vṛṣṭayaḥ |
pra | samrāje | bṛhadarcā | gabhīraṁ | brahma | priyaṁ | varuṇāya | śrutāya |
vi | yo | jaghāna | śamiteva | carmopastire | pṛthivīṁ | sūryāya |
vaneṣu | vyantarikṣaṁ | tatāna | vājamarvatsu | payosriyāsu |
hṛtsu | kratuṁ | varuṇo | apsvagniṁ | divi | sūryamadadhātsomamadrau |
nīcīnabāraṁ | varuṇaḥ | kavandhaṁ | pra | sasarja | rodasī | antarikṣam |
tena | viśvasya | bhuvanasya | rājā | yavaṁ | na | vṛṣṭirvyunatti | bhūma |
unatti | bhūmiṁ | pṛthivīmuta | dyāṁ | yadā | dugdhaṁ | varuṇo | vaṣṭyādit |
samabhreṇa | vasata | parvatāsastaviṣīyantaḥ | śrathayanta | vīrāḥ |
imāmū | ṣvāsurasya | śrutasya | mahīṁ | māyāṁ | varuṇasya | pra | vocam |
māneneva | tasthivām̐ | antarikṣe | vi | yo | mame | pṛthivīṁ | sūryeṇa |
imāmū | nu | kavitamasya | māyāṁ | mahīṁ | devasya | nakirā | dadharṣa |
ekaṁ | yadudnā | na | pṛṇantyenīrāsiñcantīravanayaḥ | samudram |
aryamyaṁ | varuṇa | mitryaṁ | vā | sakhāyaṁ | vā | sadamidbhrātaraṁ | vā |
veśaṁ | vā | nityaṁ | varuṇāraṇaṁ | vā | yatsīmāgaścakṛmā | śiśrathastat |
kitavāso | yadriripurna | dīvi | yadvā | ghā | satyamuta | yanna | vidma |
sarvā | tā | vi | ṣya | śithireva | devādhā | te | syāma | varuṇa | priyāsaḥ |
indrāgnī | yamavathobhā | vājeṣu | martyam |
dṛḻhā | citsa | pra | bhedati | dyumnā | vāṇīriva | tritaḥ |
yā | pṛtanāsu | duṣṭarā | yā | vājeṣu | śravāyyā |
yā | pañca | carṣaṇīrabhīndrāgnī | tā | havāmahe |
tayoridamavacchavastigmā | didyunmaghonoḥ |
prati | druṇā | gabhastyorgavāṁ | vṛtraghnaiṣate |
tā | vāmeṣe | rathānāmindrāgnī | havāmahe |
patī | turasya | rādhaso | vidvāṁsā | girvaṇastamā |
tā | vṛdhantāvanu | dyūnmartāya | devāvadabhā |
arhantā | citpuro | dadheṁ'śeva | devāvarvate |
evendrāgnibhyāmahāvi | havyaṁ | śūṣyaṁ | ghṛtaṁ | na | pūtamadribhiḥ |
tā | sūriṣu | śravo | bṛhadrayiṁ | gṛṇatsu | didhṛtamiṣaṁ | gṛṇatsu | didhṛtam |
pra | vo | mahe | matayo | yantu | viṣṇave | marutvate | girijaivayāmarut |
pra | śardhāya | prayajyave | sukhādaye | tavase | bhandadiṣṭaye | dhunivratāya | śavase |
pra | ye | jātā | mahinā | ye | ca | nu | svayaṁ | pra | vidmanā | bruvataivayāmarut |
kratvā | tadvo | maruto | nādhṛṣe | śavo | dānā | mahnā | tadeṣāmadhṛṣṭāso | nādrayaḥ |
pra | ye | divo | bṛhataḥ | śṛṇvire | girā | suśukvānaḥ | subhvaivayāmarut |
na | yeṣāmirī | sadhastheṣṭa | ām̐ | agnayo | na | svavidyutaḥ | pra | spandrāso | dhunīnām |
sa | cakrame | mahato | nirurukramaḥ | samānasmātsadasaivayāmarut |
yadāyukta | tmanā | svādadhi | ṣṇubhirviṣpardhaso | vimahaso | jigāti | śevṛdho | nṛbhiḥ |
svano | na | vo'mavānrejayadvṛṣā | tveṣo | yayistaviṣaivayāmarut |
yenā | sahanta | ṛñjata | svarociṣaḥ | sthāraśmāno | hiraṇyayāḥ | svāyudhāseṣmiṇaḥ |
apāro | vo | mahimā | vṛddhaśavasastveṣaṁ | śavo'vatvevayāmarut |
sthātāro | hi | prasitau | saṁdṛśi | sthana | te | noruṣyatā | nidaḥ | śuśukvāṁso | nāgnayaḥ |
te | rudrāsaḥ | sumakhāgnayo | yathā | tuvidyumnāvantvevayāmarut |
dīrghaṁ | pṛthu | paprathe | sadma | pārthivaṁ | yeṣāmajmeṣvā | mahaḥ | śardhāṁsyadbhutainasām |
adveṣo | no | maruto | gātumetana | śrotā | havaṁ | jariturevayāmarut |
viṣṇormahaḥ | samanyavo | yuyotana | smadrathyo | na | daṁsanāpa | dveṣāṁsi | sanutaḥ |
gantā | no | yajñaṁ | yajñiyāḥ | suśami | śrotā | havamarakṣaivayāmarut |
jyeṣṭhāso | na | parvatāso | vyomani | yūyaṁ | tasya | pracetasaḥ | syāta | durdhartavo | nidaḥ |
tvaṁ | hyagne | prathamo | manotāsyā | dhiyo | abhavo | dasma | hotā |
tvaṁ | sīṁ | vṛṣannakṛṇorduṣṭarītu | saho | viśvasmai | sahase | sahadhyai |
adhā | hotā | nyasīdo | yajīyāniḻaspadeṣayannīḍyaḥ | san |
taṁ | tvā | naraḥ | prathamaṁ | devayanto | maho | rāye | citayanto | anu | gman |
vṛteva | yantaṁ | bahubhirvasavyaistve | rayiṁ | jāgṛvāṁso | anu | gman |
ruśantamagniṁ | darśataṁ | bṛhantaṁ | vapāvantaṁ | viśvahā | dīdivāṁsam |
padaṁ | devasya | namasā | vyantaḥ | śravasyavaḥ | śravāpannamṛktam |
nāmāni | ciddadhire | yajñiyāni | bhadrāyāṁ | te | raṇayanta | saṁdṛṣṭau |
tvāṁ | vardhanti | kṣitayaḥ | pṛthivyāṁ | tvāṁ | rāyobhayāso | janānām |
tvaṁ | trātā | taraṇe | cetyo | bhūḥ | pitā | mātā | sadaminmānuṣāṇām |
saparyeṇyaḥ | sa | priyo | vikṣvagnirhotā | mandro | ni | ṣasādā | yajīyān |
taṁ | tvā | vayaṁ | damā | dīdivāṁsamupa | jñubādho | namasā | sadema |
taṁ | tvā | vayaṁ | sudhyo | navyamagne | sumnāyavemahe | devayantaḥ |
tvaṁ | viśo | anayo | dīdyāno | divo | agne | bṛhatā | rocanena |
viśāṁ | kaviṁ | viśpatiṁ | śaśvatīnāṁ | nitośanaṁ | vṛṣabhaṁ | carṣaṇīnām |
pretīṣaṇimiṣayantaṁ | pāvakaṁ | rājantamagniṁ | yajataṁ | rayīṇām |
so | agneje | śaśame | ca | marto | yastānaṭ | samidhā | havyadātim |
yāhutiṁ | pari | vedā | namobhirviśvetsa | vāmā | dadhate | tvotaḥ |
asmo | te | mahi | mahe | vidhema | namobhiragne | samidhota | havyaiḥ |
vedī | sūno | sahaso | gīrbhirukthairā | te | bhadrāyāṁ | sumatau | yatema |
ā | yastatantha | rodasī | vi | bhāsā | śravobhiśca | śravasyastarutraḥ |
bṛhadbhirvājaiḥ | sthavirebhirasme | revadbhiragne | vitaraṁ | vi | bhāhi |
nṛvadvaso | sadamiddhehyasme | bhūri | tokāya | tanayāya | paśvaḥ |
pūrvīriṣo | bṛhatīrāreaghāsme | bhadrā | sauśravasāni | santu |
purūṇyagne | purudhā | tvāyā | vasūni | rājanvasutā | te | aśyām |
purūṇi | hi | tve | puruvāra | santyagne | vasu | vidhate | rājani | tve |
tvaṁ | hi | kṣaitavadyaśo'gne | mitro | na | patyase |
tvaṁ | vicarṣaṇe | śravo | vaso | puṣṭiṁ | na | puṣyasi |
tvāṁ | hi | ṣmā | carṣaṇayo | yajñebhirgīrbhirīḻate |
tvāṁ | vājī | yātyavṛko | rajastūrviśvacarṣaṇiḥ |
sajoṣastvā | divo | naro | yajñasya | ketumindhate |
yaddha | sya | mānuṣo | janaḥ | sumnāyurjuhve | adhvare |
ṛdhadyaste | sudānave | dhiyā | martaḥ | śaśamate |
ūtī | ṣa | bṛhato | divo | dviṣo | aṁho | na | tarati |
samidhā | yastāhutiṁ | niśitiṁ | martyo | naśat |
vayāvantaṁ | sa | puṣyati | kṣayamagne | śatāyuṣam |
tveṣaste | dhūma | ṛṇvati | divi | ṣañchukrātataḥ |
sūro | na | hi | dyutā | tvaṁ | kṛpā | pāvaka | rocase |
adhā | hi | vikṣvīḍyo'si | priyo | no | atithiḥ |
raṇvaḥ | purīva | jūryaḥ | sūnurna | trayayāyyaḥ |
kratvā | hi | droṇe | ajyase'gne | vājī | na | kṛtvyaḥ |
parijmeva | svadhā | gayo'tyo | na | hvāryaḥ | śiśuḥ |
tvaṁ | tyā | cidacyutāgne | paśurna | yavase |
dhāmā | ha | yatte | ajara | vanā | vṛścanti | śikvasaḥ |
veṣi | hyadhvarīyatāmagne | hotā | dame | viśām |
samṛdho | viśpate | kṛṇu | juṣasva | havyamaṅgiraḥ |
acchā | no | mitramaho | deva | devānagne | vocaḥ | sumatiṁ | rodasyoḥ |
vīhi | svastiṁ | sukṣitiṁ | divo | nṝndviṣo | aṁhāṁsi | duritā | tarema | tā | tarema | tavāvasā | tarema |
agne | sa | kṣeṣadṛtapā | ṛtejoru | jyotirnaśate | devayuṣṭe |
yaṁ | tvaṁ | mitreṇa | varuṇaḥ | sajoṣā | deva | pāsi | tyajasā | martamaṁhaḥ |
īje | yajñebhiḥ | śaśame | śamībhirṛdhadvārāyāgnaye | dadāśa |
evā | cana | taṁ | yaśasāmajuṣṭirnāṁho | martaṁ | naśate | na | pradṛptiḥ |
sūro | na | yasya | dṛśatirarepā | bhīmā | yadeti | śucatastā | dhīḥ |
heṣasvataḥ | śurudho | nāyamaktoḥ | kutrā | cidraṇvo | vasatirvanejāḥ |
tigmaṁ | cidema | mahi | varpo | asya | bhasadaśvo | na | yamasānāsā |
vijehamānaḥ | paraśurna | jihvāṁ | dravirna | drāvayati | dāru | dhakṣat |
sedasteva | prati | dhādasiṣyañchiśīta | tejo'yaso | na | dhārām |
citradhrajatiraratiryo | aktorverna | druṣadvā | raghupatmajaṁhāḥ |
seṁ | rebho | na | prati | vastosrāḥ | śociṣā | rārapīti | mitramahāḥ |
naktaṁ | yemaruṣo | yo | divā | nṝnamartyo | aruṣo | yo | divā | nṝn |
divo | na | yasya | vidhato | navīnodvṛṣā | rukṣauṣadhīṣu | nūnot |
ghṛṇā | na | yo | dhrajasā | patmanā | yannā | rodasī | vasunā | daṁ | supatnī |
dhāyobhirvā | yo | yujyebhirarkairvidyunna | davidyotsvebhiḥ | śuṣmaiḥ |
śardho | vā | yo | marutāṁ | tatakṣa | ṛbhurna | tveṣo | rabhasāno | adyaut |
yathā | hotarmanuṣo | devatātā | yajñebhiḥ | sūno | sahaso | yajāsi |
evā | no | adya | samanā | samānānuśannagnośato | yakṣi | devān |
sa | no | vibhāvā | cakṣaṇirna | vastoragnirvandāru | vedyaścano | dhāt |
viśvāyuryo | amṛto | martyeṣūṣarbhudbhūdatithirjātavedāḥ |
dyāvo | na | yasya | panayantyabhvaṁ | bhāsāṁsi | vaste | sūryo | na | śukraḥ |
vi | yenotyajaraḥ | pāvako'śnasya | cicchiśnathatpūrvyāṇi |
vadmā | hi | sūno | asyadmasadvā | cakre | agnirjanuṣājmānnam |
sa | tvaṁ | norjasana | ūrjaṁ | dhā | rājeva | jeravṛke | kṣeṣyantaḥ |
nitikti | yo | vāraṇamannamatti | vāyurna | rāṣṭryatyetyaktūn |
turyāma | yastādiśāmarātīratyo | na | hrutaḥ | patataḥ | parihrut |
ā | sūryo | na | bhānumadbhirarkairagne | tatantha | rodasī | vi | bhāsā |
citro | nayatpari | tamāṁsyaktaḥ | śociṣā | patmannauśijo | na | dīyan |
tvāṁ | hi | mandratamamarkaśokairvavṛmahe | mahi | naḥ | śroṣyagne |
indraṁ | na | tvā | śavasā | devatā | vāyuṁ | pṛṇanti | rādhasā | nṛtamāḥ |
nū | no | agne'vṛkebhiḥ | svasti | veṣi | rāyaḥ | pathibhiḥ | parṣyaṁhaḥ |
tā | sūribhyo | gṛṇate | rāsi | sumnaṁ | madema | śatahimāḥ | suvīrāḥ |
huve | vaḥ | sūnuṁ | sahaso | yuvānamadroghavācaṁ | matibhiryaviṣṭham |
yenvati | draviṇāni | pracetā | viśvavārāṇi | puruvāro | adhruk |
tve | vasūni | purvaṇīka | hotardoṣā | vastorerire | yajñiyāsaḥ |
kṣāmeva | viśvā | bhuvanāni | yasmintsaṁ | saubhagāni | dadhire | pāvake |
tvaṁ | vikṣu | pradivaḥ | sīdāsu | kratvā | rathīrabhavo | vāryāṇām |
atenoṣi | vidhate | cikitvo | vyānuṣagjātavedo | vasūni |
yo | naḥ | sanutyo | abhidāsadagne | yo | antaro | mitramaho | vanuṣyāt |
tamajarebhirvṛṣabhistava | svaistapā | tapiṣṭha | tapasā | tapasvān |
yaste | yajñena | samidhā | yokthairarkebhiḥ | sūno | sahaso | dadāśat |
sa | martyeṣvamṛta | pracetā | rāyā | dyumnena | śravasā | vi | bhāti |
sa | tatkṛdhīṣitastūyamagne | spṛdho | bādhasva | sahasā | sahasvān |
yacchasyase | dyubhirakto | vacobhistajjuṣasva | jariturghoṣi | manma |
aśyāma | taṁ | kāmamagne | tavotī | aśyāma | rayiṁ | rayivaḥ | suvīram |
aśyāma | vājamabhi | vājayanto'śyāma | dyumnamajarājaraṁ | te |
pra | navyasā | sahasaḥ | sūnumacchā | yajñena | gātumavecchamānaḥ |
vṛścadvanaṁ | kṛṣṇayāmaṁ | ruśantaṁ | vītī | hotāraṁ | divyaṁ | jigāti |
sa | śvitānastanyatū | rocanasthājarebhirnānadadbhiryaviṣṭhaḥ |
yaḥ | pāvakaḥ | purutamaḥ | purūṇi | pṛthūnyagniranuyāti | bharvan |
vi | te | viṣvagvātajūtāso | agne | bhāmāsaḥ | śuce | śucayaścaranti |
tuvimrakṣāso | divyā | navagvā | vanā | vananti | dhṛṣatā | rujantaḥ |
ye | te | śukrāsaḥ | śucayaḥ | śuciṣmaḥ | kṣāṁ | vapanti | viṣitāso | aśvāḥ |
adha | bhramastorviyā | vi | bhāti | yātayamāno | adhi | sānu | pṛśneḥ |
adha | jihvā | pāpatīti | pra | vṛṣṇo | goṣuyudho | nāśaniḥ | sṛjānā |
śūrasyeva | prasitiḥ | kṣātiragnerdurvarturbhīmo | dayate | vanāni |
ā | bhānunā | pārthivāni | jrayāṁsi | mahastodasya | dhṛṣatā | tatantha |
sa | bādhasvāpa | bhayā | sahobhiḥ | spṛdho | vanuṣyanvanuṣo | ni | jūrva |
sa | citra | citraṁ | citayantamasme | citrakṣatra | citratamaṁ | vayodhām |
candraṁ | rayiṁ | puruvīraṁ | bṛhantaṁ | candra | candrābhirgṛṇate | yuvasva |
mūrdhānaṁ | divo | aratiṁ | pṛthivyā | vaiśvānaramṛtā | jātamagnim |
kaviṁ | samrājamatithiṁ | janānāmāsannā | pātraṁ | janayanta | devāḥ |
nābhiṁ | yajñānāṁ | sadanaṁ | rayīṇāṁ | mahāmāhāvamabhi | saṁ | navanta |
vaiśvānaraṁ | rathyamadhvarāṇāṁ | yajñasya | ketuṁ | janayanta | devāḥ |
tvadvipro | jāyate | vājyagne | tvadvīrāso | abhimātiṣāhaḥ |
vaiśvānara | tvamasmāsu | dhehi | vasūni | rājantspṛhayāyyāṇi |
tvāṁ | viśve | amṛta | jāyamānaṁ | śiśuṁ | na | devābhi | saṁ | navante |
tava | kratubhiramṛtatvamāyanvaiśvānara | yatpitroradīdeḥ |
vaiśvānara | tava | tāni | vratāni | mahānyagne | nakirā | dadharṣa |
yajjāyamānaḥ | pitrorupasthe'vindaḥ | ketuṁ | vayuneṣvahnām |
vaiśvānarasya | vimitāni | cakṣasā | sānūni | divo | amṛtasya | ketunā |
tasyedu | viśvā | bhuvanādhi | mūrdhani | vayeva | ruruhuḥ | sapta | visruhaḥ |
vi | yo | rajāṁsyamimīta | sukraturvaiśvānaro | vi | divo | rocanā | kaviḥ |
pari | yo | viśvā | bhuvanāni | paprathe'dabdho | gopāmṛtasya | rakṣitā |
pṛkṣasya | vṛṣṇo | aruṣasya | nū | sahaḥ | pra | nu | vocaṁ | vidathā | jātavedasaḥ |
vaiśvānarāya | matirnavyasī | śuciḥ | someva | pavate | cāruragnaye |
sa | jāyamānaḥ | parame | vyomani | vratānyagnirvratapārakṣata |
vyantarikṣamamimīta | sukraturvaiśvānaro | mahinā | nākamaspṛśat |
vyastabhnādrodasī | mitro | adbhuto'ntarvāvadakṛṇojjyotiṣā | tamaḥ |
vi | carmaṇīva | dhiṣaṇe | avartayadvaiśvānaro | viśvamadhatta | vṛṣṇyam |
apāmupasthe | mahiṣāgṛbhṇata | viśo | rājānamupa | tasthurṛgmiyam |
ā | dūto | agnimabharadvivasvato | vaiśvānaraṁ | mātariśvā | parāvataḥ |
yugeyuge | vidathyaṁ | gṛṇadbhyo'gne | rayiṁ | yaśasaṁ | dhehi | navyasīm |
pavyeva | rājannaghaśaṁsamajara | nīcā | ni | vṛśca | vaninaṁ | na | tejasā |
asmākamagne | maghavatsu | dhārayānāmi | kṣatramajaraṁ | suvīryam |
vayaṁ | jayema | śatinaṁ | sahasriṇaṁ | vaiśvānara | vājamagne | tavotibhiḥ |
adabdhebhistava | gopābhiriṣṭe'smākaṁ | pāhi | triṣadhastha | sūrīn |
rakṣā | ca | no | daduṣāṁ | śardho | agne | vaiśvānara | pra | ca | tārīḥ | stavānaḥ |
ahaśca | kṛṣṇamahararjunaṁ | ca | vi | vartete | rajasī | vedyābhiḥ |
vaiśvānaro | jāyamāno | na | rājāvātirajjyotiṣāgnistamāṁsi |
nāhaṁ | tantuṁ | na | vi | jānāmyotuṁ | na | yaṁ | vayanti | samare'tamānāḥ |
kasya | svitputreha | vaktvāni | paro | vadātyavareṇa | pitrā |
settantuṁ | sa | vi | jānātyotuṁ | sa | vaktvānyṛtuthā | vadāti |
yeṁ | ciketadamṛtasya | gopāvaścaranparo | anyena | paśyan |
ayaṁ | hotā | prathamaḥ | paśyatemamidaṁ | jyotiramṛtaṁ | martyeṣu |
ayaṁ | sa | jajñe | dhruvā | niṣatto'martyastanvā | vardhamānaḥ |
dhruvaṁ | jyotirnihitaṁ | dṛśaye | kaṁ | mano | javiṣṭhaṁ | patayatsvantaḥ |
viśve | devāḥ | samanasaḥ | saketaikaṁ | kratumabhi | vi | yanti | sādhu |
vi | me | karṇā | patayato | vi | cakṣurvīdaṁ | jyotirhṛdayāhitaṁ | yat |
vi | me | manaścarati | dūraādhīḥ | kiṁ | svidvakṣyāmi | kimu | nū | maniṣye |
viśve | devānamasyanbhiyānāstvāmagne | tamasi | tasthivāṁsam |
vaiśvānaro'vatūtaye | no'martyo'vatūtaye | naḥ |
puro | vo | mandraṁ | divyaṁ | suvṛktiṁ | prayati | yajñe | agnimadhvare | dadhidhvam |
purokthebhiḥ | sa | hi | no | vibhāvā | svadhvarā | karati | jātavedāḥ |
tamu | dyumaḥ | purvaṇīka | hotaragne | agnibhirmanuṣedhānaḥ |
stomaṁ | yamasmai | mamateva | śūṣaṁ | ghṛtaṁ | na | śuci | matayaḥ | pavante |
pīpāya | sa | śravasā | martyeṣu | yo | agnaye | dadāśa | viprokthaiḥ |
citrābhistamūtibhiścitraśocirvrajasya | sātā | gomato | dadhāti |
ā | yaḥ | paprau | jāyamānorvī | dūredṛśā | bhāsā | kṛṣṇādhvā |
adha | bahu | cittamormyāyāstiraḥ | śociṣā | dadṛśe | pāvakaḥ |
nū | naścitraṁ | puruvājābhirūtī | agne | rayiṁ | maghavadbhyaśca | dhehi |
ye | rādhasā | śravasā | cātyanyāntsuvīryebhiścābhi | santi | janān |
imaṁ | yajñaṁ | cano | dhāgna | uśanyaṁ | tāsāno | juhute | haviṣmān |
bharadvājeṣu | dadhiṣe | suvṛktimavīrvājasya | gadhyasya | sātau |
vi | dveṣāṁsīnuhi | vardhayeḻāṁ | madema | śatahimāḥ | suvīrāḥ |
yajasva | hotariṣito | yajīyānagne | bādho | marutāṁ | na | prayukti |
ā | no | mitrāvaruṇā | nāsatyā | dyāvā | hotrāya | pṛthivī | vavṛtyāḥ |
tvaṁ | hotā | mandratamo | no | adhrugantardevo | vidathā | martyeṣu |
pāvakayā | juhvā | vahnirāsāgne | yajasva | tanvaṁ | tava | svām |
dhanyā | ciddhi | tve | dhiṣaṇā | vaṣṭi | pra | devāñjanma | gṛṇate | yajadhyai |
vepiṣṭho | aṅgirasāṁ | yaddha | vipro | madhu | cchando | bhanati | rebheṣṭau |
adidyutatsvapāko | vibhāvāgne | yajasva | rodasī | urūcī |
āyuṁ | na | yaṁ | namasā | rātahavyāñjanti | suprayasaṁ | pañca | janāḥ |
vṛñje | ha | yannamasā | barhiragnāvayāmi | srugghṛtavatī | suvṛktiḥ |
amyakṣi | sadma | sadane | pṛthivyāśrāyi | yajñaḥ | sūrye | na | cakṣuḥ |
daśasyā | naḥ | purvaṇīka | hotardevebhiragne | agnibhiridhānaḥ |
rāyaḥ | sūno | sahaso | vāvasānāti | srasema | vṛjanaṁ | nāṁhaḥ |
madhye | hotā | duroṇe | barhiṣo | rāḻagnistodasya | rodasī | yajadhyai |
ayaṁ | sa | sūnuḥ | sahasa | ṛtāvā | dūrātsūryo | na | śociṣā | tatāna |
ā | yasmintve | svapāke | yajatra | yakṣadrājantsarvatāteva | nu | dyauḥ |
triṣadhasthastataruṣo | na | jaṁho | havyā | maghāni | mānuṣā | yajadhyai |
tejiṣṭhā | yasyāratirvanerāṭ | todo | adhvanna | vṛdhasāno | adyaut |
adrogho | na | dravitā | cetati | tmannamartyo'vartrauṣadhīṣu |
sāsmākebhiretarī | na | śūṣairagniḥ | ṣṭave | damā | jātavedāḥ |
drvanno | vanvankratvā | nārvosraḥ | piteva | jārayāyi | yajñaiḥ |
adha | smāsya | panayanti | bhāso | vṛthā | yattakṣadanuyāti | pṛthvīm |
sadyo | yaḥ | spandro | viṣito | dhavīyānṛṇo | na | tāyurati | dhanvā | rāṭ |
sa | tvaṁ | no | arvannidāyā | viśvebhiragne | agnibhiridhānaḥ |
veṣi | rāyo | vi | yāsi | ducchunā | madema | śatahimāḥ | suvīrāḥ |
tvadviśvā | subhaga | saubhagānyagne | vi | yanti | vanino | na | vayāḥ |
śruṣṭī | rayirvājo | vṛtratūrye | divo | vṛṣṭirīḍyo | rītirapām |
tvaṁ | bhago | nā | hi | ratnamiṣe | parijmeva | kṣayasi | dasmavarcāḥ |
agne | mitro | na | bṛhata | ṛtasyāsi | kṣattā | vāmasya | deva | bhūreḥ |
sa | satpatiḥ | śavasā | hanti | vṛtramagne | vipro | vi | paṇerbharti | vājam |
yaṁ | tvaṁ | praceta | ṛtajāta | rāyā | sajoṣā | naptrāpāṁ | hinoṣi |
yaste | sūno | sahaso | gīrbhirukthairyajñairmarto | niśitiṁ | vedyānaṭ |
viśvaṁ | sa | deva | prati | vāramagne | dhatte | dhānyaṁ | patyate | vasavyaiḥ |
tā | nṛbhyā | sauśravasā | suvīrāgne | sūno | sahasaḥ | puṣyase | dhāḥ |
kṛṇoṣi | yacchavasā | bhūri | paśvo | vayo | vṛkāyāraye | jasuraye |
vadmā | sūno | sahaso | no | vihāyāgne | tokaṁ | tanayaṁ | vāji | no | dāḥ |
viśvābhirgīrbhirabhi | pūrtimaśyāṁ | madema | śatahimāḥ | suvīrāḥ |
agnā | yo | martyo | duvo | dhiyaṁ | jujoṣa | dhītibhiḥ |
bhasannu | ṣa | pra | pūrvyeṣaṁ | vurītāvase |
agniriddhi | pracetāgnirvedhastama | ṛṣiḥ |
agniṁ | hotāramīḻate | yajñeṣu | manuṣo | viśaḥ |
nānā | hyagne'vase | spardhante | rāyo | aryaḥ |
tūrvanto | dasyumāyavo | vrataiḥ | sīkṣanto | avratam |
agnirapsāmṛtīṣahaṁ | vīraṁ | dadāti | satpatim |
yasya | trasanti | śavasaḥ | saṁcakṣi | śatravo | bhiyā |
agnirhi | vidmanā | nido | devo | martamuruṣyati |
sahāvā | yasyāvṛto | rayirvājeṣvavṛtaḥ |
acchā | no | mitramaho | deva | devānagne | vocaḥ | sumatiṁ | rodasyoḥ |
vīhi | svastiṁ | sukṣitiṁ | divo | nṝndviṣo | aṁhāṁsi | duritā | tarema | tā | tarema | tavāvasā | tarema |
imamū | ṣu | vo | atithimuṣarbudhaṁ | viśvāsāṁ | viśāṁ | patimṛñjase | girā |
vetīddivo | januṣā | kaccidā | śucirjyokcidatti | garbho | yadacyutam |
mitraṁ | na | yaṁ | sudhitaṁ | bhṛgavo | dadhurvanaspatāvīḍyamūrdhvaśociṣam |
sa | tvaṁ | suprīto | vītahavye | adbhuta | praśastibhirmahayase | divedive |
sa | tvaṁ | dakṣasyāvṛko | vṛdho | bhūraryaḥ | parasyāntarasya | taruṣaḥ |
rāyaḥ | sūno | sahaso | martyeṣvā | chardiryaccha | vītahavyāya | sapratho | bharadvājāya | saprathaḥ |
dyutānaṁ | vo | atithiṁ | svarṇaramagniṁ | hotāraṁ | manuṣaḥ | svadhvaram |
vipraṁ | na | dyukṣavacasaṁ | suvṛktibhirhavyavāhamaratiṁ | devamṛñjase |
pāvakayā | yaścitayantyā | kṛpā | kṣāmanrurucoṣaso | na | bhānunā |
tūrvanna | yāmannetaśasya | nū | raṇā | yo | ghṛṇe | na | tatṛṣāṇo | ajaraḥ |
agnimagniṁ | vaḥ | samidhā | duvasyata | priyaṁpriyaṁ | vo | atithiṁ | gṛṇīṣaṇi |
upa | vo | gīrbhiramṛtaṁ | vivāsata | devo | deveṣu | vanate | hi | vāryaṁ | devo | deveṣu | vanate | hi | no | duvaḥ |
samiddhamagniṁ | samidhā | girā | gṛṇe | śuciṁ | pāvakaṁ | puro | adhvare | dhruvam |
vipraṁ | hotāraṁ | puruvāramadruhaṁ | kaviṁ | sumnairīmahe | jātavedasam |
tvāṁ | dūtamagne | amṛtaṁ | yugeyuge | havyavāhaṁ | dadhire | pāyumīḍyam |
devāsaśca | martāsaśca | jāgṛviṁ | vibhuṁ | viśpatiṁ | namasā | ni | ṣedire |
vibhūṣannagnobhayām̐ | anu | vratā | dūto | devānāṁ | rajasī | samīyase |
yatte | dhītiṁ | sumatimāvṛṇīmahe'dha | smā | nastrivarūthaḥ | śivo | bhava |
taṁ | supratīkaṁ | sudṛśaṁ | svañcamavidvāṁso | viduṣṭaraṁ | sapema |
sa | yakṣadviśvā | vayunāni | vidvānpra | havyamagniramṛteṣu | vocat |
tamagne | pāsyuta | taṁ | piparṣi | yastānaṭ | kavaye | śūra | dhītim |
yajñasya | vā | niśitiṁ | voditiṁ | vā | tamitpṛṇakṣi | śavasota | rāyā |
tvamagne | vanuṣyato | ni | pāhi | tvamu | naḥ | sahasāvannavadyāt |
saṁ | tvā | dhvasmanvadabhyetu | pāthaḥ | saṁ | rayiḥ | spṛhayāyyaḥ | sahasrī |
agnirhotā | gṛhapatiḥ | sa | rājā | viśvā | veda | janimā | jātavedāḥ |
devānāmuta | yo | martyānāṁ | yajiṣṭhaḥ | sa | pra | yajatāmṛtāvā |
agne | yadadya | viśo | adhvarasya | hotaḥ | pāvakaśoce | veṣṭvaṁ | hi | yajvā |
ṛtā | yajāsi | mahinā | vi | yadbhūrhavyā | vaha | yaviṣṭha | yā | te | adya |
abhi | prayāṁsi | sudhitāni | hi | khyo | ni | tvā | dadhīta | rodasī | yajadhyai |
avā | no | maghavanvājasātāvagne | viśvāni | duritā | tarema | tā | tarema | tavāvasā | tarema |
agne | viśvebhiḥ | svanīka | devairūrṇāvantaṁ | prathamaḥ | sīda | yonim |
kulāyinaṁ | ghṛtavantaṁ | savitre | yajñaṁ | naya | yajamānāya | sādhu |
imamu | tyamatharvavadagniṁ | manthanti | vedhasaḥ |
yamaṅkūyantamānayannamūraṁ | śyāvyābhyaḥ |
janiṣvā | devavītaye | sarvatātā | svastaye |
ā | devānvakṣyamṛtām̐ | ṛtāvṛdho | yajñaṁ | deveṣu | pispṛśaḥ |
vayamu | tvā | gṛhapate | janānāmagne | akarma | samidhā | bṛhantam |
asthūri | no | gārhapatyāni | santu | tigmena | nastejasā | saṁ | śiśādhi |
tvamagne | yajñānāṁ | hotā | viśveṣāṁ | hitaḥ |
devebhirmānuṣe | jane |
sa | no | mandrābhiradhvare | jihvābhiryajā | mahaḥ |
ā | devānvakṣi | yakṣi | ca |
vetthā | hi | vedho | adhvanaḥ | pathaśca | devāñjasā |
agne | yajñeṣu | sukrato |
tvāmīḻe | adha | dvitā | bharato | vājibhiḥ | śunam |
īje | yajñeṣu | yajñiyam |
tvamimā | vāryā | puru | divodāsāya | sunvate |
bharadvājāya | dāśuṣe |
tvaṁ | dūto | amartyā | vahā | daivyaṁ | janam |
śṛṇvanviprasya | suṣṭutim |
tvāmagne | svādhyo | martāso | devavītaye |
yajñeṣu | devamīḻate |
tava | pra | yakṣi | saṁdṛśamuta | kratuṁ | sudānavaḥ |
viśve | juṣanta | kāminaḥ |
tvaṁ | hotā | manurhito | vahnirāsā | viduṣṭaraḥ |
agne | yakṣi | divo | viśaḥ |
agnā | yāhi | vītaye | gṛṇāno | havyadātaye |
ni | hotā | satsi | barhiṣi |
taṁ | tvā | samidbhiraṅgiro | ghṛtena | vardhayāmasi |
bṛhacchocā | yaviṣṭhya |
sa | naḥ | pṛthu | śravāyyamacchā | deva | vivāsasi |
bṛhadagne | suvīryam |
tvāmagne | puṣkarādadhyatharvā | niramanthata |
mūrdhno | viśvasya | vāghataḥ |
tamu | tvā | dadhyaṅṅṛṣiḥ | putredhe | atharvaṇaḥ |
vṛtrahaṇaṁ | puraṁdaram |
tamu | tvā | pāthyo | vṛṣā | samīdhe | dasyuhantamam |
dhanaṁjayaṁ | raṇeraṇe |
ehyū | ṣu | bravāṇi | te'gnetthetarā | giraḥ |
ebhirvardhāsendubhiḥ |
yatra | kva | ca | te | mano | dakṣaṁ | dadhasottaram |
tatrā | sadaḥ | kṛṇavase |
nahi | te | pūrtamakṣipadbhuvannemānāṁ | vaso |
athā | duvo | vanavase |
āgniragāmi | bhārato | vṛtrahā | purucetanaḥ |
divodāsasya | satpatiḥ |
sa | hi | viśvāti | pārthivā | rayiṁ | dāśanmahitvanā |
vanvannavāto | astṛtaḥ |
sa | pratnavannavīyasāgne | dyumnena | saṁyatā |
bṛhattatantha | bhānunā |
pra | vaḥ | sakhāyo | agnaye | stomaṁ | yajñaṁ | ca | dhṛṣṇuyā |
arca | gāya | ca | vedhase |
sa | hi | yo | mānuṣā | yugā | sīdaddhotā | kavikratuḥ |
dūtaśca | havyavāhanaḥ |
tā | rājānā | śucivratādityānmārutaṁ | gaṇam |
vaso | yakṣīha | rodasī |
vasvī | te | agne | saṁdṛṣṭiriṣayate | martyāya |
ūrjo | napādamṛtasya |
kratvā | dāstu | śreṣṭho'dya | tvā | vanvantsurekṇāḥ |
martānāśa | suvṛktim |
te | te | agne | tvoteṣayanto | viśvamāyuḥ |
taranto | aryo | arātīrvanvanto | aryo | arātīḥ |
agnistigmena | śociṣā | yāsadviśvaṁ | nyatriṇam |
agnirno | vanate | rayim |
suvīraṁ | rayimā | bhara | jātavedo | vicarṣaṇe |
jahi | rakṣāṁsi | sukrato |
tvaṁ | naḥ | pāhyaṁhaso | jātavedo | aghāyataḥ |
rakṣā | ṇo | brahmaṇaskave |
yo | no | agne | durevā | marto | vadhāya | dāśati |
tasmānnaḥ | pāhyaṁhasaḥ |
tvaṁ | taṁ | deva | jihvayā | pari | bādhasva | duṣkṛtam |
marto | yo | no | jighāṁsati |
bharadvājāya | saprathaḥ | śarma | yaccha | sahantya |
agne | vareṇyaṁ | vasu |
agnirvṛtrāṇi | jaṅghanaddraviṇasyurvipanyayā |
samiddhaḥ | śukrāhutaḥ |
garbhe | mātuḥ | pituṣpitā | vididyutāno | akṣare |
sīdannṛtasya | yonimā |
brahma | prajāvadā | bhara | jātavedo | vicarṣaṇe |
agne | yaddīdayaddivi |
upa | tvā | raṇvasaṁdṛśaṁ | prayasvantaḥ | sahaskṛta |
agne | sasṛjmahe | giraḥ |
upa | cchāyāmiva | ghṛṇeraganma | śarma | te | vayam |
agne | hiraṇyasaṁdṛśaḥ |
yogra | iva | śaryahā | tigmaśṛṅgo | na | vaṁsagaḥ |
agne | puro | rurojitha |
ā | yaṁ | haste | na | khādinaṁ | śiśuṁ | jātaṁ | na | bibhrati |
viśāmagniṁ | svadhvaram |
pra | devaṁ | devavītaye | bharatā | vasuvittamam |
ā | sve | yonau | ni | ṣīdatu |
ā | jātaṁ | jātavedasi | priyaṁ | śiśītātithim |
syonā | gṛhapatim |
agne | yukṣvā | hi | ye | tavāśvāso | deva | sādhavaḥ |
araṁ | vahanti | manyave |
acchā | no | yāhyā | vahābhi | prayāṁsi | vītaye |
ā | devāntsomapītaye |
udagne | bhārata | dyumadajasreṇa | davidyutat |
śocā | vi | bhāhyajara |
vītī | yo | devaṁ | marto | duvasyedagnimīḻītādhvare | haviṣmān |
hotāraṁ | satyayajaṁ | rodasyoruttānahasto | namasā | vivāset |
ā | te | agna | ṛcā | havirhṛdā | taṣṭaṁ | bharāmasi |
te | te | bhavantūkṣaṇa | ṛṣabhāso | vaśota |
agniṁ | devāso | agriyamindhate | vṛtrahantamam |
yenā | vasūnyābhṛtā | tṛḻhā | rakṣāṁsi | vājinā |
pibā | somamabhi | yamugra | tardorvaṁ | gavyaṁ | mahi | gṛṇānendra |
vi | yo | dhṛṣṇo | vadhiṣo | vajrahasta | viśvā | vṛtramamitriyā | śavobhiḥ |
seṁ | pāhi | ya | ṛjīṣī | tarutro | yaḥ | śipravānvṛṣabho | yo | matīnām |
yo | gotrabhidvajrabhṛdyo | hariṣṭhāḥ | sendra | citrām̐ | abhi | tṛndhi | vājān |
evā | pāhi | pratnathā | mandatu | tvā | śrudhi | brahma | vāvṛdhasvota | gīrbhiḥ |
āviḥ | sūryaṁ | kṛṇuhi | pīpihīṣo | jahi | śatrūm̐rabhi | gendra | tṛndhi |
te | tvā | madā | bṛhadindra | svadhāveme | pītokṣayanta | dyumantam |
mahāmanūnaṁ | tavasaṁ | vibhūtiṁ | matsarāso | jarhṛṣanta | prasāham |
yebhiḥ | sūryamuṣasaṁ | mandasāno'vāsayo'pa | dṛḻhāni | dardrat |
mahāmadriṁ | pari | gendra | santaṁ | nutthācyutaṁ | sadasaspari | svāt |
tava | kratvā | tava | taddaṁsanābhirāmāsu | pakvaṁ | śacyā | ni | dīdhaḥ |
aurṇordurosriyābhyo | vi | dṛḻhodūrvādgāsṛjo | aṅgirasvān |
paprātha | kṣāṁ | mahi | daṁso | vyurvīmupa | dyāmṛṣvo | bṛhadindra | stabhāyaḥ |
adhārayo | rodasī | devaputre | pratne | mātarā | yahvī | ṛtasya |
adha | tvā | viśve | purendra | devaikaṁ | tavasaṁ | dadhire | bharāya |
adevo | yadabhyauhiṣṭa | devāntsvarṣātā | vṛṇatendramatra |
adha | dyauścitte | apa | sā | nu | vajrāddvitānamadbhiyasā | svasya | manyoḥ |
ahiṁ | yadindro | abhyohasānaṁ | ni | cidviśvāyuḥ | śayathe | jaghāna |
adha | tvaṣṭā | te | mahogra | vajraṁ | sahasrabhṛṣṭiṁ | vavṛtacchatāśrim |
nikāmamaramaṇasaṁ | yena | navantamahiṁ | saṁ | piṇagṛjīṣin |
vardhānyaṁ | viśve | marutaḥ | sajoṣāḥ | pacacchataṁ | mahiṣām̐ | indra | tubhyam |
pūṣā | viṣṇustrīṇi | sarāṁsi | dhāvanvṛtrahaṇaṁ | madiramaṁśumasmai |
ā | kṣodo | mahi | vṛtaṁ | nadīnāṁ | pariṣṭhitamasṛjormimapām |
tāsāmanu | pravatendra | panthāṁ | prārdayo | nīcīrapasaḥ | samudram |
evā | tā | viśvā | cakṛvāṁsamindraṁ | mahāmugramajuryaṁ | sahodām |
suvīraṁ | tvā | svāyudhaṁ | suvajramā | brahma | navyamavase | vavṛtyāt |
sa | no | vājāya | śravaseṣe | ca | rāye | dhehi | dyumatendra | viprān |
bharadvāje | nṛvatendra | sūrīndivi | ca | smaidhi | pārye | nendra |
ayā | vājaṁ | devahitaṁ | sanema | madema | śatahimāḥ | suvīrāḥ |
tamu | ṣṭuhi | yo | abhibhūtyojā | vanvannavātaḥ | puruhūtendraḥ |
aṣāḻhamugraṁ | sahamānamābhirgīrbhirvardha | vṛṣabhaṁ | carṣaṇīnām |
sa | yudhmaḥ | satvā | khajakṛtsamadvā | tuvimrakṣo | nadanumām̐ | ṛjīṣī |
bṛhadreṇuścyavano | mānuṣīṇāmekaḥ | kṛṣṭīnāmabhavatsahāvā |
tvaṁ | ha | nu | tyadadamāyo | dasyūm̐rekaḥ | kṛṣṭīravanorāryāya |
asti | svinnu | vīryaṁ | tattendra | na | svidasti | tadṛtuthā | vi | vocaḥ |
sadiddhi | te | tuvijātasya | manye | sahaḥ | sahiṣṭha | turatasturasya |
ugramugrasya | tavasastavīyo'radhrasya | radhraturo | babhūva |
tannaḥ | pratnaṁ | sakhyamastu | yuṣme | itthā | vadadbhirvalamaṅgirobhiḥ |
hannacyutacyuddasmeṣayantamṛṇoḥ | puro | vi | duro | asya | viśvāḥ |
sa | hi | dhībhirhavyo | astyugreśānakṛnmahati | vṛtratūrye |
sa | tokasātā | tanaye | sa | vajrī | vitantasāyyo | abhavatsamatsu |
sa | majmanā | janima | mānuṣāṇāmamartyena | nāmnāti | pra | sarsre |
sa | dyumnena | sa | śavasota | rāyā | sa | vīryeṇa | nṛtamaḥ | samokāḥ |
sa | yo | na | muhe | na | mithū | jano | bhūtsumantunāmā | cumuriṁ | dhuniṁ | ca |
vṛṇakpipruṁ | śambaraṁ | śuṣṇamindraḥ | purāṁ | cyautnāya | śayathāya | nū | cit |
udāvatā | tvakṣasā | panyasā | ca | vṛtrahatyāya | rathamindra | tiṣṭha |
dhiṣva | vajraṁ | hastā | dakṣiṇatrābhi | pra | manda | purudatra | māyāḥ |
agnirna | śuṣkaṁ | vanamindra | hetī | rakṣo | ni | dhakṣyaśanirna | bhīmā |
gambhīraya | ṛṣvayā | yo | rurojādhvānayadduritā | dambhayacca |
ā | sahasraṁ | pathibhirindra | rāyā | tuvidyumna | tuvivājebhirarvāk |
yāhi | sūno | sahaso | yasya | nū | cidadeveśe | puruhūta | yotoḥ |
pra | tuvidyumnasya | sthavirasya | ghṛṣverdivo | rarapśe | mahimā | pṛthivyāḥ |
nāsya | śatrurna | pratimānamasti | na | pratiṣṭhiḥ | purumāyasya | sahyoḥ |
pra | tatte | adyā | karaṇaṁ | kṛtaṁ | bhūtkutsaṁ | yadāyumatithigvamasmai |
purū | sahasrā | ni | śiśābhi | kṣāmuttūrvayāṇaṁ | dhṛṣatā | ninetha |
anu | tvāhighne | adha | deva | devā | madanviśve | kavitamaṁ | kavīnām |
karo | yatra | varivo | bādhitāya | dive | janāya | tanve | gṛṇānaḥ |
anu | dyāvāpṛthivī | tattaujo'martyā | jihatendra | devāḥ |
kṛṣvā | kṛtno | akṛtaṁ | yatte | astyukthaṁ | navīyo | janayasva | yajñaiḥ |
mahām̐ | indro | nṛvadā | carṣaṇiprota | dvibarhāminaḥ | sahobhiḥ |
asmadryagvāvṛdhe | vīryāyoruḥ | pṛthuḥ | sukṛtaḥ | kartṛbhirbhūt |
indrameva | dhiṣaṇā | sātaye | dhādbṛhantamṛṣvamajaraṁ | yuvānam |
aṣāḻhena | śavasā | śūśuvāṁsaṁ | sadyaścidyo | vāvṛdhe | asāmi |
pṛthū | karasnā | bahulā | gabhastī | asmadryaksaṁ | mimīhi | śravāṁsi |
yūtheva | paśvaḥ | paśupā | damūnāsmām̐ | indrābhyā | vavṛtsvājau |
taṁ | vendraṁ | catinamasya | śākairiha | nūnaṁ | vājayanto | huvema |
yathā | citpūrve | jaritārāsuranedyā | anavadyāriṣṭāḥ |
dhṛtavrato | dhanadāḥ | somavṛddhaḥ | sa | hi | vāmasya | vasunaḥ | purukṣuḥ |
saṁ | jagmire | pathyā | rāyo | asmintsamudre | na | sindhavo | yādamānāḥ |
śaviṣṭhaṁ | nā | bhara | śūra | śavaujiṣṭhamojo | abhibhūtogram |
viśvā | dyumnā | vṛṣṇyā | mānuṣāṇāmasmabhyaṁ | dā | harivo | mādayadhyai |
yaste | madaḥ | pṛtanāṣāḻamṛdhrendra | taṁ | nā | bhara | śūśuvāṁsam |
yena | tokasya | tanayasya | sātau | maṁsīmahi | jigīvāṁsastvotāḥ |
ā | no | bhara | vṛṣaṇaṁ | śuṣmamindra | dhanaspṛtaṁ | śūśuvāṁsaṁ | sudakṣam |
yena | vaṁsāma | pṛtanāsu | śatrūntavotibhiruta | jāmīm̐rajāmīn |
ā | te | śuṣmo | vṛṣabhaitu | paścādottarādadharādā | purastāt |
ā | viśvato | abhi | sametvarvāṅindra | dyumnaṁ | svarvaddhehyasme |
nṛvattendra | nṛtamābhirūtī | vaṁsīmahi | vāmaṁ | śromatebhiḥ |
īkṣe | hi | vasvobhayasya | rājandhā | ratnaṁ | mahi | sthūraṁ | bṛhantam |
marutvantaṁ | vṛṣabhaṁ | vāvṛdhānamakavāriṁ | divyaṁ | śāsamindram |
viśvāsāhamavase | nūtanāyograṁ | sahodāmiha | taṁ | huvema |
janaṁ | vajrinmahi | cinmanyamānamebhyo | nṛbhyo | randhayā | yeṣvasmi |
adhā | hi | tvā | pṛthivyāṁ | śūrasātau | havāmahe | tanaye | goṣvapsu |
vayaṁ | taibhiḥ | puruhūta | sakhyaiḥ | śatroḥśatroruttaretsyāma |
ghnanto | vṛtrāṇyubhayāni | śūra | rāyā | madema | bṛhatā | tvotāḥ |
dyaurna | yendrābhi | bhūmāryastasthau | rayiḥ | śavasā | pṛtsu | janān |
taṁ | naḥ | sahasrabharamurvarāsāṁ | daddhi | sūno | sahaso | vṛtraturam |
divo | na | tubhyamanvindra | satrāsuryaṁ | devebhirdhāyi | viśvam |
ahiṁ | yadvṛtramapo | vavrivāṁsaṁ | hannṛjīṣinviṣṇunā | sacānaḥ |
tūrvannojīyāntavasastavīyānkṛtabrahmendro | vṛddhamahāḥ |
rājābhavanmadhunaḥ | somyasya | viśvāsāṁ | yatpurāṁ | dartnumāvat |
śatairapadranpaṇayendrātra | daśoṇaye | kavaye'rkasātau |
vadhaiḥ | śuṣṇasyāśuṣasya | māyāḥ | pitvo | nārirecītkiṁ | cana | pra |
maho | druho | apa | viśvāyu | dhāyi | vajrasya | yatpatane | pādi | śuṣṇaḥ |
uru | ṣa | sarathaṁ | sārathaye | karindraḥ | kutsāya | sūryasya | sātau |
pra | śyeno | na | madiramaṁśumasmai | śiro | dāsasya | namucermathāyan |
prāvannamīṁ | sāpyaṁ | sasantaṁ | pṛṇagrāyā | samiṣā | saṁ | svasti |
vi | piprorahimāyasya | dṛḻhāḥ | puro | vajriñchavasā | na | dardaḥ |
sudāmantadrekṇo | apramṛṣyamṛjiśvane | dātraṁ | dāśuṣe | dāḥ |
sa | vetasuṁ | daśamāyaṁ | daśoṇiṁ | tūtujimindraḥ | svabhiṣṭisumnaḥ |
ā | tugraṁ | śaśvadibhaṁ | dyotanāya | māturna | sīmupa | sṛjeyadhyai |
seṁ | spṛdho | vanate | apratīto | bibhradvajraṁ | vṛtrahaṇaṁ | gabhastau |
tiṣṭhaddharī | adhyasteva | garte | vacoyujā | vahatendramṛṣvam |
sanema | te'vasā | navyendra | pra | pūravaḥ | stavantainā | yajñaiḥ |
sapta | yatpuraḥ | śarma | śāradīrdarddhandāsīḥ | purukutsāya | śikṣan |
tvaṁ | vṛdhendra | pūrvyo | bhūrvarivasyannuśane | kāvyāya |
parā | navavāstvamanudeyaṁ | mahe | pitre | dadātha | svaṁ | napātam |
tvaṁ | dhunirindra | dhunimatīrṛṇorapaḥ | sīrā | na | sravantīḥ |
pra | yatsamudramati | śūra | parṣi | pārayā | turvaśaṁ | yaduṁ | svasti |
tava | ha | tyadindra | viśvamājau | sasto | dhunīcumurī | yā | ha | siṣvap |
dīdayadittubhyaṁ | somebhiḥ | sunvandabhītiridhmabhṛtiḥ | pakthyarkaiḥ |
imo | tvā | purutamasya | kārorhavyaṁ | vīra | havyā | havante |
dhiyo | ratheṣṭhāmajaraṁ | navīyo | rayirvibhūtirīyate | vacasyā |
tamu | stuṣendraṁ | yo | vidāno | girvāhasaṁ | gīrbhiryajñavṛddham |
yasya | divamati | mahnā | pṛthivyāḥ | purumāyasya | ririce | mahitvam |
settamo'vayunaṁ | tatanvatsūryeṇa | vayunavaccakāra |
kadā | te | martāmṛtasya | dhāmeyakṣanto | na | minanti | svadhāvaḥ |
yastā | cakāra | sa | kuha | svidindraḥ | kamā | janaṁ | carati | kāsu | vikṣu |
kaste | yajño | manase | śaṁ | varāya | ko | arkendra | katamaḥ | sa | hotā |
idā | hi | te | veviṣataḥ | purājāḥ | pratnāsāsuḥ | purukṛtsakhāyaḥ |
ye | madhyamāsota | nūtanāsotāvamasya | puruhūta | bodhi |
taṁ | pṛcchanto'varāsaḥ | parāṇi | pratnā | tendra | śrutyānu | yemuḥ |
arcāmasi | vīra | brahmavāho | yādeva | vidma | tāttvā | mahāntam |
abhi | tvā | pājo | rakṣaso | vi | tasthe | mahi | jajñānamabhi | tatsu | tiṣṭha |
tava | pratnena | yujyena | sakhyā | vajreṇa | dhṛṣṇo | apa | tā | nudasva |
sa | tu | śrudhīndra | nūtanasya | brahmaṇyato | vīra | kārudhāyaḥ |
tvaṁ | hyāpiḥ | pradivi | pitṝṇāṁ | śaśvadbabhūtha | suhavaiṣṭau |
protaye | varuṇaṁ | mitramindraṁ | marutaḥ | kṛṣvāvase | no | adya |
pra | pūṣaṇaṁ | viṣṇumagniṁ | puraṁdhiṁ | savitāramoṣadhīḥ | parvatām̐śca |
imo | tvā | puruśāka | prayajyo | jaritāro | abhyarcantyarkaiḥ |
śrudhī | havamā | huvato | huvāno | na | tvāvām̐ | anyo | amṛta | tvadasti |
nū | mā | vācamupa | yāhi | vidvānviśvebhiḥ | sūno | sahaso | yajatraiḥ |
ye | agnijihvā | ṛtasāpāsurye | manuṁ | cakruruparaṁ | dasāya |
sa | no | bodhi | puraetā | sugeṣūta | durgeṣu | pathikṛdvidānaḥ |
ye | aśramāsoravo | vahiṣṭhāstebhirnendrābhi | vakṣi | vājam |
yaika | iddhavyaścarṣaṇīnāmindraṁ | taṁ | gīrbhirabhyarcābhiḥ |
yaḥ | patyate | vṛṣabho | vṛṣṇyāvāntsatyaḥ | satvā | purumāyaḥ | sahasvān |
tamu | naḥ | pūrve | pitaro | navagvāḥ | sapta | viprāso | abhi | vājayantaḥ |
nakṣaddābhaṁ | taturiṁ | parvateṣṭhāmadroghavācaṁ | matibhiḥ | śaviṣṭham |
tamīmahendramasya | rāyaḥ | puruvīrasya | nṛvataḥ | purukṣoḥ |
yo | askṛdhoyurajaraḥ | svarvāntamā | bhara | harivo | mādayadhyai |
tanno | vi | voco | yadi | te | purā | cijjaritārānaśuḥ | sumnamindra |
kaste | bhāgaḥ | kiṁ | vayo | dudhra | khidvaḥ | puruhūta | purūvaso'suraghnaḥ |
taṁ | pṛcchantī | vajrahastaṁ | ratheṣṭhāmindraṁ | vepī | vakvarī | yasya | nū | gīḥ |
tuvigrābhaṁ | tuvikūrmiṁ | rabhodāṁ | gātumiṣe | nakṣate | tumramaccha |
ayā | ha | tyaṁ | māyayā | vāvṛdhānaṁ | manojuvā | svatavaḥ | parvatena |
acyutā | cidvīḻitā | svojo | rujo | vi | dṛḻhā | dhṛṣatā | virapśin |
taṁ | vo | dhiyā | navyasyā | śaviṣṭhaṁ | pratnaṁ | pratnavatparitaṁsayadhyai |
sa | no | vakṣadanimānaḥ | suvahmendro | viśvānyati | durgahāṇi |
ā | janāya | druhvaṇe | pārthivāni | divyāni | dīpayo'ntarikṣā |
tapā | vṛṣanviśvataḥ | śociṣā | tānbrahmadviṣe | śocaya | kṣāmapaśca |
bhuvo | janasya | divyasya | rājā | pārthivasya | jagatastveṣasaṁdṛk |
dhiṣva | vajraṁ | dakṣiṇendra | haste | viśvājurya | dayase | vi | māyāḥ |
ā | saṁyatamindra | ṇaḥ | svastiṁ | śatrutūryāya | bṛhatīmamṛdhrām |
yayā | dāsānyāryāṇi | vṛtrā | karo | vajrintsutukā | nāhuṣāṇi |
sa | no | niyudbhiḥ | puruhūta | vedho | viśvavārābhirā | gahi | prayajyo |
na | yādevo | varate | na | devābhiryāhi | tūyamā | madryadrik |
sutettvaṁ | nimiślendra | some | stome | brahmaṇi | śasyamānokthe |
yadvā | yuktābhyāṁ | maghavanharibhyāṁ | bibhradvajraṁ | bāhvorindra | yāsi |
yadvā | divi | pārye | suṣvimindra | vṛtrahatye'vasi | śūrasātau |
yadvā | dakṣasya | bibhyuṣo | abibhyadarandhayaḥ | śardhatendra | dasyūn |
pātā | sutamindro | astu | somaṁ | praṇenīrugro | jaritāramūtī |
kartā | vīrāya | suṣvayo | lokaṁ | dātā | vasu | stuvate | kīraye | cit |
ganteyānti | savanā | haribhyāṁ | babhrirvajraṁ | papiḥ | somaṁ | dadirgāḥ |
kartā | vīraṁ | naryaṁ | sarvavīraṁ | śrotā | havaṁ | gṛṇataḥ | stomavāhāḥ |
asmai | vayaṁ | yadvāvāna | tadviviṣmendrāya | yo | naḥ | pradivo | apaskaḥ |
sute | some | stumasi | śaṁsadukthendrāya | brahma | vardhanaṁ | yathāsat |
brahmāṇi | hi | cakṛṣe | vardhanāni | tāvattendra | matibhirviviṣmaḥ |
sute | some | sutapāḥ | śaṁtamāni | rāṇḍyā | kriyāsma | vakṣaṇāni | yajñaiḥ |
sa | no | bodhi | puroḻāśaṁ | rarāṇaḥ | pibā | tu | somaṁ | goṛjīkamindra |
edaṁ | barhiryajamānasya | sīdoruṁ | kṛdhi | tvāyato | lokam |
sa | mandasvā | hyanu | joṣamugra | pra | tvā | yajñāseme | aśnuvantu |
preme | havāsaḥ | puruhūtamasme | ā | tveyaṁ | dhīravasendra | yamyāḥ |
taṁ | vaḥ | sakhāyaḥ | saṁ | yathā | suteṣu | somebhirīṁ | pṛṇatā | bhojamindram |
kuvittasmāsati | no | bharāya | na | suṣvimindro'vase | mṛdhāti |
evedindraḥ | sute | astāvi | some | bharadvājeṣu | kṣayadinmaghonaḥ |
asadyathā | jaritrota | sūririndro | rāyo | viśvavārasya | dātā |
vṛṣā | madendre | ślokokthā | sacā | someṣu | sutapā | ṛjīṣī |
arcatryo | maghavā | nṛbhyokthairdyukṣo | rājā | girāmakṣitotiḥ |
taturirvīro | naryo | vicetāḥ | śrotā | havaṁ | gṛṇatorvyūtiḥ |
vasuḥ | śaṁso | narāṁ | kārudhāyā | vājī | stuto | vidathe | dāti | vājam |
akṣo | na | cakryoḥ | śūra | bṛhanpra | te | mahnā | ririce | rodasyoḥ |
vṛkṣasya | nu | te | puruhūta | vayā | vyūtayo | ruruhurindra | pūrvīḥ |
śacīvataste | puruśāka | śākā | gavāmiva | srutayaḥ | saṁcaraṇīḥ |
vatsānāṁ | na | tantayastendra | dāmanvanto | adāmānaḥ | sudāman |
anyadadya | karvaramanyadu | śvo'sacca | sanmuhurācakririndraḥ |
mitro | no | atra | varuṇaśca | pūṣāryo | vaśasya | paryetāsti |
vi | tvadāpo | na | parvatasya | pṛṣṭhādukthebhirindrānayanta | yajñaiḥ |
taṁ | tvābhiḥ | suṣṭutibhirvājayantājiṁ | na | jagmurgirvāho | aśvāḥ |
na | yaṁ | jaranti | śarado | na | māsā | na | dyāvendramavakarśayanti |
vṛddhasya | cidvardhatāmasya | tanūḥ | stomebhirukthaiśca | śasyamānā |
na | vīḻave | namate | na | sthirāya | na | śardhate | dasyujūtāya | stavān |
ajrendrasya | girayaścidṛṣvā | gambhīre | cidbhavati | gādhamasmai |
gambhīreṇa | noruṇāmatrinpreṣo | yandhi | sutapāvanvājān |
stho | ṣūrdhva | ūtī | ariṣaṇyannaktorvyuṣṭau | paritakmyāyām |
sacasva | nāyamavase | abhīketo | vā | tamindra | pāhi | riṣaḥ |
amā | cainamaraṇye | pāhi | riṣo | madema | śatahimāḥ | suvīrāḥ |
yā | totiravamā | yā | paramā | yā | madhyamendra | śuṣminnasti |
tābhirū | ṣu | vṛtrahatye'vīrnaibhiśca | vājairmahānnogra |
ābhiḥ | spṛdho | mithatīrariṣaṇyannamitrasya | vyathayā | manyumindra |
ābhirviśvābhiyujo | viṣūcīrāryāya | viśo'va | tārīrdāsīḥ |
indra | jāmayota | ye'jāmayo'rvācīnāso | vanuṣo | yuyujre |
tvameṣāṁ | vithurā | śavāṁsi | jahi | vṛṣṇyāni | kṛṇuhī | parācaḥ |
śūro | vā | śūraṁ | vanate | śarīraistanūrucā | taruṣi | yatkṛṇvaite |
toke | vā | goṣu | tanaye | yadapsu | vi | krandasī | urvarāsu | bravaite |
nahi | tvā | śūro | na | turo | na | dhṛṣṇurna | tvā | yodho | manyamāno | yuyodha |
indra | nakiṣṭvā | pratyastyeṣāṁ | viśvā | jātānyabhyasi | tāni |
sa | patyatobhayornṛmṇamayoryadī | vedhasaḥ | samithe | havante |
vṛtre | vā | maho | nṛvati | kṣaye | vā | vyacasvantā | yadi | vitantasaite |
adha | smā | te | carṣaṇayo | yadejānindra | trātota | bhavā | varūtā |
asmākāso | ye | nṛtamāso | aryendra | sūrayo | dadhire | puro | naḥ |
anu | te | dāyi | mahendriyāya | satrā | te | viśvamanu | vṛtrahatye |
anu | kṣatramanu | saho | yajatrendra | devebhiranu | te | nṛṣahye |
evā | naḥ | spṛdhaḥ | samajā | samatsvindra | rārandhi | mithatīradevīḥ |
vidyāma | vastoravasā | gṛṇanto | bharadvājota | tendra | nūnam |
śrudhī | nendra | hvayāmasi | tvā | maho | vājasya | sātau | vāvṛṣāṇāḥ |
saṁ | yadviśo'yanta | śūrasātograṁ | no'vaḥ | pārye | ahandāḥ |
tvāṁ | vājī | havate | vājineyo | maho | vājasya | gadhyasya | sātau |
tvāṁ | vṛtreṣvindra | satpatiṁ | tarutraṁ | tvāṁ | caṣṭe | muṣṭihā | goṣu | yudhyan |
tvaṁ | kaviṁ | codayo'rkasātau | tvaṁ | kutsāya | śuṣṇaṁ | dāśuṣe | vark |
tvaṁ | śiro | amarmaṇaḥ | parāhannatithigvāya | śaṁsyaṁ | kariṣyan |
tvaṁ | rathaṁ | pra | bharo | yodhamṛṣvamāvo | yudhyantaṁ | vṛṣabhaṁ | daśadyum |
tvaṁ | tugraṁ | vetasave | sacāhantvaṁ | tujiṁ | gṛṇantamindra | tūtoḥ |
tvaṁ | tadukthamindra | barhaṇā | kaḥ | pra | yacchatā | sahasrā | śūra | darṣi |
ava | girerdāsaṁ | śambaraṁ | hanprāvo | divodāsaṁ | citrābhirūtī |
tvaṁ | śraddhābhirmandasānaḥ | somairdabhītaye | cumurimindra | siṣvap |
tvaṁ | rajiṁ | piṭhīnase | daśasyantśaṣṭiṁ | sahasrā | śacyā | sacāhan |
ahaṁ | cana | tatsūribhirānaśyāṁ | tava | jyāyendra | sumnamojaḥ |
tvayā | yatstavante | sadhavīra | vīrāstrivarūthena | nahuṣā | śaviṣṭha |
vayaṁ | te | asyāmindra | dyumnahūtau | sakhāyaḥ | syāma | mahina | preṣṭhāḥ |
prātardaniḥ | kṣatraśrīrastu | śreṣṭho | ghane | vṛtrāṇāṁ | sanaye | dhanānām |
kimasya | made | kimvasya | pītāvindraḥ | kimasya | sakhye | cakāra |
raṇā | vā | ye | niṣadi | kiṁ | te | asya | purā | vividre | kimu | nūtanāsaḥ |
sadasya | made | sadvasya | pītāvindraḥ | sadasya | sakhye | cakāra |
raṇā | vā | ye | niṣadi | satte | asya | purā | vividre | sadu | nūtanāsaḥ |
nahi | nu | te | mahimanaḥ | samasya | na | maghavanmaghavattvasya | vidma |
na | rādhasorādhaso | nūtanasyendra | nakirdadṛśendriyaṁ | te |
etattyattendriyamaceti | yenāvadhīrvaraśikhasya | śeṣaḥ |
vajrasya | yatte | nihatasya | śuṣmātsvanāccidindra | paramo | dadāra |
vadhīdindro | varaśikhasya | śeṣo'bhyāvartine | cāyamānāya | śikṣan |
vṛcīvato | yaddhariyūpīyāyāṁ | hanpūrve | ardhe | bhiyasāparo | dart |
triṁśacchataṁ | varmiṇendra | sākaṁ | yavyāvatyāṁ | puruhūta | śravasyā |
vṛcīvantaḥ | śarave | patyamānāḥ | pātrā | bhindānā | nyarthānyāyan |
yasya | gāvāvaruṣā | sūyavasyū | antarū | ṣu | carato | rerihāṇā |
sa | sṛñjayāya | turvaśaṁ | parādādvṛcīvato | daivavātāya | śikṣan |
dvayām̐ | agne | rathino | viṁśatiṁ | gā | vadhūmato | maghavā | mahyaṁ | samrāṭ |
abhyāvartī | cāyamāno | dadāti | dūṇāśeyaṁ | dakṣiṇā | pārthavānām |
ā | gāvo | agmannuta | bhadramakrantsīdantu | goṣṭhe | raṇayantvasme |
prajāvatīḥ | pururūpeha | syurindrāya | pūrvīruṣaso | duhānāḥ |
indro | yajvane | pṛṇate | ca | śikṣatyupeddadāti | na | svaṁ | muṣāyati |
bhūyobhūyo | rayimidasya | vardhayannabhinne | khilye | ni | dadhāti | devayum |
na | tā | naśanti | na | dabhāti | taskaro | nāsāmāmitro | vyathirā | dadharṣati |
devām̐śca | yābhiryajate | dadāti | ca | jyogittābhiḥ | sacate | gopatiḥ | saha |
na | tārvā | reṇukakāṭo | aśnute | na | saṁskṛtatramupa | yanti | tābhi |
urugāyamabhayaṁ | tasya | tānu | gāvo | martasya | vi | caranti | yajvanaḥ |
gāvo | bhago | gāvendro | me | acchāngāvaḥ | somasya | prathamasya | bhakṣaḥ |
imā | yā | gāvaḥ | sa | janāsendra | icchāmīddhṛdā | manasā | cidindram |
yūyaṁ | gāvo | medayathā | kṛśaṁ | cidaśrīraṁ | citkṛṇuthā | supratīkam |
bhadraṁ | gṛhaṁ | kṛṇutha | bhadravāco | bṛhadvo | vayocyate | sabhāsu |
prajāvatīḥ | sūyavasaṁ | riśantīḥ | śuddhāpaḥ | suprapāṇe | pibantīḥ |
mā | vaḥ | steneśata | māghaśaṁsaḥ | pari | vo | hetī | rudrasya | vṛjyāḥ |
upedamupaparcanamāsu | goṣūpa | pṛcyatām |
upa | ṛṣabhasya | retasyupendra | tava | vīrye |
indraṁ | vo | naraḥ | sakhyāya | sepurmaho | yantaḥ | sumataye | cakānāḥ |
maho | hi | dātā | vajrahasto | asti | mahāmu | raṇvamavase | yajadhvam |
ā | yasminhaste | naryā | mimikṣurā | rathe | hiraṇyaye | ratheṣṭhāḥ |
ā | raśmayo | gabhastyoḥ | sthūrayorādhvannaśvāso | vṛṣaṇo | yujānāḥ |
śriye | te | pādā | duvā | mimikṣurdhṛṣṇurvajrī | śavasā | dakṣiṇāvān |
vasāno | atkaṁ | surabhiṁ | dṛśe | kaṁ | svarṇa | nṛtaviṣiro | babhūtha |
sa | somāmiślatamaḥ | suto | bhūdyasminpaktiḥ | pacyate | santi | dhānāḥ |
indraṁ | naraḥ | stuvanto | brahmakārokthā | śaṁsanto | devavātatamāḥ |
na | te | antaḥ | śavaso | dhāyyasya | vi | tu | bābadhe | rodasī | mahitvā |
ā | tā | sūriḥ | pṛṇati | tūtujāno | yūthevāpsu | samījamānotī |
evedindraḥ | suhava | ṛṣvo | astūtī | anūtī | hiriśipraḥ | satvā |
evā | hi | jāto | asamātyojāḥ | purū | ca | vṛtrā | hanati | ni | dasyūn |
bhūyedvāvṛdhe | vīryāyam̐ | eko | ajuryo | dayate | vasūni |
pra | ririce | divendraḥ | pṛthivyārdhamidasya | prati | rodasī | ubhe |
adhā | manye | bṛhadasuryamasya | yāni | dādhāra | nakirā | mināti |
divedive | sūryo | darśato | bhūdvi | sadmānyurviyā | sukraturdhāt |
adyā | cinnū | cittadapo | nadīnāṁ | yadābhyo | arado | gātumindra |
ni | parvatādmasado | na | sedustvayā | dṛḻhāni | sukrato | rajāṁsi |
satyamittanna | tvāvām̐ | anyo | astīndra | devo | na | martyo | jyāyān |
ahannahiṁ | pariśayānamarṇo'vāsṛjo | apo | acchā | samudram |
tvamapo | vi | duro | viṣūcīrindra | dṛḻhamarujaḥ | parvatasya |
rājābhavo | jagataścarṣaṇīnāṁ | sākaṁ | sūryaṁ | janayandyāmuṣāsam |
abhūreko | rayipate | rayīṇāmā | hastayoradhithendra | kṛṣṭīḥ |
vi | toke | apsu | tanaye | ca | sūre'vocanta | carṣaṇayo | vivācaḥ |
tvadbhiyendra | pārthivāni | viśvācyutā | ciccyāvayante | rajāṁsi |
dyāvākṣāmā | parvatāso | vanāni | viśvaṁ | dṛḻhaṁ | bhayate | ajmannā | te |
tvaṁ | kutsenābhi | śuṣṇamindrāśuṣaṁ | yudhya | kuyavaṁ | gaviṣṭau |
daśa | prapitve | adha | sūryasya | muṣāyaścakramavive | rapāṁsi |
tvaṁ | śatānyava | śambarasya | puro | jaghanthāpratīni | dasyoḥ |
aśikṣo | yatra | śacyā | śacīvo | divodāsāya | sunvate | sutakre | bharadvājāya | gṛṇate | vasūni |
sa | satyasatvanmahate | raṇāya | rathamā | tiṣṭha | tuvinṛmṇa | bhīmam |
yāhi | prapathinnavasopa | madrikpra | ca | śruta | śrāvaya | carṣaṇibhyaḥ |
apūrvyā | purutamānyasmai | mahe | vīrāya | tavase | turāya |
virapśine | vajriṇe | śaṁtamāni | vacāṁsyāsā | sthavirāya | takṣam |
sa | mātarā | sūryeṇā | kavīnāmavāsayadrujadadriṁ | gṛṇānaḥ |
svādhībhirṛkvabhirvāvaśānodusriyāṇāmasṛjannidānam |
sa | vahnibhirṛkvabhirgoṣu | śaśvanmitajñubhiḥ | purukṛtvā | jigāya |
puraḥ | purohā | sakhibhiḥ | sakhīyandṛḻhā | ruroja | kavibhiḥ | kaviḥ | san |
sa | nīvyābhirjaritāramacchā | maho | vājebhirmahadbhiśca | śuṣmaiḥ |
puruvīrābhirvṛṣabha | kṣitīnāmā | girvaṇaḥ | suvitāya | pra | yāhi |
sa | sargeṇa | śavasā | takto | atyairapendro | dakṣiṇatasturāṣāṭ |
itthā | sṛjānānapāvṛdarthaṁ | divedive | viviṣurapramṛṣyam |
yaujiṣṭha | indra | taṁ | su | no | dā | mado | vṛṣantsvabhiṣṭirdāsvān |
sauvaśvyaṁ | yo | vanavatsvaśvo | vṛtrā | samatsu | sāsahadamitrān |
tvāṁ | hīndrāvase | vivāco | havante | carṣaṇayaḥ | śūrasātau |
tvaṁ | viprebhirvi | paṇīm̐raśāyastvotetsanitā | vājamarvā |
tvaṁ | tām̐ | indrobhayām̐ | amitrāndāsā | vṛtrāṇyāryā | ca | śūra |
vadhīrvaneva | sudhitebhiratkairā | pṛtsu | darṣi | nṛṇāṁ | nṛtama |
sa | tvaṁ | nendrākavābhirūtī | sakhā | viśvāyuravitā | vṛdhe | bhūḥ |
svarṣātā | yaddhvayāmasi | tvā | yudhyanto | nemadhitā | pṛtsu | śūra |
nūnaṁ | nendrāparāya | ca | syā | bhavā | mṛḻīkota | no | abhiṣṭau |
itthā | gṛṇanto | mahinasya | śarmandivi | ṣyāma | pārye | goṣatamāḥ |
saṁ | ca | tve | jagmurgirendra | pūrvīrvi | ca | tvadyanti | vibhvo | manīṣāḥ |
purā | nūnaṁ | ca | stutaya | ṛṣīṇāṁ | paspṛdhrendre | adhyukthārkā |
puruhūto | yaḥ | purugūrta | ṛbhvām̐ | ekaḥ | purupraśasto | asti | yajñaiḥ |
ratho | na | mahe | śavase | yujāno'smābhirindro | anumādyo | bhūt |
na | yaṁ | hiṁsanti | dhītayo | na | vāṇīrindraṁ | nakṣantīdabhi | vardhayantīḥ |
yadi | stotāraḥ | śataṁ | yatsahasraṁ | gṛṇanti | girvaṇasaṁ | śaṁ | tadasmai |
asmaitaddivyarceva | māsā | mimikṣendre | nyayāmi | somaḥ |
janaṁ | na | dhanvannabhi | saṁ | yadāpaḥ | satrā | vāvṛdhurhavanāni | yajñaiḥ |
asmaitanmahyāṅgūṣamasmā | indrāya | stotraṁ | matibhiravāci |
asadyathā | mahati | vṛtratūryendro | viśvāyuravitā | vṛdhaśca |
kadā | bhuvanrathakṣayāṇi | brahma | kadā | stotre | sahasrapoṣyaṁ | dāḥ |
kadā | stomaṁ | vāsayo'sya | rāyā | kadā | dhiyaḥ | karasi | vājaratnāḥ |
karhi | svittadindra | yannṛbhirnṝnvīrairvīrānnīḻayāse | jayājīn |
tridhātu | gādhi | jayāsi | goṣvindra | dyumnaṁ | svarvaddhehyasme |
karhi | svittadindra | yajjaritre | viśvapsu | brahma | kṛṇavaḥ | śaviṣṭha |
kadā | dhiyo | na | niyuto | yuvāse | kadā | gomaghā | havanāni | gacchāḥ |
sa | gomaghā | jaritre | aśvaścandrā | vājaśravaso | adhi | dhehi | pṛkṣaḥ |
pīpihīṣaḥ | sudughāmindra | dhenuṁ | bharadvājeṣu | suruco | rurucyāḥ |
tamā | nūnaṁ | vṛjanamanyathā | cicchūro | yacchakra | vi | duro | gṛṇīṣe |
mā | niraraṁ | śukradughasya | dhenorāṅgirasānbrahmaṇā | vipra | jinva |
satrā | madāsastava | viśvajanyāḥ | satrā | rāyo'dha | ye | pārthivāsaḥ |
satrā | vājānāmabhavo | vibhaktā | yaddeveṣu | dhārayathāsuryam |
anu | pra | yeje | janaujo | asya | satrā | dadhire | anu | vīryāya |
syūmagṛbhe | dudhaye'rvate | ca | kratuṁ | vṛñjantyapi | vṛtrahatye |
taṁ | sadhrīcīrūtayo | vṛṣṇyāni | pauṁsyāni | niyutaḥ | saścurindram |
samudraṁ | na | sindhavokthaśuṣmā | uruvyacasaṁ | girā | viśanti |
sa | rāyaskhāmupa | sṛjā | gṛṇānaḥ | puruścandrasya | tvamindra | vasvaḥ |
patirbabhūthāsamo | janānāmeko | viśvasya | bhuvanasya | rājā |
sa | tu | śrudhi | śrutyā | yo | duvoyurdyaurna | bhūmābhi | rāyo | aryaḥ |
aso | yathā | naḥ | śavasā | cakāno | yugeyuge | vayasā | cekitānaḥ |
arvāgrathaṁ | viśvavāraṁ | togrendra | yuktāso | harayo | vahantu |
kīriściddhi | tvā | havate | svarvānṛdhīmahi | sadhamādaste | adya |
pro | droṇe | harayaḥ | karmāgmanpunānāsa | ṛjyanto | abhūvan |
indro | no | asya | pūrvyaḥ | papīyāddyukṣo | madasya | somyasya | rājā |
āsasrāṇāsaḥ | śavasānamacchendraṁ | sucakre | rathyāso | aśvāḥ |
abhi | śrava | ṛjyanto | vaheyurnū | cinnu | vāyoramṛtaṁ | vi | dasyet |
variṣṭho | asya | dakṣiṇāmiyartīndro | maghonāṁ | tuvikūrmitamaḥ |
yayā | vajrivaḥ | pariyāsyaṁho | maghā | ca | dhṛṣṇo | dayase | vi | sūrīn |
indro | vājasya | sthavirasya | dātendro | gīrbhirvardhatāṁ | vṛddhamahāḥ |
indro | vṛtraṁ | haniṣṭho | astu | satvā | tā | sūriḥ | pṛṇati | tūtujānaḥ |
apāditodu | naścitratamo | mahīṁ | bharṣaddyumatīmindrahūtim |
panyasīṁ | dhītiṁ | daivyasya | yāmañjanasya | rātiṁ | vanate | sudānuḥ |
dūrāccidā | vasato | asya | karṇā | ghoṣādindrasya | tanyati | bruvāṇaḥ |
eyamenaṁ | devahūtirvavṛtyānmadryagindramiyamṛcyamānā |
taṁ | vo | dhiyā | paramayā | purājāmajaramindramabhyanūṣyarkaiḥ |
brahmā | ca | giro | dadhire | samasminmahām̐śca | stomo | adhi | vardhadindre |
vardhādyaṁ | yajñota | somendraṁ | vardhādbrahma | girokthā | ca | manma |
vardhāhainamuṣaso | yāmannaktorvardhānmāsāḥ | śarado | dyāvendram |
evā | jajñānaṁ | sahase | asāmi | vāvṛdhānaṁ | rādhase | ca | śrutāya |
mahāmugramavase | vipra | nūnamā | vivāsema | vṛtratūryeṣu |
mandrasya | kaverdivyasya | vahnervipramanmano | vacanasya | madhvaḥ |
apā | nastasya | sacanasya | deveṣo | yuvasva | gṛṇate | goagrāḥ |
ayamuśānaḥ | paryadrimusrā | ṛtadhītibhirṛtayugyujānaḥ |
rujadarugṇaṁ | vi | valasya | sānuṁ | paṇīm̐rvacobhirabhi | yodhadindraḥ |
ayaṁ | dyotayadadyuto | vyaktūndoṣā | vastoḥ | śaradendurindra |
imaṁ | ketumadadhurnū | cidahnāṁ | śucijanmanoṣasaścakāra |
ayaṁ | rocayadaruco | rucāno'yaṁ | vāsayadvyṛtena | pūrvīḥ |
ayamīyata | ṛtayugbhiraśvaiḥ | svarvidā | nābhinā | carṣaṇiprāḥ |
nū | gṛṇāno | gṛṇate | pratna | rājanniṣaḥ | pinva | vasudeyāya | pūrvīḥ |
apauṣadhīraviṣā | vanāni | gārvato | nṝnṛcase | rirīhi |
indra | piba | tubhyaṁ | suto | madāyāva | sya | harī | vi | mucā | sakhāyā |
uta | pra | gāya | gaṇā | niṣadyāthā | yajñāya | gṛṇate | vayo | dhāḥ |
asya | piba | yasya | jajñānendra | madāya | kratve | apibo | virapśin |
tamu | te | gāvo | narāpo | adririnduṁ | samahyanpītaye | samasmai |
samiddhe | agnau | sutendra | somā | tvā | vahantu | harayo | vahiṣṭhāḥ |
tvāyatā | manasā | johavīmīndrā | yāhi | suvitāya | mahe | naḥ |
ā | yāhi | śaśvaduśatā | yayāthendra | mahā | manasā | somapeyam |
upa | brahmāṇi | śṛṇavemā | no'thā | te | yajñastanve | vayo | dhāt |
yadindra | divi | pārye | yadṛdhagyadvā | sve | sadane | yatra | vāsi |
ato | no | yajñamavase | niyutvāntsajoṣāḥ | pāhi | girvaṇo | marudbhiḥ |
aheḻamānopa | yāhi | yajñaṁ | tubhyaṁ | pavantendavaḥ | sutāsaḥ |
gāvo | na | vajrintsvamoko | acchendrā | gahi | prathamo | yajñiyānām |
yā | te | kākutsukṛtā | yā | variṣṭhā | yayā | śaśvatpibasi | madhvormim |
tayā | pāhi | pra | te | adhvaryurasthātsaṁ | te | vajro | vartatāmindra | gavyuḥ |
eṣa | drapso | vṛṣabho | viśvarūpendrāya | vṛṣṇe | samakāri | somaḥ |
etaṁ | piba | harivaḥ | sthātarugra | yasyeśiṣe | pradivi | yaste | annam |
sutaḥ | somo | asutādindra | vasyānayaṁ | śreyāñcikituṣe | raṇāya |
etaṁ | titirvopa | yāhi | yajñaṁ | tena | viśvāstaviṣīrā | pṛṇasva |
hvayāmasi | tvendra | yāhyarvāṅaraṁ | te | somastanve | bhavāti |
śatakrato | mādayasvā | suteṣu | prāsmām̐ | ava | pṛtanāsu | pra | vikṣu |
pratyasmai | pipīṣate | viśvāni | viduṣe | bhara |
araṁgamāya | jagmaye'paścāddaghvane | nare |
emenaṁ | pratyetana | somebhiḥ | somapātamam |
amatrebhirṛjīṣiṇamindraṁ | sutebhirindubhiḥ |
yadī | sutebhirindubhiḥ | somebhiḥ | pratibhūṣatha |
vedā | viśvasya | medhiro | dhṛṣattaṁtamideṣate |
asmāasmedandhaso'dhvaryo | pra | bharā | sutam |
kuvitsamasya | jenyasya | śardhato'bhiśasteravasparat |
yasya | tyacchambaraṁ | made | divodāsāya | randhayaḥ |
ayaṁ | sa | somendra | te | sutaḥ | piba |
yasya | tīvrasutaṁ | madaṁ | madhyamantaṁ | ca | rakṣase |
ayaṁ | sa | somendra | te | sutaḥ | piba |
yasya | gāntaraśmano | made | dṛḻhāvāsṛjaḥ |
ayaṁ | sa | somendra | te | sutaḥ | piba |
yasya | mandāno | andhaso | māghonaṁ | dadhiṣe | śavaḥ |
ayaṁ | sa | somendra | te | sutaḥ | piba |
yo | rayivo | rayiṁtamo | yo | dyumnairdyumnavattamaḥ |
somaḥ | sutaḥ | sendra | te'sti | svadhāpate | madaḥ |
yaḥ | śagmastuviśagma | te | rāyo | dāmā | matīnām |
somaḥ | sutaḥ | sendra | te'sti | svadhāpate | madaḥ |
yena | vṛddho | na | śavasā | turo | na | svābhirūtibhiḥ |
somaḥ | sutaḥ | sendra | te'sti | svadhāpate | madaḥ |
tyamu | vo | aprahaṇaṁ | gṛṇīṣe | śavasaspatim |
indraṁ | viśvāsāhaṁ | naraṁ | maṁhiṣṭhaṁ | viśvacarṣaṇim |
yaṁ | vardhayantīdgiraḥ | patiṁ | turasya | rādhasaḥ |
taminnvasya | rodasī | devī | śuṣmaṁ | saparyataḥ |
tadvokthasya | barhaṇendrāyopastṛṇīṣaṇi |
vipo | na | yasyotayo | vi | yadrohanti | sakṣitaḥ |
avidaddakṣaṁ | mitro | navīyānpapāno | devebhyo | vasyo | acait |
sasavāntstaulābhirdhautarībhiruruṣyā | pāyurabhavatsakhibhyaḥ |
ṛtasya | pathi | vedhāpāyi | śriye | manāṁsi | devāso | akran |
dadhāno | nāma | maho | vacobhirvapurdṛśaye | venyo | vyāvaḥ |
dyumattamaṁ | dakṣaṁ | dhehyasme | sedhā | janānāṁ | pūrvīrarātīḥ |
varṣīyo | vayaḥ | kṛṇuhi | śacībhirdhanasya | sātāvasmām̐ | aviḍḍhi |
indra | tubhyaminmaghavannabhūma | vayaṁ | dātre | harivo | mā | vi | venaḥ |
nakirāpirdadṛśe | martyatrā | kimaṅga | radhracodanaṁ | tvāhuḥ |
mā | jasvane | vṛṣabha | no | rarīthā | mā | te | revataḥ | sakhye | riṣāma |
pūrvīṣṭendra | niṣṣidho | janeṣu | jahyasuṣvīnpra | vṛhāpṛṇataḥ |
udabhrāṇīva | stanayanniyartīndro | rādhāṁsyaśvyāni | gavyā |
tvamasi | pradivaḥ | kārudhāyā | mā | tvādāmānā | dabhanmaghonaḥ |
adhvaryo | vīra | pra | mahe | sutānāmindrāya | bhara | sa | hyasya | rājā |
yaḥ | pūrvyābhiruta | nūtanābhirgīrbhirvāvṛdhe | gṛṇatāmṛṣīṇām |
asya | made | puru | varpāṁsi | vidvānindro | vṛtrāṇyapratī | jaghāna |
tamu | pra | hoṣi | madhumantamasmai | somaṁ | vīrāya | śipriṇe | pibadhyai |
pātā | sutamindro | astu | somaṁ | hantā | vṛtraṁ | vajreṇa | mandasānaḥ |
gantā | yajñaṁ | parāvataścidacchā | vasurdhīnāmavitā | kārudhāyāḥ |
idaṁ | tyatpātramindrapānamindrasya | priyamamṛtamapāyi |
matsadyathā | saumanasāya | devaṁ | vyasmaddveṣo | yuyavadvyaṁhaḥ |
enā | mandāno | jahi | śūra | śatrūñjāmimajāmiṁ | maghavannamitrān |
abhiṣeṇām̐ | abhyādediśānānparācendra | pra | mṛṇā | jahī | ca |
āsu | ṣmā | ṇo | maghavannindra | pṛtsvasmabhyaṁ | mahi | varivaḥ | sugaṁ | kaḥ |
apāṁ | tokasya | tanayasya | jeṣendra | sūrīnkṛṇuhi | smā | no | ardham |
ā | tvā | harayo | vṛṣaṇo | yujānā | vṛṣarathāso | vṛṣaraśmayo'tyāḥ |
asmatrāñco | vṛṣaṇo | vajravāho | vṛṣṇe | madāya | suyujo | vahantu |
ā | te | vṛṣanvṛṣaṇo | droṇamasthurghṛtapruṣo | normayo | madantaḥ |
indra | pra | tubhyaṁ | vṛṣabhiḥ | sutānāṁ | vṛṣṇe | bharanti | vṛṣabhāya | somam |
vṛṣāsi | divo | vṛṣabhaḥ | pṛthivyā | vṛṣā | sindhūnāṁ | vṛṣabhaḥ | stiyānām |
vṛṣṇe | tendurvṛṣabha | pīpāya | svādū | raso | madhupeyo | varāya |
ayaṁ | devaḥ | sahasā | jāyamānendreṇa | yujā | paṇimastabhāyat |
ayaṁ | svasya | piturāyudhānīnduramuṣṇādaśivasya | māyāḥ |
ayamakṛṇoduṣasaḥ | supatnīrayaṁ | sūrye | adadhājjyotirantaḥ |
ayaṁ | tridhātu | divi | rocaneṣu | triteṣu | vindadamṛtaṁ | nigūḻham |
ayaṁ | dyāvāpṛthivī | vi | ṣkabhāyadayaṁ | rathamayunaksaptaraśmim |
ayaṁ | goṣu | śacyā | pakvamantaḥ | somo | dādhāra | daśayantramutsam |
yānayatparāvataḥ | sunītī | turvaśaṁ | yadum |
indraḥ | sa | no | yuvā | sakhā |
avipre | cidvayo | dadhadanāśunā | cidarvatā |
indro | jetā | hitaṁ | dhanam |
mahīrasya | praṇītayaḥ | pūrvīruta | praśastayaḥ |
nāsya | kṣīyantotayaḥ |
sakhāyo | brahmavāhase'rcata | pra | ca | gāyata |
sa | hi | naḥ | pramatirmahī |
tvamekasya | vṛtrahannavitā | dvayorasi |
utedṛśe | yathā | vayam |
nayasīdvati | dviṣaḥ | kṛṇoṣyukthaśaṁsinaḥ |
nṛbhiḥ | suvīrocyase |
brahmāṇaṁ | brahmavāhasaṁ | gīrbhiḥ | sakhāyamṛgmiyam |
gāṁ | na | dohase | huve |
yasya | viśvāni | hastayorūcurvasūni | ni | dvitā |
vīrasya | pṛtanāṣahaḥ |
vi | dṛḻhāni | cidadrivo | janānāṁ | śacīpate |
vṛha | māyānānata |
tamu | tvā | satya | somapendra | vājānāṁ | pate |
ahūmahi | śravasyavaḥ |
tamu | tvā | yaḥ | purāsitha | yo | vā | nūnaṁ | hite | dhane |
havyaḥ | sa | śrudhī | havam |
dhībhirarvadbhirarvato | vājām̐ | indra | śravāyyān |
tvayā | jeṣma | hitaṁ | dhanam |
abhūru | vīra | girvaṇo | mahām̐ | indra | dhane | hite |
bhare | vitantasāyyaḥ |
yā | totiramitrahanmakṣūjavastamāsati |
tayā | no | hinuhī | ratham |
sa | rathena | rathītamo'smākenābhiyugvanā |
jeṣi | jiṣṇo | hitaṁ | dhanam |
yaika | ittamu | ṣṭuhi | kṛṣṭīnāṁ | vicarṣaṇiḥ |
patirjajñe | vṛṣakratuḥ |
yo | gṛṇatāmidāsithāpirūtī | śivaḥ | sakhā |
sa | tvaṁ | nendra | mṛḻaya |
dhiṣva | vajraṁ | gabhastyo | rakṣohatyāya | vajrivaḥ |
sāsahīṣṭhābhi | spṛdhaḥ |
pratnaṁ | rayīṇāṁ | yujaṁ | sakhāyaṁ | kīricodanam |
brahmavāhastamaṁ | huve |
sa | hi | viśvāni | pārthivām̐ | eko | vasūni | patyate |
girvaṇastamo | adhriguḥ |
sa | no | niyudbhirā | pṛṇa | kāmaṁ | vājebhiraśvibhiḥ |
gomadbhirgopate | dhṛṣat |
tadvo | gāya | sute | sacā | puruhūtāya | satvane |
śaṁ | yadgave | na | śākine |
na | ghā | vasurni | yamate | dānaṁ | vājasya | gomataḥ |
yatsīmupa | śravadgiraḥ |
kuvitsasya | pra | hi | vrajaṁ | gomantaṁ | dasyuhā | gamat |
śacībhirapa | no | varat |
imo | tvā | śatakrato'bhi | pra | ṇonuvurgiraḥ |
indra | vatsaṁ | na | mātaraḥ |
dūṇāśaṁ | sakhyaṁ | tava | gaurasi | vīra | gavyate |
aśvo | aśvāyate | bhava |
sa | mandasvā | hyandhaso | rādhase | tanvā | mahe |
na | stotāraṁ | nide | karaḥ |
imo | tvā | sutesute | nakṣante | girvaṇo | giraḥ |
vatsaṁ | gāvo | na | dhenavaḥ |
purūtamaṁ | purūṇāṁ | stotṝṇāṁ | vivāci |
vājebhirvājayatām |
asmākamindra | bhūtu | te | stomo | vāhiṣṭho | antamaḥ |
asmānrāye | mahe | hinu |
adhi | bṛbuḥ | paṇīnāṁ | varṣiṣṭhe | mūrdhannasthāt |
uruḥ | kakṣo | na | gāṅgyaḥ |
yasya | vāyoriva | dravadbhadrā | rātiḥ | sahasriṇī |
sadyo | dānāya | maṁhate |
tatsu | no | viśve | aryā | sadā | gṛṇanti | kāravaḥ |
bṛbuṁ | sahasradātamaṁ | sūriṁ | sahasrasātamam |
tvāmiddhi | havāmahe | sātā | vājasya | kāravaḥ |
tvāṁ | vṛtreṣvindra | satpatiṁ | narastvāṁ | kāṣṭhāsvarvataḥ |
sa | tvaṁ | naścitra | vajrahasta | dhṛṣṇuyā | mahaḥ | stavāno | adrivaḥ |
gāmaśvaṁ | rathyamindra | saṁ | kira | satrā | vājaṁ | na | jigyuṣe |
yaḥ | satrāhā | vicarṣaṇirindraṁ | taṁ | hūmahe | vayam |
sahasramuṣka | tuvinṛmṇa | satpate | bhavā | samatsu | no | vṛdhe |
bādhase | janānvṛṣabheva | manyunā | ghṛṣau | mīḻha | ṛcīṣama |
asmākaṁ | bodhyavitā | mahādhane | tanūṣvapsu | sūrye |
indra | jyeṣṭhaṁ | nā | bharam̐ | ojiṣṭhaṁ | papuri | śravaḥ |
yeneme | citra | vajrahasta | rodasī | obhe | suśipra | prāḥ |
tvāmugramavase | carṣaṇīsahaṁ | rājandeveṣu | hūmahe |
viśvā | su | no | vithurā | pibdanā | vaso'mitrāntsuṣahānkṛdhi |
yadindra | nāhuṣīṣvām̐ | ojo | nṛmṇaṁ | ca | kṛṣṭiṣu |
yadvā | pañca | kṣitīnāṁ | dyumnamā | bhara | satrā | viśvāni | pauṁsyā |
yadvā | tṛkṣau | maghavandruhyāvā | jane | yatpūrau | kacca | vṛṣṇyam |
asmabhyaṁ | tadrirīhi | saṁ | nṛṣāhye'mitrānpṛtsu | turvaṇe |
indra | tridhātu | śaraṇaṁ | trivarūthaṁ | svastimat |
chardiryaccha | maghavadbhyaśca | mahyaṁ | ca | yāvayā | didyumebhyaḥ |
ye | gavyatā | manasā | śatrumādabhurabhipraghnanti | dhṛṣṇuyā |
adha | smā | no | maghavannindra | girvaṇastanūpāntamo | bhava |
adha | smā | no | vṛdhe | bhavendra | nāyamavā | yudhi |
yadantarikṣe | patayanti | parṇino | didyavastigmamūrdhānaḥ |
yatra | śūrāsastanvo | vitanvate | priyā | śarma | pitṝṇām |
adha | smā | yaccha | tanve | tane | ca | chardiracittaṁ | yāvaya | dveṣaḥ |
yadindra | sarge | arvataścodayāse | mahādhane |
asamane | adhvani | vṛjine | pathi | śyenām̐ | iva | śravasyataḥ |
sindhūm̐riva | pravaṇāśuyā | yato | yadi | klośamanu | ṣvaṇi |
ā | ye | vayo | na | varvṛtatyāmiṣi | gṛbhītā | bāhvorgavi |
svāduṣkilāyaṁ | madhumām̐ | utāyaṁ | tīvraḥ | kilāyaṁ | rasavām̐ | utāyam |
uto | nvasya | papivāṁsamindraṁ | na | kaścana | sahatāhaveṣu |
ayaṁ | svāduriha | madiṣṭhāsa | yasyendro | vṛtrahatye | mamāda |
purūṇi | yaścyautnā | śambarasya | vi | navatiṁ | nava | ca | dehyo | han |
ayaṁ | me | pītodiyarti | vācamayaṁ | manīṣāmuśatīmajīgaḥ |
ayaṁ | ṣaḻurvīramimīta | dhīro | na | yābhyo | bhuvanaṁ | kaccanāre |
ayaṁ | sa | yo | varimāṇaṁ | pṛthivyā | varṣmāṇaṁ | divo | akṛṇodayaṁ | saḥ |
ayaṁ | pīyūṣaṁ | tisṛṣu | pravatsu | somo | dādhārorvantarikṣam |
ayaṁ | vidaccitradṛśīkamarṇaḥ | śukrasadmanāmuṣasāmanīke |
ayaṁ | mahānmahatā | skambhanenoddyāmastabhnādvṛṣabho | marutvān |
dhṛṣatpiba | kalaśe | somamindra | vṛtrahā | śūra | samare | vasūnām |
mādhyaṁdine | savanā | vṛṣasva | rayisthāno | rayimasmāsu | dhehi |
indra | pra | ṇaḥ | puraeteva | paśya | pra | no | naya | prataraṁ | vasyo | accha |
bhavā | supāro | atipārayo | no | bhavā | sunītiruta | vāmanītiḥ |
uruṁ | no | lokamanu | neṣi | vidvāntsvarvajjyotirabhayaṁ | svasti |
ṛṣvā | tendra | sthavirasya | bāhūpa | stheyāma | śaraṇā | bṛhantā |
variṣṭhe | nendra | vandhure | dhā | vahiṣṭhayoḥ | śatāvannaśvayorā |
iṣamā | vakṣīṣāṁ | varṣiṣṭhāṁ | mā | nastārīnmaghavanrāyo | aryaḥ |
indra | mṛḻa | mahyaṁ | jīvātumiccha | codaya | dhiyamayaso | na | dhārām |
yatkiṁ | cāhaṁ | tvāyuridaṁ | vadāmi | tajjuṣasva | kṛdhi | mā | devavantam |
trātāramindramavitāramindraṁ | havehave | suhavaṁ | śūramindram |
hvayāmi | śakraṁ | puruhūtamindraṁ | svasti | no | maghavā | dhātvindraḥ |
indraḥ | sutrāmā | svavām̐ | avobhiḥ | sumṛḻīko | bhavatu | viśvavedāḥ |
bādhatāṁ | dveṣo | abhayaṁ | kṛṇotu | suvīryasya | patayaḥ | syāma |
tasya | vayaṁ | sumatau | yajñiyasyāpi | bhadre | saumanase | syāma |
sa | sutrāmā | svavām̐ | indro | asme | ārācciddveṣaḥ | sanutaryuyotu |
ava | tve | indra | pravato | normirgiro | brahmāṇi | niyuto | dhavante |
urū | na | rādhaḥ | savanā | purūṇyapo | gā | vajrinyuvase | samindūn |
keṁ | stavatkaḥ | pṛṇātko | yajāte | yadugraminmaghavā | viśvahāvet |
pādāviva | praharannanyamanyaṁ | kṛṇoti | pūrvamaparaṁ | śacībhiḥ |
śṛṇve | vīrogramugraṁ | damāyannanyamanyamatinenīyamānaḥ |
edhamānadviḻubhayasya | rājā | coṣkūyate | viśendro | manuṣyān |
parā | pūrveṣāṁ | sakhyā | vṛṇakti | vitarturāṇo | aparebhireti |
anānubhūtīravadhūnvānaḥ | pūrvīrindraḥ | śaradastartarīti |
rūpaṁrūpaṁ | pratirūpo | babhūva | tadasya | rūpaṁ | praticakṣaṇāya |
indro | māyābhiḥ | pururūpeyate | yuktā | hyasya | harayaḥ | śatā | daśa |
yujāno | haritā | rathe | bhūri | tvaṣṭeha | rājati |
ko | viśvāhā | dviṣataḥ | pakṣāsata | utāsīneṣu | sūriṣu |
agavyūti | kṣetramāganma | devorvī | satī | bhūmiraṁhūraṇābhūt |
bṛhaspate | pra | cikitsā | gaviṣṭāvitthā | sate | jaritrendra | panthām |
divedive | sadṛśīranyamardhaṁ | kṛṣṇāsedhadapa | sadmano | jāḥ |
ahandāsā | vṛṣabho | vasnayantodavraje | varcinaṁ | śambaraṁ | ca |
prastokennu | rādhasastendra | daśa | kośayīrdaśa | vājino'dāt |
divodāsādatithigvasya | rādhaḥ | śāmbaraṁ | vasu | pratyagrabhīṣma |
daśāśvāndaśa | kośāndaśa | vastrādhibhojanā |
daśo | hiraṇyapiṇḍāndivodāsādasāniṣam |
daśa | rathānpraṣṭimataḥ | śataṁ | gātharvabhyaḥ |
aśvathaḥ | pāyave'dāt |
mahi | rādho | viśvajanyaṁ | dadhānānbharadvājāntsārñjayo | abhyayaṣṭa |
vanaspate | vīḍvaṅgo | hi | bhūyāsmatsakhā | prataraṇaḥ | suvīraḥ |
gobhiḥ | saṁnaddho | asi | vīḻayasvāsthātā | te | jayatu | jetvāni |
divaspṛthivyāḥ | paryojodbhṛtaṁ | vanaspatibhyaḥ | paryābhṛtaṁ | sahaḥ |
apāmojmānaṁ | pari | gobhirāvṛtamindrasya | vajraṁ | haviṣā | rathaṁ | yaja |
indrasya | vajro | marutāmanīkaṁ | mitrasya | garbho | varuṇasya | nābhiḥ |
semāṁ | no | havyadātiṁ | juṣāṇo | deva | ratha | prati | havyā | gṛbhāya |
upa | śvāsaya | pṛthivīmuta | dyāṁ | purutrā | te | manutāṁ | viṣṭhitaṁ | jagat |
sa | dundubhe | sajūrindreṇa | devairdūrāddavīyo | apa | sedha | śatrūn |
ā | krandaya | balamojo | nā | dhā | niḥ | ṣṭanihi | duritā | bādhamānaḥ |
apa | protha | dundubhe | ducchuneta | indrasya | muṣṭirasi | vīḻayasva |
āmūraja | pratyāvartayemāḥ | ketumaddundubhirvāvadīti |
samaśvaparṇāścaranti | no | naro'smākamindra | rathino | jayantu |
yajñāyajñā | vo | agnaye | girāgirā | ca | dakṣase |
prapra | vayamamṛtaṁ | jātavedasaṁ | priyaṁ | mitraṁ | na | śaṁsiṣam |
ūrjo | napātaṁ | sa | hināyamasmayurdāśema | havyadātaye |
bhuvadvājeṣvavitā | bhuvadvṛdhota | trātā | tanūnām |
vṛṣā | hyagne | ajaro | mahānvibhāsyarciṣā |
ajasreṇa | śociṣā | śośucacchuce | sudītibhiḥ | su | dīdihi |
maho | devānyajasi | yakṣyānuṣaktava | kratvota | daṁsanā |
arvācaḥ | sīṁ | kṛṇuhyagne'vase | rāsva | vājota | vaṁsva |
yamāpo | adrayo | vanā | garbhamṛtasya | piprati |
sahasā | yo | mathito | jāyate | nṛbhiḥ | pṛthivyādhi | sānavi |
ā | yaḥ | paprau | bhānunā | rodasī | ubhe | dhūmena | dhāvate | divi |
tirastamo | dadṛśormyāsvā | śyāvāsvaruṣo | vṛṣā | śyāvāruṣo | vṛṣā |
bṛhadbhiragne | arcibhiḥ | śukreṇa | deva | śociṣā |
bharadvāje | samidhāno | yaviṣṭhya | revannaḥ | śukra | dīdihi | dyumatpāvaka | dīdihi |
viśvāsāṁ | gṛhapatirviśāmasi | tvamagne | mānuṣīṇām |
śataṁ | pūrbhiryaviṣṭha | pāhyaṁhasaḥ | sameddhāraṁ | śataṁ | himāḥ | stotṛbhyo | ye | ca | dadati |
tvaṁ | naścitrotyā | vaso | rādhāṁsi | codaya |
asya | rāyastvamagne | rathīrasi | vidā | gādhaṁ | tuce | tu | naḥ |
parṣi | tokaṁ | tanayaṁ | partṛbhiṣṭvamadabdhairaprayutvabhiḥ |
agne | heḻāṁsi | daivyā | yuyodhi | no'devāni | hvarāṁsi | ca |
ā | sakhāyaḥ | sabardughāṁ | dhenumajadhvamupa | navyasā | vacaḥ |
sṛjadhvamanapasphurām |
yā | śardhāya | mārutāya | svabhānave | śravo'mṛtyu | dhukṣata |
yā | mṛḻīke | marutāṁ | turāṇāṁ | yā | sumnairevayāvarī |
bharadvājāyāva | dhukṣata | dvitā |
dhenuṁ | ca | viśvadohasamiṣaṁ | ca | viśvabhojasam |
taṁ | vendraṁ | na | sukratuṁ | varuṇamiva | māyinam |
aryamaṇaṁ | na | mandraṁ | sṛprabhojasaṁ | viṣṇuṁ | na | stuṣādiśe |
tveṣaṁ | śardho | na | mārutaṁ | tuviṣvaṇyanarvāṇaṁ | pūṣaṇaṁ | saṁ | yathā | śatā |
saṁ | sahasrā | kāriṣaccarṣaṇibhyām̐ | āvirgūḻhā | vasū | karatsuvedā | no | vasū | karat |
ā | mā | pūṣannupa | drava | śaṁsiṣaṁ | nu | te | apikarṇāghṛṇe |
aghāryo | arātayaḥ |
mā | kākambīramudvṛho | vanaspatimaśastīrvi | hi | nīnaśaḥ |
mota | sūro | ahaivā | cana | grīvādadhate | veḥ |
dṛteriva | te'vṛkamastu | sakhyam |
acchidrasya | dadhanvataḥ | supūrṇasya | dadhanvataḥ |
paro | hi | martyairasi | samo | devairuta | śriyā |
abhi | khyaḥ | pūṣanpṛtanāsu | nastvamavā | nūnaṁ | yathā | purā |
vāmī | vāmasya | dhūtayaḥ | praṇītirastu | sūnṛtā |
devasya | vā | maruto | martyasya | vejānasya | prayajyavaḥ |
sadyaścidyasya | carkṛtiḥ | pari | dyāṁ | devo | naiti | sūryaḥ |
tveṣaṁ | śavo | dadhire | nāma | yajñiyaṁ | maruto | vṛtrahaṁ | śavo | jyeṣṭhaṁ | vṛtrahaṁ | śavaḥ |
sakṛddha | dyaurajāyata | sakṛdbhūmirajāyata |
pṛśnyā | dugdhaṁ | sakṛtpayastadanyo | nānu | jāyate |
stuṣe | janaṁ | suvrataṁ | navyasībhirgīrbhirmitrāvaruṇā | sumnayantā |
tā | gamantu | teha | śruvantu | sukṣatrāso | varuṇo | mitro | agniḥ |
viśoviśeḍyamadhvareṣvadṛptakratumaratiṁ | yuvatyoḥ |
divaḥ | śiśuṁ | sahasaḥ | sūnumagniṁ | yajñasya | ketumaruṣaṁ | yajadhyai |
aruṣasya | duhitarā | virūpe | stṛbhiranyā | pipiśe | sūro | anyā |
mithasturā | vicarantī | pāvake | manma | śrutaṁ | nakṣata | ṛcyamāne |
pra | vāyumacchā | bṛhatī | manīṣā | bṛhadrayiṁ | viśvavāraṁ | rathaprām |
dyutadyāmā | niyutaḥ | patyamānaḥ | kaviḥ | kavimiyakṣasi | prayajyo |
sa | me | vapuśchadayadaśvinoryo | ratho | virukmānmanasā | yujānaḥ |
yena | narā | nāsatyeṣayadhyai | vartiryāthastanayāya | tmane | ca |
parjanyavātā | vṛṣabhā | pṛthivyāḥ | purīṣāṇi | jinvatamapyāni |
satyaśrutaḥ | kavayo | yasya | gīrbhirjagataḥ | sthātarjagadā | kṛṇudhvam |
pāvīravī | kanyā | citrāyuḥ | sarasvatī | vīrapatnī | dhiyaṁ | dhāt |
gnābhiracchidraṁ | śaraṇaṁ | sajoṣā | durādharṣaṁ | gṛṇate | śarma | yaṁsat |
pathaspathaḥ | paripatiṁ | vacasyā | kāmena | kṛto | abhyānaḻarkam |
sa | no | rāsacchurudhaścandrāgrā | dhiyaṁdhiyaṁ | sīṣadhāti | pra | pūṣā |
prathamabhājaṁ | yaśasaṁ | vayodhāṁ | supāṇiṁ | devaṁ | sugabhastimṛbhvam |
hotā | yakṣadyajataṁ | pastyānāmagnistvaṣṭāraṁ | suhavaṁ | vibhāvā |
bhuvanasya | pitaraṁ | gīrbhirābhī | rudraṁ | divā | vardhayā | rudramaktau |
bṛhantamṛṣvamajaraṁ | suṣumnamṛdhagghuvema | kavineṣitāsaḥ |
ā | yuvānaḥ | kavayo | yajñiyāso | maruto | ganta | gṛṇato | varasyām |
acitraṁ | ciddhi | jinvathā | vṛdhantetthā | nakṣanto | naro | aṅgirasvat |
pra | vīrāya | pra | tavase | turāyājā | yūtheva | paśurakṣirastam |
sa | pispṛśati | tanvi | śrutasya | stṛbhirna | nākaṁ | vacanasya | vipaḥ |
yo | rajāṁsi | vimame | pārthivāni | triścidviṣṇurmanave | bādhitāya |
tasya | te | śarmannupadadyamāne | rāyā | madema | tanvā | tanā | ca |
tanno'hirbudhnyo | adbhirarkaistatparvatastatsavitā | cano | dhāt |
tadoṣadhībhirabhi | rātiṣāco | bhagaḥ | puraṁdhirjinvatu | pra | rāye |
nu | no | rayiṁ | rathyaṁ | carṣaṇiprāṁ | puruvīraṁ | maha | ṛtasya | gopām |
kṣayaṁ | dātājaraṁ | yena | janāntspṛdho | adevīrabhi | ca | kramāma | viśādevīrabhyaśnavāma |
huve | vo | devīmaditiṁ | namobhirmṛḻīkāya | varuṇaṁ | mitramagnim |
abhikṣadāmaryamaṇaṁ | suśevaṁ | trātṝndevāntsavitāraṁ | bhagaṁ | ca |
sujyotiṣaḥ | sūrya | dakṣapitṝnanāgāstve | sumaho | vīhi | devān |
dvijanmāno | ya | ṛtasāpaḥ | satyāḥ | svarvanto | yajatāgnijihvāḥ |
uta | dyāvāpṛthivī | kṣatramuru | bṛhadrodasī | śaraṇaṁ | suṣumne |
mahaskaratho | varivo | yathā | no'sme | kṣayāya | dhiṣaṇe | anehaḥ |
ā | no | rudrasya | sūnavo | namantāmadyā | hūtāso | vasavo'dhṛṣṭāḥ |
yadīmarbhe | mahati | vā | hitāso | bādhe | maruto | ahvāma | devān |
mimyakṣa | yeṣu | rodasī | nu | devī | siṣakti | pūṣābhyardhayajvā |
śrutvā | havaṁ | maruto | yaddha | yātha | bhūmā | rejante | adhvani | pravikte |
abhi | tyaṁ | vīraṁ | girvaṇasamarcendraṁ | brahmaṇā | jaritarnavena |
śravadiddhavamupa | ca | stavāno | rāsadvājām̐ | upa | maho | gṛṇānaḥ |
omānamāpo | mānuṣīramṛktaṁ | dhāta | tokāya | tanayāya | śaṁ | yoḥ |
yūyaṁ | hi | ṣṭhā | bhiṣajo | mātṛtamā | viśvasya | sthāturjagato | janitrīḥ |
ā | no | devaḥ | savitā | trāyamāṇo | hiraṇyapāṇiryajato | jagamyāt |
yo | datravām̐ | uṣaso | na | pratīkaṁ | vyūrṇute | dāśuṣe | vāryāṇi |
uta | tvaṁ | sūno | sahaso | no | adyā | devām̐ | asminnadhvare | vavṛtyāḥ |
syāmahaṁ | te | sadamidrātau | tava | syāmagne'vasā | suvīraḥ |
uta | tyā | me | havamā | jagmyātaṁ | nāsatyā | dhībhiryuvamaṅga | viprā |
atriṁ | na | mahastamaso'mumuktaṁ | tūrvataṁ | narā | duritādabhīke |
te | no | rāyo | dyumato | vājavato | dātāro | bhūta | nṛvataḥ | purukṣoḥ |
daśasyanto | divyāḥ | pārthivāso | gojātāpyā | mṛḻatā | ca | devāḥ |
te | no | rudraḥ | sarasvatī | sajoṣā | mīḻhuṣmanto | viṣṇurmṛḻantu | vāyuḥ |
ṛbhukṣā | vājo | daivyo | vidhātā | parjanyāvātā | pipyatāmiṣaṁ | naḥ |
uta | sya | devaḥ | savitā | bhago | no'pāṁ | napādavatu | dānu | papriḥ |
tvaṣṭā | devebhirjanibhiḥ | sajoṣā | dyaurdevebhiḥ | pṛthivī | samudraiḥ |
uta | no'hirbudhnyaḥ | śṛṇotvajaikapātpṛthivī | samudraḥ |
viśve | devā | ṛtāvṛdho | huvānāḥ | stutā | mantrāḥ | kaviśastāvantu |
evā | napāto | mama | tasya | dhībhirbharadvājābhyarcantyarkaiḥ |
gnā | hutāso | vasavo'dhṛṣṭā | viśve | stutāso | bhūtā | yajatrāḥ |
udu | tyaccakṣurmahi | mitrayorām̐ | eti | priyaṁ | varuṇayoradabdham |
ṛtasya | śuci | darśatamanīkaṁ | rukmo | na | divoditā | vyadyaut |
veda | yastrīṇi | vidathānyeṣāṁ | devānāṁ | janma | sanutarā | ca | vipraḥ |
ṛju | marteṣu | vṛjinā | ca | paśyannabhi | caṣṭe | sūro | aryaivān |
stuṣo | vo | maha | ṛtasya | gopānaditiṁ | mitraṁ | varuṇaṁ | sujātān |
aryamaṇaṁ | bhagamadabdhadhītīnacchā | voce | sadhanyaḥ | pāvakān |
riśādasaḥ | satpatīm̐radabdhānmaho | rājñaḥ | suvasanasya | dātṝn |
yūnaḥ | sukṣatrānkṣayato | divo | nṝnādityānyāmyaditiṁ | duvoyu |
dyauṣpitaḥ | pṛthivi | mātaradhrugagne | bhrātarvasavo | mṛḻatā | naḥ |
viśvādityā | adite | sajoṣāsmabhyaṁ | śarma | bahulaṁ | vi | yanta |
mā | no | vṛkāya | vṛkye | samasmāghāyate | rīradhatā | yajatrāḥ |
yūyaṁ | hi | ṣṭhā | rathyo | nastanūnāṁ | yūyaṁ | dakṣasya | vacaso | babhūva |
mā | vaino | anyakṛtaṁ | bhujema | mā | tatkarma | vasavo | yaccayadhve |
viśvasya | hi | kṣayatha | viśvadevāḥ | svayaṁ | ripustanvaṁ | rīriṣīṣṭa |
namedugraṁ | namā | vivāse | namo | dādhāra | pṛthivīmuta | dyām |
namo | devebhyo | nameśa | eṣāṁ | kṛtaṁ | cideno | namasā | vivāse |
ṛtasya | vo | rathyaḥ | pūtadakṣānṛtasya | pastyasado | adabdhān |
tām̐ | ā | namobhirurucakṣaso | nṝnviśvānvā | name | maho | yajatrāḥ |
te | hi | śreṣṭhavarcasasto | nastiro | viśvāni | duritā | nayanti |
sukṣatrāso | varuṇo | mitro | agnirṛtadhītayo | vakmarājasatyāḥ |
te | nendraḥ | pṛthivī | kṣāma | vardhanpūṣā | bhago | aditiḥ | pañca | janāḥ |
suśarmāṇaḥ | svavasaḥ | sunīthā | bhavantu | naḥ | sutrātrāsaḥ | sugopāḥ |
nū | sadmānaṁ | divyaṁ | naṁśi | devā | bhāradvājaḥ | sumatiṁ | yāti | hotā |
āsānebhiryajamāno | miyedhairdevānāṁ | janma | vasūyurvavanda |
apa | tyaṁ | vṛjinaṁ | ripuṁ | stenamagne | durādhyam |
daviṣṭhamasya | satpate | kṛdhī | sugam |
grāvāṇaḥ | soma | no | hi | kaṁ | sakhitvanāya | vāvaśuḥ |
jahī | nyatriṇaṁ | paṇiṁ | vṛko | hi | ṣaḥ |
yūyaṁ | hi | ṣṭhā | sudānavendrajyeṣṭhā | abhidyavaḥ |
kartā | no | adhvannā | sugaṁ | gopāmā |
api | panthāmaganmahi | svastigāmanehasam |
yena | viśvāḥ | pari | dviṣo | vṛṇakti | vindate | vasu |
na | taddivā | na | pṛthivyānu | manye | na | yajñena | nota | śamībhirābhiḥ |
ubjantu | taṁ | subhvaḥ | parvatāso | ni | hīyatāmatiyājasya | yaṣṭā |
ati | vā | yo | maruto | manyate | no | brahma | vā | yaḥ | kriyamāṇaṁ | ninitsāt |
tapūṁṣi | tasmai | vṛjināni | santu | brahmadviṣamabhi | taṁ | śocatu | dyauḥ |
kimaṅga | tvā | brahmaṇaḥ | soma | gopāṁ | kimaṅga | tvāhurabhiśastipāṁ | naḥ |
kimaṅga | naḥ | paśyasi | nidyamānānbrahmadviṣe | tapuṣiṁ | hetimasya |
avantu | māmuṣaso | jāyamānāvantu | mā | sindhavaḥ | pinvamānāḥ |
avantu | mā | parvatāso | dhruvāso'vantu | mā | pitaro | devahūtau |
viśvadānīṁ | sumanasaḥ | syāma | paśyema | nu | sūryamuccarantam |
