tathā | karadvasupatirvasūnāṁ | devām̐ | ohāno'vasāgamiṣṭhaḥ |
indro | nediṣṭhamavasāgamiṣṭhaḥ | sarasvatī | sindhubhiḥ | pinvamānā |
parjanyo | nauṣadhībhirmayobhuragniḥ | suśaṁsaḥ | suhavaḥ | piteva |
viśve | devāsā | gata | śṛṇutā | memaṁ | havam |
edaṁ | barhirni | ṣīdata |
yo | vo | devā | ghṛtasnunā | havyena | pratibhūṣati |
taṁ | viśvopa | gacchatha |
upa | naḥ | sūnavo | giraḥ | śṛṇvantvamṛtasya | ye |
sumṛḻīkā | bhavantu | naḥ |
viśve | devā | ṛtāvṛdha | ṛtubhirhavanaśrutaḥ |
juṣantāṁ | yujyaṁ | payaḥ |
stotramindro | marudgaṇastvaṣṭṛmānmitro | aryamā |
imā | havyā | juṣanta | naḥ |
imaṁ | no | agne | adhvaraṁ | hotarvayunaśo | yaja |
cikitvāndaivyaṁ | janam |
viśve | devāḥ | śṛṇutemaṁ | havaṁ | me | ye | antarikṣe | yopa | dyavi | ṣṭha |
ye | agnijihvota | vā | yajatrāsadyāsminbarhiṣi | mādayadhvam |
viśve | devā | mama | śṛṇvantu | yajñiyobhe | rodasī | apāṁ | napācca | manma |
mā | vo | vacāṁsi | paricakṣyāṇi | vocaṁ | sumneṣvidvo | antamā | madema |
ye | ke | ca | jmā | mahino | ahimāyā | divo | jajñire | apāṁ | sadhasthe |
te | asmabhyamiṣaye | viśvamāyuḥ | kṣaposrā | varivasyantu | devāḥ |
agnīparjanyāvavataṁ | dhiyaṁ | me'sminhave | suhavā | suṣṭutiṁ | naḥ |
iḻāmanyo | janayadgarbhamanyaḥ | prajāvatīriṣā | dhattamasme |
stīrṇe | barhiṣi | samidhāne | agnau | sūktena | mahā | namasā | vivāse |
asminno | adya | vidathe | yajatrā | viśve | devā | haviṣi | mādayadhvam |
vayamu | tvā | pathaspate | rathaṁ | na | vājasātaye |
dhiye | pūṣannayujmahi |
abhi | no | naryaṁ | vasu | vīraṁ | prayatadakṣiṇam |
vāmaṁ | gṛhapatiṁ | naya |
aditsantaṁ | cidāghṛṇe | pūṣandānāya | codaya |
paṇeścidvi | mradā | manaḥ |
vi | patho | vājasātaye | cinuhi | vi | mṛdho | jahi |
sādhantāmugra | no | dhiyaḥ |
pari | tṛndhi | paṇīnāmārayā | hṛdayā | kave |
athemasmabhyaṁ | randhaya |
vi | pūṣannārayā | tuda | paṇericcha | hṛdi | priyam |
athemasmabhyaṁ | randhaya |
ā | rikha | kikirā | kṛṇu | paṇīnāṁ | hṛdayā | kave |
athemasmabhyaṁ | randhaya |
yāṁ | pūṣanbrahmacodanīmārāṁ | bibharṣyāghṛṇe |
tayā | samasya | hṛdayamā | rikha | kikirā | kṛṇu |
yā | te | aṣṭrā | goopaśāghṛṇe | paśusādhanī |
tasyāste | sumnamīmahe |
uta | no | goṣaṇiṁ | dhiyamaśvasāṁ | vājasāmuta |
nṛvatkṛṇuhi | vītaye |
saṁ | pūṣanviduṣā | naya | yo | añjasānuśāsati |
yaivedamiti | bravat |
samu | pūṣṇā | gamemahi | yo | gṛhām̐ | abhiśāsati |
imaiveti | ca | bravat |
pūṣṇaścakraṁ | na | riṣyati | na | kośo'va | padyate |
no | asya | vyathate | paviḥ |
yo | asmai | haviṣāvidhanna | taṁ | pūṣāpi | mṛṣyate |
prathamo | vindate | vasu |
pūṣā | gānvetu | naḥ | pūṣā | rakṣatvarvataḥ |
pūṣā | vājaṁ | sanotu | naḥ |
pūṣannanu | pra | gehi | yajamānasya | sunvataḥ |
asmākaṁ | stuvatāmuta |
mākirneśanmākīṁ | riṣanmākīṁ | saṁ | śāri | kevaṭe |
athāriṣṭābhirā | gahi |
śṛṇvantaṁ | pūṣaṇaṁ | vayamiryamanaṣṭavedasam |
īśānaṁ | rāyemahe |
pūṣantava | vrate | vayaṁ | na | riṣyema | kadā | cana |
stotārasteha | smasi |
pari | pūṣā | parastāddhastaṁ | dadhātu | dakṣiṇam |
punarno | naṣṭamājatu |
ehi | vāṁ | vimuco | napādāghṛṇe | saṁ | sacāvahai |
rathīrṛtasya | no | bhava |
rathītamaṁ | kapardinamīśānaṁ | rādhaso | mahaḥ |
rāyaḥ | sakhāyamīmahe |
rāyo | dhārāsyāghṛṇe | vaso | rāśirajāśva |
dhīvatodhīvataḥ | sakhā |
pūṣaṇaṁ | nvajāśvamupa | stoṣāma | vājinam |
svasuryo | jārocyate |
māturdidhiṣumabravaṁ | svasurjāraḥ | śṛṇotu | naḥ |
bhrātendrasya | sakhā | mama |
ājāsaḥ | pūṣaṇaṁ | rathe | niśṛmbhāste | janaśriyam |
devaṁ | vahantu | bibhrataḥ |
yainamādideśati | karambhāditi | pūṣaṇam |
na | tena | devādiśe |
uta | ghā | sa | rathītamaḥ | sakhyā | satpatiryujā |
indro | vṛtrāṇi | jighnate |
utādaḥ | paruṣe | gavi | sūraścakraṁ | hiraṇyayam |
nyairayadrathītamaḥ |
yadadya | tvā | puruṣṭuta | bravāma | dasra | mantumaḥ |
tatsu | no | manma | sādhaya |
imaṁ | ca | no | gaveṣaṇaṁ | sātaye | sīṣadho | gaṇam |
ārātpūṣannasi | śrutaḥ |
ā | te | svastimīmahāreaghāmupāvasum |
adyā | ca | sarvatātaye | śvaśca | sarvatātaye |
indrā | nu | pūṣaṇā | vayaṁ | sakhyāya | svastaye |
huvema | vājasātaye |
somamanyopāsadatpātave | camvoḥ | sutam |
karambhamanyecchati |
ajānyasya | vahnayo | harī | anyasya | saṁbhṛtā |
tābhyāṁ | vṛtrāṇi | jighnate |
yadindro | anayadrito | mahīrapo | vṛṣantamaḥ |
tatra | pūṣābhavatsacā |
tāṁ | pūṣṇaḥ | sumatiṁ | vayaṁ | vṛkṣasya | pra | vayāmiva |
indrasya | cā | rabhāmahe |
utpūṣaṇaṁ | yuvāmahe'bhīśūm̐riva | sārathiḥ |
mahyendraṁ | svastaye |
śukraṁ | te | anyadyajataṁ | te | anyadviṣurūpe | ahanī | dyaurivāsi |
viśvā | hi | māyāvasi | svadhāvo | bhadrā | te | pūṣanniha | rātirastu |
ajāśvaḥ | paśupā | vājapastyo | dhiyaṁjinvo | bhuvane | viśve | arpitaḥ |
aṣṭrāṁ | pūṣā | śithirāmudvarīvṛjatsaṁcakṣāṇo | bhuvanā | deveyate |
yāste | pūṣannāvo | antaḥ | samudre | hiraṇyayīrantarikṣe | caranti |
tābhiryāsi | dūtyāṁ | sūryasya | kāmena | kṛta | śravecchamānaḥ |
pūṣā | subandhurdivā | pṛthivyeḻaspatirmaghavā | dasmavarcāḥ |
yaṁ | devāso | adaduḥ | sūryāyai | kāmena | kṛtaṁ | tavasaṁ | svañcam |
pra | nu | vocā | suteṣu | vāṁ | vīryā | yāni | cakrathuḥ |
hatāso | vāṁ | pitaro | devaśatravendrāgnī | jīvatho | yuvam |
baḻitthā | mahimā | vāmindrāgnī | paniṣṭhā |
samāno | vāṁ | janitā | bhrātarā | yuvaṁ | yamāvihehamātarā |
okivāṁsā | sute | sacām̐ | aśvā | saptīvādane |
indrā | nvagnī | avaseha | vajriṇā | vayaṁ | devā | havāmahe |
yendrāgnī | suteṣu | vāṁ | stavatteṣvṛtāvṛdhā |
joṣavākaṁ | vadataḥ | pajrahoṣiṇā | na | devā | bhasathaścana |
indrāgnī | ko | asya | vāṁ | devau | martaściketati |
viṣūco | aśvānyuyujāneyata | ekaḥ | samānā | rathe |
indrāgnī | apādiyaṁ | pūrvāgātpadvatībhyaḥ |
hitvī | śiro | jihvayā | vāvadaccarattriṁśatpadā | nyakramīt |
indrāgnī | ā | hi | tanvate | naro | dhanvāni | bāhvoḥ |
mā | no | asminmahādhane | parā | varktaṁ | gaviṣṭiṣu |
indrāgnī | tapanti | māghāryo | arātayaḥ |
apa | dveṣāṁsyā | kṛtaṁ | yuyutaṁ | sūryādadhi |
indrāgnī | yuvorapi | vasu | divyāni | pārthivā |
ā | neha | pra | yacchataṁ | rayiṁ | viśvāyupoṣasam |
indrāgnī | ukthavāhasā | stomebhirhavanaśrutā |
viśvābhirgīrbhirā | gatamasya | somasya | pītaye |
śnathadvṛtramuta | sanoti | vājamindrā | yo | agnī | sahurī | saparyāt |
irajyantā | vasavyasya | bhūreḥ | sahastamā | sahasā | vājayantā |
tā | yodhiṣṭamabhi | gendra | nūnamapaḥ | svaruṣaso | agnoḻhāḥ |
diśaḥ | svaruṣasendra | citrāpo | gāgne | yuvase | niyutvān |
ā | vṛtrahaṇā | vṛtrahabhiḥ | śuṣmairindra | yātaṁ | namobhiragne | arvāk |
yuvaṁ | rādhobhirakavebhirindrāgne | asme | bhavatamuttamebhiḥ |
tā | huve | yayoridaṁ | papne | viśvaṁ | purā | kṛtam |
indrāgnī | na | mardhataḥ |
ugrā | vighaninā | mṛdhendrāgnī | havāmahe |
tā | no | mṛḻātedṛśe |
hato | vṛtrāṇyāryā | hato | dāsāni | satpatī |
hato | viśvāpa | dviṣaḥ |
indrāgnī | yuvāmime'bhi | stomānūṣata |
pibataṁ | śaṁbhuvā | sutam |
yā | vāṁ | santi | puruspṛho | niyuto | dāśuṣe | narā |
indrāgnī | tābhirā | gatam |
tābhirā | gacchataṁ | naropedaṁ | savanaṁ | sutam |
indrāgnī | somapītaye |
tamīḻiṣva | yo | arciṣā | vanā | viśvā | pariṣvajat |
kṛṣṇā | kṛṇoti | jihvayā |
yeddha | āvivāsati | sumnamindrasya | martyaḥ |
dyumnāya | sutarāpaḥ |
tā | no | vājavatīriṣāśūnpipṛtamarvataḥ |
indramagniṁ | ca | voḻhave |
ubhā | vāmindrāgnī | āhuvadhyobhā | rādhasaḥ | saha | mādayadhyai |
ubhā | dātārāviṣāṁ | rayīṇāmubhā | vājasya | sātaye | huve | vām |
ā | no | gavyebhiraśvyairvasavyairupa | gacchatam |
sakhāyau | devau | sakhyāya | śaṁbhuvendrāgnī | tā | havāmahe |
indrāgnī | śṛṇutaṁ | havaṁ | yajamānasya | sunvataḥ |
vītaṁ | havyānyā | gataṁ | pibataṁ | somyaṁ | madhu |
iyamadadādrabhasamṛṇacyutaṁ | divodāsaṁ | vadhryaśvāya | dāśuṣe |
yā | śaśvantamācakhādāvasaṁ | paṇiṁ | tā | te | dātrāṇi | taviṣā | sarasvati |
iyaṁ | śuṣmebhirbisakhevārujatsānu | girīṇāṁ | taviṣebhirūrmibhiḥ |
pārāvataghnīmavase | suvṛktibhiḥ | sarasvatīmā | vivāsema | dhītibhiḥ |
sarasvati | devanido | ni | barhaya | prajāṁ | viśvasya | bṛsayasya | māyinaḥ |
uta | kṣitibhyo'vanīravindo | viṣamebhyo | asravo | vājinīvati |
pra | ṇo | devī | sarasvatī | vājebhirvājinīvatī |
dhīnāmavitryavatu |
yastvā | devi | sarasvatyupabrūte | dhane | hite |
indraṁ | na | vṛtratūrye |
tvaṁ | devi | sarasvatyavā | vājeṣu | vājini |
radā | pūṣeva | naḥ | sanim |
uta | syā | naḥ | sarasvatī | ghorā | hiraṇyavartaniḥ |
vṛtraghnī | vaṣṭi | suṣṭutim |
yasyānanto | ahrutastveṣaścariṣṇurarṇavaḥ |
amaścarati | roruvat |
sā | no | viśvāti | dviṣaḥ | svasṝranyā | ṛtāvarī |
atannaheva | sūryaḥ |
uta | naḥ | priyā | priyāsu | saptasvasā | sujuṣṭā |
sarasvatī | stomyā | bhūt |
āpapruṣī | pārthivānyuru | rajo | antarikṣam |
sarasvatī | nidaspātu |
triṣadhasthā | saptadhātuḥ | pañca | jātā | vardhayantī |
vājevāje | havyā | bhūt |
pra | yā | mahimnā | mahināsu | cekite | dyumnebhiranyāpasāmapastamā |
ratheva | bṛhatī | vibhvane | kṛtopastutyā | cikituṣā | sarasvatī |
sarasvatyabhi | no | neṣi | vasyo | māpa | spharīḥ | payasā | mā | nā | dhak |
juṣasva | naḥ | sakhyā | veśyā | ca | mā | tvatkṣetrāṇyaraṇāni | ganma |
stuṣe | narā | divo | asya | prasantāśvinā | huve | jaramāṇo | arkaiḥ |
yā | sadyosrā | vyuṣi | jmo | antānyuyūṣataḥ | paryurū | varāṁsi |
tā | yajñamā | śucibhiścakramāṇā | rathasya | bhānuṁ | rurucū | rajobhiḥ |
purū | varāṁsyamitā | mimānāpo | dhanvānyati | yātho | ajrān |
tā | ha | tyadvartiryadaradhramugretthā | dhiyohathuḥ | śaśvadaśvaiḥ |
manojavebhiriṣiraiḥ | śayadhyai | pari | vyathirdāśuṣo | martyasya |
tā | navyaso | jaramāṇasya | manmopa | bhūṣato | yuyujānasaptī |
śubhaṁ | pṛkṣamiṣamūrjaṁ | vahantā | hotā | yakṣatpratno | adhrugyuvānā |
tā | valgū | dasrā | puruśākatamā | pratnā | navyasā | vacasā | vivāse |
yā | śaṁsate | stuvate | śaṁbhaviṣṭhā | babhūvaturgṛṇate | citrarātī |
tā | bhujyuṁ | vibhiradbhyaḥ | samudrāttugrasya | sūnumūhathū | rajobhiḥ |
areṇubhiryojanebhirbhujantā | patatribhirarṇaso | nirupasthāt |
vi | jayuṣā | rathyā | yātamadriṁ | śrutaṁ | havaṁ | vṛṣaṇā | vadhrimatyāḥ |
daśasyantā | śayave | pipyathurgāmiti | cyavānā | sumatiṁ | bhuraṇyū |
yadrodasī | pradivo | asti | bhūmā | heḻo | devānāmuta | martyatrā |
tadādityā | vasavo | rudriyāso | rakṣoyuje | tapuraghaṁ | dadhāta |
yeṁ | rājānāvṛtuthā | vidadhadrajaso | mitro | varuṇaściketat |
gambhīrāya | rakṣase | hetimasya | droghāya | cidvacasānavāya |
antaraiścakraistanayāya | vartirdyumatā | yātaṁ | nṛvatā | rathena |
sanutyena | tyajasā | martyasya | vanuṣyatāmapi | śīrṣā | vavṛktam |
ā | paramābhiruta | madhyamābhirniyudbhiryātamavamābhirarvāk |
dṛḻhasya | cidgomato | vi | vrajasya | duro | vartaṁ | gṛṇate | citrarātī |
kva | tyā | valgū | puruhūtādya | dūto | na | stomo'vidannamasvān |
ā | yo | arvāṅnāsatyā | vavarta | preṣṭhā | hyasatho | asya | manman |
araṁ | me | gantaṁ | havanāyāsmai | gṛṇānā | yathā | pibātho | andhaḥ |
pari | ha | tyadvartiryātho | riṣo | na | yatparo | nāntarastuturyāt |
akāri | vāmandhaso | varīmannastāri | barhiḥ | suprāyaṇatamam |
uttānahasto | yuvayurvavandā | vāṁ | nakṣanto | adrayāñjan |
ūrdhvo | vāmagniradhvareṣvasthātpra | rātireti | jūrṇinī | ghṛtācī |
pra | hotā | gūrtamanorāṇo'yukta | yo | nāsatyā | havīman |
adhi | śriye | duhitā | sūryasya | rathaṁ | tasthau | purubhujā | śatotim |
pra | māyābhirmāyinā | bhūtamatra | narā | nṛtū | janimanyajñiyānām |
yuvaṁ | śrībhirdarśatābhirābhiḥ | śubhe | puṣṭimūhathuḥ | sūryāyāḥ |
pra | vāṁ | vayo | vapuṣe'nu | paptannakṣadvāṇī | suṣṭutā | dhiṣṇyā | vām |
ā | vāṁ | vayo'śvāso | vahiṣṭhābhi | prayo | nāsatyā | vahantu |
pra | vāṁ | ratho | manojavāsarjīṣaḥ | pṛkṣeṣidho | anu | pūrvīḥ |
puru | hi | vāṁ | purubhujā | deṣṇaṁ | dhenuṁ | neṣaṁ | pinvatamasakrām |
stutaśca | vāṁ | mādhvī | suṣṭutiśca | rasāśca | ye | vāmanu | rātimagman |
uta | ma | ṛjre | purayasya | raghvī | sumīḻhe | śataṁ | peruke | ca | pakvā |
śāṇḍo | dāddhiraṇinaḥ | smaddiṣṭīndaśa | vaśāso | abhiṣāca | ṛṣvān |
saṁ | vāṁ | śatā | nāsatyā | sahasrāśvānāṁ | purupanthā | gire | dāt |
bharadvājāya | vīra | nū | gire | dāddhatā | rakṣāṁsi | purudaṁsasā | syuḥ |
ā | vāṁ | sumne | varimantsūribhiḥ | ṣyām |
udu | śriyoṣaso | rocamānāsthurapāṁ | normayo | ruśantaḥ |
kṛṇoti | viśvā | supathā | sugānyabhūdu | vasvī | dakṣiṇā | maghonī |
bhadrā | dadṛkṣorviyā | vi | bhāsyutte | śocirbhānavo | dyāmapaptan |
āvirvakṣaḥ | kṛṇuṣe | śumbhamānoṣo | devi | rocamānā | mahobhiḥ |
vahanti | sīmaruṇāso | ruśanto | gāvaḥ | subhagāmurviyā | prathānām |
apejate | śūro | asteva | śatrūnbādhate | tamo | ajiro | na | voḻhā |
sugota | te | supathā | parvateṣvavāte | apastarasi | svabhāno |
sā | nā | vaha | pṛthuyāmannṛṣve | rayiṁ | divo | duhitariṣayadhyai |
sā | vaha | yokṣabhiravātoṣo | varaṁ | vahasi | joṣamanu |
tvaṁ | divo | duhitaryā | ha | devī | pūrvahūtau | maṁhanā | darśatā | bhūḥ |
utte | vayaścidvasaterapaptannaraśca | ye | pitubhājo | vyuṣṭau |
amā | sate | vahasi | bhūri | vāmamuṣo | devi | dāśuṣe | martyāya |
eṣā | syā | no | duhitā | divojāḥ | kṣitīrucchantī | mānuṣīrajīgaḥ |
yā | bhānunā | ruśatā | rāmyāsvajñāyi | tirastamasaścidaktūn |
vi | tadyayuraruṇayugbhiraśvaiścitraṁ | bhāntyuṣasaścandrarathāḥ |
agraṁ | yajñasya | bṛhato | nayantīrvi | tā | bādhante | tamormyāyāḥ |
śravo | vājamiṣamūrjaṁ | vahantīrni | dāśuṣoṣaso | martyāya |
maghonīrvīravatpatyamānāvo | dhāta | vidhate | ratnamadya |
idā | hi | vo | vidhate | ratnamastīdā | vīrāya | dāśuṣoṣāsaḥ |
idā | viprāya | jarate | yadukthā | ni | ṣma | māvate | vahathā | purā | cit |
idā | hi | toṣo | adrisāno | gotrā | gavāmaṅgiraso | gṛṇanti |
vyarkeṇa | bibhidurbrahmaṇā | ca | satyā | nṛṇāmabhavaddevahūtiḥ |
ucchā | divo | duhitaḥ | pratnavanno | bharadvājavadvidhate | maghoni |
suvīraṁ | rayiṁ | gṛṇate | rirīhyurugāyamadhi | dhehi | śravo | naḥ |
vapurnu | taccikituṣe | cidastu | samānaṁ | nāma | dhenu | patyamānam |
marteṣvanyaddohase | pīpāya | sakṛcchukraṁ | duduhe | pṛśnirūdhaḥ |
ye | agnayo | na | śośucannidhānā | dviryattrirmaruto | vāvṛdhanta |
areṇavo | hiraṇyayāsaiṣāṁ | sākaṁ | nṛmṇaiḥ | pauṁsyebhiśca | bhūvan |
rudrasya | ye | mīḻhuṣaḥ | santi | putrā | yām̐śco | nu | dādhṛvirbharadhyai |
vide | hi | mātā | maho | mahī | ṣā | setpṛśniḥ | subhve | garbhamādhāt |
na | yeṣante | januṣo'yā | nvantaḥ | santo'vadyāni | punānāḥ |
niryadduhre | śucayo'nu | joṣamanu | śriyā | tanvamukṣamāṇāḥ |
makṣū | na | yeṣu | dohase | cidayā | nāma | dhṛṣṇu | mārutaṁ | dadhānāḥ |
na | ye | staunāyāso | mahnā | nū | citsudānurava | yāsadugrān |
tedugrāḥ | śavasā | dhṛṣṇuṣeṇobhe | yujanta | rodasī | sumeke |
adha | smaiṣu | rodasī | svaśocirāmavatsu | tasthau | na | rokaḥ |
aneno | vo | maruto | yāmo | astvanaśvaścidyamajatyarathīḥ |
anavaso | anabhīśū | rajastūrvi | rodasī | pathyā | yāti | sādhan |
nāsya | vartā | na | tarutā | nvasti | maruto | yamavatha | vājasātau |
toke | vā | goṣu | tanaye | yamapsu | sa | vrajaṁ | dartā | pārye | adha | dyoḥ |
pra | citramarkaṁ | gṛṇate | turāya | mārutāya | svatavase | bharadhvam |
ye | sahāṁsi | sahasā | sahante | rejate | agne | pṛthivī | makhebhyaḥ |
tviṣīmanto | adhvarasyeva | didyuttṛṣucyavaso | juhvo | nāgneḥ |
arcatrayo | dhunayo | na | vīrā | bhrājajjanmāno | maruto | adhṛṣṭāḥ |
taṁ | vṛdhantaṁ | mārutaṁ | bhrājadṛṣṭiṁ | rudrasya | sūnuṁ | havasā | vivāse |
divaḥ | śardhāya | śucayo | manīṣā | girayo | nāpogrā | aspṛdhran |
viśveṣāṁ | vaḥ | satāṁ | jyeṣṭhatamā | gīrbhirmitrāvaruṇā | vāvṛdhadhyai |
saṁ | yā | raśmeva | yamaturyamiṣṭhā | dvā | janām̐ | asamā | bāhubhiḥ | svaiḥ |
iyaṁ | madvāṁ | pra | stṛṇīte | manīṣopa | priyā | namasā | barhiraccha |
yantaṁ | no | mitrāvaruṇāvadhṛṣṭaṁ | chardiryadvāṁ | varūthyaṁ | sudānū |
ā | yātaṁ | mitrāvaruṇā | suśastyupa | priyā | namasā | hūyamānā |
saṁ | yāvapnaḥstho | apaseva | janāñchrudhīyataścidyatatho | mahitvā |
aśvā | na | yā | vājinā | pūtabandhū | ṛtā | yadgarbhamaditirbharadhyai |
pra | yā | mahi | mahāntā | jāyamānā | ghorā | martāya | ripave | ni | dīdhaḥ |
viśve | yadvāṁ | maṁhanā | mandamānāḥ | kṣatraṁ | devāso | adadhuḥ | sajoṣāḥ |
pari | yadbhūtho | rodasī | cidurvī | santi | spaśo | adabdhāso | amūrāḥ |
tā | hi | kṣatraṁ | dhārayethe | anu | dyūndṛṁhethe | sānumupamādiva | dyoḥ |
dṛḻho | nakṣatrota | viśvadevo | bhūmimātāndyāṁ | dhāsināyoḥ |
tā | vigraṁ | dhaithe | jaṭharaṁ | pṛṇadhyā | yatsadma | sabhṛtayaḥ | pṛṇanti |
na | mṛṣyante | yuvatayo'vātā | vi | yatpayo | viśvajinvā | bharante |
tā | jihvayā | sadamedaṁ | sumedhā | yadvāṁ | satyo | aratirṛte | bhūt |
tadvāṁ | mahitvaṁ | ghṛtānnāvastu | yuvaṁ | dāśuṣe | vi | cayiṣṭamaṁhaḥ |
pra | yadvāṁ | mitrāvaruṇā | spūrdhanpriyā | dhāma | yuvadhitā | minanti |
na | ye | devāsauhasā | na | martāyajñasāco | apyo | na | putrāḥ |
vi | yadvācaṁ | kīstāso | bharante | śaṁsanti | ke | cinnivido | manānāḥ |
ādvāṁ | bravāma | satyānyukthā | nakirdevebhiryatatho | mahitvā |
avoritthā | vāṁ | chardiṣo | abhiṣṭau | yuvormitrāvaruṇāvaskṛdhoyu |
anu | yadgāvaḥ | sphurānṛjipyaṁ | dhṛṣṇuṁ | yadraṇe | vṛṣaṇaṁ | yunajan |
śruṣṭī | vāṁ | yajñodyataḥ | sajoṣā | manuṣvadvṛktabarhiṣo | yajadhyai |
ā | yendrāvaruṇāviṣe | adya | mahe | sumnāya | mahāvavartat |
tā | hi | śreṣṭhā | devatātā | tujā | śūrāṇāṁ | śaviṣṭhā | tā | hi | bhūtam |
maghonāṁ | maṁhiṣṭhā | tuviśuṣma | ṛtena | vṛtraturā | sarvasenā |
tā | gṛṇīhi | namasyebhiḥ | śūṣaiḥ | sumnebhirindrāvaruṇā | cakānā |
vajreṇānyaḥ | śavasā | hanti | vṛtraṁ | siṣaktyanyo | vṛjaneṣu | vipraḥ |
gnāśca | yannaraśca | vāvṛdhanta | viśve | devāso | narāṁ | svagūrtāḥ |
praibhyendrāvaruṇā | mahitvā | dyauśca | pṛthivi | bhūtamurvī |
setsudānuḥ | svavām̐ | ṛtāvendrā | yo | vāṁ | varuṇa | dāśati | tman |
iṣā | sa | dviṣastareddāsvānvaṁsadrayiṁ | rayivataśca | janān |
yaṁ | yuvaṁ | dāśvadhvarāya | devā | rayiṁ | dhattho | vasumantaṁ | purukṣum |
asme | sendrāvaruṇāvapi | ṣyātpra | yo | bhanakti | vanuṣāmaśastīḥ |
uta | naḥ | sutrātro | devagopāḥ | sūribhyendrāvaruṇā | rayiḥ | ṣyāt |
yeṣāṁ | śuṣmaḥ | pṛtanāsu | sāhvānpra | sadyo | dyumnā | tirate | taturiḥ |
nū | nendrāvaruṇā | gṛṇānā | pṛṅktaṁ | rayiṁ | sauśravasāya | devā |
itthā | gṛṇanto | mahinasya | śardho'po | na | nāvā | duritā | tarema |
pra | samrāje | bṛhate | manma | nu | priyamarca | devāya | varuṇāya | saprathaḥ |
ayaṁ | yorvī | mahinā | mahivrataḥ | kratvā | vibhātyajaro | na | śociṣā |
indrāvaruṇā | sutapāvimaṁ | sutaṁ | somaṁ | pibataṁ | madyaṁ | dhṛtavratā |
yuvo | ratho | adhvaraṁ | devavītaye | prati | svasaramupa | yāti | pītaye |
indrāvaruṇā | madhumattamasya | vṛṣṇaḥ | somasya | vṛṣaṇā | vṛṣethām |
idaṁ | vāmandhaḥ | pariṣiktamasme | āsadyāsminbarhiṣi | mādayethām |
saṁ | vāṁ | karmaṇā | samiṣā | hinomīndrāviṣṇū | apasaspāre | asya |
juṣethāṁ | yajñaṁ | draviṇaṁ | ca | dhattamariṣṭairnaḥ | pathibhiḥ | pārayantā |
yā | viśvāsāṁ | janitārā | matīnāmindrāviṣṇū | kalaśā | somadhānā |
pra | vāṁ | giraḥ | śasyamānāvantu | pra | stomāso | gīyamānāso | arkaiḥ |
indrāviṣṇū | madapatī | madānāmā | somaṁ | yātaṁ | draviṇo | dadhānā |
saṁ | vāmañjantvaktubhirmatīnāṁ | saṁ | stomāsaḥ | śasyamānāsokthaiḥ |
ā | vāmaśvāso | abhimātiṣāhendrāviṣṇū | sadhamādo | vahantu |
juṣethāṁ | viśvā | havanā | matīnāmupa | brahmāṇi | śṛṇutaṁ | giro | me |
indrāviṣṇū | tatpanayāyyaṁ | vāṁ | somasya | madoru | cakramāthe |
akṛṇutamantarikṣaṁ | varīyo'prathataṁ | jīvase | no | rajāṁsi |
indrāviṣṇū | haviṣā | vāvṛdhānāgrādvānā | namasā | rātahavyā |
ghṛtāsutī | draviṇaṁ | dhattamasme | samudraḥ | sthaḥ | kalaśaḥ | somadhānaḥ |
indrāviṣṇū | pibataṁ | madhvo | asya | somasya | dasrā | jaṭharaṁ | pṛṇethām |
ā | vāmandhāṁsi | madirāṇyagmannupa | brahmāṇi | śṛṇutaṁ | havaṁ | me |
ubhā | jigyathurna | parā | jayethe | na | parā | jigye | kataraścanainoḥ |
indraśca | viṣṇo | yadapaspṛdhethāṁ | tredhā | sahasraṁ | vi | tadairayethām |
ghṛtavatī | bhuvanānāmabhiśriyorvī | pṛthvī | madhudughe | supeśasā |
dyāvāpṛthivī | varuṇasya | dharmaṇā | viṣkabhite | ajare | bhūriretasā |
asaścantī | bhūridhāre | payasvatī | ghṛtaṁ | duhāte | sukṛte | śucivrate |
rājantī | asya | bhuvanasya | rodasī | asme | retaḥ | siñcataṁ | yanmanurhitam |
yo | vāmṛjave | kramaṇāya | rodasī | marto | dadāśa | dhiṣaṇe | sa | sādhati |
pra | prajābhirjāyate | dharmaṇaspari | yuvoḥ | siktā | viṣurūpāṇi | savratā |
ghṛtena | dyāvāpṛthivī | abhīvṛte | ghṛtaśriyā | ghṛtapṛcā | ghṛtāvṛdhā |
urvī | pṛthvī | hotṛvūrye | purohite | te | idvipreḻate | sumnamiṣṭaye |
madhu | no | dyāvāpṛthivī | mimikṣatāṁ | madhuścutā | madhudughe | madhuvrate |
dadhāne | yajñaṁ | draviṇaṁ | ca | devatā | mahi | śravo | vājamasme | suvīryam |
ūrjaṁ | no | dyauśca | pṛthivī | ca | pinvatāṁ | pitā | mātā | viśvavidā | sudaṁsasā |
saṁrarāṇe | rodasī | viśvaśambhuvā | saniṁ | vājaṁ | rayimasme | saminvatām |
udu | ṣya | devaḥ | savitā | hiraṇyayā | bāhū | ayaṁsta | savanāya | sukratuḥ |
ghṛtena | pāṇī | abhi | pruṣṇute | makho | yuvā | sudakṣo | rajaso | vidharmaṇi |
devasya | vayaṁ | savituḥ | savīmani | śreṣṭhe | syāma | vasunaśca | dāvane |
yo | viśvasya | dvipado | yaścatuṣpado | niveśane | prasave | cāsi | bhūmanaḥ |
adabdhebhiḥ | savitaḥ | pāyubhiṣṭvaṁ | śivebhiradya | pari | pāhi | no | gayam |
hiraṇyajihvaḥ | suvitāya | navyase | rakṣā | mākirno | aghaśaṁseśata |
udu | ṣya | devaḥ | savitā | damūnā | hiraṇyapāṇiḥ | pratidoṣamasthāt |
ayohanuryajato | mandrajihvā | dāśuṣe | suvati | bhūri | vāmam |
udū | ayām̐ | upavakteva | bāhū | hiraṇyayā | savitā | supratīkā |
divo | rohāṁsyaruhatpṛthivyārīramatpatayatkaccidabhvam |
vāmamadya | savitarvāmamu | śvo | divedive | vāmamasmabhyaṁ | sāvīḥ |
vāmasya | hi | kṣayasya | deva | bhūrerayā | dhiyā | vāmabhājaḥ | syāma |
indrāsomā | mahi | tadvāṁ | mahitvaṁ | yuvaṁ | mahāni | prathamāni | cakrathuḥ |
yuvaṁ | sūryaṁ | vividathuryuvaṁ | svarviśvā | tamāṁsyahataṁ | nidaśca |
indrāsomā | vāsayathoṣāsamutsūryaṁ | nayatho | jyotiṣā | saha |
upa | dyāṁ | skambhathuḥ | skambhanenāprathataṁ | pṛthivīṁ | mātaraṁ | vi |
indrāsomāvahimapaḥ | pariṣṭhāṁ | hatho | vṛtramanu | vāṁ | dyauramanyata |
prārṇāṁsyairayataṁ | nadīnāmā | samudrāṇi | paprathuḥ | purūṇi |
indrāsomā | pakvamāmāsvantarni | gavāmiddadhathurvakṣaṇāsu |
jagṛbhathuranapinaddhamāsu | ruśaccitrāsu | jagatīṣvantaḥ |
indrāsomā | yuvamaṅga | tarutramapatyasācaṁ | śrutyaṁ | rarāthe |
yuvaṁ | śuṣmaṁ | naryaṁ | carṣaṇibhyaḥ | saṁ | vivyathuḥ | pṛtanāṣāhamugrā |
yo | adribhitprathamajā | ṛtāvā | bṛhaspatirāṅgiraso | haviṣmān |
dvibarhajmā | prāgharmasatpitā | nā | rodasī | vṛṣabho | roravīti |
janāya | cidyevata | u | lokaṁ | bṛhaspatirdevahūtau | cakāra |
ghnanvṛtrāṇi | vi | puro | dardarīti | jayañchatrūm̐ramitrānpṛtsu | sāhan |
bṛhaspatiḥ | samajayadvasūni | maho | vrajāngomato | devaiṣaḥ |
apaḥ | siṣāsantsvarapratīto | bṛhaspatirhantyamitramarkaiḥ |
somārudrā | dhārayethāmasuryaṁ | pra | vāmiṣṭayo'ramaśnuvantu |
damedame | sapta | ratnā | dadhānā | śaṁ | no | bhūtaṁ | dvipade | śaṁ | catuṣpade |
somārudrā | vi | vṛhataṁ | viṣūcīmamīvā | yā | no | gayamāviveśa |
āre | bādhethāṁ | nirṛtiṁ | parācairasme | bhadrā | sauśravasāni | santu |
somārudrā | yuvametānyasme | viśvā | tanūṣu | bheṣajāni | dhattam |
ava | syataṁ | muñcataṁ | yanno | asti | tanūṣu | baddhaṁ | kṛtameno | asmat |
tigmāyudhau | tigmahetī | suśevau | somārudrāviha | su | mṛḻataṁ | naḥ |
pra | no | muñcataṁ | varuṇasya | pāśādgopāyataṁ | naḥ | sumanasyamānā |
jīmūtasyeva | bhavati | pratīkaṁ | yadvarmī | yāti | samadāmupasthe |
anāviddhayā | tanvā | jaya | tvaṁ | sa | tvā | varmaṇo | mahimā | pipartu |
dhanvanā | gā | dhanvanājiṁ | jayema | dhanvanā | tīvrāḥ | samado | jayema |
dhanuḥ | śatrorapakāmaṁ | kṛṇoti | dhanvanā | sarvāḥ | pradiśo | jayema |
vakṣyantīvedā | ganīganti | karṇaṁ | priyaṁ | sakhāyaṁ | pariṣasvajānā |
yoṣeva | śiṅkte | vitatādhi | dhanvañjyeyaṁ | samane | pārayantī |
te | ācarantī | samaneva | yoṣā | māteva | putraṁ | bibhṛtāmupasthe |
apa | śatrūnvidhyatāṁ | saṁvidāne | ārtnīme | viṣphurantī | amitrān |
bahvīnāṁ | pitā | bahurasya | putraściścā | kṛṇoti | samanāvagatya |
iṣudhiḥ | saṅkāḥ | pṛtanāśca | sarvāḥ | pṛṣṭhe | ninaddho | jayati | prasūtaḥ |
rathe | tiṣṭhannayati | vājinaḥ | puro | yatrayatra | kāmayate | suṣārathiḥ |
abhīśūnāṁ | mahimānaṁ | panāyata | manaḥ | paścādanu | yacchanti | raśmayaḥ |
tīvrānghoṣānkṛṇvate | vṛṣapāṇayo'śvā | rathebhiḥ | saha | vājayantaḥ |
avakrāmantaḥ | prapadairamitrānkṣiṇanti | śatrūm̐ranapavyayantaḥ |
rathavāhanaṁ | havirasya | nāma | yatrāyudhaṁ | nihitamasya | varma |
tatrā | rathamupa | śagmaṁ | sadema | viśvāhā | vayaṁ | sumanasyamānāḥ |
svāduṣaṁsadaḥ | pitaro | vayodhāḥ | kṛcchreśritaḥ | śaktīvanto | gabhīrāḥ |
citraseneṣubalā | amṛdhrāḥ | satovīroravo | vrātasāhāḥ |
brāhmaṇāsaḥ | pitaraḥ | somyāsaḥ | śive | no | dyāvāpṛthivī | anehasā |
pūṣā | naḥ | pātu | duritādṛtāvṛdho | rakṣā | mākirno | aghaśaṁseśata |
suparṇaṁ | vaste | mṛgo | asyā | danto | gobhiḥ | saṁnaddhā | patati | prasūtā |
yatrā | naraḥ | saṁ | ca | vi | ca | dravanti | tatrāsmabhyamiṣavaḥ | śarma | yaṁsan |
ṛjīte | pari | vṛṅdhi | no'śmā | bhavatu | nastanūḥ |
somo | adhi | bravītu | no'ditiḥ | śarma | yacchatu |
ā | jaṅghanti | sānveṣāṁ | jaghanām̐ | upa | jighnate |
aśvājani | pracetaso'śvāntsamatsu | codaya |
ahiriva | bhogaiḥ | paryeti | bāhuṁ | jyāyā | hetiṁ | paribādhamānaḥ |
hastaghno | viśvā | vayunāni | vidvānpumānpumāṁsaṁ | pari | pātu | viśvataḥ |
ālāktā | yā | ruruśīrṣṇyatho | yasyāyo | mukham |
idaṁ | parjanyaretaseṣvai | devyai | bṛhannamaḥ |
avasṛṣṭā | parā | pata | śaravye | brahmasaṁśite |
gacchāmitrānpra | padyasva | māmīṣāṁ | kaṁ | canocchiṣaḥ |
yatra | bāṇāḥ | saṁpatanti | kumārā | viśikheva |
tatrā | no | brahmaṇaspatiraditiḥ | śarma | yacchatu | viśvāhā | śarma | yacchatu |
marmāṇi | te | varmaṇā | chādayāmi | somastvā | rājāmṛtenānu | vastām |
urorvarīyo | varuṇaste | kṛṇotu | jayantaṁ | tvānu | devā | madantu |
yo | naḥ | svo | araṇo | yaśca | niṣṭyo | jighāṁsati |
devāstaṁ | sarve | dhūrvantu | brahma | varma | mamāntaram |
agniṁ | naro | dīdhitibhiraraṇyorhastacyutī | janayanta | praśastam |
dūredṛśaṁ | gṛhapatimatharyum |
tamagnimaste | vasavo | nyṛṇvantsupraticakṣamavase | kutaścit |
dakṣāyyo | yo | damāsa | nityaḥ |
preddho | agne | dīdihi | puro | no'jasrayā | sūrmyā | yaviṣṭha |
tvāṁ | śaśvantopa | yanti | vājāḥ |
pra | te | agnayo'gnibhyo | varaṁ | niḥ | suvīrāsaḥ | śośucanta | dyumantaḥ |
yatrā | naraḥ | samāsate | sujātāḥ |
dā | no | agne | dhiyā | rayiṁ | suvīraṁ | svapatyaṁ | sahasya | praśastam |
na | yaṁ | yāvā | tarati | yātumāvān |
upa | yameti | yuvatiḥ | sudakṣaṁ | doṣā | vastorhaviṣmatī | ghṛtācī |
upa | svainamaramatirvasūyuḥ |
viśvāgne'pa | dahārātīryebhistapobhiradaho | jarūtham |
pra | nisvaraṁ | cātayasvāmīvām |
ā | yaste | agnedhate | anīkaṁ | vasiṣṭha | śukra | dīdivaḥ | pāvaka |
uto | naibhiḥ | stavathairiha | syāḥ |
vi | ye | te | agne | bhejire | anīkaṁ | martā | naraḥ | pitryāsaḥ | purutrā |
uto | naibhiḥ | sumaneha | syāḥ |
ime | naro | vṛtrahatyeṣu | śūrā | viśvādevīrabhi | santu | māyāḥ |
ye | me | dhiyaṁ | panayanta | praśastām |
mā | śūne | agne | ni | ṣadāma | nṛṇāṁ | māśeṣaso'vīratā | pari | tvā |
prajāvatīṣu | duryāsu | durya |
yamaśvī | nityamupayāti | yajñaṁ | prajāvantaṁ | svapatyaṁ | kṣayaṁ | naḥ |
svajanmanā | śeṣasā | vāvṛdhānam |
pāhi | no | agne | rakṣaso | ajuṣṭātpāhi | dhūrterararuṣo | aghāyoḥ |
tvā | yujā | pṛtanāyūm̐rabhi | ṣyām |
sedagniragnīm̐ratyastvanyānyatra | vājī | tanayo | vīḻupāṇiḥ |
sahasrapāthākṣarā | sameti |
sedagniryo | vanuṣyato | nipāti | sameddhāramaṁhasoruṣyāt |
sujātāsaḥ | pari | caranti | vīrāḥ |
ayaṁ | so | agnirāhutaḥ | purutrā | yamīśānaḥ | samidindhe | haviṣmān |
pari | yametyadhvareṣu | hotā |
tve | agnāhavanāni | bhūrīśānāsā | juhuyāma | nityā |
ubhā | kṛṇvanto | vahatū | miyedhe |
imo | agne | vītatamāni | havyājasro | vakṣi | devatātimaccha |
prati | neṁ | surabhīṇi | vyantu |
mā | no | agne'vīrate | parā | dā | durvāsase'mataye | mā | no | asyai |
mā | naḥ | kṣudhe | mā | rakṣasa | ṛtāvo | mā | no | dame | mā | vanā | juhūrthāḥ |
nū | me | brahmāṇyagnocchaśādhi | tvaṁ | deva | maghavadbhyaḥ | suṣūdaḥ |
rātau | syāmobhayāsā | te | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
tvamagne | suhavo | raṇvasaṁdṛksudītī | sūno | sahaso | didīhi |
mā | tve | sacā | tanaye | nityā | dhaṅmā | vīro | asmannaryo | vi | dāsīt |
mā | no | agne | durbhṛtaye | sacaiṣu | deveddheṣvagniṣu | pra | vocaḥ |
mā | te | asmāndurmatayo | bhṛmācciddevasya | sūno | sahaso | naśanta |
sa | marto | agne | svanīka | revānamartye | yājuhoti | havyam |
sa | devatā | vasuvaniṁ | dadhāti | yaṁ | sūrirarthī | pṛcchamānaiti |
maho | no | agne | suvitasya | vidvānrayiṁ | sūribhyā | vahā | bṛhantam |
yena | vayaṁ | sahasāvanmademāvikṣitāsāyuṣā | suvīrāḥ |
nū | me | brahmāṇyagnocchaśādhi | tvaṁ | deva | maghavadbhyaḥ | suṣūdaḥ |
rātau | syāmobhayāsā | te | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
juṣasva | naḥ | samidhamagne | adya | śocā | bṛhadyajataṁ | dhūmamṛṇvan |
upa | spṛśa | divyaṁ | sānu | stūpaiḥ | saṁ | raśmibhistatanaḥ | sūryasya |
narāśaṁsasya | mahimānameṣāmupa | stoṣāma | yajatasya | yajñaiḥ |
ye | sukratavaḥ | śucayo | dhiyaṁdhāḥ | svadanti | devobhayāni | havyā |
īḻenyaṁ | vo | asuraṁ | sudakṣamantardūtaṁ | rodasī | satyavācam |
manuṣvadagniṁ | manunā | samiddhaṁ | samadhvarāya | sadaminmahema |
saparyavo | bharamāṇābhijñu | pra | vṛñjate | namasā | barhiragnau |
ājuhvānā | ghṛtapṛṣṭhaṁ | pṛṣadvadadhvaryavo | haviṣā | marjayadhvam |
svādhyo | vi | duro | devayanto'śiśrayū | rathayurdevatātā |
pūrvī | śiśuṁ | na | mātarā | rihāṇe | samagruvo | na | samaneṣvañjan |
uta | yoṣaṇe | divye | mahī | noṣāsānaktā | sudugheva | dhenuḥ |
barhiṣadā | puruhūte | maghonī | ā | yajñiye | suvitāya | śrayetām |
viprā | yajñeṣu | mānuṣeṣu | kārū | manye | vāṁ | jātavedasā | yajadhyai |
ūrdhvaṁ | no | adhvaraṁ | kṛtaṁ | haveṣu | tā | deveṣu | vanatho | vāryāṇi |
ā | bhāratī | bhāratībhiḥ | sajoṣeḻā | devairmanuṣyebhiragniḥ |
sarasvatī | sārasvatebhirarvāktisro | devīrbarhiredaṁ | sadantu |
tannasturīpamadha | poṣayitnu | deva | tvaṣṭarvi | rarāṇaḥ | syasva |
yato | vīraḥ | karmaṇyaḥ | sudakṣo | yuktagrāvā | jāyate | devakāmaḥ |
vanaspate'va | sṛjopa | devānagnirhaviḥ | śamitā | sūdayāti |
sedu | hotā | satyataro | yajāti | yathā | devānāṁ | janimāni | veda |
ā | yāhyagne | samidhāno | arvāṅindreṇa | devaiḥ | sarathaṁ | turebhiḥ |
barhirnāstāmaditiḥ | suputrā | svāhā | devāmṛtā | mādayantām |
agniṁ | vo | devamagnibhiḥ | sajoṣā | yajiṣṭhaṁ | dūtamadhvare | kṛṇudhvam |
yo | martyeṣu | nidhruvirṛtāvā | tapurmūrdhā | ghṛtānnaḥ | pāvakaḥ |
prothadaśvo | na | yavase'viṣyanyadā | mahaḥ | saṁvaraṇādvyasthāt |
ādasya | vāto | anu | vāti | śociradha | sma | te | vrajanaṁ | kṛṣṇamasti |
udyasya | te | navajātasya | vṛṣṇo'gne | carantyajaredhānāḥ |
acchā | dyāmaruṣo | dhūmaiti | saṁ | dūto | agneyase | hi | devān |
vi | yasya | te | pṛthivyāṁ | pājo | aśrettṛṣu | yadannā | samavṛkta | jambhaiḥ |
seneva | sṛṣṭā | prasitiṣṭaiti | yavaṁ | na | dasma | juhvā | vivekṣi |
tamiddoṣā | tamuṣasi | yaviṣṭhamagnimatyaṁ | na | marjayanta | naraḥ |
niśiśānātithimasya | yonau | dīdāya | śocirāhutasya | vṛṣṇaḥ |
susaṁdṛkte | svanīka | pratīkaṁ | vi | yadrukmo | na | rocasopāke |
divo | na | te | tanyatureti | śuṣmaścitro | na | sūraḥ | prati | cakṣi | bhānum |
yathā | vaḥ | svāhāgnaye | dāśema | parīḻābhirghṛtavadbhiśca | havyaiḥ |
tebhirno | agne | amitairmahobhiḥ | śataṁ | pūrbhirāyasībhirni | pāhi |
yā | vā | te | santi | dāśuṣe | adhṛṣṭā | giro | vā | yābhirnṛvatīruruṣyāḥ |
tābhirnaḥ | sūno | sahaso | ni | pāhi | smatsūrīñjaritṝñjātavedaḥ |
niryatpūteva | svadhitiḥ | śucirgātsvayā | kṛpā | tanvā | rocamānaḥ |
ā | yo | mātroruśenyo | janiṣṭa | devayajyāya | sukratuḥ | pāvakaḥ |
etā | no | agne | saubhagā | didīhyapi | kratuṁ | sucetasaṁ | vatema |
viśvā | stotṛbhyo | gṛṇate | ca | santu | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
pra | vaḥ | śukrāya | bhānave | bharadhvaṁ | havyaṁ | matiṁ | cāgnaye | supūtam |
yo | daivyāni | mānuṣā | janūṁṣyantarviśvāni | vidmanā | jigāti |
sa | gṛtso | agnistaruṇaścidastu | yato | yaviṣṭho | ajaniṣṭa | mātuḥ |
saṁ | yo | vanā | yuvate | śucidanbhūri | cidannā | samidatti | sadyaḥ |
asya | devasya | saṁsadyanīke | yaṁ | martāsaḥ | śyetaṁ | jagṛbhre |
ni | yo | gṛbhaṁ | pauruṣeyīmuvoca | durokamagnirāyave | śuśoca |
ayaṁ | kavirakaviṣu | pracetā | marteṣvagniramṛto | ni | dhāyi |
sa | mā | no | atra | juhuraḥ | sahasvaḥ | sadā | tve | sumanasaḥ | syāma |
ā | yo | yoniṁ | devakṛtaṁ | sasāda | kratvā | hyagniramṛtām̐ | atārīt |
tamoṣadhīśca | vaninaśca | garbhaṁ | bhūmiśca | viśvadhāyasaṁ | bibharti |
īśe | hyagniramṛtasya | bhūrerīśe | rāyaḥ | suvīryasya | dātoḥ |
mā | tvā | vayaṁ | sahasāvannavīrā | māpsavaḥ | pari | ṣadāma | māduvaḥ |
pariṣadyaṁ | hyaraṇasya | rekṇo | nityasya | rāyaḥ | patayaḥ | syāma |
na | śeṣo | agne | anyajātamastyacetānasya | mā | patho | vi | dukṣaḥ |
nahi | grabhāyāraṇaḥ | suśevo'nyodaryo | manasā | mantavo |
adhā | cidokaḥ | punaritsaityā | no | vājyabhīṣāḻetu | navyaḥ |
tvamagne | vanuṣyato | ni | pāhi | tvamu | naḥ | sahasāvannavadyāt |
saṁ | tvā | dhvasmanvadabhyetu | pāthaḥ | saṁ | rayiḥ | spṛhayāyyaḥ | sahasrī |
etā | no | agne | saubhagā | didīhyapi | kratuṁ | sucetasaṁ | vatema |
viśvā | stotṛbhyo | gṛṇate | ca | santu | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
prāgnaye | tavase | bharadhvaṁ | giraṁ | divo | arataye | pṛthivyāḥ |
yo | viśveṣāmamṛtānāmupasthe | vaiśvānaro | vāvṛdhe | jāgṛvadbhiḥ |
pṛṣṭo | divi | dhāyyagniḥ | pṛthivyāṁ | netā | sindhūnāṁ | vṛṣabhaḥ | stiyānām |
sa | mānuṣīrabhi | viśo | vi | bhāti | vaiśvānaro | vāvṛdhāno | vareṇa |
tvadbhiyā | viśāyannasiknīrasamanā | jahatīrbhojanāni |
vaiśvānara | pūrave | śośucānaḥ | puro | yadagne | darayannadīdeḥ |
tava | tridhātu | pṛthivī | uta | dyaurvaiśvānara | vratamagne | sacanta |
tvaṁ | bhāsā | rodasī | ā | tatanthājasreṇa | śociṣā | śośucānaḥ |
tvāmagne | harito | vāvaśānā | giraḥ | sacante | dhunayo | ghṛtācīḥ |
patiṁ | kṛṣṭīnāṁ | rathyaṁ | rayīṇāṁ | vaiśvānaramuṣasāṁ | ketumahnām |
tve | asuryaṁ | vasavo | nyṛṇvankratuṁ | hi | te | mitramaho | juṣanta |
tvaṁ | dasyūm̐rokaso | agnāja | uru | jyotirjanayannāryāya |
sa | jāyamānaḥ | parame | vyomanvāyurna | pāthaḥ | pari | pāsi | sadyaḥ |
tvaṁ | bhuvanā | janayannabhi | krannapatyāya | jātavedo | daśasyan |
tāmagne | asme | iṣamerayasva | vaiśvānara | dyumatīṁ | jātavedaḥ |
yayā | rādhaḥ | pinvasi | viśvavāra | pṛthu | śravo | dāśuṣe | martyāya |
taṁ | no | agne | maghavadbhyaḥ | purukṣuṁ | rayiṁ | ni | vājaṁ | śrutyaṁ | yuvasva |
vaiśvānara | mahi | naḥ | śarma | yaccha | rudrebhiragne | vasubhiḥ | sajoṣāḥ |
pra | samrājo | asurasya | praśastiṁ | puṁsaḥ | kṛṣṭīnāmanumādyasya |
indrasyeva | pra | tavasaskṛtāni | vande | dāruṁ | vandamāno | vivakmi |
kaviṁ | ketuṁ | dhāsiṁ | bhānumadrerhinvanti | śaṁ | rājyaṁ | rodasyoḥ |
puraṁdarasya | gīrbhirā | vivāse'gnervratāni | pūrvyā | mahāni |
nyakratūngrathino | mṛdhravācaḥ | paṇīm̐raśraddhām̐ | avṛdhām̐ | ayajñān |
prapra | tāndasyūm̐ragnirvivāya | pūrvaścakārāparām̐ | ayajyūn |
yo | apācīne | tamasi | madantīḥ | prācīścakāra | nṛtamaḥ | śacībhiḥ |
tamīśānaṁ | vasvo | agniṁ | gṛṇīṣe'nānataṁ | damayantaṁ | pṛtanyūn |
yo | dehyo | anamayadvadhasnairyo | aryapatnīruṣasaścakāra |
sa | nirudhyā | nahuṣo | yahvo | agnirviśaścakre | balihṛtaḥ | sahobhiḥ |
yasya | śarmannupa | viśve | janāsaivaistasthuḥ | sumatiṁ | bhikṣamāṇāḥ |
vaiśvānaro | varamā | rodasyorāgniḥ | sasāda | pitrorupastham |
ā | devo | dade | budhnyā | vasūni | vaiśvānaroditā | sūryasya |
ā | samudrādavarādā | parasmādāgnirdade | divā | pṛthivyāḥ |
pra | vo | devaṁ | citsahasānamagnimaśvaṁ | na | vājinaṁ | hiṣe | namobhiḥ |
bhavā | no | dūto | adhvarasya | vidvāntmanā | deveṣu | vivide | mitadruḥ |
ā | yāhyagne | pathyānu | svā | mandro | devānāṁ | sakhyaṁ | juṣāṇaḥ |
ā | sānu | śuṣmairnadayanpṛthivyā | jambhebhirviśvamuśadhagvanāni |
prācīno | yajñaḥ | sudhitaṁ | hi | barhiḥ | prīṇīte | agnirīḻito | na | hotā |
ā | mātarā | viśvavāre | huvāno | yato | yaviṣṭha | jajñiṣe | suśevaḥ |
sadyo | adhvare | rathiraṁ | jananta | mānuṣāso | vicetaso | yaiṣām |
viśāmadhāyi | viśpatirduroṇe'gnirmandro | madhuvacā | ṛtāvā |
asādi | vṛto | vahnirājaganvānagnirbrahmā | nṛṣadane | vidhartā |
dyauśca | yaṁ | pṛthivī | vāvṛdhāte | ā | yaṁ | hotā | yajati | viśvavāram |
ete | dyumnebhirviśvamātiranta | mantraṁ | ye | vāraṁ | naryātakṣan |
pra | ye | viśastiranta | śroṣamāṇā | ye | me | asya | dīdhayannṛtasya |
nū | tvāmagnemahe | vasiṣṭheśānaṁ | sūno | sahaso | vasūnām |
iṣaṁ | stotṛbhyo | maghavadbhyānaḍyūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
indhe | rājā | samaryo | namobhiryasya | pratīkamāhutaṁ | ghṛtena |
naro | havyebhirīḻate | sabādhāgniragra | uṣasāmaśoci |
ayamu | ṣya | sumahām̐ | avedi | hotā | mandro | manuṣo | yahvo | agniḥ |
vi | bhākaḥ | sasṛjānaḥ | pṛthivyāṁ | kṛṣṇapaviroṣadhībhirvavakṣe |
kayā | no | agne | vi | vasaḥ | suvṛktiṁ | kāmu | svadhāmṛṇavaḥ | śasyamānaḥ |
kadā | bhavema | patayaḥ | sudatra | rāyo | vantāro | duṣṭarasya | sādhoḥ |
praprāyamagnirbharatasya | śṛṇve | vi | yatsūryo | na | rocate | bṛhadbhāḥ |
abhi | yaḥ | pūruṁ | pṛtanāsu | tasthau | dyutāno | daivyo | atithiḥ | śuśoca |
asannittve | āhavanāni | bhūri | bhuvo | viśvebhiḥ | sumanānīkaiḥ |
stutaścidagne | śṛṇviṣe | gṛṇānaḥ | svayaṁ | vardhasva | tanvaṁ | sujāta |
idaṁ | vacaḥ | śatasāḥ | saṁsahasramudagnaye | janiṣīṣṭa | dvibarhāḥ |
śaṁ | yatstotṛbhyāpaye | bhavāti | dyumadamīvacātanaṁ | rakṣohā |
nū | tvāmagnemahe | vasiṣṭheśānaṁ | sūno | sahaso | vasūnām |
iṣaṁ | stotṛbhyo | maghavadbhyānaḍyūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
abodhi | jāroṣasāmupasthāddhotā | mandraḥ | kavitamaḥ | pāvakaḥ |
dadhāti | ketumubhayasya | jantorhavyā | deveṣu | draviṇaṁ | sukṛtsu |
sa | sukraturyo | vi | duraḥ | paṇīnāṁ | punāno | arkaṁ | purubhojasaṁ | naḥ |
hotā | mandro | viśāṁ | damūnāstirastamo | dadṛśe | rāmyāṇām |
amūraḥ | kaviraditirvivasvāntsusaṁsanmitro | atithiḥ | śivo | naḥ |
citrabhānuruṣasāṁ | bhātyagre'pāṁ | garbhaḥ | prasvā | viveśa |
īḻenyo | vo | manuṣo | yugeṣu | samanagāśucajjātavedāḥ |
susaṁdṛśā | bhānunā | yo | vibhāti | prati | gāvaḥ | samidhānaṁ | budhanta |
agne | yāhi | dūtyaṁ | mā | riṣaṇyo | devām̐ | acchā | brahmakṛtā | gaṇena |
sarasvatīṁ | maruto | aśvināpo | yakṣi | devānratnadheyāya | viśvān |
tvāmagne | samidhāno | vasiṣṭho | jarūthaṁ | hanyakṣi | rāye | puraṁdhim |
puruṇīthā | jātavedo | jarasva | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
uṣo | na | jāraḥ | pṛthu | pājo | aśreddavidyutaddīdyacchośucānaḥ |
vṛṣā | hariḥ | śucirā | bhāti | bhāsā | dhiyo | hinvānośatīrajīgaḥ |
svarṇa | vastoruṣasāmaroci | yajñaṁ | tanvānośijo | na | manma |
agnirjanmāni | devā | vi | vidvāndravaddūto | devayāvā | vaniṣṭhaḥ |
acchā | giro | matayo | devayantīragniṁ | yanti | draviṇaṁ | bhikṣamāṇāḥ |
susaṁdṛśaṁ | supratīkaṁ | svañcaṁ | havyavāhamaratiṁ | mānuṣāṇām |
indraṁ | no | agne | vasubhiḥ | sajoṣā | rudraṁ | rudrebhirā | vahā | bṛhantam |
ādityebhiraditiṁ | viśvajanyāṁ | bṛhaspatimṛkvabhirviśvavāram |
mandraṁ | hotāramuśijo | yaviṣṭhamagniṁ | viśeḻate | adhvareṣu |
sa | hi | kṣapāvām̐ | abhavadrayīṇāmatandro | dūto | yajathāya | devān |
mahām̐ | asyadhvarasya | praketo | na | ṛte | tvadamṛtā | mādayante |
ā | viśvebhiḥ | sarathaṁ | yāhi | devairnyagne | hotā | prathamaḥ | sadeha |
tvāmīḻate | ajiraṁ | dūtyāya | haviṣmantaḥ | sadaminmānuṣāsaḥ |
yasya | devairāsado | barhiragne'hānyasmai | sudinā | bhavanti |
triścidaktoḥ | pra | cikiturvasūni | tve | antardāśuṣe | martyāya |
manuṣvadagneha | yakṣi | devānbhavā | no | dūto | abhiśastipāvā |
agnirīśe | bṛhato | adhvarasyāgnirviśvasya | haviṣaḥ | kṛtasya |
kratuṁ | hyasya | vasavo | juṣantāthā | devā | dadhire | havyavāham |
āgne | vaha | haviradyāya | devānindrajyeṣṭhāseha | mādayantām |
imaṁ | yajñaṁ | divi | deveṣu | dhehi | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
aganma | mahā | namasā | yaviṣṭhaṁ | yo | dīdāya | samiddhaḥ | sve | duroṇe |
citrabhānuṁ | rodasī | antarurvī | svāhutaṁ | viśvataḥ | pratyañcam |
sa | mahnā | viśvā | duritāni | sāhvānagniḥ | ṣṭave | damā | jātavedāḥ |
sa | no | rakṣiṣadduritādavadyādasmāngṛṇatota | no | maghonaḥ |
tvaṁ | varuṇota | mitro | agne | tvāṁ | vardhanti | matibhirvasiṣṭhāḥ |
tve | vasu | suṣaṇanāni | santu | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
prāgnaye | viśvaśuce | dhiyaṁdhe'suraghne | manma | dhītiṁ | bharadhvam |
bhare | havirna | barhiṣi | prīṇāno | vaiśvānarāya | yataye | matīnām |
tvamagne | śociṣā | śośucānā | rodasī | apṛṇā | jāyamānaḥ |
tvaṁ | devām̐ | abhiśasteramuñco | vaiśvānara | jātavedo | mahitvā |
jāto | yadagne | bhuvanā | vyakhyaḥ | paśūnna | goperyaḥ | parijmā |
vaiśvānara | brahmaṇe | vinda | gātuṁ | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
samidhā | jātavedase | devāya | devahūtibhiḥ |
havirbhiḥ | śukraśociṣe | namasvino | vayaṁ | dāśemāgnaye |
vayaṁ | te | agne | samidhā | vidhema | vayaṁ | dāśema | suṣṭutī | yajatra |
vayaṁ | ghṛtenādhvarasya | hotarvayaṁ | deva | haviṣā | bhadraśoce |
ā | no | devebhirupa | devahūtimagne | yāhi | vaṣaṭkṛtiṁ | juṣāṇaḥ |
tubhyaṁ | devāya | dāśataḥ | syāma | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
upasadyāya | mīḻhuṣāsye | juhutā | haviḥ |
yo | no | nediṣṭhamāpyam |
yaḥ | pañca | carṣaṇīrabhi | niṣasāda | damedame |
kavirgṛhapatiryuvā |
sa | no | vedo | amātyamagnī | rakṣatu | viśvataḥ |
utāsmānpātvaṁhasaḥ |
navaṁ | nu | stomamagnaye | divaḥ | śyenāya | jījanam |
vasvaḥ | kuvidvanāti | naḥ |
spārhā | yasya | śriyo | dṛśe | rayirvīravato | yathā |
agre | yajñasya | śocataḥ |
semāṁ | vetu | vaṣaṭkṛtimagnirjuṣata | no | giraḥ |
yajiṣṭho | havyavāhanaḥ |
ni | tvā | nakṣya | viśpate | dyumantaṁ | deva | dhīmahi |
suvīramagnāhuta |
kṣaposraśca | dīdihi | svagnayastvayā | vayam |
suvīrastvamasmayuḥ |
upa | tvā | sātaye | naro | viprāso | yanti | dhītibhiḥ |
upākṣarā | sahasriṇī |
agnī | rakṣāṁsi | sedhati | śukraśociramartyaḥ |
śuciḥ | pāvakeḍyaḥ |
sa | no | rādhāṁsyā | bhareśānaḥ | sahaso | yaho |
bhagaśca | dātu | vāryam |
tvamagne | vīravadyaśo | devaśca | savitā | bhagaḥ |
ditiśca | dāti | vāryam |
agne | rakṣā | ṇo | aṁhasaḥ | prati | ṣma | deva | rīṣataḥ |
tapiṣṭhairajaro | daha |
adhā | mahī | nāyasyanādhṛṣṭo | nṛpītaye |
pūrbhavā | śatabhujiḥ |
tvaṁ | naḥ | pāhyaṁhaso | doṣāvastaraghāyataḥ |
divā | naktamadābhya |
enā | vo | agniṁ | namasorjo | napātamā | huve |
priyaṁ | cetiṣṭhamaratiṁ | svadhvaraṁ | viśvasya | dūtamamṛtam |
sa | yojate | aruṣā | viśvabhojasā | sa | dudravatsvāhutaḥ |
subrahmā | yajñaḥ | suśamī | vasūnāṁ | devaṁ | rādho | janānām |
udasya | śocirasthādājuhvānasya | mīḻhuṣaḥ |
uddhūmāso | aruṣāso | divispṛśaḥ | samagnimindhate | naraḥ |
taṁ | tvā | dūtaṁ | kṛṇmahe | yaśastamaṁ | devām̐ | ā | vītaye | vaha |
viśvā | sūno | sahaso | martabhojanā | rāsva | tadyattvemahe |
tvamagne | gṛhapatistvaṁ | hotā | no | adhvare |
tvaṁ | potā | viśvavāra | pracetā | yakṣi | veṣi | ca | vāryam |
kṛdhi | ratnaṁ | yajamānāya | sukrato | tvaṁ | hi | ratnadhāsi |
ā | na | ṛte | śiśīhi | viśvamṛtvijaṁ | suśaṁso | yaśca | dakṣate |
tve | agne | svāhuta | priyāsaḥ | santu | sūrayaḥ |
yantāro | ye | maghavāno | janānāmūrvāndayanta | gonām |
yeṣāmiḻā | ghṛtahastā | duroṇām̐ | api | prātā | niṣīdati |
tām̐strāyasva | sahasya | druho | nido | yacchā | naḥ | śarma | dīrghaśrut |
sa | mandrayā | ca | jihvayā | vahnirāsā | viduṣṭaraḥ |
agne | rayiṁ | maghavadbhyo | nā | vaha | havyadātiṁ | ca | sūdaya |
ye | rādhāṁsi | dadatyaśvyā | maghā | kāmena | śravaso | mahaḥ |
tām̐ | aṁhasaḥ | pipṛhi | partṛbhiṣṭvaṁ | śataṁ | pūrbhiryaviṣṭhya |
devo | vo | draviṇodāḥ | pūrṇāṁ | vivaṣṭyāsicam |
udvā | siñcadhvamupa | vā | pṛṇadhvamādidvo | devauhate |
taṁ | hotāramadhvarasya | pracetasaṁ | vahniṁ | devākṛṇvata |
dadhāti | ratnaṁ | vidhate | suvīryamagnirjanāya | dāśuṣe |
agne | bhava | suṣamidhā | samiddhota | barhirurviyā | vi | stṛṇītām |
uta | dvārośatīrvi | śrayantāmuta | devām̐ | uśatā | vaheha |
agne | vīhi | haviṣā | yakṣi | devāntsvadhvarā | kṛṇuhi | jātavedaḥ |
svadhvarā | karati | jātavedā | yakṣaddevām̐ | amṛtānpiprayacca |
vaṁsva | viśvā | vāryāṇi | pracetaḥ | satyā | bhavantvāśiṣo | no | adya |
tvāmu | te | dadhire | havyavāhaṁ | devāso | agnorja | ā | napātam |
te | te | devāya | dāśataḥ | syāma | maho | no | ratnā | vi | dadheyānaḥ |
tve | ha | yatpitaraścinnendra | viśvā | vāmā | jaritāro | asanvan |
tve | gāvaḥ | sudughāstve | hyaśvāstvaṁ | vasu | devayate | vaniṣṭhaḥ |
rājeva | hi | janibhiḥ | kṣeṣyevāva | dyubhirabhi | viduṣkaviḥ | san |
piśā | giro | maghavangobhiraśvaistvāyataḥ | śiśīhi | rāye | asmān |
imo | tvā | paspṛdhānāso | atra | mandrā | giro | devayantīrupa | sthuḥ |
arvācī | te | pathyā | rāyaitu | syāma | te | sumatāvindra | śarman |
dhenuṁ | na | tvā | sūyavase | dudukṣannupa | brahmāṇi | sasṛje | vasiṣṭhaḥ |
tvāminme | gopatiṁ | viśvāhā | nendraḥ | sumatiṁ | gantvaccha |
arṇāṁsi | citpaprathānā | sudāsendro | gādhānyakṛṇotsupārā |
śardhantaṁ | śimyumucathasya | navyaḥ | śāpaṁ | sindhūnāmakṛṇodaśastīḥ |
puroḻetturvaśo | yakṣurāsīdrāye | matsyāso | niśitāpīva |
śruṣṭiṁ | cakrurbhṛgavo | druhyavaśca | sakhā | sakhāyamataradviṣūcoḥ |
ā | pakthāso | bhalānaso | bhanantālināso | viṣāṇinaḥ | śivāsaḥ |
ā | yo'nayatsadhamāryasya | gavyā | tṛtsubhyo | ajaganyudhā | nṝn |
durādhyo | aditiṁ | srevayanto'cetaso | vi | jagṛbhre | paruṣṇīm |
mahnāvivyakpṛthivīṁ | patyamānaḥ | paśuṣkaviraśayaccāyamānaḥ |
īyurarthaṁ | na | nyarthaṁ | paruṣṇīmāśuścanedabhipitvaṁ | jagāma |
sudāsendraḥ | sutukām̐ | amitrānarandhayanmānuṣe | vadhrivācaḥ |
īyurgāvo | na | yavasādagopā | yathākṛtamabhi | mitraṁ | citāsaḥ |
pṛśnigāvaḥ | pṛśninipreṣitāsaḥ | śruṣṭiṁ | cakrurniyuto | rantayaśca |
ekaṁ | ca | yo | viṁśatiṁ | ca | śravasyā | vaikarṇayorjanānrājā | nyastaḥ |
dasmo | na | sadmanni | śiśāti | barhiḥ | śūraḥ | sargamakṛṇodindraiṣām |
adha | śrutaṁ | kavaṣaṁ | vṛddhamapsvanu | druhyuṁ | ni | vṛṇagvajrabāhuḥ |
vṛṇānātra | sakhyāya | sakhyaṁ | tvāyanto | ye | amadannanu | tvā |
vi | sadyo | viśvā | dṛṁhitānyeṣāmindraḥ | puraḥ | sahasā | sapta | dardaḥ |
vyānavasya | tṛtsave | gayaṁ | bhāgjeṣma | pūruṁ | vidathe | mṛdhravācam |
ni | gavyavo'navo | druhyavaśca | ṣaṣṭiḥ | śatā | suṣupuḥ | ṣaṭ | sahasrā |
ṣaṣṭirvīrāso | adhi | ṣaḍduvoyu | viśvedindrasya | vīryā | kṛtāni |
indreṇaite | tṛtsavo | veviṣāṇāpo | na | sṛṣṭādhavanta | nīcīḥ |
durmitrāsaḥ | prakalavinmimānā | jahurviśvāni | bhojanā | sudāse |
ardhaṁ | vīrasya | śṛtapāmanindraṁ | parā | śardhantaṁ | nunude | abhi | kṣām |
indro | manyuṁ | manyumyo | mimāya | bheje | patho | vartaniṁ | patyamānaḥ |
ādhreṇa | cittadvekaṁ | cakāra | siṁhyaṁ | citpetvenā | jaghāna |
ava | sraktīrveśyāvṛścadindraḥ | prāyacchadviśvā | bhojanā | sudāse |
śaśvanto | hi | śatravo | rāradhuṣṭe | bhedasya | cicchardhato | vinda | randhim |
martām̐ | enaḥ | stuvato | yaḥ | kṛṇoti | tigmaṁ | tasminni | jahi | vajramindra |
āvadindraṁ | yamunā | tṛtsavaśca | prātra | bhedaṁ | sarvatātā | muṣāyat |
ajāsaśca | śigravo | yakṣavaśca | baliṁ | śīrṣāṇi | jabhruraśvyāni |
na | tendra | sumatayo | na | rāyaḥ | saṁcakṣe | pūrvoṣaso | na | nūtnāḥ |
devakaṁ | cinmānyamānaṁ | jaghanthāva | tmanā | bṛhataḥ | śambaraṁ | bhet |
pra | ye | gṛhādamamadustvāyā | parāśaraḥ | śatayāturvasiṣṭhaḥ |
na | te | bhojasya | sakhyaṁ | mṛṣantādhā | sūribhyaḥ | sudinā | vyucchān |
dve | napturdevavataḥ | śate | gordvā | rathā | vadhūmantā | sudāsaḥ |
arhannagne | paijavanasya | dānaṁ | hoteva | sadma | paryemi | rebhan |
catvāro | mā | paijavanasya | dānāḥ | smaddiṣṭayaḥ | kṛśanino | nireke |
ṛjrāso | mā | pṛthiviṣṭhāḥ | sudāsastokaṁ | tokāya | śravase | vahanti |
yasya | śravo | rodasī | antarurvī | śīrṣṇeśīrṣṇe | vibabhājā | vibhaktā |
saptedindraṁ | na | sravato | gṛṇanti | ni | yudhyāmadhimaśiśādabhīke |
imaṁ | naro | marutaḥ | saścatānu | divodāsaṁ | na | pitaraṁ | sudāsaḥ |
aviṣṭanā | paijavanasya | ketaṁ | dūṇāśaṁ | kṣatramajaraṁ | duvoyu |
yastigmaśṛṅgo | vṛṣabho | na | bhīmaikaḥ | kṛṣṭīścyāvayati | pra | viśvāḥ |
yaḥ | śaśvato | adāśuṣo | gayasya | prayantāsi | suṣvitarāya | vedaḥ |
tvaṁ | ha | tyadindra | kutsamāvaḥ | śuśrūṣamāṇastanvā | samarye |
dāsaṁ | yacchuṣṇaṁ | kuyavaṁ | nyasmārandhaya | ārjuneyāya | śikṣan |
tvaṁ | dhṛṣṇo | dhṛṣatā | vītahavyaṁ | prāvo | viśvābhirūtibhiḥ | sudāsam |
pra | paurukutsiṁ | trasadasyumāvaḥ | kṣetrasātā | vṛtrahatyeṣu | pūrum |
tvaṁ | nṛbhirnṛmaṇo | devavītau | bhūrīṇi | vṛtrā | haryaśva | haṁsi |
tvaṁ | ni | dasyuṁ | cumuriṁ | dhuniṁ | cāsvāpayo | dabhītaye | suhantu |
tava | cyautnāni | vajrahasta | tāni | nava | yatpuro | navatiṁ | ca | sadyaḥ |
niveśane | śatatamāviveṣīrahañca | vṛtraṁ | namucimutāhan |
sanā | tā | tendra | bhojanāni | rātahavyāya | dāśuṣe | sudāse |
vṛṣṇe | te | harī | vṛṣaṇā | yunajmi | vyantu | brahmāṇi | puruśāka | vājam |
mā | te | asyāṁ | sahasāvanpariṣṭāvaghāya | bhūma | harivaḥ | parādai |
trāyasva | no'vṛkebhirvarūthaistava | priyāsaḥ | sūriṣu | syāma |
priyāsette | maghavannabhiṣṭau | naro | madema | śaraṇe | sakhāyaḥ |
ni | turvaśaṁ | ni | yādvaṁ | śiśīhyatithigvāya | śaṁsyaṁ | kariṣyan |
sadyaścinnu | te | maghavannabhiṣṭau | naraḥ | śaṁsantyukthaśāsokthā |
ye | te | havebhirvi | paṇīm̐radāśannasmānvṛṇīṣva | yujyāya | tasmai |
ete | stomā | narāṁ | nṛtama | tubhyamasmadryañco | dadato | maghāni |
teṣāmindra | vṛtrahatye | śivo | bhūḥ | sakhā | ca | śūro'vitā | ca | nṛṇām |
nū | indra | śūra | stavamānotī | brahmajūtastanvā | vāvṛdhasva |
upa | no | vājānmimīhyupa | stīnyūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
ugro | jajñe | vīryāya | svadhāvāñcakrirapo | naryo | yatkariṣyan |
jagmiryuvā | nṛṣadanamavobhistrātā | nendra | enaso | mahaścit |
hantā | vṛtramindraḥ | śūśuvānaḥ | prāvīnnu | vīro | jaritāramūtī |
kartā | sudāse | aha | vo | lokaṁ | dātā | vasu | muhurā | dāśuṣe | bhūt |
yudhmo | anarvā | khajakṛtsamadvā | śūraḥ | satrāṣāḍjanuṣemaṣāḻhaḥ |
vyāsendraḥ | pṛtanāḥ | svojādhā | viśvaṁ | śatrūyantaṁ | jaghāna |
ubhe | cidindra | rodasī | mahitvā | paprātha | taviṣībhistuviṣmaḥ |
ni | vajramindro | harivānmimikṣantsamandhasā | madeṣu | vovoca |
vṛṣā | jajāna | vṛṣaṇaṁ | raṇāya | tamu | cinnārī | naryaṁ | sasūva |
pra | yaḥ | senānīradha | nṛbhyo | astīnaḥ | satvā | gaveṣaṇaḥ | sa | dhṛṣṇuḥ |
nū | citsa | bhreṣate | jano | na | reṣanmano | yo | asya | ghoramāvivāsāt |
yajñairyendre | dadhate | duvāṁsi | kṣayatsa | rāya | ṛtapā | ṛtejāḥ |
yadindra | pūrvo | aparāya | śikṣannayajjyāyānkanīyaso | deṣṇam |
amṛtetparyāsīta | dūramā | citra | citryaṁ | bharā | rayiṁ | naḥ |
yastendra | priyo | jano | dadāśadasannireke | adrivaḥ | sakhā | te |
vayaṁ | te | asyāṁ | sumatau | caniṣṭhāḥ | syāma | varūthe | aghnato | nṛpītau |
eṣa | stomo | acikradadvṛṣā | tota | stāmurmaghavannakrapiṣṭa |
rāyaskāmo | jaritāraṁ | tāgantvamaṅga | śakra | vasvā | śako | naḥ |
sa | nendra | tvayatāyeṣe | dhāstmanā | ca | ye | maghavāno | junanti |
vasvī | ṣu | te | jaritre | astu | śaktiryūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
asāvi | devaṁ | goṛjīkamandho | nyasminnindro | januṣemuvoca |
bodhāmasi | tvā | haryaśva | yajñairbodhā | naḥ | stomamandhaso | madeṣu |
pra | yanti | yajñaṁ | vipayanti | barhiḥ | somamādo | vidathe | dudhravācaḥ |
nyu | bhriyante | yaśaso | gṛbhādā | dūraüpabdo | vṛṣaṇo | nṛṣācaḥ |
tvamindra | sravitavāpaskaḥ | pariṣṭhitāhinā | śūra | pūrvīḥ |
tvadvāvakre | rathyo | na | dhenā | rejante | viśvā | kṛtrimāṇi | bhīṣā |
bhīmo | viveṣāyudhebhireṣāmapāṁsi | viśvā | naryāṇi | vidvān |
indraḥ | puro | jarhṛṣāṇo | vi | dūdhodvi | vajrahasto | mahinā | jaghāna |
na | yātavendra | jūjuvurno | na | vandanā | śaviṣṭha | vedyābhiḥ |
sa | śardhadaryo | viṣuṇasya | jantormā | śiśnadevāpi | gurṛtaṁ | naḥ |
abhi | kratvendra | bhūradha | jmanna | te | vivyaṅmahimānaṁ | rajāṁsi |
svenā | hi | vṛtraṁ | śavasā | jaghantha | na | śatrurantaṁ | vividadyudhā | te |
devāścitte | asuryāya | pūrve'nu | kṣatrāya | mamire | sahāṁsi |
indro | maghāni | dayate | viṣahyendraṁ | vājasya | johuvanta | sātau |
kīriściddhi | tvāmavase | juhāveśānamindra | saubhagasya | bhūreḥ |
avo | babhūtha | śatamūte | asme | abhikṣattustvāvato | varūtā |
sakhāyastendra | viśvaha | syāma | namovṛdhāso | mahinā | tarutra |
vanvantu | smā | te'vasā | samīke'bhītimaryo | vanuṣāṁ | śavāṁsi |
sa | nendra | tvayatāyeṣe | dhāstmanā | ca | ye | maghavāno | junanti |
vasvī | ṣu | te | jaritre | astu | śaktiryūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
pibā | somamindra | mandatu | tvā | yaṁ | te | suṣāva | haryaśvādriḥ |
soturbāhubhyāṁ | suyato | nārvā |
yaste | mado | yujyaścārurasti | yena | vṛtrāṇi | haryaśva | haṁsi |
sa | tvāmindra | prabhūvaso | mamattu |
bodhā | su | me | maghavanvācamemāṁ | yāṁ | te | vasiṣṭho | arcati | praśastim |
imā | brahma | sadhamāde | juṣasva |
śrudhī | havaṁ | vipipānasyādrerbodhā | viprasyārcato | manīṣām |
kṛṣvā | duvāṁsyantamā | sacemā |
na | te | giro | api | mṛṣye | turasya | na | suṣṭutimasuryasya | vidvān |
sadā | te | nāma | svayaśo | vivakmi |
bhūri | hi | te | savanā | mānuṣeṣu | bhūri | manīṣī | havate | tvāmit |
māre | asmanmaghavañjyokkaḥ |
tubhyedimā | savanā | śūra | viśvā | tubhyaṁ | brahmāṇi | vardhanā | kṛṇomi |
tvaṁ | nṛbhirhavyo | viśvadhāsi |
nū | cinnu | te | manyamānasya | dasmodaśnuvanti | mahimānamugra |
na | vīryamindra | te | na | rādhaḥ |
ye | ca | pūrva | ṛṣayo | ye | ca | nūtnendra | brahmāṇi | janayanta | viprāḥ |
asme | te | santu | sakhyā | śivāni | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
udu | brahmāṇyairata | śravasyendraṁ | samarye | mahayā | vasiṣṭha |
ā | yo | viśvāni | śavasā | tatānopaśrotā | mevato | vacāṁsi |
ayāmi | ghoṣendra | devajāmirirajyanta | yacchurudho | vivāci |
nahi | svamāyuścikite | janeṣu | tānīdaṁhāṁsyati | parṣyasmān |
yuje | rathaṁ | gaveṣaṇaṁ | haribhyāmupa | brahmāṇi | jujuṣāṇamasthuḥ |
vi | bādhiṣṭa | sya | rodasī | mahitvendro | vṛtrāṇyapratī | jaghanvān |
āpaścitpipyuḥ | staryo | na | gāvo | nakṣannṛtaṁ | jaritārastendra |
yāhi | vāyurna | niyuto | no | acchā | tvaṁ | hi | dhībhirdayase | vi | vājān |
te | tvā | madendra | mādayantu | śuṣmiṇaṁ | tuvirādhasaṁ | jaritre |
eko | devatrā | dayase | hi | martānasmiñchūra | savane | mādayasva |
evedindraṁ | vṛṣaṇaṁ | vajrabāhuṁ | vasiṣṭhāso | abhyarcantyarkaiḥ |
sa | naḥ | stuto | vīravaddhātu | gomadyūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
yoniṣṭendra | sadane | akāri | tamā | nṛbhiḥ | puruhūta | pra | yāhi |
aso | yathā | no'vitā | vṛdhe | ca | dado | vasūni | mamadaśca | somaiḥ |
gṛbhītaṁ | te | manendra | dvibarhāḥ | sutaḥ | somaḥ | pariṣiktā | madhūni |
visṛṣṭadhenā | bharate | suvṛktiriyamindraṁ | johuvatī | manīṣā |
ā | no | divā | pṛthivyā | ṛjīṣinnidaṁ | barhiḥ | somapeyāya | yāhi |
vahantu | tvā | harayo | madryañcamāṅgūṣamacchā | tavasaṁ | madāya |
ā | no | viśvābhirūtibhiḥ | sajoṣā | brahma | juṣāṇo | haryaśva | yāhi |
varīvṛjatsthavirebhiḥ | suśiprāsme | dadhadvṛṣaṇaṁ | śuṣmamindra |
eṣa | stomo | mahogrāya | vāhe | dhurīvātyo | na | vājayannadhāyi |
indra | tvāyamarkeṭṭe | vasūnāṁ | divīva | dyāmadhi | naḥ | śromataṁ | dhāḥ |
evā | nendra | vāryasya | pūrdhi | pra | te | mahīṁ | sumatiṁ | vevidāma |
iṣaṁ | pinva | maghavadbhyaḥ | suvīrāṁ | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
ā | te | mahendrotyugra | samanyavo | yatsamaranta | senāḥ |
patāti | didyunnaryasya | bāhvormā | te | mano | viṣvadryagvi | cārīt |
ni | durgendra | śnathihyamitrānabhi | ye | no | martāso | amanti |
āre | taṁ | śaṁsaṁ | kṛṇuhi | ninitsorā | no | bhara | saṁbharaṇaṁ | vasūnām |
śataṁ | te | śiprinnūtayaḥ | sudāse | sahasraṁ | śaṁsota | rātirastu |
jahi | vadharvanuṣo | martyasyāsme | dyumnamadhi | ratnaṁ | ca | dhehi |
tvāvato | hīndra | kratve | asmi | tvāvato'vituḥ | śūra | rātau |
viśvedahāni | taviṣīvogram̐ | okaḥ | kṛṇuṣva | harivo | na | mardhīḥ |
kutsaite | haryaśvāya | śūṣamindre | saho | devajūtamiyānāḥ |
satrā | kṛdhi | suhanā | śūra | vṛtrā | vayaṁ | tarutrāḥ | sanuyāma | vājam |
evā | nendra | vāryasya | pūrdhi | pra | te | mahīṁ | sumatiṁ | vevidāma |
iṣaṁ | pinva | maghavadbhyaḥ | suvīrāṁ | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
na | somendramasuto | mamāda | nābrahmāṇo | maghavānaṁ | sutāsaḥ |
tasmokthaṁ | janaye | yajjujoṣannṛvannavīyaḥ | śṛṇavadyathā | naḥ |
ukthaükthe | somendraṁ | mamāda | nīthenīthe | maghavānaṁ | sutāsaḥ |
yadīṁ | sabādhaḥ | pitaraṁ | na | putrāḥ | samānadakṣāvase | havante |
cakāra | tā | kṛṇavannūnamanyā | yāni | bruvanti | vedhasaḥ | suteṣu |
janīriva | patirekaḥ | samāno | ni | māmṛje | purendraḥ | su | sarvāḥ |
evā | tamāhuruta | śṛṇvendra | eko | vibhaktā | taraṇirmaghānām |
mithasturotayo | yasya | pūrvīrasme | bhadrāṇi | saścata | priyāṇi |
evā | vasiṣṭhendramūtaye | nṝnkṛṣṭīnāṁ | vṛṣabhaṁ | sute | gṛṇāti |
sahasriṇopa | no | māhi | vājānyūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
indraṁ | naro | nemadhitā | havante | yatpāryā | yunajate | dhiyastāḥ |
śūro | nṛṣātā | śavasaścakānā | gomati | vraje | bhajā | tvaṁ | naḥ |
yendra | śuṣmo | maghavante | asti | śikṣā | sakhibhyaḥ | puruhūta | nṛbhyaḥ |
tvaṁ | hi | dṛḻhā | maghavanvicetāpā | vṛdhi | parivṛtaṁ | na | rādhaḥ |
indro | rājā | jagataścarṣaṇīnāmadhi | kṣami | viṣurūpaṁ | yadasti |
tato | dadāti | dāśuṣe | vasūni | codadrādhopastutaścidarvāk |
nū | cinnendro | maghavā | sahūtī | dāno | vājaṁ | ni | yamate | notī |
anūnā | yasya | dakṣiṇā | pīpāya | vāmaṁ | nṛbhyo | abhivītā | sakhibhyaḥ |
nū | indra | rāye | varivaskṛdhī | nā | te | mano | vavṛtyāma | maghāya |
gomadaśvāvadrathavadvyanto | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
brahmā | ṇendropa | yāhi | vidvānarvāñcaste | harayaḥ | santu | yuktāḥ |
viśve | ciddhi | tvā | vihavanta | martāsmākamicchṛṇuhi | viśvaminva |
havaṁ | tendra | mahimā | vyānaḍbrahma | yatpāsi | śavasinnṛṣīṇām |
ā | yadvajraṁ | dadhiṣe | hastogra | ghoraḥ | sankratvā | janiṣṭhāṣāḻhaḥ |
tava | praṇītīndra | johuvānāntsaṁ | yannṝnna | rodasī | ninetha |
mahe | kṣatrāya | śavase | hi | jajñe'tūtujiṁ | cittūtujiraśiśnat |
ebhirnendrāhabhirdaśasya | durmitrāso | hi | kṣitayaḥ | pavante |
prati | yaccaṣṭe | anṛtamanenāva | dvitā | varuṇo | māyī | naḥ | sāt |
vocemedindraṁ | maghavānamenaṁ | maho | rāyo | rādhaso | yaddadannaḥ |
yo | arcato | brahmakṛtimaviṣṭho | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
ayaṁ | somendra | tubhyaṁ | sunvā | tu | pra | yāhi | harivastadokāḥ |
pibā | tvasya | suṣutasya | cārordado | maghāni | maghavanniyānaḥ |
brahmanvīra | brahmakṛtiṁ | juṣāṇo'rvācīno | haribhiryāhi | tūyam |
asminnū | ṣu | savane | mādayasvopa | brahmāṇi | śṛṇavemā | naḥ |
kā | te | astyaraṁkṛtiḥ | sūktaiḥ | kadā | nūnaṁ | te | maghavandāśema |
viśvā | matīrā | tatane | tvāyādhā | mendra | śṛṇavo | havemā |
uto | ghā | te | puruṣyedāsanyeṣāṁ | pūrveṣāmaśṛṇorṛṣīṇām |
adhāhaṁ | tvā | maghavañjohavīmi | tvaṁ | nendrāsi | pramatiḥ | piteva |
vocemedindraṁ | maghavānamenaṁ | maho | rāyo | rādhaso | yaddadannaḥ |
yo | arcato | brahmakṛtimaviṣṭho | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
ā | no | deva | śavasā | yāhi | śuṣminbhavā | vṛdhendra | rāyo | asya |
mahe | nṛmṇāya | nṛpate | suvajra | mahi | kṣatrāya | pauṁsyāya | śūra |
havanto | tvā | havyaṁ | vivāci | tanūṣu | śūrāḥ | sūryasya | sātau |
tvaṁ | viśveṣu | senyo | janeṣu | tvaṁ | vṛtrāṇi | randhayā | suhantu |
ahā | yadindra | sudinā | vyucchāndadho | yatketumupamaṁ | samatsu |
nyagniḥ | sīdadasuro | na | hotā | huvāno | atra | subhagāya | devān |
vayaṁ | te | tendra | ye | ca | deva | stavanta | śūra | dadato | maghāni |
yacchā | sūribhyopamaṁ | varūthaṁ | svābhuvo | jaraṇāmaśnavanta |
vocemedindraṁ | maghavānamenaṁ | maho | rāyo | rādhaso | yaddadannaḥ |
yo | arcato | brahmakṛtimaviṣṭho | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
pra | vendrāya | mādanaṁ | haryaśvāya | gāyata |
sakhāyaḥ | somapāvne |
śaṁsedukthaṁ | sudānavota | dyukṣaṁ | yathā | naraḥ |
cakṛmā | satyarādhase |
tvaṁ | nendra | vājayustvaṁ | gavyuḥ | śatakrato |
tvaṁ | hiraṇyayurvaso |
vayamindra | tvāyavo'bhi | pra | ṇonumo | vṛṣan |
viddhī | tvasya | no | vaso |
mā | no | nide | ca | vaktave'ryo | randhīrarāvṇe |
tve | api | kraturmama |
tvaṁ | varmāsi | saprathaḥ | puroyodhaśca | vṛtrahan |
tvayā | prati | bruve | yujā |
mahām̐ | utāsi | yasya | te'nu | svadhāvarī | sahaḥ |
mamnāte | indra | rodasī |
taṁ | tvā | marutvatī | pari | bhuvadvāṇī | sayāvarī |
nakṣamāṇā | saha | dyubhiḥ |
ūrdhvāsastvānvindavo | bhuvandasmamupa | dyavi |
saṁ | te | namanta | kṛṣṭayaḥ |
pra | vo | mahe | mahivṛdhe | bharadhvaṁ | pracetase | pra | sumatiṁ | kṛṇudhvam |
viśaḥ | pūrvīḥ | pra | carā | carṣaṇiprāḥ |
uruvyacase | mahine | suvṛktimindrāya | brahma | janayanta | viprāḥ |
tasya | vratāni | na | minanti | dhīrāḥ |
indraṁ | vāṇīranuttamanyumeva | satrā | rājānaṁ | dadhire | sahadhyai |
haryaśvāya | barhayā | samāpīn |
mo | ṣu | tvā | vāghataścanāre | asmanni | rīraman |
ārāttāccitsadhamādaṁ | nā | gahīha | vā | sannupa | śrudhi |
ime | hi | te | brahmakṛtaḥ | sute | sacā | madhau | na | makṣāsate |
indre | kāmaṁ | jaritāro | vasūyavo | rathe | na | pādamā | dadhuḥ |
rāyaskāmo | vajrahastaṁ | sudakṣiṇaṁ | putro | na | pitaraṁ | huve |
imendrāya | sunvire | somāso | dadhyāśiraḥ |
tām̐ | ā | madāya | vajrahasta | pītaye | haribhyāṁ | yāhyokā |
śravacchrutkarṇeyate | vasūnāṁ | nū | cinno | mardhiṣadgiraḥ |
sadyaścidyaḥ | sahasrāṇi | śatā | dadannakirditsantamā | minat |
sa | vīro | apratiṣkutendreṇa | śūśuve | nṛbhiḥ |
yaste | gabhīrā | savanāni | vṛtrahantsunotyā | ca | dhāvati |
bhavā | varūthaṁ | maghavanmaghonāṁ | yatsamajāsi | śardhataḥ |
vi | tvāhatasya | vedanaṁ | bhajemahyā | dūṇāśo | bharā | gayam |
sunotā | somapāvne | somamindrāya | vajriṇe |
pacatā | paktīravase | kṛṇudhvamitpṛṇannitpṛṇate | mayaḥ |
mā | sredhata | somino | dakṣatā | mahe | kṛṇudhvaṁ | rāyātuje |
taraṇirijjayati | kṣeti | puṣyati | na | devāsaḥ | kavatnave |
nakiḥ | sudāso | rathaṁ | paryāsa | na | rīramat |
indro | yasyāvitā | yasya | maruto | gamatsa | gomati | vraje |
gamadvājaṁ | vājayannindra | martyo | yasya | tvamavitā | bhuvaḥ |
asmākaṁ | bodhyavitā | rathānāmasmākaṁ | śūra | nṛṇām |
udinnvasya | ricyateṁ'śo | dhanaṁ | na | jigyuṣaḥ |
yendro | harivānna | dabhanti | taṁ | ripo | dakṣaṁ | dadhāti | somini |
mantramakharvaṁ | sudhitaṁ | supeśasaṁ | dadhāta | yajñiyeṣvā |
pūrvīścana | prasitayastaranti | taṁ | yendre | karmaṇā | bhuvat |
kastamindra | tvāvasumā | martyo | dadharṣati |
śraddhette | maghavanpārye | divi | vājī | vājaṁ | siṣāsati |
maghonaḥ | sma | vṛtrahatyeṣu | codaya | ye | dadati | priyā | vasu |
tava | praṇītī | haryaśva | sūribhirviśvā | tarema | duritā |
tavedindrāvamaṁ | vasu | tvaṁ | puṣyasi | madhyamam |
satrā | viśvasya | paramasya | rājasi | nakiṣṭvā | goṣu | vṛṇvate |
tvaṁ | viśvasya | dhanadāsi | śruto | yeṁ | bhavantyājayaḥ |
tavāyaṁ | viśvaḥ | puruhūta | pārthivo'vasyurnāma | bhikṣate |
yadindra | yāvatastvametāvadahamīśīya |
stotāramiddidhiṣeya | radāvaso | na | pāpatvāya | rāsīya |
śikṣeyaminmahayate | divedive | rāyā | kuhacidvide |
nahi | tvadanyanmaghavannāpyaṁ | vasyo | asti | pitā | cana |
taraṇiritsiṣāsati | vājaṁ | puraṁdhyā | yujā |
ā | vendraṁ | puruhūtaṁ | name | girā | nemiṁ | taṣṭeva | sudrvam |
na | duṣṭutī | martyo | vindate | vasu | na | sredhantaṁ | rayirnaśat |
suśaktirinmaghavantubhyaṁ | māvate | deṣṇaṁ | yatpārye | divi |
abhi | tvā | śūra | nonumo'dugdheva | dhenavaḥ |
īśānamasya | jagataḥ | svardṛśamīśānamindra | tasthuṣaḥ |
na | tvāvām̐ | anyo | divyo | na | pārthivo | na | jāto | na | janiṣyate |
aśvāyanto | maghavannindra | vājino | gavyantastvā | havāmahe |
abhī | ṣatastadā | bharendra | jyāyaḥ | kanīyasaḥ |
purūvasurhi | maghavantsanādasi | bharebhare | ca | havyaḥ |
parā | ṇudasva | maghavannamitrāntsuvedā | no | vasū | kṛdhi |
asmākaṁ | bodhyavitā | mahādhane | bhavā | vṛdhaḥ | sakhīnām |
indra | kratuṁ | nā | bhara | pitā | putrebhyo | yathā |
śikṣā | ṇo | asminpuruhūta | yāmani | jīvā | jyotiraśīmahi |
mā | no | ajñātā | vṛjanā | durādhyo | māśivāso | ava | kramuḥ |
tvayā | vayaṁ | pravataḥ | śaśvatīrapo'ti | śūra | tarāmasi |
śvityañco | mā | dakṣiṇataskapardā | dhiyaṁjinvāso | abhi | hi | pramanduḥ |
uttiṣṭhanvoce | pari | barhiṣo | nṝnna | me | dūrādavitave | vasiṣṭhāḥ |
dūrādindramanayannā | sutena | tiro | vaiśantamati | pāntamugram |
pāśadyumnasya | vāyatasya | somātsutādindro'vṛṇītā | vasiṣṭhān |
evennu | kaṁ | sindhumebhistatārevennu | kaṁ | bhedamebhirjaghāna |
evennu | kaṁ | dāśarājñe | sudāsaṁ | prāvadindro | brahmaṇā | vo | vasiṣṭhāḥ |
juṣṭī | naro | brahmaṇā | vaḥ | pitṝṇāmakṣamavyayaṁ | na | kilā | riṣātha |
yacchakvarīṣu | bṛhatā | raveṇendre | śuṣmamadadhātā | vasiṣṭhāḥ |
uddyāmivettṛṣṇajo | nāthitāso'dīdhayurdāśarājñe | vṛtāsaḥ |
vasiṣṭhasya | stuvatendro | aśroduruṁ | tṛtsubhyo | akṛṇodu | lokam |
daṇḍevedgoajanāsa | āsanparicchinnā | bharatārbhakāsaḥ |
abhavacca | puraetā | vasiṣṭhādittṛtsūnāṁ | viśo | aprathanta |
trayaḥ | kṛṇvanti | bhuvaneṣu | retastisraḥ | prajāryā | jyotiragrāḥ |
trayo | gharmāsoṣasaṁ | sacante | sarvām̐ | ittām̐ | anu | vidurvasiṣṭhāḥ |
sūryasyeva | vakṣatho | jyotireṣāṁ | samudrasyeva | mahimā | gabhīraḥ |
vātasyeva | prajavo | nānyena | stomo | vasiṣṭhānvetave | vaḥ |
tenniṇyaṁ | hṛdayasya | praketaiḥ | sahasravalśamabhi | saṁ | caranti |
yamena | tataṁ | paridhiṁ | vayanto'psarasopa | sedurvasiṣṭhāḥ |
vidyuto | jyotiḥ | pari | saṁjihānaṁ | mitrāvaruṇā | yadapaśyatāṁ | tvā |
tatte | janmotaikaṁ | vasiṣṭhāgastyo | yattvā | viśājabhāra |
utāsi | maitrāvaruṇo | vasiṣṭhorvaśyā | brahmanmanaso'dhi | jātaḥ |
drapsaṁ | skannaṁ | brahmaṇā | daivyena | viśve | devāḥ | puṣkare | tvādadanta |
sa | praketobhayasya | pravidvāntsahasradānota | vā | sadānaḥ |
yamena | tataṁ | paridhiṁ | vayiṣyannapsarasaḥ | pari | jajñe | vasiṣṭhaḥ |
satre | ha | jātāviṣitā | namobhiḥ | kumbhe | retaḥ | siṣicatuḥ | samānam |
tato | ha | mānodiyāya | madhyāttato | jātamṛṣimāhurvasiṣṭham |
ukthabhṛtaṁ | sāmabhṛtaṁ | bibharti | grāvāṇaṁ | bibhratpra | vadātyagre |
upainamādhvaṁ | sumanasyamānā | vo | gacchāti | pratṛdo | vasiṣṭhaḥ |
pra | śukraitu | devī | manīṣāsmatsutaṣṭo | ratho | na | vājī |
viduḥ | pṛthivyā | divo | janitraṁ | śṛṇvantyāpo | adha | kṣarantīḥ |
āpaścidasmai | pinvanta | pṛthvīrvṛtreṣu | śūrā | maṁsantogrāḥ |
ā | dhūrṣvasmai | dadhātāśvānindro | na | vajrī | hiraṇyabāhuḥ |
abhi | pra | sthātāheva | yajñaṁ | yāteva | patmantmanā | hinota |
tmanā | samatsu | hinota | yajñaṁ | dadhāta | ketuṁ | janāya | vīram |
udasya | śuṣmādbhānurnārta | bibharti | bhāraṁ | pṛthivī | na | bhūma |
hvayāmi | devām̐ | ayāturagne | sādhannṛtena | dhiyaṁ | dadhāmi |
abhi | vo | devīṁ | dhiyaṁ | dadhidhvaṁ | pra | vo | devatrā | vācaṁ | kṛṇudhvam |
ā | caṣṭāsāṁ | pātho | nadīnāṁ | varuṇograḥ | sahasracakṣāḥ |
rājā | rāṣṭrānāṁ | peśo | nadīnāmanuttamasmai | kṣatraṁ | viśvāyu |
aviṣṭo | asmānviśvāsu | vikṣvadyuṁ | kṛṇota | śaṁsaṁ | ninitsoḥ |
vyetu | didyuddviṣāmaśevā | yuyota | viṣvagrapastanūnām |
avīnno | agnirhavyānnamobhiḥ | preṣṭho | asmādhāyi | stomaḥ |
sajūrdevebhirapāṁ | napātaṁ | sakhāyaṁ | kṛdhvaṁ | śivo | no | astu |
abjāmukthairahiṁ | gṛṇīṣe | budhne | nadīnāṁ | rajaḥsu | ṣīdan |
mā | no'hirbudhnyo | riṣe | dhānmā | yajño | asya | sridhadṛtāyoḥ |
uta | naiṣu | nṛṣu | śravo | dhuḥ | pra | rāye | yantu | śardhanto | aryaḥ |
tapanti | śatruṁ | svarṇa | bhūmā | mahāsenāso | amebhireṣām |
ā | yannaḥ | patnīrgamantyacchā | tvaṣṭā | supāṇirdadhātu | vīrān |
prati | naḥ | stomaṁ | tvaṣṭā | juṣeta | syādasme | aramatirvasūyuḥ |
tā | no | rāsanrātiṣāco | vasūnyā | rodasī | varuṇānī | śṛṇotu |
varūtrībhiḥ | suśaraṇo | no | astu | tvaṣṭā | sudatro | vi | dadhātu | rāyaḥ |
tanno | rāyaḥ | parvatāstannāpastadrātiṣāca | oṣadhīruta | dyauḥ |
vanaspatibhiḥ | pṛthivī | sajoṣobhe | rodasī | pari | pāsato | naḥ |
anu | tadurvī | rodasī | jihātāmanu | dyukṣo | varuṇendrasakhā |
anu | viśve | maruto | ye | sahāso | rāyaḥ | syāma | dharuṇaṁ | dhiyadhyai |
tannendro | varuṇo | mitro | agnirāpauṣadhīrvanino | juṣanta |
śarmantsyāma | marutāmupasthe | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
śaṁ | nendrāgnī | bhavatāmavobhiḥ | śaṁ | nendrāvaruṇā | rātahavyā |
śamindrāsomā | suvitāya | śaṁ | yoḥ | śaṁ | nendrāpūṣaṇā | vājasātau |
śaṁ | no | bhagaḥ | śamu | naḥ | śaṁso | astu | śaṁ | naḥ | puraṁdhiḥ | śamu | santu | rāyaḥ |
śaṁ | naḥ | satyasya | suyamasya | śaṁsaḥ | śaṁ | no | aryamā | purujāto | astu |
śaṁ | no | dhātā | śamu | dhartā | no | astu | śaṁ | norūcī | bhavatu | svadhābhiḥ |
śaṁ | rodasī | bṛhatī | śaṁ | no | adriḥ | śaṁ | no | devānāṁ | suhavāni | santu |
śaṁ | no | agnirjyotiranīko | astu | śaṁ | no | mitrāvaruṇāvaśvinā | śam |
śaṁ | naḥ | sukṛtāṁ | sukṛtāni | santu | śaṁ | neṣiro | abhi | vātu | vātaḥ |
śaṁ | no | dyāvāpṛthivī | pūrvahūtau | śamantarikṣaṁ | dṛśaye | no | astu |
śaṁ | nauṣadhīrvanino | bhavantu | śaṁ | no | rajasaspatirastu | jiṣṇuḥ |
śaṁ | nendro | vasubhirdevo | astu | śamādityebhirvaruṇaḥ | suśaṁsaḥ |
śaṁ | no | rudro | rudrebhirjalāṣaḥ | śaṁ | nastvaṣṭā | gnābhiriha | śṛṇotu |
śaṁ | naḥ | somo | bhavatu | brahma | śaṁ | naḥ | śaṁ | no | grāvāṇaḥ | śamu | santu | yajñāḥ |
śaṁ | naḥ | svarūṇāṁ | mitayo | bhavantu | śaṁ | naḥ | prasvaḥ | śamvastu | vediḥ |
śaṁ | naḥ | sūryorucakṣā | udetu | śaṁ | naścatasraḥ | pradiśo | bhavantu |
śaṁ | naḥ | parvatā | dhruvayo | bhavantu | śaṁ | naḥ | sindhavaḥ | śamu | santvāpaḥ |
śaṁ | no | aditirbhavatu | vratebhiḥ | śaṁ | no | bhavantu | marutaḥ | svarkāḥ |
śaṁ | no | viṣṇuḥ | śamu | pūṣā | no | astu | śaṁ | no | bhavitraṁ | śamvastu | vāyuḥ |
śaṁ | no | devaḥ | savitā | trāyamāṇaḥ | śaṁ | no | bhavantūṣaso | vibhātīḥ |
śaṁ | naḥ | parjanyo | bhavatu | prajābhyaḥ | śaṁ | naḥ | kṣetrasya | patirastu | śaṁbhuḥ |
śaṁ | no | devā | viśvadevā | bhavantu | śaṁ | sarasvatī | saha | dhībhirastu |
śamabhiṣācaḥ | śamu | rātiṣācaḥ | śaṁ | no | divyāḥ | pārthivāḥ | śaṁ | no | apyāḥ |
śaṁ | naḥ | satyasya | patayo | bhavantu | śaṁ | no | arvantaḥ | śamu | santu | gāvaḥ |
śaṁ | na | ṛbhavaḥ | sukṛtaḥ | suhastāḥ | śaṁ | no | bhavantu | pitaro | haveṣu |
śaṁ | no | ajaikapāddevo | astu | śaṁ | no'hirbudhnyaḥ | śaṁ | samudraḥ |
śaṁ | no | apāṁ | napātperurastu | śaṁ | naḥ | pṛśnirbhavatu | devagopā |
ādityā | rudrā | vasavo | juṣantedaṁ | brahma | kriyamāṇaṁ | navīyaḥ |
śṛṇvantu | no | divyāḥ | pārthivāso | gojātota | ye | yajñiyāsaḥ |
ye | devānāṁ | yajñiyā | yajñiyānāṁ | manoryajatrāmṛtā | ṛtajñāḥ |
te | no | rāsantāmurugāyamadya | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
pra | brahmaitu | sadanādṛtasya | vi | raśmibhiḥ | sasṛje | sūryo | gāḥ |
vi | sānunā | pṛthivī | sasrorvī | pṛthu | pratīkamadhyedhe | agniḥ |
imāṁ | vāṁ | mitrāvaruṇā | suvṛktimiṣaṁ | na | kṛṇve | asurā | navīyaḥ |
ino | vāmanyaḥ | padavīradabdho | janaṁ | ca | mitro | yatati | bruvāṇaḥ |
ā | vātasya | dhrajato | rantetyā | apīpayanta | dhenavo | na | sūdāḥ |
maho | divaḥ | sadane | jāyamāno'cikradadvṛṣabhaḥ | sasminnūdhan |
girā | yaitā | yunajaddharī | tendra | priyā | surathā | śūra | dhāyū |
pra | yo | manyuṁ | ririkṣato | minātyā | sukratumaryamaṇaṁ | vavṛtyām |
yajante | asya | sakhyaṁ | vayaśca | namasvinaḥ | sva | ṛtasya | dhāman |
vi | pṛkṣo | bābadhe | nṛbhiḥ | stavānedaṁ | namo | rudrāya | preṣṭham |
ā | yatsākaṁ | yaśaso | vāvaśānāḥ | sarasvatī | saptathī | sindhumātā |
yāḥ | suṣvayanta | sudughāḥ | sudhārābhi | svena | payasā | pīpyānāḥ |
uta | tye | no | maruto | mandasānā | dhiyaṁ | tokaṁ | ca | vājino'vantu |
mā | naḥ | pari | khyadakṣarā | carantyavīvṛdhanyujyaṁ | te | rayiṁ | naḥ |
pra | vo | mahīmaramatiṁ | kṛṇudhvaṁ | pra | pūṣaṇaṁ | vidathyaṁ | na | vīram |
bhagaṁ | dhiyo'vitāraṁ | no | asyāḥ | sātau | vājaṁ | rātiṣācaṁ | puraṁdhim |
acchāyaṁ | vo | marutaḥ | ślokaitvacchā | viṣṇuṁ | niṣiktapāmavobhiḥ |
uta | prajāyai | gṛṇate | vayo | dhuryūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
ā | vo | vāhiṣṭho | vahatu | stavadhyai | ratho | vājā | ṛbhukṣaṇo | amṛktaḥ |
abhi | tripṛṣṭhaiḥ | savaneṣu | somairmade | suśiprā | mahabhiḥ | pṛṇadhvam |
yūyaṁ | ha | ratnaṁ | maghavatsu | dhattha | svardṛśa | ṛbhukṣaṇo | amṛktam |
saṁ | yajñeṣu | svadhāvantaḥ | pibadhvaṁ | vi | no | rādhāṁsi | matibhirdayadhvam |
uvocitha | hi | maghavandeṣṇaṁ | maho | arbhasya | vasuno | vibhāge |
ubhā | te | pūrṇā | vasunā | gabhastī | na | sūnṛtā | ni | yamate | vasavyā |
tvamindra | svayaśā | ṛbhukṣā | vājo | na | sādhurastameṣyṛkvā |
vayaṁ | nu | te | dāśvāṁsaḥ | syāma | brahma | kṛṇvanto | harivo | vasiṣṭhāḥ |
sanitāsi | pravato | dāśuṣe | cidyābhirviveṣo | haryaśva | dhībhiḥ |
vavanmā | nu | te | yujyābhirūtī | kadā | nendra | rāyā | daśasyeḥ |
vāsayasīva | vedhasastvaṁ | naḥ | kadā | nendra | vacaso | bubodhaḥ |
astaṁ | tātyā | dhiyā | rayiṁ | suvīraṁ | pṛkṣo | no | arvā | nyuhīta | vājī |
abhi | yaṁ | devī | nirṛtiścidīśe | nakṣantendraṁ | śaradaḥ | supṛkṣaḥ |
upa | tribandhurjaradaṣṭimetyasvaveśaṁ | yaṁ | kṛṇavanta | martāḥ |
ā | no | rādhāṁsi | savitaḥ | stavadhyā | rāyo | yantu | parvatasya | rātau |
sadā | no | divyaḥ | pāyuḥ | siṣaktu | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
udu | ṣya | devaḥ | savitā | yayāma | hiraṇyayīmamatiṁ | yāmaśiśret |
nūnaṁ | bhago | havyo | mānuṣebhirvi | yo | ratnā | purūvasurdadhāti |
udu | tiṣṭha | savitaḥ | śrudhyasya | hiraṇyapāṇe | prabhṛtāvṛtasya |
vyurvīṁ | pṛthvīmamatiṁ | sṛjānā | nṛbhyo | martabhojanaṁ | suvānaḥ |
api | ṣṭutaḥ | savitā | devo | astu | yamā | cidviśve | vasavo | gṛṇanti |
sa | naḥ | stomānnamasyaścano | dhādviśvebhiḥ | pātu | pāyubhirni | sūrīn |
abhi | yaṁ | devyaditirgṛṇāti | savaṁ | devasya | saviturjuṣāṇā |
abhi | samrājo | varuṇo | gṛṇantyabhi | mitrāso | aryamā | sajoṣāḥ |
abhi | ye | mitho | vanuṣaḥ | sapante | rātiṁ | divo | rātiṣācaḥ | pṛthivyāḥ |
ahirbudhnyota | naḥ | śṛṇotu | varūtryekadhenubhirni | pātu |
anu | tanno | jāspatirmaṁsīṣṭa | ratnaṁ | devasya | savituriyānaḥ |
bhagamugro'vase | johavīti | bhagamanugro | adha | yāti | ratnam |
śaṁ | no | bhavantu | vājino | haveṣu | devatātā | mitadravaḥ | svarkāḥ |
jambhayanto'hiṁ | vṛkaṁ | rakṣāṁsi | sanemyasmadyuyavannamīvāḥ |
vājevāje'vata | vājino | no | dhaneṣu | viprāmṛtā | ṛtajñāḥ |
asya | madhvaḥ | pibata | mādayadhvaṁ | tṛptā | yāta | pathibhirdevayānaiḥ |
ūrdhvo | agniḥ | sumatiṁ | vasvo | aśretpratīcī | jūrṇirdevatātimeti |
bhejāte | adrī | rathyeva | panthāmṛtaṁ | hotā | neṣito | yajāti |
pra | vāvṛje | suprayā | barhireṣāmā | viśpatīva | bīriṭeyāte |
viśāmaktoruṣasaḥ | pūrvahūtau | vāyuḥ | pūṣā | svastaye | niyutvān |
jmayātra | vasavo | ranta | devorāvantarikṣe | marjayanta | śubhrāḥ |
arvākpathorujrayaḥ | kṛṇudhvaṁ | śrotā | dūtasya | jagmuṣo | no | asya |
te | hi | yajñeṣu | yajñiyāsomāḥ | sadhasthaṁ | viśve | abhi | santi | devāḥ |
tām̐ | adhvarośato | yakṣyagne | śruṣṭī | bhagaṁ | nāsatyā | puraṁdhim |
āgne | giro | divā | pṛthivyā | mitraṁ | vaha | varuṇamindramagnim |
āryamaṇamaditiṁ | viṣṇumeṣāṁ | sarasvatī | maruto | mādayantām |
rare | havyaṁ | matibhiryajñiyānāṁ | nakṣatkāmaṁ | martyānāmasinvan |
dhātā | rayimavidasyaṁ | sadāsāṁ | sakṣīmahi | yujyebhirnu | devaiḥ |
nū | rodasī | abhiṣṭute | vasiṣṭhairṛtāvāno | varuṇo | mitro | agniḥ |
yacchantu | candropamaṁ | no | arkaṁ | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
o | śruṣṭirvidathyā | sametu | prati | stomaṁ | dadhīmahi | turāṇām |
yadadya | devaḥ | savitā | suvāti | syāmāsya | ratnino | vibhāge |
mitrastanno | varuṇo | rodasī | ca | dyubhaktamindro | aryamā | dadātu |
dideṣṭu | devyaditī | rekṇo | vāyuśca | yanniyuvaite | bhagaśca |
sedugro | astu | marutaḥ | sa | śuṣmī | yaṁ | martyaṁ | pṛṣadaśvāvātha |
utemagniḥ | sarasvatī | junanti | na | tasya | rāyaḥ | paryetāsti |
ayaṁ | hi | netā | varuṇa | ṛtasya | mitro | rājāno | aryamāpo | dhuḥ |
suhavā | devyaditiranarvā | te | no | aṁho | ati | parṣannariṣṭān |
asya | devasya | mīḻhuṣo | vayā | viṣṇoreṣasya | prabhṛthe | havirbhiḥ |
vide | hi | rudro | rudriyaṁ | mahitvaṁ | yāsiṣṭaṁ | vartiraśvināvirāvat |
mātra | pūṣannāghṛṇerasyo | varūtrī | yadrātiṣācaśca | rāsan |
mayobhuvo | no | arvanto | ni | pāntu | vṛṣṭiṁ | parijmā | vāto | dadātu |
nū | rodasī | abhiṣṭute | vasiṣṭhairṛtāvāno | varuṇo | mitro | agniḥ |
yacchantu | candropamaṁ | no | arkaṁ | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
prātaragniṁ | prātarindraṁ | havāmahe | prātarmitrāvaruṇā | prātaraśvinā |
prātarbhagaṁ | pūṣaṇaṁ | brahmaṇaspatiṁ | prātaḥ | somamuta | rudraṁ | huvema |
prātarjitaṁ | bhagamugraṁ | huvema | vayaṁ | putramaditeryo | vidhartā |
ādhraścidyaṁ | manyamānasturaścidrājā | cidyaṁ | bhagaṁ | bhakṣītyāha |
bhaga | praṇetarbhaga | satyarādho | bhagemāṁ | dhiyamudavā | dadannaḥ |
bhaga | pra | ṇo | janaya | gobhiraśvairbhaga | pra | nṛbhirnṛvantaḥ | syāma |
utedānīṁ | bhagavantaḥ | syāmota | prapitvota | madhye | ahnām |
utoditā | maghavantsūryasya | vayaṁ | devānāṁ | sumatau | syāma |
bhagaiva | bhagavām̐ | astu | devāstena | vayaṁ | bhagavantaḥ | syāma |
taṁ | tvā | bhaga | sarvejjohavīti | sa | no | bhaga | puraetā | bhaveha |
samadhvarāyoṣaso | namanta | dadhikrāveva | śucaye | padāya |
arvācīnaṁ | vasuvidaṁ | bhagaṁ | no | rathamivāśvā | vājinā | vahantu |
aśvāvatīrgomatīrnoṣāso | vīravatīḥ | sadamucchantu | bhadrāḥ |
ghṛtaṁ | duhānā | viśvataḥ | prapītā | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
pra | brahmāṇo | aṅgiraso | nakṣanta | pra | krandanurnabhanyasya | vetu |
pra | dhenavodapruto | navanta | yujyātāmadrī | adhvarasya | peśaḥ |
sugaste | agne | sanavitto | adhvā | yukṣvā | sute | harito | rohitaśca |
ye | vā | sadmannaruṣā | vīravāho | huve | devānāṁ | janimāni | sattaḥ |
samu | vo | yajñaṁ | mahayannamobhiḥ | pra | hotā | mandro | riricopāke |
yajasva | su | purvaṇīka | devānā | yajñiyāmaramatiṁ | vavṛtyāḥ |
yadā | vīrasya | revato | duroṇe | syonaśīratithirāciketat |
suprīto | agniḥ | sudhito | damā | sa | viśe | dāti | vāryamiyatyai |
imaṁ | no | agne | adhvaraṁ | juṣasva | marutsvindre | yaśasaṁ | kṛdhī | naḥ |
ā | naktā | barhiḥ | sadatāmuṣāsośantā | mitrāvaruṇā | yajeha |
evāgniṁ | sahasyaṁ | vasiṣṭho | rāyaskāmo | viśvapsnyasya | staut |
iṣaṁ | rayiṁ | paprathadvājamasme | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
pra | vo | yajñeṣu | devayanto | arcandyāvā | namobhiḥ | pṛthivīṣadhyai |
yeṣāṁ | brahmāṇyasamāni | viprā | viṣvagviyanti | vanino | na | śākhāḥ |
pra | yajñaitu | hetvo | na | saptirudyacchadhvaṁ | samanaso | ghṛtācīḥ |
stṛṇīta | barhiradhvarāya | sādhūrdhvā | śocīṁṣi | devayūnyasthuḥ |
ā | putrāso | na | mātaraṁ | vibhṛtrāḥ | sānau | devāso | barhiṣaḥ | sadantu |
ā | viśvācī | vidathyāmanaktvagne | mā | no | devatātā | mṛdhaskaḥ |
te | sīṣapanta | joṣamā | yajatrā | ṛtasya | dhārāḥ | sudughā | duhānāḥ |
jyeṣṭhaṁ | vo | adya | mahā | vasūnāmā | gantana | samanaso | yati | ṣṭha |
evā | no | agne | vikṣvā | daśasya | tvayā | vayaṁ | sahasāvannāskrāḥ |
rāyā | yujā | sadhamādo | ariṣṭā | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
dadhikrāṁ | vaḥ | prathamamaśvinoṣasamagniṁ | samiddhaṁ | bhagamūtaye | huve |
indraṁ | viṣṇuṁ | pūṣaṇaṁ | brahmaṇaspatimādityāndyāvāpṛthivī | apaḥ | svaḥ |
dadhikrāmu | namasā | bodhayantodīrāṇā | yajñamupaprayantaḥ |
iḻāṁ | devīṁ | barhiṣi | sādayanto'śvinā | viprā | suhavā | huvema |
dadhikrāvāṇaṁ | bubudhāno | agnimupa | bruvoṣasaṁ | sūryaṁ | gām |
bradhnaṁ | mam̐ścatorvaruṇasya | babhruṁ | te | viśvāsmadduritā | yāvayantu |
dadhikrāvā | prathamo | vājyarvāgre | rathānāṁ | bhavati | prajānan |
saṁvidānoṣasā | sūryeṇādityebhirvasubhiraṅgirobhiḥ |
ā | no | dadhikrāḥ | pathyāmanaktvṛtasya | panthāmanvetavo |
śṛṇotu | no | daivyaṁ | śardho | agniḥ | śṛṇvantu | viśve | mahiṣāmūrāḥ |
ā | devo | yātu | savitā | suratno'ntarikṣaprā | vahamāno | aśvaiḥ |
haste | dadhāno | naryā | purūṇi | niveśayañca | prasuvañca | bhūma |
udasya | bāhū | śithirā | bṛhantā | hiraṇyayā | divo | antām̐ | anaṣṭām |
nūnaṁ | so | asya | mahimā | paniṣṭa | sūraścidasmānu | dādapasyām |
sa | ghā | no | devaḥ | savitā | sahāvā | sāviṣadvasupatirvasūni |
viśrayamāṇo | amatimurūcīṁ | martabhojanamadha | rāsate | naḥ |
imā | giraḥ | savitāraṁ | sujihvaṁ | pūrṇagabhastimīḻate | supāṇim |
citraṁ | vayo | bṛhadasme | dadhātu | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
imā | rudrāya | sthiradhanvane | giraḥ | kṣipreṣave | devāya | svadhāvne |
aṣāḻhāya | sahamānāya | vedhase | tigmāyudhāya | bharatā | śṛṇotu | naḥ |
sa | hi | kṣayeṇa | kṣamyasya | janmanaḥ | sāmrājyena | divyasya | cetati |
avannavantīrupa | no | duraścarānamīvo | rudra | jāsu | no | bhava |
yā | te | didyudavasṛṣṭā | divaspari | kṣmayā | carati | pari | sā | vṛṇaktu | naḥ |
sahasraṁ | te | svapivāta | bheṣajā | mā | nastokeṣu | tanayeṣu | rīriṣaḥ |
mā | no | vadhī | rudra | mā | parā | dā | mā | te | bhūma | prasitau | hīḻitasya |
ā | no | bhaja | barhiṣi | jīvaśaṁse | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
āpo | yaṁ | vaḥ | prathamaṁ | devayantendrapānamūrmimakṛṇvateḻaḥ |
taṁ | vo | vayaṁ | śucimaripramadya | ghṛtapruṣaṁ | madhumantaṁ | vanema |
tamūrmimāpo | madhumattamaṁ | vo'pāṁ | napādavatvāśuhemā |
yasminnindro | vasubhirmādayāte | tamaśyāma | devayanto | vo | adya |
śatapavitrāḥ | svadhayā | madantīrdevīrdevānāmapi | yanti | pāthaḥ |
tendrasya | na | minanti | vratāni | sindhubhyo | havyaṁ | ghṛtavajjuhota |
yāḥ | sūryo | raśmibhirātatāna | yābhyendro | aradadgātumūrmim |
te | sindhavo | varivo | dhātanā | no | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
ṛbhukṣaṇo | vājā | mādayadhvamasme | naro | maghavānaḥ | sutasya |
ā | vo'rvācaḥ | kratavo | na | yātāṁ | vibhvo | rathaṁ | naryaṁ | vartayantu |
