ṛbhurṛbhubhirabhi | vaḥ | syāma | vibhvo | vibhubhiḥ | śavasā | śavāṁsi |
vājo | asmām̐ | avatu | vājasātāvindreṇa | yujā | taruṣema | vṛtram |
te | ciddhi | pūrvīrabhi | santi | śāsā | viśvām̐ | aryoparatāti | vanvan |
indro | vibhvām̐ | ṛbhukṣā | vājo | aryaḥ | śatrormithatyā | kṛṇavanvi | nṛmṇam |
nū | devāso | varivaḥ | kartanā | no | bhūta | no | viśve'vase | sajoṣāḥ |
samasme | iṣaṁ | vasavo | dadīranyūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
samudrajyeṣṭhāḥ | salilasya | madhyātpunānā | yantyaniviśamānāḥ |
indro | yā | vajrī | vṛṣabho | rarāda | tāpo | devīriha | māmavantu |
yāpo | divyota | vā | sravanti | khanitrimota | vā | yāḥ | svayaṁjāḥ |
samudrārthā | yāḥ | śucayaḥ | pāvakāstāpo | devīriha | māmavantu |
yāsāṁ | rājā | varuṇo | yāti | madhye | satyānṛte | avapaśyañjanānām |
madhuścutaḥ | śucayo | yāḥ | pāvakāstāpo | devīriha | māmavantu |
yāsu | rājā | varuṇo | yāsu | somo | viśve | devā | yāsūrjaṁ | madanti |
vaiśvānaro | yāsvagniḥ | praviṣṭastāpo | devīriha | māmavantu |
ā | māṁ | mitrāvaruṇeha | rakṣataṁ | kulāyayadviśvayanmā | nā | gan |
ajakāvaṁ | durdṛśīkaṁ | tiro | dadhe | mā | māṁ | padyena | rapasā | vidattsaruḥ |
yadvijāmanparuṣi | vandanaṁ | bhuvadaṣṭhīvantau | pari | kulphau | ca | dehat |
agniṣṭacchocannapa | bādhatāmito | mā | māṁ | padyena | rapasā | vidattsaruḥ |
yacchalmalau | bhavati | yannadīṣu | yadoṣadhībhyaḥ | pari | jāyate | viṣam |
viśve | devā | niritastatsuvantu | mā | māṁ | padyena | rapasā | vidattsaruḥ |
yāḥ | pravato | nivatodvata | udanvatīranudakāśca | yāḥ |
tāsmabhyaṁ | payasā | pinvamānāḥ | śivā | devīraśipadā | bhavantu | sarvā | nadyo | aśimidā | bhavantu |
ādityānāmavasā | nūtanena | sakṣīmahi | śarmaṇā | śaṁtamena |
anāgāstve | adititve | turāsemaṁ | yajñaṁ | dadhatu | śroṣamāṇāḥ |
ādityāso | aditirmādayantāṁ | mitro | aryamā | varuṇo | rajiṣṭhāḥ |
asmākaṁ | santu | bhuvanasya | gopāḥ | pibantu | somamavase | no | adya |
ādityā | viśve | marutaśca | viśve | devāśca | viśva | ṛbhavaśca | viśve |
indro | agniraśvinā | tuṣṭuvānā | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
ādityāso | aditayaḥ | syāma | pūrdevatrā | vasavo | martyatrā |
sanema | mitrāvaruṇā | sananto | bhavema | dyāvāpṛthivī | bhavantaḥ |
mitrastanno | varuṇo | māmahanta | śarma | tokāya | tanayāya | gopāḥ |
mā | vo | bhujemānyajātameno | mā | tatkarma | vasavo | yaccayadhve |
turaṇyavo'ṅgiraso | nakṣanta | ratnaṁ | devasya | savituriyānāḥ |
pitā | ca | tanno | mahānyajatro | viśve | devāḥ | samanaso | juṣanta |
pra | dyāvā | yajñaiḥ | pṛthivī | namobhiḥ | sabādheḻe | bṛhatī | yajatre |
te | ciddhi | pūrve | kavayo | gṛṇantaḥ | puro | mahī | dadhire | devaputre |
pra | pūrvaje | pitarā | navyasībhirgīrbhiḥ | kṛṇudhvaṁ | sadane | ṛtasya |
ā | no | dyāvāpṛthivī | daivyena | janena | yātaṁ | mahi | vāṁ | varūtham |
uto | hi | vāṁ | ratnadheyāni | santi | purūṇi | dyāvāpṛthivī | sudāse |
asme | dhattaṁ | yadasadaskṛdhoyu | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
vāstoṣpate | prati | jānīhyasmāntsvāveśo | anamīvo | bhavā | naḥ |
yattvemahe | prati | tanno | juṣasva | śaṁ | no | bhava | dvipade | śaṁ | catuṣpade |
vāstoṣpate | prataraṇo | naidhi | gayasphāno | gobhiraśvebhirindo |
ajarāsaste | sakhye | syāma | piteva | putrānprati | no | juṣasva |
vāstoṣpate | śagmayā | saṁsadā | te | sakṣīmahi | raṇvayā | gātumatyā |
pāhi | kṣemota | yoge | varaṁ | no | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
amīvahā | vāstoṣpate | viśvā | rūpāṇyāviśan |
sakhā | suśevaidhi | naḥ |
yadarjuna | sārameya | dataḥ | piśaṅga | yacchase |
vīva | bhrājanta | ṛṣṭayopa | srakveṣu | bapsato | ni | ṣu | svapa |
stenaṁ | rāya | sārameya | taskaraṁ | vā | punaḥsara |
stotṝnindrasya | rāyasi | kimasmānducchunāyase | ni | ṣu | svapa |
tvaṁ | sūkarasya | dardṛhi | tava | dardartu | sūkaraḥ |
stotṝnindrasya | rāyasi | kimasmānducchunāyase | ni | ṣu | svapa |
sastu | mātā | sastu | pitā | sastu | śvā | sastu | viśpatiḥ |
sasantu | sarve | jñātayaḥ | sastvayamabhito | janaḥ |
yāste | yaśca | carati | yaśca | paśyati | no | janaḥ |
teṣāṁ | saṁ | hanmo | akṣāṇi | yathedaṁ | harmyaṁ | tathā |
sahasraśṛṅgo | vṛṣabho | yaḥ | samudrādudācarat |
tenā | sahasyenā | vayaṁ | ni | janāntsvāpayāmasi |
proṣṭheśayā | vahyeśayā | nārīryāstalpaśīvarīḥ |
striyo | yāḥ | puṇyagandhāstāḥ | sarvāḥ | svāpayāmasi |
keṁ | vyaktā | naraḥ | sanīḻā | rudrasya | maryādha | svaśvāḥ |
nakirhyeṣāṁ | janūṁṣi | veda | te | aṅga | vidre | mitho | janitram |
abhi | svapūbhirmitho | vapanta | vātasvanasaḥ | śyenāspṛdhran |
etāni | dhīro | niṇyā | ciketa | pṛśniryadūdho | mahī | jabhāra |
sā | viṭ | suvīrā | marudbhirastu | sanātsahantī | puṣyantī | nṛmṇam |
yāmaṁ | yeṣṭhāḥ | śubhā | śobhiṣṭhāḥ | śriyā | saṁmiślaujobhirugrāḥ |
ugraṁ | vaujaḥ | sthirā | śavāṁsyadhā | marudbhirgaṇastuviṣmān |
śubhro | vaḥ | śuṣmaḥ | krudhmī | manāṁsi | dhunirmuniriva | śardhasya | dhṛṣṇoḥ |
sanemyasmadyuyota | didyuṁ | mā | vo | durmatiriha | praṇaṅnaḥ |
priyā | vo | nāma | huve | turāṇāmā | yattṛpanmaruto | vāvaśānāḥ |
svāyudhāseṣmiṇaḥ | suniṣkota | svayaṁ | tanvaḥ | śumbhamānāḥ |
śucī | vo | havyā | marutaḥ | śucīnāṁ | śuciṁ | hinomyadhvaraṁ | śucibhyaḥ |
ṛtena | satyamṛtasāpāyañchucijanmānaḥ | śucayaḥ | pāvakāḥ |
aṁseṣvā | marutaḥ | khādayo | vo | vakṣaḥsu | rukmopaśiśriyāṇāḥ |
vi | vidyuto | na | vṛṣṭibhī | rucānānu | svadhāmāyudhairyacchamānāḥ |
pra | budhnyā | verate | mahāṁsi | pra | nāmāni | prayajyavastiradhvam |
sahasriyaṁ | damyaṁ | bhāgametaṁ | gṛhamedhīyaṁ | maruto | juṣadhvam |
yadi | stutasya | maruto | adhīthetthā | viprasya | vājino | havīman |
makṣū | rāyaḥ | suvīryasya | dāta | nū | cidyamanyādabhadarāvā |
atyāso | na | ye | marutaḥ | svañco | yakṣadṛśo | na | śubhayanta | maryāḥ |
te | harmyeṣṭhāḥ | śiśavo | na | śubhrā | vatsāso | na | prakrīḻinaḥ | payodhāḥ |
daśasyanto | no | maruto | mṛḻantu | varivasyanto | rodasī | sumeke |
āre | gohā | nṛhā | vadho | vo | astu | sumnebhirasme | vasavo | namadhvam |
ā | vo | hotā | johavīti | sattaḥ | satrācīṁ | rātiṁ | maruto | gṛṇānaḥ |
yevato | vṛṣaṇo | asti | gopāḥ | so | advayāvī | havate | vokthaiḥ |
ime | turaṁ | maruto | rāmayantīme | sahaḥ | sahasā | namanti |
ime | śaṁsaṁ | vanuṣyato | ni | pānti | guru | dveṣo | araruṣe | dadhanti |
ime | radhraṁ | cinmaruto | junanti | bhṛmiṁ | cidyathā | vasavo | juṣanta |
apa | bādhadhvaṁ | vṛṣaṇastamāṁsi | dhatta | viśvaṁ | tanayaṁ | tokamasme |
mā | vo | dātrānmaruto | nirarāma | mā | paścāddaghma | rathyo | vibhāge |
ā | naḥ | spārhe | bhajatanā | vasavye | yadīṁ | sujātaṁ | vṛṣaṇo | vo | asti |
saṁ | yaddhananta | manyubhirjanāsaḥ | śūrā | yahvīṣvoṣadhīṣu | vikṣu |
adha | smā | no | maruto | rudriyāsastrātāro | bhūta | pṛtanāsvaryaḥ |
bhūri | cakra | marutaḥ | pitryāṇyukthāni | yā | vaḥ | śasyante | purā | cit |
marudbhirugraḥ | pṛtanāsu | sāḻhā | marudbhiritsanitā | vājamarvā |
asme | vīro | marutaḥ | śuṣmyastu | janānāṁ | yo | asuro | vidhartā |
apo | yena | sukṣitaye | taremādha | svamoko | abhi | vaḥ | syāma |
tannendro | varuṇo | mitro | agnirāpauṣadhīrvanino | juṣanta |
śarmantsyāma | marutāmupasthe | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
madhvo | vo | nāma | mārutaṁ | yajatrāḥ | pra | yajñeṣu | śavasā | madanti |
ye | rejayanti | rodasī | cidurvī | pinvantyutsaṁ | yadayāsurugrāḥ |
nicetāro | hi | maruto | gṛṇantaṁ | praṇetāro | yajamānasya | manma |
asmākamadya | vidatheṣu | barhirā | vītaye | sadata | pipriyāṇāḥ |
naitāvadanye | maruto | yatheme | bhrājante | rukmairāyudhaistanūbhiḥ |
ā | rodasī | viśvapiśaḥ | piśānāḥ | samānamañjyañjate | śubhe | kam |
ṛdhaksā | vo | maruto | didyudastu | yadvāgaḥ | puruṣatā | karāma |
mā | vastasyāmapi | bhūmā | yajatrāsme | vo | astu | sumatiścaniṣṭhā |
kṛte | cidatra | maruto | raṇantānavadyāsaḥ | śucayaḥ | pāvakāḥ |
pra | ṇo'vata | sumatibhiryajatrāḥ | pra | vājebhistirata | puṣyase | naḥ |
uta | stutāso | maruto | vyantu | viśvebhirnāmabhirnaro | havīṁṣi |
dadāta | no | amṛtasya | prajāyai | jigṛta | rāyaḥ | sūnṛtā | maghāni |
ā | stutāso | maruto | viśvotī | acchā | sūrīntsarvatātā | jigāta |
ye | nastmanā | śatino | vardhayanti | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
pra | sākamukṣe | arcatā | gaṇāya | yo | daivyasya | dhāmnastuviṣmān |
uta | kṣodanti | rodasī | mahitvā | nakṣante | nākaṁ | nirṛteravaṁśāt |
janūścidvo | marutastveṣyeṇa | bhīmāsastuvimanyavo'yāsaḥ |
pra | ye | mahobhirojasota | santi | viśvo | vo | yāmanbhayate | svardṛk |
bṛhadvayo | maghavadbhyo | dadhāta | jujoṣanninmarutaḥ | suṣṭutiṁ | naḥ |
gato | nādhvā | vi | tirāti | jantuṁ | pra | ṇaḥ | spārhābhirūtibhistireta |
yuṣmoto | vipro | marutaḥ | śatasvī | yuṣmoto | arvā | sahuriḥ | sahasrī |
yuṣmotaḥ | samrāḻuta | hanti | vṛtraṁ | pra | tadvo | astu | dhūtayo | deṣṇam |
tām̐ | ā | rudrasya | mīḻhuṣo | vivāse | kuvinnaṁsante | marutaḥ | punarnaḥ |
yatsasvartā | jihīḻire | yadāvirava | tadenemahe | turāṇām |
pra | sā | vāci | suṣṭutirmaghonāmidaṁ | sūktaṁ | maruto | juṣanta |
ārācciddveṣo | vṛṣaṇo | yuyota | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
yaṁ | trāyadhvedamidaṁ | devāso | yaṁ | ca | nayatha |
tasmāgne | varuṇa | mitrāryamanmarutaḥ | śarma | yacchata |
yuṣmākaṁ | devāvasāhani | priyejānastarati | dviṣaḥ |
pra | sa | kṣayaṁ | tirate | vi | mahīriṣo | yo | vo | varāya | dāśati |
nahi | vaścaramaṁ | cana | vasiṣṭhaḥ | parimaṁsate |
asmākamadya | marutaḥ | sute | sacā | viśve | pibata | kāminaḥ |
nahi | votiḥ | pṛtanāsu | mardhati | yasmārādhvaṁ | naraḥ |
abhi | vāvartsumatirnavīyasī | tūyaṁ | yāta | pipīṣavaḥ |
o | ṣu | ghṛṣvirādhaso | yātanāndhāṁsi | pītaye |
imā | vo | havyā | maruto | rare | hi | kaṁ | mo | ṣvanyatra | gantana |
ā | ca | no | barhiḥ | sadatāvitā | ca | naḥ | spārhāṇi | dātave | vasu |
asredhanto | marutaḥ | somye | madhau | svāheha | mādayādhvai |
sasvaściddhi | tanvaḥ | śumbhamānā | haṁsāso | nīlapṛṣṭhāpaptan |
viśvaṁ | śardho | abhito | mā | ni | ṣeda | naro | na | raṇvāḥ | savane | madantaḥ |
yo | no | maruto | abhi | durhṛṇāyustiraścittāni | vasavo | jighāṁsati |
druhaḥ | pāśānprati | sa | mucīṣṭa | tapiṣṭhena | hanmanā | hantanā | tam |
sāṁtapanedaṁ | havirmarutastajjujuṣṭana |
yuṣmākotī | riśādasaḥ |
gṛhamedhāsā | gata | maruto | māpa | bhūtana |
yuṣmākotī | sudānavaḥ |
iheha | vaḥ | svatavasaḥ | kavayaḥ | sūryatvacaḥ |
yajñaṁ | marutā | vṛṇe |
tryambakaṁ | yajāmahe | sugandhiṁ | puṣṭivardhanam |
urvārukamiva | bandhanānmṛtyormukṣīya | māmṛtāt |
yadadya | sūrya | bravo'nāgodyanmitrāya | varuṇāya | satyam |
vayaṁ | devatrādite | syāma | tava | priyāso | aryamangṛṇantaḥ |
eṣa | sya | mitrāvaruṇā | nṛcakṣobhe | udeti | sūryo | abhi | jman |
viśvasya | sthāturjagataśca | gopā | ṛju | marteṣu | vṛjinā | ca | paśyan |
ayukta | sapta | haritaḥ | sadhasthādyeṁ | vahanti | sūryaṁ | ghṛtācīḥ |
dhāmāni | mitrāvaruṇā | yuvākuḥ | saṁ | yo | yūtheva | janimāni | caṣṭe |
udvāṁ | pṛkṣāso | madhumanto | asthurā | sūryo | aruhacchukramarṇaḥ |
yasmādityā | adhvano | radanti | mitro | aryamā | varuṇaḥ | sajoṣāḥ |
ime | cetāro | anṛtasya | bhūrermitro | aryamā | varuṇo | hi | santi |
ima | ṛtasya | vāvṛdhurduroṇe | śagmāsaḥ | putrāditeradabdhāḥ |
ime | mitro | varuṇo | dūḻabhāso'cetasaṁ | ciccitayanti | dakṣaiḥ |
api | kratuṁ | sucetasaṁ | vatantastiraścidaṁhaḥ | supathā | nayanti |
ime | divo | animiṣā | pṛthivyāścikitvāṁso | acetasaṁ | nayanti |
pravrāje | cinnadyo | gādhamasti | pāraṁ | no | asya | viṣpitasya | parṣan |
yadgopāvadaditiḥ | śarma | bhadraṁ | mitro | yacchanti | varuṇaḥ | sudāse |
tasminnā | tokaṁ | tanayaṁ | dadhānā | mā | karma | devaheḻanaṁ | turāsaḥ |
ava | vediṁ | hotrābhiryajeta | ripaḥ | kāścidvaruṇadhrutaḥ | saḥ |
pari | dveṣobhiraryamā | vṛṇaktūruṁ | sudāse | vṛṣaṇo | lokam |
sasvaściddhi | samṛtistveṣyeṣāmapīcyena | sahasā | sahante |
yuṣmadbhiyā | vṛṣaṇo | rejamānā | dakṣasya | cinmahinā | mṛḻatā | naḥ |
yo | brahmaṇe | sumatimāyajāte | vājasya | sātau | paramasya | rāyaḥ |
sīkṣanta | manyuṁ | maghavāno | aryoru | kṣayāya | cakrire | sudhātu |
iyaṁ | deva | purohitiryuvabhyāṁ | yajñeṣu | mitrāvaruṇāvakāri |
viśvāni | durgā | pipṛtaṁ | tiro | no | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
udvāṁ | cakṣurvaruṇa | supratīkaṁ | devayoreti | sūryastatanvān |
abhi | yo | viśvā | bhuvanāni | caṣṭe | sa | manyuṁ | martyeṣvā | ciketa |
pra | vāṁ | sa | mitrāvaruṇāvṛtāvā | vipro | manmāni | dīrghaśrudiyarti |
yasya | brahmāṇi | sukratū | avāthā | yatkratvā | na | śaradaḥ | pṛṇaithe |
prorormitrāvaruṇā | pṛthivyāḥ | pra | diva | ṛṣvādbṛhataḥ | sudānū |
spaśo | dadhāthe | oṣadhīṣu | vikṣvṛdhagyato | animiṣaṁ | rakṣamāṇā |
śaṁsā | mitrasya | varuṇasya | dhāma | śuṣmo | rodasī | badbadhe | mahitvā |
ayanmāsāyajvanāmavīrāḥ | pra | yajñamanmā | vṛjanaṁ | tirāte |
amūrā | viśvā | vṛṣaṇāvimā | vāṁ | na | yāsu | citraṁ | dadṛśe | na | yakṣam |
druhaḥ | sacante | anṛtā | janānāṁ | na | vāṁ | niṇyānyacite | abhūvan |
samu | vāṁ | yajñaṁ | mahayaṁ | namobhirhuve | vāṁ | mitrāvaruṇā | sabādhaḥ |
pra | vāṁ | manmānyṛcase | navāni | kṛtāni | brahma | jujuṣannimāni |
iyaṁ | deva | purohitiryuvabhyāṁ | yajñeṣu | mitrāvaruṇāvakāri |
viśvāni | durgā | pipṛtaṁ | tiro | no | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
utsūryo | bṛhadarcīṁṣyaśretpuru | viśvā | janima | mānuṣāṇām |
samo | divā | dadṛśe | rocamānaḥ | kratvā | kṛtaḥ | sukṛtaḥ | kartṛbhirbhūt |
sa | sūrya | prati | puro | nodgā | ebhiḥ | stomebhiretaśebhirevaiḥ |
pra | no | mitrāya | varuṇāya | voco'nāgaso | aryamṇe | agnaye | ca |
vi | naḥ | sahasraṁ | śurudho | radantvṛtāvāno | varuṇo | mitro | agniḥ |
yacchantu | candropamaṁ | no | arkamā | naḥ | kāmaṁ | pūpurantu | stavānāḥ |
dyāvābhūmī | adite | trāsīthāṁ | no | ye | vāṁ | jajñuḥ | sujanimāna | ṛṣve |
mā | heḻe | bhūma | varuṇasya | vāyormā | mitrasya | priyatamasya | nṛṇām |
pra | bāhavā | sisṛtaṁ | jīvase | nā | no | gavyūtimukṣataṁ | ghṛtena |
ā | no | jane | śravayataṁ | yuvānā | śrutaṁ | me | mitrāvaruṇā | havemā |
nū | mitro | varuṇo | aryamā | nastmane | tokāya | varivo | dadhantu |
sugā | no | viśvā | supathāni | santu | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
udveti | subhago | viśvacakṣāḥ | sādhāraṇaḥ | sūryo | mānuṣāṇām |
cakṣurmitrasya | varuṇasya | devaścarmeva | yaḥ | samavivyaktamāṁsi |
udveti | prasavītā | janānāṁ | mahānketurarṇavaḥ | sūryasya |
samānaṁ | cakraṁ | paryāvivṛtsanyadetaśo | vahati | dhūrṣu | yuktaḥ |
vibhrājamānoṣasāmupasthādrebhairudetyanumadyamānaḥ |
eṣa | me | devaḥ | savitā | cacchanda | yaḥ | samānaṁ | na | pramināti | dhāma |
divo | rukmorucakṣā | udeti | dūrearthastaraṇirbhrājamānaḥ |
nūnaṁ | janāḥ | sūryeṇa | prasūtāyannarthāni | kṛṇavannapāṁsi |
yatrā | cakruramṛtā | gātumasmai | śyeno | na | dīyannanveti | pāthaḥ |
prati | vāṁ | sūrodite | vidhema | namobhirmitrāvaruṇota | havyaiḥ |
nū | mitro | varuṇo | aryamā | nastmane | tokāya | varivo | dadhantu |
sugā | no | viśvā | supathāni | santu | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
divi | kṣayantā | rajasaḥ | pṛthivyāṁ | pra | vāṁ | ghṛtasya | nirṇijo | dadīran |
havyaṁ | no | mitro | aryamā | sujāto | rājā | sukṣatro | varuṇo | juṣanta |
ā | rājānā | maha | ṛtasya | gopā | sindhupatī | kṣatriyā | yātamarvāk |
iḻāṁ | no | mitrāvaruṇota | vṛṣṭimava | divenvataṁ | jīradānū |
mitrastanno | varuṇo | devo | aryaḥ | pra | sādhiṣṭhebhiḥ | pathibhirnayantu |
bravadyathā | nādariḥ | sudāseṣā | madema | saha | devagopāḥ |
yo | vāṁ | gartaṁ | manasā | takṣadetamūrdhvāṁ | dhītiṁ | kṛṇavaddhārayacca |
ukṣethāṁ | mitrāvaruṇā | ghṛtena | tā | rājānā | sukṣitīstarpayethām |
eṣa | stomo | varuṇa | mitra | tubhyaṁ | somaḥ | śukro | na | vāyave'yāmi |
aviṣṭaṁ | dhiyo | jigṛtaṁ | puraṁdhīryūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
prati | vāṁ | sūrodite | sūktairmitraṁ | huve | varuṇaṁ | pūtadakṣam |
yayorasuryamakṣitaṁ | jyeṣṭhaṁ | viśvasya | yāmannācitā | jigatnu |
tā | hi | devānāmasurā | tāvaryā | tā | naḥ | kṣitīḥ | karatamūrjayantīḥ |
aśyāma | mitrāvaruṇā | vayaṁ | vāṁ | dyāvā | ca | yatra | pīpayannahā | ca |
tā | bhūripāśāvanṛtasya | setū | duratyetū | ripave | martyāya |
ṛtasya | mitrāvaruṇā | pathā | vāmapo | na | nāvā | duritā | tarema |
ā | no | mitrāvaruṇā | havyajuṣṭiṁ | ghṛtairgavyūtimukṣatamiḻābhiḥ |
prati | vāmatra | varamā | janāya | pṛṇītamudno | divyasya | cāroḥ |
eṣa | stomo | varuṇa | mitra | tubhyaṁ | somaḥ | śukro | na | vāyave'yāmi |
aviṣṭaṁ | dhiyo | jigṛtaṁ | puraṁdhīryūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
pra | mitrayorvaruṇayoḥ | stomo | naitu | śūṣyaḥ |
namasvāntuvijātayoḥ |
yā | dhārayanta | devāḥ | sudakṣā | dakṣapitarā |
asuryāya | pramahasā |
tā | naḥ | stipā | tanūpā | varuṇa | jaritṝṇām |
mitra | sādhayataṁ | dhiyaḥ |
yadadya | sūrodite'nāgā | mitro | aryamā |
suvāti | savitā | bhagaḥ |
suprāvīrastu | sa | kṣayaḥ | pra | nu | yāmantsudānavaḥ |
ye | no | aṁho'tipiprati |
uta | svarājo | aditiradabdhasya | vratasya | ye |
maho | rājāneśate |
prati | vāṁ | sūrodite | mitraṁ | gṛṇīṣe | varuṇam |
aryamaṇaṁ | riśādasam |
rāyā | hiraṇyayā | matiriyamavṛkāya | śavase |
iyaṁ | viprā | medhasātaye |
te | syāma | deva | varuṇa | te | mitra | sūribhiḥ | saha |
iṣaṁ | svaśca | dhīmahi |
bahavaḥ | sūracakṣaso'gnijihvā | ṛtāvṛdhaḥ |
trīṇi | ye | yemurvidathāni | dhītibhirviśvāni | paribhūtibhiḥ |
vi | ye | dadhuḥ | śaradaṁ | māsamādaharyajñamaktuṁ | cādṛcam |
anāpyaṁ | varuṇo | mitro | aryamā | kṣatraṁ | rājānāśata |
tadvo | adya | manāmahe | sūktaiḥ | sūrodite |
yadohate | varuṇo | mitro | aryamā | yūyamṛtasya | rathyaḥ |
ṛtāvāna | ṛtajātā | ṛtāvṛdho | ghorāso | anṛtadviṣaḥ |
teṣāṁ | vaḥ | sumne | succhardiṣṭame | naraḥ | syāma | ye | ca | sūrayaḥ |
udu | tyaddarśataṁ | vapurdivaiti | pratihvare |
yadīmāśurvahati | devaitaśo | viśvasmai | cakṣase | aram |
śīrṣṇaḥśīrṣṇo | jagatastasthuṣaspatiṁ | samayā | viśvamā | rajaḥ |
sapta | svasāraḥ | suvitāya | sūryaṁ | vahanti | harito | rathe |
taccakṣurdevahitaṁ | śukramuccarat |
paśyema | śaradaḥ | śataṁ | jīvema | śaradaḥ | śatam |
kāvyebhiradābhyā | yātaṁ | varuṇa | dyumat |
mitraśca | somapītaye |
divo | dhāmabhirvaruṇa | mitraścā | yātamadruhā |
pibataṁ | somamātujī |
ā | yātaṁ | mitrāvaruṇā | juṣāṇāvāhutiṁ | narā |
pātaṁ | somamṛtāvṛdhā |
prati | vāṁ | rathaṁ | nṛpatī | jaradhyai | haviṣmatā | manasā | yajñiyena |
yo | vāṁ | dūto | na | dhiṣṇyāvajīgaracchā | sūnurna | pitarā | vivakmi |
aśocyagniḥ | samidhāno | asme | upo | adṛśrantamasaścidantāḥ |
aceti | keturuṣasaḥ | purastācchriye | divo | duhiturjāyamānaḥ |
abhi | vāṁ | nūnamaśvinā | suhotā | stomaiḥ | siṣakti | nāsatyā | vivakvān |
pūrvībhiryātaṁ | pathyābhirarvāksvarvidā | vasumatā | rathena |
avorvāṁ | nūnamaśvinā | yuvākurhuve | yadvāṁ | sute | mādhvī | vasūyuḥ |
ā | vāṁ | vahantu | sthavirāso | aśvāḥ | pibātho | asme | suṣutā | madhūni |
prācīmu | devāśvinā | dhiyaṁ | me'mṛdhrāṁ | sātaye | kṛtaṁ | vasūyum |
viśvāviṣṭaṁ | vājā | puraṁdhīstā | naḥ | śaktaṁ | śacīpatī | śacībhiḥ |
aviṣṭaṁ | dhīṣvaśvinā | nāsu | prajāvadreto | ahrayaṁ | no | astu |
ā | vāṁ | toke | tanaye | tūtujānāḥ | suratnāso | devavītiṁ | gamema |
eṣa | sya | vāṁ | pūrvagatveva | sakhye | nidhirhito | mādhvī | rāto | asme |
aheḻatā | manasā | yātamarvāgaśnantā | havyaṁ | mānuṣīṣu | vikṣu |
ekasminyoge | bhuraṇā | samāne | pari | vāṁ | sapta | sravato | ratho | gāt |
na | vāyanti | subhvo | devayuktā | ye | vāṁ | dhūrṣu | taraṇayo | vahanti |
asaścatā | maghavadbhyo | hi | bhūtaṁ | ye | rāyā | maghadeyaṁ | junanti |
pra | ye | bandhuṁ | sūnṛtābhistirante | gavyā | pṛñcanto | aśvyā | maghāni |
nū | me | havamā | śṛṇutaṁ | yuvānā | yāsiṣṭaṁ | vartiraśvināvirāvat |
dhattaṁ | ratnāni | jarataṁ | ca | sūrīnyūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
ā | śubhrā | yātamaśvinā | svaśvā | giro | dasrā | jujuṣāṇā | yuvākoḥ |
havyāni | ca | pratibhṛtā | vītaṁ | naḥ |
pra | vāmandhāṁsi | madyānyasthuraraṁ | gantaṁ | haviṣo | vītaye | me |
tiro | aryo | havanāni | śrutaṁ | naḥ |
pra | vāṁ | ratho | manojaveyarti | tiro | rajāṁsyaśvinā | śatotiḥ |
asmabhyaṁ | sūryāvasū | iyānaḥ |
ayaṁ | ha | yadvāṁ | devayo | adrirūrdhvo | vivakti | somasudyuvabhyām |
ā | valgū | vipro | vavṛtīta | havyaiḥ |
citraṁ | ha | yadvāṁ | bhojanaṁ | nvasti | nyatraye | mahiṣvantaṁ | yuyotam |
yo | vāmomānaṁ | dadhate | priyaḥ | san |
uta | tyadvāṁ | jurate | aśvinā | bhūccyavānāya | pratītyaṁ | havirde |
adhi | yadvarpetaūti | dhatthaḥ |
uta | tyaṁ | bhujyumaśvinā | sakhāyo | madhye | jahurdurevāsaḥ | samudre |
nirīṁ | parṣadarāvā | yo | yuvākuḥ |
vṛkāya | cijjasamānāya | śaktamuta | śrutaṁ | śayave | hūyamānā |
yāvaghnyāmapinvatamapo | na | staryaṁ | cicchaktyaśvinā | śacībhiḥ |
eṣa | sya | kārurjarate | sūktairagre | budhānoṣasāṁ | sumanmā |
iṣā | taṁ | vardhadaghnyā | payobhiryūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
ā | vāṁ | ratho | rodasī | badbadhāno | hiraṇyayo | vṛṣabhiryātvaśvaiḥ |
ghṛtavartaniḥ | pavibhī | rucāneṣāṁ | voḻhā | nṛpatirvājinīvān |
sa | paprathāno | abhi | pañca | bhūmā | trivandhuro | manasā | yātu | yuktaḥ |
viśo | yena | gacchatho | devayantīḥ | kutrā | cidyāmamaśvinā | dadhānā |
svaśvā | yaśasā | yātamarvāgdasrā | nidhiṁ | madhumantaṁ | pibāthaḥ |
vi | vāṁ | ratho | vadhvā | yādamāno'ntāndivo | bādhate | vartanibhyām |
yuvoḥ | śriyaṁ | pari | yoṣāvṛṇīta | sūro | duhitā | paritakmyāyām |
yaddevayantamavathaḥ | śacībhiḥ | pari | ghraṁsamomanā | vāṁ | vayo | gāt |
yo | ha | sya | vāṁ | rathirā | vastosrā | ratho | yujānaḥ | pariyāti | vartiḥ |
tena | naḥ | śaṁ | yoruṣaso | vyuṣṭau | nyaśvinā | vahataṁ | yajñe | asmin |
narā | gaureva | vidyutaṁ | tṛṣāṇāsmākamadya | savanopa | yātam |
purutrā | hi | vāṁ | matibhirhavante | mā | vāmanye | ni | yamandevayantaḥ |
yuvaṁ | bhujyumavaviddhaṁ | samudrodūhathurarṇaso | asridhānaiḥ |
patatribhiraśramairavyathibhirdaṁsanābhiraśvinā | pārayantā |
nū | me | havamā | śṛṇutaṁ | yuvānā | yāsiṣṭaṁ | vartiraśvināvirāvat |
dhattaṁ | ratnāni | jarataṁ | ca | sūrīnyūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
ā | viśvavārāśvinā | gataṁ | naḥ | pra | tatsthānamavāci | vāṁ | pṛthivyām |
aśvo | na | vājī | śunapṛṣṭho | asthādā | yatsedathurdhruvase | na | yonim |
siṣakti | sā | vāṁ | sumatiścaniṣṭhātāpi | gharmo | manuṣo | duroṇe |
yo | vāṁ | samudrāntsaritaḥ | pipartyetagvā | cinna | suyujā | yujānaḥ |
yāni | sthānānyaśvinā | dadhāthe | divo | yahvīṣvoṣadhīṣu | vikṣu |
ni | parvatasya | mūrdhani | sadanteṣaṁ | janāya | dāśuṣe | vahantā |
caniṣṭaṁ | devauṣadhīṣvapsu | yadyogyāśnavaithe | ṛṣīṇām |
purūṇi | ratnā | dadhatau | nyasme | anu | pūrvāṇi | cakhyathuryugāni |
śuśruvāṁsā | cidaśvinā | purūṇyabhi | brahmāṇi | cakṣāthe | ṛṣīṇām |
prati | pra | yātaṁ | varamā | janāyāsme | vāmastu | sumatiścaniṣṭhā |
yo | vāṁ | yajño | nāsatyā | haviṣmānkṛtabrahmā | samaryo | bhavāti |
upa | pra | yātaṁ | varamā | vasiṣṭhamimā | brahmāṇyṛcyante | yuvabhyām |
iyaṁ | manīṣeyamaśvinā | gīrimāṁ | suvṛktiṁ | vṛṣaṇā | juṣethām |
imā | brahmāṇi | yuvayūnyagmanyūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
apa | svasuruṣaso | nagjihīte | riṇakti | kṛṣṇīraruṣāya | panthām |
aśvāmaghā | gomaghā | vāṁ | huvema | divā | naktaṁ | śarumasmadyuyotam |
upāyātaṁ | dāśuṣe | martyāya | rathena | vāmamaśvinā | vahantā |
yuyutamasmadanirāmamīvāṁ | divā | naktaṁ | mādhvī | trāsīthāṁ | naḥ |
ā | vāṁ | rathamavamasyāṁ | vyuṣṭau | sumnāyavo | vṛṣaṇo | vartayantu |
syūmagabhastimṛtayugbhiraśvairāśvinā | vasumantaṁ | vahethām |
yo | vāṁ | ratho | nṛpatī | asti | voḻhā | trivandhuro | vasumām̐ | usrayāmā |
ā | nainā | nāsatyopa | yātamabhi | yadvāṁ | viśvapsnyo | jigāti |
yuvaṁ | cyavānaṁ | jaraso'mumuktaṁ | ni | pedavohathurāśumaśvam |
niraṁhasastamasaḥ | spartamatriṁ | ni | jāhuṣaṁ | śithire | dhātamantaḥ |
iyaṁ | manīṣeyamaśvinā | gīrimāṁ | suvṛktiṁ | vṛṣaṇā | juṣethām |
imā | brahmāṇi | yuvayūnyagmanyūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
ā | gomatā | nāsatyā | rathenāśvāvatā | puruścandreṇa | yātam |
abhi | vāṁ | viśvā | niyutaḥ | sacante | spārhayā | śriyā | tanvā | śubhānā |
ā | no | devebhirupa | yātamarvāksajoṣasā | nāsatyā | rathena |
yuvorhi | naḥ | sakhyā | pitryāṇi | samāno | bandhuruta | tasya | vittam |
udu | stomāso | aśvinorabudhrañjāmi | brahmāṇyuṣasaśca | devīḥ |
āvivāsanrodasī | dhiṣṇyeme | acchā | vipro | nāsatyā | vivakti |
vi | ceducchantyaśvinoṣāsaḥ | pra | vāṁ | brahmāṇi | kāravo | bharante |
ūrdhvaṁ | bhānuṁ | savitā | devo | aśredbṛhadagnayaḥ | samidhā | jarante |
ā | paścātānnāsatyā | purastādāśvinā | yātamadharādudaktāt |
ā | viśvataḥ | pāñcajanyena | rāyā | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
atāriṣma | tamasaspāramasya | prati | stomaṁ | devayanto | dadhānāḥ |
purudaṁsā | purutamā | purājāmartyā | havate | aśvinā | gīḥ |
nyu | priyo | manuṣaḥ | sādi | hotā | nāsatyā | yo | yajate | vandate | ca |
aśnītaṁ | madhvo | aśvinopāka | ā | vāṁ | voce | vidatheṣu | prayasvān |
ahema | yajñaṁ | pathāmurāṇemāṁ | suvṛktiṁ | vṛṣaṇā | juṣethām |
śruṣṭīveva | preṣito | vāmabodhi | prati | stomairjaramāṇo | vasiṣṭhaḥ |
upa | tyā | vahnī | gamato | viśaṁ | no | rakṣohaṇā | saṁbhṛtā | vīḻupāṇī |
samandhāṁsyagmata | matsarāṇi | mā | no | mardhiṣṭamā | gataṁ | śivena |
ā | paścātānnāsatyā | purastādāśvinā | yātamadharādudaktāt |
ā | viśvataḥ | pāñcajanyena | rāyā | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
imo | vāṁ | diviṣṭayosrā | havante | aśvinā |
ayaṁ | vāmahve'vase | śacīvasū | viśaṁviśaṁ | hi | gacchathaḥ |
yuvaṁ | citraṁ | dadathurbhojanaṁ | narā | codethāṁ | sūnṛtāvate |
arvāgrathaṁ | samanasā | ni | yacchataṁ | pibataṁ | somyaṁ | madhu |
ā | yātamupa | bhūṣataṁ | madhvaḥ | pibatamaśvinā |
dugdhaṁ | payo | vṛṣaṇā | jenyāvasū | mā | no | mardhiṣṭamā | gatam |
aśvāso | ye | vāmupa | dāśuṣo | gṛhaṁ | yuvāṁ | dīyanti | bibhrataḥ |
makṣūyubhirnarā | hayebhiraśvinā | devā | yātamasmayū |
adhā | ha | yanto | aśvinā | pṛkṣaḥ | sacanta | sūrayaḥ |
tā | yaṁsato | maghavadbhyo | dhruvaṁ | yaśaśchardirasmabhyaṁ | nāsatyā |
pra | ye | yayuravṛkāso | ratheva | nṛpātāro | janānām |
uta | svena | śavasā | śūśuvurnarota | kṣiyanti | sukṣitim |
vyuṣāvo | divijā | ṛtenāviṣkṛṇvānā | mahimānamāgāt |
apa | druhastamāvarajuṣṭamaṅgirastamā | pathyājīgaḥ |
mahe | no | adya | suvitāya | bodhyuṣo | mahe | saubhagāya | pra | yandhi |
citraṁ | rayiṁ | yaśasaṁ | dhehyasme | devi | marteṣu | mānuṣi | śravasyum |
ete | tye | bhānavo | darśatāyāścitroṣaso | amṛtāsāguḥ |
janayanto | daivyāni | vratānyāpṛṇanto | antarikṣā | vyasthuḥ |
eṣā | syā | yujānā | parākātpañca | kṣitīḥ | pari | sadyo | jigāti |
abhipaśyantī | vayunā | janānāṁ | divo | duhitā | bhuvanasya | patnī |
vājinīvatī | sūryasya | yoṣā | citrāmaghā | rāyeśe | vasūnām |
ṛṣiṣṭutā | jarayantī | maghonyuṣocchati | vahnibhirgṛṇānā |
prati | dyutānāmaruṣāso | aśvāścitrādṛśrannuṣasaṁ | vahantaḥ |
yāti | śubhrā | viśvapiśā | rathena | dadhāti | ratnaṁ | vidhate | janāya |
satyā | satyebhirmahatī | mahadbhirdevī | devebhiryajatā | yajatraiḥ |
rujaddṛḻhāni | dadadusriyāṇāṁ | prati | gāvoṣasaṁ | vāvaśanta |
nū | no | gomadvīravaddhehi | ratnamuṣo | aśvāvatpurubhojo | asme |
mā | no | barhiḥ | puruṣatā | nide | karyūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
udu | jyotiramṛtaṁ | viśvajanyaṁ | viśvānaraḥ | savitā | devo | aśret |
kratvā | devānāmajaniṣṭa | cakṣurāvirakarbhuvanaṁ | viśvamuṣāḥ |
pra | me | panthā | devayānādṛśrannamardhanto | vasubhiriṣkṛtāsaḥ |
abhūdu | keturuṣasaḥ | purastātpratīcyāgādadhi | harmyebhyaḥ |
tānīdahāni | bahulānyāsanyā | prācīnamuditā | sūryasya |
yataḥ | pari | jārevācarantyuṣo | dadṛkṣe | na | punaryatīva |
teddevānāṁ | sadhamādāsannṛtāvānaḥ | kavayaḥ | pūrvyāsaḥ |
gūḻhaṁ | jyotiḥ | pitaro | anvavindantsatyamantrājanayannuṣāsam |
samānorve | adhi | saṁgatāsaḥ | saṁ | jānate | na | yatante | mithaste |
te | devānāṁ | na | minanti | vratānyamardhanto | vasubhiryādamānāḥ |
prati | tvā | stomairīḻate | vasiṣṭhoṣarbudhaḥ | subhage | tuṣṭuvāṁsaḥ |
gavāṁ | netrī | vājapatnī | nocchoṣaḥ | sujāte | prathamā | jarasva |
eṣā | netrī | rādhasaḥ | sūnṛtānāmuṣocchantī | ribhyate | vasiṣṭhaiḥ |
dīrghaśrutaṁ | rayimasme | dadhānā | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
upo | ruruce | yuvatirna | yoṣā | viśvaṁ | jīvaṁ | prasuvantī | carāyai |
abhūdagniḥ | samidhe | mānuṣāṇāmakarjyotirbādhamānā | tamāṁsi |
viśvaṁ | pratīcī | saprathodasthādruśadvāso | bibhratī | śukramaśvait |
hiraṇyavarṇā | sudṛśīkasaṁdṛggavāṁ | mātā | netryahnāmaroci |
devānāṁ | cakṣuḥ | subhagā | vahantī | śvetaṁ | nayantī | sudṛśīkamaśvam |
uṣādarśi | raśmibhirvyaktā | citrāmaghā | viśvamanu | prabhūtā |
antivāmā | dūre | amitramucchorvīṁ | gavyūtimabhayaṁ | kṛdhī | naḥ |
yāvaya | dveṣā | bharā | vasūni | codaya | rādho | gṛṇate | maghoni |
asme | śreṣṭhebhirbhānubhirvi | bhāhyuṣo | devi | pratirantī | nāyuḥ |
iṣaṁ | ca | no | dadhatī | viśvavāre | gomadaśvāvadrathavacca | rādhaḥ |
yāṁ | tvā | divo | duhitarvardhayantyuṣaḥ | sujāte | matibhirvasiṣṭhāḥ |
sāsmāsu | dhā | rayimṛṣvaṁ | bṛhantaṁ | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
prati | ketavaḥ | prathamādṛśrannūrdhvā | asyāñjayo | vi | śrayante |
uṣo | arvācā | bṛhatā | rathena | jyotiṣmatā | vāmamasmabhyaṁ | vakṣi |
prati | ṣīmagnirjarate | samiddhaḥ | prati | viprāso | matibhirgṛṇantaḥ |
uṣā | yāti | jyotiṣā | bādhamānā | viśvā | tamāṁsi | duritāpa | devī |
eto | tyāḥ | pratyadṛśranpurastājjyotiryacchantīruṣaso | vibhātīḥ |
ajījanantsūryaṁ | yajñamagnimapācīnaṁ | tamo | agādajuṣṭam |
aceti | divo | duhitā | maghonī | viśve | paśyantyuṣasaṁ | vibhātīm |
āsthādrathaṁ | svadhayā | yujyamānamā | yamaśvāsaḥ | suyujo | vahanti |
prati | tvādya | sumanaso | budhantāsmākāso | maghavāno | vayaṁ | ca |
tilvilāyadhvamuṣaso | vibhātīryūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
vyuṣāvaḥ | pathyā | janānāṁ | pañca | kṣitīrmānuṣīrbodhayantī |
susaṁdṛgbhirukṣabhirbhānumaśredvi | sūryo | rodasī | cakṣasāvaḥ |
vyañjate | divo | anteṣvaktūnviśo | na | yuktoṣaso | yatante |
saṁ | te | gāvastamā | vartayanti | jyotiryacchanti | saviteva | bāhū |
abhūduṣendratamā | maghonyajījanatsuvitāya | śravāṁsi |
vi | divo | devī | duhitā | dadhātyaṅgirastamā | sukṛte | vasūni |
tāvaduṣo | rādho | asmabhyaṁ | rāsva | yāvatstotṛbhyo | arado | gṛṇānā |
yāṁ | tvā | jajñurvṛṣabhasyā | raveṇa | vi | dṛḻhasya | duro | adreraurṇoḥ |
devaṁdevaṁ | rādhase | codayantyasmadryaksūnṛterayantī |
vyucchantī | naḥ | sanaye | dhiyo | dhā | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
prati | stomebhiruṣasaṁ | vasiṣṭhā | gīrbhirviprāsaḥ | prathamābudhran |
vivartayantīṁ | rajasī | samante | āviṣkṛṇvatīṁ | bhuvanāni | viśvā |
eṣā | syā | navyamāyurdadhānā | gūḍhvī | tamo | jyotiṣoṣābodhi |
agraiti | yuvatirahrayāṇā | prācikitatsūryaṁ | yajñamagnim |
aśvāvatīrgomatīrnoṣāso | vīravatīḥ | sadamucchantu | bhadrāḥ |
ghṛtaṁ | duhānā | viśvataḥ | prapītā | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
pratyu | adarśyāyatyucchantī | duhitā | divaḥ |
apo | mahi | vyayati | cakṣase | tamo | jyotiṣkṛṇoti | sūnarī |
udusriyāḥ | sṛjate | sūryaḥ | sacām̐ | udyannakṣatramarcivat |
taveduṣo | vyuṣi | sūryasya | ca | saṁ | bhaktena | gamemahi |
prati | tvā | duhitardivoṣo | jīrābhutsmahi |
yā | vahasi | puru | spārhaṁ | vananvati | ratnaṁ | na | dāśuṣe | mayaḥ |
ucchantī | yā | kṛṇoṣi | maṁhanā | mahi | prakhyai | devi | svardṛśe |
tasyāste | ratnabhājemahe | vayaṁ | syāma | māturna | sūnavaḥ |
taccitraṁ | rādhā | bharoṣo | yaddīrghaśruttamam |
yatte | divo | duhitarmartabhojanaṁ | tadrāsva | bhunajāmahai |
śravaḥ | sūribhyo | amṛtaṁ | vasutvanaṁ | vājām̐ | asmabhyaṁ | gomataḥ |
codayitrī | maghonaḥ | sūnṛtāvatyuṣocchadapa | sridhaḥ |
indrāvaruṇā | yuvamadhvarāya | no | viśe | janāya | mahi | śarma | yacchatam |
dīrghaprayajyumati | yo | vanuṣyati | vayaṁ | jayema | pṛtanāsu | dūḍhyaḥ |
samrāḻanyaḥ | svarāḻanyocyate | vāṁ | mahāntāvindrāvaruṇā | mahāvasū |
viśve | devāsaḥ | parame | vyomani | saṁ | vāmojo | vṛṣaṇā | saṁ | balaṁ | dadhuḥ |
anvapāṁ | khānyatṛntamojasā | sūryamairayataṁ | divi | prabhum |
indrāvaruṇā | made | asya | māyino'pinvatamapitaḥ | pinvataṁ | dhiyaḥ |
yuvāmidyutsu | pṛtanāsu | vahnayo | yuvāṁ | kṣemasya | prasave | mitajñavaḥ |
īśānā | vasvobhayasya | kāravendrāvaruṇā | suhavā | havāmahe |
indrāvaruṇā | yadimāni | cakrathurviśvā | jātāni | bhuvanasya | majmanā |
kṣemeṇa | mitro | varuṇaṁ | duvasyati | marudbhirugraḥ | śubhamanyeyate |
mahe | śulkāya | varuṇasya | nu | tviṣaujo | mimāte | dhruvamasya | yatsvam |
ajāmimanyaḥ | śnathayantamātiraddabhrebhiranyaḥ | pra | vṛṇoti | bhūyasaḥ |
na | tamaṁho | na | duritāni | martyamindrāvaruṇā | na | tapaḥ | kutaścana |
yasya | devā | gacchatho | vītho | adhvaraṁ | na | taṁ | martasya | naśate | parihvṛtiḥ |
arvāṅnarā | daivyenāvasā | gataṁ | śṛṇutaṁ | havaṁ | yadi | me | jujoṣathaḥ |
yuvorhi | sakhyamuta | vā | yadāpyaṁ | mārḍīkamindrāvaruṇā | ni | yacchatam |
asmākamindrāvaruṇā | bharebhare | puroyodhā | bhavataṁ | kṛṣṭyojasā |
yadvāṁ | havantobhaye | adha | spṛdhi | narastokasya | tanayasya | sātiṣu |
asme | indro | varuṇo | mitro | aryamā | dyumnaṁ | yacchantu | mahi | śarma | saprathaḥ |
avadhraṁ | jyotiraditerṛtāvṛdho | devasya | ślokaṁ | saviturmanāmahe |
yuvāṁ | narā | paśyamānāsāpyaṁ | prācā | gavyantaḥ | pṛthuparśavo | yayuḥ |
dāsā | ca | vṛtrā | hatamāryāṇi | ca | sudāsamindrāvaruṇāvasāvatam |
yatrā | naraḥ | samayante | kṛtadhvajo | yasminnājā | bhavati | kiṁ | cana | priyam |
yatrā | bhayante | bhuvanā | svardṛśastatrā | nendrāvaruṇādhi | vocatam |
saṁ | bhūmyāntā | dhvasirādṛkṣatendrāvaruṇā | divi | ghoṣāruhat |
asthurjanānāmupa | māmarātayo'rvāgavasā | havanaśrutā | gatam |
indrāvaruṇā | vadhanābhiraprati | bhedaṁ | vanvantā | pra | sudāsamāvatam |
brahmāṇyeṣāṁ | śṛṇutaṁ | havīmani | satyā | tṛtsūnāmabhavatpurohitiḥ |
indrāvaruṇāvabhyā | tapanti | māghānyaryo | vanuṣāmarātayaḥ |
yuvaṁ | hi | vasvobhayasya | rājatho'dha | smā | no'vataṁ | pārye | divi |
yuvāṁ | havantobhayāsa | ājiṣvindraṁ | ca | vasvo | varuṇaṁ | ca | sātaye |
yatra | rājabhirdaśabhirnibādhitaṁ | pra | sudāsamāvataṁ | tṛtsubhiḥ | saha |
daśa | rājānaḥ | samitāyajyavaḥ | sudāsamindrāvaruṇā | na | yuyudhuḥ |
satyā | nṛṇāmadmasadāmupastutirdevaiṣāmabhavandevahūtiṣu |
dāśarājñe | pariyattāya | viśvataḥ | sudāsendrāvaruṇāvaśikṣatam |
śvityañco | yatra | namasā | kapardino | dhiyā | dhīvanto | asapanta | tṛtsavaḥ |
vṛtrāṇyanyaḥ | samitheṣu | jighnate | vratānyanyo | abhi | rakṣate | sadā |
havāmahe | vāṁ | vṛṣaṇā | suvṛktibhirasme | indrāvaruṇā | śarma | yacchatam |
asme | indro | varuṇo | mitro | aryamā | dyumnaṁ | yacchantu | mahi | śarma | saprathaḥ |
avadhraṁ | jyotiraditerṛtāvṛdho | devasya | ślokaṁ | saviturmanāmahe |
ā | vāṁ | rājānāvadhvare | vavṛtyāṁ | havyebhirindrāvaruṇā | namobhiḥ |
pra | vāṁ | ghṛtācī | bāhvordadhānā | pari | tmanā | viṣurūpā | jigāti |
yuvo | rāṣṭraṁ | bṛhadinvati | dyauryau | setṛbhirarajjubhiḥ | sinīthaḥ |
pari | no | heḻo | varuṇasya | vṛjyoruṁ | nendraḥ | kṛṇavadu | lokam |
kṛtaṁ | no | yajñaṁ | vidatheṣu | cāruṁ | kṛtaṁ | brahmāṇi | sūriṣu | praśastā |
upo | rayirdevajūto | naitu | pra | ṇaḥ | spārhābhirūtibhistiretam |
asme | indrāvaruṇā | viśvavāraṁ | rayiṁ | dhattaṁ | vasumantaṁ | purukṣum |
pra | yādityo | anṛtā | minātyamitā | śūro | dayate | vasūni |
iyamindraṁ | varuṇamaṣṭa | me | gīḥ | prāvattoke | tanaye | tūtujānā |
suratnāso | devavītiṁ | gamema | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
punīṣe | vāmarakṣasaṁ | manīṣāṁ | somamindrāya | varuṇāya | juhvat |
ghṛtapratīkāmuṣasaṁ | na | devīṁ | tā | no | yāmannuruṣyatāmabhīke |
spardhante | vo | devahūye | atra | yeṣu | dhvajeṣu | didyavaḥ | patanti |
yuvaṁ | tām̐ | indrāvaruṇāvamitrānhataṁ | parācaḥ | śarvā | viṣūcaḥ |
āpaściddhi | svayaśasaḥ | sadaḥsu | devīrindraṁ | varuṇaṁ | devatā | dhuḥ |
kṛṣṭīranyo | dhārayati | praviktā | vṛtrāṇyanyo | apratīni | hanti |
sa | sukraturṛtacidastu | hotā | yāditya | śavasā | vāṁ | namasvān |
āvavartadavase | vāṁ | haviṣmānasaditsa | suvitāya | prayasvān |
iyamindraṁ | varuṇamaṣṭa | me | gīḥ | prāvattoke | tanaye | tūtujānā |
suratnāso | devavītiṁ | gamema | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
dhīrā | tvasya | mahinā | janūṁṣi | vi | yastastambha | rodasī | cidurvī |
pra | nākamṛṣvaṁ | nunude | bṛhantaṁ | dvitā | nakṣatraṁ | paprathacca | bhūma |
uta | svayā | tanvā | saṁ | vade | tatkadā | nvantarvaruṇe | bhuvāni |
kiṁ | me | havyamahṛṇāno | juṣeta | kadā | mṛḻīkaṁ | sumanābhi | khyam |
pṛcche | tadeno | varuṇa | didṛkṣūpo | emi | cikituṣo | vipṛccham |
samānaminme | kavayaścidāhurayaṁ | ha | tubhyaṁ | varuṇo | hṛṇīte |
kimāgāsa | varuṇa | jyeṣṭhaṁ | yatstotāraṁ | jighāṁsasi | sakhāyam |
pra | tanme | voco | dūḻabha | svadhāvo'va | tvānenā | namasā | tureyām |
ava | drugdhāni | pitryā | sṛjā | no'va | yā | vayaṁ | cakṛmā | tanūbhiḥ |
ava | rājanpaśutṛpaṁ | na | tāyuṁ | sṛjā | vatsaṁ | na | dāmno | vasiṣṭham |
na | sa | svo | dakṣo | varuṇa | dhrutiḥ | sā | surā | manyurvibhīdako | acittiḥ |
asti | jyāyānkanīyasopāre | svapnaścanedanṛtasya | prayotā |
araṁ | dāso | na | mīḻhuṣe | karāṇyahaṁ | devāya | bhūrṇaye'nāgāḥ |
acetayadacito | devo | aryo | gṛtsaṁ | rāye | kavitaro | junāti |
ayaṁ | su | tubhyaṁ | varuṇa | svadhāvo | hṛdi | stomopaśritaścidastu |
śaṁ | naḥ | kṣeme | śamu | yoge | no | astu | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
radatpatho | varuṇaḥ | sūryāya | prārṇāṁsi | samudriyā | nadīnām |
sargo | na | sṛṣṭo | arvatīrṛtāyañcakāra | mahīravanīrahabhyaḥ |
ātmā | te | vāto | rajā | navīnotpaśurna | bhūrṇiryavase | sasavān |
antarmahī | bṛhatī | rodasīme | viśvā | te | dhāma | varuṇa | priyāṇi |
pari | spaśo | varuṇasya | smadiṣṭobhe | paśyanti | rodasī | sumeke |
ṛtāvānaḥ | kavayo | yajñadhīrāḥ | pracetaso | yeṣayanta | manma |
uvāca | me | varuṇo | medhirāya | triḥ | sapta | nāmāghnyā | bibharti |
vidvānpadasya | guhyā | na | vocadyugāya | viproparāya | śikṣan |
tisro | dyāvo | nihitāntarasmintisro | bhūmīruparāḥ | ṣaḍvidhānāḥ |
gṛtso | rājā | varuṇaścakraitaṁ | divi | preṅkhaṁ | hiraṇyayaṁ | śubhe | kam |
ava | sindhuṁ | varuṇo | dyauriva | sthāddrapso | na | śveto | mṛgastuviṣmān |
gambhīraśaṁso | rajaso | vimānaḥ | supārakṣatraḥ | sato | asya | rājā |
yo | mṛḻayāti | cakruṣe | cidāgo | vayaṁ | syāma | varuṇe | anāgāḥ |
anu | vratānyaditerṛdhanto | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
pra | śundhyuvaṁ | varuṇāya | preṣṭhāṁ | matiṁ | vasiṣṭha | mīḻhuṣe | bharasva |
yemarvāñcaṁ | karate | yajatraṁ | sahasrāmaghaṁ | vṛṣaṇaṁ | bṛhantam |
adhā | nvasya | saṁdṛśaṁ | jaganvānagneranīkaṁ | varuṇasya | maṁsi |
svaryadaśmannadhipo | andho'bhi | mā | vapurdṛśaye | ninīyāt |
ā | yadruhāva | varuṇaśca | nāvaṁ | pra | yatsamudramīrayāva | madhyam |
adhi | yadapāṁ | snubhiścarāva | pra | preṅkheṅkhayāvahai | śubhe | kam |
vasiṣṭhaṁ | ha | varuṇo | nāvyādhādṛṣiṁ | cakāra | svapā | mahobhiḥ |
stotāraṁ | vipraḥ | sudinatve | ahnāṁ | yānnu | dyāvastatananyāduṣāsaḥ |
kva | tyāni | nau | sakhyā | babhūvuḥ | sacāvahe | yadavṛkaṁ | purā | cit |
bṛhantaṁ | mānaṁ | varuṇa | svadhāvaḥ | sahasradvāraṁ | jagamā | gṛhaṁ | te |
yāpirnityo | varuṇa | priyaḥ | santvāmāgāṁsi | kṛṇavatsakhā | te |
mā | tainasvanto | yakṣinbhujema | yandhi | ṣmā | vipraḥ | stuvate | varūtham |
dhruvāsu | tvāsu | kṣitiṣu | kṣiyanto | vyasmatpāśaṁ | varuṇo | mumocat |
avo | vanvānāditerupasthādyūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
mo | ṣu | varuṇa | mṛnmayaṁ | gṛhaṁ | rājannahaṁ | gamam |
mṛḻā | sukṣatra | mṛḻaya |
yademi | prasphuranniva | dṛtirna | dhmāto | adrivaḥ |
mṛḻā | sukṣatra | mṛḻaya |
kratvaḥ | samaha | dīnatā | pratīpaṁ | jagamā | śuce |
mṛḻā | sukṣatra | mṛḻaya |
apāṁ | madhye | tasthivāṁsaṁ | tṛṣṇāvidajjaritāram |
mṛḻā | sukṣatra | mṛḻaya |
yatkiṁ | cedaṁ | varuṇa | daivye | jane'bhidrohaṁ | manuṣyāścarāmasi |
acittī | yattava | dharmā | yuyopima | mā | nastasmādenaso | deva | rīriṣaḥ |
pra | vīrayā | śucayo | dadrire | vāmadhvaryubhirmadhumantaḥ | sutāsaḥ |
vaha | vāyo | niyuto | yāhyacchā | pibā | sutasyāndhaso | madāya |
īśānāya | prahutiṁ | yastānaṭ | chuciṁ | somaṁ | śucipāstubhyaṁ | vāyo |
kṛṇoṣi | taṁ | martyeṣu | praśastaṁ | jātojāto | jāyate | vājyasya |
rāye | nu | yaṁ | jajñatū | rodasīme | rāye | devī | dhiṣaṇā | dhāti | devam |
adha | vāyuṁ | niyutaḥ | saścata | svota | śvetaṁ | vasudhitiṁ | nireke |
ucchannuṣasaḥ | sudināriprā | uru | jyotirvividurdīdhyānāḥ |
gavyaṁ | cidūrvamuśijo | vi | vavrusteṣāmanu | pradivaḥ | sasrurāpaḥ |
te | satyena | manasā | dīdhyānāḥ | svena | yuktāsaḥ | kratunā | vahanti |
indravāyū | vīravāhaṁ | rathaṁ | vāmīśānayorabhi | pṛkṣaḥ | sacante |
īśānāso | ye | dadhate | svarṇo | gobhiraśvebhirvasubhirhiraṇyaiḥ |
indravāyū | sūrayo | viśvamāyurarvadbhirvīraiḥ | pṛtanāsu | sahyuḥ |
arvanto | na | śravaso | bhikṣamāṇendravāyū | suṣṭutibhirvasiṣṭhāḥ |
vājayantaḥ | svavase | huvema | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
kuvidaṅga | namasā | ye | vṛdhāsaḥ | purā | devānavadyāsa | āsan |
te | vāyave | manave | bādhitāyāvāsayannuṣasaṁ | sūryeṇa |
uśantā | dūtā | na | dabhāya | gopā | māsaśca | pāthaḥ | śaradaśca | pūrvīḥ |
indravāyū | suṣṭutirvāmiyānā | mārḍīkamīṭṭe | suvitaṁ | ca | navyam |
pīvoannām̐ | rayivṛdhaḥ | sumedhāḥ | śvetaḥ | siṣakti | niyutāmabhiśrīḥ |
te | vāyave | samanaso | vi | tasthurviśvennaraḥ | svapatyāni | cakruḥ |
yāvattarastanvo | yāvadojo | yāvannaraścakṣasā | dīdhyānāḥ |
śuciṁ | somaṁ | śucipā | pātamasme | indravāyū | sadataṁ | barhiredam |
niyuvānā | niyutaḥ | spārhavīrendravāyū | sarathaṁ | yātamarvāk |
idaṁ | hi | vāṁ | prabhṛtaṁ | madhvo | agramadha | prīṇānā | vi | mumuktamasme |
yā | vāṁ | śataṁ | niyuto | yāḥ | sahasramindravāyū | viśvavārāḥ | sacante |
ābhiryātaṁ | suvidatrābhirarvākpātaṁ | narā | pratibhṛtasya | madhvaḥ |
arvanto | na | śravaso | bhikṣamāṇendravāyū | suṣṭutibhirvasiṣṭhāḥ |
vājayantaḥ | svavase | huvema | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
ā | vāyo | bhūṣa | śucipopa | naḥ | sahasraṁ | te | niyuto | viśvavāra |
upo | te | andho | madyamayāmi | yasya | deva | dadhiṣe | pūrvapeyam |
pra | sotā | jīro | adhvareṣvasthātsomamindrāya | vāyave | pibadhyai |
pra | yadvāṁ | madhvo | agriyaṁ | bharantyadhvaryavo | devayantaḥ | śacībhiḥ |
pra | yābhiryāsi | dāśvāṁsamacchā | niyudbhirvāyaviṣṭaye | duroṇe |
ni | no | rayiṁ | subhojasaṁ | yuvasva | ni | vīraṁ | gavyamaśvyaṁ | ca | rādhaḥ |
ye | vāyavendramādanāsa | ādevāso | nitośanāso | aryaḥ |
ghnanto | vṛtrāṇi | sūribhiḥ | ṣyāma | sāsahvāṁso | yudhā | nṛbhiramitrān |
ā | no | niyudbhiḥ | śatinībhiradhvaraṁ | sahasriṇībhirupa | yāhi | yajñam |
vāyo | asmintsavane | mādayasva | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
śuciṁ | nu | stomaṁ | navajātamadyendrāgnī | vṛtrahaṇā | juṣethām |
ubhā | hi | vāṁ | suhavā | johavīmi | tā | vājaṁ | sadyośate | dheṣṭhā |
tā | sānasī | śavasānā | hi | bhūtaṁ | sākaṁvṛdhā | śavasā | śūśuvāṁsā |
kṣayantau | rāyo | yavasasya | bhūreḥ | pṛṅktaṁ | vājasya | sthavirasya | ghṛṣveḥ |
upo | ha | yadvidathaṁ | vājino | gurdhībhirviprāḥ | pramatimicchamānāḥ |
arvanto | na | kāṣṭhāṁ | nakṣamāṇendrāgnī | johuvato | naraste |
gīrbhirvipraḥ | pramatimicchamāneṭṭe | rayiṁ | yaśasaṁ | pūrvabhājam |
indrāgnī | vṛtrahaṇā | suvajrā | pra | no | navyebhistirataṁ | deṣṇaiḥ |
saṁ | yanmahī | mithatī | spardhamāne | tanūrucā | śūrasātā | yataite |
adevayuṁ | vidathe | devayubhiḥ | satrā | hataṁ | somasutā | janena |
imāmu | ṣu | somasutimupa | naindrāgnī | saumanasāya | yātam |
nū | ciddhi | parimamnāthe | asmānā | vāṁ | śaśvadbhirvavṛtīya | vājaiḥ |
so | agnainā | namasā | samiddho'cchā | mitraṁ | varuṇamindraṁ | voceḥ |
yatsīmāgaścakṛmā | tatsu | mṛḻa | tadaryamāditiḥ | śiśrathantu |
etāgna | āśuṣāṇāseṣṭīryuvoḥ | sacābhyaśyāma | vājān |
mendro | no | viṣṇurmarutaḥ | pari | khyanyūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
iyaṁ | vāmasya | manmanendrāgnī | pūrvyastutiḥ |
abhrādvṛṣṭirivājani |
śṛṇutaṁ | jariturhavamindrāgnī | vanataṁ | giraḥ |
īśānā | pipyataṁ | dhiyaḥ |
mā | pāpatvāya | no | narendrāgnī | mābhiśastaye |
mā | no | rīradhataṁ | nide |
indre | agnā | namo | bṛhatsuvṛktimerayāmahe |
dhiyā | dhenāvasyavaḥ |
tā | hi | śaśvanteḻata | itthā | viprāsotaye |
sabādho | vājasātaye |
tā | vāṁ | gīrbhirvipanyavaḥ | prayasvanto | havāmahe |
medhasātā | saniṣyavaḥ |
indrāgnī | avasā | gatamasmabhyaṁ | carṣaṇīsahā |
mā | no | duḥśaṁseśata |
mā | kasya | no | araruṣo | dhūrtiḥ | praṇaṅmartyasya |
indrāgnī | śarma | yacchatam |
gomaddhiraṇyavadvasu | yadvāmaśvāvadīmahe |
indrāgnī | tadvanemahi |
yatsomā | sute | narendrāgnī | ajohavuḥ |
saptīvantā | saparyavaḥ |
ukthebhirvṛtrahantamā | yā | mandānā | cidā | girā |
āṅgūṣairāvivāsataḥ |
tāvidduḥśaṁsaṁ | martyaṁ | durvidvāṁsaṁ | rakṣasvinam |
ābhogaṁ | hanmanā | hatamudadhiṁ | hanmanā | hatam |
pra | kṣodasā | dhāyasā | sasraiṣā | sarasvatī | dharuṇamāyasī | pūḥ |
prabābadhānā | rathyeva | yāti | viśvāpo | mahinā | sindhuranyāḥ |
ekācetatsarasvatī | nadīnāṁ | śuciryatī | giribhyā | samudrāt |
rāyaścetantī | bhuvanasya | bhūrerghṛtaṁ | payo | duduhe | nāhuṣāya |
sa | vāvṛdhe | naryo | yoṣaṇāsu | vṛṣā | śiśurvṛṣabho | yajñiyāsu |
sa | vājinaṁ | maghavadbhyo | dadhāti | vi | sātaye | tanvaṁ | māmṛjīta |
uta | syā | naḥ | sarasvatī | juṣāṇopa | śravatsubhagā | yajñe | asmin |
mitajñubhirnamasyairiyānā | rāyā | yujā | ciduttarā | sakhibhyaḥ |
imā | juhvānā | yuṣmadā | namobhiḥ | prati | stomaṁ | sarasvati | juṣasva |
tava | śarmanpriyatame | dadhānopa | stheyāma | śaraṇaṁ | na | vṛkṣam |
ayamu | te | sarasvati | vasiṣṭho | dvārāvṛtasya | subhage | vyāvaḥ |
vardha | śubhre | stuvate | rāsi | vājānyūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
bṛhadu | gāyiṣe | vaco'suryā | nadīnām |
sarasvatīminmahayā | suvṛktibhiḥ | stomairvasiṣṭha | rodasī |
ubhe | yatte | mahinā | śubhre | andhasī | adhikṣiyanti | pūravaḥ |
sā | no | bodhyavitrī | marutsakhā | coda | rādho | maghonām |
bhadramidbhadrā | kṛṇavatsarasvatyakavārī | cetati | vājinīvatī |
gṛṇānā | jamadagnivatstuvānā | ca | vasiṣṭhavat |
janīyanto | nvagravaḥ | putrīyantaḥ | sudānavaḥ |
sarasvantaṁ | havāmahe |
ye | te | sarasvormayo | madhumanto | ghṛtaścutaḥ |
tebhirno'vitā | bhava |
pīpivāṁsaṁ | sarasvataḥ | stanaṁ | yo | viśvadarśataḥ |
bhakṣīmahi | prajāmiṣam |
yajñe | divo | nṛṣadane | pṛthivyā | naro | yatra | devayavo | madanti |
indrāya | yatra | savanāni | sunve | gamanmadāya | prathamaṁ | vayaśca |
ā | daivyā | vṛṇīmahe'vāṁsi | bṛhaspatirno | mahā | sakhāyaḥ |
yathā | bhavema | mīḻhuṣe | anāgā | yo | no | dātā | parāvataḥ | piteva |
tamu | jyeṣṭhaṁ | namasā | havirbhiḥ | suśevaṁ | brahmaṇaspatiṁ | gṛṇīṣe |
indraṁ | śloko | mahi | daivyaḥ | siṣaktu | yo | brahmaṇo | devakṛtasya | rājā |
sā | no | yoniṁ | sadatu | preṣṭho | bṛhaspatirviśvavāro | yo | asti |
kāmo | rāyaḥ | suvīryasya | taṁ | dātparṣanno | ati | saścato | ariṣṭān |
tamā | no | arkamamṛtāya | juṣṭamime | dhāsuramṛtāsaḥ | purājāḥ |
śucikrandaṁ | yajataṁ | pastyānāṁ | bṛhaspatimanarvāṇaṁ | huvema |
taṁ | śagmāso | aruṣāso | aśvā | bṛhaspatiṁ | sahavāho | vahanti |
sahaścidyasya | nīlavatsadhasthaṁ | nabho | na | rūpamaruṣaṁ | vasānāḥ |
sa | hi | śuciḥ | śatapatraḥ | sa | śundhyurhiraṇyavāśīriṣiraḥ | svarṣāḥ |
bṛhaspatiḥ | sa | svāveśa | ṛṣvaḥ | purū | sakhibhyāsutiṁ | kariṣṭhaḥ |
devī | devasya | rodasī | janitrī | bṛhaspatiṁ | vāvṛdhaturmahitvā |
dakṣāyyāya | dakṣatā | sakhāyaḥ | karadbrahmaṇe | sutarā | sugādhā |
iyaṁ | vāṁ | brahmaṇaspate | suvṛktirbrahmendrāya | vajriṇe | akāri |
aviṣṭaṁ | dhiyo | jigṛtaṁ | puraṁdhīrjajastamaryo | vanuṣāmarātīḥ |
bṛhaspate | yuvamindraśca | vasvo | divyasyeśāthe | uta | pārthivasya |
dhattaṁ | rayiṁ | stuvate | kīraye | cidyūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
adhvaryavo'ruṇaṁ | dugdhamaṁśuṁ | juhotana | vṛṣabhāya | kṣitīnām |
gaurādvedīyām̐ | avapānamindro | viśvāhedyāti | sutasomamicchan |
yaddadhiṣe | pradivi | cārvannaṁ | divedive | pītimidasya | vakṣi |
uta | hṛdota | manasā | juṣāṇośannindra | prasthitānpāhi | somān |
jajñānaḥ | somaṁ | sahase | papātha | pra | te | mātā | mahimānamuvāca |
endra | paprāthorvantarikṣaṁ | yudhā | devebhyo | varivaścakartha |
yadyodhayā | mahato | manyamānāntsākṣāma | tānbāhubhiḥ | śāśadānān |
yadvā | nṛbhirvṛtendrābhiyudhyāstaṁ | tvayājiṁ | sauśravasaṁ | jayema |
prendrasya | vocaṁ | prathamā | kṛtāni | pra | nūtanā | maghavā | yā | cakāra |
yadedadevīrasahiṣṭa | māyāthābhavatkevalaḥ | somo | asya |
tavedaṁ | viśvamabhitaḥ | paśavyaṁ | yatpaśyasi | cakṣasā | sūryasya |
gavāmasi | gopatirekendra | bhakṣīmahi | te | prayatasya | vasvaḥ |
bṛhaspate | yuvamindraśca | vasvo | divyasyeśāthe | uta | pārthivasya |
dhattaṁ | rayiṁ | stuvate | kīraye | cidyūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
paro | mātrayā | tanvā | vṛdhāna | na | te | mahitvamanvaśnuvanti |
ubhe | te | vidma | rajasī | pṛthivyā | viṣṇo | deva | tvaṁ | paramasya | vitse |
na | te | viṣṇo | jāyamāno | na | jāto | deva | mahimnaḥ | paramantamāpa |
udastabhnā | nākamṛṣvaṁ | bṛhantaṁ | dādhartha | prācīṁ | kakubhaṁ | pṛthivyāḥ |
irāvatī | dhenumatī | hi | bhūtaṁ | sūyavasinī | manuṣe | daśasyā |
vyastabhnā | rodasī | viṣṇavete | dādhartha | pṛthivīmabhito | mayūkhaiḥ |
uruṁ | yajñāya | cakrathuru | lokaṁ | janayantā | sūryamuṣāsamagnim |
dāsasya | cidvṛṣaśiprasya | māyā | jaghnathurnarā | pṛtanājyeṣu |
indrāviṣṇū | dṛṁhitāḥ | śambarasya | nava | puro | navatiṁ | ca | śnathiṣṭam |
śataṁ | varcinaḥ | sahasraṁ | ca | sākaṁ | hatho | apratyasurasya | vīrān |
iyaṁ | manīṣā | bṛhatī | bṛhantorukramā | tavasā | vardhayantī |
rare | vāṁ | stomaṁ | vidatheṣu | viṣṇo | pinvatamiṣo | vṛjaneṣvindra |
vaṣaṭ | te | viṣṇavāsā | kṛṇomi | tanme | juṣasva | śipiviṣṭa | havyam |
vardhantu | tvā | suṣṭutayo | giro | me | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
nū | marto | dayate | saniṣyanyo | viṣṇavorugāyāya | dāśat |
pra | yaḥ | satrācā | manasā | yajātaitāvantaṁ | naryamāvivāsāt |
tvaṁ | viṣṇo | sumatiṁ | viśvajanyāmaprayutāmevayāvo | matiṁ | dāḥ |
parco | yathā | naḥ | suvitasya | bhūreraśvāvataḥ | puruścandrasya | rāyaḥ |
trirdevaḥ | pṛthivīmeṣaitāṁ | vi | cakrame | śatarcasaṁ | mahitvā |
pra | viṣṇurastu | tavasastavīyāntveṣaṁ | hyasya | sthavirasya | nāma |
vi | cakrame | pṛthivīmeṣaitāṁ | kṣetrāya | viṣṇurmanuṣe | daśasyan |
dhruvāso | asya | kīrayo | janāsorukṣitiṁ | sujanimā | cakāra |
pra | tatte | adya | śipiviṣṭa | nāmāryaḥ | śaṁsāmi | vayunāni | vidvān |
taṁ | tvā | gṛṇāmi | tavasamatavyānkṣayantamasya | rajasaḥ | parāke |
kimitte | viṣṇo | paricakṣyaṁ | bhūtpra | yadvavakṣe | śipiviṣṭo | asmi |
mā | varpo | asmadapa | gūhaitadyadanyarūpaḥ | samithe | babhūtha |
vaṣaṭ | te | viṣṇavāsā | kṛṇomi | tanme | juṣasva | śipiviṣṭa | havyam |
vardhantu | tvā | suṣṭutayo | giro | me | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
tisro | vācaḥ | pra | vada | jyotiragrā | yaitadduhre | madhudoghamūdhaḥ |
sa | vatsaṁ | kṛṇvangarbhamoṣadhīnāṁ | sadyo | jāto | vṛṣabho | roravīti |
yo | vardhanauṣadhīnāṁ | yo | apāṁ | yo | viśvasya | jagato | deveśe |
sa | tridhātu | śaraṇaṁ | śarma | yaṁsattrivartu | jyotiḥ | svabhiṣṭyasme |
starīru | tvadbhavati | sūto | tvadyathāvaśaṁ | tanvaṁ | cakraiṣaḥ |
pituḥ | payaḥ | prati | gṛbhṇāti | mātā | tena | pitā | vardhate | tena | putraḥ |
yasminviśvāni | bhuvanāni | tasthustisro | dyāvastredhā | sasrurāpaḥ |
trayaḥ | kośāsopasecanāso | madhvaḥ | ścotantyabhito | virapśam |
idaṁ | vacaḥ | parjanyāya | svarāje | hṛdo | astvantaraṁ | tajjujoṣat |
mayobhuvo | vṛṣṭayaḥ | santvasme | supippalauṣadhīrdevagopāḥ |
sa | retodhā | vṛṣabhaḥ | śaśvatīnāṁ | tasminnātmā | jagatastasthuṣaśca |
tanma | ṛtaṁ | pātu | śataśāradāya | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
parjanyāya | pra | gāyata | divasputrāya | mīḻhuṣe |
sa | no | yavasamicchatu |
yo | garbhamoṣadhīnāṁ | gavāṁ | kṛṇotyarvatām |
parjanyaḥ | puruṣīṇām |
tasmedāsye | havirjuhotā | madhumattamam |
iḻāṁ | naḥ | saṁyataṁ | karat |
saṁvatsaraṁ | śaśayānā | brāhmaṇā | vratacāriṇaḥ |
vācaṁ | parjanyajinvitāṁ | pra | maṇḍūkāvādiṣuḥ |
divyāpo | abhi | yadenamāyandṛtiṁ | na | śuṣkaṁ | sarasī | śayānam |
gavāmaha | na | māyurvatsinīnāṁ | maṇḍūkānāṁ | vagnuratrā | sameti |
yadīmenām̐ | uśato | abhyavarṣīttṛṣyāvataḥ | prāvṛṣyāgatāyām |
akhkhalīkṛtyā | pitaraṁ | na | putro | anyo | anyamupa | vadantameti |
anyo | anyamanu | gṛbhṇātyenorapāṁ | prasarge | yadamandiṣātām |
maṇḍūko | yadabhivṛṣṭaḥ | kaniṣkanpṛśniḥ | saṁpṛṅkte | haritena | vācam |
yadeṣāmanyo | anyasya | vācaṁ | śāktasyeva | vadati | śikṣamāṇaḥ |
sarvaṁ | tadeṣāṁ | samṛdheva | parva | yatsuvāco | vadathanādhyapsu |
gomāyureko | ajamāyurekaḥ | pṛśnireko | haritaika | eṣām |
samānaṁ | nāma | bibhrato | virūpāḥ | purutrā | vācaṁ | pipiśurvadantaḥ |
brāhmaṇāso | atirātre | na | some | saro | na | pūrṇamabhito | vadantaḥ |
saṁvatsarasya | tadahaḥ | pari | ṣṭha | yanmaṇḍūkāḥ | prāvṛṣīṇaṁ | babhūva |
brāhmaṇāsaḥ | somino | vācamakrata | brahma | kṛṇvantaḥ | parivatsarīṇam |
adhvaryavo | gharmiṇaḥ | siṣvidānāvirbhavanti | guhyā | na | ke | cit |
devahitiṁ | jugupurdvādaśasya | ṛtuṁ | naro | na | pra | minantyete |
saṁvatsare | prāvṛṣyāgatāyāṁ | taptā | gharmāśnuvate | visargam |
gomāyuradādajamāyuradātpṛśniradāddharito | no | vasūni |
gavāṁ | maṇḍūkā | dadataḥ | śatāni | sahasrasāve | pra | tirantāyuḥ |
indrāsomā | tapataṁ | rakṣobjataṁ | nyarpayataṁ | vṛṣaṇā | tamovṛdhaḥ |
parā | śṛṇītamacito | nyoṣataṁ | hataṁ | nudethāṁ | ni | śiśītamatriṇaḥ |
indrāsomā | samaghaśaṁsamabhyaghaṁ | tapuryayastu | caruragnivām̐ | iva |
brahmadviṣe | kravyāde | ghoracakṣase | dveṣo | dhattamanavāyaṁ | kimīdine |
indrāsomā | duṣkṛto | vavre | antaranārambhaṇe | tamasi | pra | vidhyatam |
yathā | nātaḥ | punarekaścanodayattadvāmastu | sahase | manyumacchavaḥ |
indrāsomā | vartayataṁ | divo | vadhaṁ | saṁ | pṛthivyāghaśaṁsāya | tarhaṇam |
uttakṣataṁ | svaryaṁ | parvatebhyo | yena | rakṣo | vāvṛdhānaṁ | nijūrvathaḥ |
indrāsomā | vartayataṁ | divasparyagnitaptebhiryuvamaśmahanmabhiḥ |
tapurvadhebhirajarebhiratriṇo | ni | parśāne | vidhyataṁ | yantu | nisvaram |
indrāsomā | pari | vāṁ | bhūtu | viśvateyaṁ | matiḥ | kakṣyāśveva | vājinā |
yāṁ | vāṁ | hotrāṁ | parihinomi | medhayemā | brahmāṇi | nṛpatīva | jinvatam |
prati | smarethāṁ | tujayadbhirevairhataṁ | druho | rakṣaso | bhaṅgurāvataḥ |
indrāsomā | duṣkṛte | mā | sugaṁ | bhūdyo | naḥ | kadā | cidabhidāsati | druhā |
yo | mā | pākena | manasā | carantamabhicaṣṭe | anṛtebhirvacobhiḥ |
āpeva | kāśinā | saṁgṛbhītāsannastvāsata | indra | vaktā |
ye | pākaśaṁsaṁ | viharantaivairye | vā | bhadraṁ | dūṣayanti | svadhābhiḥ |
ahaye | vā | tānpradadātu | somā | vā | dadhātu | nirṛterupasthe |
yo | no | rasaṁ | dipsati | pitvo | agne | yo | aśvānāṁ | yo | gavāṁ | yastanūnām |
ripuḥ | stenaḥ | steyakṛddabhrametu | ni | ṣa | hīyatāṁ | tanvā | tanā | ca |
paraḥ | so | astu | tanvā | tanā | ca | tisraḥ | pṛthivīradho | astu | viśvāḥ |
prati | śuṣyatu | yaśo | asya | devā | yo | no | divā | dipsati | yaśca | naktam |
suvijñānaṁ | cikituṣe | janāya | saccāsacca | vacasī | paspṛdhāte |
tayoryatsatyaṁ | yataradṛjīyastaditsomo'vati | hantyāsat |
na | vo | somo | vṛjinaṁ | hinoti | na | kṣatriyaṁ | mithuyā | dhārayantam |
hanti | rakṣo | hantyāsadvadantamubhāvindrasya | prasitau | śayāte |
yadi | vāhamanṛtadevāsa | moghaṁ | vā | devām̐ | apyūhe | agne |
kimasmabhyaṁ | jātavedo | hṛṇīṣe | droghavācaste | nirṛthaṁ | sacantām |
adyā | murīya | yadi | yātudhāno | asmi | yadi | vāyustatapa | pūruṣasya |
adhā | sa | vīrairdaśabhirvi | yūyā | yo | mā | moghaṁ | yātudhānetyāha |
yo | māyātuṁ | yātudhānetyāha | yo | vā | rakṣāḥ | śucirasmītyāha |
indrastaṁ | hantu | mahatā | vadhena | viśvasya | jantoradhamaspadīṣṭa |
pra | yā | jigāti | khargaleva | naktamapa | druhā | tanvaṁ | gūhamānā |
vavrām̐ | anantām̐ | ava | sā | padīṣṭa | grāvāṇo | ghnantu | rakṣasopabdaiḥ |
vi | tiṣṭhadhvaṁ | maruto | vikṣvicchata | gṛbhāyata | rakṣasaḥ | saṁ | pinaṣṭana |
vayo | ye | bhūtvī | patayanti | naktabhirye | vā | ripo | dadhire | deve | adhvare |
pra | vartaya | divo | aśmānamindra | somaśitaṁ | maghavantsaṁ | śiśādhi |
prāktādapāktādadharādudaktādabhi | jahi | rakṣasaḥ | parvatena |
eto | tye | patayanti | śvayātavendraṁ | dipsanti | dipsavo'dābhyam |
śiśīte | śakraḥ | piśunebhyo | vadhaṁ | nūnaṁ | sṛjadaśaniṁ | yātumadbhyaḥ |
indro | yātūnāmabhavatparāśaro | havirmathīnāmabhyāvivāsatām |
abhīdu | śakraḥ | paraśuryathā | vanaṁ | pātreva | bhindantsataiti | rakṣasaḥ |
ulūkayātuṁ | śuśulūkayātuṁ | jahi | śvayātumuta | kokayātum |
suparṇayātumuta | gṛdhrayātuṁ | dṛṣadeva | pra | mṛṇa | rakṣendra |
mā | no | rakṣo | abhi | naḍyātumāvatāmapocchatu | mithunā | yā | kimīdinā |
pṛthivī | naḥ | pārthivātpātvaṁhaso'ntarikṣaṁ | divyātpātvasmān |
indra | jahi | pumāṁsaṁ | yātudhānamuta | striyaṁ | māyayā | śāśadānām |
vigrīvāso | mūradevā | ṛdantu | mā | te | dṛśantsūryamuccarantam |
prati | cakṣva | vi | cakṣvendraśca | soma | jāgṛtam |
rakṣobhyo | vadhamasyatamaśaniṁ | yātumadbhyaḥ |
mā | cidanyadvi | śaṁsata | sakhāyo | mā | riṣaṇyata |
indramitstotā | vṛṣaṇaṁ | sacā | sute | muhurukthā | ca | śaṁsata |
avakrakṣiṇaṁ | vṛṣabhaṁ | yathājuraṁ | gāṁ | na | carṣaṇīsaham |
vidveṣaṇaṁ | saṁvananobhayaṁkaraṁ | maṁhiṣṭhamubhayāvinam |
yacciddhi | tvā | janeme | nānā | havantotaye |
asmākaṁ | brahmedamindra | bhūtu | te'hā | viśvā | ca | vardhanam |
vi | tartūryante | maghavanvipaścito'ryo | vipo | janānām |
upa | kramasva | pururūpamā | bhara | vājaṁ | nediṣṭhamūtaye |
mahe | cana | tvāmadrivaḥ | parā | śulkāya | deyām |
na | sahasrāya | nāyutāya | vajrivo | na | śatāya | śatāmagha |
vasyām̐ | indrāsi | me | pituruta | bhrāturabhuñjataḥ |
mātā | ca | me | chadayathaḥ | samā | vaso | vasutvanāya | rādhase |
kveyatha | kvedasi | purutrā | ciddhi | te | manaḥ |
alarṣi | yudhma | khajakṛtpuraṁdara | pra | gāyatrāgāsiṣuḥ |
prāsmai | gāyatramarcata | vāvāturyaḥ | puraṁdaraḥ |
yābhiḥ | kāṇvasyopa | barhirāsadaṁ | yāsadvajrī | bhinatpuraḥ |
ye | te | santi | daśagvinaḥ | śatino | ye | sahasriṇaḥ |
aśvāso | ye | te | vṛṣaṇo | raghudruvastebhirnastūyamā | gahi |
ā | tvadya | sabardughāṁ | huve | gāyatravepasam |
indraṁ | dhenuṁ | sudughāmanyāmiṣamurudhārāmaraṁkṛtam |
yattudatsūraitaśaṁ | vaṅkū | vātasya | parṇinā |
vahatkutsamārjuneyaṁ | śatakratuḥ | tsaradgandharvamastṛtam |
ya | ṛte | cidabhiśriṣaḥ | purā | jatrubhyātṛdaḥ |
saṁdhātā | saṁdhiṁ | maghavā | purūvasuriṣkartā | vihrutaṁ | punaḥ |
mā | bhūma | niṣṭyevendra | tvadaraṇeva |
vanāni | na | prajahitānyadrivo | duroṣāso | amanmahi |
amanmahīdanāśavo'nugrāsaśca | vṛtrahan |
sakṛtsu | te | mahatā | śūra | rādhasānu | stomaṁ | mudīmahi |
yadi | stomaṁ | mama | śravadasmākamindramindavaḥ |
tiraḥ | pavitraṁ | sasṛvāṁsāśavo | mandantu | tugryāvṛdhaḥ |
ā | tvadya | sadhastutiṁ | vāvātuḥ | sakhyurā | gahi |
upastutirmaghonāṁ | pra | tvāvatvadhā | te | vaśmi | suṣṭutim |
sotā | hi | somamadribhiremenamapsu | dhāvata |
gavyā | vastreva | vāsayantennaro | nirdhukṣanvakṣaṇābhyaḥ |
adha | jmo | adha | vā | divo | bṛhato | rocanādadhi |
ayā | vardhasva | tanvā | girā | mamā | jātā | sukrato | pṛṇa |
indrāya | su | madintamaṁ | somaṁ | sotā | vareṇyam |
śakraiṇaṁ | pīpayadviśvayā | dhiyā | hinvānaṁ | na | vājayum |
mā | tvā | somasya | galdayā | sadā | yācannahaṁ | girā |
bhūrṇiṁ | mṛgaṁ | na | savaneṣu | cukrudhaṁ | keśānaṁ | na | yāciṣat |
madeneṣitaṁ | madamugramugreṇa | śavasā |
viśveṣāṁ | tarutāraṁ | madacyutaṁ | made | hi | ṣmā | dadāti | naḥ |
śevāre | vāryā | puru | devo | martāya | dāśuṣe |
sa | sunvate | ca | stuvate | ca | rāsate | viśvagūrto | ariṣṭutaḥ |
endra | yāhi | matsva | citreṇa | deva | rādhasā |
saro | na | prāsyudaraṁ | sapītibhirā | somebhiruru | sphiram |
ā | tvā | sahasramā | śataṁ | yuktā | rathe | hiraṇyaye |
brahmayujo | harayendra | keśino | vahantu | somapītaye |
ā | tvā | rathe | hiraṇyaye | harī | mayūraśepyā |
śitipṛṣṭhā | vahatāṁ | madhvo | andhaso | vivakṣaṇasya | pītaye |
pibā | tvasya | girvaṇaḥ | sutasya | pūrvapeva |
pariṣkṛtasya | rasineyamāsutiścārurmadāya | patyate |
yaiko | asti | daṁsanā | mahām̐ | ugro | abhi | vrataiḥ |
gamatsa | śiprī | na | sa | yoṣadā | gamaddhavaṁ | na | pari | varjati |
tvaṁ | puraṁ | cariṣṇvaṁ | vadhaiḥ | śuṣṇasya | saṁ | piṇak |
tvaṁ | bhānu | caro | adha | dvitā | yadindra | havyo | bhuvaḥ |
mama | tvā | sūrodite | mama | madhyaṁdine | divaḥ |
mama | prapitve | apiśarvare | vasavā | stomāso | avṛtsata |
stuhi | stuhīdete | ghā | te | maṁhiṣṭhāso | maghonām |
ninditāśvaḥ | prapathī | paramajyā | maghasya | medhyātithe |
ā | yadaśvānvananvataḥ | śraddhayāhaṁ | rathe | ruham |
uta | vāmasya | vasunaściketati | yo | asti | yādvaḥ | paśuḥ |
ya | ṛjrā | mahyaṁ | māmahe | saha | tvacā | hiraṇyayā |
eṣa | viśvānyabhyastu | saubhagāsaṅgasya | svanadrathaḥ |
adha | plāyogirati | dāsadanyānāsaṅgo | agne | daśabhiḥ | sahasraiḥ |
adhokṣaṇo | daśa | mahyaṁ | ruśanto | naḻeva | saraso | niratiṣṭhan |
anvasya | sthūraṁ | dadṛśe | purastādanasthoruravarambamāṇaḥ |
śaśvatī | nāryabhicakṣyāha | subhadramarya | bhojanaṁ | bibharṣi |
idaṁ | vaso | sutamandhaḥ | pibā | supūrṇamudaram |
anābhayinrarimā | te |
nṛbhirdhūtaḥ | suto | aśnairavyo | vāraiḥ | paripūtaḥ |
aśvo | na | nikto | nadīṣu |
taṁ | te | yavaṁ | yathā | gobhiḥ | svādumakarma | śrīṇantaḥ |
indra | tvāsmintsadhamāde |
indretsomapā | ekendraḥ | sutapā | viśvāyuḥ |
antardevānmartyām̐śca |
na | yaṁ | śukro | na | durāśīrna | tṛproruvyacasam |
apaspṛṇvate | suhārdam |
gobhiryadīmanye | asmanmṛgaṁ | na | vrā | mṛgayante |
abhitsaranti | dhenubhiḥ |
trayendrasya | somāḥ | sutāsaḥ | santu | devasya |
sve | kṣaye | sutapāvnaḥ |
trayaḥ | kośāsaḥ | ścotanti | tisraścamvaḥ | supūrṇāḥ |
samāne | adhi | bhārman |
śucirasi | puruniḥṣṭhāḥ | kṣīrairmadhyatāśīrtaḥ |
dadhnā | mandiṣṭhaḥ | śūrasya |
ime | tendra | somāstīvrāsme | sutāsaḥ |
śukrāśiraṁ | yācante |
tām̐ | āśiraṁ | puroḻāśamindremaṁ | somaṁ | śrīṇīhi |
revantaṁ | hi | tvā | śṛṇomi |
hṛtsu | pītāso | yudhyante | durmadāso | na | surāyām |
ūdharna | nagnā | jarante |
revām̐ | idrevataḥ | stotā | syāttvāvato | maghonaḥ |
predu | harivaḥ | śrutasya |
ukthaṁ | cana | śasyamānamagorarirā | ciketa |
na | gāyatraṁ | gīyamānam |
mā | nendra | pīyatnave | mā | śardhate | parā | dāḥ |
śikṣā | śacīvaḥ | śacībhiḥ |
vayamu | tvā | tadidarthendra | tvāyantaḥ | sakhāyaḥ |
kaṇvokthebhirjarante |
na | ghemanyadā | papana | vajrinnapaso | naviṣṭau |
tavedu | stomaṁ | ciketa |
icchanti | devāḥ | sunvantaṁ | na | svapnāya | spṛhayanti |
yanti | pramādamatandrāḥ |
o | ṣu | pra | yāhi | vājebhirmā | hṛṇīthābhyasmān |
mahām̐ | iva | yuvajāniḥ |
mo | ṣvadya | durhaṇāvāntsāyaṁ | karadāre | asmat |
aśrīreva | jāmātā |
vidmā | hyasya | vīrasya | bhūridāvarīṁ | sumatim |
triṣu | jātasya | manāṁsi |
ā | tū | ṣiñca | kaṇvamantaṁ | na | ghā | vidma | śavasānāt |
yaśastaraṁ | śatamūteḥ |
jyeṣṭhena | sotarindrāya | somaṁ | vīrāya | śakrāya |
bharā | pibannaryāya |
yo | vediṣṭho | avyathiṣvaśvāvantaṁ | jaritṛbhyaḥ |
vājaṁ | stotṛbhyo | gomantam |
panyaṁpanyamitsotārā | dhāvata | madyāya |
somaṁ | vīrāya | śūrāya |
pātā | vṛtrahā | sutamā | ghā | gamannāre | asmat |
ni | yamate | śatamūtiḥ |
eha | harī | brahmayujā | śagmā | vakṣataḥ | sakhāyam |
gīrbhiḥ | śrutaṁ | girvaṇasam |
svādavaḥ | somā | yāhi | śrītāḥ | somā | yāhi |
śiprinnṛṣīvaḥ | śacīvo | nāyamacchā | sadhamādam |
stutaśca | yāstvā | vardhanti | mahe | rādhase | nṛmṇāya |
indra | kāriṇaṁ | vṛdhantaḥ |
giraśca | yāste | girvāhokthā | ca | tubhyaṁ | tāni |
satrā | dadhire | śavāṁsi |
evedeṣa | tuvikūrmirvājām̐ | eko | vajrahastaḥ |
sanādamṛkto | dayate |
hantā | vṛtraṁ | dakṣiṇenendraḥ | purū | puruhūtaḥ |
mahānmahībhiḥ | śacībhiḥ |
yasminviśvāścarṣaṇayota | cyautnā | jrayāṁsi | ca |
anu | ghenmandī | maghonaḥ |
eṣaitāni | cakārendro | viśvā | yo'ti | śṛṇve |
vājadāvā | maghonām |
prabhartā | rathaṁ | gavyantamapākāccidyamavati |
ino | vasu | sa | hi | voḻhā |
sanitā | vipro | arvadbhirhantā | vṛtraṁ | nṛbhiḥ | śūraḥ |
satyo'vitā | vidhantam |
yajadhvainaṁ | priyamedhendraṁ | satrācā | manasā |
yo | bhūtsomaiḥ | satyamadvā |
gāthaśravasaṁ | satpatiṁ | śravaskāmaṁ | purutmānam |
kaṇvāso | gāta | vājinam |
ya | ṛte | cidgāspadebhyo | dātsakhā | nṛbhyaḥ | śacīvān |
ye | asminkāmamaśriyan |
itthā | dhīvantamadrivaḥ | kāṇvaṁ | medhyātithim |
meṣo | bhūto'bhi | yannayaḥ |
śikṣā | vibhindo | asmai | catvāryayutā | dadat |
aṣṭā | paraḥ | sahasrā |
uta | su | tye | payovṛdhā | mākī | raṇasya | naptyā |
janitvanāya | māmahe |
pibā | sutasya | rasino | matsvā | nendra | gomataḥ |
āpirno | bodhi | sadhamādyo | vṛdhe'smām̐ | avantu | te | dhiyaḥ |
bhūyāma | te | sumatau | vājino | vayaṁ | mā | naḥ | starabhimātaye |
asmāñcitrābhiravatādabhiṣṭibhirā | naḥ | sumneṣu | yāmaya |
imo | tvā | purūvaso | giro | vardhantu | yā | mama |
pāvakavarṇāḥ | śucayo | vipaścito'bhi | stomairanūṣata |
ayaṁ | sahasramṛṣibhiḥ | sahaskṛtaḥ | samudreva | paprathe |
satyaḥ | so | asya | mahimā | gṛṇe | śavo | yajñeṣu | viprarājye |
indramiddevatātayendraṁ | prayatyadhvare |
indraṁ | samīke | vanino | havāmahendraṁ | dhanasya | sātaye |
indro | mahnā | rodasī | paprathacchavendraḥ | sūryamarocayat |
indre | ha | viśvā | bhuvanāni | yemirendre | suvānāsendavaḥ |
abhi | tvā | pūrvapītayendra | stomebhirāyavaḥ |
samīcīnāsa | ṛbhavaḥ | samasvaranrudrā | gṛṇanta | pūrvyam |
asyedindro | vāvṛdhe | vṛṣṇyaṁ | śavo | made | sutasya | viṣṇavi |
adyā | tamasya | mahimānamāyavo'nu | ṣṭuvanti | pūrvathā |
tattvā | yāmi | suvīryaṁ | tadbrahma | pūrvacittaye |
yenā | yatibhyo | bhṛgave | dhane | hite | yena | praskaṇvamāvitha |
yenā | samudramasṛjo | mahīrapastadindra | vṛṣṇi | te | śavaḥ |
sadyaḥ | so | asya | mahimā | na | saṁnaśe | yaṁ | kṣoṇīranucakrade |
śagdhī | nendra | yattvā | rayiṁ | yāmi | suvīryam |
śagdhi | vājāya | prathamaṁ | siṣāsate | śagdhi | stomāya | pūrvya |
śagdhī | no | asya | yaddha | pauramāvitha | dhiyendra | siṣāsataḥ |
śagdhi | yathā | ruśamaṁ | śyāvakaṁ | kṛpamindra | prāvaḥ | svarṇaram |
kannavyo | atasīnāṁ | turo | gṛṇīta | martyaḥ |
nahī | nvasya | mahimānamindriyaṁ | svargṛṇantānaśuḥ |
kadu | stuvanta | ṛtayanta | devata | ṛṣiḥ | ko | viprauhate |
kadā | havaṁ | maghavannindra | sunvataḥ | kadu | stuvatā | gamaḥ |
udu | tye | madhumattamā | giraḥ | stomāserate |
satrājito | dhanasākṣitotayo | vājayanto | ratheva |
kaṇveva | bhṛgavaḥ | sūryeva | viśvamiddhītamānaśuḥ |
indraṁ | stomebhirmahayantāyavaḥ | priyamedhāso | asvaran |
yukṣvā | hi | vṛtrahantama | harīndra | parāvataḥ |
arvācīno | maghavantsomapītayogra | ṛṣvebhirā | gahi |
ime | hi | te | kāravo | vāvaśurdhiyā | viprāso | medhasātaye |
sa | tvaṁ | no | maghavannindra | girvaṇo | veno | na | śṛṇudhī | havam |
nirindra | bṛhatībhyo | vṛtraṁ | dhanubhyo | asphuraḥ |
nirarbudasya | mṛgayasya | māyino | niḥ | parvatasya | gājaḥ |
niragnayo | rurucurniru | sūryo | niḥ | somendriyo | rasaḥ |
nirantarikṣādadhamo | mahāmahiṁ | kṛṣe | tadindra | pauṁsyam |
yaṁ | me | durindro | marutaḥ | pākasthāmā | kaurayāṇaḥ |
viśveṣāṁ | tmanā | śobhiṣṭhamupeva | divi | dhāvamānam |
rohitaṁ | me | pākasthāmā | sudhuraṁ | kakṣyaprām |
adādrāyo | vibodhanam |
yasmānye | daśa | prati | dhuraṁ | vahanti | vahnayaḥ |
astaṁ | vayo | na | tugryam |
ātmā | pitustanūrvāsaujodā | abhyañjanam |
turīyamidrohitasya | pākasthāmānaṁ | bhojaṁ | dātāramabravam |
yadindra | prāgapāgudaṅnyagvā | hūyase | nṛbhiḥ |
simā | purū | nṛṣūto | asyānave'si | praśardha | turvaśe |
yadvā | rume | ruśame | śyāvake | kṛpendra | mādayase | sacā |
kaṇvāsastvā | brahmabhiḥ | stomavāhasendrā | yacchantyā | gahi |
yathā | gauro | apā | kṛtaṁ | tṛṣyannetyaveriṇam |
āpitve | naḥ | prapitve | tūyamā | gahi | kaṇveṣu | su | sacā | piba |
mandantu | tvā | maghavannindrendavo | rādhodeyāya | sunvate |
āmuṣyā | somamapibaścamū | sutaṁ | jyeṣṭhaṁ | taddadhiṣe | sahaḥ |
pra | cakre | sahasā | saho | babhañja | manyumojasā |
viśve | tendra | pṛtanāyavo | yaho | ni | vṛkṣeva | yemire |
sahasreṇeva | sacate | yavīyudhā | yastānaḻupastutim |
putraṁ | prāvargaṁ | kṛṇute | suvīrye | dāśnoti | namaüktibhiḥ |
mā | bhema | mā | śramiṣmograsya | sakhye | tava |
mahatte | vṛṣṇo | abhicakṣyaṁ | kṛtaṁ | paśyema | turvaśaṁ | yadum |
savyāmanu | sphigyaṁ | vāvase | vṛṣā | na | dāno | asya | roṣati |
madhvā | saṁpṛktāḥ | sāragheṇa | dhenavastūyamehi | dravā | piba |
aśvī | rathī | surūpedgomām̐ | idindra | te | sakhā |
śvātrabhājā | vayasā | sacate | sadā | candro | yāti | sabhāmupa |
ṛśyo | na | tṛṣyannavapānamā | gahi | pibā | somaṁ | vaśām̐ | anu |
nimeghamāno | maghavandivedivaujiṣṭhaṁ | dadhiṣe | sahaḥ |
adhvaryo | drāvayā | tvaṁ | somamindraḥ | pipāsati |
upa | nūnaṁ | yuyuje | vṛṣaṇā | harī | ā | ca | jagāma | vṛtrahā |
svayaṁ | citsa | manyate | dāśurirjano | yatrā | somasya | tṛmpasi |
idaṁ | te | annaṁ | yujyaṁ | samukṣitaṁ | tasyehi | pra | dravā | piba |
ratheṣṭhāyādhvaryavaḥ | somamindrāya | sotana |
adhi | bradhnasyādrayo | vi | cakṣate | sunvanto | dāśvadhvaram |
upa | bradhnaṁ | vāvātā | vṛṣaṇā | harīndramapasu | vakṣataḥ |
arvāñcaṁ | tvā | saptayo'dhvaraśriyo | vahantu | savanedupa |
pra | pūṣaṇaṁ | vṛṇīmahe | yujyāya | purūvasum |
sa | śakra | śikṣa | puruhūta | no | dhiyā | tuje | rāye | vimocana |
saṁ | naḥ | śiśīhi | bhurijoriva | kṣuraṁ | rāsva | rāyo | vimocana |
tve | tannaḥ | suvedamusriyaṁ | vasu | yaṁ | tvaṁ | hinoṣi | martyam |
vemi | tvā | pūṣannṛñjase | vemi | stotavāghṛṇe |
na | tasya | vemyaraṇaṁ | hi | tadvaso | stuṣe | pajrāya | sāmne |
parā | gāvo | yavasaṁ | kaccidāghṛṇe | nityaṁ | rekṇo | amartya |
asmākaṁ | pūṣannavitā | śivo | bhava | maṁhiṣṭho | vājasātaye |
sthūraṁ | rādhaḥ | śatāśvaṁ | kuruṅgasya | diviṣṭiṣu |
rājñastveṣasya | subhagasya | rātiṣu | turvaśeṣvamanmahi |
dhībhiḥ | sātāni | kāṇvasya | vājinaḥ | priyamedhairabhidyubhiḥ |
ṣaṣṭiṁ | sahasrānu | nirmajāmaje | niryūthāni | gavāmṛṣiḥ |
vṛkṣāścinme | abhipitve | arāraṇuḥ |
gāṁ | bhajanta | mehanāśvaṁ | bhajanta | mehanā |
dūrādiheva | yatsatyaruṇapsuraśiśvitat |
vi | bhānuṁ | viśvadhātanat |
nṛvaddasrā | manoyujā | rathena | pṛthupājasā |
sacethe | aśvinoṣasam |
yuvābhyāṁ | vājinīvasū | prati | stomādṛkṣata |
vācaṁ | dūto | yathohiṣe |
purupriyā | ṇotaye | purumandrā | purūvasū |
stuṣe | kaṇvāso | aśvinā |
maṁhiṣṭhā | vājasātameṣayantā | śubhaspatī |
gantārā | dāśuṣo | gṛham |
tā | sudevāya | dāśuṣe | sumedhāmavitāriṇīm |
ghṛtairgavyūtimukṣatam |
ā | naḥ | stomamupa | dravattūyaṁ | śyenebhirāśubhiḥ |
yātamaśvebhiraśvinā |
yebhistisraḥ | parāvato | divo | viśvāni | rocanā |
trīm̐raktūnparidīyathaḥ |
uta | no | gomatīriṣota | sātīraharvidā |
vi | pathaḥ | sātaye | sitam |
ā | no | gomantamaśvinā | suvīraṁ | surathaṁ | rayim |
voḻhamaśvāvatīriṣaḥ |
vāvṛdhānā | śubhaspatī | dasrā | hiraṇyavartanī |
pibataṁ | somyaṁ | madhu |
asmabhyaṁ | vājinīvasū | maghavadbhyaśca | saprathaḥ |
chardiryantamadābhyam |
ni | ṣu | brahma | janānāṁ | yāviṣṭaṁ | tūyamā | gatam |
mo | ṣvanyām̐ | upāratam |
asya | pibatamaśvinā | yuvaṁ | madasya | cāruṇaḥ |
madhvo | rātasya | dhiṣṇyā |
asme | ā | vahataṁ | rayiṁ | śatavantaṁ | sahasriṇam |
purukṣuṁ | viśvadhāyasam |
purutrā | ciddhi | vāṁ | narā | vihvayante | manīṣiṇaḥ |
vāghadbhiraśvinā | gatam |
janāso | vṛktabarhiṣo | haviṣmanto | araṁkṛtaḥ |
yuvāṁ | havante | aśvinā |
asmākamadya | vāmayaṁ | stomo | vāhiṣṭho | antamaḥ |
yuvābhyāṁ | bhūtvaśvinā |
yo | ha | vāṁ | madhuno | dṛtirāhito | rathacarṣaṇe |
tataḥ | pibatamaśvinā |
tena | no | vājinīvasū | paśve | tokāya | śaṁ | gave |
vahataṁ | pīvarīriṣaḥ |
uta | no | divyeṣa | uta | sindhūm̐raharvidā |
apa | dvāreva | varṣathaḥ |
kadā | vāṁ | taugryo | vidhatsamudre | jahito | narā |
yadvāṁ | ratho | vibhiṣpatāt |
yuvaṁ | kaṇvāya | nāsatyā | ṛpiriptāya | harmye |
śaśvadūtīrdaśasyathaḥ |
tābhirā | yātamūtibhirnavyasībhiḥ | suśastibhiḥ |
yadvāṁ | vṛṣaṇvasū | huve |
yathā | citkaṇvamāvataṁ | priyamedhamupastutam |
atriṁ | śiñjāramaśvinā |
yathota | kṛtvye | dhaneṁ'śuṁ | goṣvagastyam |
yathā | vājeṣu | sobharim |
etāvadvāṁ | vṛṣaṇvasū | ato | vā | bhūyo | aśvinā |
gṛṇantaḥ | sumnamīmahe |
rathaṁ | hiraṇyavandhuraṁ | hiraṇyābhīśumaśvinā |
ā | hi | sthātho | divispṛśam |
hiraṇyayī | vāṁ | rabhirīṣākṣo | hiraṇyayaḥ |
ubhā | cakrā | hiraṇyayā |
tena | no | vājinīvasū | parāvataścidā | gatam |
upemāṁ | suṣṭutiṁ | mama |
ā | vahethe | parākātpūrvīraśnantāvaśvinā |
iṣo | dāsīramartyā |
ā | no | dyumnairā | śravobhirā | rāyā | yātamaśvinā |
puruścandrā | nāsatyā |
eha | vāṁ | pruṣitapsavo | vayo | vahantu | parṇinaḥ |
acchā | svadhvaraṁ | janam |
rathaṁ | vāmanugāyasaṁ | yeṣā | vartate | saha |
na | cakramabhi | bādhate |
hiraṇyayena | rathena | dravatpāṇibhiraśvaiḥ |
dhījavanā | nāsatyā |
yuvaṁ | mṛgaṁ | jāgṛvāṁsaṁ | svadatho | vā | vṛṣaṇvasū |
tā | naḥ | pṛṅktamiṣā | rayim |
tā | me | aśvinā | sanīnāṁ | vidyātaṁ | navānām |
yathā | ciccaidyaḥ | kaśuḥ | śatamuṣṭrānāṁ | dadatsahasrā | daśa | gonām |
yo | me | hiraṇyasaṁdṛśo | daśa | rājño | amaṁhata |
adhaspadeccaidyasya | kṛṣṭayaścarmamnābhito | janāḥ |
mākirenā | pathā | gādyeneme | yanti | cedayaḥ |
anyo | netsūrirohate | bhūridāvattaro | janaḥ |
mahām̐ | indro | yaujasā | parjanyo | vṛṣṭimām̐ | iva |
stomairvatsasya | vāvṛdhe |
prajāmṛtasya | piprataḥ | pra | yadbharanta | vahnayaḥ |
viprā | ṛtasya | vāhasā |
kaṇvendraṁ | yadakrata | stomairyajñasya | sādhanam |
jāmi | bruvatāyudham |
samasya | manyave | viśo | viśvā | namanta | kṛṣṭayaḥ |
samudrāyeva | sindhavaḥ |
ojastadasya | titviṣobhe | yatsamavartayat |
indraścarmeva | rodasī |
vi | cidvṛtrasya | dodhato | vajreṇa | śataparvaṇā |
śiro | bibheda | vṛṣṇinā |
imābhi | pra | ṇonumo | vipāmagreṣu | dhītayaḥ |
agneḥ | śocirna | didyutaḥ |
guhā | satīrupa | tmanā | pra | yacchocanta | dhītayaḥ |
kaṇvā | ṛtasya | dhārayā |
pra | tamindra | naśīmahi | rayiṁ | gomantamaśvinam |
pra | brahma | pūrvacittaye |
ahamiddhi | pituṣpari | medhāmṛtasya | jagrabha |
ahaṁ | sūryevājani |
ahaṁ | pratnena | manmanā | giraḥ | śumbhāmi | kaṇvavat |
yenendraḥ | śuṣmamiddadhe |
ye | tvāmindra | na | tuṣṭuvurṛṣayo | ye | ca | tuṣṭuvuḥ |
mamedvardhasva | suṣṭutaḥ |
yadasya | manyuradhvanīdvi | vṛtraṁ | parvaśo | rujan |
apaḥ | samudramairayat |
ni | śuṣṇendra | dharṇasiṁ | vajraṁ | jaghantha | dasyavi |
vṛṣā | hyugra | śṛṇviṣe |
na | dyāvendramojasā | nāntarikṣāṇi | vajriṇam |
na | vivyacanta | bhūmayaḥ |
yastendra | mahīrapaḥ | stabhūyamānāśayat |
ni | taṁ | padyāsu | śiśnathaḥ |
yeme | rodasī | mahī | samīcī | samajagrabhīt |
tamobhirindra | taṁ | guhaḥ |
yendra | yatayastvā | bhṛgavo | ye | ca | tuṣṭuvuḥ |
mamedugra | śrudhī | havam |
imāstendra | pṛśnayo | ghṛtaṁ | duhatāśiram |
enāmṛtasya | pipyuṣīḥ |
yendra | prasvastvāsā | garbhamacakriran |
pari | dharmeva | sūryam |
tvāmicchavasaspate | kaṇvokthena | vāvṛdhuḥ |
tvāṁ | sutāsendavaḥ |
tavedindra | praṇītiṣūta | praśastiradrivaḥ |
yajño | vitantasāyyaḥ |
ā | nendra | mahīmiṣaṁ | puraṁ | na | darṣi | gomatīm |
uta | prajāṁ | suvīryam |
uta | tyadāśvaśvyaṁ | yadindra | nāhuṣīṣvā |
agre | vikṣu | pradīdayat |
abhi | vrajaṁ | na | tatniṣe | sūropākacakṣasam |
yadindra | mṛḻayāsi | naḥ |
yadaṅga | taviṣīyasendra | prarājasi | kṣitīḥ |
mahām̐ | apāraujasā |
taṁ | tvā | haviṣmatīrviśopa | bruvatotaye |
urujrayasamindubhiḥ |
upahvare | girīṇāṁ | saṁgathe | ca | nadīnām |
dhiyā | vipro | ajāyata |
ataḥ | samudramudvataścikitvām̐ | ava | paśyati |
yato | vipānaijati |
āditpratnasya | retaso | jyotiṣpaśyanti | vāsaram |
paro | yadidhyate | divā |
kaṇvāsendra | te | matiṁ | viśve | vardhanti | pauṁsyam |
uto | śaviṣṭha | vṛṣṇyam |
imāṁ | mendra | suṣṭutiṁ | juṣasva | pra | su | māmava |
uta | pra | vardhayā | matim |
uta | brahmaṇyā | vayaṁ | tubhyaṁ | pravṛddha | vajrivaḥ |
viprātakṣma | jīvase |
abhi | kaṇvānūṣatāpo | na | pravatā | yatīḥ |
indraṁ | vananvatī | matiḥ |
indramukthāni | vāvṛdhuḥ | samudramiva | sindhavaḥ |
anuttamanyumajaram |
ā | no | yāhi | parāvato | haribhyāṁ | haryatābhyām |
imamindra | sutaṁ | piba |
tvāmidvṛtrahantama | janāso | vṛktabarhiṣaḥ |
havante | vājasātaye |
anu | tvā | rodasī | ubhe | cakraṁ | na | vartyetaśam |
anu | suvānāsendavaḥ |
mandasvā | su | svarṇarotendra | śaryaṇāvati |
matsvā | vivasvato | matī |
vāvṛdhānopa | dyavi | vṛṣā | vajryaroravīt |
vṛtrahā | somapātamaḥ |
ṛṣirhi | pūrvajāsyeka | īśānaujasā |
indra | coṣkūyase | vasu |
asmākaṁ | tvā | sutām̐ | upa | vītapṛṣṭhābhi | prayaḥ |
śataṁ | vahantu | harayaḥ |
imāṁ | su | pūrvyāṁ | dhiyaṁ | madhorghṛtasya | pipyuṣīm |
kaṇvokthena | vāvṛdhuḥ |
indramidvimahīnāṁ | medhe | vṛṇīta | martyaḥ |
indraṁ | saniṣyurūtaye |
arvāñcaṁ | tvā | puruṣṭuta | priyamedhastutā | harī |
somapeyāya | vakṣataḥ |
śatamahaṁ | tirindire | sahasraṁ | parśāvā | dade |
rādhāṁsi | yādvānām |
trīṇi | śatānyarvatāṁ | sahasrā | daśa | gonām |
daduṣpajrāya | sāmne |
udānaṭ | kakuho | divamuṣṭrāñcaturyujo | dadat |
śravasā | yādvaṁ | janam |
pra | yadvastriṣṭubhamiṣaṁ | maruto | vipro | akṣarat |
vi | parvateṣu | rājatha |
yadaṅga | taviṣīyavo | yāmaṁ | śubhrācidhvam |
ni | parvatāhāsata |
udīrayanta | vāyubhirvāśrāsaḥ | pṛśnimātaraḥ |
dhukṣanta | pipyuṣīmiṣam |
vapanti | maruto | mihaṁ | pra | vepayanti | parvatān |
yadyāmaṁ | yānti | vāyubhiḥ |
ni | yadyāmāya | vo | girirni | sindhavo | vidharmaṇe |
mahe | śuṣmāya | yemire |
yuṣmām̐ | u | naktamūtaye | yuṣmāndivā | havāmahe |
yuṣmānprayatyadhvare |
udu | tye | aruṇapsavaścitrā | yāmebhirīrate |
vāśrādhi | ṣṇunā | divaḥ |
sṛjanti | raśmimojasā | panthāṁ | sūryāya | yātave |
te | bhānubhirvi | tasthire |
imāṁ | me | maruto | giramimaṁ | stomamṛbhukṣaṇaḥ |
imaṁ | me | vanatā | havam |
trīṇi | sarāṁsi | pṛśnayo | duduhre | vajriṇe | madhu |
utsaṁ | kavandhamudriṇam |
maruto | yaddha | vo | divaḥ | sumnāyanto | havāmahe |
ā | tū | nopa | gantana |
yūyaṁ | hi | ṣṭhā | sudānavo | rudrā | ṛbhukṣaṇo | dame |
uta | pracetaso | made |
ā | no | rayiṁ | madacyutaṁ | purukṣuṁ | viśvadhāyasam |
iyartā | maruto | divaḥ |
adhīva | yadgirīṇāṁ | yāmaṁ | śubhrācidhvam |
suvānairmandadhvendubhiḥ |
etāvataścideṣāṁ | sumnaṁ | bhikṣeta | martyaḥ |
adābhyasya | manmabhiḥ |
ye | drapseva | rodasī | dhamantyanu | vṛṣṭibhiḥ |
utsaṁ | duhanto | akṣitam |
udu | svānebhirīratodrathairudu | vāyubhiḥ |
utstomaiḥ | pṛśnimātaraḥ |
yenāva | turvaśaṁ | yaduṁ | yena | kaṇvaṁ | dhanaspṛtam |
rāye | su | tasya | dhīmahi |
imo | vaḥ | sudānavo | ghṛtaṁ | na | pipyuṣīriṣaḥ |
vardhānkāṇvasya | manmabhiḥ |
kva | nūnaṁ | sudānavo | madathā | vṛktabarhiṣaḥ |
brahmā | ko | vaḥ | saparyati |
nahi | ṣma | yaddha | vaḥ | purā | stomebhirvṛktabarhiṣaḥ |
śardhām̐ | ṛtasya | jinvatha |
samu | tye | mahatīrapaḥ | saṁ | kṣoṇī | samu | sūryam |
saṁ | vajraṁ | parvaśo | dadhuḥ |
vi | vṛtraṁ | parvaśo | yayurvi | parvatām̐ | arājinaḥ |
cakrāṇā | vṛṣṇi | pauṁsyam |
anu | tritasya | yudhyataḥ | śuṣmamāvannuta | kratum |
anvindraṁ | vṛtratūrye |
vidyuddhastābhidyavaḥ | śiprāḥ | śīrṣanhiraṇyayīḥ |
śubhrā | vyañjata | śriye |
uśanā | yatparāvatokṣṇo | randhramayātana |
dyaurna | cakradadbhiyā |
ā | no | makhasya | dāvane'śvairhiraṇyapāṇibhiḥ |
devāsopa | gantana |
yadeṣāṁ | pṛṣatī | rathe | praṣṭirvahati | rohitaḥ |
yānti | śubhrā | riṇannapaḥ |
suṣome | śaryaṇāvatyārjīke | pastyāvati |
yayurnicakrayā | naraḥ |
kadā | gacchātha | marutetthā | vipraṁ | havamānam |
mārḍīkebhirnādhamānam |
kaddha | nūnaṁ | kadhapriyo | yadindramajahātana |
ko | vaḥ | sakhitvauhate |
saho | ṣu | ṇo | vajrahastaiḥ | kaṇvāso | agniṁ | marudbhiḥ |
stuṣe | hiraṇyavāśībhiḥ |
o | ṣu | vṛṣṇaḥ | prayajyūnā | navyase | suvitāya |
vavṛtyāṁ | citravājān |
girayaścinni | jihate | parśānāso | manyamānāḥ |
parvatāścinni | yemire |
ākṣṇayāvāno | vahantyantarikṣeṇa | patataḥ |
dhātāraḥ | stuvate | vayaḥ |
agnirhi | jāni | pūrvyaśchando | na | sūro | arciṣā |
te | bhānubhirvi | tasthire |
ā | no | viśvābhirūtibhiraśvinā | gacchataṁ | yuvam |
dasrā | hiraṇyavartanī | pibataṁ | somyaṁ | madhu |
ā | nūnaṁ | yātamaśvinā | rathena | sūryatvacā |
bhujī | hiraṇyapeśasā | kavī | gambhīracetasā |
ā | yātaṁ | nahuṣasparyāntarikṣātsuvṛktibhiḥ |
pibātho | aśvinā | madhu | kaṇvānāṁ | savane | sutam |
ā | no | yātaṁ | divasparyāntarikṣādadhapriyā |
putraḥ | kaṇvasya | vāmiha | suṣāva | somyaṁ | madhu |
ā | no | yātamupaśrutyaśvinā | somapītaye |
svāhā | stomasya | vardhanā | pra | kavī | dhītibhirnarā |
yacciddhi | vāṁ | pura | ṛṣayo | juhūre'vase | narā |
ā | yātamaśvinā | gatamupemāṁ | suṣṭutiṁ | mama |
divaścidrocanādadhyā | no | gantaṁ | svarvidā |
dhībhirvatsapracetasā | stomebhirhavanaśrutā |
kimanye | paryāsate'smatstomebhiraśvinā |
putraḥ | kaṇvasya | vāmṛṣirgīrbhirvatso | avīvṛdhat |
ā | vāṁ | viprehāvase'hvatstomebhiraśvinā |
ariprā | vṛtrahantamā | tā | no | bhūtaṁ | mayobhuvā |
ā | yadvāṁ | yoṣaṇā | rathamatiṣṭhadvājinīvasū |
viśvānyaśvinā | yuvaṁ | pra | dhītānyagacchatam |
ataḥ | sahasranirṇijā | rathenā | yātamaśvinā |
vatso | vāṁ | madhumadvaco'śaṁsītkāvyaḥ | kaviḥ |
purumandrā | purūvasū | manotarā | rayīṇām |
stomaṁ | me | aśvināvimamabhi | vahnī | anūṣātām |
ā | no | viśvānyaśvinā | dhattaṁ | rādhāṁsyahrayā |
kṛtaṁ | na | ṛtviyāvato | mā | no | rīradhataṁ | nide |
yannāsatyā | parāvati | yadvā | stho | adhyambare |
ataḥ | sahasranirṇijā | rathenā | yātamaśvinā |
yo | vāṁ | nāsatyāvṛṣirgīrbhirvatso | avīvṛdhat |
tasmai | sahasranirṇijamiṣaṁ | dhattaṁ | ghṛtaścutam |
prāsmorjaṁ | ghṛtaścutamaśvinā | yacchataṁ | yuvam |
yo | vāṁ | sumnāya | tuṣṭavadvasūyāddānunaspatī |
ā | no | gantaṁ | riśādasemaṁ | stomaṁ | purubhujā |
kṛtaṁ | naḥ | suśriyo | naremā | dātamabhiṣṭaye |
ā | vāṁ | viśvābhirūtibhiḥ | priyamedhāhūṣata |
rājantāvadhvarāṇāmaśvinā | yāmahūtiṣu |
ā | no | gantaṁ | mayobhuvāśvinā | śaṁbhuvā | yuvam |
yo | vāṁ | vipanyū | dhītibhirgīrbhirvatso | avīvṛdhat |
yābhiḥ | kaṇvaṁ | medhātithiṁ | yābhirvaśaṁ | daśavrajam |
