yābhirgośaryamāvataṁ | tābhirno'vataṁ | narā |
yābhirnarā | trasadasyumāvataṁ | kṛtvye | dhane |
tābhiḥ | ṣvasmām̐ | aśvinā | prāvataṁ | vājasātaye |
pra | vāṁ | stomāḥ | suvṛktayo | giro | vardhantvaśvinā |
purutrā | vṛtrahantamā | tā | no | bhūtaṁ | puruspṛhā |
trīṇi | padānyaśvinorāviḥ | sānti | guhā | paraḥ |
kavī | ṛtasya | patmabhirarvāgjīvebhyaspari |
ā | nūnamaśvinā | yuvaṁ | vatsasya | gantamavase |
prāsmai | yacchatamavṛkaṁ | pṛthu | cchardiryuyutaṁ | yārātayaḥ |
yadantarikṣe | yaddivi | yatpañca | mānuṣām̐ | anu |
nṛmṇaṁ | taddhattamaśvinā |
ye | vāṁ | daṁsāṁsyaśvinā | viprāsaḥ | parimāmṛśuḥ |
evetkāṇvasya | bodhatam |
ayaṁ | vāṁ | gharmo | aśvinā | stomena | pari | ṣicyate |
ayaṁ | somo | madhumānvājinīvasū | yena | vṛtraṁ | ciketathaḥ |
yadapsu | yadvanaspatau | yadoṣadhīṣu | purudaṁsasā | kṛtam |
tena | māviṣṭamaśvinā |
yannāsatyā | bhuraṇyatho | yadvā | deva | bhiṣajyathaḥ |
ayaṁ | vāṁ | vatso | matibhirna | vindhate | haviṣmantaṁ | hi | gacchathaḥ |
ā | nūnamaśvinorṛṣiḥ | stomaṁ | ciketa | vāmayā |
ā | somaṁ | madhumattamaṁ | gharmaṁ | siñcādatharvaṇi |
ā | nūnaṁ | raghuvartaniṁ | rathaṁ | tiṣṭhātho | aśvinā |
ā | vāṁ | stomeme | mama | nabho | na | cucyavīrata |
yadadya | vāṁ | nāsatyokthairācucyuvīmahi |
yadvā | vāṇībhiraśvinevetkāṇvasya | bodhatam |
yadvāṁ | kakṣīvām̐ | uta | yadvyaśva | ṛṣiryadvāṁ | dīrghatamā | juhāva |
pṛthī | yadvāṁ | vainyaḥ | sādaneṣvevedato | aśvinā | cetayethām |
yātaṁ | chardiṣpota | naḥ | paraspā | bhūtaṁ | jagatpota | nastanūpā |
vartistokāya | tanayāya | yātam |
yadindreṇa | sarathaṁ | yātho | aśvinā | yadvā | vāyunā | bhavathaḥ | samokasā |
yadādityebhirṛbhubhiḥ | sajoṣasā | yadvā | viṣṇorvikramaṇeṣu | tiṣṭhathaḥ |
yadadyāśvināvahaṁ | huveya | vājasātaye |
yatpṛtsu | turvaṇe | sahastacchreṣṭhamaśvinoravaḥ |
ā | nūnaṁ | yātamaśvinemā | havyāni | vāṁ | hitā |
ime | somāso | adhi | turvaśe | yadāvime | kaṇveṣu | vāmatha |
yannāsatyā | parāke | arvāke | asti | bheṣajam |
tena | nūnaṁ | vimadāya | pracetasā | chardirvatsāya | yacchatam |
abhutsyu | pra | devyā | sākaṁ | vācāhamaśvinoḥ |
vyāvardevyā | matiṁ | vi | rātiṁ | martyebhyaḥ |
pra | bodhayoṣo | aśvinā | pra | devi | sūnṛte | mahi |
pra | yajñahotarānuṣakpra | madāya | śravo | bṛhat |
yaduṣo | yāsi | bhānunā | saṁ | sūryeṇa | rocase |
ā | hāyamaśvino | ratho | vartiryāti | nṛpāyyam |
yadāpītāso | aṁśavo | gāvo | na | duhrodhabhiḥ |
yadvā | vāṇīranūṣata | pra | devayanto | aśvinā |
pra | dyumnāya | pra | śavase | pra | nṛṣāhyāya | śarmaṇe |
pra | dakṣāya | pracetasā |
yannūnaṁ | dhībhiraśvinā | pituryonā | niṣīdathaḥ |
yadvā | sumnebhirukthyā |
yatstho | dīrghaprasadmani | yadvādo | rocane | divaḥ |
yadvā | samudre | adhyākṛte | gṛhe'tā | yātamaśvinā |
yadvā | yajñaṁ | manave | saṁmimikṣathurevetkāṇvasya | bodhatam |
bṛhaspatiṁ | viśvāndevām̐ | ahaṁ | huvendrāviṣṇū | aśvināvāśuheṣasā |
tyā | nvaśvinā | huve | sudaṁsasā | gṛbhe | kṛtā |
yayorasti | pra | ṇaḥ | sakhyaṁ | deveṣvadhyāpyam |
yayoradhi | pra | yajñāsūre | santi | sūrayaḥ |
tā | yajñasyādhvarasya | pracetasā | svadhābhiryā | pibataḥ | somyaṁ | madhu |
yadadyāśvināvapāgyatprākstho | vājinīvasū |
yaddruhyavyanavi | turvaśe | yadau | huve | vāmatha | mā | gatam |
yadantarikṣe | patathaḥ | purubhujā | yadveme | rodasī | anu |
yadvā | svadhābhiradhitiṣṭhatho | rathamatā | yātamaśvinā |
tvamagne | vratapāsi | devā | martyeṣvā |
tvaṁ | yajñeṣvīḍyaḥ |
tvamasi | praśasyo | vidatheṣu | sahantya |
agne | rathīradhvarāṇām |
sa | tvamasmadapa | dviṣo | yuyodhi | jātavedaḥ |
adevīragne | arātīḥ |
anti | citsantamaha | yajñaṁ | martasya | ripoḥ |
nopa | veṣi | jātavedaḥ |
martāmartyasya | te | bhūri | nāma | manāmahe |
viprāso | jātavedasaḥ |
vipraṁ | viprāso'vase | devaṁ | martāsotaye |
agniṁ | gīrbhirhavāmahe |
ā | te | vatso | mano | yamatparamāccitsadhasthāt |
agne | tvāṁkāmayā | girā |
purutrā | hi | sadṛṅṅasi | viśo | viśvānu | prabhuḥ |
samatsu | tvā | havāmahe |
samatsvagnimavase | vājayanto | havāmahe |
vājeṣu | citrarādhasam |
pratno | hi | kamīḍyo | adhvareṣu | sanācca | hotā | navyaśca | satsi |
svāṁ | cāgne | tanvaṁ | piprayasvāsmabhyaṁ | ca | saubhagamā | yajasva |
yendra | somapātamo | madaḥ | śaviṣṭha | cetati |
yenā | haṁsi | nyatriṇaṁ | tamīmahe |
yenā | daśagvamadhriguṁ | vepayantaṁ | svarṇaram |
yenā | samudramāvithā | tamīmahe |
yena | sindhuṁ | mahīrapo | rathām̐ | iva | pracodayaḥ |
panthāmṛtasya | yātave | tamīmahe |
imaṁ | stomamabhiṣṭaye | ghṛtaṁ | na | pūtamadrivaḥ |
yenā | nu | sadyaujasā | vavakṣitha |
imaṁ | juṣasva | girvaṇaḥ | samudreva | pinvate |
indra | viśvābhirūtibhirvavakṣitha |
yo | no | devaḥ | parāvataḥ | sakhitvanāya | māmahe |
divo | na | vṛṣṭiṁ | prathayanvavakṣitha |
vavakṣurasya | ketavota | vajro | gabhastyoḥ |
yatsūryo | na | rodasī | avardhayat |
yadi | pravṛddha | satpate | sahasraṁ | mahiṣām̐ | aghaḥ |
ādittendriyaṁ | mahi | pra | vāvṛdhe |
indraḥ | sūryasya | raśmibhirnyarśasānamoṣati |
agnirvaneva | sāsahiḥ | pra | vāvṛdhe |
iyaṁ | ta | ṛtviyāvatī | dhītireti | navīyasī |
saparyantī | purupriyā | mimītet |
garbho | yajñasya | devayuḥ | kratuṁ | punītānuṣak |
stomairindrasya | vāvṛdhe | mimītet |
sanirmitrasya | paprathendraḥ | somasya | pītaye |
prācī | vāśīva | sunvate | mimītet |
yaṁ | viprokthavāhaso'bhipramandurāyavaḥ |
ghṛtaṁ | na | pipyāsanyṛtasya | yat |
uta | svarāje | aditiḥ | stomamindrāya | jījanat |
purupraśastamūtaya | ṛtasya | yat |
abhi | vahnayotaye'nūṣata | praśastaye |
na | deva | vivratā | harī | ṛtasya | yat |
yatsomamindra | viṣṇavi | yadvā | gha | tritāptye |
yadvā | marutsu | mandase | samindubhiḥ |
yadvā | śakra | parāvati | samudre | adhi | mandase |
asmākamitsute | raṇā | samindubhiḥ |
yadvāsi | sunvato | vṛdho | yajamānasya | satpate |
ukthe | vā | yasya | raṇyasi | samindubhiḥ |
devaṁdevaṁ | vo'vasendramindraṁ | gṛṇīṣaṇi |
adhā | yajñāya | turvaṇe | vyānaśuḥ |
yajñebhiryajñavāhasaṁ | somebhiḥ | somapātamam |
hotrābhirindraṁ | vāvṛdhurvyānaśuḥ |
mahīrasya | praṇītayaḥ | pūrvīruta | praśastayaḥ |
viśvā | vasūni | dāśuṣe | vyānaśuḥ |
indraṁ | vṛtrāya | hantave | devāso | dadhire | puraḥ |
indraṁ | vāṇīranūṣatā | samojase |
mahāntaṁ | mahinā | vayaṁ | stomebhirhavanaśrutam |
arkairabhi | pra | ṇonumaḥ | samojase |
na | yaṁ | vivikto | rodasī | nāntarikṣāṇi | vajriṇam |
amādidasya | titviṣe | samojasaḥ |
yadindra | pṛtanājye | devāstvā | dadhire | puraḥ |
āditte | haryatā | harī | vavakṣatuḥ |
yadā | vṛtraṁ | nadīvṛtaṁ | śavasā | vajrinnavadhīḥ |
āditte | haryatā | harī | vavakṣatuḥ |
yadā | te | viṣṇurojasā | trīṇi | padā | vicakrame |
āditte | haryatā | harī | vavakṣatuḥ |
yadā | te | haryatā | harī | vāvṛdhāte | divedive |
āditte | viśvā | bhuvanāni | yemire |
yadā | te | mārutīrviśastubhyamindra | niyemire |
āditte | viśvā | bhuvanāni | yemire |
yadā | sūryamamuṁ | divi | śukraṁ | jyotiradhārayaḥ |
āditte | viśvā | bhuvanāni | yemire |
imāṁ | tendra | suṣṭutiṁ | vipreyarti | dhītibhiḥ |
jāmiṁ | padeva | pipratīṁ | prādhvare |
yadasya | dhāmani | priye | samīcīnāso | asvaran |
nābhā | yajñasya | dohanā | prādhvare |
suvīryaṁ | svaśvyaṁ | sugavyamindra | daddhi | naḥ |
hoteva | pūrvacittaye | prādhvare |
indraḥ | suteṣu | someṣu | kratuṁ | punītokthyam |
vide | vṛdhasya | dakṣaso | mahānhi | ṣaḥ |
sa | prathame | vyomani | devānāṁ | sadane | vṛdhaḥ |
supāraḥ | suśravastamaḥ | samapsujit |
tamahve | vājasātayendraṁ | bharāya | śuṣmiṇam |
bhavā | naḥ | sumne | antamaḥ | sakhā | vṛdhe |
iyaṁ | tendra | girvaṇo | rātiḥ | kṣarati | sunvataḥ |
mandāno | asya | barhiṣo | vi | rājasi |
nūnaṁ | tadindra | daddhi | no | yattvā | sunvantemahe |
rayiṁ | naścitramā | bharā | svarvidam |
stotā | yatte | vicarṣaṇiratipraśardhayadgiraḥ |
vayevānu | rohate | juṣanta | yat |
pratnavajjanayā | giraḥ | śṛṇudhī | jariturhavam |
mademade | vavakṣithā | sukṛtvane |
krīḻantyasya | sūnṛtāpo | na | pravatā | yatīḥ |
ayā | dhiyā | yocyate | patirdivaḥ |
uto | patiryocyate | kṛṣṭīnāmekedvaśī |
namovṛdhairavasyubhiḥ | sute | raṇa |
stuhi | śrutaṁ | vipaścitaṁ | harī | yasya | prasakṣiṇā |
gantārā | dāśuṣo | gṛhaṁ | namasvinaḥ |
tūtujāno | mahemate'śvebhiḥ | pruṣitapsubhiḥ |
ā | yāhi | yajñamāśubhiḥ | śamiddhi | te |
indra | śaviṣṭha | satpate | rayiṁ | gṛṇatsu | dhāraya |
śravaḥ | sūribhyo | amṛtaṁ | vasutvanam |
have | tvā | sūrodite | have | madhyaṁdine | divaḥ |
juṣāṇendra | saptibhirnā | gahi |
ā | tū | gahi | pra | tu | drava | matsvā | sutasya | gomataḥ |
tantuṁ | tanuṣva | pūrvyaṁ | yathā | vide |
yacchakrāsi | parāvati | yadarvāvati | vṛtrahan |
yadvā | samudre | andhaso'vitedasi |
indraṁ | vardhantu | no | girendraṁ | sutāsendavaḥ |
indre | haviṣmatīrviśo | arāṇiṣuḥ |
tamidviprāvasyavaḥ | pravatvatībhirūtibhiḥ |
indraṁ | kṣoṇīravardhayanvayeva |
trikadrukeṣu | cetanaṁ | devāso | yajñamatnata |
tamidvardhantu | no | giraḥ | sadāvṛdham |
stotā | yatte | anuvratokthānyṛtuthā | dadhe |
śuciḥ | pāvakocyate | so | adbhutaḥ |
tadidrudrasya | cetati | yahvaṁ | pratneṣu | dhāmasu |
mano | yatrā | vi | taddadhurvicetasaḥ |
yadi | me | sakhyamāvaremasya | pāhyandhasaḥ |
yena | viśvāti | dviṣo | atārima |
kadā | tendra | girvaṇaḥ | stotā | bhavāti | śaṁtamaḥ |
kadā | no | gavye | aśvye | vasau | dadhaḥ |
uta | te | suṣṭutā | harī | vṛṣaṇā | vahato | ratham |
ajuryasya | madintamaṁ | yamīmahe |
tamīmahe | puruṣṭutaṁ | yahvaṁ | pratnābhirūtibhiḥ |
ni | barhiṣi | priye | sadadadha | dvitā |
vardhasvā | su | puruṣṭuta | ṛṣiṣṭutābhirūtibhiḥ |
dhukṣasva | pipyuṣīmiṣamavā | ca | naḥ |
indra | tvamavitedasītthā | stuvato | adrivaḥ |
ṛtādiyarmi | te | dhiyaṁ | manoyujam |
iha | tyā | sadhamādyā | yujānaḥ | somapītaye |
harīndra | pratadvasū | abhi | svara |
abhi | svarantu | ye | tava | rudrāsaḥ | sakṣata | śriyam |
uto | marutvatīrviśo | abhi | prayaḥ |
imāsya | pratūrtayaḥ | padaṁ | juṣanta | yaddivi |
nābhā | yajñasya | saṁ | dadhuryathā | vide |
ayaṁ | dīrghāya | cakṣase | prāci | prayatyadhvare |
mimīte | yajñamānuṣagvicakṣya |
vṛṣāyamindra | te | rathoto | te | vṛṣaṇā | harī |
vṛṣā | tvaṁ | śatakrato | vṛṣā | havaḥ |
vṛṣā | grāvā | vṛṣā | mado | vṛṣā | somo | ayaṁ | sutaḥ |
vṛṣā | yajño | yaminvasi | vṛṣā | havaḥ |
vṛṣā | tvā | vṛṣaṇaṁ | huve | vajriñcitrābhirūtibhiḥ |
vāvantha | hi | pratiṣṭutiṁ | vṛṣā | havaḥ |
yadindrāhaṁ | yathā | tvamīśīya | vasvaika | it |
stotā | me | goṣakhā | syāt |
śikṣeyamasmai | ditseyaṁ | śacīpate | manīṣiṇe |
yadahaṁ | gopatiḥ | syām |
dhenuṣṭendra | sūnṛtā | yajamānāya | sunvate |
gāmaśvaṁ | pipyuṣī | duhe |
na | te | vartāsti | rādhasendra | devo | na | martyaḥ |
yadditsasi | stuto | magham |
yajñendramavardhayadyadbhūmiṁ | vyavartayat |
cakrāṇaupaśaṁ | divi |
vāvṛdhānasya | te | vayaṁ | viśvā | dhanāni | jigyuṣaḥ |
ūtimindrā | vṛṇīmahe |
vyantarikṣamatiranmade | somasya | rocanā |
indro | yadabhinadvalam |
udgājadaṅgirobhya | āviṣkṛṇvanguhā | satīḥ |
arvāñcaṁ | nunude | valam |
indreṇa | rocanā | divo | dṛḻhāni | dṛṁhitāni | ca |
sthirāṇi | na | parāṇude |
apāmūrmirmadanniva | stomendrājirāyate |
vi | te | madārājiṣuḥ |
tvaṁ | hi | stomavardhanendrāsyukthavardhanaḥ |
stotṝṇāmuta | bhadrakṛt |
indramitkeśinā | harī | somapeyāya | vakṣataḥ |
upa | yajñaṁ | surādhasam |
apāṁ | phenena | namuceḥ | śirendrodavartayaḥ |
viśvā | yadajayaḥ | spṛdhaḥ |
māyābhirutsisṛpsatendra | dyāmārurukṣataḥ |
ava | dasyūm̐radhūnuthāḥ |
asunvāmindra | saṁsadaṁ | viṣūcīṁ | vyanāśayaḥ |
somapottaro | bhavan |
tamvabhi | pra | gāyata | puruhūtaṁ | puruṣṭutam |
indraṁ | gīrbhistaviṣamā | vivāsata |
yasya | dvibarhaso | bṛhatsaho | dādhāra | rodasī |
girīm̐rajrām̐ | apaḥ | svarvṛṣatvanā |
sa | rājasi | puruṣṭutam̐ | eko | vṛtrāṇi | jighnase |
indra | jaitrā | śravasyā | ca | yantave |
taṁ | te | madaṁ | gṛṇīmasi | vṛṣaṇaṁ | pṛtsu | sāsahim |
u | lokakṛtnumadrivo | hariśriyam |
yena | jyotīṁṣyāyave | manave | ca | viveditha |
mandāno | asya | barhiṣo | vi | rājasi |
tadadyā | cittokthino'nu | ṣṭuvanti | pūrvathā |
vṛṣapatnīrapo | jayā | divedive |
tava | tyadindriyaṁ | bṛhattava | śuṣmamuta | kratum |
vajraṁ | śiśāti | dhiṣaṇā | vareṇyam |
tava | dyaurindra | pauṁsyaṁ | pṛthivī | vardhati | śravaḥ |
tvāmāpaḥ | parvatāsaśca | hinvire |
tvāṁ | viṣṇurbṛhankṣayo | mitro | gṛṇāti | varuṇaḥ |
tvāṁ | śardho | madatyanu | mārutam |
tvaṁ | vṛṣā | janānāṁ | maṁhiṣṭhendra | jajñiṣe |
satrā | viśvā | svapatyāni | dadhiṣe |
satrā | tvaṁ | puruṣṭutam̐ | eko | vṛtrāṇi | tośase |
nānyendrātkaraṇaṁ | bhūyenvati |
yadindra | manmaśastvā | nānā | havantotaye |
asmākebhirnṛbhiratrā | svarjaya |
araṁ | kṣayāya | no | mahe | viśvā | rūpāṇyāviśan |
indraṁ | jaitrāya | harṣayā | śacīpatim |
pra | samrājaṁ | carṣaṇīnāmindraṁ | stotā | navyaṁ | gīrbhiḥ |
naraṁ | nṛṣāhaṁ | maṁhiṣṭham |
yasminnukthāni | raṇyanti | viśvāni | ca | śravasyā |
apāmavo | na | samudre |
taṁ | suṣṭutyā | vivāse | jyeṣṭharājaṁ | bhare | kṛtnum |
maho | vājinaṁ | sanibhyaḥ |
yasyānūnā | gabhīrā | madoravastarutrāḥ |
harṣumantaḥ | śūrasātau |
tamiddhaneṣu | hiteṣvadhivākāya | havante |
yeṣāmindraste | jayanti |
tamiccyautnairāryanti | taṁ | kṛtebhiścarṣaṇayaḥ |
eṣendro | varivaskṛt |
indro | brahmendra | ṛṣirindraḥ | purū | puruhūtaḥ |
mahānmahībhiḥ | śacībhiḥ |
sa | stomyaḥ | sa | havyaḥ | satyaḥ | satvā | tuvikūrmiḥ |
ekaścitsannabhibhūtiḥ |
tamarkebhistaṁ | sāmabhistaṁ | gāyatraiścarṣaṇayaḥ |
indraṁ | vardhanti | kṣitayaḥ |
praṇetāraṁ | vasyo | acchā | kartāraṁ | jyotiḥ | samatsu |
sāsahvāṁsaṁ | yudhāmitrān |
sa | naḥ | papriḥ | pārayāti | svasti | nāvā | puruhūtaḥ |
indro | viśvāti | dviṣaḥ |
sa | tvaṁ | nendra | vājebhirdaśasyā | ca | gātuyā | ca |
acchā | ca | naḥ | sumnaṁ | neṣi |
ā | yāhi | suṣumā | hi | tendra | somaṁ | pibemam |
edaṁ | barhiḥ | sado | mama |
ā | tvā | brahmayujā | harī | vahatāmindra | keśinā |
upa | brahmāṇi | naḥ | śṛṇu |
brahmāṇastvā | vayaṁ | yujā | somapāmindra | sominaḥ |
sutāvanto | havāmahe |
ā | no | yāhi | sutāvato'smākaṁ | suṣṭutīrupa |
pibā | su | śiprinnandhasaḥ |
ā | te | siñcāmi | kukṣyoranu | gātrā | vi | dhāvatu |
gṛbhāya | jihvayā | madhu |
svāduṣṭe | astu | saṁsude | madhumāntanve | tava |
somaḥ | śamastu | te | hṛde |
ayamu | tvā | vicarṣaṇe | janīrivābhi | saṁvṛtaḥ |
pra | somendra | sarpatu |
tuvigrīvo | vapodaraḥ | subāhurandhaso | made |
indro | vṛtrāṇi | jighnate |
indra | prehi | purastvaṁ | viśvasyeśānaujasā |
vṛtrāṇi | vṛtrahañjahi |
dīrghaste | astvaṅkuśo | yenā | vasu | prayacchasi |
yajamānāya | sunvate |
ayaṁ | tendra | somo | nipūto | adhi | barhiṣi |
ehīmasya | dravā | piba |
śācigo | śācipūjanāyaṁ | raṇāya | te | sutaḥ |
ākhaṇḍala | pra | hūyase |
yaste | śṛṅgavṛṣo | napātpraṇapātkuṇḍapāyyaḥ |
nyasmindadhrā | manaḥ |
vāstoṣpate | dhruvā | sthūṇāṁsatraṁ | somyānām |
drapso | bhettā | purāṁ | śaśvatīnāmindro | munīnāṁ | sakhā |
pṛdākusānuryajato | gaveṣaṇaikaḥ | sannabhi | bhūyasaḥ |
bhūrṇimaśvaṁ | nayattujā | puro | gṛbhendraṁ | somasya | pītaye |
idaṁ | ha | nūnameṣāṁ | sumnaṁ | bhikṣeta | martyaḥ |
ādityānāmapūrvyaṁ | savīmani |
anarvāṇo | hyeṣāṁ | panthādityānām |
adabdhāḥ | santi | pāyavaḥ | sugevṛdhaḥ |
tatsu | naḥ | savitā | bhago | varuṇo | mitro | aryamā |
śarma | yacchantu | sapratho | yadīmahe |
devebhirdevyadite'riṣṭabharmannā | gahi |
smatsūribhiḥ | purupriye | suśarmabhiḥ |
te | hi | putrāso | aditervidurdveṣāṁsi | yotave |
aṁhościdurucakrayo'nehasaḥ |
aditirno | divā | paśumaditirnaktamadvayāḥ |
aditiḥ | pātvaṁhasaḥ | sadāvṛdhā |
uta | syā | no | divā | matiraditirūtyā | gamat |
sā | śaṁtāti | mayaskaradapa | sridhaḥ |
uta | tyā | daivyā | bhiṣajā | śaṁ | naḥ | karato | aśvinā |
yuyuyātāmito | rapo | apa | sridhaḥ |
śamagniragnibhiḥ | karacchaṁ | nastapatu | sūryaḥ |
śaṁ | vāto | vātvarapāpa | sridhaḥ |
apāmīvāmapa | sridhamapa | sedhata | durmatim |
ādityāso | yuyotanā | no | aṁhasaḥ |
yuyotā | śarumasmadām̐ | ādityāsotāmatim |
ṛdhagdveṣaḥ | kṛṇuta | viśvavedasaḥ |
tatsu | naḥ | śarma | yacchatādityā | yanmumocati |
enasvantaṁ | cidenasaḥ | sudānavaḥ |
yo | naḥ | kaścidririkṣati | rakṣastvena | martyaḥ |
svaiḥ | ṣaivai | ririṣīṣṭa | yurjanaḥ |
samittamaghamaśnavadduḥśaṁsaṁ | martyaṁ | ripum |
yo | asmatrā | durhaṇāvām̐ | upa | dvayuḥ |
pākatrā | sthana | devā | hṛtsu | jānītha | martyam |
upa | dvayuṁ | cādvayuṁ | ca | vasavaḥ |
ā | śarma | parvatānāmotāpāṁ | vṛṇīmahe |
dyāvākṣāmāre | asmadrapaskṛtam |
te | no | bhadreṇa | śarmaṇā | yuṣmākaṁ | nāvā | vasavaḥ |
ati | viśvāni | duritā | pipartana |
tuce | tanāya | tatsu | no | drāghīyāyurjīvase |
ādityāsaḥ | sumahasaḥ | kṛṇotana |
yajño | hīḻo | vo | antarādityā | asti | mṛḻata |
yuṣme | idvo | api | ṣmasi | sajātye |
bṛhadvarūthaṁ | marutāṁ | devaṁ | trātāramaśvinā |
mitramīmahe | varuṇaṁ | svastaye |
aneho | mitrāryamannṛvadvaruṇa | śaṁsyam |
trivarūthaṁ | maruto | yanta | naśchardiḥ |
ye | ciddhi | mṛtyubandhavādityā | manavaḥ | smasi |
pra | sū | nāyurjīvase | tiretana |
taṁ | gūrdhayā | svarṇaraṁ | devāso | devamaratiṁ | dadhanvire |
devatrā | havyamohire |
vibhūtarātiṁ | vipra | citraśociṣamagnimīḻiṣva | yanturam |
asya | medhasya | somyasya | sobhare | premadhvarāya | pūrvyam |
yajiṣṭhaṁ | tvā | vavṛmahe | devaṁ | devatrā | hotāramamartyam |
asya | yajñasya | sukratum |
ūrjo | napātaṁ | subhagaṁ | sudīditimagniṁ | śreṣṭhaśociṣam |
sa | no | mitrasya | varuṇasya | so | apāmā | sumnaṁ | yakṣate | divi |
yaḥ | samidhā | yāhutī | yo | vedena | dadāśa | marto | agnaye |
yo | namasā | svadhvaraḥ |
tasyedarvanto | raṁhayantāśavastasya | dyumnitamaṁ | yaśaḥ |
na | tamaṁho | devakṛtaṁ | kutaścana | na | martyakṛtaṁ | naśat |
svagnayo | vo | agnibhiḥ | syāma | sūno | sahasorjāṁ | pate |
suvīrastvamasmayuḥ |
praśaṁsamāno | atithirna | mitriyo'gnī | ratho | na | vedyaḥ |
tve | kṣemāso | api | santi | sādhavastvaṁ | rājā | rayīṇām |
so | addhā | dāśvadhvaro'gne | martaḥ | subhaga | sa | praśaṁsyaḥ |
sa | dhībhirastu | sanitā |
yasya | tvamūrdhvo | adhvarāya | tiṣṭhasi | kṣayadvīraḥ | sa | sādhate |
so | arvadbhiḥ | sanitā | sa | vipanyubhiḥ | sa | śūraiḥ | sanitā | kṛtam |
yasyāgnirvapurgṛhe | stomaṁ | cano | dadhīta | viśvavāryaḥ |
havyā | vā | veviṣadviṣaḥ |
viprasya | vā | stuvataḥ | sahaso | yaho | makṣūtamasya | rātiṣu |
avodevamuparimartyaṁ | kṛdhi | vaso | vividuṣo | vacaḥ |
yo | agniṁ | havyadātibhirnamobhirvā | sudakṣamāvivāsati |
girā | vājiraśociṣam |
samidhā | yo | niśitī | dāśadaditiṁ | dhāmabhirasya | martyaḥ |
viśvetsa | dhībhiḥ | subhago | janām̐ | ati | dyumnairudneva | tāriṣat |
tadagne | dyumnamā | bhara | yatsāsahatsadane | kaṁ | cidatriṇam |
manyuṁ | janasya | dūḍhyaḥ |
yena | caṣṭe | varuṇo | mitro | aryamā | yena | nāsatyā | bhagaḥ |
vayaṁ | tatte | śavasā | gātuvittamendratvotā | vidhemahi |
te | ghedagne | svādhyo | ye | tvā | vipra | nidadhire | nṛcakṣasam |
viprāso | deva | sukratum |
tedvediṁ | subhaga | tāhutiṁ | te | sotuṁ | cakrire | divi |
tedvājebhirjigyurmahaddhanaṁ | ye | tve | kāmaṁ | nyerire |
bhadro | no | agnirāhuto | bhadrā | rātiḥ | subhaga | bhadro | adhvaraḥ |
bhadrota | praśastayaḥ |
bhadraṁ | manaḥ | kṛṇuṣva | vṛtratūrye | yenā | samatsu | sāsahaḥ |
ava | sthirā | tanuhi | bhūri | śardhatāṁ | vanemā | te | abhiṣṭibhiḥ |
īḻe | girā | manurhitaṁ | yaṁ | devā | dūtamaratiṁ | nyerire |
yajiṣṭhaṁ | havyavāhanam |
tigmajambhāya | taruṇāya | rājate | prayo | gāyasyagnaye |
yaḥ | piṁśate | sūnṛtābhiḥ | suvīryamagnirghṛtebhirāhutaḥ |
yadī | ghṛtebhirāhuto | vāśīmagnirbharatoccāva | ca |
asureva | nirṇijam |
yo | havyānyairayatā | manurhito | devāsā | sugandhinā |
vivāsate | vāryāṇi | svadhvaro | hotā | devo | amartyaḥ |
yadagne | martyastvaṁ | syāmahaṁ | mitramaho | amartyaḥ |
sahasaḥ | sūnavāhuta |
na | tvā | rāsīyābhiśastaye | vaso | na | pāpatvāya | santya |
na | me | stotāmatīvā | na | durhitaḥ | syādagne | na | pāpayā |
piturna | putraḥ | subhṛto | duroṇā | devām̐ | etu | pra | ṇo | haviḥ |
tavāhamagnotibhirnediṣṭhābhiḥ | saceya | joṣamā | vaso |
sadā | devasya | martyaḥ |
tava | kratvā | saneyaṁ | tava | rātibhiragne | tava | praśastibhiḥ |
tvāmidāhuḥ | pramatiṁ | vaso | mamāgne | harṣasva | dātave |
pra | so | agne | tavotibhiḥ | suvīrābhistirate | vājabharmabhiḥ |
yasya | tvaṁ | sakhyamāvaraḥ |
tava | drapso | nīlavānvāśa | ṛtviyendhānaḥ | siṣṇavā | dade |
tvaṁ | mahīnāmuṣasāmasi | priyaḥ | kṣapo | vastuṣu | rājasi |
tamāganma | sobharayaḥ | sahasramuṣkaṁ | svabhiṣṭimavase |
samrājaṁ | trāsadasyavam |
yasya | te | agne | anye | agnayopakṣito | vayeva |
vipo | na | dyumnā | ni | yuve | janānāṁ | tava | kṣatrāṇi | vardhayan |
yamādityāso | adruhaḥ | pāraṁ | nayatha | martyam |
maghonāṁ | viśveṣāṁ | sudānavaḥ |
yūyaṁ | rājānaḥ | kaṁ | ciccarṣaṇīsahaḥ | kṣayantaṁ | mānuṣām̐ | anu |
vayaṁ | te | vo | varuṇa | mitrāryamantsyāmedṛtasya | rathyaḥ |
adānme | paurukutsyaḥ | pañcāśataṁ | trasadasyurvadhūnām |
maṁhiṣṭho | aryaḥ | satpatiḥ |
uta | me | prayiyorvayiyoḥ | suvāstvādhi | tugvani |
tisṝṇāṁ | saptatīnāṁ | śyāvaḥ | praṇetā | bhuvadvasurdiyānāṁ | patiḥ |
ā | gantā | mā | riṣaṇyata | prasthāvāno | māpa | sthātā | samanyavaḥ |
sthirā | cinnamayiṣṇavaḥ |
vīḻupavibhirmaruta | ṛbhukṣaṇā | rudrāsaḥ | sudītibhiḥ |
iṣā | no | adyā | gatā | puruspṛho | yajñamā | sobharīyavaḥ |
vidmā | hi | rudriyāṇāṁ | śuṣmamugraṁ | marutāṁ | śimīvatām |
viṣṇoreṣasya | mīḻhuṣām |
vi | dvīpāni | pāpatantiṣṭhadducchunobhe | yujanta | rodasī |
pra | dhanvānyairata | śubhrakhādayo | yadejatha | svabhānavaḥ |
acyutā | cidvo | ajmannā | nānadati | parvatāso | vanaspatiḥ |
bhūmiryāmeṣu | rejate |
amāya | vo | maruto | yātave | dyaurjihītottarā | bṛhat |
yatrā | naro | dediśate | tanūṣvā | tvakṣāṁsi | bāhvojasaḥ |
svadhāmanu | śriyaṁ | naro | mahi | tveṣāmavanto | vṛṣapsavaḥ |
vahante | ahrutapsavaḥ |
gobhirvāṇo | ajyate | sobharīṇāṁ | rathe | kośe | hiraṇyaye |
gobandhavaḥ | sujātāseṣe | bhuje | mahānto | naḥ | sparase | nu |
prati | vo | vṛṣadañjayo | vṛṣṇe | śardhāya | mārutāya | bharadhvam |
havyā | vṛṣaprayāvṇe |
vṛṣaṇaśvena | maruto | vṛṣapsunā | rathena | vṛṣanābhinā |
ā | śyenāso | na | pakṣiṇo | vṛthā | naro | havyā | no | vītaye | gata |
samānamañjyeṣāṁ | vi | bhrājante | rukmāso | adhi | bāhuṣu |
davidyutatyṛṣṭayaḥ |
togrāso | vṛṣaṇograbāhavo | nakiṣṭanūṣu | yetire |
sthirā | dhanvānyāyudhā | ratheṣu | vo'nīkeṣvadhi | śriyaḥ |
yeṣāmarṇo | na | sapratho | nāma | tveṣaṁ | śaśvatāmekamidbhuje |
vayo | na | pitryaṁ | sahaḥ |
tānvandasva | marutastām̐ | upa | stuhi | teṣāṁ | hi | dhunīnām |
arāṇāṁ | na | caramastadeṣāṁ | dānā | mahnā | tadeṣām |
subhagaḥ | sa | votiṣvāsa | pūrvāsu | maruto | vyuṣṭiṣu |
yo | vā | nūnamutāsati |
yasya | vā | yūyaṁ | prati | vājino | narā | havyā | vītaye | gatha |
abhi | ṣa | dyumnairuta | vājasātibhiḥ | sumnā | vo | dhūtayo | naśat |
yathā | rudrasya | sūnavo | divo | vaśantyasurasya | vedhasaḥ |
yuvānastathedasat |
ye | cārhanti | marutaḥ | sudānavaḥ | smanmīḻhuṣaścaranti | ye |
ataścidā | nopa | vasyasā | hṛdā | yuvānā | vavṛdhvam |
yūno | ṣu | naviṣṭhayā | vṛṣṇaḥ | pāvakām̐ | abhi | sobhare | girā |
gāya | geva | carkṛṣat |
sāhā | ye | santi | muṣṭiheva | havyo | viśvāsu | pṛtsu | hotṛṣu |
vṛṣṇaścandrānna | suśravastamāngirā | vandasva | maruto | aha |
gāvaścidghā | samanyavaḥ | sajātyena | marutaḥ | sabandhavaḥ |
rihate | kakubho | mithaḥ |
martaścidvo | nṛtavo | rukmavakṣasopa | bhrātṛtvamāyati |
adhi | no | gāta | marutaḥ | sadā | hi | vāpitvamasti | nidhruvi |
maruto | mārutasya | nā | bheṣajasya | vahatā | sudānavaḥ |
yūyaṁ | sakhāyaḥ | saptayaḥ |
yābhiḥ | sindhumavatha | yābhistūrvatha | yābhirdaśasyathā | krivim |
mayo | no | bhūtotibhirmayobhuvaḥ | śivābhirasacadviṣaḥ |
yatsindhau | yadasiknyāṁ | yatsamudreṣu | marutaḥ | subarhiṣaḥ |
yatparvateṣu | bheṣajam |
viśvaṁ | paśyanto | bibhṛthā | tanūṣvā | tenā | no | adhi | vocata |
kṣamā | rapo | marutāturasya | neṣkartā | vihrutaṁ | punaḥ |
vayamu | tvāmapūrvya | sthūraṁ | na | kaccidbharanto'vasyavaḥ |
vāje | citraṁ | havāmahe |
upa | tvā | karmannūtaye | sa | no | yuvograścakrāma | yo | dhṛṣat |
tvāmiddhyavitāraṁ | vavṛmahe | sakhāyendra | sānasim |
ā | yāhīmendavo'śvapate | gopatorvarāpate |
somaṁ | somapate | piba |
vayaṁ | hi | tvā | bandhumantamabandhavo | viprāsendra | yemima |
yā | te | dhāmāni | vṛṣabha | tebhirā | gahi | viśvebhiḥ | somapītaye |
sīdantaste | vayo | yathā | gośrīte | madhau | madire | vivakṣaṇe |
abhi | tvāmindra | nonumaḥ |
acchā | ca | tvainā | namasā | vadāmasi | kiṁ | muhuścidvi | dīdhayaḥ |
santi | kāmāso | harivo | dadiṣṭvaṁ | smo | vayaṁ | santi | no | dhiyaḥ |
nūtnedindra | te | vayamūtī | abhūma | nahi | nū | te | adrivaḥ |
vidmā | purā | parīṇasaḥ |
vidmā | sakhitvamuta | śūra | bhojyamā | te | tā | vajrinnīmahe |
uto | samasminnā | śiśīhi | no | vaso | vāje | suśipra | gomati |
yo | nedamidaṁ | purā | pra | vasyānināya | tamu | vaḥ | stuṣe |
sakhāyendramūtaye |
haryaśvaṁ | satpatiṁ | carṣaṇīsahaṁ | sa | hi | ṣmā | yo | amandata |
ā | tu | naḥ | sa | vayati | gavyamaśvyaṁ | stotṛbhyo | maghavā | śatam |
tvayā | ha | svidyujā | vayaṁ | prati | śvasantaṁ | vṛṣabha | bruvīmahi |
saṁsthe | janasya | gomataḥ |
jayema | kāre | puruhūta | kāriṇo'bhi | tiṣṭhema | dūḍhyaḥ |
nṛbhirvṛtraṁ | hanyāma | śūśuyāma | cāverindra | pra | ṇo | dhiyaḥ |
abhrātṛvyo | anā | tvamanāpirindra | januṣā | sanādasi |
yudhedāpitvamicchase |
nakī | revantaṁ | sakhyāya | vindase | pīyanti | te | surāśvaḥ |
yadā | kṛṇoṣi | nadanuṁ | samūhasyāditpiteva | hūyase |
mā | te | amājuro | yathā | mūrāsendra | sakhye | tvāvataḥ |
ni | ṣadāma | sacā | sute |
mā | te | godatra | nirarāma | rādhasendra | mā | te | gṛhāmahi |
dṛḻhā | cidaryaḥ | pra | mṛśābhyā | bhara | na | te | dāmānādabhe |
indro | vā | ghediyanmaghaṁ | sarasvatī | vā | subhagā | dadirvasu |
tvaṁ | vā | citra | dāśuṣe |
citredrājā | rājakedanyake | yake | sarasvatīmanu |
parjanyeva | tatanaddhi | vṛṣṭyā | sahasramayutā | dadat |
o | tyamahvā | rathamadyā | daṁsiṣṭhamūtaye |
yamaśvinā | suhavā | rudravartanī | ā | sūryāyai | tasthathuḥ |
pūrvāpuṣaṁ | suhavaṁ | puruspṛhaṁ | bhujyuṁ | vājeṣu | pūrvyam |
sacanāvantaṁ | sumatibhiḥ | sobhare | vidveṣasamanehasam |
iha | tyā | purubhūtamā | devā | namobhiraśvinā |
arvācīnā | svavase | karāmahe | gantārā | dāśuṣo | gṛham |
yuvo | rathasya | pari | cakramīyatermānyadvāmiṣaṇyati |
asmām̐ | acchā | sumatirvāṁ | śubhaspatī | ā | dhenuriva | dhāvatu |
ratho | yo | vāṁ | trivandhuro | hiraṇyābhīśuraśvinā |
pari | dyāvāpṛthivī | bhūṣati | śrutastena | nāsatyā | gatam |
daśasyantā | manave | pūrvyaṁ | divi | yavaṁ | vṛkeṇa | karṣathaḥ |
tā | vāmadya | sumatibhiḥ | śubhaspatī | aśvinā | pra | stuvīmahi |
upa | no | vājinīvasū | yātamṛtasya | pathibhiḥ |
yebhistṛkṣiṁ | vṛṣaṇā | trāsadasyavaṁ | mahe | kṣatrāya | jinvathaḥ |
ayaṁ | vāmadribhiḥ | sutaḥ | somo | narā | vṛṣaṇvasū |
ā | yātaṁ | somapītaye | pibataṁ | dāśuṣo | gṛhe |
ā | hi | ruhatamaśvinā | rathe | kośe | hiraṇyaye | vṛṣaṇvasū |
yuñjāthāṁ | pīvarīriṣaḥ |
yābhiḥ | pakthamavatho | yābhiradhriguṁ | yābhirbabhruṁ | vijoṣasam |
tābhirno | makṣū | tūyamaśvinā | gataṁ | bhiṣajyataṁ | yadāturam |
yadadhrigāvo | adhrigū | idā | cidahno | aśvinā | havāmahe |
vayaṁ | gīrbhirvipanyavaḥ |
tābhirā | yātaṁ | vṛṣaṇopa | me | havaṁ | viśvapsuṁ | viśvavāryam |
iṣā | maṁhiṣṭhā | purubhūtamā | narā | yābhiḥ | kriviṁ | vāvṛdhustābhirā | gatam |
tāvidā | cidahānāṁ | tāvaśvinā | vandamānopa | bruve |
to | namobhirīmahe |
tāviddoṣā | toṣasi | śubhaspatī | tā | yāmanrudravartanī |
mā | no | martāya | ripave | vājinīvasū | paro | rudrāvati | khyatam |
ā | sugmyāya | sugmyaṁ | prātā | rathenāśvinā | vā | sakṣaṇī |
huve | piteva | sobharī |
manojavasā | vṛṣaṇā | madacyutā | makṣuṁgamābhirūtibhiḥ |
ārāttāccidbhūtamasme | avase | pūrvībhiḥ | purubhojasā |
ā | no | aśvāvadaśvinā | vartiryāsiṣṭaṁ | madhupātamā | narā |
gomaddasrā | hiraṇyavat |
suprāvargaṁ | suvīryaṁ | suṣṭhu | vāryamanādhṛṣṭaṁ | rakṣasvinā |
asminnā | vāmāyāne | vājinīvasū | viśvā | vāmāni | dhīmahi |
īḻiṣvā | hi | pratīvyaṁ | yajasva | jātavedasam |
cariṣṇudhūmamagṛbhītaśociṣam |
dāmānaṁ | viśvacarṣaṇe'gniṁ | viśvamano | girā |
uta | stuṣe | viṣpardhaso | rathānām |
yeṣāmābādha | ṛgmiyeṣaḥ | pṛkṣaśca | nigrabhe |
upavidā | vahnirvindate | vasu |
udasya | śocirasthāddīdiyuṣo | vyajaram |
tapurjambhasya | sudyuto | gaṇaśriyaḥ |
udu | tiṣṭha | svadhvara | stavāno | devyā | kṛpā |
abhikhyā | bhāsā | bṛhatā | śuśukvaniḥ |
agne | yāhi | suśastibhirhavyā | juhvānānuṣak |
yathā | dūto | babhūtha | havyavāhanaḥ |
agniṁ | vaḥ | pūrvyaṁ | huve | hotāraṁ | carṣaṇīnām |
tamayā | vācā | gṛṇe | tamu | vaḥ | stuṣe |
yajñebhiradbhutakratuṁ | yaṁ | kṛpā | sūdayantet |
mitraṁ | na | jane | sudhitamṛtāvani |
ṛtāvānamṛtāyavo | yajñasya | sādhanaṁ | girā |
upo | enaṁ | jujuṣurnamasaspade |
acchā | no | aṅgirastamaṁ | yajñāso | yantu | saṁyataḥ |
hotā | yo | asti | vikṣvā | yaśastamaḥ |
agne | tava | tye | ajarendhānāso | bṛhadbhāḥ |
aśveva | vṛṣaṇastaviṣīyavaḥ |
sa | tvaṁ | norjāṁ | pate | rayiṁ | rāsva | suvīryam |
prāva | nastoke | tanaye | samatsvā |
yadvo | viśpatiḥ | śitaḥ | suprīto | manuṣo | viśi |
viśvedagniḥ | prati | rakṣāṁsi | sedhati |
śruṣṭyagne | navasya | me | stomasya | vīra | viśpate |
ni | māyinastapuṣā | rakṣaso | daha |
na | tasya | māyayā | cana | ripurīśīta | martyaḥ |
yo | agnaye | dadāśa | havyadātibhiḥ |
vyaśvastvā | vasuvidamukṣaṇyuraprīṇādṛṣiḥ |
maho | rāye | tamu | tvā | samidhīmahi |
uśanā | kāvyastvā | ni | hotāramasādayat |
āyajiṁ | tvā | manave | jātavedasam |
viśve | hi | tvā | sajoṣaso | devāso | dūtamakrata |
śruṣṭī | deva | prathamo | yajñiyo | bhuvaḥ |
imaṁ | ghā | vīro | amṛtaṁ | dūtaṁ | kṛṇvīta | martyaḥ |
pāvakaṁ | kṛṣṇavartaniṁ | vihāyasam |
taṁ | huvema | yatasrucaḥ | subhāsaṁ | śukraśociṣam |
viśāmagnimajaraṁ | pratnamīḍyam |
yo | asmai | havyadātibhirāhutiṁ | marto'vidhat |
bhūri | poṣaṁ | sa | dhatte | vīravadyaśaḥ |
prathamaṁ | jātavedasamagniṁ | yajñeṣu | pūrvyam |
prati | srugeti | namasā | haviṣmatī |
ābhirvidhemāgnaye | jyeṣṭhābhirvyaśvavat |
maṁhiṣṭhābhirmatibhiḥ | śukraśociṣe |
nūnamarca | vihāyase | stomebhiḥ | sthūrayūpavat |
ṛṣe | vaiyaśva | damyāyāgnaye |
atithiṁ | mānuṣāṇāṁ | sūnuṁ | vanaspatīnām |
viprāgnimavase | pratnamīḻate |
maho | viśvām̐ | abhi | ṣato'bhi | havyāni | mānuṣā |
agne | ni | ṣatsi | namasādhi | barhiṣi |
vaṁsvā | no | vāryā | puru | vaṁsva | rāyaḥ | puruspṛhaḥ |
suvīryasya | prajāvato | yaśasvataḥ |
tvaṁ | varo | suṣāmṇe'gne | janāya | codaya |
sadā | vaso | rātiṁ | yaviṣṭha | śaśvate |
tvaṁ | hi | supratūrasi | tvaṁ | no | gomatīriṣaḥ |
maho | rāyaḥ | sātimagne | apā | vṛdhi |
agne | tvaṁ | yaśāsyā | mitrāvaruṇā | vaha |
ṛtāvānā | samrājā | pūtadakṣasā |
sakhāyā | śiṣāmahi | brahmendrāya | vajriṇe |
stuṣo | ṣu | vo | nṛtamāya | dhṛṣṇave |
śavasā | hyasi | śruto | vṛtrahatyena | vṛtrahā |
maghairmaghono | ati | śūra | dāśasi |
sa | naḥ | stavānā | bhara | rayiṁ | citraśravastamam |
nireke | cidyo | harivo | vasurdadiḥ |
ā | nirekamuta | priyamindra | darṣi | janānām |
dhṛṣatā | dhṛṣṇo | stavamānā | bhara |
na | te | savyaṁ | na | dakṣiṇaṁ | hastaṁ | varantāmuraḥ |
na | paribādho | harivo | gaviṣṭiṣu |
ā | tvā | gobhiriva | vrajaṁ | gīrbhirṛṇomyadrivaḥ |
ā | smā | kāmaṁ | jariturā | manaḥ | pṛṇa |
viśvāni | viśvamanaso | dhiyā | no | vṛtrahantama |
ugra | praṇetaradhi | ṣū | vaso | gahi |
vayaṁ | te | asya | vṛtrahanvidyāma | śūra | navyasaḥ |
vasoḥ | spārhasya | puruhūta | rādhasaḥ |
indra | yathā | hyasti | te'parītaṁ | nṛto | śavaḥ |
amṛktā | rātiḥ | puruhūta | dāśuṣe |
ā | vṛṣasva | mahāmaha | mahe | nṛtama | rādhase |
dṛḻhaściddṛhya | maghavanmaghattaye |
nū | anyatrā | cidadrivastvanno | jagmurāśasaḥ |
maghavañchagdhi | tava | tannotibhiḥ |
nahyaṅga | nṛto | tvadanyaṁ | vindāmi | rādhase |
rāye | dyumnāya | śavase | ca | girvaṇaḥ |
endumindrāya | siñcata | pibāti | somyaṁ | madhu |
pra | rādhasā | codayāte | mahitvanā |
upo | harīṇāṁ | patiṁ | dakṣaṁ | pṛñcantamabravam |
nūnaṁ | śrudhi | stuvato | aśvyasya |
nahyaṅga | purā | cana | jajñe | vīratarastvat |
nakī | rāyā | naivathā | na | bhandanā |
edu | madhvo | madintaraṁ | siñca | vādhvaryo | andhasaḥ |
evā | hi | vīraḥ | stavate | sadāvṛdhaḥ |
indra | sthātarharīṇāṁ | nakiṣṭe | pūrvyastutim |
udānaṁśa | śavasā | na | bhandanā |
taṁ | vo | vājānāṁ | patimahūmahi | śravasyavaḥ |
aprāyubhiryajñebhirvāvṛdhenyam |
eto | nvindraṁ | stavāma | sakhāyaḥ | stomyaṁ | naram |
kṛṣṭīryo | viśvābhyastyeka | it |
agorudhāya | gaviṣe | dyukṣāya | dasmyaṁ | vacaḥ |
ghṛtātsvādīyo | madhunaśca | vocata |
yasyāmitāni | vīryā | na | rādhaḥ | paryetave |
jyotirna | viśvamabhyasti | dakṣiṇā |
stuhīndraṁ | vyaśvavadanūrmiṁ | vājinaṁ | yamam |
aryo | gayaṁ | maṁhamānaṁ | vi | dāśuṣe |
evā | nūnamupa | stuhi | vaiyaśva | daśamaṁ | navam |
suvidvāṁsaṁ | carkṛtyaṁ | caraṇīnām |
vetthā | hi | nirṛtīnāṁ | vajrahasta | parivṛjam |
aharahaḥ | śundhyuḥ | paripadāmiva |
tadindrāvā | bhara | yenā | daṁsiṣṭha | kṛtvane |
dvitā | kutsāya | śiśnatho | ni | codaya |
tamu | tvā | nūnamīmahe | navyaṁ | daṁsiṣṭha | sanyase |
sa | tvaṁ | no | viśvābhimātīḥ | sakṣaṇiḥ |
ya | ṛkṣādaṁhaso | mucadyo | vāryātsapta | sindhuṣu |
vadhardāsasya | tuvinṛmṇa | nīnamaḥ |
yathā | varo | suṣāmṇe | sanibhyāvaho | rayim |
vyaśvebhyaḥ | subhage | vājinīvati |
ā | nāryasya | dakṣiṇā | vyaśvām̐ | etu | sominaḥ |
sthūraṁ | ca | rādhaḥ | śatavatsahasravat |
yattvā | pṛcchādījānaḥ | kuhayā | kuhayākṛte |
eṣo | apaśrito | valo | gomatīmava | tiṣṭhati |
tā | vāṁ | viśvasya | gopā | devā | deveṣu | yajñiyā |
ṛtāvānā | yajase | pūtadakṣasā |
mitrā | tanā | na | rathyā | varuṇo | yaśca | sukratuḥ |
sanātsujātā | tanayā | dhṛtavratā |
tā | mātā | viśvavedasāsuryāya | pramahasā |
mahī | jajānāditirṛtāvarī |
mahāntā | mitrāvaruṇā | samrājā | devāvasurā |
ṛtāvānāvṛtamā | ghoṣato | bṛhat |
napātā | śavaso | mahaḥ | sūnū | dakṣasya | sukratū |
sṛpradānū | iṣo | vāstvadhi | kṣitaḥ |
saṁ | yā | dānūni | yemathurdivyāḥ | pārthivīriṣaḥ |
nabhasvatīrā | vāṁ | carantu | vṛṣṭayaḥ |
adhi | yā | bṛhato | divo'bhi | yūtheva | paśyataḥ |
ṛtāvānā | samrājā | namase | hitā |
ṛtāvānā | ni | ṣedatuḥ | sāmrājyāya | sukratū |
dhṛtavratā | kṣatriyā | kṣatramāśatuḥ |
akṣṇaścidgātuvittarānulbaṇena | cakṣasā |
ni | cinmiṣantā | nicirā | ni | cikyatuḥ |
uta | no | devyaditiruruṣyatāṁ | nāsatyā |
uruṣyantu | maruto | vṛddhaśavasaḥ |
te | no | nāvamuruṣyata | divā | naktaṁ | sudānavaḥ |
ariṣyanto | ni | pāyubhiḥ | sacemahi |
aghnate | viṣṇave | vayamariṣyantaḥ | sudānave |
śrudhi | svayāvantsindho | pūrvacittaye |
tadvāryaṁ | vṛṇīmahe | variṣṭhaṁ | gopayatyam |
mitro | yatpānti | varuṇo | yadaryamā |
uta | naḥ | sindhurapāṁ | tanmarutastadaśvinā |
indro | viṣṇurmīḍhvāṁsaḥ | sajoṣasaḥ |
te | hi | ṣmā | vanuṣo | naro'bhimātiṁ | kayasya | cit |
tigmaṁ | na | kṣodaḥ | pratighnanti | bhūrṇayaḥ |
ayameketthā | purūru | caṣṭe | vi | viśpatiḥ |
tasya | vratānyanu | vaścarāmasi |
anu | pūrvāṇyokyā | sāmrājyasya | saścima |
mitrasya | vratā | varuṇasya | dīrghaśrut |
pari | yo | raśminā | divo'ntānmame | pṛthivyāḥ |
ubhe | ā | paprau | rodasī | mahitvā |
udu | ṣya | śaraṇe | divo | jyotirayaṁsta | sūryaḥ |
agnirna | śukraḥ | samidhānāhutaḥ |
vaco | dīrghaprasadmanīśe | vājasya | gomataḥ |
īśe | hi | pitvo'viṣasya | dāvane |
tatsūryaṁ | rodasī | ubhe | doṣā | vastorupa | bruve |
bhojeṣvasmām̐ | abhyuccarā | sadā |
ṛjramukṣaṇyāyane | rajataṁ | harayāṇe |
rathaṁ | yuktamasanāma | suṣāmaṇi |
tā | me | aśvyānāṁ | harīṇāṁ | nitośanā |
uto | nu | kṛtvyānāṁ | nṛvāhasā |
smadabhīśū | kaśāvantā | viprā | naviṣṭhayā | matī |
maho | vājināvarvantā | sacāsanam |
yuvoru | ṣū | rathaṁ | huve | sadhastutyāya | sūriṣu |
atūrtadakṣā | vṛṣaṇā | vṛṣaṇvasū |
yuvaṁ | varo | suṣāmṇe | mahe | tane | nāsatyā |
avobhiryātho | vṛṣaṇā | vṛṣaṇvasū |
tā | vāmadya | havāmahe | havyebhirvājinīvasū |
pūrvīriṣeṣayantāvati | kṣapaḥ |
ā | vāṁ | vāhiṣṭho | aśvinā | ratho | yātu | śruto | narā |
upa | stomānturasya | darśathaḥ | śriye |
juhurāṇā | cidaśvinā | manyethāṁ | vṛṣaṇvasū |
yuvaṁ | hi | rudrā | parṣatho | ati | dviṣaḥ |
dasrā | hi | viśvamānuṣaṅmakṣūbhiḥ | paridīyathaḥ |
dhiyaṁjinvā | madhuvarṇā | śubhaspatī |
upa | no | yātamaśvinā | rāyā | viśvapuṣā | saha |
maghavānā | suvīrāvanapacyutā |
ā | me | asya | pratīvyamindranāsatyā | gatam |
devā | devebhiradya | sacanastamā |
vayaṁ | hi | vāṁ | havāmahokṣaṇyanto | vyaśvavat |
sumatibhirupa | viprāvihā | gatam |
aśvinā | svṛṣe | stuhi | kuvitte | śravato | havam |
nedīyasaḥ | kūḻayātaḥ | paṇīm̐ruta |
vaiyaśvasya | śrutaṁ | naroto | me | asya | vedathaḥ |
sajoṣasā | varuṇo | mitro | aryamā |
yuvādattasya | dhiṣṇyā | yuvānītasya | sūribhiḥ |
aharaharvṛṣaṇa | mahyaṁ | śikṣatam |
yo | vāṁ | yajñebhirāvṛto'dhivastrā | vadhūriva |
saparyantā | śubhe | cakrāte | aśvinā |
yo | vāmuruvyacastamaṁ | ciketati | nṛpāyyam |
vartiraśvinā | pari | yātamasmayū |
asmabhyaṁ | su | vṛṣaṇvasū | yātaṁ | vartirnṛpāyyam |
viṣudruheva | yajñamūhathurgirā |
vāhiṣṭho | vāṁ | havānāṁ | stomo | dūto | huvannarā |
yuvābhyāṁ | bhūtvaśvinā |
yadado | divo | arṇaveṣo | vā | madatho | gṛhe |
śrutaminme | amartyā |
uta | syā | śvetayāvarī | vāhiṣṭhā | vāṁ | nadīnām |
sindhurhiraṇyavartaniḥ |
smadetayā | sukīrtyāśvinā | śvetayā | dhiyā |
vahethe | śubhrayāvānā |
yukṣvā | hi | tvaṁ | rathāsahā | yuvasva | poṣyā | vaso |
ānno | vāyo | madhu | pibāsmākaṁ | savanā | gahi |
tava | vāyavṛtaspate | tvaṣṭurjāmātaradbhuta |
avāṁsyā | vṛṇīmahe |
tvaṣṭurjāmātaraṁ | vayamīśānaṁ | rāyemahe |
sutāvanto | vāyuṁ | dyumnā | janāsaḥ |
vāyo | yāhi | śivā | divo | vahasvā | su | svaśvyam |
vahasva | mahaḥ | pṛthupakṣasā | rathe |
tvāṁ | hi | supsarastamaṁ | nṛṣadaneṣu | hūmahe |
grāvāṇaṁ | nāśvapṛṣṭhaṁ | maṁhanā |
sa | tvaṁ | no | deva | manasā | vāyo | mandāno | agriyaḥ |
kṛdhi | vājām̐ | apo | dhiyaḥ |
agnirukthe | purohito | grāvāṇo | barhiradhvare |
ṛcā | yāmi | maruto | brahmaṇaspatiṁ | devām̐ | avo | vareṇyam |
ā | paśuṁ | gāsi | pṛthivīṁ | vanaspatīnuṣāsā | naktamoṣadhīḥ |
viśve | ca | no | vasavo | viśvavedaso | dhīnāṁ | bhūta | prāvitāraḥ |
pra | sū | naitvadhvaro'gnā | deveṣu | pūrvyaḥ |
ādityeṣu | pra | varuṇe | dhṛtavrate | marutsu | viśvabhānuṣu |
viśve | hi | ṣmā | manave | viśvavedaso | bhuvanvṛdhe | riśādasaḥ |
ariṣṭebhiḥ | pāyubhirviśvavedaso | yantā | no'vṛkaṁ | chardiḥ |
ā | no | adya | samanaso | gantā | viśve | sajoṣasaḥ |
ṛcā | girā | maruto | devyadite | sadane | pastye | mahi |
abhi | priyā | maruto | yā | vo | aśvyā | havyā | mitra | prayāthana |
ā | barhirindro | varuṇasturā | narādityāsaḥ | sadantu | naḥ |
vayaṁ | vo | vṛktabarhiṣo | hitaprayasānuṣak |
sutasomāso | varuṇa | havāmahe | manuṣvadiddhāgnayaḥ |
ā | pra | yāta | maruto | viṣṇo | aśvinā | pūṣanmākīnayā | dhiyā |
indrā | yātu | prathamaḥ | saniṣyubhirvṛṣā | yo | vṛtrahā | gṛṇe |
vi | no | devāso | adruho'cchidraṁ | śarma | yacchata |
na | yaddūrādvasavo | nū | cidantito | varūthamādadharṣati |
asti | hi | vaḥ | sajātyaṁ | riśādaso | devāso | astyāpyam |
pra | ṇaḥ | pūrvasmai | suvitāya | vocata | makṣū | sumnāya | navyase |
idā | hi | vopastutimidā | vāmasya | bhaktaye |
upa | vo | viśvavedaso | namasyurām̐ | asṛkṣyanyāmiva |
udu | ṣya | vaḥ | savitā | supraṇītayo'sthādūrdhvo | vareṇyaḥ |
ni | dvipādaścatuṣpādo | arthino'viśranpatayiṣṇavaḥ |
devaṁdevaṁ | vo'vase | devaṁdevamabhiṣṭaye |
devaṁdevaṁ | huvema | vājasātaye | gṛṇanto | devyā | dhiyā |
devāso | hi | ṣmā | manave | samanyavo | viśve | sākaṁ | sarātayaḥ |
te | no | adya | te | aparaṁ | tuce | tu | no | bhavantu | varivovidaḥ |
pra | vaḥ | śaṁsāmyadruhaḥ | saṁsthopastutīnām |
na | taṁ | dhūrtirvaruṇa | mitra | martyaṁ | yo | vo | dhāmabhyo'vidhat |
pra | sa | kṣayaṁ | tirate | vi | mahīriṣo | yo | vo | varāya | dāśati |
pra | prajābhirjāyate | dharmaṇasparyariṣṭaḥ | sarvaidhate |
ṛte | sa | vindate | yudhaḥ | sugebhiryātyadhvanaḥ |
aryamā | mitro | varuṇaḥ | sarātayo | yaṁ | trāyante | sajoṣasaḥ |
ajre | cidasmai | kṛṇuthā | nyañcanaṁ | durge | cidā | susaraṇam |
eṣā | cidasmādaśaniḥ | paro | nu | sāsredhantī | vi | naśyatu |
yadadya | sūryodyati | priyakṣatrā | ṛtaṁ | dadha |
yannimruci | prabudhi | viśvavedaso | yadvā | madhyaṁdine | divaḥ |
yadvābhipitve | asurā | ṛtaṁ | yate | chardiryema | vi | dāśuṣe |
vayaṁ | tadvo | vasavo | viśvavedasopa | stheyāma | madhyā |
yadadya | sūrodite | yanmadhyaṁdinātuci |
vāmaṁ | dhattha | manave | viśvavedaso | juhvānāya | pracetase |
vayaṁ | tadvaḥ | samrājā | vṛṇīmahe | putro | na | bahupāyyam |
aśyāma | tadādityā | juhvato | haviryena | vasyo'naśāmahai |
ye | triṁśati | trayasparo | devāso | barhirāsadan |
vidannaha | dvitāsanan |
varuṇo | mitro | aryamā | smadrātiṣāco | agnayaḥ |
patnīvanto | vaṣaṭkṛtāḥ |
te | no | gopāpācyāsta | udaktetthā | nyak |
purastātsarvayā | viśā |
yathā | vaśanti | devāstathedasattadeṣāṁ | nakirā | minat |
arāvā | cana | martyaḥ |
saptānāṁ | sapta | ṛṣṭayaḥ | sapta | dyumnānyeṣām |
sapto | adhi | śriyo | dhire |
babhrureko | viṣuṇaḥ | sūnaro | yuvāñjyaṅkte | hiraṇyayam |
yonimekā | sasāda | dyotano'ntardeveṣu | medhiraḥ |
vāśīmeko | bibharti | hastāyasīmantardeveṣu | nidhruviḥ |
vajrameko | bibharti | hastāhitaṁ | tena | vṛtrāṇi | jighnate |
tigmameko | bibharti | hastāyudhaṁ | śucirugro | jalāṣabheṣajaḥ |
pathaikaḥ | pīpāya | taskaro | yathām̐ | eṣa | veda | nidhīnām |
trīṇyekorugāyo | vi | cakrame | yatra | devāso | madanti |
vibhirdvā | carataikayā | saha | pra | pravāseva | vasataḥ |
sado | dvā | cakrāte | upamā | divi | samrājā | sarpirāsutī |
arcantaike | mahi | sāma | manvata | tena | sūryamarocayan |
nahi | vo | astyarbhako | devāso | na | kumārakaḥ |
viśve | satomahāntet |
iti | stutāso | asathā | riśādaso | ye | stha | trayaśca | triṁśacca |
manordevā | yajñiyāsaḥ |
te | nastrādhvaṁ | te'vata | to | no | adhi | vocata |
mā | naḥ | pathaḥ | pitryānmānavādadhi | dūraṁ | naiṣṭa | parāvataḥ |
ye | devāseha | sthana | viśve | vaiśvānarota |
asmabhyaṁ | śarma | sapratho | gave'śvāya | yacchata |
yo | yajāti | yajātetsunavacca | pacāti | ca |
brahmedindrasya | cākanat |
puroḻāśaṁ | yo | asmai | somaṁ | raratāśiram |
pādittaṁ | śakro | aṁhasaḥ |
tasya | dyumām̐ | asadratho | devajūtaḥ | sa | śūśuvat |
viśvā | vanvannamitriyā |
asya | prajāvatī | gṛhe'saścantī | divedive |
iḻā | dhenumatī | duhe |
yā | daṁpatī | samanasā | sunutā | ca | dhāvataḥ |
devāso | nityayāśirā |
prati | prāśavyām̐ | itaḥ | samyañcā | barhirāśāte |
na | tā | vājeṣu | vāyataḥ |
na | devānāmapi | hnutaḥ | sumatiṁ | na | jugukṣataḥ |
śravo | bṛhadvivāsataḥ |
putriṇā | tā | kumāriṇā | viśvamāyurvyaśnutaḥ |
ubhā | hiraṇyapeśasā |
vītihotrā | kṛtadvasū | daśasyantāmṛtāya | kam |
samūdho | romaśaṁ | hato | deveṣu | kṛṇuto | duvaḥ |
ā | śarma | parvatānāṁ | vṛṇīmahe | nadīnām |
ā | viṣṇoḥ | sacābhuvaḥ |
aitu | pūṣā | rayirbhagaḥ | svasti | sarvadhātamaḥ |
ururadhvā | svastaye |
aramatiranarvaṇo | viśvo | devasya | manasā |
ādityānāmanehet |
yathā | no | mitro | aryamā | varuṇaḥ | santi | gopāḥ |
sugā | ṛtasya | panthāḥ |
agniṁ | vaḥ | pūrvyaṁ | girā | devamīḻe | vasūnām |
saparyantaḥ | purupriyaṁ | mitraṁ | na | kṣetrasādhasam |
makṣū | devavato | rathaḥ | śūro | vā | pṛtsu | kāsu | cit |
devānāṁ | yenmano | yajamāneyakṣatyabhīdayajvano | bhuvat |
na | yajamāna | riṣyasi | na | sunvāna | na | devayo |
devānāṁ | yenmano | yajamāneyakṣatyabhīdayajvano | bhuvat |
nakiṣṭaṁ | karmaṇā | naśanna | pra | yoṣanna | yoṣati |
devānāṁ | yenmano | yajamāneyakṣatyabhīdayajvano | bhuvat |
asadatra | suvīryamuta | tyadāśvaśvyam |
devānāṁ | yenmano | yajamāneyakṣatyabhīdayajvano | bhuvat |
pra | kṛtānyṛjīṣiṇaḥ | kaṇvendrasya | gāthayā |
made | somasya | vocata |
yaḥ | sṛbindamanarśaniṁ | pipruṁ | dāsamahīśuvam |
vadhīdugro | riṇannapaḥ |
nyarbudasya | viṣṭapaṁ | varṣmāṇaṁ | bṛhatastira |
kṛṣe | tadindra | pauṁsyam |
prati | śrutāya | vo | dhṛṣattūrṇāśaṁ | na | gireradhi |
huve | suśipramūtaye |
sa | goraśvasya | vi | vrajaṁ | mandānaḥ | somyebhyaḥ |
puraṁ | na | śūra | darṣasi |
yadi | me | rāraṇaḥ | sutokthe | vā | dadhase | canaḥ |
ārādupa | svadhā | gahi |
vayaṁ | ghā | te | api | ṣmasi | stotārendra | girvaṇaḥ |
tvaṁ | no | jinva | somapāḥ |
uta | naḥ | pitumā | bhara | saṁrarāṇo | avikṣitam |
maghavanbhūri | te | vasu |
uta | no | gomataskṛdhi | hiraṇyavato | aśvinaḥ |
iḻābhiḥ | saṁ | rabhemahi |
bṛbadukthaṁ | havāmahe | sṛprakarasnamūtaye |
sādhu | kṛṇvantamavase |
yaḥ | saṁsthe | cicchatakraturādīṁ | kṛṇoti | vṛtrahā |
jaritṛbhyaḥ | purūvasuḥ |
sa | naḥ | śakraścidā | śakaddānavām̐ | antarābharaḥ |
indro | viśvābhirūtibhiḥ |
yo | rāyo'vanirmahāntsupāraḥ | sunvataḥ | sakhā |
tamindramabhi | gāyata |
āyantāraṁ | mahi | sthiraṁ | pṛtanāsu | śravojitam |
bhūrerīśānamojasā |
nakirasya | śacīnāṁ | niyantā | sūnṛtānām |
nakirvaktā | na | dāditi |
na | nūnaṁ | brahmaṇāmṛṇaṁ | prāśūnāmasti | sunvatām |
na | somo | apratā | pape |
panyedupa | gāyata | panyokthāni | śaṁsata |
brahmā | kṛṇota | panyet |
panyā | dardiracchatā | sahasrā | vājyavṛtaḥ |
indro | yo | yajvano | vṛdhaḥ |
vi | ṣū | cara | svadhānu | kṛṣṭīnāmanvāhuvaḥ |
indra | piba | sutānām |
piba | svadhainavānāmuta | yastugrye | sacā |
utāyamindra | yastava |
atīhi | manyuṣāviṇaṁ | suṣuvāṁsamupāraṇe |
imaṁ | rātaṁ | sutaṁ | piba |
ihi | tisraḥ | parāvatehi | pañca | janām̐ | ati |
dhenendrāvacākaśat |
sūryo | raśmiṁ | yathā | sṛjā | tvā | yacchantu | me | giraḥ |
nimnamāpo | na | sadhryak |
adhvaryavā | tu | hi | ṣiñca | somaṁ | vīrāya | śipriṇe |
bharā | sutasya | pītaye |
yodnaḥ | phaligaṁ | bhinannyaksindhūm̐ravāsṛjat |
yo | goṣu | pakvaṁ | dhārayat |
ahanvṛtramṛcīṣamāurṇavābhamahīśuvam |
himenāvidhyadarbudam |
pra | vogrāya | niṣṭure'ṣāḻhāya | prasakṣiṇe |
devattaṁ | brahma | gāyata |
yo | viśvānyabhi | vratā | somasya | made | andhasaḥ |
indro | deveṣu | cetati |
iha | tyā | sadhamādyā | harī | hiraṇyakeśyā |
voḻhāmabhi | prayo | hitam |
arvāñcaṁ | tvā | puruṣṭuta | priyamedhastutā | harī |
somapeyāya | vakṣataḥ |
vayaṁ | gha | tvā | sutāvantāpo | na | vṛktabarhiṣaḥ |
pavitrasya | prasravaṇeṣu | vṛtrahanpari | stotārāsate |
svaranti | tvā | sute | naro | vaso | nirekokthinaḥ |
kadā | sutaṁ | tṛṣāṇauka | ā | gamendra | svabdīva | vaṁsagaḥ |
kaṇvebhirdhṛṣṇavā | dhṛṣadvājaṁ | darṣi | sahasriṇam |
piśaṅgarūpaṁ | maghavanvicarṣaṇe | makṣū | gomantamīmahe |
pāhi | gāyāndhaso | madendrāya | medhyātithe |
yaḥ | saṁmiślo | haryoryaḥ | sute | sacā | vajrī | ratho | hiraṇyayaḥ |
yaḥ | suṣavyaḥ | sudakṣiṇeno | yaḥ | sukraturgṛṇe |
yākaraḥ | sahasrā | yaḥ | śatāmaghendro | yaḥ | pūrbhidāritaḥ |
yo | dhṛṣito | yo'vṛto | yo | asti | śmaśruṣu | śritaḥ |
vibhūtadyumnaścyavanaḥ | puruṣṭutaḥ | kratvā | gauriva | śākinaḥ |
keṁ | veda | sute | sacā | pibantaṁ | kadvayo | dadhe |
ayaṁ | yaḥ | puro | vibhinattyojasā | mandānaḥ | śipryandhasaḥ |
dānā | mṛgo | na | vāraṇaḥ | purutrā | carathaṁ | dadhe |
nakiṣṭvā | ni | yamadā | sute | gamo | mahām̐ścarasyojasā |
yograḥ | sannaniṣṭṛtaḥ | sthiro | raṇāya | saṁskṛtaḥ |
yadi | stoturmaghavā | śṛṇavaddhavaṁ | nendro | yoṣatyā | gamat |
satyamitthā | vṛṣedasi | vṛṣajūtirno'vṛtaḥ |
vṛṣā | hyugra | śṛṇviṣe | parāvati | vṛṣo | arvāvati | śrutaḥ |
vṛṣaṇaste | abhīśavo | vṛṣā | kaśā | hiraṇyayī |
vṛṣā | ratho | maghavanvṛṣaṇā | harī | vṛṣā | tvaṁ | śatakrato |
vṛṣā | sotā | sunotu | te | vṛṣannṛjīpinnā | bhara |
vṛṣā | dadhanve | vṛṣaṇaṁ | nadīṣvā | tubhyaṁ | sthātarharīṇām |
endra | yāhi | pītaye | madhu | śaviṣṭha | somyam |
nāyamacchā | maghavā | śṛṇavadgiro | brahmokthā | ca | sukratuḥ |
vahantu | tvā | ratheṣṭhāmā | harayo | rathayujaḥ |
tiraścidaryaṁ | savanāni | vṛtrahannanyeṣāṁ | yā | śatakrato |
asmākamadyāntamaṁ | stomaṁ | dhiṣva | mahāmaha |
asmākaṁ | te | savanā | santu | śaṁtamā | madāya | dyukṣa | somapāḥ |
nahi | ṣastava | no | mama | śāstre | anyasya | raṇyati |
yo | asmānvīrānayat |
indraścidghā | tadabravītstriyāśāsyaṁ | manaḥ |
uto | aha | kratuṁ | raghum |
saptī | cidghā | madacyutā | mithunā | vahato | ratham |
eveddhūrvṛṣṇottarā |
adhaḥ | paśyasva | mopari | saṁtarāṁ | pādakau | hara |
mā | te | kaśaplakau | dṛśantstrī | hi | brahmā | babhūvitha |
endra | yāhi | haribhirupa | kaṇvasya | suṣṭutim |
divo | amuṣya | śāsato | divaṁ | yaya | divāvaso |
ā | tvā | grāvā | vadanniha | somī | ghoṣeṇa | yacchatu |
divo | amuṣya | śāsato | divaṁ | yaya | divāvaso |

divo | amuṣya | śāsato | divaṁ | yaya | divāvaso |

divo | amuṣya | śāsato | divaṁ | yaya | divāvaso |

divo | amuṣya | śāsato | divaṁ | yaya | divāvaso |

divo | amuṣya | śāsato | divaṁ | yaya | divāvaso |

divo | amuṣya | śāsato | divaṁ | yaya | divāvaso |

divo | amuṣya | śāsato | divaṁ | yaya | divāvaso |

divo | amuṣya | śāsato | divaṁ | yaya | divāvaso |

divo | amuṣya | śāsato | divaṁ | yaya | divāvaso |

ā | naḥ | sahasraśo | bharāyutāni | śatāni | ca |
divo | amuṣya | śāsato | divaṁ | yaya | divāvaso |
ā | yadindraśca | dadvahe | sahasraṁ | vasurociṣaḥ |
ojiṣṭhamaśvyaṁ | paśum |
ya | ṛjrā | vātaraṁhaso'ruṣāso | raghuṣyadaḥ |
bhrājante | sūryeva |
pārāvatasya | rātiṣu | dravaccakreṣvāśuṣu |
tiṣṭhaṁ | vanasya | madhyā |
agninendreṇa | varuṇena | viṣṇunādityai | rudrairvasubhiḥ | sacābhuvā |
sajoṣasoṣasā | sūryeṇa | ca | somaṁ | pibatamaśvinā |
viśvābhirdhībhirbhuvanena | vājinā | divā | pṛthivyādribhiḥ | sacābhuvā |
sajoṣasoṣasā | sūryeṇa | ca | somaṁ | pibatamaśvinā |
viśvairdevaistribhirekādaśairihādbhirmarudbhirbhṛgubhiḥ | sacābhuvā |
sajoṣasoṣasā | sūryeṇa | ca | somaṁ | pibatamaśvinā |
juṣethāṁ | yajñaṁ | bodhataṁ | havasya | me | viśveha | devau | savanāva | gacchatam |
sajoṣasoṣasā | sūryeṇa | ceṣaṁ | no | voḻhamaśvinā |
stomaṁ | juṣethāṁ | yuvaśeva | kanyanāṁ | viśveha | devau | savanāva | gacchatam |
sajoṣasoṣasā | sūryeṇa | ceṣaṁ | no | voḻhamaśvinā |
giro | juṣethāmadhvaraṁ | juṣethāṁ | viśveha | devau | savanāva | gacchatam |
sajoṣasoṣasā | sūryeṇa | ceṣaṁ | no | voḻhamaśvinā |
hāridraveva | patatho | vanedupa | somaṁ | sutaṁ | mahiṣevāva | gacchathaḥ |
sajoṣasoṣasā | sūryeṇa | ca | trirvartiryātamaśvinā |
haṁsāviva | patatho | adhvagāviva | somaṁ | sutaṁ | mahiṣevāva | gacchathaḥ |
sajoṣasoṣasā | sūryeṇa | ca | trirvartiryātamaśvinā |
śyenāviva | patatho | havyadātaye | somaṁ | sutaṁ | mahiṣevāva | gacchathaḥ |
sajoṣasoṣasā | sūryeṇa | ca | trirvartiryātamaśvinā |
pibataṁ | ca | tṛpṇutaṁ | cā | ca | gacchataṁ | prajāṁ | ca | dhattaṁ | draviṇaṁ | ca | dhattam |
sajoṣasoṣasā | sūryeṇa | corjaṁ | no | dhattamaśvinā |
jayataṁ | ca | pra | stutaṁ | ca | pra | cāvataṁ | prajāṁ | ca | dhattaṁ | draviṇaṁ | ca | dhattam |
sajoṣasoṣasā | sūryeṇa | corjaṁ | no | dhattamaśvinā |
hataṁ | ca | śatrūnyatataṁ | ca | mitriṇaḥ | prajāṁ | ca | dhattaṁ | draviṇaṁ | ca | dhattam |
sajoṣasoṣasā | sūryeṇa | corjaṁ | no | dhattamaśvinā |
mitrāvaruṇavantota | dharmavantā | marutvantā | jariturgacchatho | havam |
sajoṣasoṣasā | sūryeṇa | cādityairyātamaśvinā |
aṅgirasvantota | viṣṇuvantā | marutvantā | jariturgacchatho | havam |
sajoṣasoṣasā | sūryeṇa | cādityairyātamaśvinā |
ṛbhumantā | vṛṣaṇā | vājavantā | marutvantā | jariturgacchatho | havam |
sajoṣasoṣasā | sūryeṇa | cādityairyātamaśvinā |
brahma | jinvatamuta | jinvataṁ | dhiyo | hataṁ | rakṣāṁsi | sedhatamamīvāḥ |
sajoṣasoṣasā | sūryeṇa | ca | somaṁ | sunvato | aśvinā |
kṣatraṁ | jinvatamuta | jinvataṁ | nṝnhataṁ | rakṣāṁsi | sedhatamamīvāḥ |
sajoṣasoṣasā | sūryeṇa | ca | somaṁ | sunvato | aśvinā |
dhenūrjinvatamuta | jinvataṁ | viśo | hataṁ | rakṣāṁsi | sedhatamamīvāḥ |
sajoṣasoṣasā | sūryeṇa | ca | somaṁ | sunvato | aśvinā |
atreriva | śṛṇutaṁ | pūrvyastutiṁ | śyāvāśvasya | sunvato | madacyutā |
sajoṣasoṣasā | sūryeṇa | cāśvinā | tiroahnyam |
sargām̐ | iva | sṛjataṁ | suṣṭutīrupa | śyāvāśvasya | sunvato | madacyutā |
sajoṣasoṣasā | sūryeṇa | cāśvinā | tiroahnyam |
raśmīm̐riva | yacchatamadhvarām̐ | upa | śyāvāśvasya | sunvato | madacyutā |
sajoṣasoṣasā | sūryeṇa | cāśvinā | tiroahnyam |
arvāgrathaṁ | ni | yacchataṁ | pibataṁ | somyaṁ | madhu |
ā | yātamaśvinā | gatamavasyurvāmahaṁ | huve | dhattaṁ | ratnāni | dāśuṣe |
namovāke | prasthite | adhvare | narā | vivakṣaṇasya | pītaye |
ā | yātamaśvinā | gatamavasyurvāmahaṁ | huve | dhattaṁ | ratnāni | dāśuṣe |
svāhākṛtasya | tṛmpataṁ | sutasya | devāvandhasaḥ |
ā | yātamaśvinā | gatamavasyurvāmahaṁ | huve | dhattaṁ | ratnāni | dāśuṣe |
avitāsi | sunvato | vṛktabarhiṣaḥ | pibā | somaṁ | madāya | kaṁ | śatakrato |
yaṁ | te | bhāgamadhārayanviśvāḥ | sehānaḥ | pṛtanoru | jrayaḥ | samapsujinmarutvām̐ | indra | satpate |
prāva | stotāraṁ | maghavannava | tvāṁ | pibā | somaṁ | madāya | kaṁ | śatakrato |
yaṁ | te | bhāgamadhārayanviśvāḥ | sehānaḥ | pṛtanoru | jrayaḥ | samapsujinmarutvām̐ | indra | satpate |

yaṁ | te | bhāgamadhārayanviśvāḥ | sehānaḥ | pṛtanoru | jrayaḥ | samapsujinmarutvām̐ | indra | satpate |
janitā | divo | janitā | pṛthivyāḥ | pibā | somaṁ | madāya | kaṁ | śatakrato |
yaṁ | te | bhāgamadhārayanviśvāḥ | sehānaḥ | pṛtanoru | jrayaḥ | samapsujinmarutvām̐ | indra | satpate |

śyāvāśvasya | sunvatastathā | śṛṇu | yathāśṛṇoratreḥ | karmāṇi | kṛṇvataḥ |
pra | trasadasyumāvitha | tvamekennṛṣāhya | indra | brahmāṇi | vardhayan |
predaṁ | brahma | vṛtratūryeṣvāvitha | pra | sunvataḥ | śacīpatendra | viśvābhirūtibhiḥ |
mādhyaṁdinasya | savanasya | vṛtrahannanedya | pibā | somasya | vajrivaḥ |
sehānogra | pṛtanābhi | druhaḥ | śacīpatendra | viśvābhirūtibhiḥ |
mādhyaṁdinasya | savanasya | vṛtrahannanedya | pibā | somasya | vajrivaḥ |
ekarāḻasya | bhuvanasya | rājasi | śacīpatendra | viśvābhirūtibhiḥ |
mādhyaṁdinasya | savanasya | vṛtrahannanedya | pibā | somasya | vajrivaḥ |
sasthāvānā | yavayasi | tvamekecchacīpata | indra | viśvābhirūtibhiḥ |
