kṣemasya | ca | prayujaśca | tvamīśiṣe | śacīpatendra | viśvābhirūtibhiḥ |
mādhyaṁdinasya | savanasya | vṛtrahannanedya | pibā | somasya | vajrivaḥ |
kṣatrāya | tvamavasi | na | tvamāvitha | śacīpatendra | viśvābhirūtibhiḥ |
mādhyaṁdinasya | savanasya | vṛtrahannanedya | pibā | somasya | vajrivaḥ |
śyāvāśvasya | rebhatastathā | śṛṇu | yathāśṛṇoratreḥ | karmāṇi | kṛṇvataḥ |
pra | trasadasyumāvitha | tvamekennṛṣāhya | indra | kṣatrāṇi | vardhayan |
yajñasya | hi | stha | ṛtvijā | sasnī | vājeṣu | karmasu |
indrāgnī | tasya | bodhatam |
tośāsā | rathayāvānā | vṛtrahaṇāparājitā |
indrāgnī | tasya | bodhatam |
idaṁ | vāṁ | madiraṁ | madhvadhukṣannadribhirnaraḥ |
indrāgnī | tasya | bodhatam |
juṣethāṁ | yajñamiṣṭaye | sutaṁ | somaṁ | sadhastutī |
indrāgnī | ā | gataṁ | narā |
imā | juṣethāṁ | savanā | yebhirhavyānyūhathuḥ |
indrāgnī | ā | gataṁ | narā |
imāṁ | gāyatravartaniṁ | juṣethāṁ | suṣṭutiṁ | mama |
indrāgnī | ā | gataṁ | narā |
prātaryāvabhirā | gataṁ | devebhirjenyāvasū |
indrāgnī | somapītaye |
śyāvāśvasya | sunvato'trīṇāṁ | śṛṇutaṁ | havam |
indrāgnī | somapītaye |
evā | vāmahvotaye | yathāhuvanta | medhirāḥ |
indrāgnī | somapītaye |
āhaṁ | sarasvatīvatorindrāgnyoravo | vṛṇe |
yābhyāṁ | gāyatramṛcyate |
agnimastoṣyṛgmiyamagnimīḻā | yajadhyai |
agnirdevām̐ | anaktu | nobhe | hi | vidathe | kavirantaścarati | dūtyaṁ | nabhantāmanyake | same |
nyagne | navyasā | vacastanūṣu | śaṁsameṣām |
nyarātī | rarāvṇāṁ | viśvāryo | arātīrito | yucchantvāmuro | nabhantāmanyake | same |
agne | manmāni | tubhyaṁ | kaṁ | ghṛtaṁ | na | juhvāsani |
sa | deveṣu | pra | cikiddhi | tvaṁ | hyasi | pūrvyaḥ | śivo | dūto | vivasvato | nabhantāmanyake | same |
tattadagnirvayo | dadhe | yathāyathā | kṛpaṇyati |
ūrjāhutirvasūnāṁ | śaṁ | ca | yośca | mayo | dadhe | viśvasyai | devahūtyai | nabhantāmanyake | same |
sa | ciketa | sahīyasāgniścitreṇa | karmaṇā |
sa | hotā | śaśvatīnāṁ | dakṣiṇābhirabhīvṛtenoti | ca | pratīvyaṁ | nabhantāmanyake | same |
agnirjātā | devānāmagnirveda | martānāmapīcyam |
agniḥ | sa | draviṇodāgnirdvārā | vyūrṇute | svāhuto | navīyasā | nabhantāmanyake | same |
agnirdeveṣu | saṁvasuḥ | sa | vikṣu | yajñiyāsvā |
sa | mudā | kāvyā | puru | viśvaṁ | bhūmeva | puṣyati | devo | deveṣu | yajñiyo | nabhantāmanyake | same |
yo | agniḥ | saptamānuṣaḥ | śrito | viśveṣu | sindhuṣu |
tamāganma | tripastyaṁ | mandhāturdasyuhantamamagniṁ | yajñeṣu | pūrvyaṁ | nabhantāmanyake | same |
agnistrīṇi | tridhātūnyā | kṣeti | vidathā | kaviḥ |
sa | trīm̐rekādaśām̐ | iha | yakṣacca | piprayacca | no | vipro | dūtaḥ | pariṣkṛto | nabhantāmanyake | same |
tvaṁ | no | agnāyuṣu | tvaṁ | deveṣu | pūrvya | vasvaika | irajyasi |
tvāmāpaḥ | parisrutaḥ | pari | yanti | svasetavo | nabhantāmanyake | same |
indrāgnī | yuvaṁ | su | naḥ | sahantā | dāsatho | rayim |
yena | dṛḻhā | samatsvā | vīḻu | citsāhiṣīmahyagnirvaneva | vātennabhantāmanyake | same |
nahi | vāṁ | vavrayāmahe'thendramidyajāmahe | śaviṣṭhaṁ | nṛṇāṁ | naram |
sa | naḥ | kadā | cidarvatā | gamadā | vājasātaye | gamadā | medhasātaye | nabhantāmanyake | same |
tā | hi | madhyaṁ | bharāṇāmindrāgnī | adhikṣitaḥ |
to | kavitvanā | kavī | pṛcchyamānā | sakhīyate | saṁ | dhītamaśnutaṁ | narā | nabhantāmanyake | same |
abhyarca | nabhākavadindrāgnī | yajasā | girā |
yayorviśvamidaṁ | jagadiyaṁ | dyauḥ | pṛthivī | mahyupasthe | bibhṛto | vasu | nabhantāmanyake | same |
pra | brahmāṇi | nabhākavadindrāgnibhyāmirajyata |
yā | saptabudhnamarṇavaṁ | jihmabāramaporṇutendra | īśānaujasā | nabhantāmanyake | same |
api | vṛśca | purāṇavadvratateriva | guṣpitamojo | dāsasya | dambhaya |
vayaṁ | tadasya | saṁbhṛtaṁ | vasvindreṇa | vi | bhajemahi | nabhantāmanyake | same |
yadindrāgnī | janeme | vihvayante | tanā | girā |
asmākebhirnṛbhirvayaṁ | sāsahyāma | pṛtanyato | vanuyāma | vanuṣyato | nabhantāmanyake | same |
yā | nu | śvetāvavo | divoccarāta | upa | dyubhiḥ |
indrāgnyoranu | vratamuhānā | yanti | sindhavo | yāntsīṁ | bandhādamuñcatāṁ | nabhantāmanyake | same |
pūrvīṣṭendropamātayaḥ | pūrvīruta | praśastayaḥ | sūno | hinvasya | harivaḥ |
vasvo | vīrasyāpṛco | yā | nu | sādhanta | no | dhiyo | nabhantāmanyake | same |
taṁ | śiśītā | suvṛktibhistveṣaṁ | satvānamṛgmiyam |
uto | nu | cidyaujasā | śuṣṇasyāṇḍāni | bhedati | jeṣatsvarvatīrapo | nabhantāmanyake | same |
taṁ | śiśītā | svadhvaraṁ | satyaṁ | satvānamṛtviyam |
uto | nu | cidyauhata | āṇḍā | śuṣṇasya | bhedatyajaiḥ | svarvatīrapo | nabhantāmanyake | same |
evendrāgnibhyāṁ | pitṛvannavīyo | mandhātṛvadaṅgirasvadavāci |
tridhātunā | śarmaṇā | pātamasmānvayaṁ | syāma | patayo | rayīṇām |
asmo | ṣu | prabhūtaye | varuṇāya | marudbhyo'rcā | viduṣṭarebhyaḥ |
yo | dhītā | mānuṣāṇāṁ | paśvo | geva | rakṣati | nabhantāmanyake | same |
tamū | ṣu | samanā | girā | pitṝṇāṁ | ca | manmabhiḥ |
nābhākasya | praśastibhiryaḥ | sindhūnāmupodaye | saptasvasā | sa | madhyamo | nabhantāmanyake | same |
sa | kṣapaḥ | pari | ṣasvaje | nyusro | māyayā | dadhe | sa | viśvaṁ | pari | darśataḥ |
tasya | venīranu | vratamuṣastisro | avardhayannabhantāmanyake | same |
yaḥ | kakubho | nidhārayaḥ | pṛthivyāmadhi | darśataḥ |
sa | mātā | pūrvyaṁ | padaṁ | tadvaruṇasya | saptyaṁ | sa | hi | gopeveryo | nabhantāmanyake | same |
yo | dhartā | bhuvanānāṁ | yosrāṇāmapīcyā | veda | nāmāni | guhyā |
sa | kaviḥ | kāvyā | puru | rūpaṁ | dyauriva | puṣyati | nabhantāmanyake | same |
yasminviśvāni | kāvyā | cakre | nābhiriva | śritā |
tritaṁ | jūtī | saparyata | vraje | gāvo | na | saṁyuje | yuje | aśvām̐ | ayukṣata | nabhantāmanyake | same |
yāsvatka | āśaye | viśvā | jātānyeṣām |
pari | dhāmāni | marmṛśadvaruṇasya | puro | gaye | viśve | devānu | vrataṁ | nabhantāmanyake | same |
sa | samudro | apīcyasturo | dyāmiva | rohati | ni | yadāsu | yajurdadhe |
sa | māyārcinā | padāstṛṇānnākamāruhannabhantāmanyake | same |
yasya | śvetā | vicakṣaṇā | tisro | bhūmīradhikṣitaḥ |
triruttarāṇi | papraturvaruṇasya | dhruvaṁ | sadaḥ | sa | saptānāmirajyati | nabhantāmanyake | same |
yaḥ | śvetām̐ | adhinirṇijaścakre | kṛṣṇām̐ | anu | vratā |
sa | dhāma | pūrvyaṁ | mame | yaḥ | skambhena | vi | rodasī | ajo | na | dyāmadhārayannabhantāmanyake | same |
astabhnāddyāmasuro | viśvavedāmimīta | varimāṇaṁ | pṛthivyāḥ |
āsīdadviśvā | bhuvanāni | samrāḍviśvettāni | varuṇasya | vratāni |
evā | vandasva | varuṇaṁ | bṛhantaṁ | namasyā | dhīramamṛtasya | gopām |
sa | naḥ | śarma | trivarūthaṁ | vi | yaṁsatpātaṁ | no | dyāvāpṛthivī | upasthe |
imāṁ | dhiyaṁ | śikṣamāṇasya | deva | kratuṁ | dakṣaṁ | varuṇa | saṁ | śiśādhi |
yayāti | viśvā | duritā | tarema | sutarmāṇamadhi | nāvaṁ | ruhema |
ā | vāṁ | grāvāṇo | aśvinā | dhībhirviprācucyavuḥ |
nāsatyā | somapītaye | nabhantāmanyake | same |
yathā | vāmatriraśvinā | gīrbhirvipro | ajohavīt |
nāsatyā | somapītaye | nabhantāmanyake | same |
evā | vāmahvotaye | yathāhuvanta | medhirāḥ |
nāsatyā | somapītaye | nabhantāmanyake | same |
ime | viprasya | vedhaso'gnerastṛtayajvanaḥ |
giraḥ | stomāserate |
asmai | te | pratiharyate | jātavedo | vicarṣaṇe |
agne | janāmi | suṣṭutim |
ārokeva | ghedaha | tigmāgne | tava | tviṣaḥ |
dadbhirvanāni | bapsati |
harayo | dhūmaketavo | vātajūtopa | dyavi |
yatante | vṛthagagnayaḥ |
ete | tye | vṛthagagnayeddhāsaḥ | samadṛkṣata |
uṣasāmiva | ketavaḥ |
kṛṣṇā | rajāṁsi | patsutaḥ | prayāṇe | jātavedasaḥ |
agniryadrodhati | kṣami |
dhāsiṁ | kṛṇvānauṣadhīrbapsadagnirna | vāyati |
punaryantaruṇīrapi |
jihvābhiraha | nannamadarciṣā | jañjaṇābhavan |
agnirvaneṣu | rocate |
apsvagne | sadhiṣṭava | sauṣadhīranu | rudhyase |
garbhe | sañjāyase | punaḥ |
udagne | tava | tadghṛtādarcī | rocatāhutam |
niṁsānaṁ | juhvo | mukhe |
ukṣānnāya | vaśānnāya | somapṛṣṭhāya | vedhase |
stomairvidhemāgnaye |
uta | tvā | namasā | vayaṁ | hotarvareṇyakrato |
agne | samidbhirīmahe |
uta | tvā | bhṛguvacchuce | manuṣvadagnāhuta |
aṅgirasvaddhavāmahe |
tvaṁ | hyagne | agninā | vipro | vipreṇa | santsatā |
sakhā | sakhyā | samidhyase |
sa | tvaṁ | viprāya | dāśuṣe | rayiṁ | dehi | sahasriṇam |
agne | vīravatīmiṣam |
agne | bhrātaḥ | sahaskṛta | rohidaśva | śucivrata |
imaṁ | stomaṁ | juṣasva | me |
uta | tvāgne | mama | stuto | vāśrāya | pratiharyate |
goṣṭhaṁ | gāvevāśata |
tubhyaṁ | tāṅgirastama | viśvāḥ | sukṣitayaḥ | pṛthak |
agne | kāmāya | yemire |
agniṁ | dhībhirmanīṣiṇo | medhirāso | vipaścitaḥ |
admasadyāya | hinvire |
taṁ | tvāmajmeṣu | vājinaṁ | tanvānāgne | adhvaram |
vahniṁ | hotāramīḻate |
purutrā | hi | sadṛṅṅasi | viśo | viśvānu | prabhuḥ |
samatsu | tvā | havāmahe |
tamīḻiṣva | yāhuto'gnirvibhrājate | ghṛtaiḥ |
imaṁ | naḥ | śṛṇavaddhavam |
taṁ | tvā | vayaṁ | havāmahe | śṛṇvantaṁ | jātavedasam |
agne | ghnantamapa | dviṣaḥ |
viśāṁ | rājānamadbhutamadhyakṣaṁ | dharmaṇāmimam |
agnimīḻe | so | śravat |
agniṁ | viśvāyuvepasaṁ | maryaṁ | na | vājinaṁ | hitam |
saptiṁ | na | vājayāmasi |
ghnanmṛdhrāṇyapa | dviṣo | dahanrakṣāṁsi | viśvahā |
agne | tigmena | dīdihi |
yaṁ | tvā | janāsendhate | manuṣvadaṅgirastama |
agne | sa | bodhi | me | vacaḥ |
yadagne | divijāsyapsujā | vā | sahaskṛta |
taṁ | tvā | gīrbhirhavāmahe |
tubhyaṁ | ghette | janeme | viśvāḥ | sukṣitayaḥ | pṛthak |
dhāsiṁ | hinvantyattave |
te | ghedagne | svādhyo'hā | viśvā | nṛcakṣasaḥ |
tarantaḥ | syāma | durgahā |
agniṁ | mandraṁ | purupriyaṁ | śīraṁ | pāvakaśociṣam |
hṛdbhirmandrebhirīmahe |
sa | tvamagne | vibhāvasuḥ | sṛjantsūryo | na | raśmibhiḥ |
śardhantamāṁsi | jighnase |
tatte | sahasvemahe | dātraṁ | yannopadasyati |
tvadagne | vāryaṁ | vasu |
samidhāgniṁ | duvasyata | ghṛtairbodhayatātithim |
āsminhavyā | juhotana |
agne | stomaṁ | juṣasva | me | vardhasvānena | manmanā |
prati | sūktāni | harya | naḥ |
agniṁ | dūtaṁ | puro | dadhe | havyavāhamupa | bruve |
devām̐ | ā | sādayādiha |
utte | bṛhanto | arcayaḥ | samidhānasya | dīdivaḥ |
agne | śukrāserate |
upa | tvā | juhvo | mama | ghṛtācīryantu | haryata |
agne | havyā | juṣasva | naḥ |
mandraṁ | hotāramṛtvijaṁ | citrabhānuṁ | vibhāvasum |
agnimīḻe | so | śravat |
pratnaṁ | hotāramīḍyaṁ | juṣṭamagniṁ | kavikratum |
adhvarāṇāmabhiśriyam |
juṣāṇo | aṅgirastamemā | havyānyānuṣak |
agne | yajñaṁ | naya | ṛtuthā |
samidhāno | santya | śukraśocehā | vaha |
cikitvāndaivyaṁ | janam |
vipraṁ | hotāramadruhaṁ | dhūmaketuṁ | vibhāvasum |
yajñānāṁ | ketumīmahe |
agne | ni | pāhi | nastvaṁ | prati | ṣma | deva | rīṣataḥ |
bhindhi | dveṣaḥ | sahaskṛta |
agniḥ | pratnena | manmanā | śumbhānastanvaṁ | svām |
kavirvipreṇa | vāvṛdhe |
ūrjo | napātamā | huve'gniṁ | pāvakaśociṣam |
asminyajñe | svadhvare |
sa | no | mitramahastvamagne | śukreṇa | śociṣā |
devairā | satsi | barhiṣi |
yo | agniṁ | tanvo | dame | devaṁ | martaḥ | saparyati |
tasmeddīdayadvasu |
agnirmūrdhā | divaḥ | kakutpatiḥ | pṛthivyāyam |
apāṁ | retāṁsi | jinvati |
udagne | śucayastava | śukrā | bhrājanterate |
tava | jyotīṁṣyarcayaḥ |
īśiṣe | vāryasya | hi | dātrasyāgne | svarpatiḥ |
stotā | syāṁ | tava | śarmaṇi |
tvāmagne | manīṣiṇastvāṁ | hinvanti | cittibhiḥ |
tvāṁ | vardhantu | no | giraḥ |
adabdhasya | svadhāvato | dūtasya | rebhataḥ | sadā |
agneḥ | sakhyaṁ | vṛṇīmahe |
agniḥ | śucivratatamaḥ | śucirvipraḥ | śuciḥ | kaviḥ |
śucī | rocatāhutaḥ |
uta | tvā | dhītayo | mama | giro | vardhantu | viśvahā |
agne | sakhyasya | bodhi | naḥ |
yadagne | syāmahaṁ | tvaṁ | tvaṁ | vā | ghā | syāham |
syuṣṭe | satyehāśiṣaḥ |
vasurvasupatirhi | kamasyagne | vibhāvasuḥ |
syāma | te | sumatāvapi |
agne | dhṛtavratāya | te | samudrāyeva | sindhavaḥ |
giro | vāśrāserate |
yuvānaṁ | viśpatiṁ | kaviṁ | viśvādaṁ | puruvepasam |
agniṁ | śumbhāmi | manmabhiḥ |
yajñānāṁ | rathye | vayaṁ | tigmajambhāya | vīḻave |
stomairiṣemāgnaye |
ayamagne | tve | api | jaritā | bhūtu | santya |
tasmai | pāvaka | mṛḻaya |
dhīro | hyasyadmasadvipro | na | jāgṛviḥ | sadā |
agne | dīdayasi | dyavi |
purāgne | duritebhyaḥ | purā | mṛdhrebhyaḥ | kave |
pra | ṇāyurvaso | tira |
ā | ghā | ye | agnimindhate | stṛṇanti | barhirānuṣak |
yeṣāmindro | yuvā | sakhā |
bṛhannididhmaiṣāṁ | bhūri | śastaṁ | pṛthuḥ | svaruḥ |
yeṣāmindro | yuvā | sakhā |
ayuddhedyudhā | vṛtaṁ | śūrājati | satvabhiḥ |
yeṣāmindro | yuvā | sakhā |
ā | bundaṁ | vṛtrahā | dade | jātaḥ | pṛcchadvi | mātaram |
kogrāḥ | ke | ha | śṛṇvire |
prati | tvā | śavasī | vadadgirāvapso | na | yodhiṣat |
yaste | śatrutvamācake |
uta | tvaṁ | maghavañchṛṇu | yaste | vaṣṭi | vavakṣi | tat |
yadvīḻayāsi | vīḻu | tat |
yadājiṁ | yātyājikṛdindraḥ | svaśvayurupa |
rathītamo | rathinām |
vi | ṣu | viśvābhiyujo | vajrinviṣvagyathā | vṛha |
bhavā | naḥ | suśravastamaḥ |
asmākaṁ | su | rathaṁ | purendraḥ | kṛṇotu | sātaye |
na | yaṁ | dhūrvanti | dhūrtayaḥ |
vṛjyāma | te | pari | dviṣo'raṁ | te | śakra | dāvane |
gamemedindra | gomataḥ |
śanaiścidyanto | adrivo'śvāvantaḥ | śatagvinaḥ |
vivakṣaṇānehasaḥ |
ūrdhvā | hi | te | divedive | sahasrā | sūnṛtā | śatā |
jaritṛbhyo | vimaṁhate |
vidmā | hi | tvā | dhanaṁjayamindra | dṛḻhā | cidārujam |
ā-dāriṇaṁ | yathā | gayam |
kakuhaṁ | cittvā | kave | mandantu | dhṛṣṇavindavaḥ |
ā | tvā | paṇiṁ | yadīmahe |
yaste | revām̐ | adāśuriḥ | pramamarṣa | maghattaye |
tasya | no | vedā | bhara |
imo | tvā | vi | cakṣate | sakhāyendra | sominaḥ |
puṣṭāvanto | yathā | paśum |
uta | tvābadhiraṁ | vayaṁ | śrutkarṇaṁ | santamūtaye |
dūrādiha | havāmahe |
yacchuśrūyemaṁ | havaṁ | durmarṣaṁ | cakriyota |
bhaverāpirno | antamaḥ |
yacciddhi | te | api | vyathirjaganvāṁso | amanmahi |
godedindra | bodhi | naḥ |
ā | tvā | rambhaṁ | na | jivrayo | rarabhmā | śavasaspate |
uśmasi | tvā | sadhasthā |
stotramindrāya | gāyata | purunṛmṇāya | satvane |
nakiryaṁ | vṛṇvate | yudhi |
abhi | tvā | vṛṣabhā | sute | sutaṁ | sṛjāmi | pītaye |
tṛmpā | vyaśnuhī | madam |
mā | tvā | mūrāviṣyavo | mopahasvānā | dabhan |
mākīṁ | brahmadviṣo | vanaḥ |
iha | tvā | goparīṇasā | mahe | mandantu | rādhase |
saro | gauro | yathā | piba |
yā | vṛtrahā | parāvati | sanā | navā | ca | cucyuve |
tā | saṁsatsu | pra | vocata |
apibatkadruvaḥ | sutamindraḥ | sahasrabāhve |
atrādediṣṭa | pauṁsyam |
satyaṁ | tatturvaśe | yadau | vidāno | ahnavāyyam |
vyānaṭ | turvaṇe | śami |
taraṇiṁ | vo | janānāṁ | tradaṁ | vājasya | gomataḥ |
samānamu | pra | śaṁsiṣam |
ṛbhukṣaṇaṁ | na | vartavoktheṣu | tugryāvṛdham |
indraṁ | some | sacā | sute |
yaḥ | kṛntadidvi | yonyaṁ | triśokāya | giriṁ | pṛthum |
gobhyo | gātuṁ | niretave |
yaddadhiṣe | manasyasi | mandānaḥ | prediyakṣasi |
mā | tatkarindra | mṛḻaya |
dabhraṁ | ciddhi | tvāvataḥ | kṛtaṁ | śṛṇve | adhi | kṣami |
jigātvindra | te | manaḥ |
tavedu | tāḥ | sukīrtayo'sannuta | praśastayaḥ |
yadindra | mṛḻayāsi | naḥ |
mā | naikasminnāgasi | mā | dvayoruta | triṣu |
vadhīrmā | śūra | bhūriṣu |
bibhayā | hi | tvāvatogrādabhiprabhaṅgiṇaḥ |
dasmādahamṛtīṣahaḥ |
mā | sakhyuḥ | śūnamā | vide | mā | putrasya | prabhūvaso |
āvṛtvadbhūtu | te | manaḥ |
ko | nu | maryāmithitaḥ | sakhā | sakhāyamabravīt |
jahā | ko | asmadīṣate |
evāre | vṛṣabhā | sute'sinvanbhūryāvayaḥ |
śvaghnīva | nivatā | caran |
ā | taitā | vacoyujā | harī | gṛbhṇe | sumadrathā |
yadīṁ | brahmabhyeddadaḥ |
bhindhi | viśvāpa | dviṣaḥ | pari | bādho | jahī | mṛdhaḥ |
vasu | spārhaṁ | tadā | bhara |
yadvīḻāvindra | yatsthire | yatparśāne | parābhṛtam |
vasu | spārhaṁ | tadā | bhara |
yasya | te | viśvamānuṣo | bhūrerdattasya | vedati |
vasu | spārhaṁ | tadā | bhara |
tvāvataḥ | purūvaso | vayamindra | praṇetaḥ |
smasi | sthātarharīṇām |
tvāṁ | hi | satyamadrivo | vidma | dātāramiṣām |
vidma | dātāraṁ | rayīṇām |
ā | yasya | te | mahimānaṁ | śatamūte | śatakrato |
gīrbhirgṛṇanti | kāravaḥ |
sunītho | ghā | sa | martyo | yaṁ | maruto | yamaryamā |
mitraḥ | pāntyadruhaḥ |
dadhāno | gomadaśvavatsuvīryamādityajūtaidhate |
sadā | rāyā | puruspṛhā |
tamindraṁ | dānamīmahe | śavasānamabhīrvam |
īśānaṁ | rāyemahe |
tasminhi | santyūtayo | viśvābhīravaḥ | sacā |
tamā | vahantu | saptayaḥ | purūvasuṁ | madāya | harayaḥ | sutam |
yaste | mado | vareṇyo | yendra | vṛtrahantamaḥ |
yādadiḥ | svarnṛbhiryaḥ | pṛtanāsu | duṣṭaraḥ |
yo | duṣṭaro | viśvavāra | śravāyyo | vājeṣvasti | tarutā |
sa | naḥ | śaviṣṭha | savanā | vaso | gahi | gamema | gomati | vraje |
gavyo | ṣu | ṇo | yathā | purāśvayota | rathayā |
varivasya | mahāmaha |
nahi | te | śūra | rādhaso'ntaṁ | vindāmi | satrā |
daśasyā | no | maghavannū | cidadrivo | dhiyo | vājebhirāvitha |
ya | ṛṣvaḥ | śrāvayatsakhā | viśvetsa | veda | janimā | puruṣṭutaḥ |
taṁ | viśve | mānuṣā | yugendraṁ | havante | taviṣaṁ | yatasrucaḥ |
sa | no | vājeṣvavitā | purūvasuḥ | puraḥsthātā | maghavā | vṛtrahā | bhuvat |
abhi | vo | vīramandhaso | madeṣu | gāya | girā | mahā | vicetasam |
indraṁ | nāma | śrutyaṁ | śākinaṁ | vaco | yathā |
dadī | rekṇastanve | dadirvasu | dadirvājeṣu | puruhūta | vājinam |
nūnamatha |
viśveṣāmirajyantaṁ | vasūnāṁ | sāsahvāṁsaṁ | cidasya | varpasaḥ |
kṛpayato | nūnamatyatha |
mahaḥ | su | vo | aramiṣe | stavāmahe | mīḻhuṣe | araṁgamāya | jagmaye |
yajñebhirgīrbhirviśvamanuṣāṁ | marutāmiyakṣasi | gāye | tvā | namasā | girā |
ye | pātayante | ajmabhirgirīṇāṁ | snubhireṣām |
yajñaṁ | mahiṣvaṇīnāṁ | sumnaṁ | tuviṣvaṇīnāṁ | prādhvare |
prabhaṅgaṁ | durmatīnāmindra | śaviṣṭhā | bhara |
rayimasmabhyaṁ | yujyaṁ | codayanmate | jyeṣṭhaṁ | codayanmate |
sanitaḥ | susanitarugra | citra | cetiṣṭha | sūnṛta |
prāsahā | samrāṭ | sahuriṁ | sahantaṁ | bhujyuṁ | vājeṣu | pūrvyam |
ā | saitu | yevadām̐ | adevaḥ | pūrtamādade |
yathā | cidvaśo | aśvyaḥ | pṛthuśravasi | kānīte'syā | vyuṣyādade |
ṣaṣṭiṁ | sahasrāśvyasyāyutāsanamuṣṭrānāṁ | viṁśatiṁ | śatā |
daśa | śyāvīnāṁ | śatā | daśa | tryaruṣīṇāṁ | daśa | gavāṁ | sahasrā |
daśa | śyāvā | ṛdhadrayo | vītavārāsāśavaḥ |
mathrā | nemiṁ | ni | vāvṛtuḥ |
dānāsaḥ | pṛthuśravasaḥ | kānītasya | surādhasaḥ |
rathaṁ | hiraṇyayaṁ | dadanmaṁhiṣṭhaḥ | sūrirabhūdvarṣiṣṭhamakṛta | śravaḥ |
ā | no | vāyo | mahe | tane | yāhi | makhāya | pājase |
vayaṁ | hi | te | cakṛmā | bhūri | dāvane | sadyaścinmahi | dāvane |
yo | aśvebhirvahate | vastosrāstriḥ | sapta | saptatīnām |
ebhiḥ | somebhiḥ | somasudbhiḥ | somapā | dānāya | śukrapūtapāḥ |
yo | memaṁ | cidu | tmanāmandaccitraṁ | dāvane |
araṭve | akṣe | nahuṣe | sukṛtvani | sukṛttarāya | sukratuḥ |
ucathye | vapuṣi | yaḥ | svarāḻuta | vāyo | ghṛtasnāḥ |
aśveṣitaṁ | rajeṣitaṁ | śuneṣitaṁ | prājma | tadidaṁ | nu | tat |
adha | priyamiṣirāya | ṣaṣṭiṁ | sahasrāsanam |
aśvānāminna | vṛṣṇām |
gāvo | na | yūthamupa | yanti | vadhrayopa | mā | yanti | vadhrayaḥ |
adha | yaccārathe | gaṇe | śatamuṣṭrām̐ | acikradat |
adha | śvitneṣu | viṁśatiṁ | śatā |
śataṁ | dāse | balbūthe | viprastarukṣā | dade |
te | te | vāyavime | janā | madantīndragopā | madanti | devagopāḥ |
adha | syā | yoṣaṇā | mahī | pratīcī | vaśamaśvyam |
adhirukmā | vi | nīyate |
mahi | vo | mahatāmavo | varuṇa | mitra | dāśuṣe |
yamādityābhi | druho | rakṣathā | nemaghaṁ | naśadanehaso | votayaḥ | suūtayo | votayaḥ |
vidā | devāghānāmādityāso | apākṛtim |
pakṣā | vayo | yathopari | vyasme | śarma | yacchatānehaso | votayaḥ | suūtayo | votayaḥ |
vyasme | adhi | śarma | tatpakṣā | vayo | na | yantana |
viśvāni | viśvavedaso | varūthyā | manāmahe'nehaso | votayaḥ | suūtayo | votayaḥ |
yasmārāsata | kṣayaṁ | jīvātuṁ | ca | pracetasaḥ |
manorviśvasya | ghedimādityā | rāyeśate'nehaso | votayaḥ | suūtayo | votayaḥ |
pari | ṇo | vṛṇajannaghā | durgāṇi | rathyo | yathā |
syāmedindrasya | śarmaṇyādityānāmutāvasyanehaso | votayaḥ | suūtayo | votayaḥ |
parihvṛtedanā | jano | yuṣmādattasya | vāyati |
devādabhramāśa | vo | yamādityāhetanānehaso | votayaḥ | suūtayo | votayaḥ |
na | taṁ | tigmaṁ | cana | tyajo | na | drāsadabhi | taṁ | guru |
yasmo | śarma | saprathādityāso | arādhvamanehaso | votayaḥ | suūtayo | votayaḥ |
yuṣme | devāpi | ṣmasi | yudhyanteva | varmasu |
yūyaṁ | maho | nainaso | yūyamarbhāduruṣyatānehaso | votayaḥ | suūtayo | votayaḥ |
aditirnoruṣyatvaditiḥ | śarma | yacchatu |
mātā | mitrasya | revato'ryamṇo | varuṇasya | cānehaso | votayaḥ | suūtayo | votayaḥ |
yaddevāḥ | śarma | śaraṇaṁ | yadbhadraṁ | yadanāturam |
tridhātu | yadvarūthyaṁ | tadasmāsu | vi | yantanānehaso | votayaḥ | suūtayo | votayaḥ |
ādityāva | hi | khyatādhi | kūlādiva | spaśaḥ |
sutīrthamarvato | yathānu | no | neṣathā | sugamanehaso | votayaḥ | suūtayo | votayaḥ |
neha | bhadraṁ | rakṣasvine | nāvayai | nopayota |
gave | ca | bhadraṁ | dhenave | vīrāya | ca | śravasyate'nehaso | votayaḥ | suūtayo | votayaḥ |
yadāviryadapīcyaṁ | devāso | asti | duṣkṛtam |
trite | tadviśvamāptyāre | asmaddadhātanānehaso | votayaḥ | suūtayo | votayaḥ |
yacca | goṣu | duṣṣvapnyaṁ | yaccāsme | duhitardivaḥ |
tritāya | tadvibhāvaryāptyāya | parā | vahānehaso | votayaḥ | suūtayo | votayaḥ |
niṣkaṁ | vā | ghā | kṛṇavate | srajaṁ | vā | duhitardivaḥ |
trite | duṣṣvapnyaṁ | sarvamāptye | pari | dadmasyanehaso | votayaḥ | suūtayo | votayaḥ |
tadannāya | tadapase | taṁ | bhāgamupaseduṣe |
tritāya | ca | dvitāya | coṣo | duṣṣvapnyaṁ | vahānehaso | votayaḥ | suūtayo | votayaḥ |
yathā | kalāṁ | yathā | śaphaṁ | yatha | ṛṇaṁ | saṁnayāmasi |
evā | duṣṣvapnyaṁ | sarvamāptye | saṁ | nayāmasyanehaso | votayaḥ | suūtayo | votayaḥ |
ajaiṣmādyāsanāma | cābhūmānāgaso | vayam |
uṣo | yasmādduṣṣvapnyādabhaiṣmāpa | taducchatvanehaso | votayaḥ | suūtayo | votayaḥ |
svādorabhakṣi | vayasaḥ | sumedhāḥ | svādhyo | varivovittarasya |
viśve | yaṁ | devota | martyāso | madhu | bruvanto | abhi | saṁcaranti |
antaśca | prāgāditirbhavāsyavayātā | haraso | daivyasya |
indavindrasya | sakhyaṁ | juṣāṇaḥ | śrauṣṭīva | dhuramanu | rāya | ṛdhyāḥ |
apāma | somamamṛtābhūmāganma | jyotiravidāma | devān |
kiṁ | nūnamasmānkṛṇavadarātiḥ | kimu | dhūrtiramṛta | martyasya |
śaṁ | no | bhava | hṛdā | pītendo | piteva | soma | sūnave | suśevaḥ |
sakheva | sakhyoruśaṁsa | dhīraḥ | pra | ṇāyurjīvase | soma | tārīḥ |
ime | mā | pītā | yaśasoruṣyavo | rathaṁ | na | gāvaḥ | samanāha | parvasu |
te | mā | rakṣantu | visrasaścaritrāduta | mā | srāmādyavayantvindavaḥ |
agniṁ | na | mā | mathitaṁ | saṁ | didīpaḥ | pra | cakṣaya | kṛṇuhi | vasyaso | naḥ |
athā | hi | te | madā | soma | manye | revām̐ | iva | pra | carā | puṣṭimaccha |
iṣireṇa | te | manasā | sutasya | bhakṣīmahi | pitryasyeva | rāyaḥ |
soma | rājanpra | ṇāyūṁṣi | tārīrahānīva | sūryo | vāsarāṇi |
soma | rājanmṛḻayā | naḥ | svasti | tava | smasi | vratyāstasya | viddhi |
alarti | dakṣota | manyurindo | mā | no | aryo | anukāmaṁ | parā | dāḥ |
tvaṁ | hi | nastanvaḥ | soma | gopā | gātregātre | niṣasatthā | nṛcakṣāḥ |
yatte | vayaṁ | pramināma | vratāni | sa | no | mṛḻa | suṣakhā | deva | vasyaḥ |
ṛdūdareṇa | sakhyā | saceya | yo | mā | na | riṣyeddharyaśva | pītaḥ |
ayaṁ | yaḥ | somo | nyadhāyyasme | tasmendraṁ | pratiramemyāyuḥ |
apa | tyāsthuranirā | amīvā | niratrasantamiṣīcīrabhaiṣuḥ |
ā | somo | asmām̐ | aruhadvihāyāganma | yatra | pratirantāyuḥ |
yo | nenduḥ | pitaro | hṛtsu | pīto'martyo | martyām̐ | āviveśa |
tasmai | somāya | haviṣā | vidhema | mṛḻīke | asya | sumatau | syāma |
tvaṁ | soma | pitṛbhiḥ | saṁvidāno'nu | dyāvāpṛthivī | ā | tatantha |
tasmai | tendo | haviṣā | vidhema | vayaṁ | syāma | patayo | rayīṇām |
trātāro | devādhi | vocatā | no | mā | no | nidreśata | mota | jalpiḥ |
vayaṁ | somasya | viśvaha | priyāsaḥ | suvīrāso | vidathamā | vadema |
tvaṁ | naḥ | soma | viśvato | vayodhāstvaṁ | svarvidā | viśā | nṛcakṣāḥ |
tvaṁ | nenda | ūtibhiḥ | sajoṣāḥ | pāhi | paścātāduta | vā | purastāt |
abhi | pra | vaḥ | surādhasamindramarca | yathā | vide |
yo | jaritṛbhyo | maghavā | purūvasuḥ | sahasreṇeva | śikṣati |
śatānīkeva | pra | jigāti | dhṛṣṇuyā | hanti | vṛtrāṇi | dāśuṣe |
gireriva | pra | rasāsya | pinvire | datrāṇi | purubhojasaḥ |
ā | tvā | sutāsendavo | madā | yendra | girvaṇaḥ |
āpo | na | vajrinnanvokyaṁ | saraḥ | pṛṇanti | śūra | rādhase |
anehasaṁ | prataraṇaṁ | vivakṣaṇaṁ | madhvaḥ | svādiṣṭhamīṁ | piba |
ā | yathā | mandasānaḥ | kirāsi | naḥ | pra | kṣudreva | tmanā | dhṛṣat |
ā | naḥ | stomamupa | dravaddhiyāno | aśvo | na | sotṛbhiḥ |
yaṁ | te | svadhāvantsvadayanti | dhenavendra | kaṇveṣu | rātayaḥ |
ugraṁ | na | vīraṁ | namasopa | sedima | vibhūtimakṣitāvasum |
udrīva | vajrinnavato | na | siñcate | kṣarantīndra | dhītayaḥ |
yaddha | nūnaṁ | yadvā | yajñe | yadvā | pṛthivyāmadhi |
ato | no | yajñamāśubhirmahematogra | ugrebhirā | gahi |
ajirāso | harayo | ye | tāśavo | vāteva | prasakṣiṇaḥ |
yebhirapatyaṁ | manuṣaḥ | parīyase | yebhirviśvaṁ | svardṛśe |
etāvatastemaha | indra | sumnasya | gomataḥ |
yathā | prāvo | maghavanmedhyātithiṁ | yathā | nīpātithiṁ | dhane |
yathā | kaṇve | maghavantrasadasyavi | yathā | pakthe | daśavraje |
yathā | gośarye | asanorṛjiśvanīndra | gomaddhiraṇyavat |
pra | su | śrutaṁ | surādhasamarcā | śakramabhiṣṭaye |
yaḥ | sunvate | stuvate | kāmyaṁ | vasu | sahasreṇeva | maṁhate |
śatānīkā | hetayo | asya | duṣṭarendrasya | samiṣo | mahīḥ |
girirna | bhujmā | maghavatsu | pinvate | yadīṁ | sutāmandiṣuḥ |
yadīṁ | sutāsendavo'bhi | priyamamandiṣuḥ |
āpo | na | dhāyi | savanaṁ | mā | vaso | dughevopa | dāśuṣe |
anehasaṁ | vo | havamānamūtaye | madhvaḥ | kṣaranti | dhītayaḥ |
ā | tvā | vaso | havamānāsendava | upa | stotreṣu | dadhire |
ā | naḥ | some | svadhvareyāno | atyo | na | tośate |
yaṁ | te | svadāvantsvadanti | gūrtayaḥ | paure | chandayase | havam |
pra | vīramugraṁ | viviciṁ | dhanaspṛtaṁ | vibhūtiṁ | rādhaso | mahaḥ |
udrīva | vajrinnavato | vasutvanā | sadā | pīpetha | dāśuṣe |
yaddha | nūnaṁ | parāvati | yadvā | pṛthivyāṁ | divi |
yujānendra | haribhirmahemata | ṛṣva | ṛṣvebhirā | gahi |
rathirāso | harayo | ye | te | asridhaujo | vātasya | piprati |
yebhirni | dasyuṁ | manuṣo | nighoṣayo | yebhiḥ | svaḥ | parīyase |
etāvataste | vaso | vidyāma | śūra | navyasaḥ |
yathā | prāvaitaśaṁ | kṛtvye | dhane | yathā | vaśaṁ | daśavraje |
yathā | kaṇve | maghavanmedhe | adhvare | dīrghanīthe | damūnasi |
yathā | gośarye | asiṣāso | adrivo | mayi | gotraṁ | hariśriyam |
yathā | manau | sāṁvaraṇau | somamindrāpibaḥ | sutam |
nīpātithau | maghavanmedhyātithau | puṣṭigau | śruṣṭigau | sacā |
pārṣadvāṇaḥ | praskaṇvaṁ | samasādayacchayānaṁ | jivrimuddhitam |
sahasrāṇyasiṣāsadgavāmṛṣistvoto | dasyave | vṛkaḥ |
yokthebhirna | vindhate | cikidya | ṛṣicodanaḥ |
indraṁ | tamacchā | vada | navyasyā | matyariṣyantaṁ | na | bhojase |
yasmārkaṁ | saptaśīrṣāṇamānṛcustridhātumuttame | pade |
sa | tvimā | viśvā | bhuvanāni | cikradadādijjaniṣṭa | pauṁsyam |
yo | no | dātā | vasūnāmindraṁ | taṁ | hūmahe | vayam |
vidmā | hyasya | sumatiṁ | navīyasīṁ | gamema | gomati | vraje |
yasmai | tvaṁ | vaso | dānāya | śikṣasi | sa | rāyaspoṣamaśnute |
taṁ | tvā | vayaṁ | maghavannindra | girvaṇaḥ | sutāvanto | havāmahe |
kadā | cana | starīrasi | nendra | saścasi | dāśuṣe |
upopennu | maghavanbhūyennu | te | dānaṁ | devasya | pṛcyate |
pra | yo | nanakṣe | abhyojasā | kriviṁ | vadhaiḥ | śuṣṇaṁ | nighoṣayan |
yadedastambhītprathayannamūṁ | divamādijjaniṣṭa | pārthivaḥ |
yasyāyaṁ | viśvāryo | dāsaḥ | śevadhipāriḥ |
tiraścidarye | ruśame | parīravi | tubhyetso | ajyate | rayiḥ |
turaṇyavo | madhumantaṁ | ghṛtaścutaṁ | viprāso | arkamānṛcuḥ |
asme | rayiḥ | paprathe | vṛṣṇyaṁ | śavo'sme | suvānāsendavaḥ |
yathā | manau | vivasvati | somaṁ | śakrāpibaḥ | sutam |
yathā | trite | chandendra | jujoṣasyāyau | mādayase | sacā |
pṛṣadhre | medhye | mātariśvanīndra | suvāne | amandathāḥ |
yathā | somaṁ | daśaśipre | daśoṇye | syūmaraśmāvṛjūnasi |
yokthā | kevalā | dadhe | yaḥ | somaṁ | dhṛṣitāpibat |
yasmai | viṣṇustrīṇi | padā | vicakramopa | mitrasya | dharmabhiḥ |
yasya | tvamindra | stomeṣu | cākano | vāje | vājiñchatakrato |
taṁ | tvā | vayaṁ | sudughāmiva | goduho | juhūmasi | śravasyavaḥ |
yo | no | dātā | sa | naḥ | pitā | mahām̐ | ugreśānakṛt |
ayāmannugro | maghavā | purūvasurgoraśvasya | pra | dātu | naḥ |
yasmai | tvaṁ | vaso | dānāya | maṁhase | sa | rāyaspoṣaminvati |
vasūyavo | vasupatiṁ | śatakratuṁ | stomairindraṁ | havāmahe |
kadā | cana | pra | yucchasyubhe | ni | pāsi | janmanī |
turīyāditya | havanaṁ | tendriyamā | tasthāvamṛtaṁ | divi |
yasmai | tvaṁ | maghavannindra | girvaṇaḥ | śikṣo | śikṣasi | dāśuṣe |
asmākaṁ | girota | suṣṭutiṁ | vaso | kaṇvavacchṛṇudhī | havam |
astāvi | manma | pūrvyaṁ | brahmendrāya | vocata |
pūrvīrṛtasya | bṛhatīranūṣata | stoturmedhāsṛkṣata |
samindro | rāyo | bṛhatīradhūnuta | saṁ | kṣoṇī | samu | sūryam |
saṁ | śukrāsaḥ | śucayaḥ | saṁ | gavāśiraḥ | somendramamandiṣuḥ |
upamaṁ | tvā | maghonāṁ | jyeṣṭhaṁ | ca | vṛṣabhāṇām |
pūrbhittamaṁ | maghavannindra | govidamīśānaṁ | rāyemahe |
yāyuṁ | kutsamatithigvamardayo | vāvṛdhāno | divedive |
taṁ | tvā | vayaṁ | haryaśvaṁ | śatakratuṁ | vājayanto | havāmahe |
ā | no | viśveṣāṁ | rasaṁ | madhvaḥ | siñcantvadrayaḥ |
ye | parāvati | sunvire | janeṣvā | ye | arvāvatīndavaḥ |
viśvā | dveṣāṁsi | jahi | cāva | cā | kṛdhi | viśve | sanvantvā | vasu |
śīṣṭeṣu | citte | madirāso | aṁśavo | yatrā | somasya | tṛmpasi |
indra | nedīyaidihi | mitamedhābhirūtibhiḥ |
ā | śaṁtama | śaṁtamābhirabhiṣṭibhirā | svāpe | svāpibhiḥ |
ājituraṁ | satpatiṁ | viśvacarṣaṇiṁ | kṛdhi | prajāsvābhagam |
pra | sū | tirā | śacībhirye | tokthinaḥ | kratuṁ | punatānuṣak |
yaste | sādhiṣṭho'vase | te | syāma | bhareṣu | te |
vayaṁ | hotrābhiruta | devahūtibhiḥ | sasavāṁso | manāmahe |
ahaṁ | hi | te | harivo | brahma | vājayurājiṁ | yāmi | sadotibhiḥ |
tvāmideva | tamame | samaśvayurgavyuragre | mathīnām |
etattendra | vīryaṁ | gīrbhirgṛṇanti | kāravaḥ |
te | stobhantorjamāvanghṛtaścutaṁ | paurāso | nakṣandhītibhiḥ |
nakṣantendramavase | sukṛtyayā | yeṣāṁ | suteṣu | mandase |
yathā | saṁvarte | amado | yathā | kṛśaivāsme | indra | matsva |
ā | no | viśve | sajoṣaso | devāso | gantanopa | naḥ |
vasavo | rudrāvase | nā | gamañchṛṇvantu | maruto | havam |
pūṣā | viṣṇurhavanaṁ | me | sarasvatyavantu | sapta | sindhavaḥ |
āpo | vātaḥ | parvatāso | vanaspatiḥ | śṛṇotu | pṛthivī | havam |
yadindra | rādho | asti | te | māghonaṁ | maghavattama |
tena | no | bodhi | sadhamādyo | vṛdhe | bhago | dānāya | vṛtrahan |
ājipate | nṛpate | tvamiddhi | no | vājā | vakṣi | sukrato |
vītī | hotrābhiruta | devavītibhiḥ | sasavāṁso | vi | śṛṇvire |
santi | hyaryāśiṣa | indrāyurjanānām |
asmānnakṣasva | maghavannupāvase | dhukṣasva | pipyuṣīmiṣam |
vayaṁ | tendra | stomebhirvidhema | tvamasmākaṁ | śatakrato |
mahi | sthūraṁ | śaśayaṁ | rādho | ahrayaṁ | praskaṇvāya | ni | tośaya |
bhūrīdindrasya | vīryaṁ | vyakhyamabhyāyati |
rādhaste | dasyave | vṛka |
śataṁ | śvetāsokṣaṇo | divi | tāro | na | rocante |
mahnā | divaṁ | na | tastabhuḥ |
śataṁ | veṇūñchataṁ | śunaḥ | śataṁ | carmāṇi | mlātāni |
śataṁ | me | balbajastukāruṣīṇāṁ | catuḥśatam |
sudevāḥ | stha | kāṇvāyanā | vayovayo | vicarantaḥ |
aśvāso | na | caṅkramata |
āditsāptasya | carkirannānūnasya | mahi | śravaḥ |
śyāvīratidhvasanpathaścakṣuṣā | cana | saṁnaśe |
prati | te | dasyave | vṛka | rādho | adarśyahrayam |
dyaurna | prathinā | śavaḥ |
daśa | mahyaṁ | pautakrataḥ | sahasrā | dasyave | vṛkaḥ |
nityādrāyo | amaṁhata |
śataṁ | me | gardabhānāṁ | śatamūrṇāvatīnām |
śataṁ | dāsām̐ | ati | srajaḥ |
tatro | api | prāṇīyata | pūtakratāyai | vyaktā |
aśvānāminna | yūthyām |
acetyagniścikiturhavyavāṭ | sa | sumadrathaḥ |
agniḥ | śukreṇa | śociṣā | bṛhatsūro | arocata | divi | sūryo | arocata |
yuvaṁ | devā | kratunā | pūrvyeṇa | yuktā | rathena | taviṣaṁ | yajatrā |
āgacchataṁ | nāsatyā | śacībhiridaṁ | tṛtīyaṁ | savanaṁ | pibāthaḥ |
yuvāṁ | devāstrayaikādaśāsaḥ | satyāḥ | satyasya | dadṛśe | purastāt |
asmākaṁ | yajñaṁ | savanaṁ | juṣāṇā | pātaṁ | somamaśvinā | dīdyagnī |
panāyyaṁ | tadaśvinā | kṛtaṁ | vāṁ | vṛṣabho | divo | rajasaḥ | pṛthivyāḥ |
sahasraṁ | śaṁsota | ye | gaviṣṭau | sarvām̐ | ittām̐ | upa | yātā | pibadhyai |
ayaṁ | vāṁ | bhāgo | nihito | yajatremā | giro | nāsatyopa | yātam |
pibataṁ | somaṁ | madhumantamasme | pra | dāśvāṁsamavataṁ | śacībhiḥ |
yamṛtvijo | bahudhā | kalpayantaḥ | sacetaso | yajñamimaṁ | vahanti |
yo | anūcāno | brāhmaṇo | yuktāsītkā | svittatra | yajamānasya | saṁvit |
ekaivāgnirbahudhā | samiddhaikaḥ | sūryo | viśvamanu | prabhūtaḥ |
ekaivoṣāḥ | sarvamidaṁ | vi | bhātyekaṁ | vedaṁ | vi | babhūva | sarvam |
jyotiṣmantaṁ | ketumantaṁ | tricakraṁ | sukhaṁ | rathaṁ | suṣadaṁ | bhūrivāram |
citrāmaghā | yasya | yoge'dhijajñe | taṁ | vāṁ | huve | ati | riktaṁ | pibadhyai |
imāni | vāṁ | bhāgadheyāni | sisratendrāvaruṇā | pra | mahe | suteṣu | vām |
yajñeyajñe | ha | savanā | bhuraṇyatho | yatsunvate | yajamānāya | śikṣathaḥ |
niṣṣidhvarīroṣadhīrāpāstāmindrāvaruṇā | mahimānamāśata |
yā | sisratū | rajasaḥ | pāre | adhvano | yayoḥ | śatrurnakirādevauhate |
satyaṁ | tadindrāvaruṇā | kṛśasya | vāṁ | madhvormiṁ | duhate | sapta | vāṇīḥ |
tābhirdāśvāṁsamavataṁ | śubhaspatī | yo | vāmadabdho | abhi | pāti | cittibhiḥ |
ghṛtapruṣaḥ | saumyā | jīradānavaḥ | sapta | svasāraḥ | sadana | ṛtasya |
yā | ha | vāmindrāvaruṇā | ghṛtaścutastābhirdhattaṁ | yajamānāya | śikṣatam |
avocāma | mahate | saubhagāya | satyaṁ | tveṣābhyāṁ | mahimānamindriyam |
asmāntsvindrāvaruṇā | ghṛtaścutastribhiḥ | sāptebhiravataṁ | śubhaspatī |
indrāvaruṇā | yadṛṣibhyo | manīṣāṁ | vāco | matiṁ | śrutamadattamagre |
yāni | sthānānyasṛjanta | dhīrā | yajñaṁ | tanvānāstapasābhyapaśyam |
indrāvaruṇā | saumanasamadṛptaṁ | rāyaspoṣaṁ | yajamāneṣu | dhattam |
prajāṁ | puṣṭiṁ | bhūtimasmāsu | dhattaṁ | dīrghāyutvāya | pra | tirataṁ | nāyuḥ |
agnā | yāhyagnibhirhotāraṁ | tvā | vṛṇīmahe |
ā | tvāmanaktu | prayatā | haviṣmatī | yajiṣṭhaṁ | barhirāsade |
acchā | hi | tvā | sahasaḥ | sūno | aṅgiraḥ | srucaścarantyadhvare |
ūrjo | napātaṁ | ghṛtakeśamīmahe'gniṁ | yajñeṣu | pūrvyam |
agne | kavirvedhāsi | hotā | pāvaka | yakṣyaḥ |
mandro | yajiṣṭho | adhvareṣvīḍyo | viprebhiḥ | śukra | manmabhiḥ |
adroghamā | vahośato | yaviṣṭhya | devām̐ | ajasra | vītaye |
abhi | prayāṁsi | sudhitā | vaso | gahi | mandasva | dhītibhirhitaḥ |
tvamitsaprathāsyagne | trātarṛtaskaviḥ |
tvāṁ | viprāsaḥ | samidhāna | dīdivā | vivāsanti | vedhasaḥ |
śocā | śociṣṭha | dīdihi | viśe | mayo | rāsva | stotre | mahām̐ | asi |
devānāṁ | śarmanmama | santu | sūrayaḥ | śatrūṣāhaḥ | svagnayaḥ |
yathā | cidvṛddhamatasamagne | saṁjūrvasi | kṣami |
evā | daha | mitramaho | yo | asmadhrugdurmanmā | kaśca | venati |
mā | no | martāya | ripave | rakṣasvine | māghaśaṁsāya | rīradhaḥ |
asredhadbhistaraṇibhiryaviṣṭhya | śivebhiḥ | pāhi | pāyubhiḥ |
pāhi | no | agnaikayā | pāhyuta | dvitīyayā |
pāhi | gīrbhistisṛbhirūrjāṁ | pate | pāhi | catasṛbhirvaso |
pāhi | viśvasmādrakṣaso | arāvṇaḥ | pra | sma | vājeṣu | no'va |
tvāmiddhi | nediṣṭhaṁ | devatātayāpiṁ | nakṣāmahe | vṛdhe |
ā | no | agne | vayovṛdhaṁ | rayiṁ | pāvaka | śaṁsyam |
rāsvā | ca | nopamāte | puruspṛhaṁ | sunītī | svayaśastaram |
yena | vaṁsāma | pṛtanāsu | śardhatastaranto | aryādiśaḥ |
sa | tvaṁ | no | vardha | prayasā | śacīvaso | jinvā | dhiyo | vasuvidaḥ |
śiśāno | vṛṣabho | yathāgniḥ | śṛṅge | davidhvat |
tigmāsya | hanavo | na | pratidhṛṣe | sujambhaḥ | sahaso | yahuḥ |
nahi | te | agne | vṛṣabha | pratidhṛṣe | jambhāso | yadvitiṣṭhase |
sa | tvaṁ | no | hotaḥ | suhutaṁ | haviṣkṛdhi | vaṁsvā | no | vāryā | puru |
śeṣe | vaneṣu | mātroḥ | saṁ | tvā | martāsendhate |
atandro | havyā | vahasi | haviṣkṛtādiddeveṣu | rājasi |
sapta | hotārastamidīḻate | tvāgne | sutyajamahrayam |
bhinatsyadriṁ | tapasā | vi | śociṣā | prāgne | tiṣṭha | janām̐ | ati |
agnimagniṁ | vo | adhriguṁ | huvema | vṛktabarhiṣaḥ |
agniṁ | hitaprayasaḥ | śaśvatīṣvā | hotāraṁ | carṣaṇīnām |
ketena | śarmantsacate | suṣāmaṇyagne | tubhyaṁ | cikitvanā |
iṣaṇyayā | naḥ | pururūpamā | bhara | vājaṁ | nediṣṭhamūtaye |
agne | jaritarviśpatistepāno | deva | rakṣasaḥ |
aproṣivāngṛhapatirmahām̐ | asi | divaspāyurduroṇayuḥ |
mā | no | rakṣā | veśīdāghṛṇīvaso | mā | yāturyātumāvatām |
parogavyūtyanirāmapa | kṣudhamagne | sedha | rakṣasvinaḥ |
ubhayaṁ | śṛṇavacca | nendro | arvāgidaṁ | vacaḥ |
satrācyā | maghavā | somapītaye | dhiyā | śaviṣṭhā | gamat |
taṁ | hi | svarājaṁ | vṛṣabhaṁ | tamojase | dhiṣaṇe | niṣṭatakṣatuḥ |
utopamānāṁ | prathamo | ni | ṣīdasi | somakāmaṁ | hi | te | manaḥ |
ā | vṛṣasva | purūvaso | sutasyendrāndhasaḥ |
vidmā | hi | tvā | harivaḥ | pṛtsu | sāsahimadhṛṣṭaṁ | ciddadhṛṣvaṇim |
aprāmisatya | maghavantathedasadindra | kratvā | yathā | vaśaḥ |
sanema | vājaṁ | tava | śiprinnavasā | makṣū | cidyanto | adrivaḥ |
śagdhyū | ṣu | śacīpatendra | viśvābhirūtibhiḥ |
bhagaṁ | na | hi | tvā | yaśasaṁ | vasuvidamanu | śūra | carāmasi |
pauro | aśvasya | purukṛdgavāmasyutso | deva | hiraṇyayaḥ |
nakirhi | dānaṁ | parimardhiṣattve | yadyadyāmi | tadā | bhara |
tvaṁ | hyehi | cerave | vidā | bhagaṁ | vasuttaye |
udvāvṛṣasva | maghavangaviṣṭayodindrāśvamiṣṭaye |
tvaṁ | purū | sahasrāṇi | śatāni | ca | yūthā | dānāya | maṁhase |
ā | puraṁdaraṁ | cakṛma | vipravacasendraṁ | gāyanto'vase |
avipro | vā | yadavidhadvipro | vendra | te | vacaḥ |
sa | pra | mamandattvāyā | śatakrato | prācāmanyo | ahaṁsana |
ugrabāhurmrakṣakṛtvā | puraṁdaro | yadi | me | śṛṇavaddhavam |
vasūyavo | vasupatiṁ | śatakratuṁ | stomairindraṁ | havāmahe |
na | pāpāso | manāmahe | nārāyāso | na | jaḻhavaḥ |
yadinnvindraṁ | vṛṣaṇaṁ | sacā | sute | sakhāyaṁ | kṛṇavāmahai |
ugraṁ | yuyujma | pṛtanāsu | sāsahimṛṇakātimadābhyam |
vedā | bhṛmaṁ | citsanitā | rathītamo | vājinaṁ | yamidū | naśat |
yatendra | bhayāmahe | tato | no | abhayaṁ | kṛdhi |
maghavañchagdhi | tava | tannotibhirvi | dviṣo | vi | mṛdho | jahi |
tvaṁ | hi | rādhaspate | rādhaso | mahaḥ | kṣayasyāsi | vidhataḥ |
taṁ | tvā | vayaṁ | maghavannindra | girvaṇaḥ | sutāvanto | havāmahe |
indraḥ | spaḻuta | vṛtrahā | paraspā | no | vareṇyaḥ |
sa | no | rakṣiṣaccaramaṁ | sa | madhyamaṁ | sa | paścātpātu | naḥ | puraḥ |
tvaṁ | naḥ | paścādadharāduttarātpurendra | ni | pāhi | viśvataḥ |
āre | asmatkṛṇuhi | daivyaṁ | bhayamāre | hetīradevīḥ |
adyādyā | śvaḥśvendra | trāsva | pare | ca | naḥ |
viśvā | ca | no | jaritṝntsatpate | ahā | divā | naktaṁ | ca | rakṣiṣaḥ |
prabhaṅgī | śūro | maghavā | tuvīmaghaḥ | saṁmiślo | viryāya | kam |
ubhā | te | bāhū | vṛṣaṇā | śatakrato | ni | yā | vajraṁ | mimikṣatuḥ |
pro | asmopastutiṁ | bharatā | yajjujoṣati |
ukthairindrasya | māhinaṁ | vayo | vardhanti | somino | bhadrendrasya | rātayaḥ |
ayujo | asamo | nṛbhirekaḥ | kṛṣṭīrayāsyaḥ |
pūrvīrati | pra | vāvṛdhe | viśvā | jātānyojasā | bhadrendrasya | rātayaḥ |
ahitena | cidarvatā | jīradānuḥ | siṣāsati |
pravācyamindra | tattava | vīryāṇi | kariṣyato | bhadrendrasya | rātayaḥ |
ā | yāhi | kṛṇavāma | tendra | brahmāṇi | vardhanā |
yebhiḥ | śaviṣṭha | cākano | bhadramiha | śravasyate | bhadrendrasya | rātayaḥ |
dhṛṣataściddhṛṣanmanaḥ | kṛṇoṣīndra | yattvam |
tīvraiḥ | somaiḥ | saparyato | namobhiḥ | pratibhūṣato | bhadrendrasya | rātayaḥ |
ava | caṣṭa | ṛcīṣamo'vatām̐ | iva | mānuṣaḥ |
juṣṭvī | dakṣasya | sominaḥ | sakhāyaṁ | kṛṇute | yujaṁ | bhadrendrasya | rātayaḥ |
viśve | tendra | vīryaṁ | devānu | kratuṁ | daduḥ |
bhuvo | viśvasya | gopatiḥ | puruṣṭuta | bhadrendrasya | rātayaḥ |
gṛṇe | tadindra | te | śavopamaṁ | devatātaye |
yaddhaṁsi | vṛtramojasā | śacīpate | bhadrendrasya | rātayaḥ |
samaneva | vapuṣyataḥ | kṛṇavanmānuṣā | yugā |
vide | tadindraścetanamadha | śruto | bhadrendrasya | rātayaḥ |
ujjātamindra | te | śavottvāmuttava | kratum |
bhūrigo | bhūri | vāvṛdhurmaghavantava | śarmaṇi | bhadrendrasya | rātayaḥ |
ahaṁ | ca | tvaṁ | ca | vṛtrahantsaṁ | yujyāva | sanibhyā |
arātīvā | cidadrivo'nu | nau | śūra | maṁsate | bhadrendrasya | rātayaḥ |
satyamidvo | taṁ | vayamindraṁ | stavāma | nānṛtam |
mahām̐ | asunvato | vadho | bhūri | jyotīṁṣi | sunvato | bhadrendrasya | rātayaḥ |
sa | pūrvyo | mahānāṁ | venaḥ | kratubhirānaje |
yasya | dvārā | manuṣpitā | deveṣu | dhiyānaje |
divo | mānaṁ | notsadantsomapṛṣṭhāso | adrayaḥ |
ukthā | brahma | ca | śaṁsyā |
sa | vidvām̐ | aṅgirobhyendro | gāvṛṇodapa |
stuṣe | tadasya | pauṁsyam |
sa | pratnathā | kavivṛdhendro | vākasya | vakṣaṇiḥ |
śivo | arkasya | homanyasmatrā | gantvavase |
ādū | nu | te | anu | kratuṁ | svāhā | varasya | yajyavaḥ |
śvātramarkānūṣatendra | gotrasya | dāvane |
indre | viśvāni | vīryā | kṛtāni | kartvāni | ca |
yamarkādhvaraṁ | viduḥ |
yatpāñcajanyayā | viśendre | ghoṣāsṛkṣata |
astṛṇādbarhaṇā | vipo'ryo | mānasya | sa | kṣayaḥ |
iyamu | te | anuṣṭutiścakṛṣe | tāni | pauṁsyā |
prāvaścakrasya | vartanim |
asya | vṛṣṇo | vyodanoru | kramiṣṭa | jīvase |
yavaṁ | na | paśvā | dade |
taddadhānāvasyavo | yuṣmābhirdakṣapitaraḥ |
syāma | marutvato | vṛdhe |
baḻṛtviyāya | dhāmna | ṛkvabhiḥ | śūra | nonumaḥ |
jeṣāmendra | tvayā | yujā |
asme | rudrā | mehanā | parvatāso | vṛtrahatye | bharahūtau | sajoṣāḥ |
yaḥ | śaṁsate | stuvate | dhāyi | pajrendrajyeṣṭhā | asmām̐ | avantu | devāḥ |
uttvā | mandantu | stomāḥ | kṛṇuṣva | rādho | adrivaḥ |
ava | brahmadviṣo | jahi |
padā | paṇīm̐rarādhaso | ni | bādhasva | mahām̐ | asi |
nahi | tvā | kaścana | prati |
tvamīśiṣe | sutānāmindra | tvamasutānām |
tvaṁ | rājā | janānām |
ehi | prehi | kṣayo | divyāghoṣañcarṣaṇīnām |
obhe | pṛṇāsi | rodasī |
tyaṁ | citparvataṁ | giriṁ | śatavantaṁ | sahasriṇam |
vi | stotṛbhyo | rurojitha |
vayamu | tvā | divā | sute | vayaṁ | naktaṁ | havāmahe |
asmākaṁ | kāmamā | pṛṇa |
kva | sya | vṛṣabho | yuvā | tuvigrīvo | anānataḥ |
brahmā | kastaṁ | saparyati |
kasya | svitsavanaṁ | vṛṣā | jujuṣvām̐ | ava | gacchati |
indraṁ | ko | svidā | cake |
kaṁ | te | dānāsakṣata | vṛtrahankaṁ | suvīryā |
ukthe | ko | svidantamaḥ |
ayaṁ | te | mānuṣe | jane | somaḥ | pūruṣu | sūyate |
tasyehi | pra | dravā | piba |
ayaṁ | te | śaryaṇāvati | suṣomāyāmadhi | priyaḥ |
ārjīkīye | madintamaḥ |
tamadya | rādhase | mahe | cāruṁ | madāya | ghṛṣvaye |
ehīmindra | dravā | piba |
yadindra | prāgapāgudaṅnyagvā | hūyase | nṛbhiḥ |
ā | yāhi | tūyamāśubhiḥ |
yadvā | prasravaṇe | divo | mādayāse | svarṇare |
yadvā | samudre | andhasaḥ |
ā | tvā | gīrbhirmahāmuruṁ | huve | gāmiva | bhojase |
indra | somasya | pītaye |
ā | tendra | mahimānaṁ | harayo | deva | te | mahaḥ |
rathe | vahantu | bibhrataḥ |
indra | gṛṇīṣo | stuṣe | mahām̐ | ugreśānakṛt |
ehi | naḥ | sutaṁ | piba |
sutāvantastvā | vayaṁ | prayasvanto | havāmahe |
idaṁ | no | barhirāsade |
yacciddhi | śaśvatāmasīndra | sādhāraṇastvam |
taṁ | tvā | vayaṁ | havāmahe |
idaṁ | te | somyaṁ | madhvadhukṣannadribhirnaraḥ |
juṣāṇendra | tatpiba |
viśvām̐ | aryo | vipaścito'ti | khyastūyamā | gahi |
asme | dhehi | śravo | bṛhat |
dātā | me | pṛṣatīnāṁ | rājā | hiraṇyavīnām |
mā | devā | maghavā | riṣat |
sahasre | pṛṣatīnāmadhi | ścandraṁ | bṛhatpṛthu |
śukraṁ | hiraṇyamā | dade |
napāto | durgahasya | me | sahasreṇa | surādhasaḥ |
śravo | deveṣvakrata |
tarobhirvo | vidadvasumindraṁ | sabādhotaye |
bṛhadgāyantaḥ | sutasome | adhvare | huve | bharaṁ | na | kāriṇam |
na | yaṁ | dudhrā | varante | na | sthirā | muro | made | suśipramandhasaḥ |
yādṛtyā | śaśamānāya | sunvate | dātā | jaritrokthyam |
yaḥ | śakro | mṛkṣo | aśvyo | yo | vā | kījo | hiraṇyayaḥ |
sorvasya | rejayatyapāvṛtimindro | gavyasya | vṛtrahā |
nikhātaṁ | cidyaḥ | purusaṁbhṛtaṁ | vasūdidvapati | dāśuṣe |
vajrī | suśipro | haryaśvetkaradindraḥ | kratvā | yathā | vaśat |
yadvāvantha | puruṣṭuta | purā | cicchūra | nṛṇām |
vayaṁ | tattendra | saṁ | bharāmasi | yajñamukthaṁ | turaṁ | vacaḥ |
sacā | someṣu | puruhūta | vajrivo | madāya | dyukṣa | somapāḥ |
tvamiddhi | brahmakṛte | kāmyaṁ | vasu | deṣṭhaḥ | sunvate | bhuvaḥ |
vayamenamidā | hyo'pīpemeha | vajriṇam |
tasmo | adya | samanā | sutaṁ | bharā | nūnaṁ | bhūṣata | śrute |
vṛkaścidasya | vāraṇorāmathirā | vayuneṣu | bhūṣati |
semaṁ | naḥ | stomaṁ | jujuṣāṇā | gahīndra | pra | citrayā | dhiyā |
kadū | nvasyākṛtamindrasyāsti | pauṁsyam |
keno | nu | kaṁ | śromatena | na | śuśruve | januṣaḥ | pari | vṛtrahā |
kadū | mahīradhṛṣṭāsya | taviṣīḥ | kadu | vṛtraghno | astṛtam |
indro | viśvānbekanāṭām̐ | ahardṛśota | kratvā | paṇīm̐rabhi |
vayaṁ | ghā | te | apūrvyendra | brahmāṇi | vṛtrahan |
purūtamāsaḥ | puruhūta | vajrivo | bhṛtiṁ | na | pra | bharāmasi |
pūrvīściddhi | tve | tuvikūrminnāśaso | havantendrotayaḥ |
tiraścidaryaḥ | savanā | vaso | gahi | śaviṣṭha | śrudhi | me | havam |
vayaṁ | ghā | te | tve | idvindra | viprāpi | ṣmasi |
nahi | tvadanyaḥ | puruhūta | kaścana | maghavannasti | marḍitā |
tvaṁ | no | asyāmateruta | kṣudho'bhiśasterava | spṛdhi |
tvaṁ | notī | tava | citrayā | dhiyā | śikṣā | śaciṣṭha | gātuvit |
somedvaḥ | suto | astu | kalayo | mā | bibhītana |
apedeṣa | dhvasmāyati | svayaṁ | ghaiṣo | apāyati |
tyānnu | kṣatriyām̐ | avādityānyāciṣāmahe |
sumṛḻīkām̐ | abhiṣṭaye |
mitro | no | atyaṁhatiṁ | varuṇaḥ | parṣadaryamā |
ādityāso | yathā | viduḥ |
teṣāṁ | hi | citramukthyaṁ | varūthamasti | dāśuṣe |
ādityānāmaraṁkṛte |
mahi | vo | mahatāmavo | varuṇa | mitrāryaman |
avāṁsyā | vṛṇīmahe |
jīvānno | abhi | dhetanādityāsaḥ | purā | hathāt |
kaddha | stha | havanaśrutaḥ |
yadvaḥ | śrāntāya | sunvate | varūthamasti | yacchardiḥ |
tenā | no | adhi | vocata |
asti | devāṁhorurvasti | ratnamanāgasaḥ |
ādityādbhutainasaḥ |
mā | naḥ | setuḥ | siṣedayaṁ | mahe | vṛṇaktu | naspari |
indreddhi | śruto | vaśī |
mā | no | mṛcā | ripūṇāṁ | vṛjinānāmaviṣyavaḥ |
devābhi | pra | mṛkṣata |
uta | tvāmadite | mahyahaṁ | devyupa | bruve |
sumṛḻīkāmabhiṣṭaye |
parṣi | dīne | gabhīrām̐ | ugraputre | jighāṁsataḥ |
mākistokasya | no | riṣat |
aneho | noruvraja | urūci | vi | prasartave |
kṛdhi | tokāya | jīvase |
ye | mūrdhānaḥ | kṣitīnāmadabdhāsaḥ | svayaśasaḥ |
vratā | rakṣante | adruhaḥ |
te | nāsno | vṛkāṇāmādityāso | mumocata |
stenaṁ | baddhamivādite |
apo | ṣu | ṇeyaṁ | śarurādityāpa | durmatiḥ |
asmadetvajaghnuṣī |
śaśvaddhi | vaḥ | sudānavādityā | ūtibhirvayam |
purā | nūnaṁ | bubhujmahe |
śaśvantaṁ | hi | pracetasaḥ | pratiyantaṁ | cidenasaḥ |
devāḥ | kṛṇutha | jīvase |
tatsu | no | navyaṁ | sanyasādityā | yanmumocati |
bandhādbaddhamivādite |
nāsmākamasti | tattarādityāso | atiṣkade |
yūyamasmabhyaṁ | mṛḻata |
mā | no | hetirvivasvatādityāḥ | kṛtrimā | śaruḥ |
purā | nu | jaraso | vadhīt |
vi | ṣu | dveṣo | vyaṁhatimādityāso | vi | saṁhitam |
viṣvagvi | vṛhatā | rapaḥ |
ā | tvā | rathaṁ | yathotaye | sumnāya | vartayāmasi |
tuvikūrmimṛtīṣahamindra | śaviṣṭha | satpate |
tuviśuṣma | tuvikrato | śacīvo | viśvayā | mate |
ā | paprātha | mahitvanā |
yasya | te | mahinā | mahaḥ | pari | jmāyantamīyatuḥ |
hastā | vajraṁ | hiraṇyayam |
viśvānarasya | vaspatimanānatasya | śavasaḥ |
evaiśca | carṣaṇīnāmūtī | huve | rathānām |
abhiṣṭaye | sadāvṛdhaṁ | svarmīḻheṣu | yaṁ | naraḥ |
nānā | havantotaye |
paromātramṛcīṣamamindramugraṁ | surādhasam |
īśānaṁ | cidvasūnām |
taṁtamidrādhase | mahendraṁ | codāmi | pītaye |
yaḥ | pūrvyāmanuṣṭutimīśe | kṛṣṭīnāṁ | nṛtuḥ |
na | yasya | te | śavasāna | sakhyamānaṁśa | martyaḥ |
nakiḥ | śavāṁsi | te | naśat |
tvotāsastvā | yujāpsu | sūrye | mahaddhanam |
jayema | pṛtsu | vajrivaḥ |
taṁ | tvā | yajñebhirīmahe | taṁ | gīrbhirgirvaṇastama |
indra | yathā | cidāvitha | vājeṣu | purumāyyam |
yasya | te | svādu | sakhyaṁ | svādvī | praṇītiradrivaḥ |
yajño | vitantasāyyaḥ |
uru | ṇastanve | tanoru | kṣayāya | naskṛdhi |
uru | ṇo | yandhi | jīvase |
uruṁ | nṛbhyoruṁ | gavoruṁ | rathāya | panthām |
devavītiṁ | manāmahe |
upa | mā | ṣaḍdvādvā | naraḥ | somasya | harṣyā |
tiṣṭhanti | svādurātayaḥ |
ṛjrāvindrotā | dade | harī | ṛkṣasya | sūnavi |
āśvamedhasya | rohitā |
surathām̐ | ātithigve | svabhīśūm̐rārkṣe |
āśvamedhe | supeśasaḥ |
ṣaḻaśvām̐ | ātithigvendrote | vadhūmataḥ |
sacā | pūtakratau | sanam |
aiṣu | cetadvṛṣaṇvatyantarṛjreṣvaruṣī |
svabhīśuḥ | kaśāvatī |
na | yuṣme | vājabandhavo | ninitsuścana | martyaḥ |
avadyamadhi | dīdharat |
prapra | vastriṣṭubhamiṣaṁ | mandadvīrāyendave |
dhiyā | vo | medhasātaye | puraṁdhyā | vivāsati |

abhi | pra | gopatiṁ | girendramarca | yathā | vide |
sūnuṁ | satyasya | satpatim |
ā | harayaḥ | sasṛjrire'ruṣīradhi | barhiṣi |
yatrābhi | saṁnavāmahe |
indrāya | gāvāśiraṁ | duduhre | vajriṇe | madhu |
yatsīmupahvare | vidat |

madhvaḥ | pītvā | sacevahi | triḥ | sapta | sakhyuḥ | pade |
arcata | prārcata | priyamedhāso | arcata |
arcantu | putrakota | puraṁ | na | dhṛṣṇvarcata |

piṅgā | pari | caniṣkadadindrāya | brahmodyatam |
ā | yatpatantyenyaḥ | sudughānapasphuraḥ |
apasphuraṁ | gṛbhāyata | somamindrāya | pātave |
apādindro | apādagnirviśve | devāmatsata |
varuṇediha | kṣayattamāpo | abhyanūṣata | vatsaṁ | saṁśiśvarīriva |
sudevo | asi | varuṇa | yasya | te | sapta | sindhavaḥ |
anukṣaranti | kākudaṁ | sūrmyaṁ | suṣirāmiva |

sa | pakṣanmahiṣaṁ | mṛgaṁ | pitre | mātre | vibhukratum |
ā | tū | suśipra | daṁpate | rathaṁ | tiṣṭhā | hiraṇyayam |
adha | dyukṣaṁ | sacevahi | sahasrapādamaruṣaṁ | svastigāmanehasam |

arthaṁ | cidasya | sudhitaṁ | yadetavāvartayanti | dāvane |

viśvāsāṁ | tarutā | pṛtanānāṁ | jyeṣṭho | yo | vṛtrahā | gṛṇe |
indraṁ | taṁ | śumbha | puruhanmannavase | yasya | dvitā | vidhartari |
hastāya | vajraḥ | prati | dhāyi | darśato | maho | dive | na | sūryaḥ |
nakiṣṭaṁ | karmaṇā | naśadyaścakāra | sadāvṛdham |
indraṁ | na | yajñairviśvagūrtamṛbhvasamadhṛṣṭaṁ | dhṛṣṇvojasam |

saṁ | dhenavo | jāyamāne | anonavurdyāvaḥ | kṣāmo | anonavuḥ |
yaddyāvendra | te | śataṁ | śataṁ | bhūmīruta | syuḥ |
na | tvā | vajrintsahasraṁ | sūryānu | na | jātamaṣṭa | rodasī |
ā | paprātha | mahinā | vṛṣṇyā | vṛṣanviśvā | śaviṣṭha | śavasā |

na | sīmadevāpadiṣaṁ | dīrghāyo | martyaḥ |

yo | gādheṣu | yāraṇeṣu | havyo | vājeṣvasti | havyaḥ |
udū | ṣu | ṇo | vaso | mahe | mṛśasva | śūra | rādhase |
udū | ṣu | mahyai | maghavanmaghattayodindra | śravase | mahe |

anyavratamamānuṣamayajvānamadevayum |

tvaṁ | no | agne | mahobhiḥ | pāhi | viśvasyārāteḥ |

nahi | manyuḥ | pauruṣeyeśe | hi | vaḥ | priyajāta |
tvamidasi | kṣapāvān |
sa | no | viśvebhirdevebhirūrjo | napādbhadraśoce |
rayiṁ | dehi | viśvavāram |
na | tamagne | arātayo | martaṁ | yuvanta | rāyaḥ |
yaṁ | trāyase | dāśvāṁsam |

sa | tavotī | goṣu | gantā |
tvaṁ | rayiṁ | puruvīramagne | dāśuṣe | martāya |
pra | ṇo | naya | vasyo | accha |

durādhye | martāya |
agne | mākiṣṭe | devasya | rātimadevo | yuyota |
tvamīśiṣe | vasūnām |

acchā | naḥ | śīraśociṣaṁ | giro | yantu | darśatam |
acchā | yajñāso | namasā | purūvasuṁ | purupraśastamūtaye |
agniṁ | sūnuṁ | sahaso | jātavedasaṁ | dānāya | vāryāṇām |
dvitā | yo | bhūdamṛto | martyeṣvā | hotā | mandratamo | viśi |

agnimīḻiṣvāvase | gāthābhiḥ | śīraśociṣam |

anti | ṣadbhūtu | vāmavaḥ |
viśoviśo | vo | atithiṁ | vājayantaḥ | purupriyam |
agniṁ | vo | duryaṁ | vacaḥ | stuṣe | śūṣasya | manmabhiḥ |
yaṁ | janāso | haviṣmanto | mitraṁ | na | sarpirāsutim |
praśaṁsanti | praśastibhiḥ |
panyāṁsaṁ | jātavedasaṁ | yo | devatātyudyatā |
havyānyairayaddivi |
āganma | vṛtrahantamaṁ | jyeṣṭhamagnimānavam |
yasya | śrutarvā | bṛhannārkṣo | anīkaidhate |
amṛtaṁ | jātavedasaṁ | tirastamāṁsi | darśatam |
ghṛtāhavanamīḍyam |
sabādho | yaṁ | janeme'gniṁ | havyebhirīḻate |
juhvānāso | yatasrucaḥ |
iyaṁ | te | navyasī | matiragne | adhāyyasmadā |
mandra | sujāta | sukrato'mūra | dasmātithe |
sā | te | agne | śaṁtamā | caniṣṭhā | bhavatu | priyā |
tayā | vardhasva | suṣṭutaḥ |
sā | dyumnairdyumninī | bṛhadupopa | śravasi | śravaḥ |
dadhīta | vṛtratūrye |
aśvamidgāṁ | rathaprāṁ | tveṣamindraṁ | na | satpatim |
yasya | śravāṁsi | tūrvatha | panyaṁpanyaṁ | ca | kṛṣṭayaḥ |
yaṁ | tvā | gopavano | girā | caniṣṭhadagne | aṅgiraḥ |
sa | pāvaka | śrudhī | havam |
yaṁ | tvā | janāseḻate | sabādho | vājasātaye |
sa | bodhi | vṛtratūrye |
ahaṁ | huvānārkṣe | śrutarvaṇi | madacyuti |
śardhāṁsīva | stukāvināṁ | mṛkṣā | śīrṣā | caturṇām |
māṁ | catvārāśavaḥ | śaviṣṭhasya | dravitnavaḥ |
surathāso | abhi | prayo | vakṣanvayo | na | tugryam |
satyamittvā | mahenadi | paruṣṇyava | dediśam |
nemāpo | aśvadātaraḥ | śaviṣṭhādasti | martyaḥ |
yukṣvā | hi | devahūtamām̐ | aśvām̐ | agne | rathīriva |
ni | hotā | pūrvyaḥ | sadaḥ |
uta | no | deva | devām̐ | acchā | voco | viduṣṭaraḥ |
śradviśvā | vāryā | kṛdhi |
tvaṁ | ha | yadyaviṣṭhya | sahasaḥ | sūnavāhuta |
ṛtāvā | yajñiyo | bhuvaḥ |
ayamagniḥ | sahasriṇo | vājasya | śatinaspatiḥ |
mūrdhā | kavī | rayīṇām |
taṁ | nemimṛbhavo | yathā | namasva | sahūtibhiḥ |
nedīyo | yajñamaṅgiraḥ |
tasmai | nūnamabhidyave | vācā | virūpa | nityayā |
vṛṣṇe | codasva | suṣṭutim |
kamu | ṣvidasya | senayāgnerapākacakṣasaḥ |
paṇiṁ | goṣu | starāmahe |
mā | no | devānāṁ | viśaḥ | prasnātīrivosrāḥ |
kṛśaṁ | na | hāsuraghnyāḥ |
mā | naḥ | samasya | dūḍhyaḥ | paridveṣaso | aṁhatiḥ |
ūrmirna | nāvamā | vadhīt |
namaste | agnaujase | gṛṇanti | deva | kṛṣṭayaḥ |
amairamitramardaya |
kuvitsu | no | gaviṣṭaye'gne | saṁveṣiṣo | rayim |
urukṛduru | ṇaskṛdhi |
mā | no | asminmahādhane | parā | vargbhārabhṛdyathā |
saṁvargaṁ | saṁ | rayiṁ | jaya |
anyamasmadbhiyeyamagne | siṣaktu | ducchunā |
vardhā | no | amavacchavaḥ |
yasyājuṣannamasvinaḥ | śamīmadurmakhasya | vā |
taṁ | ghedagnirvṛdhāvati |
parasyādhi | saṁvato'varām̐ | abhyā | tara |
yatrāhamasmi | tām̐ | ava |
vidmā | hi | te | purā | vayamagne | pituryathāvasaḥ |
adhā | te | sumnamīmahe |
imaṁ | nu | māyinaṁ | huvendramīśānamojasā |
marutvantaṁ | na | vṛñjase |
ayamindro | marutsakhā | vi | vṛtrasyābhinacchiraḥ |
vajreṇa | śataparvaṇā |
vāvṛdhāno | marutsakhendro | vi | vṛtramairayat |
sṛjantsamudriyāpaḥ |
ayaṁ | ha | yena | vedaṁ | svarmarutvatā | jitam |
indreṇa | somapītaye |
marutvantamṛjīṣiṇamojasvantaṁ | virapśinam |
indraṁ | gīrbhirhavāmahe |
indraṁ | pratnena | manmanā | marutvantaṁ | havāmahe |
asya | somasya | pītaye |
marutvām̐ | indra | mīḍhvaḥ | pibā | somaṁ | śatakrato |
asminyajñe | puruṣṭuta |
tubhyedindra | marutvate | sutāḥ | somāso | adrivaḥ |
hṛdā | hūyantokthinaḥ |
pibedindra | marutsakhā | sutaṁ | somaṁ | diviṣṭiṣu |
vajraṁ | śiśānaujasā |
uttiṣṭhannojasā | saha | pītvī | śipre | avepayaḥ |
somamindra | camū | sutam |
anu | tvā | rodasī | ubhe | krakṣamāṇamakṛpetām |
indra | yaddasyuhābhavaḥ |
vācamaṣṭāpadīmahaṁ | navasraktimṛtaspṛśam |
indrātpari | tanvaṁ | mame |
jajñāno | nu | śatakraturvi | pṛcchaditi | mātaram |
kogrāḥ | ke | ha | śṛṇvire |
ādīṁ | śavasyabravīdaurṇavābhamahīśuvam |
te | putra | santu | niṣṭuraḥ |
samittānvṛtrahākhidatkhe | arām̐ | iva | khedayā |
pravṛddho | dasyuhābhavat |
ekayā | pratidhāpibatsākaṁ | sarāṁsi | triṁśatam |
indraḥ | somasya | kāṇukā |
abhi | gandharvamatṛṇadabudhneṣu | rajaḥsvā |
indro | brahmabhyedvṛdhe |
nirāvidhyadgiribhyā | dhārayatpakvamodanam |
indro | bundaṁ | svātatam |
śatabradhneṣustava | sahasraparṇaika | it |
yamindra | cakṛṣe | yujam |
tena | stotṛbhyā | bhara | nṛbhyo | nāribhyo | attave |
sadyo | jāta | ṛbhuṣṭhira |
etā | cyautnāni | te | kṛtā | varṣiṣṭhāni | parīṇasā |
hṛdā | vīḍvadhārayaḥ |
viśvettā | viṣṇurābharadurukramastveṣitaḥ |
śataṁ | mahiṣānkṣīrapākamodanaṁ | varāhamindraimuṣam |
tuvikṣaṁ | te | sukṛtaṁ | sūmayaṁ | dhanuḥ | sādhurbundo | hiraṇyayaḥ |
ubhā | te | bāhū | raṇyā | susaṁskṛta | ṛdūpe | cidṛdūvṛdhā |
puroḻāśaṁ | no | andhasendra | sahasramā | bhara |
śatā | ca | śūra | gonām |
ā | no | bhara | vyañjanaṁ | gāmaśvamabhyañjanam |
sacā | manā | hiraṇyayā |
uta | naḥ | karṇaśobhanā | purūṇi | dhṛṣṇavā | bhara |
tvaṁ | hi | śṛṇviṣe | vaso |
nakīṁ | vṛdhīkendra | te | na | suṣā | na | sudota |
nānyastvacchūra | vāghataḥ |
nakīmindro | nikartave | na | śakraḥ | pariśaktave |
viśvaṁ | śṛṇoti | paśyati |
sa | manyuṁ | martyānāmadabdho | ni | cikīṣate |
purā | nidaścikīṣate |
kratvetpūrṇamudaraṁ | turasyāsti | vidhataḥ |
vṛtraghnaḥ | somapāvnaḥ |
tve | vasūni | saṁgatā | viśvā | ca | soma | saubhagā |
sudātvaparihvṛtā |
tvāmidyavayurmama | kāmo | gavyurhiraṇyayuḥ |
tvāmaśvayureṣate |
tavedindrāhamāśasā | haste | dātraṁ | canā | dade |
dinasya | vā | maghavantsaṁbhṛtasya | vā | pūrdhi | yavasya | kāśinā |
ayaṁ | kṛtnuragṛbhīto | viśvajidudbhiditsomaḥ |
ṛṣirvipraḥ | kāvyena |
abhyūrṇoti | yannagnaṁ | bhiṣakti | viśvaṁ | yatturam |
premandhaḥ | khyanniḥ | śroṇo | bhūt |
tvaṁ | soma | tanūkṛdbhyo | dveṣobhyo'nyakṛtebhyaḥ |
uru | yantāsi | varūtham |
tvaṁ | cittī | tava | dakṣairdivā | pṛthivyā | ṛjīṣin |
yāvīraghasya | ciddveṣaḥ |
arthino | yanti | cedarthaṁ | gacchāniddaduṣo | rātim |
vavṛjyustṛṣyataḥ | kāmam |
vidadyatpūrvyaṁ | naṣṭamudīmṛtāyumīrayat |
premāyustārīdatīrṇam |
suśevo | no | mṛḻayākuradṛptakraturavātaḥ |
bhavā | naḥ | soma | śaṁ | hṛde |
mā | naḥ | soma | saṁ | vīvijo | mā | vi | bībhiṣathā | rājan |
mā | no | hārdi | tviṣā | vadhīḥ |
ava | yatsve | sadhasthe | devānāṁ | durmatīrīkṣe |
rājannapa | dviṣaḥ | sedha | mīḍhvo | apa | sridhaḥ | sedha |
nahyanyaṁ | baḻākaraṁ | marḍitāraṁ | śatakrato |
tvaṁ | nendra | mṛḻaya |
yo | naḥ | śaśvatpurāvithāmṛdhro | vājasātaye |
sa | tvaṁ | nendra | mṛḻaya |
kimaṅga | radhracodanaḥ | sunvānasyāvitedasi |
kuvitsvindra | ṇaḥ | śakaḥ |
indra | pra | ṇo | rathamava | paścāccitsantamadrivaḥ |
purastādenaṁ | me | kṛdhi |
hanto | nu | kimāsase | prathamaṁ | no | rathaṁ | kṛdhi |
upamaṁ | vājayu | śravaḥ |
avā | no | vājayuṁ | rathaṁ | sukaraṁ | te | kimitpari |
asmāntsu | jigyuṣaskṛdhi |
indra | dṛhyasva | pūrasi | bhadrā | taiti | niṣkṛtam |
iyaṁ | dhīrṛtviyāvatī |
mā | sīmavadyā | bhāgurvī | kāṣṭhā | hitaṁ | dhanam |
apāvṛktāratnayaḥ |
turīyaṁ | nāma | yajñiyaṁ | yadā | karastaduśmasi |
āditpatirnauhase |
avīvṛdhadvo | amṛtāmandīdekadyūrdevā | uta | yāśca | devīḥ |
tasmo | rādhaḥ | kṛṇuta | praśastaṁ | prātarmakṣū | dhiyāvasurjagamyāt |
ā | tū | nendra | kṣumantaṁ | citraṁ | grābhaṁ | saṁ | gṛbhāya |
mahāhastī | dakṣiṇena |
vidmā | hi | tvā | tuvikūrmiṁ | tuvideṣṇaṁ | tuvīmagham |
tuvimātramavobhiḥ |
nahi | tvā | śūra | devā | na | martāso | ditsantam |
bhīmaṁ | na | gāṁ | vārayante |
eto | nvindraṁ | stavāmeśānaṁ | vasvaḥ | svarājam |
na | rādhasā | mardhiṣannaḥ |
pra | stoṣadupa | gāsiṣacchravatsāma | gīyamānam |
abhi | rādhasā | jugurat |
ā | no | bhara | dakṣiṇenābhi | savyena | pra | mṛśa |
indra | mā | no | vasornirbhāk |
upa | kramasvā | bhara | dhṛṣatā | dhṛṣṇo | janānām |
adāśūṣṭarasya | vedaḥ |
indra | yo | nu | te | asti | vājo | viprebhiḥ | sanitvaḥ |
asmābhiḥ | su | taṁ | sanuhi |
sadyojuvaste | vājāsmabhyaṁ | viśvaścandrāḥ |
vaśaiśca | makṣū | jarante |
ā | pra | drava | parāvato'rvāvataśca | vṛtrahan |
madhvaḥ | prati | prabharmaṇi |
tīvrāḥ | somāsā | gahi | sutāso | mādayiṣṇavaḥ |
pibā | dadhṛgyathociṣe |
iṣā | mandasvādu | te'raṁ | varāya | manyave |
bhuvattendra | śaṁ | hṛde |
ā | tvaśatravā | gahi | nyukthāni | ca | hūyase |
upame | rocane | divaḥ |
tubhyāyamadribhiḥ | suto | gobhiḥ | śrīto | madāya | kam |
pra | somendra | hūyate |
indra | śrudhi | su | me | havamasme | sutasya | gomataḥ |
vi | pītiṁ | tṛptimaśnuhi |
yendra | camaseṣvā | somaścamūṣu | te | sutaḥ |
pibedasya | tvamīśiṣe |
yo | apsu | candrameva | somaścamūṣu | dadṛśe |
pibedasya | tvamīśiṣe |
yaṁ | te | śyenaḥ | padābharattiro | rajāṁsyaspṛtam |
pibedasya | tvamīśiṣe |
devānāmidavo | mahattadā | vṛṇīmahe | vayam |
vṛṣṇāmasmabhyamūtaye |
te | naḥ | santu | yujaḥ | sadā | varuṇo | mitro | aryamā |
vṛdhāsaśca | pracetasaḥ |
ati | no | viṣpitā | puru | naubhirapo | na | parṣatha |
yūyamṛtasya | rathyaḥ |
vāmaṁ | no | astvaryamanvāmaṁ | varuṇa | śaṁsyam |
vāmaṁ | hyāvṛṇīmahe |
vāmasya | hi | pracetaseśānāśo | riśādasaḥ |
nemādityāghasya | yat |
vayamidvaḥ | sudānavaḥ | kṣiyanto | yānto | adhvannā |
devā | vṛdhāya | hūmahe |
adhi | nendraiṣāṁ | viṣṇo | sajātyānām |
itā | maruto | aśvinā |
pra | bhrātṛtvaṁ | sudānavo'dha | dvitā | samānyā |
māturgarbhe | bharāmahe |
yūyaṁ | hi | ṣṭhā | sudānavendrajyeṣṭhā | abhidyavaḥ |
adhā | cidvota | bruve |
preṣṭhaṁ | vo | atithiṁ | stuṣe | mitramiva | priyam |
agniṁ | rathaṁ | na | vedyam |
kavimiva | pracetasaṁ | yaṁ | devāso | adha | dvitā |
ni | martyeṣvādadhuḥ |
tvaṁ | yaviṣṭha | dāśuṣo | nṝm̐ḥ | pāhi | śṛṇudhī | giraḥ |
rakṣā | tokamuta | tmanā |
kayā | te | agne | aṅgirorjo | napādupastutim |
varāya | deva | manyave |
dāśema | kasya | manasā | yajñasya | sahaso | yaho |
kadu | vocedaṁ | namaḥ |
adhā | tvaṁ | hi | naskaro | viśvāsmabhyaṁ | sukṣitīḥ |
vājadraviṇaso | giraḥ |
kasya | nūnaṁ | parīṇaso | dhiyo | jinvasi | daṁpate |
goṣātā | yasya | te | giraḥ |
taṁ | marjayanta | sukratuṁ | puroyāvānamājiṣu |
sveṣu | kṣayeṣu | vājinam |
kṣeti | kṣemebhiḥ | sādhubhirnakiryaṁ | ghnanti | hanti | yaḥ |
agne | suvīraidhate |
ā | me | havaṁ | nāsatyāśvinā | gacchataṁ | yuvam |
madhvaḥ | somasya | pītaye |
imaṁ | me | stomamaśvinemaṁ | me | śṛṇutaṁ | havam |
madhvaḥ | somasya | pītaye |
ayaṁ | vāṁ | kṛṣṇo | aśvinā | havate | vājinīvasū |
madhvaḥ | somasya | pītaye |
śṛṇutaṁ | jariturhavaṁ | kṛṣṇasya | stuvato | narā |
madhvaḥ | somasya | pītaye |
chardiryantamadābhyaṁ | viprāya | stuvate | narā |
madhvaḥ | somasya | pītaye |
gacchataṁ | dāśuṣo | gṛhamitthā | stuvato | aśvinā |
madhvaḥ | somasya | pītaye |
yuñjāthāṁ | rāsabhaṁ | rathe | vīḍvaṅge | vṛṣaṇvasū |
madhvaḥ | somasya | pītaye |
trivandhureṇa | trivṛtā | rathenā | yātamaśvinā |
madhvaḥ | somasya | pītaye |
nū | me | giro | nāsatyāśvinā | prāvataṁ | yuvam |
madhvaḥ | somasya | pītaye |
ubhā | hi | dasrā | bhiṣajā | mayobhuvobhā | dakṣasya | vacaso | babhūvathuḥ |
tā | vāṁ | viśvako | havate | tanūkṛthe | mā | no | vi | yauṣṭaṁ | sakhyā | mumocatam |
kathā | nūnaṁ | vāṁ | vimanopa | stavadyuvaṁ | dhiyaṁ | dadathurvasyaïṣṭaye |
tā | vāṁ | viśvako | havate | tanūkṛthe | mā | no | vi | yauṣṭaṁ | sakhyā | mumocatam |
yuvaṁ | hi | ṣmā | purubhujemamedhatuṁ | viṣṇāpve | dadathurvasyaïṣṭaye |
tā | vāṁ | viśvako | havate | tanūkṛthe | mā | no | vi | yauṣṭaṁ | sakhyā | mumocatam |
uta | tyaṁ | vīraṁ | dhanasāmṛjīṣiṇaṁ | dūre | citsantamavase | havāmahe |
yasya | svādiṣṭhā | sumatiḥ | pituryathā | mā | no | vi | yauṣṭaṁ | sakhyā | mumocatam |
ṛtena | devaḥ | savitā | śamāyata | ṛtasya | śṛṅgamurviyā | vi | paprathe |
ṛtaṁ | sāsāha | mahi | citpṛtanyato | mā | no | vi | yauṣṭaṁ | sakhyā | mumocatam |
dyumnī | vāṁ | stomo | aśvinā | krivirna | sekā | gatam |
madhvaḥ | sutasya | sa | divi | priyo | narā | pātaṁ | gaurāviveriṇe |
pibataṁ | gharmaṁ | madhumantamaśvinā | barhiḥ | sīdataṁ | narā |
tā | mandasānā | manuṣo | duroṇā | ni | pātaṁ | vedasā | vayaḥ |
ā | vāṁ | viśvābhirūtibhiḥ | priyamedhāhūṣata |
tā | vartiryātamupa | vṛktabarhiṣo | juṣṭaṁ | yajñaṁ | diviṣṭiṣu |
pibataṁ | somaṁ | madhumantamaśvinā | barhiḥ | sīdataṁ | sumat |
tā | vāvṛdhānopa | suṣṭutiṁ | divo | gantaṁ | gaurāviveriṇam |
ā | nūnaṁ | yātamaśvināśvebhiḥ | pruṣitapsubhiḥ |
dasrā | hiraṇyavartanī | śubhaspatī | pātaṁ | somamṛtāvṛdhā |
vayaṁ | hi | vāṁ | havāmahe | vipanyavo | viprāso | vājasātaye |
tā | valgū | dasrā | purudaṁsasā | dhiyāśvinā | śruṣṭyā | gatam |
taṁ | vo | dasmamṛtīṣahaṁ | vasormandānamandhasaḥ |
abhi | vatsaṁ | na | svasareṣu | dhenavendraṁ | gīrbhirnavāmahe |
dyukṣaṁ | sudānuṁ | taviṣībhirāvṛtaṁ | giriṁ | na | purubhojasam |
kṣumantaṁ | vājaṁ | śatinaṁ | sahasriṇaṁ | makṣū | gomantamīmahe |
na | tvā | bṛhanto | adrayo | varantendra | vīḻavaḥ |
yadditsasi | stuvate | māvate | vasu | nakiṣṭadā | mināti | te |
yoddhāsi | kratvā | śavasota | daṁsanā | viśvā | jātābhi | majmanā |
ā | tvāyamarkotaye | vavartati | yaṁ | gotamājījanan |
pra | hi | ririkṣaujasā | divo | antebhyaspari |
na | tvā | vivyāca | rajendra | pārthivamanu | svadhāṁ | vavakṣitha |
nakiḥ | pariṣṭirmaghavanmaghasya | te | yaddāśuṣe | daśasyasi |
asmākaṁ | bodhyucathasya | coditā | maṁhiṣṭho | vājasātaye |
bṛhadindrāya | gāyata | maruto | vṛtrahaṁtamam |
yena | jyotirajanayannṛtāvṛdho | devaṁ | devāya | jāgṛvi |
apādhamadabhiśastīraśastihāthendro | dyumnyābhavat |
devāstendra | sakhyāya | yemire | bṛhadbhāno | marudgaṇa |
pra | vendrāya | bṛhate | maruto | brahmārcata |
vṛtraṁ | hanati | vṛtrahā | śatakraturvajreṇa | śataparvaṇā |
abhi | pra | bhara | dhṛṣatā | dhṛṣanmanaḥ | śravaścitte | asadbṛhat |
arṣantvāpo | javasā | vi | mātaro | hano | vṛtraṁ | jayā | svaḥ |
yajjāyathāpūrvya | maghavanvṛtrahatyāya |
tatpṛthivīmaprathayastadastabhnota | dyām |
tatte | yajño | ajāyata | tadarkota | haskṛtiḥ |
tadviśvamabhibhūrasi | yajjātaṁ | yacca | jantvam |
āmāsu | pakvamairayā | sūryaṁ | rohayo | divi |
gharmaṁ | na | sāmantapatā | suvṛktibhirjuṣṭaṁ | girvaṇase | bṛhat |
ā | no | viśvāsu | havyendraḥ | samatsu | bhūṣatu |
upa | brahmāṇi | savanāni | vṛtrahā | paramajyā | ṛcīṣamaḥ |
tvaṁ | dātā | prathamo | rādhasāmasyasi | satyeśānakṛt |
tuvidyumnasya | yujyā | vṛṇīmahe | putrasya | śavaso | mahaḥ |
brahmā | tendra | girvaṇaḥ | kriyante | anatidbhutā |
imā | juṣasva | haryaśva | yojanendra | yā | te | amanmahi |
tvaṁ | hi | satyo | maghavannanānato | vṛtrā | bhūri | nyṛñjase |
sa | tvaṁ | śaviṣṭha | vajrahasta | dāśuṣe'rvāñcaṁ | rayimā | kṛdhi |
tvamindra | yaśāsyṛjīṣī | śavasaspate |
tvaṁ | vṛtrāṇi | haṁsyapratīnyekedanuttā | carṣaṇīdhṛtā |
tamu | tvā | nūnamasura | pracetasaṁ | rādho | bhāgamivemahe |
mahīva | kṛttiḥ | śaraṇā | tendra | pra | te | sumnā | no | aśnavan |
kanyā | vāravāyatī | somamapi | srutāvidat |
astaṁ | bharantyabravīdindrāya | sunavai | tvā | śakrāya | sunavai | tvā |
asau | yaiṣi | vīrako | gṛhaṁgṛhaṁ | vicākaśat |
imaṁ | jambhasutaṁ | piba | dhānāvantaṁ | karambhiṇamapūpavantamukthinam |
ā | cana | tvā | cikitsāmo'dhi | cana | tvā | nemasi |
śanairiva | śanakairivendrāyendo | pari | srava |
kuvicchakatkuvitkaratkuvinno | vasyasaskarat |
kuvitpatidviṣo | yatīrindreṇa | saṁgamāmahai |
imāni | trīṇi | viṣṭapā | tānīndra | vi | rohaya |
śirastatasyorvarāmādidaṁ | mopodare |
asau | ca | yā | norvarādimāṁ | tanvaṁ | mama |
atho | tatasya | yacchiraḥ | sarvā | tā | romaśā | kṛdhi |
khe | rathasya | khe'nasaḥ | khe | yugasya | śatakrato |
apālāmindra | triṣpūtvyakṛṇoḥ | sūryatvacam |
pāntamā | vo | andhasendramabhi | pra | gāyata |
viśvāsāhaṁ | śatakratuṁ | maṁhiṣṭhaṁ | carṣaṇīnām |
puruhūtaṁ | puruṣṭutaṁ | gāthānyaṁ | sanaśrutam |
indreti | bravītana |
indrenno | mahānāṁ | dātā | vājānāṁ | nṛtuḥ |
mahām̐ | abhijñvā | yamat |
apādu | śipryandhasaḥ | sudakṣasya | prahoṣiṇaḥ |
indorindro | yavāśiraḥ |
tamvabhi | prārcatendraṁ | somasya | pītaye |
tadiddhyasya | vardhanam |
asya | pītvā | madānāṁ | devo | devasyaujasā |
viśvābhi | bhuvanā | bhuvat |
tyamu | vaḥ | satrāsāhaṁ | viśvāsu | gīrṣvāyatam |
ā | cyāvayasyūtaye |
yudhmaṁ | santamanarvāṇaṁ | somapāmanapacyutam |
naramavāryakratum |
śikṣā | ṇendra | rāyā | puru | vidvām̐ | ṛcīṣama |
avā | naḥ | pārye | dhane |
ataścidindra | ṇopā | yāhi | śatavājayā |
iṣā | sahasravājayā |
ayāma | dhīvato | dhiyo'rvadbhiḥ | śakra | godare |
jayema | pṛtsu | vajrivaḥ |
vayamu | tvā | śatakrato | gāvo | na | yavaseṣvā |
uktheṣu | raṇayāmasi |
viśvā | hi | martyatvanānukāmā | śatakrato |
aganma | vajrinnāśasaḥ |
tve | su | putra | śavaso'vṛtrankāmakātayaḥ |
na | tvāmindrāti | ricyate |
sa | no | vṛṣantsaniṣṭhayā | saṁ | ghorayā | dravitnvā |
dhiyāviḍḍhi | puraṁdhyā |
yaste | nūnaṁ | śatakratavindra | dyumnitamo | madaḥ |
tena | nūnaṁ | made | madeḥ |
yaste | citraśravastamo | yendra | vṛtrahantamaḥ |
yaujodātamo | madaḥ |
vidmā | hi | yaste | adrivastvādattaḥ | satya | somapāḥ |
viśvāsu | dasma | kṛṣṭiṣu |
indrāya | madvane | sutaṁ | pari | ṣṭobhantu | no | giraḥ |
arkamarcantu | kāravaḥ |
yasminviśvādhi | śriyo | raṇanti | sapta | saṁsadaḥ |
indraṁ | sute | havāmahe |
trikadrukeṣu | cetanaṁ | devāso | yajñamatnata |
tamidvardhantu | no | giraḥ |
ā | tvā | viśantvindavaḥ | samudramiva | sindhavaḥ |
na | tvāmindrāti | ricyate |
vivyaktha | mahinā | vṛṣanbhakṣaṁ | somasya | jāgṛve |
yendra | jaṭhareṣu | te |
araṁ | tendra | kukṣaye | somo | bhavatu | vṛtrahan |
araṁ | dhāmabhyendavaḥ |
aramaśvāya | gāyati | śrutakakṣo | araṁ | gave |
aramindrasya | dhāmne |
araṁ | hi | ṣma | suteṣu | ṇaḥ | someṣvindra | bhūṣasi |
araṁ | te | śakra | dāvane |
parākāttāccidadrivastvāṁ | nakṣanta | no | giraḥ |
araṁ | gamāma | te | vayam |
evā | hyasi | vīrayurevā | śūrota | sthiraḥ |
evā | te | rādhyaṁ | manaḥ |
evā | rātistuvīmagha | viśvebhirdhāyi | dhātṛbhiḥ |
adhā | cidindra | me | sacā |
mo | ṣu | brahmeva | tandrayurbhuvo | vājānāṁ | pate |
matsvā | sutasya | gomataḥ |
mā | nendrābhyādiśaḥ | sūro | aktuṣvā | yaman |
tvā | yujā | vanema | tat |
tvayedindra | yujā | vayaṁ | prati | bruvīmahi | spṛdhaḥ |
tvamasmākaṁ | tava | smasi |
tvāmiddhi | tvāyavo'nunonuvataścarān |
sakhāyendra | kāravaḥ |
udghedabhi | śrutāmaghaṁ | vṛṣabhaṁ | naryāpasam |
astārameṣi | sūrya |
nava | yo | navatiṁ | puro | bibheda | bāhvojasā |
ahiṁ | ca | vṛtrahāvadhīt |
sa | nendraḥ | śivaḥ | sakhāśvāvadgomadyavamat |
urudhāreva | dohate |
yadadya | kacca | vṛtrahannudagābhi | sūrya |
sarvaṁ | tadindra | te | vaśe |
yadvā | pravṛddha | satpate | na | mareti | manyase |
uto | tatsatyamittava |
ye | somāsaḥ | parāvati | ye | arvāvati | sunvire |
sarvām̐stām̐ | indra | gacchasi |
tamindraṁ | vājayāmasi | mahe | vṛtrāya | hantave |
sa | vṛṣā | vṛṣabho | bhuvat |
indraḥ | sa | dāmane | kṛtaujiṣṭhaḥ | sa | made | hitaḥ |
dyumnī | ślokī | sa | somyaḥ |
girā | vajro | na | saṁbhṛtaḥ | sabalo | anapacyutaḥ |
vavakṣa | ṛṣvo | astṛtaḥ |
durge | cinnaḥ | sugaṁ | kṛdhi | gṛṇānendra | girvaṇaḥ |
tvaṁ | ca | maghavanvaśaḥ |
yasya | te | nū | cidādiśaṁ | na | minanti | svarājyam |
na | devo | nādhrigurjanaḥ |
adhā | te | apratiṣkutaṁ | devī | śuṣmaṁ | saparyataḥ |
ubhe | suśipra | rodasī |
tvametadadhārayaḥ | kṛṣṇāsu | rohiṇīṣu | ca |
paruṣṇīṣu | ruśatpayaḥ |
vi | yadaheradha | tviṣo | viśve | devāso | akramuḥ |
vidanmṛgasya | tām̐ | amaḥ |
ādu | me | nivaro | bhuvadvṛtrahādiṣṭa | pauṁsyam |
ajātaśatrurastṛtaḥ |
śrutaṁ | vo | vṛtrahantamaṁ | pra | śardhaṁ | carṣaṇīnām |
ā | śuṣe | rādhase | mahe |
ayā | dhiyā | ca | gavyayā | puruṇāmanpuruṣṭuta |
yatsomesomābhavaḥ |
bodhinmanedastu | no | vṛtrahā | bhūryāsutiḥ |
śṛṇotu | śakrāśiṣam |
kayā | tvaṁ | notyābhi | pra | mandase | vṛṣan |
kayā | stotṛbhyā | bhara |
kasya | vṛṣā | sute | sacā | niyutvānvṛṣabho | raṇat |
vṛtrahā | somapītaye |
abhī | ṣu | ṇastvaṁ | rayiṁ | mandasānaḥ | sahasriṇam |
prayantā | bodhi | dāśuṣe |
patnīvantaḥ | sutema | uśanto | yanti | vītaye |
apāṁ | jagmirnicumpuṇaḥ |
iṣṭā | hotrāsṛkṣatendraṁ | vṛdhāso | adhvare |
acchāvabhṛthamojasā |
iha | tyā | sadhamādyā | harī | hiraṇyakeśyā |
voḻhāmabhi | prayo | hitam |
tubhyaṁ | somāḥ | suteme | stīrṇaṁ | barhirvibhāvaso |
stotṛbhyendramā | vaha |
ā | te | dakṣaṁ | vi | rocanā | dadhadratnā | vi | dāśuṣe |
stotṛbhyendramarcata |
ā | te | dadhāmīndriyamukthā | viśvā | śatakrato |
stotṛbhyendra | mṛḻaya |
bhadraṁbhadraṁ | nā | bhareṣamūrjaṁ | śatakrato |
yadindra | mṛḻayāsi | naḥ |
sa | no | viśvānyā | bhara | suvitāni | śatakrato |
yadindra | mṛḻayāsi | naḥ |
tvāmidvṛtrahantama | sutāvanto | havāmahe |
yadindra | mṛḻayāsi | naḥ |
upa | no | haribhiḥ | sutaṁ | yāhi | madānāṁ | pate |
upa | no | haribhiḥ | sutam |
dvitā | yo | vṛtrahantamo | videndraḥ | śatakratuḥ |
upa | no | haribhiḥ | sutam |
tvaṁ | hi | vṛtrahanneṣāṁ | pātā | somānāmasi |
upa | no | haribhiḥ | sutam |
indreṣe | dadātu | na | ṛbhukṣaṇamṛbhuṁ | rayim |
vājī | dadātu | vājinam |
gaurdhayati | marutāṁ | śravasyurmātā | maghonām |
yuktā | vahnī | rathānām |
yasyā | devopasthe | vratā | viśve | dhārayante |
sūryāmāsā | dṛśe | kam |
tatsu | no | viśve | aryā | sadā | gṛṇanti | kāravaḥ |
marutaḥ | somapītaye |
asti | somo | ayaṁ | sutaḥ | pibantyasya | marutaḥ |
uta | svarājo | aśvinā |
pibanti | mitro | aryamā | tanā | pūtasya | varuṇaḥ |
triṣadhasthasya | jāvataḥ |
uto | nvasya | joṣamām̐ | indraḥ | sutasya | gomataḥ |
prātarhoteva | matsati |
kadatviṣanta | sūrayastirāpa | iva | sridhaḥ |
arṣanti | pūtadakṣasaḥ |
kadvo | adya | mahānāṁ | devānāmavo | vṛṇe |
tmanā | ca | dasmavarcasām |
ā | ye | viśvā | pārthivāni | paprathanrocanā | divaḥ |
marutaḥ | somapītaye |
tyānnu | pūtadakṣaso | divo | vo | maruto | huve |
asya | somasya | pītaye |
tyānnu | ye | vi | rodasī | tastabhurmaruto | huve |
asya | somasya | pītaye |
tyaṁ | nu | mārutaṁ | gaṇaṁ | giriṣṭhāṁ | vṛṣaṇaṁ | huve |
asya | somasya | pītaye |
ā | tvā | giro | rathīrivāsthuḥ | suteṣu | girvaṇaḥ |
abhi | tvā | samanūṣatendra | vatsaṁ | na | mātaraḥ |
ā | tvā | śukrācucyavuḥ | sutāsendra | girvaṇaḥ |
pibā | tvasyāndhasendra | viśvāsu | te | hitam |
pibā | somaṁ | madāya | kamindra | śyenābhṛtaṁ | sutam |
tvaṁ | hi | śaśvatīnāṁ | patī | rājā | viśāmasi |
śrudhī | havaṁ | tiraścyendra | yastvā | saparyati |
suvīryasya | gomato | rāyaspūrdhi | mahām̐ | asi |
indra | yaste | navīyasīṁ | giraṁ | mandrāmajījanat |
cikitvinmanasaṁ | dhiyaṁ | pratnāmṛtasya | pipyuṣīm |
tamu | ṣṭavāma | yaṁ | girendramukthāni | vāvṛdhuḥ |
purūṇyasya | pauṁsyā | siṣāsanto | vanāmahe |
eto | nvindraṁ | stavāma | śuddhaṁ | śuddhena | sāmnā |
śuddhairukthairvāvṛdhvāṁsaṁ | śuddhāśīrvānmamattu |
indra | śuddho | nā | gahi | śuddhaḥ | śuddhābhirūtibhiḥ |
śuddho | rayiṁ | ni | dhāraya | śuddho | mamaddhi | somyaḥ |
indra | śuddho | hi | no | rayiṁ | śuddho | ratnāni | dāśuṣe |
śuddho | vṛtrāṇi | jighnase | śuddho | vājaṁ | siṣāsasi |
asmoṣāsa | ātiranta | yāmamindrāya | naktamūrmyāḥ | suvācaḥ |
asmāpo | mātaraḥ | sapta | tasthurnṛbhyastarāya | sindhavaḥ | supārāḥ |
atividdhā | vithureṇā | cidastrā | triḥ | sapta | sānu | saṁhitā | girīṇām |
na | taddevo | na | martyastuturyādyāni | pravṛddho | vṛṣabhaścakāra |
indrasya | vajrāyaso | nimiślendrasya | bāhvorbhūyiṣṭhamojaḥ |
śīrṣannindrasya | kratavo | nirekāsanneṣanta | śrutyopāke |
manye | tvā | yajñiyaṁ | yajñiyānāṁ | manye | tvā | cyavanamacyutānām |
manye | tvā | satvanāmindra | ketuṁ | manye | tvā | vṛṣabhaṁ | carṣaṇīnām |
ā | yadvajraṁ | bāhvorindra | dhatse | madacyutamahaye | hantavo |
pra | parvatānavanta | pra | gāvaḥ | pra | brahmāṇo | abhinakṣantendram |
tamu | ṣṭavāma | yemā | jajāna | viśvā | jātānyavarāṇyasmāt |
indreṇa | mitraṁ | didhiṣema | gīrbhirupo | namobhirvṛṣabhaṁ | viśema |
vṛtrasya | tvā | śvasathādīṣamāṇā | viśve | devājahurye | sakhāyaḥ |
marudbhirindra | sakhyaṁ | te | astvathemā | viśvāḥ | pṛtanā | jayāsi |
triḥ | ṣaṣṭistvā | maruto | vāvṛdhānosrā | iva | rāśayo | yajñiyāsaḥ |
upa | tvemaḥ | kṛdhi | no | bhāgadheyaṁ | śuṣmaṁ | tainā | haviṣā | vidhema |
tigmamāyudhaṁ | marutāmanīkaṁ | kastendra | prati | vajraṁ | dadharṣa |
anāyudhāso | asurādevāścakreṇa | tām̐ | apa | vapa | ṛjīṣin |
mahogrāya | tavase | suvṛktiṁ | preraya | śivatamāya | paśvaḥ |
girvāhase | girendrāya | pūrvīrdhehi | tanve | kuvidaṅga | vedat |
ukthavāhase | vibhve | manīṣāṁ | druṇā | na | pāramīrayā | nadīnām |
ni | spṛśa | dhiyā | tanvi | śrutasya | juṣṭatarasya | kuvidaṅga | vedat |
tadviviḍḍhi | yattendro | jujoṣatstuhi | suṣṭutiṁ | namasā | vivāsa |
upa | bhūṣa | jaritarmā | ruvaṇyaḥ | śrāvayā | vācaṁ | kuvidaṅga | vedat |
ava | drapso | aṁśumatīmatiṣṭhadiyānaḥ | kṛṣṇo | daśabhiḥ | sahasraiḥ |
āvattamindraḥ | śacyā | dhamantamapa | snehitīrnṛmaṇādhatta |
drapsamapaśyaṁ | viṣuṇe | carantamupahvare | nadyo | aṁśumatyāḥ |
nabho | na | kṛṣṇamavatasthivāṁsamiṣyāmi | vo | vṛṣaṇo | yudhyatājau |
adha | drapso | aṁśumatyopasthe'dhārayattanvaṁ | titviṣāṇaḥ |
viśo | adevīrabhyācarantīrbṛhaspatinā | yujendraḥ | sasāhe |
tvaṁ | ha | tyatsaptabhyo | jāyamāno'śatrubhyo | abhavaḥ | śatrurindra |
gūḻhe | dyāvāpṛthivī | anvavindo | vibhumadbhyo | bhuvanebhyo | raṇaṁ | dhāḥ |
tvaṁ | ha | tyadapratimānamojo | vajreṇa | vajrindhṛṣito | jaghantha |
tvaṁ | śuṣṇasyāvātiro | vadhatraistvaṁ | gendra | śacyedavindaḥ |
tvaṁ | ha | tyadvṛṣabha | carṣaṇīnāṁ | ghano | vṛtrāṇāṁ | taviṣo | babhūtha |
tvaṁ | sindhūm̐rasṛjastastabhānāntvamapo | ajayo | dāsapatnīḥ |
sa | sukratū | raṇitā | yaḥ | suteṣvanuttamanyuryo | aheva | revān |
yaika | innaryapāṁsi | kartā | sa | vṛtrahā | pratīdanyamāhuḥ |
sa | vṛtrahendraścarṣaṇīdhṛttaṁ | suṣṭutyā | havyaṁ | huvema |
sa | prāvitā | maghavā | no'dhivaktā | sa | vājasya | śravasyasya | dātā |
sa | vṛtrahendra | ṛbhukṣāḥ | sadyo | jajñāno | havyo | babhūva |
kṛṇvannapāṁsi | naryā | purūṇi | somo | na | pīto | havyaḥ | sakhibhyaḥ |
yendra | bhujābharaḥ | svarvām̐ | asurebhyaḥ |
stotāraminmaghavannasya | vardhaya | ye | ca | tve | vṛktabarhiṣaḥ |
yamindra | dadhiṣe | tvamaśvaṁ | gāṁ | bhāgamavyayam |
yajamāne | sunvati | dakṣiṇāvati | tasmintaṁ | dhehi | mā | paṇau |
yendra | sastyavrato'nuṣvāpamadevayuḥ |
svaiḥ | ṣaivairmumuratpoṣyaṁ | rayiṁ | sanutardhehi | taṁ | tataḥ |
yacchakrāsi | parāvati | yadarvāvati | vṛtrahan |
atastvā | gīrbhirdyugadindra | keśibhiḥ | sutāvām̐ | ā | vivāsati |
yadvāsi | rocane | divaḥ | samudrasyādhi | viṣṭapi |
yatpārthive | sadane | vṛtrahantama | yadantarikṣā | gahi |
sa | naḥ | someṣu | somapāḥ | suteṣu | śavasaspate |
mādayasva | rādhasā | sūnṛtāvatendra | rāyā | parīṇasā |
mā | nendra | parā | vṛṇagbhavā | naḥ | sadhamādyaḥ |
tvaṁ | notī | tvaminnāpyaṁ | mā | nendra | parā | vṛṇak |
asme | indra | sacā | sute | ni | ṣadā | pītaye | madhu |
kṛdhī | jaritre | maghavannavo | mahadasme | indra | sacā | sute |
na | tvā | devāsāśata | na | martyāso | adrivaḥ |
viśvā | jātāni | śavasābhibhūrasi | na | tvā | devāsāśata |
viśvāḥ | pṛtanābhibhūtaraṁ | naraṁ | sajūstatakṣurindraṁ | jajanuśca | rājase |
kratvā | variṣṭhaṁ | varāmurimutogramojiṣṭhaṁ | tavasaṁ | tarasvinam |
samīṁ | rebhāso | asvarannindraṁ | somasya | pītaye |
svarpatiṁ | yadīṁ | vṛdhe | dhṛtavrato | hyojasā | samūtibhiḥ |
nemiṁ | namanti | cakṣasā | meṣaṁ | viprābhisvarā |
sudītayo | vo | adruho'pi | karṇe | tarasvinaḥ | samṛkvabhiḥ |
tamindraṁ | johavīmi | maghavānamugraṁ | satrā | dadhānamapratiṣkutaṁ | śavāṁsi |
maṁhiṣṭho | gīrbhirā | ca | yajñiyo | vavartadrāye | no | viśvā | supathā | kṛṇotu | vajrī |
tvaṁ | purendra | cikidenā | vyojasā | śaviṣṭha | śakra | nāśayadhyai |
tvadviśvāni | bhuvanāni | vajrindyāvā | rejete | pṛthivī | ca | bhīṣā |
tanma | ṛtamindra | śūra | citra | pātvapo | na | vajrinduritāti | parṣi | bhūri |
kadā | nendra | rāyā | daśasyerviśvapsnyasya | spṛhayāyyasya | rājan |
indrāya | sāma | gāyata | viprāya | bṛhate | bṛhat |
dharmakṛte | vipaścite | panasyave |
tvamindrābhibhūrasi | tvaṁ | sūryamarocayaḥ |
viśvakarmā | viśvadevo | mahām̐ | asi |
vibhrājañjyotiṣā | svaragaccho | rocanaṁ | divaḥ |
devāstendra | sakhyāya | yemire |
endra | no | gadhi | priyaḥ | satrājidagohyaḥ |
girirna | viśvataspṛthuḥ | patirdivaḥ |
abhi | hi | satya | somapobhe | babhūtha | rodasī |
indrāsi | sunvato | vṛdhaḥ | patirdivaḥ |
tvaṁ | hi | śaśvatīnāmindra | dartā | purāmasi |
hantā | dasyormanorvṛdhaḥ | patirdivaḥ |
adhā | hīndra | girvaṇopa | tvā | kāmānmahaḥ | sasṛjmahe |
udeva | yantodabhiḥ |
vārṇa | tvā | yavyābhirvardhanti | śūra | brahmāṇi |
vāvṛdhvāṁsaṁ | cidadrivo | divedive |
yuñjanti | harīṣirasya | gāthayorau | rathoruyuge |
indravāhā | vacoyujā |
tvaṁ | nendrā | bharam̐ | ojo | nṛmṇaṁ | śatakrato | vicarṣaṇe |
ā | vīraṁ | pṛtanāṣaham |
tvaṁ | hi | naḥ | pitā | vaso | tvaṁ | mātā | śatakrato | babhūvitha |
adhā | te | sumnamīmahe |
tvāṁ | śuṣminpuruhūta | vājayantamupa | bruve | śatakrato |
sa | no | rāsva | suvīryam |
tvāmidā | hyo | naro'pīpyanvajrinbhūrṇayaḥ |
sendra | stomavāhasāmiha | śrudhyupa | svasaramā | gahi |
matsvā | suśipra | harivastadīmahe | tve | ā | bhūṣanti | vedhasaḥ |
tava | śravāṁsyupamānyukthyā | suteṣvindra | girvaṇaḥ |
śrāyanteva | sūryaṁ | viśvedindrasya | bhakṣata |
vasūni | jāte | janamānaujasā | prati | bhāgaṁ | na | dīdhima |
anarśarātiṁ | vasudāmupa | stuhi | bhadrendrasya | rātayaḥ |
so | asya | kāmaṁ | vidhato | na | roṣati | mano | dānāya | codayan |
tvamindra | pratūrtiṣvabhi | viśvāsi | spṛdhaḥ |
aśastihā | janitā | viśvatūrasi | tvaṁ | tūrya | taruṣyataḥ |
anu | te | śuṣmaṁ | turayantamīyatuḥ | kṣoṇī | śiśuṁ | na | mātarā |
viśvāste | spṛdhaḥ | śnathayanta | manyave | vṛtraṁ | yadindra | tūrvasi |
itotī | vo | ajaraṁ | prahetāramaprahitam |
āśuṁ | jetāraṁ | hetāraṁ | rathītamamatūrtaṁ | tugryāvṛdham |
iṣkartāramaniṣkṛtaṁ | sahaskṛtaṁ | śatamūtiṁ | śatakratum |
samānamindramavase | havāmahe | vasavānaṁ | vasūjuvam |
ayaṁ | taimi | tanvā | purastādviśve | devābhi | mā | yanti | paścāt |
yadā | mahyaṁ | dīdharo | bhāgamindrādinmayā | kṛṇavo | vīryāṇi |
dadhāmi | te | madhuno | bhakṣamagre | hitaste | bhāgaḥ | suto | astu | somaḥ |
asaśca | tvaṁ | dakṣiṇataḥ | sakhā | me'dhā | vṛtrāṇi | jaṅghanāva | bhūri |
pra | su | stomaṁ | bharata | vājayantendrāya | satyaṁ | yadi | satyamasti |
nendro | astīti | nemo | tvāha | keṁ | dadarśa | kamabhi | ṣṭavāma |
ayamasmi | jaritaḥ | paśya | meha | viśvā | jātānyabhyasmi | mahnā |
ṛtasya | mā | pradiśo | vardhayantyādardiro | bhuvanā | dardarīmi |
ā | yanmā | venāruhannṛtasyam̐ | ekamāsīnaṁ | haryatasya | pṛṣṭhe |
manaścinme | hṛdā | pratyavocadacikradañchiśumantaḥ | sakhāyaḥ |
viśvettā | te | savaneṣu | pravācyā | yā | cakartha | maghavannindra | sunvate |
pārāvataṁ | yatpurusaṁbhṛtaṁ | vasvapāvṛṇoḥ | śarabhāya | ṛṣibandhave |
pra | nūnaṁ | dhāvatā | pṛthaṅneha | yo | vo | avāvarīt |
ni | ṣīṁ | vṛtrasya | marmaṇi | vajramindro | apīpatat |
manojavāyamāna | āyasīmataratpuram |
divaṁ | suparṇo | gatvāya | somaṁ | vajriṇābharat |
samudre | antaḥ | śayatodnā | vajro | abhīvṛtaḥ |
bharantyasmai | saṁyataḥ | puraḥprasravaṇā | balim |
yadvāgvadantyavicetanāni | rāṣṭrī | devānāṁ | niṣasāda | mandrā |
catasrorjaṁ | duduhe | payāṁsi | kva | svidasyāḥ | paramaṁ | jagāma |
devīṁ | vācamajanayanta | devāstāṁ | viśvarūpāḥ | paśavo | vadanti |
sā | no | mandreṣamūrjaṁ | duhānā | dhenurvāgasmānupa | suṣṭutaitu |
