sakhe | viṣṇo | vitaraṁ | vi | kramasva | dyaurdehi | lokaṁ | vajrāya | viṣkabhe |
hanāva | vṛtraṁ | riṇacāva | sindhūnindrasya | yantu | prasave | visṛṣṭāḥ |
ṛdhagitthā | sa | martyaḥ | śaśame | devatātaye |
yo | nūnaṁ | mitrāvaruṇāvabhiṣṭayācakre | havyadātaye |
varṣiṣṭhakṣatrorucakṣasā | narā | rājānā | dīrghaśruttamā |
tā | bāhutā | na | daṁsanā | ratharyataḥ | sākaṁ | sūryasya | raśmibhiḥ |
pra | yo | vāṁ | mitrāvaruṇājiro | dūto | adravat |
ayaḥśīrṣā | maderaghuḥ |
na | yaḥ | saṁpṛcche | na | punarhavītave | na | saṁvādāya | ramate |
tasmānno | adya | samṛteruruṣyataṁ | bāhubhyāṁ | noruṣyatam |
pra | mitrāya | prāryamṇe | sacathyamṛtāvaso |
varūthyaṁ | varuṇe | chandyaṁ | vacaḥ | stotraṁ | rājasu | gāyata |
te | hinvire | aruṇaṁ | jenyaṁ | vasvekaṁ | putraṁ | tisṝṇām |
te | dhāmānyamṛtā | martyānāmadabdhābhi | cakṣate |
ā | me | vacāṁsyudyatā | dyumattamāni | kartvā |
ubhā | yātaṁ | nāsatyā | sajoṣasā | prati | havyāni | vītaye |
rātiṁ | yadvāmarakṣasaṁ | havāmahe | yuvābhyāṁ | vājinīvasū |
prācīṁ | hotrāṁ | pratirantāvitaṁ | narā | gṛṇānā | jamadagninā |
ā | no | yajñaṁ | divispṛśaṁ | vāyo | yāhi | sumanmabhiḥ |
antaḥ | pavitropari | śrīṇāno'yaṁ | śukro | ayāmi | te |
vetyadhvaryuḥ | pathibhī | rajiṣṭhaiḥ | prati | havyāni | vītaye |
adhā | niyutvobhayasya | naḥ | piba | śuciṁ | somaṁ | gavāśiram |
baṇmahām̐ | asi | sūrya | baḻāditya | mahām̐ | asi |
mahaste | sato | mahimā | panasyate'ddhā | deva | mahām̐ | asi |
baṭ | sūrya | śravasā | mahām̐ | asi | satrā | deva | mahām̐ | asi |
mahnā | devānāmasuryaḥ | purohito | vibhu | jyotiradābhyam |
iyaṁ | yā | nīcyarkiṇī | rūpā | rohiṇyā | kṛtā |
citreva | pratyadarśyāyatyantardaśasu | bāhuṣu |
prajā | ha | tisro | atyāyamīyurnyanyārkamabhito | viviśre |
bṛhaddha | tasthau | bhuvaneṣvantaḥ | pavamāno | haritā | viveśa |
mātā | rudrāṇāṁ | duhitā | vasūnāṁ | svasādityānāmamṛtasya | nābhiḥ |
pra | nu | vocaṁ | cikituṣe | janāya | mā | gāmanāgāmaditiṁ | vadhiṣṭa |
vacovidaṁ | vācamudīrayantīṁ | viśvābhirdhībhirupatiṣṭhamānām |
devīṁ | devebhyaḥ | paryeyuṣīṁ | gāmā | māvṛkta | martyo | dabhracetāḥ |
tvamagne | bṛhadvayo | dadhāsi | deva | dāśuṣe |
kavirgṛhapatiryuvā |
sa | neḻānayā | saha | devām̐ | agne | duvasyuvā |
cikidvibhānavā | vaha |
tvayā | ha | svidyujā | vayaṁ | codiṣṭhena | yaviṣṭhya |
abhi | ṣmo | vājasātaye |
aurvabhṛguvacchucimapnavānavadā | huve |
agniṁ | samudravāsasam |
huve | vātasvanaṁ | kaviṁ | parjanyakrandyaṁ | sahaḥ |
agniṁ | samudravāsasam |
ā | savaṁ | savituryathā | bhagasyeva | bhujiṁ | huve |
agniṁ | samudravāsasam |
agniṁ | vo | vṛdhantamadhvarāṇāṁ | purūtamam |
acchā | naptre | sahasvate |
ayaṁ | yathā | nābhuvattvaṣṭā | rūpeva | takṣyā |
asya | kratvā | yaśasvataḥ |
ayaṁ | viśvābhi | śriyo'gnirdeveṣu | patyate |
ā | vājairupa | no | gamat |
viśveṣāmiha | stuhi | hotṝṇāṁ | yaśastamam |
agniṁ | yajñeṣu | pūrvyam |
śīraṁ | pāvakaśociṣaṁ | jyeṣṭho | yo | dameṣvā |
dīdāya | dīrghaśruttamaḥ |
tamarvantaṁ | na | sānasiṁ | gṛṇīhi | vipra | śuṣmiṇam |
mitraṁ | na | yātayajjanam |
upa | tvā | jāmayo | giro | dediśatīrhaviṣkṛtaḥ |
vāyoranīke | asthiran |
yasya | tridhātvavṛtaṁ | barhistasthāvasaṁdinam |
āpaścinni | dadhā | padam |
padaṁ | devasya | mīḻhuṣo'nādhṛṣṭābhirūtibhiḥ |
bhadrā | sūryevopadṛk |
agne | ghṛtasya | dhītibhistepāno | deva | śociṣā |
ā | devānvakṣi | yakṣi | ca |
taṁ | tvājananta | mātaraḥ | kaviṁ | devāso | aṅgiraḥ |
havyavāhamamartyam |
pracetasaṁ | tvā | kave'gne | dūtaṁ | vareṇyam |
havyavāhaṁ | ni | ṣedire |
nahi | me | astyaghnyā | na | svadhitirvananvati |
athaitādṛgbharāmi | te |
yadagne | kāni | kāni | cidā | te | dārūṇi | dadhmasi |
tā | juṣasva | yaviṣṭhya |
yadattyupajihvikā | yadvamro | atisarpati |
sarvaṁ | tadastu | te | ghṛtam |
agnimindhāno | manasā | dhiyaṁ | saceta | martyaḥ |
agnimīdhe | vivasvabhiḥ |
adarśi | gātuvittamo | yasminvratānyādadhuḥ |
upo | ṣu | jātamāryasya | vardhanamagniṁ | nakṣanta | no | giraḥ |
pra | daivodāso | agnirdevām̐ | acchā | na | majmanā |
anu | mātaraṁ | pṛthivīṁ | vi | vāvṛte | tasthau | nākasya | sānavi |
yasmādrejanta | kṛṣṭayaścarkṛtyāni | kṛṇvataḥ |
sahasrasāṁ | medhasātāviva | tmanāgniṁ | dhībhiḥ | saparyata |
pra | yaṁ | rāye | ninīṣasi | marto | yaste | vaso | dāśat |
sa | vīraṁ | dhatte | agnokthaśaṁsinaṁ | tmanā | sahasrapoṣiṇam |
sa | dṛḻhe | cidabhi | tṛṇatti | vājamarvatā | sa | dhatte | akṣiti | śravaḥ |
tve | devatrā | sadā | purūvaso | viśvā | vāmāni | dhīmahi |
yo | viśvā | dayate | vasu | hotā | mandro | janānām |
madhorna | pātrā | prathamānyasmai | pra | stomā | yantyagnaye |
aśvaṁ | na | gīrbhī | rathyaṁ | sudānavo | marmṛjyante | devayavaḥ |
ubhe | toke | tanaye | dasma | viśpate | parṣi | rādho | maghonām |
pra | maṁhiṣṭhāya | gāyata | ṛtāvne | bṛhate | śukraśociṣe |
upastutāso | agnaye |
ā | vaṁsate | maghavā | vīravadyaśaḥ | samiddho | dyumnyāhutaḥ |
kuvinno | asya | sumatirnavīyasyacchā | vājebhirāgamat |
preṣṭhamu | priyāṇāṁ | stuhyāsāvātithim |
agniṁ | rathānāṁ | yamam |
uditā | yo | niditā | veditā | vasvā | yajñiyo | vavartati |
duṣṭarā | yasya | pravaṇe | normayo | dhiyā | vājaṁ | siṣāsataḥ |
mā | no | hṛṇītāmatithirvasuragniḥ | purupraśastaiṣaḥ |
yaḥ | suhotā | svadhvaraḥ |
mo | te | riṣanye | acchoktibhirvaso'gne | kebhiścidevaiḥ |
kīriściddhi | tvāmīṭṭe | dūtyāya | rātahavyaḥ | svadhvaraḥ |
āgne | yāhi | marutsakhā | rudrebhiḥ | somapītaye |
sobharyopa | suṣṭutiṁ | mādayasva | svarṇare |
svādiṣṭhayā | madiṣṭhayā | pavasva | soma | dhārayā |
indrāya | pātave | sutaḥ |
rakṣohā | viśvacarṣaṇirabhi | yonimayohatam |
druṇā | sadhasthamāsadat |
varivodhātamo | bhava | maṁhiṣṭho | vṛtrahantamaḥ |
parṣi | rādho | maghonām |
abhyarṣa | mahānāṁ | devānāṁ | vītimandhasā |
abhi | vājamuta | śravaḥ |
tvāmacchā | carāmasi | tadidarthaṁ | divedive |
indo | tve | nāśasaḥ |
punāti | te | parisrutaṁ | somaṁ | sūryasya | duhitā |
vāreṇa | śaśvatā | tanā |
tamīmaṇvīḥ | samaryā | gṛbhṇanti | yoṣaṇo | daśa |
svasāraḥ | pārye | divi |
tamīṁ | hinvantyagruvo | dhamanti | bākuraṁ | dṛtim |
tridhātu | vāraṇaṁ | madhu |
abhīmamaghnyota | śrīṇanti | dhenavaḥ | śiśum |
somamindrāya | pātave |
asyedindro | madeṣvā | viśvā | vṛtrāṇi | jighnate |
śūro | maghā | ca | maṁhate |
pavasva | devavīrati | pavitraṁ | soma | raṁhyā |
indramindo | vṛṣā | viśa |
ā | vacyasva | mahi | psaro | vṛṣendo | dyumnavattamaḥ |
ā | yoniṁ | dharṇasiḥ | sadaḥ |
adhukṣata | priyaṁ | madhu | dhārā | sutasya | vedhasaḥ |
apo | vasiṣṭa | sukratuḥ |
mahāntaṁ | tvā | mahīranvāpo | arṣanti | sindhavaḥ |
yadgobhirvāsayiṣyase |
samudro | apsu | māmṛje | viṣṭambho | dharuṇo | divaḥ |
somaḥ | pavitre | asmayuḥ |
acikradadvṛṣā | harirmahānmitro | na | darśataḥ |
saṁ | sūryeṇa | rocate |
girastenda | ojasā | marmṛjyante | apasyuvaḥ |
yābhirmadāya | śumbhase |
taṁ | tvā | madāya | ghṛṣvayo | lokakṛtnumīmahe |
tava | praśastayo | mahīḥ |
asmabhyamindavindrayurmadhvaḥ | pavasva | dhārayā |
parjanyo | vṛṣṭimām̐ | iva |
goṣendo | nṛṣāsyaśvasā | vājasota |
ātmā | yajñasya | pūrvyaḥ |
eṣa | devo | amartyaḥ | parṇavīriva | dīyati |
abhi | droṇānyāsadam |
eṣa | devo | vipā | kṛto'ti | hvarāṁsi | dhāvati |
pavamāno | adābhyaḥ |
eṣa | devo | vipanyubhiḥ | pavamāna | ṛtāyubhiḥ |
harirvājāya | mṛjyate |
eṣa | viśvāni | vāryā | śūro | yanniva | satvabhiḥ |
pavamānaḥ | siṣāsati |
eṣa | devo | ratharyati | pavamāno | daśasyati |
āviṣkṛṇoti | vagvanum |
eṣa | viprairabhiṣṭuto'po | devo | vi | gāhate |
dadhadratnāni | dāśuṣe |
eṣa | divaṁ | vi | dhāvati | tiro | rajāṁsi | dhārayā |
pavamānaḥ | kanikradat |
eṣa | divaṁ | vyāsarattiro | rajāṁsyaspṛtaḥ |
pavamānaḥ | svadhvaraḥ |
eṣa | pratnena | janmanā | devo | devebhyaḥ | sutaḥ |
hariḥ | pavitre | arṣati |
eṣo | sya | puruvrato | jajñāno | janayanniṣaḥ |
dhārayā | pavate | sutaḥ |
sanā | ca | soma | jeṣi | ca | pavamāna | mahi | śravaḥ |
athā | no | vasyasaskṛdhi |
sanā | jyotiḥ | sanā | svarviśvā | ca | soma | saubhagā |
athā | no | vasyasaskṛdhi |
sanā | dakṣamuta | kratumapa | soma | mṛdho | jahi |
athā | no | vasyasaskṛdhi |
pavītāraḥ | punītana | somamindrāya | pātave |
athā | no | vasyasaskṛdhi |
tvaṁ | sūrye | nā | bhaja | tava | kratvā | tavotibhiḥ |
athā | no | vasyasaskṛdhi |
tava | kratvā | tavotibhirjyokpaśyema | sūryam |
athā | no | vasyasaskṛdhi |
abhyarṣa | svāyudha | soma | dvibarhasaṁ | rayim |
athā | no | vasyasaskṛdhi |
abhyarṣānapacyuto | rayiṁ | samatsu | sāsahiḥ |
athā | no | vasyasaskṛdhi |
tvāṁ | yajñairavīvṛdhanpavamāna | vidharmaṇi |
athā | no | vasyasaskṛdhi |
rayiṁ | naścitramaśvinamindo | viśvāyumā | bhara |
athā | no | vasyasaskṛdhi |
samiddho | viśvataspatiḥ | pavamāno | vi | rājati |
prīṇanvṛṣā | kanikradat |
tanūnapātpavamānaḥ | śṛṅge | śiśāno | arṣati |
antarikṣeṇa | rārajat |
īḻenyaḥ | pavamāno | rayirvi | rājati | dyumān |
madhordhārābhirojasā |
barhiḥ | prācīnamojasā | pavamānaḥ | stṛṇanhariḥ |
deveṣu | deveyate |
udātairjihate | bṛhaddvāro | devīrhiraṇyayīḥ |
pavamānena | suṣṭutāḥ |
suśilpe | bṛhatī | mahī | pavamāno | vṛṣaṇyati |
naktoṣāsā | na | darśate |
ubhā | devā | nṛcakṣasā | hotārā | daivyā | huve |
pavamānendro | vṛṣā |
bhāratī | pavamānasya | sarasvatīḻā | mahī |
imaṁ | no | yajñamā | gamantisro | devīḥ | supeśasaḥ |
tvaṣṭāramagrajāṁ | gopāṁ | puroyāvānamā | huve |
indurindro | vṛṣā | hariḥ | pavamānaḥ | prajāpatiḥ |
vanaspatiṁ | pavamāna | madhvā | samaṅgdhi | dhārayā |
sahasravalśaṁ | haritaṁ | bhrājamānaṁ | hiraṇyayam |
viśve | devāḥ | svāhākṛtiṁ | pavamānasyā | gata |
vāyurbṛhaspatiḥ | sūryo'gnirindraḥ | sajoṣasaḥ |
mandrayā | soma | dhārayā | vṛṣā | pavasva | devayuḥ |
avyo | vāreṣvasmayuḥ |
abhi | tyaṁ | madyaṁ | madamindavindreti | kṣara |
abhi | vājino | arvataḥ |
abhi | tyaṁ | pūrvyaṁ | madaṁ | suvāno | arṣa | pavitrā |
abhi | vājamuta | śravaḥ |
anu | drapsāsendava | āpo | na | pravatāsaran |
punānendramāśata |
yamatyamiva | vājinaṁ | mṛjanti | yoṣaṇo | daśa |
vane | krīḻantamatyavim |
taṁ | gobhirvṛṣaṇaṁ | rasaṁ | madāya | devavītaye |
sutaṁ | bharāya | saṁ | sṛja |
devo | devāya | dhārayendrāya | pavate | sutaḥ |
payo | yadasya | pīpayat |
ātmā | yajñasya | raṁhyā | suṣvāṇaḥ | pavate | sutaḥ |
pratnaṁ | ni | pāti | kāvyam |
evā | punānendrayurmadaṁ | madiṣṭha | vītaye |
guhā | ciddadhiṣe | giraḥ |
asṛgramindavaḥ | pathā | dharmannṛtasya | suśriyaḥ |
vidānāsya | yojanam |
pra | dhārā | madhvo | agriyo | mahīrapo | vi | gāhate |
havirhaviṣṣu | vandyaḥ |
pra | yujo | vāco | agriyo | vṛṣāva | cakradadvane |
sadmābhi | satyo | adhvaraḥ |
pari | yatkāvyā | kavirnṛmṇā | vasāno | arṣati |
svarvājī | siṣāsati |
pavamāno | abhi | spṛdho | viśo | rājeva | sīdati |
yadīmṛṇvanti | vedhasaḥ |
avyo | vāre | pari | priyo | harirvaneṣu | sīdati |
rebho | vanuṣyate | matī |
sa | vāyumindramaśvinā | sākaṁ | madena | gacchati |
raṇā | yo | asya | dharmabhiḥ |
ā | mitrāvaruṇā | bhagaṁ | madhvaḥ | pavantormayaḥ |
vidānāsya | śakmabhiḥ |
asmabhyaṁ | rodasī | rayiṁ | madhvo | vājasya | sātaye |
śravo | vasūni | saṁ | jitam |
ete | somābhi | priyamindrasya | kāmamakṣaran |
vardhanto | asya | vīryam |
punānāsaścamūṣado | gacchanto | vāyumaśvinā |
te | no | dhāntu | suvīryam |
indrasya | soma | rādhase | punāno | hārdi | codaya |
ṛtasya | yonimāsadam |
mṛjanti | tvā | daśa | kṣipo | hinvanti | sapta | dhītayaḥ |
anu | viprāmādiṣuḥ |
devebhyastvā | madāya | kaṁ | sṛjānamati | meṣyaḥ |
saṁ | gobhirvāsayāmasi |
punānaḥ | kalaśeṣvā | vastrāṇyaruṣo | hariḥ |
pari | gavyānyavyata |
maghonā | pavasva | no | jahi | viśvāpa | dviṣaḥ |
indo | sakhāyamā | viśa |
vṛṣṭiṁ | divaḥ | pari | srava | dyumnaṁ | pṛthivyādhi |
saho | naḥ | soma | pṛtsu | dhāḥ |
nṛcakṣasaṁ | tvā | vayamindrapītaṁ | svarvidam |
bhakṣīmahi | prajāmiṣam |
pari | priyā | divaḥ | kavirvayāṁsi | naptyorhitaḥ |
suvāno | yāti | kavikratuḥ |
prapra | kṣayāya | panyase | janāya | juṣṭo | adruhe |
vītyarṣa | caniṣṭhayā |
sa | sūnurmātarā | śucirjāto | jāte | arocayat |
mahānmahī | ṛtāvṛdhā |
sa | sapta | dhītibhirhito | nadyo | ajinvadadruhaḥ |
yaikamakṣi | vāvṛdhuḥ |
tābhi | santamastṛtaṁ | mahe | yuvānamā | dadhuḥ |
indumindra | tava | vrate |
abhi | vahniramartyaḥ | sapta | paśyati | vāvahiḥ |
krivirdevīratarpayat |
avā | kalpeṣu | naḥ | pumastamāṁsi | soma | yodhyā |
tāni | punāna | jaṅghanaḥ |
nū | navyase | navīyase | sūktāya | sādhayā | pathaḥ |
pratnavadrocayā | rucaḥ |
pavamāna | mahi | śravo | gāmaśvaṁ | rāsi | vīravat |
sanā | medhāṁ | sanā | svaḥ |
pra | svānāso | rathevārvanto | na | śravasyavaḥ |
somāso | rāye | akramuḥ |
hinvānāso | ratheva | dadhanvire | gabhastyoḥ |
bharāsaḥ | kāriṇāmiva |
rājāno | na | praśastibhiḥ | somāso | gobhirañjate |
yajño | na | sapta | dhātṛbhiḥ |
pari | suvānāsendavo | madāya | barhaṇā | girā |
sutārṣanti | dhārayā |
āpānāso | vivasvato | janantoṣaso | bhagam |
sūrāṇvaṁ | vi | tanvate |
apa | dvārā | matīnāṁ | pratnā | ṛṇvanti | kāravaḥ |
vṛṣṇo | harasāyavaḥ |
samīcīnāsāsate | hotāraḥ | saptajāmayaḥ |
padamekasya | piprataḥ |
nābhā | nābhiṁ | nā | dade | cakṣuścitsūrye | sacā |
kaverapatyamā | duhe |
abhi | priyā | divaspadamadhvaryubhirguhā | hitam |
sūraḥ | paśyati | cakṣasā |
upāsmai | gāyatā | naraḥ | pavamānāyendave |
abhi | devām̐ | iyakṣate |
abhi | te | madhunā | payo'tharvāṇo | aśiśrayuḥ |
devaṁ | devāya | devayu |
sa | naḥ | pavasva | śaṁ | gave | śaṁ | janāya | śamarvate |
śaṁ | rājannoṣadhībhyaḥ |
babhrave | nu | svatavase'ruṇāya | divispṛśe |
somāya | gāthamarcata |
hastacyutebhiradribhiḥ | sutaṁ | somaṁ | punītana |
madhāvā | dhāvatā | madhu |
namasedupa | sīdata | dadhnedabhi | śrīṇītana |
indumindre | dadhātana |
amitrahā | vicarṣaṇiḥ | pavasva | soma | śaṁ | gave |
devebhyo | anukāmakṛt |
indrāya | soma | pātave | madāya | pari | ṣicyase |
manaścinmanasaspatiḥ |
pavamāna | suvīryaṁ | rayiṁ | soma | rirīhi | naḥ |
indavindreṇa | no | yujā |
somāsṛgramindavaḥ | sutā | ṛtasya | sādane |
indrāya | madhumattamāḥ |
abhi | viprānūṣata | gāvo | vatsaṁ | na | mātaraḥ |
indraṁ | somasya | pītaye |
madacyutkṣeti | sādane | sindhorūrmā | vipaścit |
somo | gaurī | adhi | śritaḥ |
divo | nābhā | vicakṣaṇo'vyo | vāre | mahīyate |
somo | yaḥ | sukratuḥ | kaviḥ |
yaḥ | somaḥ | kalaśeṣvām̐ | antaḥ | pavitrāhitaḥ |
taminduḥ | pari | ṣasvaje |
pra | vācaminduriṣyati | samudrasyādhi | viṣṭapi |
jinvankośaṁ | madhuścutam |
nityastotro | vanaspatirdhīnāmantaḥ | sabardughaḥ |
hinvāno | mānuṣā | yugā |
abhi | priyā | divaspadā | somo | hinvāno | arṣati |
viprasya | dhārayā | kaviḥ |
ā | pavamāna | dhāraya | rayiṁ | sahasravarcasam |
asme | indo | svābhuvam |
somaḥ | punāno | arṣati | sahasradhāro | atyaviḥ |
vāyorindrasya | niṣkṛtam |
pavamānamavasyavo | vipramabhi | pra | gāyata |
suṣvāṇaṁ | devavītaye |
pavante | vājasātaye | somāḥ | sahasrapājasaḥ |
gṛṇānā | devavītaye |
uta | no | vājasātaye | pavasva | bṛhatīriṣaḥ |
dyumadindo | suvīryam |
te | naḥ | sahasriṇaṁ | rayiṁ | pavantāmā | suvīryam |
suvānā | devāsendavaḥ |
atyā | hiyānā | na | hetṛbhirasṛgraṁ | vājasātaye |
vi | vāramavyamāśavaḥ |
vāśrārṣantīndavo'bhi | vatsaṁ | na | dhenavaḥ |
dadhanvire | gabhastyoḥ |
juṣṭendrāya | matsaraḥ | pavamāna | kanikradat |
viśvāpa | dviṣo | jahi |
apaghnanto | arāvṇaḥ | pavamānāḥ | svardṛśaḥ |
yonāvṛtasya | sīdata |
pari | prāsiṣyadatkaviḥ | sindhorūrmāvadhi | śritaḥ |
kāraṁ | bibhratpuruspṛham |
girā | yadī | sabandhavaḥ | pañca | vrātāpasyavaḥ |
pariṣkṛṇvanti | dharṇasim |
ādasya | śuṣmiṇo | rase | viśve | devāmatsata |
yadī | gobhirvasāyate |
niriṇāno | vi | dhāvati | jahaccharyāṇi | tānvā |
atrā | saṁ | jighnate | yujā |
naptībhiryo | vivasvataḥ | śubhro | na | māmṛje | yuvā |
gāḥ | kṛṇvāno | na | nirṇijam |
ati | śritī | tiraścatā | gavyā | jigātyaṇvyā |
vagnumiyarti | yaṁ | vide |
abhi | kṣipaḥ | samagmata | marjayantīriṣaspatim |
pṛṣṭhā | gṛbhṇata | vājinaḥ |
pari | divyāni | marmṛśadviśvāni | soma | pārthivā |
vasūni | yāhyasmayuḥ |
eṣa | dhiyā | yātyaṇvyā | śūro | rathebhirāśubhiḥ |
gacchannindrasya | niṣkṛtam |
eṣa | purū | dhiyāyate | bṛhate | devatātaye |
yatrāmṛtāsāsate |
eṣa | hito | vi | nīyate'ntaḥ | śubhrāvatā | pathā |
yadī | tuñjanti | bhūrṇayaḥ |
eṣa | śṛṅgāṇi | dodhuvacchiśīte | yūthyo | vṛṣā |
nṛmṇā | dadhānaujasā |
eṣa | rukmibhirīyate | vājī | śubhrebhiraṁśubhiḥ |
patiḥ | sindhūnāṁ | bhavan |
eṣa | vasūni | pibdanā | paruṣā | yayivām̐ | ati |
ava | śādeṣu | gacchati |
etaṁ | mṛjanti | marjyamupa | droṇeṣvāyavaḥ |
pracakrāṇaṁ | mahīriṣaḥ |
etamu | tyaṁ | daśa | kṣipo | mṛjanti | sapta | dhītayaḥ |
svāyudhaṁ | madintamam |
pra | te | sotārauṇyo | rasaṁ | madāya | ghṛṣvaye |
sargo | na | taktyetaśaḥ |
kratvā | dakṣasya | rathyamapo | vasānamandhasā |
goṣāmaṇveṣu | saścima |
anaptamapsu | duṣṭaraṁ | somaṁ | pavitrā | sṛja |
punīhīndrāya | pātave |
pra | punānasya | cetasā | somaḥ | pavitre | arṣati |
kratvā | sadhasthamāsadat |
pra | tvā | namobhirindavendra | somāsṛkṣata |
mahe | bharāya | kāriṇaḥ |
punāno | rūpe | avyaye | viśvārṣannabhi | śriyaḥ |
śūro | na | goṣu | tiṣṭhati |
divo | na | sānu | pipyuṣī | dhārā | sutasya | vedhasaḥ |
vṛthā | pavitre | arṣati |
tvaṁ | soma | vipaścitaṁ | tanā | punānāyuṣu |
avyo | vāraṁ | vi | dhāvasi |
pra | nimneneva | sindhavo | ghnanto | vṛtrāṇi | bhūrṇayaḥ |
somāsṛgramāśavaḥ |
abhi | suvānāsendavo | vṛṣṭayaḥ | pṛthivīmiva |
indraṁ | somāso | akṣaran |
atyūrmirmatsaro | madaḥ | somaḥ | pavitre | arṣati |
vighnanrakṣāṁsi | devayuḥ |
ā | kalaśeṣu | dhāvati | pavitre | pari | ṣicyate |
ukthairyajñeṣu | vardhate |
ati | trī | soma | rocanā | rohanna | bhrājase | divam |
iṣṇantsūryaṁ | na | codayaḥ |
abhi | viprānūṣata | mūrdhanyajñasya | kāravaḥ |
dadhānāścakṣasi | priyam |
tamu | tvā | vājinaṁ | naro | dhībhirviprāvasyavaḥ |
mṛjanti | devatātaye |
madhordhārāmanu | kṣara | tīvraḥ | sadhasthamāsadaḥ |
cārurṛtāya | pītaye |
pari | suvāno | giriṣṭhāḥ | pavitre | somo | akṣāḥ |
madeṣu | sarvadhāsi |
tvaṁ | viprastvaṁ | kavirmadhu | pra | jātamandhasaḥ |
madeṣu | sarvadhāsi |
tava | viśve | sajoṣaso | devāsaḥ | pītimāśata |
madeṣu | sarvadhāsi |
ā | yo | viśvāni | vāryā | vasūni | hastayordadhe |
madeṣu | sarvadhāsi |
yeme | rodasī | mahī | saṁ | mātareva | dohate |
madeṣu | sarvadhāsi |
pari | yo | rodasī | ubhe | sadyo | vājebhirarṣati |
madeṣu | sarvadhāsi |
sa | śuṣmī | kalaśeṣvā | punāno | acikradat |
madeṣu | sarvadhāsi |
yatsoma | citramukthyaṁ | divyaṁ | pārthivaṁ | vasu |
tannaḥ | punānā | bhara |
yuvaṁ | hi | sthaḥ | svarpatīndraśca | soma | gopatī |
īśānā | pipyataṁ | dhiyaḥ |
vṛṣā | punānāyuṣu | stanayannadhi | barhiṣi |
hariḥ | sanyonimāsadat |
avāvaśanta | dhītayo | vṛṣabhasyādhi | retasi |
sūnorvatsasya | mātaraḥ |
kuvidvṛṣaṇyantībhyaḥ | punāno | garbhamādadhat |
yāḥ | śukraṁ | duhate | payaḥ |
upa | śikṣāpatasthuṣo | bhiyasamā | dhehi | śatruṣu |
pavamāna | vidā | rayim |
ni | śatroḥ | soma | vṛṣṇyaṁ | ni | śuṣmaṁ | ni | vayastira |
dūre | vā | sato | anti | vā |
pra | kavirdevavītaye'vyo | vārebhirarṣati |
sāhvānviśvābhi | spṛdhaḥ |
sa | hi | ṣmā | jaritṛbhyā | vājaṁ | gomantaminvati |
pavamānaḥ | sahasriṇam |
pari | viśvāni | cetasā | mṛśase | pavase | matī |
sa | naḥ | soma | śravo | vidaḥ |
abhyarṣa | bṛhadyaśo | maghavadbhyo | dhruvaṁ | rayim |
iṣaṁ | stotṛbhyā | bhara |
tvaṁ | rājeva | suvrato | giraḥ | somā | viveśitha |
punāno | vahne | adbhuta |
sa | vahnirapsu | duṣṭaro | mṛjyamāno | gabhastyoḥ |
somaścamūṣu | sīdati |
krīḻurmakho | na | maṁhayuḥ | pavitraṁ | soma | gacchasi |
dadhatstotre | suvīryam |
ete | dhāvantīndavaḥ | somendrāya | ghṛṣvayaḥ |
matsarāsaḥ | svarvidaḥ |
pravṛṇvanto | abhiyujaḥ | suṣvaye | varivovidaḥ |
svayaṁ | stotre | vayaskṛtaḥ |
vṛthā | krīḻantendavaḥ | sadhasthamabhyekamit |
sindhorūrmā | vyakṣaran |
ete | viśvāni | vāryā | pavamānāsāśata |
hitā | na | saptayo | rathe |
āsminpiśaṅgamindavo | dadhātā | venamādiśe |
yo | asmabhyamarāvā |
ṛbhurna | rathyaṁ | navaṁ | dadhātā | ketamādiśe |
śukrāḥ | pavadhvamarṇasā |
eto | tye | avīvaśankāṣṭhāṁ | vājino | akrata |
sataḥ | prāsāviṣurmatim |
ete | somāsāśavo | ratheva | pra | vājinaḥ |
sargāḥ | sṛṣṭāheṣata |
ete | vātevoravaḥ | parjanyasyeva | vṛṣṭayaḥ |
agneriva | bhramā | vṛthā |
ete | pūtā | vipaścitaḥ | somāso | dadhyāśiraḥ |
vipā | vyānaśurdhiyaḥ |
ete | mṛṣṭāmartyāḥ | sasṛvāṁso | na | śaśramuḥ |
iyakṣantaḥ | patho | rajaḥ |
ete | pṛṣṭhāni | rodasorviprayanto | vyānaśuḥ |
utedamuttamaṁ | rajaḥ |
tantuṁ | tanvānamuttamamanu | pravatāśata |
utedamuttamāyyam |
tvaṁ | soma | paṇibhyā | vasu | gavyāni | dhārayaḥ |
tataṁ | tantumacikradaḥ |
somāsṛgramāśavo | madhormadasya | dhārayā |
abhi | viśvāni | kāvyā |
anu | pratnāsāyavaḥ | padaṁ | navīyo | akramuḥ |
ruce | jananta | sūryam |
ā | pavamāna | no | bharāryo | adāśuṣo | gayam |
kṛdhi | prajāvatīriṣaḥ |
abhi | somāsāyavaḥ | pavante | madyaṁ | madam |
abhi | kośaṁ | madhuścutam |
somo | arṣati | dharṇasirdadhānendriyaṁ | rasam |
suvīro | abhiśastipāḥ |
indrāya | soma | pavase | devebhyaḥ | sadhamādyaḥ |
indo | vājaṁ | siṣāsasi |
asya | pītvā | madānāmindro | vṛtrāṇyaprati |
jaghāna | jaghanacca | nu |
pra | somāso | adhanviṣuḥ | pavamānāsendavaḥ |
śrīṇānāpsu | mṛñjata |
abhi | gāvo | adhanviṣurāpo | na | pravatā | yatīḥ |
punānendramāśata |
pra | pavamāna | dhanvasi | somendrāya | pātave |
nṛbhiryato | vi | nīyase |
tvaṁ | soma | nṛmādanaḥ | pavasva | carṣaṇīsahe |
sasniryo | anumādyaḥ |
indo | yadadribhiḥ | sutaḥ | pavitraṁ | paridhāvasi |
aramindrasya | dhāmne |
pavasva | vṛtrahantamokthebhiranumādyaḥ |
śuciḥ | pāvako | adbhutaḥ |
śuciḥ | pāvakocyate | somaḥ | sutasya | madhvaḥ |
devāvīraghaśaṁsahā |
pavasva | dakṣasādhano | devebhyaḥ | pītaye | hare |
marudbhyo | vāyave | madaḥ |
pavamāna | dhiyā | hito'bhi | yoniṁ | kanikradat |
dharmaṇā | vāyumā | viśa |
saṁ | devaiḥ | śobhate | vṛṣā | kaviryonāvadhi | priyaḥ |
vṛtrahā | devavītamaḥ |
viśvā | rūpāṇyāviśanpunāno | yāti | haryataḥ |
yatrāmṛtāsāsate |
aruṣo | janayangiraḥ | somaḥ | pavatāyuṣak |
indraṁ | gacchankavikratuḥ |
ā | pavasva | madintama | pavitraṁ | dhārayā | kave |
arkasya | yonimāsadam |
tamamṛkṣanta | vājinamupasthe | aditeradhi |
viprāso | aṇvyā | dhiyā |
taṁ | gāvo | abhyanūṣata | sahasradhāramakṣitam |
induṁ | dhartāramā | divaḥ |
taṁ | vedhāṁ | medhayāhyanpavamānamadhi | dyavi |
dharṇasiṁ | bhūridhāyasam |
tamahyanbhurijordhiyā | saṁvasānaṁ | vivasvataḥ |
patiṁ | vāco | adābhyam |
taṁ | sānāvadhi | jāmayo | hariṁ | hinvantyadribhiḥ |
haryataṁ | bhūricakṣasam |
taṁ | tvā | hinvanti | vedhasaḥ | pavamāna | girāvṛdham |
indavindrāya | matsaram |
eṣa | kavirabhiṣṭutaḥ | pavitre | adhi | tośate |
punāno | ghnannapa | sridhaḥ |
eṣendrāya | vāyave | svarjitpari | ṣicyate |
pavitre | dakṣasādhanaḥ |
eṣa | nṛbhirvi | nīyate | divo | mūrdhā | vṛṣā | sutaḥ |
somo | vaneṣu | viśvavit |
eṣa | gavyuracikradatpavamāno | hiraṇyayuḥ |
induḥ | satrājidastṛtaḥ |
eṣa | sūryeṇa | hāsate | pavamāno | adhi | dyavi |
pavitre | matsaro | madaḥ |
eṣa | śuṣmyasiṣyadadantarikṣe | vṛṣā | hariḥ |
punānendurindramā |
eṣa | vājī | hito | nṛbhirviśvavinmanasaspatiḥ |
avyo | vāraṁ | vi | dhāvati |
eṣa | pavitre | akṣaratsomo | devebhyaḥ | sutaḥ |
viśvā | dhāmānyāviśan |
eṣa | devaḥ | śubhāyate'dhi | yonāvamartyaḥ |
vṛtrahā | devavītamaḥ |
eṣa | vṛṣā | kanikradaddaśabhirjāmibhiryataḥ |
abhi | droṇāni | dhāvati |
eṣa | sūryamarocayatpavamāno | vicarṣaṇiḥ |
viśvā | dhāmāni | viśvavit |
eṣa | śuṣmyadābhyaḥ | somaḥ | punāno | arṣati |
devāvīraghaśaṁsahā |
prāsya | dhārākṣaranvṛṣṇaḥ | sutasyaujasā |
devām̐ | anu | prabhūṣataḥ |
saptiṁ | mṛjanti | vedhaso | gṛṇantaḥ | kāravo | girā |
jyotirjajñānamukthyam |
suṣahā | soma | tāni | te | punānāya | prabhūvaso |
vardhā | samudramukthyam |
viśvā | vasūni | saṁjayanpavasva | soma | dhārayā |
inu | dveṣāṁsi | sadhryak |
rakṣā | su | no | araruṣaḥ | svanātsamasya | kasya | cit |
nido | yatra | mumucmahe |
endo | pārthivaṁ | rayiṁ | divyaṁ | pavasva | dhārayā |
dyumantaṁ | śuṣmamā | bhara |
pra | dhārāsya | śuṣmiṇo | vṛthā | pavitre | akṣaran |
punāno | vācamiṣyati |
indurhiyānaḥ | sotṛbhirmṛjyamānaḥ | kanikradat |
iyarti | vagnumindriyam |
ā | naḥ | śuṣmaṁ | nṛṣāhyaṁ | vīravantaṁ | puruspṛham |
pavasva | soma | dhārayā |
pra | somo | ati | dhārayā | pavamāno | asiṣyadat |
abhi | droṇānyāsadam |
apsu | tvā | madhumattamaṁ | hariṁ | hinvantyadribhiḥ |
indavindrāya | pītaye |
sunotā | madhumattamaṁ | somamindrāya | vajriṇe |
cāruṁ | śardhāya | matsaram |
pra | somāsaḥ | svādhyaḥ | pavamānāso | akramuḥ |
rayiṁ | kṛṇvanti | cetanam |
divaspṛthivyādhi | bhavendo | dyumnavardhanaḥ |
bhavā | vājānāṁ | patiḥ |
tubhyaṁ | vātābhipriyastubhyamarṣanti | sindhavaḥ |
soma | vardhanti | te | mahaḥ |
ā | pyāyasva | sametu | te | viśvataḥ | soma | vṛṣṇyam |
bhavā | vājasya | saṁgathe |
tubhyaṁ | gāvo | ghṛtaṁ | payo | babhro | duduhre | akṣitam |
varṣiṣṭhe | adhi | sānavi |
svāyudhasya | te | sato | bhuvanasya | pate | vayam |
indo | sakhitvamuśmasi |
pra | somāso | madacyutaḥ | śravase | no | maghonaḥ |
sutā | vidathe | akramuḥ |
ādīṁ | tritasya | yoṣaṇo | hariṁ | hinvantyadribhiḥ |
indumindrāya | pītaye |
ādīṁ | haṁso | yathā | gaṇaṁ | viśvasyāvīvaśanmatim |
atyo | na | gobhirajyate |
ubhe | somāvacākaśanmṛgo | na | takto | arṣasi |
sīdannṛtasya | yonimā |
abhi | gāvo | anūṣata | yoṣā | jāramiva | priyam |
agannājiṁ | yathā | hitam |
asme | dhehi | dyumadyaśo | maghavadbhyaśca | mahyaṁ | ca |
saniṁ | medhāmuta | śravaḥ |
pra | somāso | vipaścito'pāṁ | na | yantyūrmayaḥ |
vanāni | mahiṣeva |
abhi | droṇāni | babhravaḥ | śukrā | ṛtasya | dhārayā |
vājaṁ | gomantamakṣaran |
sutendrāya | vāyave | varuṇāya | marudbhyaḥ |
somārṣanti | viṣṇave |
tisro | vācodīrate | gāvo | mimanti | dhenavaḥ |
harireti | kanikradat |
abhi | brahmīranūṣata | yahvīrṛtasya | mātaraḥ |
marmṛjyante | divaḥ | śiśum |
rāyaḥ | samudrām̐ścaturo'smabhyaṁ | soma | viśvataḥ |
ā | pavasva | sahasriṇaḥ |
pra | suvāno | dhārayā | tanendurhinvāno | arṣati |
rujaddṛḻhā | vyojasā |
sutendrāya | vāyave | varuṇāya | marudbhyaḥ |
somo | arṣati | viṣṇave |
vṛṣāṇaṁ | vṛṣabhiryataṁ | sunvanti | somamadribhiḥ |
duhanti | śakmanā | payaḥ |
bhuvattritasya | marjyo | bhuvadindrāya | matsaraḥ |
saṁ | rūpairajyate | hariḥ |
abhīmṛtasya | viṣṭapaṁ | duhate | pṛśnimātaraḥ |
cāru | priyatamaṁ | haviḥ |
samenamahrutemā | giro | arṣanti | sasrutaḥ |
dhenūrvāśro | avīvaśat |
ā | naḥ | pavasva | dhārayā | pavamāna | rayiṁ | pṛthum |
yayā | jyotirvidāsi | naḥ |
indo | samudramīṅkhaya | pavasva | viśvamejaya |
rāyo | dhartā | naujasā |
tvayā | vīreṇa | vīravo'bhi | ṣyāma | pṛtanyataḥ |
kṣarā | ṇo | abhi | vāryam |
pra | vājaminduriṣyati | siṣāsanvājasā | ṛṣiḥ |
vratā | vidānāyudhā |
taṁ | gīrbhirvācamīṅkhayaṁ | punānaṁ | vāsayāmasi |
somaṁ | janasya | gopatim |
viśvo | yasya | vrate | jano | dādhāra | dharmaṇaspateḥ |
punānasya | prabhūvasoḥ |
asarji | rathyo | yathā | pavitre | camvoḥ | sutaḥ |
kārṣmanvājī | nyakramīt |
sa | vahniḥ | soma | jāgṛviḥ | pavasva | devavīrati |
abhi | kośaṁ | madhuścutam |
sa | no | jyotīṁṣi | pūrvya | pavamāna | vi | rocaya |
kratve | dakṣāya | no | hinu |
śumbhamāna | ṛtāyubhirmṛjyamāno | gabhastyoḥ |
pavate | vāre | avyaye |
sa | viśvā | dāśuṣe | vasu | somo | divyāni | pārthivā |
pavatāmāntarikṣyā |
ā | divaspṛṣṭhamaśvayurgavyayuḥ | soma | rohasi |
vīrayuḥ | śavasaspate |
sa | sutaḥ | pītaye | vṛṣā | somaḥ | pavitre | arṣati |
vighnanrakṣāṁsi | devayuḥ |
sa | pavitre | vicakṣaṇo | harirarṣati | dharṇasiḥ |
abhi | yoniṁ | kanikradat |
sa | vājī | rocanā | divaḥ | pavamāno | vi | dhāvati |
rakṣohā | vāramavyayam |
sa | tritasyādhi | sānavi | pavamāno | arocayat |
jāmibhiḥ | sūryaṁ | saha |
sa | vṛtrahā | vṛṣā | suto | varivovidadābhyaḥ |
somo | vājamivāsarat |
sa | devaḥ | kavineṣito'bhi | droṇāni | dhāvati |
indurindrāya | maṁhanā |
eṣo | sya | vṛṣā | ratho'vyo | vārebhirarṣati |
gacchanvājaṁ | sahasriṇam |
etaṁ | tritasya | yoṣaṇo | hariṁ | hinvantyadribhiḥ |
indumindrāya | pītaye |
etaṁ | tyaṁ | harito | daśa | marmṛjyante | apasyuvaḥ |
yābhirmadāya | śumbhate |
eṣa | sya | mānuṣīṣvā | śyeno | na | vikṣu | sīdati |
gacchañjāro | na | yoṣitam |
eṣa | sya | madyo | raso'va | caṣṭe | divaḥ | śiśuḥ |
yendurvāramāviśat |
eṣa | sya | pītaye | suto | harirarṣati | dharṇasiḥ |
krandanyonimabhi | priyam |
āśurarṣa | bṛhanmate | pari | priyeṇa | dhāmnā |
yatra | deveti | bravan |
pariṣkṛṇvannaniṣkṛtaṁ | janāya | yātayanniṣaḥ |
vṛṣṭiṁ | divaḥ | pari | srava |
sutaiti | pavitrā | tviṣiṁ | dadhānaujasā |
vicakṣāṇo | virocayan |
ayaṁ | sa | yo | divaspari | raghuyāmā | pavitrā |
sindhorūrmā | vyakṣarat |
āvivāsanparāvato | atho | arvāvataḥ | sutaḥ |
indrāya | sicyate | madhu |
samīcīnānūṣata | hariṁ | hinvantyadribhiḥ |
yonāvṛtasya | sīdata |
punāno | akramīdabhi | viśvā | mṛdho | vicarṣaṇiḥ |
śumbhanti | vipraṁ | dhītibhiḥ |
ā | yonimaruṇo | ruhadgamadindraṁ | vṛṣā | sutaḥ |
dhruve | sadasi | sīdati |
nū | no | rayiṁ | mahāmindo'smabhyaṁ | soma | viśvataḥ |
ā | pavasva | sahasriṇam |
viśvā | soma | pavamāna | dyumnānīndavā | bhara |
vidāḥ | sahasriṇīriṣaḥ |
sa | naḥ | punānā | bhara | rayiṁ | stotre | suvīryam |
jariturvardhayā | giraḥ |
punānendavā | bhara | soma | dvibarhasaṁ | rayim |
vṛṣannindo | nokthyam |
pra | ye | gāvo | na | bhūrṇayastveṣāyāso | akramuḥ |
ghnantaḥ | kṛṣṇāmapa | tvacam |
suvitasya | manāmahe'ti | setuṁ | durāvyam |
sāhvāṁso | dasyumavratam |
śṛṇve | vṛṣṭeriva | svanaḥ | pavamānasya | śuṣmiṇaḥ |
caranti | vidyuto | divi |
ā | pavasva | mahīmiṣaṁ | gomadindo | hiraṇyavat |
aśvāvadvājavatsutaḥ |
sa | pavasva | vicarṣaṇā | mahī | rodasī | pṛṇa |
uṣāḥ | sūryo | na | raśmibhiḥ |
pari | ṇaḥ | śarmayantyā | dhārayā | soma | viśvataḥ |
sarā | raseva | viṣṭapam |
janayanrocanā | divo | janayannapsu | sūryam |
vasāno | gāpo | hariḥ |
eṣa | pratnena | manmanā | devo | devebhyaspari |
dhārayā | pavate | sutaḥ |
vāvṛdhānāya | tūrvaye | pavante | vājasātaye |
somāḥ | sahasrapājasaḥ |
duhānaḥ | pratnamitpayaḥ | pavitre | pari | ṣicyate |
krandandevām̐ | ajījanat |
abhi | viśvāni | vāryābhi | devām̐ | ṛtāvṛdhaḥ |
somaḥ | punāno | arṣati |
gomannaḥ | soma | vīravadaśvāvadvājavatsutaḥ |
pavasva | bṛhatīriṣaḥ |
yo | atyeva | mṛjyate | gobhirmadāya | haryataḥ |
taṁ | gīrbhirvāsayāmasi |
taṁ | no | viśvāvasyuvo | giraḥ | śumbhanti | pūrvathā |
indumindrāya | pītaye |
punāno | yāti | haryataḥ | somo | gīrbhiḥ | pariṣkṛtaḥ |
viprasya | medhyātitheḥ |
pavamāna | vidā | rayimasmabhyaṁ | soma | suśriyam |
indo | sahasravarcasam |
induratyo | na | vājasṛtkanikranti | pavitrā |
yadakṣārati | devayuḥ |
pavasva | vājasātaye | viprasya | gṛṇato | vṛdhe |
soma | rāsva | suvīryam |
pra | ṇendo | mahe | tanormiṁ | na | bibhradarṣasi |
abhi | devām̐ | ayāsyaḥ |
matī | juṣṭo | dhiyā | hitaḥ | somo | hinve | parāvati |
viprasya | dhārayā | kaviḥ |
ayaṁ | deveṣu | jāgṛviḥ | sutaiti | pavitrā |
somo | yāti | vicarṣaṇiḥ |
sa | naḥ | pavasva | vājayuścakrāṇaścārumadhvaram |
barhiṣmām̐ | ā | vivāsati |
sa | no | bhagāya | vāyave | vipravīraḥ | sadāvṛdhaḥ |
somo | deveṣvā | yamat |
sa | no | adya | vasuttaye | kratuvidgātuvittamaḥ |
vājaṁ | jeṣi | śravo | bṛhat |
sa | pavasva | madāya | kaṁ | nṛcakṣā | devavītaye |
indavindrāya | pītaye |
sa | no | arṣābhi | dūtyaṁ | tvamindrāya | tośase |
devāntsakhibhyā | varam |
uta | tvāmaruṇaṁ | vayaṁ | gobhirañjmo | madāya | kam |
vi | no | rāye | duro | vṛdhi |
atyū | pavitramakramīdvājī | dhuraṁ | na | yāmani |
indurdeveṣu | patyate |
samī | sakhāyo | asvaranvane | krīḻantamatyavim |
induṁ | nāvānūṣata |
tayā | pavasva | dhārayā | yayā | pīto | vicakṣase |
indo | stotre | suvīryam |
asṛgrandevavītaye'tyāsaḥ | kṛtvyeva |
kṣarantaḥ | parvatāvṛdhaḥ |
pariṣkṛtāsendavo | yoṣeva | pitryāvatī |
vāyuṁ | somāsṛkṣata |
ete | somāsendavaḥ | prayasvantaścamū | sutāḥ |
indraṁ | vardhanti | karmabhiḥ |
ā | dhāvatā | suhastyaḥ | śukrā | gṛbhṇīta | manthinā |
gobhiḥ | śrīṇīta | matsaram |
sa | pavasva | dhanaṁjaya | prayantā | rādhaso | mahaḥ |
asmabhyaṁ | soma | gātuvit |
etaṁ | mṛjanti | marjyaṁ | pavamānaṁ | daśa | kṣipaḥ |
indrāya | matsaraṁ | madam |
ayā | somaḥ | sukṛtyayā | mahaścidabhyavardhata |
mandānodvṛṣāyate |
kṛtānīdasya | kartvā | cetante | dasyutarhaṇā |
ṛṇā | ca | dhṛṣṇuścayate |
ātsomendriyo | raso | vajraḥ | sahasrasā | bhuvat |
ukthaṁ | yadasya | jāyate |
svayaṁ | kavirvidhartari | viprāya | ratnamicchati |
yadī | marmṛjyate | dhiyaḥ |
siṣāsatū | rayīṇāṁ | vājeṣvarvatāmiva |
bhareṣu | jigyuṣāmasi |
taṁ | tvā | nṛmṇāni | bibhrataṁ | sadhastheṣu | maho | divaḥ |
cāruṁ | sukṛtyayemahe |
saṁvṛktadhṛṣṇumukthyaṁ | mahāmahivrataṁ | madam |
śataṁ | puro | rurukṣaṇim |
atastvā | rayimabhi | rājānaṁ | sukrato | divaḥ |
suparṇo | avyathirbharat |
viśvasmetsvardṛśe | sādhāraṇaṁ | rajasturam |
gopāmṛtasya | virbharat |
adhā | hinvānendriyaṁ | jyāyo | mahitvamānaśe |
abhiṣṭikṛdvicarṣaṇiḥ |
pavasva | vṛṣṭimā | su | no'pāmūrmiṁ | divaspari |
ayakṣmā | bṛhatīriṣaḥ |
tayā | pavasva | dhārayā | yayā | gāvehāgaman |
janyāsopa | no | gṛham |
ghṛtaṁ | pavasva | dhārayā | yajñeṣu | devavītamaḥ |
asmabhyaṁ | vṛṣṭimā | pava |
sa | norje | vyavyayaṁ | pavitraṁ | dhāva | dhārayā |
devāsaḥ | śṛṇavanhi | kam |
pavamāno | asiṣyadadrakṣāṁsyapajaṅghanat |
pratnavadrocayanrucaḥ |
utte | śuṣmāserate | sindhorūrmeriva | svanaḥ |
vāṇasya | codayā | pavim |
prasave | todīrate | tisro | vāco | makhasyuvaḥ |
yadavyaiṣi | sānavi |
avyo | vāre | pari | priyaṁ | hariṁ | hinvantyadribhiḥ |
pavamānaṁ | madhuścutam |
ā | pavasva | madintama | pavitraṁ | dhārayā | kave |
arkasya | yonimāsadam |
sa | pavasva | madintama | gobhirañjāno | aktubhiḥ |
indavindrāya | pītaye |
adhvaryo | adribhiḥ | sutaṁ | somaṁ | pavitrā | sṛja |
punīhīndrāya | pātave |
divaḥ | pīyūṣamuttamaṁ | somamindrāya | vajriṇe |
sunotā | madhumattamam |
tava | tyendo | andhaso | devā | madhorvyaśnate |
pavamānasya | marutaḥ |
tvaṁ | hi | soma | vardhayantsuto | madāya | bhūrṇaye |
vṛṣantstotāramūtaye |
abhyarṣa | vicakṣaṇa | pavitraṁ | dhārayā | sutaḥ |
abhi | vājamuta | śravaḥ |
pari | dyukṣaḥ | sanadrayirbharadvājaṁ | no | andhasā |
suvāno | arṣa | pavitrā |
tava | pratnebhiradhvabhiravyo | vāre | pari | priyaḥ |
sahasradhāro | yāttanā |
carurna | yastamīṅkhayendo | na | dānamīṅkhaya |
vadhairvadhasnavīṅkhaya |
ni | śuṣmamindaveṣāṁ | puruhūta | janānām |
yo | asmām̐ | ādideśati |
śataṁ | nenda | ūtibhiḥ | sahasraṁ | vā | śucīnām |
pavasva | maṁhayadrayiḥ |
utte | śuṣmāso | asthū | rakṣo | bhindanto | adrivaḥ |
nudasva | yāḥ | parispṛdhaḥ |
ayā | nijaghnirojasā | rathasaṅ | ge | dhane | hite |
stavābibhyuṣā | hṛdā |
asya | vratāni | nādhṛṣe | pavamānasya | dūḍhyā |
ruja | yastvā | pṛtanyati |
taṁ | hinvanti | madacyutaṁ | hariṁ | nadīṣu | vājinam |
indumindrāya | matsaram |
asya | pratnāmanu | dyutaṁ | śukraṁ | duduhre | ahrayaḥ |
payaḥ | sahasrasāmṛṣim |
ayaṁ | sūryevopadṛgayaṁ | sarāṁsi | dhāvati |
sapta | pravatā | divam |
ayaṁ | viśvāni | tiṣṭhati | punāno | bhuvanopari |
somo | devo | na | sūryaḥ |
pari | ṇo | devavītaye | vājām̐ | arṣasi | gomataḥ |
punānendavindrayuḥ |
yavaṁyavaṁ | no | andhasā | puṣṭaṁpuṣṭaṁ | pari | srava |
soma | viśvā | ca | saubhagā |
indo | yathā | tava | stavo | yathā | te | jātamandhasaḥ |
ni | barhiṣi | priye | sadaḥ |
uta | no | govidaśvavitpavasva | somāndhasā |
makṣūtamebhirahabhiḥ |
yo | jināti | na | jīyate | hanti | śatrumabhītya |
sa | pavasva | sahasrajit |
pari | soma | ṛtaṁ | bṛhadāśuḥ | pavitre | arṣati |
vighnanrakṣāṁsi | devayuḥ |
yatsomo | vājamarṣati | śataṁ | dhārāpasyuvaḥ |
indrasya | sakhyamāviśan |
abhi | tvā | yoṣaṇo | daśa | jāraṁ | na | kanyānūṣata |
mṛjyase | soma | sātaye |
tvamindrāya | viṣṇave | svādurindo | pari | srava |
nṝntstotṝnpāhyaṁhasaḥ |
pra | te | dhārāsaścato | divo | na | yanti | vṛṣṭayaḥ |
acchā | vājaṁ | sahasriṇam |
abhi | priyāṇi | kāvyā | viśvā | cakṣāṇo | arṣati |
haristuñjānāyudhā |
sa | marmṛjānāyubhiribho | rājeva | suvrataḥ |
śyeno | na | vaṁsu | ṣīdati |
sa | no | viśvā | divo | vasūto | pṛthivyādhi |
punānendavā | bhara |
taratsa | mandī | dhāvati | dhārā | sutasyāndhasaḥ |
taratsa | mandī | dhāvati |
usrā | veda | vasūnāṁ | martasya | devyavasaḥ |
taratsa | mandī | dhāvati |
dhvasrayoḥ | puruṣantyorā | sahasrāṇi | dadmahe |
taratsa | mandī | dhāvati |
ā | yayostriṁśataṁ | tanā | sahasrāṇi | ca | dadmahe |
taratsa | mandī | dhāvati |
pavasva | gojidaśvajidviśvajitsoma | raṇyajit |
prajāvadratnamā | bhara |
pavasvādbhyo | adābhyaḥ | pavasvauṣadhībhyaḥ |
pavasva | dhiṣaṇābhyaḥ |
tvaṁ | soma | pavamāno | viśvāni | duritā | tara |
kaviḥ | sīda | ni | barhiṣi |
pavamāna | svarvido | jāyamāno'bhavo | mahān |
indo | viśvām̐ | abhīdasi |
pra | gāyatreṇa | gāyata | pavamānaṁ | vicarṣaṇim |
induṁ | sahasracakṣasam |
taṁ | tvā | sahasracakṣasamatho | sahasrabharṇasam |
ati | vāramapāviṣuḥ |
ati | vārānpavamāno | asiṣyadatkalaśām̐ | abhi | dhāvati |
indrasya | hārdyāviśan |
indrasya | soma | rādhase | śaṁ | pavasva | vicarṣaṇe |
prajāvadretā | bhara |
ayā | vītī | pari | srava | yastendo | madeṣvā |
avāhannavatīrnava |
puraḥ | sadyetthādhiye | divodāsāya | śambaram |
adha | tyaṁ | turvaśaṁ | yadum |
pari | ṇo | aśvamaśvavidgomadindo | hiraṇyavat |
kṣarā | sahasriṇīriṣaḥ |
pavamānasya | te | vayaṁ | pavitramabhyundataḥ |
sakhitvamā | vṛṇīmahe |
ye | te | pavitramūrmayo'bhikṣaranti | dhārayā |
tebhirnaḥ | soma | mṛḻaya |
sa | naḥ | punānā | bhara | rayiṁ | vīravatīmiṣam |
īśānaḥ | soma | viśvataḥ |
etamu | tyaṁ | daśa | kṣipo | mṛjanti | sindhumātaram |
samādityebhirakhyata |
samindreṇota | vāyunā | sutaiti | pavitrā |
saṁ | sūryasya | raśmibhiḥ |
sa | no | bhagāya | vāyave | pūṣṇe | pavasva | madhumān |
cārurmitre | varuṇe | ca |
uccā | te | jātamandhaso | divi | ṣadbhūmyā | dade |
ugraṁ | śarma | mahi | śravaḥ |
enā | viśvānyaryā | dyumnāni | mānuṣāṇām |
siṣāsanto | vanāmahe |
sa | nendrāya | yajyave | varuṇāya | marudbhyaḥ |
varivovitpari | srava |
upo | ṣu | jātamapturaṁ | gobhirbhaṅgaṁ | pariṣkṛtam |
induṁ | devāyāsiṣuḥ |
tamidvardhantu | no | giro | vatsaṁ | saṁśiśvarīriva |
yendrasya | hṛdaṁsaniḥ |
arṣā | ṇaḥ | soma | śaṁ | gave | dhukṣasva | pipyuṣīmiṣam |
vardhā | samudramukthyam |
pavamāno | ajījanaddivaścitraṁ | na | tanyatum |
jyotirvaiśvānaraṁ | bṛhat |
pavamānasya | te | raso | mado | rājannaducchunaḥ |
vi | vāramavyamarṣati |
pavamāna | rasastava | dakṣo | vi | rājati | dyumān |
jyotirviśvaṁ | svardṛśe |
yaste | mado | vareṇyastenā | pavasvāndhasā |
devāvīraghaśaṁsahā |
jaghnirvṛtramamitriyaṁ | sasnirvājaṁ | divedive |
goṣo | aśvasāsi |
saṁmiślo | aruṣo | bhava | sūpasthābhirna | dhenubhiḥ |
sīdañchyeno | na | yonimā |
sa | pavasva | yāvithendraṁ | vṛtrāya | hantave |
vavrivāṁsaṁ | mahīrapaḥ |
suvīrāso | vayaṁ | dhanā | jayema | soma | mīḍhvaḥ |
punāno | vardha | no | giraḥ |
tvotāsastavāvasā | syāma | vanvantāmuraḥ |
soma | vrateṣu | jāgṛhi |
apaghnanpavate | mṛdho'pa | somo | arāvṇaḥ |
gacchannindrasya | niṣkṛtam |
maho | no | rāyā | bhara | pavamāna | jahī | mṛdhaḥ |
rāsvendo | vīravadyaśaḥ |
na | tvā | śataṁ | cana | hruto | rādho | ditsantamā | minan |
yatpunāno | makhasyase |
pavasvendo | vṛṣā | sutaḥ | kṛdhī | no | yaśaso | jane |
viśvāpa | dviṣo | jahi |
asya | te | sakhye | vayaṁ | tavendo | dyumnottame |
sāsahyāma | pṛtanyataḥ |
yā | te | bhīmānyāyudhā | tigmāni | santi | dhūrvaṇe |
rakṣā | samasya | no | nidaḥ |
ete | asṛgramindavastiraḥ | pavitramāśavaḥ |
viśvānyabhi | saubhagā |
vighnanto | duritā | puru | sugā | tokāya | vājinaḥ |
tanā | kṛṇvanto | arvate |
kṛṇvanto | varivo | gave'bhyarṣanti | suṣṭutim |
iḻāmasmabhyaṁ | saṁyatam |
asāvyaṁśurmadāyāpsu | dakṣo | giriṣṭhāḥ |
śyeno | na | yonimāsadat |
śubhramandho | devavātamapsu | dhūto | nṛbhiḥ | sutaḥ |
svadanti | gāvaḥ | payobhiḥ |
ādīmaśvaṁ | na | hetāro'śūśubhannamṛtāya |
madhvo | rasaṁ | sadhamāde |
yāste | dhārā | madhuścuto'sṛgramindotaye |
tābhiḥ | pavitramāsadaḥ |
so | arṣendrāya | pītaye | tiro | romāṇyavyayā |
sīdanyonā | vaneṣvā |
tvamindo | pari | srava | svādiṣṭho | aṅgirobhyaḥ |
varivovidghṛtaṁ | payaḥ |
ayaṁ | vicarṣaṇirhitaḥ | pavamānaḥ | sa | cetati |
hinvānāpyaṁ | bṛhat |
eṣa | vṛṣā | vṛṣavrataḥ | pavamāno | aśastihā |
karadvasūni | dāśuṣe |
ā | pavasva | sahasriṇaṁ | rayiṁ | gomantamaśvinam |
puruścandraṁ | puruspṛham |
eṣa | sya | pari | ṣicyate | marmṛjyamānāyubhiḥ |
urugāyaḥ | kavikratuḥ |
sahasrotiḥ | śatāmagho | vimāno | rajasaḥ | kaviḥ |
indrāya | pavate | madaḥ |
girā | jāteha | stutendurindrāya | dhīyate |
viryonā | vasatāviva |
pavamānaḥ | suto | nṛbhiḥ | somo | vājamivāsarat |
camūṣu | śakmanāsadam |
taṁ | tripṛṣṭhe | trivandhure | rathe | yuñjanti | yātave |
ṛṣīṇāṁ | sapta | dhītibhiḥ |
taṁ | sotāro | dhanaspṛtamāśuṁ | vājāya | yātave |
hariṁ | hinota | vājinam |
āviśankalaśaṁ | suto | viśvārṣannabhi | śriyaḥ |
śūro | na | goṣu | tiṣṭhati |
ā | tendo | madāya | kaṁ | payo | duhantyāyavaḥ |
devā | devebhyo | madhu |
ā | naḥ | somaṁ | pavitrā | sṛjatā | madhumattamam |
devebhyo | devaśruttamam |
ete | somāsṛkṣata | gṛṇānāḥ | śravase | mahe |
madintamasya | dhārayā |
abhi | gavyāni | vītaye | nṛmṇā | punāno | arṣasi |
sanadvājaḥ | pari | srava |
uta | no | gomatīriṣo | viśvārṣa | pariṣṭubhaḥ |
gṛṇāno | jamadagninā |
pavasva | vāco | agriyaḥ | soma | citrābhirūtibhiḥ |
abhi | viśvāni | kāvyā |
tvaṁ | samudriyāpo'griyo | vācerayan |
pavasva | viśvamejaya |
tubhyemā | bhuvanā | kave | mahimne | soma | tasthire |
tubhyamarṣanti | sindhavaḥ |
pra | te | divo | na | vṛṣṭayo | dhārā | yantyasaścataḥ |
abhi | śukrāmupastiram |
indrāyenduṁ | punītanograṁ | dakṣāya | sādhanam |
īśānaṁ | vītirādhasam |
pavamāna | ṛtaḥ | kaviḥ | somaḥ | pavitramāsadat |
dadhatstotre | suvīryam |
ā | pavasva | sahasriṇaṁ | rayiṁ | soma | suvīryam |
asme | śravāṁsi | dhāraya |
iṣamūrjaṁ | ca | pinvasendrāya | matsarintamaḥ |
camūṣvā | ni | ṣīdasi |
sutendrāya | viṣṇave | somaḥ | kalaśe | akṣarat |
madhumām̐ | astu | vāyave |
ete | asṛgramāśavo'ti | hvarāṁsi | babhravaḥ |
somā | ṛtasya | dhārayā |
indraṁ | vardhanto | apturaḥ | kṛṇvanto | viśvamāryam |
apaghnanto | arāvṇaḥ |
sutānu | svamā | rajo'bhyarṣanti | babhravaḥ |
indraṁ | gacchantendavaḥ |
ayā | pavasva | dhārayā | yayā | sūryamarocayaḥ |
hinvāno | mānuṣīrapaḥ |
ayukta | sūraitaśaṁ | pavamāno | manāvadhi |
antarikṣeṇa | yātave |
uta | tyā | harito | daśa | sūro | ayukta | yātave |
indurindreti | bruvan |
parīto | vāyave | sutaṁ | girendrāya | matsaram |
avyo | vāreṣu | siñcata |
pavamāna | vidā | rayimasmabhyaṁ | soma | duṣṭaram |
yo | dūṇāśo | vanuṣyatā |
abhyarṣa | sahasriṇaṁ | rayiṁ | gomantamaśvinam |
abhi | vājamuta | śravaḥ |
somo | devo | na | sūryo'dribhiḥ | pavate | sutaḥ |
dadhānaḥ | kalaśe | rasam |
ete | dhāmānyāryā | śukrā | ṛtasya | dhārayā |
vājaṁ | gomantamakṣaran |
sutendrāya | vajriṇe | somāso | dadhyāśiraḥ |
pavitramatyakṣaran |
pra | soma | madhumattamo | rāye | arṣa | pavitrā |
mado | yo | devavītamaḥ |
tamī | mṛjantyāyavo | hariṁ | nadīṣu | vājinam |
indumindrāya | matsaram |
ā | pavasva | hiraṇyavadaśvāvatsoma | vīravat |
vājaṁ | gomantamā | bhara |
pari | vāje | na | vājayumavyo | vāreṣu | siñcata |
indrāya | madhumattamam |
kaviṁ | mṛjanti | marjyaṁ | dhībhirviprāvasyavaḥ |
vṛṣā | kanikradarṣati |
vṛṣaṇaṁ | dhībhirapturaṁ | somamṛtasya | dhārayā |
matī | viprāḥ | samasvaran |
pavasva | devāyuṣagindraṁ | gacchatu | te | madaḥ |
vāyumā | roha | dharmaṇā |
pavamāna | ni | tośase | rayiṁ | soma | śravāyyam |
priyaḥ | samudramā | viśa |
apaghnanpavase | mṛdhaḥ | kratuvitsoma | matsaraḥ |
nudasvādevayuṁ | janam |
pavamānāsṛkṣata | somāḥ | śukrāsendavaḥ |
abhi | viśvāni | kāvyā |
pavamānāsāśavaḥ | śubhrāsṛgramindavaḥ |
ghnanto | viśvāpa | dviṣaḥ |
pavamānā | divasparyantarikṣādasṛkṣata |
pṛthivyādhi | sānavi |
punānaḥ | soma | dhārayendo | viśvāpa | sridhaḥ |
jahi | rakṣāṁsi | sukrato |
apaghnantsoma | rakṣaso'bhyarṣa | kanikradat |
dyumantaṁ | śuṣmamuttamam |
asme | vasūni | dhāraya | soma | divyāni | pārthivā |
indo | viśvāni | vāryā |
vṛṣā | soma | dyumām̐ | asi | vṛṣā | deva | vṛṣavrataḥ |
vṛṣā | dharmāṇi | dadhiṣe |
vṛṣṇaste | vṛṣṇyaṁ | śavo | vṛṣā | vanaṁ | vṛṣā | madaḥ |
satyaṁ | vṛṣanvṛṣedasi |
aśvo | na | cakrado | vṛṣā | saṁ | gendo | samarvataḥ |
vi | no | rāye | duro | vṛdhi |
asṛkṣata | pra | vājino | gavyā | somāso | aśvayā |
śukrāso | vīrayāśavaḥ |
śumbhamānā | ṛtāyubhirmṛjyamānā | gabhastyoḥ |
pavante | vāre | avyaye |
te | viśvā | dāśuṣe | vasu | somā | divyāni | pārthivā |
pavantāmāntarikṣyā |
pavamānasya | viśvavitpra | te | sargāsṛkṣata |
sūryasyeva | na | raśmayaḥ |
ketuṁ | kṛṇvandivaspari | viśvā | rūpābhyarṣasi |
samudraḥ | soma | pinvase |
hinvāno | vācamiṣyasi | pavamāna | vidharmaṇi |
akrāndevo | na | sūryaḥ |
induḥ | paviṣṭa | cetanaḥ | priyaḥ | kavīnāṁ | matī |
sṛjadaśvaṁ | rathīriva |
ūrmiryaste | pavitrā | devāvīḥ | paryakṣarat |
sīdannṛtasya | yonimā |
sa | no | arṣa | pavitrā | mado | yo | devavītamaḥ |
indavindrāya | pītaye |
iṣe | pavasva | dhārayā | mṛjyamāno | manīṣibhiḥ |
indo | rucābhi | gehi |
punāno | varivaskṛdhyūrjaṁ | janāya | girvaṇaḥ |
hare | sṛjānāśiram |
punāno | devavītayendrasya | yāhi | niṣkṛtam |
dyutāno | vājibhiryataḥ |
pra | hinvānāsendavo'cchā | samudramāśavaḥ |
dhiyā | jūtāsṛkṣata |
marmṛjānāsāyavo | vṛthā | samudramindavaḥ |
agmannṛtasya | yonimā |
pari | ṇo | yāhyasmayurviśvā | vasūnyojasā |
pāhi | naḥ | śarma | vīravat |
mimāti | vahniretaśaḥ | padaṁ | yujāna | ṛkvabhiḥ |
pra | yatsamudrāhitaḥ |
ā | yadyoniṁ | hiraṇyayamāśurṛtasya | sīdati |
jahātyapracetasaḥ |
abhi | venānūṣateyakṣanti | pracetasaḥ |
majjantyavicetasaḥ |
indrāyendo | marutvate | pavasva | madhumattamaḥ |
ṛtasya | yonimāsadam |
taṁ | tvā | viprā | vacovidaḥ | pari | ṣkṛṇvanti | vedhasaḥ |
saṁ | tvā | mṛjantyāyavaḥ |
rasaṁ | te | mitro | aryamā | pibanti | varuṇaḥ | kave |
pavamānasya | marutaḥ |
tvaṁ | soma | vipaścitaṁ | punāno | vācamiṣyasi |
indo | sahasrabharṇasam |
uto | sahasrabharṇasaṁ | vācaṁ | soma | makhasyuvam |
punānendavā | bhara |
punānendaveṣāṁ | puruhūta | janānām |
priyaḥ | samudramā | viśa |
davidyutatyā | rucā | pariṣṭobhantyā | kṛpā |
somāḥ | śukrā | gavāśiraḥ |
hinvāno | hetṛbhiryatā | vājaṁ | vājyakramīt |
sīdanto | vanuṣo | yathā |
ṛdhaksoma | svastaye | saṁjagmāno | divaḥ | kaviḥ |
pavasva | sūryo | dṛśe |
hinvanti | sūramusrayaḥ | svasāro | jāmayaspatim |
mahāminduṁ | mahīyuvaḥ |
pavamāna | rucārucā | devo | devebhyaspari |
viśvā | vasūnyā | viśa |
ā | pavamāna | suṣṭutiṁ | vṛṣṭiṁ | devebhyo | duvaḥ |
iṣe | pavasva | saṁyatam |
vṛṣā | hyasi | bhānunā | dyumantaṁ | tvā | havāmahe |
pavamāna | svādhyaḥ |
ā | pavasva | suvīryaṁ | mandamānaḥ | svāyudha |
iho | ṣvindavā | gahi |
yadadbhiḥ | pariṣicyase | mṛjyamāno | gabhastyoḥ |
druṇā | sadhasthamaśnuṣe |
pra | somāya | vyaśvavatpavamānāya | gāyata |
mahe | sahasracakṣase |
yasya | varṇaṁ | madhuścutaṁ | hariṁ | hinvantyadribhiḥ |
indumindrāya | pītaye |
tasya | te | vājino | vayaṁ | viśvā | dhanāni | jigyuṣaḥ |
sakhitvamā | vṛṇīmahe |
vṛṣā | pavasva | dhārayā | marutvate | ca | matsaraḥ |
viśvā | dadhānaujasā |
taṁ | tvā | dhartāramoṇyoḥ | pavamāna | svardṛśam |
hinve | vājeṣu | vājinam |
ayā | citto | vipānayā | hariḥ | pavasva | dhārayā |
yujaṁ | vājeṣu | codaya |
ā | nendo | mahīmiṣaṁ | pavasva | viśvadarśataḥ |
asmabhyaṁ | soma | gātuvit |
ā | kalaśānūṣatendo | dhārābhirojasā |
endrasya | pītaye | viśa |
yasya | te | madyaṁ | rasaṁ | tīvraṁ | duhantyadribhiḥ |
sa | pavasvābhimātihā |
rājā | medhābhirīyate | pavamāno | manāvadhi |
antarikṣeṇa | yātave |
ā | nendo | śatagvinaṁ | gavāṁ | poṣaṁ | svaśvyam |
vahā | bhagattimūtaye |
ā | naḥ | soma | saho | juvo | rūpaṁ | na | varcase | bhara |
suṣvāṇo | devavītaye |
arṣā | soma | dyumattamo'bhi | droṇāni | roruvat |
sīdañchyeno | na | yonimā |
apsendrāya | vāyave | varuṇāya | marudbhyaḥ |
somo | arṣati | viṣṇave |
iṣaṁ | tokāya | no | dadhadasmabhyaṁ | soma | viśvataḥ |
ā | pavasva | sahasriṇam |
ye | somāsaḥ | parāvati | ye | arvāvati | sunvire |
ye | vādaḥ | śaryaṇāvati |
yārjīkeṣu | kṛtvasu | ye | madhye | pastyānām |
ye | vā | janeṣu | pañcasu |
te | no | vṛṣṭiṁ | divaspari | pavantāmā | suvīryam |
suvānā | devāsendavaḥ |
pavate | haryato | harirgṛṇāno | jamadagninā |
hinvāno | goradhi | tvaci |
pra | śukrāso | vayojuvo | hinvānāso | na | saptayaḥ |
śrīṇānāpsu | mṛñjata |
taṁ | tvā | suteṣvābhuvo | hinvire | devatātaye |
sa | pavasvānayā | rucā |
ā | te | dakṣaṁ | mayobhuvaṁ | vahnimadyā | vṛṇīmahe |
pāntamā | puruspṛham |
ā | mandramā | vareṇyamā | vipramā | manīṣiṇam |
pāntamā | puruspṛham |
ā | rayimā | sucetunamā | sukrato | tanūṣvā |
pāntamā | puruspṛham |
pavasva | viśvacarṣaṇe'bhi | viśvāni | kāvyā |
sakhā | sakhibhyeḍyaḥ |
tābhyāṁ | viśvasya | rājasi | ye | pavamāna | dhāmanī |
pratīcī | soma | tasthatuḥ |
pari | dhāmāni | yāni | te | tvaṁ | somāsi | viśvataḥ |
pavamāna | ṛtubhiḥ | kave |
pavasva | janayanniṣo'bhi | viśvāni | vāryā |
sakhā | sakhibhyotaye |
tava | śukrāso | arcayo | divaspṛṣṭhe | vi | tanvate |
pavitraṁ | soma | dhāmabhiḥ |
taveme | sapta | sindhavaḥ | praśiṣaṁ | soma | sisrate |
tubhyaṁ | dhāvanti | dhenavaḥ |
pra | soma | yāhi | dhārayā | sutendrāya | matsaraḥ |
dadhāno | akṣiti | śravaḥ |
samu | tvā | dhībhirasvaranhinvatīḥ | sapta | jāmayaḥ |
vipramājā | vivasvataḥ |
mṛjanti | tvā | samagruvo'vye | jīrāvadhi | ṣvaṇi |
rebho | yadajyase | vane |
pavamānasya | te | kave | vājintsargāsṛkṣata |
arvanto | na | śravasyavaḥ |
acchā | kośaṁ | madhuścutamasṛgraṁ | vāre | avyaye |
avāvaśanta | dhītayaḥ |
acchā | samudramindavo'staṁ | gāvo | na | dhenavaḥ |
agmannṛtasya | yonimā |
pra | ṇendo | mahe | raṇāpo | arṣanti | sindhavaḥ |
yadgobhirvāsayiṣyase |
asya | te | sakhye | vayamiyakṣantastvotayaḥ |
indo | sakhitvamuśmasi |
ā | pavasva | gaviṣṭaye | mahe | soma | nṛcakṣase |
endrasya | jaṭhare | viśa |
mahām̐ | asi | soma | jyeṣṭhogrāṇāminda | ojiṣṭhaḥ |
yudhvā | sañchaśvajjigetha |
yogrebhyaścidojīyāñchūrebhyaścicchūrataraḥ |
bhūridābhyaścinmaṁhīyān |
tvaṁ | soma | sūraiṣastokasya | sātā | tanūnām |
vṛṇīmahe | sakhyāya | vṛṇīmahe | yujyāya |
agnāyūṁṣi | pavasā | suvorjamiṣaṁ | ca | naḥ |
āre | bādhasva | ducchunām |
agnirṛṣiḥ | pavamānaḥ | pāñcajanyaḥ | purohitaḥ |
tamīmahe | mahāgayam |
agne | pavasva | svapāsme | varcaḥ | suvīryam |
dadhadrayiṁ | mayi | poṣam |
pavamāno | ati | sridho'bhyarṣati | suṣṭutim |
sūro | na | viśvadarśataḥ |
sa | marmṛjānāyubhiḥ | prayasvānprayase | hitaḥ |
induratyo | vicakṣaṇaḥ |
pavamāna | ṛtaṁ | bṛhacchukraṁ | jyotirajījanat |
kṛṣṇā | tamāṁsi | jaṅghanat |
pavamānasya | jaṅghnato | hareścandrāsṛkṣata |
jīrājiraśociṣaḥ |
pavamāno | rathītamaḥ | śubhrebhiḥ | śubhraśastamaḥ |
hariścandro | marudgaṇaḥ |
pavamāno | vyaśnavadraśmibhirvājasātamaḥ |
dadhatstotre | suvīryam |
pra | suvānendurakṣāḥ | pavitramatyavyayam |
punānendurindramā |
eṣa | somo | adhi | tvaci | gavāṁ | krīḻatyadribhiḥ |
indraṁ | madāya | johuvat |
yasya | te | dyumnavatpayaḥ | pavamānābhṛtaṁ | divaḥ |
tena | no | mṛḻa | jīvase |
tvaṁ | somāsi | dhārayurmandraujiṣṭho | adhvare |
pavasva | maṁhayadrayiḥ |
tvaṁ | suto | nṛmādano | dadhanvānmatsarintamaḥ |
indrāya | sūrirandhasā |
tvaṁ | suṣvāṇo | adribhirabhyarṣa | kanikradat |
dyumantaṁ | śuṣmamuttamam |
indurhinvāno | arṣati | tiro | vārāṇyavyayā |
harirvājamacikradat |
indo | vyavyamarṣasi | vi | śravāṁsi | vi | saubhagā |
vi | vājāntsoma | gomataḥ |
ā | nendo | śatagvinaṁ | rayiṁ | gomantamaśvinam |
bharā | soma | sahasriṇam |
pavamānāsendavastiraḥ | pavitramāśavaḥ |
indraṁ | yāmebhirāśata |
kakuhaḥ | somyo | rasendurindrāya | pūrvyaḥ |
āyuḥ | pavatāyave |
hinvanti | sūramusrayaḥ | pavamānaṁ | madhuścutam |
abhi | girā | samasvaran |
avitā | no | ajāśvaḥ | pūṣā | yāmaniyāmani |
ā | bhakṣatkanyāsu | naḥ |
ayaṁ | somaḥ | kapardine | ghṛtaṁ | na | pavate | madhu |
ā | bhakṣatkanyāsu | naḥ |
ayaṁ | tāghṛṇe | suto | ghṛtaṁ | na | pavate | śuci |
ā | bhakṣatkanyāsu | naḥ |
vāco | jantuḥ | kavīnāṁ | pavasva | soma | dhārayā |
deveṣu | ratnadhāsi |
ā | kalaśeṣu | dhāvati | śyeno | varma | vi | gāhate |
abhi | droṇā | kanikradat |
pari | pra | soma | te | raso'sarji | kalaśe | sutaḥ |
śyeno | na | takto | arṣati |
pavasva | soma | mandayannindrāya | madhumattamaḥ |
asṛgrandevavītaye | vājayanto | ratheva |
te | sutāso | madintamāḥ | śukrā | vāyumasṛkṣata |
grāvṇā | tunno | abhiṣṭutaḥ | pavitraṁ | soma | gacchasi |
dadhatstotre | suvīryam |
eṣa | tunno | abhiṣṭutaḥ | pavitramati | gāhate |
rakṣohā | vāramavyayam |
yadanti | yacca | dūrake | bhayaṁ | vindati | māmiha |
pavamāna | vi | tajjahi |
pavamānaḥ | so | adya | naḥ | pavitreṇa | vicarṣaṇiḥ |
yaḥ | potā | sa | punātu | naḥ |
yatte | pavitramarciṣyagne | vitatamantarā |
brahma | tena | punīhi | naḥ |
yatte | pavitramarcivadagne | tena | punīhi | naḥ |
brahmasavaiḥ | punīhi | naḥ |
ubhābhyāṁ | deva | savitaḥ | pavitreṇa | savena | ca |
māṁ | punīhi | viśvataḥ |
tribhiṣṭvaṁ | deva | savitarvarṣiṣṭhaiḥ | soma | dhāmabhiḥ |
agne | dakṣaiḥ | punīhi | naḥ |
punantu | māṁ | devajanāḥ | punantu | vasavo | dhiyā |
viśve | devāḥ | punīta | mā | jātavedaḥ | punīhi | mā |
pra | pyāyasva | pra | syandasva | soma | viśvebhiraṁśubhiḥ |
devebhyottamaṁ | haviḥ |
upa | priyaṁ | panipnataṁ | yuvānamāhutīvṛdham |
aganma | bibhrato | namaḥ |
alāyyasya | paraśurnanāśa | tamā | pavasva | deva | soma |
ākhuṁ | cideva | deva | soma |
yaḥ | pāvamānīradhyetyṛṣibhiḥ | saṁbhṛtaṁ | rasam |
sarvaṁ | sa | pūtamaśnāti | svaditaṁ | mātariśvanā |
pāvamānīryo | adhyetyṛṣibhiḥ | saṁbhṛtaṁ | rasam |
tasmai | sarasvatī | duhe | kṣīraṁ | sarpirmadhūdakam |
pra | devamacchā | madhumantendavo'siṣyadanta | gāvā | na | dhenavaḥ |
barhiṣado | vacanāvantodhabhiḥ | parisrutamusriyā | nirṇijaṁ | dhire |
sa | roruvadabhi | pūrvācikradadupāruhaḥ | śrathayantsvādate | hariḥ |
tiraḥ | pavitraṁ | pariyannuru | jrayo | ni | śaryāṇi | dadhate | devā | varam |
vi | yo | mame | yamyā | saṁyatī | madaḥ | sākaṁvṛdhā | payasā | pinvadakṣitā |
mahī | apāre | rajasī | vivevidadabhivrajannakṣitaṁ | pājā | dade |
sa | mātarā | vicaranvājayannapaḥ | pra | medhiraḥ | svadhayā | pinvate | padam |
aṁśuryavena | pipiśe | yato | nṛbhiḥ | saṁ | jāmibhirnasate | rakṣate | śiraḥ |
saṁ | dakṣeṇa | manasā | jāyate | kavirṛtasya | garbho | nihito | yamā | paraḥ |
yūnā | ha | santā | prathamaṁ | vi | jajñaturguhā | hitaṁ | janima | nemamudyatam |
mandrasya | rūpaṁ | vividurmanīṣiṇaḥ | śyeno | yadandho | abharatparāvataḥ |
taṁ | marjayanta | suvṛdhaṁ | nadīṣvām̐ | uśantamaṁśuṁ | pariyantamṛgmiyam |
tvāṁ | mṛjanti | daśa | yoṣaṇaḥ | sutaṁ | soma | ṛṣibhirmatibhirdhītibhirhitam |
avyo | vārebhiruta | devahūtibhirnṛbhiryato | vājamā | darṣi | sātaye |
pariprayantaṁ | vayyaṁ | suṣaṁsadaṁ | somaṁ | manīṣābhyanūṣata | stubhaḥ |
yo | dhārayā | madhumām̐ | ūrmiṇā | diveyarti | vācaṁ | rayiṣāḻamartyaḥ |
ayaṁ | diveyarti | viśvamā | rajaḥ | somaḥ | punānaḥ | kalaśeṣu | sīdati |
adbhirgobhirmṛjyate | adribhiḥ | sutaḥ | punānendurvarivo | vidatpriyam |
evā | naḥ | soma | pariṣicyamāno | vayo | dadhaccitratamaṁ | pavasva |
adveṣe | dyāvāpṛthivī | huvema | devā | dhatta | rayimasme | suvīram |
iṣurna | dhanvanprati | dhīyate | matirvatso | na | māturupa | sarjyūdhani |
urudhāreva | duhe | agrāyatyasya | vrateṣvapi | someṣyate |
upo | matiḥ | pṛcyate | sicyate | madhu | mandrājanī | codate | antarāsani |
pavamānaḥ | saṁtaniḥ | praghnatāmiva | madhumāndrapsaḥ | pari | vāramarṣati |
avye | vadhūyuḥ | pavate | pari | tvaci | śrathnīte | naptīraditerṛtaṁ | yate |
harirakrānyajataḥ | saṁyato | mado | nṛmṇā | śiśāno | mahiṣo | na | śobhate |
ukṣā | mimāti | prati | yanti | dhenavo | devasya | devīrupa | yanti | niṣkṛtam |
atyakramīdarjunaṁ | vāramavyayamatkaṁ | na | niktaṁ | pari | somo | avyata |
amṛktena | ruśatā | vāsasā | hariramartyo | nirṇijānaḥ | pari | vyata |
divaspṛṣṭhaṁ | barhaṇā | nirṇije | kṛtopastaraṇaṁ | camvornabhasmayam |
sūryasyeva | raśmayo | drāvayitnavo | matsarāsaḥ | prasupaḥ | sākamīrate |
tantuṁ | tataṁ | pari | sargāsāśavo | nendrādṛte | pavate | dhāma | kiṁ | cana |
sindhoriva | pravaṇe | nimnāśavo | vṛṣacyutā | madāso | gātumāśata |
śaṁ | no | niveśe | dvipade | catuṣpade'sme | vājāḥ | soma | tiṣṭhantu | kṛṣṭayaḥ |
ā | naḥ | pavasva | vasumaddhiraṇyavadaśvāvadgomadyavamatsuvīryam |
yūyaṁ | hi | soma | pitaro | mama | sthana | divo | mūrdhānaḥ | prasthitā | vayaskṛtaḥ |
ete | somāḥ | pavamānāsendraṁ | ratheva | pra | yayuḥ | sātimaccha |
sutāḥ | pavitramati | yantyavyaṁ | hitvī | vavriṁ | harito | vṛṣṭimaccha |
indavindrāya | bṛhate | pavasva | sumṛḻīko | anavadyo | riśādāḥ |
bharā | candrāṇi | gṛṇate | vasūni | devairdyāvāpṛthivī | prāvataṁ | naḥ |
trirasmai | sapta | dhenavo | duduhre | satyāmāśiraṁ | pūrvye | vyomani |
catvāryanyā | bhuvanāni | nirṇije | cārūṇi | cakre | yadṛtairavardhata |
sa | bhikṣamāṇo | amṛtasya | cāruṇobhe | dyāvā | kāvyenā | vi | śaśrathe |
tejiṣṭhāpo | maṁhanā | pari | vyata | yadī | devasya | śravasā | sado | viduḥ |
te | asya | santu | ketavo'mṛtyavo'dābhyāso | januṣī | ubhe | anu |
yebhirnṛmṇā | ca | devyā | ca | punatādidrājānaṁ | mananāgṛbhṇata |
sa | mṛjyamāno | daśabhiḥ | sukarmabhiḥ | pra | madhyamāsu | mātṛṣu | prame | sacā |
vratāni | pāno | amṛtasya | cāruṇobhe | nṛcakṣānu | paśyate | viśau |
sa | marmṛjānendriyāya | dhāyasaubhe | antā | rodasī | harṣate | hitaḥ |
vṛṣā | śuṣmeṇa | bādhate | vi | durmatīrādediśānaḥ | śaryaheva | śurudhaḥ |
sa | mātarā | na | dadṛśānosriyo | nānadadeti | marutāmiva | svanaḥ |
jānannṛtaṁ | prathamaṁ | yatsvarṇaraṁ | praśastaye | kamavṛṇīta | sukratuḥ |
ruvati | bhīmo | vṛṣabhastaviṣyayā | śṛṅge | śiśāno | hariṇī | vicakṣaṇaḥ |
ā | yoniṁ | somaḥ | sukṛtaṁ | ni | ṣīdati | gavyayī | tvagbhavati | nirṇigavyayī |
śuciḥ | punānastanvamarepasamavye | harirnyadhāviṣṭa | sānavi |
juṣṭo | mitrāya | varuṇāya | vāyave | tridhātu | madhu | kriyate | sukarmabhiḥ |
pavasva | soma | devavītaye | vṛṣendrasya | hārdi | somadhānamā | viśa |
purā | no | bādhādduritāti | pāraya | kṣetraviddhi | diśāhā | vipṛcchate |
hito | na | saptirabhi | vājamarṣendrasyendo | jaṭharamā | pavasva |
nāvā | na | sindhumati | parṣi | vidvāñchūro | na | yudhyannava | no | nidaḥ | spaḥ |
ā | dakṣiṇā | sṛjyate | śuṣmyāsadaṁ | veti | druho | rakṣasaḥ | pāti | jāgṛviḥ |
hariropaśaṁ | kṛṇute | nabhaspayopastire | camvorbrahma | nirṇije |
pra | kṛṣṭiheva | śūṣaiti | roruvadasuryaṁ | varṇaṁ | ni | riṇīte | asya | tam |
jahāti | vavriṁ | pitureti | niṣkṛtamupaprutaṁ | kṛṇute | nirṇijaṁ | tanā |
adribhiḥ | sutaḥ | pavate | gabhastyorvṛṣāyate | nabhasā | vepate | matī |
sa | modate | nasate | sādhate | girā | nenikte | apsu | yajate | parīmaṇi |
pari | dyukṣaṁ | sahasaḥ | parvatāvṛdhaṁ | madhvaḥ | siñcanti | harmyasya | sakṣaṇim |
ā | yasmingāvaḥ | suhutādodhani | mūrdhañchrīṇantyagriyaṁ | varīmabhiḥ |
samī | rathaṁ | na | bhurijoraheṣata | daśa | svasāro | aditerupasthā |
jigādupa | jrayati | gorapīcyaṁ | padaṁ | yadasya | matuthājījanan |
śyeno | na | yoniṁ | sadanaṁ | dhiyā | kṛtaṁ | hiraṇyayamāsadaṁ | devaiṣati |
e | riṇanti | barhiṣi | priyaṁ | girāśvo | na | devām̐ | apyeti | yajñiyaḥ |
parā | vyakto | aruṣo | divaḥ | kavirvṛṣā | tripṛṣṭho | anaviṣṭa | gābhi |
sahasraṇītiryatiḥ | parāyatī | rebho | na | pūrvīruṣaso | vi | rājati |
tveṣaṁ | rūpaṁ | kṛṇute | varṇo | asya | sa | yatrāśayatsamṛtā | sedhati | sridhaḥ |
apsā | yāti | svadhayā | daivyaṁ | janaṁ | saṁ | suṣṭutī | nasate | saṁ | goagrayā |
ukṣeva | yūthā | pariyannarāvīdadhi | tviṣīradhita | sūryasya |
divyaḥ | suparṇo'va | cakṣata | kṣāṁ | somaḥ | pari | kratunā | paśyate | jāḥ |
hariṁ | mṛjantyaruṣo | na | yujyate | saṁ | dhenubhiḥ | kalaśe | somo | ajyate |
udvācamīrayati | hinvate | matī | puruṣṭutasya | kati | citparipriyaḥ |
sākaṁ | vadanti | bahavo | manīṣiṇendrasya | somaṁ | jaṭhare | yadāduhuḥ |
yadī | mṛjanti | sugabhastayo | naraḥ | sanīḻābhirdaśabhiḥ | kāmyaṁ | madhu |
aramamāṇo | atyeti | gābhi | sūryasya | priyaṁ | duhitustiro | ravam |
anvasmai | joṣamabharadvinaṁgṛsaḥ | saṁ | dvayībhiḥ | svasṛbhiḥ | kṣeti | jāmibhiḥ |
nṛdhūto | adriṣuto | barhiṣi | priyaḥ | patirgavāṁ | pradivendurṛtviyaḥ |
puraṁdhivānmanuṣo | yajñasādhanaḥ | śucirdhiyā | pavate | somendra | te |
nṛbāhubhyāṁ | codito | dhārayā | suto'nuṣvadhaṁ | pavate | somendra | te |
āprāḥ | kratūntsamajairadhvare | matīrverna | druṣaccamvorāsadaddhariḥ |
aṁśuṁ | duhanti | stanayantamakṣitaṁ | kaviṁ | kavayo'paso | manīṣiṇaḥ |
samī | gāvo | matayo | yanti | saṁyata | ṛtasya | yonā | sadane | punarbhuvaḥ |
nābhā | pṛthivyā | dharuṇo | maho | divo'pāmūrmau | sindhuṣvantarukṣitaḥ |
indrasya | vajro | vṛṣabho | vibhūvasuḥ | somo | hṛde | pavate | cāru | matsaraḥ |
sa | tū | pavasva | pari | pārthivaṁ | rajaḥ | stotre | śikṣannādhūnvate | ca | sukrato |
mā | no | nirbhāgvasunaḥ | sādanaspṛśo | rayiṁ | piśaṅgaṁ | bahulaṁ | vasīmahi |
ā | tū | nendo | śatadātvaśvyaṁ | sahasradātu | paśumaddhiraṇyavat |
upa | māsva | bṛhatī | revatīriṣo'dhi | stotrasya | pavamāna | no | gahi |
srakve | drapsasya | dhamataḥ | samasvarannṛtasya | yonā | samaranta | nābhayaḥ |
trīntsa | mūrdhno | asuraścakrārabhe | satyasya | nāvaḥ | sukṛtamapīparan |
samyaksamyañco | mahiṣāheṣata | sindhorūrmāvadhi | venāvīvipan |
madhordhārābhirjanayanto | arkamitpriyāmindrasya | tanvamavīvṛdhan |
pavitravantaḥ | pari | vācamāsate | pitaiṣāṁ | pratno | abhi | rakṣati | vratam |
mahaḥ | samudraṁ | varuṇastiro | dadhe | dhīrecchekurdharuṇeṣvārabham |
sahasradhāre'va | te | samasvarandivo | nāke | madhujihvāsaścataḥ |
asya | spaśo | na | ni | miṣanti | bhūrṇayaḥ | padepade | pāśinaḥ | santi | setavaḥ |
piturmāturadhyā | ye | samasvarannṛcā | śocantaḥ | saṁdahanto | avratān |
indradviṣṭāmapa | dhamanti | māyayā | tvacamasiknīṁ | bhūmano | divaspari |
pratnānmānādadhyā | ye | samasvarañchlokayantrāso | rabhasasya | mantavaḥ |
apānakṣāso | badhirāhāsata | ṛtasya | panthāṁ | na | taranti | duṣkṛtaḥ |
sahasradhāre | vitate | pavitrā | vācaṁ | punanti | kavayo | manīṣiṇaḥ |
rudrāsaiṣāmiṣirāso | adruhaḥ | spaśaḥ | svañcaḥ | sudṛśo | nṛcakṣasaḥ |
ṛtasya | gopā | na | dabhāya | sukratustrī | ṣa | pavitrā | hṛdyantarā | dadhe |
vidvāntsa | viśvā | bhuvanābhi | paśyatyavājuṣṭānvidhyati | karte | avratān |
ṛtasya | tanturvitataḥ | pavitrā | jihvāyāgre | varuṇasya | māyayā |
dhīrāścittatsaminakṣantāśatātrā | kartamava | padātyaprabhuḥ |
śiśurna | jāto'va | cakradadvane | svaryadvājyaruṣaḥ | siṣāsati |
divo | retasā | sacate | payovṛdhā | tamīmahe | sumatī | śarma | saprathaḥ |
divo | yaḥ | skambho | dharuṇaḥ | svātatāpūrṇo | aṁśuḥ | paryeti | viśvataḥ |
seme | mahī | rodasī | yakṣadāvṛtā | samīcīne | dādhāra | samiṣaḥ | kaviḥ |
mahi | psaraḥ | sukṛtaṁ | somyaṁ | madhūrvī | gavyūtiraditerṛtaṁ | yate |
īśe | yo | vṛṣṭeritosriyo | vṛṣāpāṁ | netā | yetaūtirṛgmiyaḥ |
ātmanvannabho | duhyate | ghṛtaṁ | paya | ṛtasya | nābhiramṛtaṁ | vi | jāyate |
samīcīnāḥ | sudānavaḥ | prīṇanti | taṁ | naro | hitamava | mehanti | peravaḥ |
arāvīdaṁśuḥ | sacamānormiṇā | devāvyaṁ | manuṣe | pinvati | tvacam |
dadhāti | garbhamaditerupasthā | yena | tokaṁ | ca | tanayaṁ | ca | dhāmahe |
sahasradhāre'va | tāsaścatastṛtīye | santu | rajasi | prajāvatīḥ |
catasro | nābho | nihitāvo | divo | havirbharantyamṛtaṁ | ghṛtaścutaḥ |
śvetaṁ | rūpaṁ | kṛṇute | yatsiṣāsati | somo | mīḍhvām̐ | asuro | veda | bhūmanaḥ |
dhiyā | śamī | sacate | semabhi | pravaddivaskavandhamava | darṣadudriṇam |
adha | śvetaṁ | kalaśaṁ | gobhiraktaṁ | kārṣmannā | vājyakramītsasavān |
ā | hinvire | manasā | devayantaḥ | kakṣīvate | śatahimāya | gonām |
adbhiḥ | soma | papṛcānasya | te | raso'vyo | vāraṁ | vi | pavamāna | dhāvati |
sa | mṛjyamānaḥ | kavibhirmadintama | svadasvendrāya | pavamāna | pītaye |
abhi | priyāṇi | pavate | canohito | nāmāni | yahvo | adhi | yeṣu | vardhate |
ā | sūryasya | bṛhato | bṛhannadhi | rathaṁ | viṣvañcamaruhadvicakṣaṇaḥ |
ṛtasya | jihvā | pavate | madhu | priyaṁ | vaktā | patirdhiyo | asyādābhyaḥ |
dadhāti | putraḥ | pitrorapīcyaṁ | nāma | tṛtīyamadhi | rocane | divaḥ |
ava | dyutānaḥ | kalaśām̐ | acikradannṛbhiryemānaḥ | kośā | hiraṇyaye |
abhīmṛtasya | dohanānūṣatādhi | tripṛṣṭhoṣaso | vi | rājati |
adribhiḥ | suto | matibhiścanohitaḥ | prarocayanrodasī | mātarā | śuciḥ |
romāṇyavyā | samayā | vi | dhāvati | madhordhārā | pinvamānā | divedive |
pari | soma | pra | dhanvā | svastaye | nṛbhiḥ | punāno | abhi | vāsayāśiram |
ye | te | madāhanaso | vihāyasastebhirindraṁ | codaya | dātave | magham |
dhartā | divaḥ | pavate | kṛtvyo | raso | dakṣo | devānāmanumādyo | nṛbhiḥ |
hariḥ | sṛjāno | atyo | na | satvabhirvṛthā | pājāṁsi | kṛṇute | nadīṣvā |
śūro | na | dhattāyudhā | gabhastyoḥ | svaḥ | siṣāsanrathiro | gaviṣṭiṣu |
indrasya | śuṣmamīrayannapasyubhirindurhinvāno | ajyate | manīṣibhiḥ |
indrasya | soma | pavamānormiṇā | taviṣyamāṇo | jaṭhareṣvā | viśa |
pra | ṇaḥ | pinva | vidyudabhreva | rodasī | dhiyā | na | vājām̐ | upa | māsi | śaśvataḥ |
viśvasya | rājā | pavate | svardṛśa | ṛtasya | dhītimṛṣiṣāḻavīvaśat |
yaḥ | sūryasyāsireṇa | mṛjyate | pitā | matīnāmasamaṣṭakāvyaḥ |
vṛṣeva | yūthā | pari | kośamarṣasyapāmupasthe | vṛṣabhaḥ | kanikradat |
sendrāya | pavase | matsarintamo | yathā | jeṣāma | samithe | tvotayaḥ |
eṣa | pra | kośe | madhumām̐ | acikradadindrasya | vajro | vapuṣo | vapuṣṭaraḥ |
abhīmṛtasya | sudughā | ghṛtaścuto | vāśrārṣanti | payaseva | dhenavaḥ |
sa | pūrvyaḥ | pavate | yaṁ | divaspari | śyeno | mathāyadiṣitastiro | rajaḥ |
sa | madhvā | yuvate | vevijānetkṛśānorasturmanasāha | bibhyuṣā |
te | naḥ | pūrvāsoparāsa | indavo | mahe | vājāya | dhanvantu | gomate |
īkṣeṇyāso | ahyo | na | cāravo | brahmabrahma | ye | jujuṣurhavirhaviḥ |
ayaṁ | no | vidvānvanavadvanuṣyatenduḥ | satrācā | manasā | puruṣṭutaḥ |
inasya | yaḥ | sadane | garbhamādadhe | gavāmurubjamabhyarṣati | vrajam |
cakrirdivaḥ | pavate | kṛtvyo | raso | mahām̐ | adabdho | varuṇo | hurugyate |
asāvi | mitro | vṛjaneṣu | yajñiyo'tyo | na | yūthe | vṛṣayuḥ | kanikradat |
pra | rājā | vācaṁ | janayannasiṣyadadapo | vasāno | abhi | geyakṣati |
gṛbhṇāti | ripramavirasya | tānvā | śuddho | devānāmupa | yāti | niṣkṛtam |
indrāya | soma | pari | ṣicyase | nṛbhirnṛcakṣormiḥ | kavirajyase | vane |
pūrvīrhi | te | srutayaḥ | santi | yātave | sahasramaśvā | harayaścamūṣadaḥ |
samudriyāpsaraso | manīṣiṇamāsīnāntarabhi | somamakṣaran |
teṁ | hinvanti | harmyasya | sakṣaṇiṁ | yācante | sumnaṁ | pavamānamakṣitam |
gojinnaḥ | somo | rathajiddhiraṇyajitsvarjidabjitpavate | sahasrajit |
yaṁ | devāsaścakrire | pītaye | madaṁ | svādiṣṭhaṁ | drapsamaruṇaṁ | mayobhuvam |
etāni | soma | pavamāno | asmayuḥ | satyāni | kṛṇvandraviṇānyarṣasi |
jahi | śatrumantike | dūrake | ca | yorvīṁ | gavyūtimabhayaṁ | ca | naskṛdhi |
acodaso | no | dhanvantvindavaḥ | pra | suvānāso | bṛhaddiveṣu | harayaḥ |
vi | ca | naśanneṣo | arātayo'ryo | naśanta | saniṣanta | no | dhiyaḥ |
pra | ṇo | dhanvantvindavo | madacyuto | dhanā | vā | yebhirarvato | junīmasi |
tiro | martasya | kasya | citparihvṛtiṁ | vayaṁ | dhanāni | viśvadhā | bharemahi |
uta | svasyārātyā | arirhi | ṣotānyasyā | arātyā | vṛko | hi | ṣaḥ |
dhanvanna | tṛṣṇā | samarīta | tām̐ | abhi | soma | jahi | pavamāna | durādhyaḥ |
divi | te | nābhā | paramo | yādade | pṛthivyāste | ruruhuḥ | sānavi | kṣipaḥ |
adrayastvā | bapsati | goradhi | tvacyapsu | tvā | hastairduduhurmanīṣiṇaḥ |
evā | tendo | subhvaṁ | supeśasaṁ | rasaṁ | tuñjanti | prathamābhiśriyaḥ |
nidaṁnidaṁ | pavamāna | ni | tāriṣāviste | śuṣmo | bhavatu | priyo | madaḥ |
somasya | dhārā | pavate | nṛcakṣasa | ṛtena | devānhavate | divaspari |
bṛhaspate | ravathenā | vi | didyute | samudrāso | na | savanāni | vivyacuḥ |
yaṁ | tvā | vājinnaghnyābhyanūṣatāyohataṁ | yonimā | rohasi | dyumān |
maghonāmāyuḥ | pratiranmahi | śravendrāya | soma | pavase | vṛṣā | madaḥ |
endrasya | kukṣā | pavate | madintamorjaṁ | vasānaḥ | śravase | sumaṅgalaḥ |
pratyaṅsa | viśvā | bhuvanābhi | paprathe | krīḻanhariratyaḥ | syandate | vṛṣā |
taṁ | tvā | devebhyo | madhumattamaṁ | naraḥ | sahasradhāraṁ | duhate | daśa | kṣipaḥ |
nṛbhiḥ | soma | pracyuto | grāvabhiḥ | suto | viśvāndevām̐ | ā | pavasvā | sahasrajit |
taṁ | tvā | hastino | madhumantamadribhirduhantyapsu | vṛṣabhaṁ | daśa | kṣipaḥ |
indraṁ | soma | mādayandaivyaṁ | janaṁ | sindhorivormiḥ | pavamāno | arṣasi |
pra | somasya | pavamānasyormayendrasya | yanti | jaṭharaṁ | supeśasaḥ |
dadhnā | yadīmunnītā | yaśasā | gavāṁ | dānāya | śūramudamandiṣuḥ | sutāḥ |
acchā | hi | somaḥ | kalaśām̐ | asiṣyadadatyo | na | voḻhā | raghuvartanirvṛṣā |
athā | devānāmubhayasya | janmano | vidvām̐ | aśnotyamutetaśca | yat |
ā | naḥ | soma | pavamānaḥ | kirā | vasvindo | bhava | maghavā | rādhaso | mahaḥ |
śikṣā | vayodho | vasave | su | cetunā | mā | no | gayamāre | asmatparā | sicaḥ |
ā | naḥ | pūṣā | pavamānaḥ | surātayo | mitro | gacchantu | varuṇaḥ | sajoṣasaḥ |
bṛhaspatirmaruto | vāyuraśvinā | tvaṣṭā | savitā | suyamā | sarasvatī |
ubhe | dyāvāpṛthivī | viśvaminve | aryamā | devo | aditirvidhātā |
bhago | nṛśaṁsorvantarikṣaṁ | viśve | devāḥ | pavamānaṁ | juṣanta |
asāvi | somo | aruṣo | vṛṣā | harī | rājeva | dasmo | abhi | gācikradat |
punāno | vāraṁ | paryetyavyayaṁ | śyeno | na | yoniṁ | ghṛtavantamāsadam |
kavirvedhasyā | paryeṣi | māhinamatyo | na | mṛṣṭo | abhi | vājamarṣasi |
apasedhanduritā | soma | mṛḻaya | ghṛtaṁ | vasānaḥ | pari | yāsi | nirṇijam |
parjanyaḥ | pitā | mahiṣasya | parṇino | nābhā | pṛthivyā | giriṣu | kṣayaṁ | dadhe |
svasārāpo | abhi | gotāsarantsaṁ | grāvabhirnasate | vīte | adhvare |
jāyeva | patyāvadhi | śeva | maṁhase | pajrāyā | garbha | śṛṇuhi | bravīmi | te |
antarvāṇīṣu | pra | carā | su | jīvase'nindyo | vṛjane | soma | jāgṛhi |
yathā | pūrvebhyaḥ | śatasāmṛdhraḥ | sahasrasāḥ | paryayā | vājamindo |
evā | pavasva | suvitāya | navyase | tava | vratamanvāpaḥ | sacante |
pavitraṁ | te | vitataṁ | brahmaṇaspate | prabhurgātrāṇi | paryeṣi | viśvataḥ |
ataptatanūrna | tadāmo | aśnute | śṛtāsedvahantastatsamāśata |
tapoṣpavitraṁ | vitataṁ | divaspade | śocanto | asya | tantavo | vyasthiran |
avantyasya | pavītāramāśavo | divaspṛṣṭhamadhi | tiṣṭhanti | cetasā |
arūrucaduṣasaḥ | pṛśniragriyokṣā | bibharti | bhuvanāni | vājayuḥ |
māyāvino | mamire | asya | māyayā | nṛcakṣasaḥ | pitaro | garbhamā | dadhuḥ |
gandharvetthā | padamasya | rakṣati | pāti | devānāṁ | janimānyadbhutaḥ |
gṛbhṇāti | ripuṁ | nidhayā | nidhāpatiḥ | sukṛttamā | madhuno | bhakṣamāśata |
havirhaviṣmo | mahi | sadma | daivyaṁ | nabho | vasānaḥ | pari | yāsyadhvaram |
rājā | pavitraratho | vājamāruhaḥ | sahasrabhṛṣṭirjayasi | śravo | bṛhat |
pavasva | devamādano | vicarṣaṇirapsendrāya | varuṇāya | vāyave |
kṛdhī | no | adya | varivaḥ | svastimadurukṣitau | gṛṇīhi | daivyaṁ | janam |
ā | yastasthau | bhuvanānyamartyo | viśvāni | somaḥ | pari | tānyarṣati |
kṛṇvantsaṁcṛtaṁ | vicṛtamabhiṣṭayenduḥ | siṣaktyuṣasaṁ | na | sūryaḥ |
ā | yo | gobhiḥ | sṛjyatauṣadhīṣvā | devānāṁ | sumneṣayannupāvasuḥ |
ā | vidyutā | pavate | dhārayā | sutendraṁ | somo | mādayandaivyaṁ | janam |
eṣa | sya | somaḥ | pavate | sahasrajiddhinvāno | vācamiṣirāmuṣarbudham |
induḥ | samudramudiyarti | vāyubhirendrasya | hārdi | kalaśeṣu | sīdati |
abhi | tyaṁ | gāvaḥ | payasā | payovṛdhaṁ | somaṁ | śrīṇanti | matibhiḥ | svarvidam |
dhanaṁjayaḥ | pavate | kṛtvyo | raso | vipraḥ | kaviḥ | kāvyenā | svarcanāḥ |
indrāya | soma | suṣutaḥ | pari | sravāpāmīvā | bhavatu | rakṣasā | saha |
mā | te | rasasya | matsata | dvayāvino | draviṇasvanteha | santvindavaḥ |
asmāntsamarye | pavamāna | codaya | dakṣo | devānāmasi | hi | priyo | madaḥ |
jahi | śatrūm̐rabhyā | bhandanāyataḥ | pibendra | somamava | no | mṛdho | jahi |
adabdhendo | pavase | madintamātmendrasya | bhavasi | dhāsiruttamaḥ |
abhi | svaranti | bahavo | manīṣiṇo | rājānamasya | bhuvanasya | niṁsate |
sahasraṇīthaḥ | śatadhāro | adbhutendrāyenduḥ | pavate | kāmyaṁ | madhu |
jayankṣetramabhyarṣā | jayannaporuṁ | no | gātuṁ | kṛṇu | soma | mīḍhvaḥ |
kanikradatkalaśe | gobhirajyase | vyavyayaṁ | samayā | vāramarṣasi |
marmṛjyamāno | atyo | na | sānasirindrasya | soma | jaṭhare | samakṣaraḥ |
svāduḥ | pavasva | divyāya | janmane | svādurindrāya | suhavītunāmne |
svādurmitrāya | varuṇāya | vāyave | bṛhaspataye | madhumām̐ | adābhyaḥ |
atyaṁ | mṛjanti | kalaśe | daśa | kṣipaḥ | pra | viprāṇāṁ | matayo | vācerate |
pavamānābhyarṣanti | suṣṭutimendraṁ | viśanti | madirāsendavaḥ |
pavamāno | abhyarṣā | suvīryamurvīṁ | gavyūtiṁ | mahi | śarma | saprathaḥ |
mākirno | asya | pariṣūtirīśatendo | jayema | tvayā | dhanaṁdhanam |
adhi | dyāmasthādvṛṣabho | vicakṣaṇo'rūrucadvi | divo | rocanā | kaviḥ |
rājā | pavitramatyeti | roruvaddivaḥ | pīyūṣaṁ | duhate | nṛcakṣasaḥ |
divo | nāke | madhujihvāsaścato | venā | duhantyukṣaṇaṁ | giriṣṭhām |
apsu | drapsaṁ | vāvṛdhānaṁ | samudrā | sindhorūrmā | madhumantaṁ | pavitrā |
nāke | suparṇamupapaptivāṁsaṁ | giro | venānāmakṛpanta | pūrvīḥ |
śiśuṁ | rihanti | matayaḥ | panipnataṁ | hiraṇyayaṁ | śakunaṁ | kṣāmaṇi | sthām |
ūrdhvo | gandharvo | adhi | nāke | asthādviśvā | rūpā | praticakṣāṇo | asya |
bhānuḥ | śukreṇa | śociṣā | vyadyautprārūrucadrodasī | mātarā | śuciḥ |
pra | tāśavaḥ | pavamāna | dhījavo | madārṣanti | raghujeva | tmanā |
divyāḥ | suparṇā | madhumantendavo | madintamāsaḥ | pari | kośamāsate |
pra | te | madāso | madirāsāśavo'sṛkṣata | rathyāso | yathā | pṛthak |
dhenurna | vatsaṁ | payasābhi | vajriṇamindramindavo | madhumantormayaḥ |
atyo | na | hiyāno | abhi | vājamarṣa | svarvitkośaṁ | divo | adrimātaram |
vṛṣā | pavitre | adhi | sāno | avyaye | somaḥ | punānendriyāya | dhāyase |
pra | tāśvinīḥ | pavamāna | dhījuvo | divyāsṛgranpayasā | dharīmaṇi |
prāntarṛṣayaḥ | sthāvirīrasṛkṣata | ye | tvā | mṛjantyṛṣiṣāṇa | vedhasaḥ |
viśvā | dhāmāni | viśvacakṣa | ṛbhvasaḥ | prabhoste | sataḥ | pari | yanti | ketavaḥ |
vyānaśiḥ | pavase | soma | dharmabhiḥ | patirviśvasya | bhuvanasya | rājasi |
ubhayataḥ | pavamānasya | raśmayo | dhruvasya | sataḥ | pari | yanti | ketavaḥ |
yadī | pavitre | adhi | mṛjyate | hariḥ | sattā | ni | yonā | kalaśeṣu | sīdati |
yajñasya | ketuḥ | pavate | svadhvaraḥ | somo | devānāmupa | yāti | niṣkṛtam |
sahasradhāraḥ | pari | kośamarṣati | vṛṣā | pavitramatyeti | roruvat |
rājā | samudraṁ | nadyo | vi | gāhate'pāmūrmiṁ | sacate | sindhuṣu | śritaḥ |
adhyasthātsānu | pavamāno | avyayaṁ | nābhā | pṛthivyā | dharuṇo | maho | divaḥ |
divo | na | sānu | stanayannacikradaddyauśca | yasya | pṛthivī | ca | dharmabhiḥ |
indrasya | sakhyaṁ | pavate | vivevidatsomaḥ | punānaḥ | kalaśeṣu | sīdati |
jyotiryajñasya | pavate | madhu | priyaṁ | pitā | devānāṁ | janitā | vibhūvasuḥ |
dadhāti | ratnaṁ | svadhayorapīcyaṁ | madintamo | matsarendriyo | rasaḥ |
abhikrandankalaśaṁ | vājyarṣati | patirdivaḥ | śatadhāro | vicakṣaṇaḥ |
harirmitrasya | sadaneṣu | sīdati | marmṛjāno'vibhiḥ | sindhubhirvṛṣā |
agre | sindhūnāṁ | pavamāno | arṣatyagre | vāco | agriyo | goṣu | gacchati |
agre | vājasya | bhajate | mahādhanaṁ | svāyudhaḥ | sotṛbhiḥ | pūyate | vṛṣā |
ayaṁ | matavāñchakuno | yathā | hito'vye | sasāra | pavamānormiṇā |
tava | kratvā | rodasī | antarā | kave | śucirdhiyā | pavate | somendra | te |
drāpiṁ | vasāno | yajato | divispṛśamantarikṣaprā | bhuvaneṣvarpitaḥ |
svarjajñāno | nabhasābhyakramītpratnamasya | pitaramā | vivāsati |
so | asya | viśe | mahi | śarma | yacchati | yo | asya | dhāma | prathamaṁ | vyānaśe |
padaṁ | yadasya | parame | vyomanyato | viśvābhi | saṁ | yāti | saṁyataḥ |
pro | ayāsīdindurindrasya | niṣkṛtaṁ | sakhā | sakhyurna | pra | mināti | saṁgiram |
maryeva | yuvatibhiḥ | samarṣati | somaḥ | kalaśe | śatayāmnā | pathā |
pra | vo | dhiyo | mandrayuvo | vipanyuvaḥ | panasyuvaḥ | saṁvasaneṣvakramuḥ |
somaṁ | manīṣābhyanūṣata | stubho'bhi | dhenavaḥ | payasemaśiśrayuḥ |
ā | naḥ | soma | saṁyataṁ | pipyuṣīmiṣamindo | pavasva | pavamāno | asridham |
yā | no | dohate | trirahannasaścuṣī | kṣumadvājavanmadhumatsuvīryam |
vṛṣā | matīnāṁ | pavate | vicakṣaṇaḥ | somo | ahnaḥ | pratarītoṣaso | divaḥ |
krāṇā | sindhūnāṁ | kalaśām̐ | avīvaśadindrasya | hārdyāviśanmanīṣibhiḥ |
manīṣibhiḥ | pavate | pūrvyaḥ | kavirnṛbhiryataḥ | pari | kośām̐ | acikradat |
tritasya | nāma | janayanmadhu | kṣaradindrasya | vāyoḥ | sakhyāya | kartave |
ayaṁ | punānoṣaso | vi | rocayadayaṁ | sindhubhyo | abhavadu | lokakṛt |
ayaṁ | triḥ | sapta | duduhānāśiraṁ | somo | hṛde | pavate | cāru | matsaraḥ |
pavasva | soma | divyeṣu | dhāmasu | sṛjānendo | kalaśe | pavitrā |
sīdannindrasya | jaṭhare | kanikradannṛbhiryataḥ | sūryamārohayo | divi |
adribhiḥ | sutaḥ | pavase | pavitrām̐ | indavindrasya | jaṭhareṣvāviśan |
tvaṁ | nṛcakṣābhavo | vicakṣaṇa | soma | gotramaṅgirobhyo'vṛṇorapa |
tvāṁ | soma | pavamānaṁ | svādhyo'nu | viprāso | amadannavasyavaḥ |
tvāṁ | suparṇābharaddivasparīndo | viśvābhirmatibhiḥ | pariṣkṛtam |
avye | punānaṁ | pari | vārormiṇā | hariṁ | navante | abhi | sapta | dhenavaḥ |
apāmupasthe | adhyāyavaḥ | kavimṛtasya | yonā | mahiṣāheṣata |
induḥ | punāno | ati | gāhate | mṛdho | viśvāni | kṛṇvantsupathāni | yajyave |
gāḥ | kṛṇvāno | nirṇijaṁ | haryataḥ | kaviratyo | na | krīḻanpari | vāramarṣati |
asaścataḥ | śatadhārābhiśriyo | hariṁ | navante'va | todanyuvaḥ |
kṣipo | mṛjanti | pari | gobhirāvṛtaṁ | tṛtīye | pṛṣṭhe | adhi | rocane | divaḥ |
tavemāḥ | prajā | divyasya | retasastvaṁ | viśvasya | bhuvanasya | rājasi |
athedaṁ | viśvaṁ | pavamāna | te | vaśe | tvamindo | prathamo | dhāmadhāsi |
tvaṁ | samudro | asi | viśvavitkave | tavemāḥ | pañca | pradiśo | vidharmaṇi |
tvaṁ | dyāṁ | ca | pṛthivīṁ | cāti | jabhriṣe | tava | jyotīṁṣi | pavamāna | sūryaḥ |
tvaṁ | pavitre | rajaso | vidharmaṇi | devebhyaḥ | soma | pavamāna | pūyase |
tvāmuśijaḥ | prathamāgṛbhṇata | tubhyemā | viśvā | bhuvanāni | yemire |
pra | rebhaityati | vāramavyayaṁ | vṛṣā | vaneṣvava | cakradaddhariḥ |
saṁ | dhītayo | vāvaśānānūṣata | śiśuṁ | rihanti | matayaḥ | panipnatam |
sa | sūryasya | raśmibhiḥ | pari | vyata | tantuṁ | tanvānastrivṛtaṁ | yathā | vide |
nayannṛtasya | praśiṣo | navīyasīḥ | patirjanīnāmupa | yāti | niṣkṛtam |
rājā | sindhūnāṁ | pavate | patirdiva | ṛtasya | yāti | pathibhiḥ | kanikradat |
sahasradhāraḥ | pari | ṣicyate | hariḥ | punāno | vācaṁ | janayannupāvasuḥ |
pavamāna | mahyarṇo | vi | dhāvasi | sūro | na | citro | avyayāni | pavyayā |
gabhastipūto | nṛbhiradribhiḥ | suto | mahe | vājāya | dhanyāya | dhanvasi |
iṣamūrjaṁ | pavamānābhyarṣasi | śyeno | na | vaṁsu | kalaśeṣu | sīdasi |
indrāya | madvā | madyo | madaḥ | suto | divo | viṣṭambhopamo | vicakṣaṇaḥ |
sapta | svasāro | abhi | mātaraḥ | śiśuṁ | navaṁ | jajñānaṁ | jenyaṁ | vipaścitam |
apāṁ | gandharvaṁ | divyaṁ | nṛcakṣasaṁ | somaṁ | viśvasya | bhuvanasya | rājase |
īśānemā | bhuvanāni | vīyase | yujānendo | haritaḥ | suparṇyaḥ |
tāste | kṣarantu | madhumadghṛtaṁ | payastava | vrate | soma | tiṣṭhantu | kṛṣṭayaḥ |
tvaṁ | nṛcakṣāsi | soma | viśvataḥ | pavamāna | vṛṣabha | tā | vi | dhāvasi |
sa | naḥ | pavasva | vasumaddhiraṇyavadvayaṁ | syāma | bhuvaneṣu | jīvase |
govitpavasva | vasuviddhiraṇyavidretodhendo | bhuvaneṣvarpitaḥ |
tvaṁ | suvīro | asi | soma | viśvavittaṁ | tvā | vipropa | giremāsate |
unmadhvormirvananā | atiṣṭhipadapo | vasāno | mahiṣo | vi | gāhate |
rājā | pavitraratho | vājamāruhatsahasrabhṛṣṭirjayati | śravo | bṛhat |
sa | bhandanodiyarti | prajāvatīrviśvāyurviśvāḥ | subharāhardivi |
brahma | prajāvadrayimaśvapastyaṁ | pītendavindramasmabhyaṁ | yācatāt |
so | agre | ahnāṁ | harirharyato | madaḥ | pra | cetasā | cetayate | anu | dyubhiḥ |
dvā | janā | yātayannantarīyate | narā | ca | śaṁsaṁ | daivyaṁ | ca | dhartari |
añjate | vyañjate | samañjate | kratuṁ | rihanti | madhunābhyañjate |
sindhorucchvāse | patayantamukṣaṇaṁ | hiraṇyapāvāḥ | paśumāsu | gṛbhṇate |
vipaścite | pavamānāya | gāyata | mahī | na | dhārātyandho | arṣati |
ahirna | jūrṇāmati | sarpati | tvacamatyo | na | krīḻannasaradvṛṣā | hariḥ |
agrego | rājāpyastaviṣyate | vimāno | ahnāṁ | bhuvaneṣvarpitaḥ |
harirghṛtasnuḥ | sudṛśīko | arṇavo | jyotīrathaḥ | pavate | rāyaukyaḥ |
asarji | skambho | divodyato | madaḥ | pari | tridhāturbhuvanānyarṣati |
aṁśuṁ | rihanti | matayaḥ | panipnataṁ | girā | yadi | nirṇijamṛgmiṇo | yayuḥ |
pra | te | dhārātyaṇvāni | meṣyaḥ | punānasya | saṁyato | yanti | raṁhayaḥ |
yadgobhirindo | camvoḥ | samajyasā | suvānaḥ | soma | kalaśeṣu | sīdasi |
pavasva | soma | kratuvinnokthyo'vyo | vāre | pari | dhāva | madhu | priyam |
jahi | viśvānrakṣasendo | atriṇo | bṛhadvadema | vidathe | suvīrāḥ |
pra | tu | drava | pari | kośaṁ | ni | ṣīda | nṛbhiḥ | punāno | abhi | vājamarṣa |
aśvaṁ | na | tvā | vājinaṁ | marjayanto'cchā | barhī | raśanābhirnayanti |
svāyudhaḥ | pavate | devenduraśastihā | vṛjanaṁ | rakṣamāṇaḥ |
pitā | devānāṁ | janitā | sudakṣo | viṣṭambho | divo | dharuṇaḥ | pṛthivyāḥ |
ṛṣirvipraḥ | puraetā | janānāmṛbhurdhīrośanā | kāvyena |
sa | cidviveda | nihitaṁ | yadāsāmapīcyaṁ | guhyaṁ | nāma | gonām |
eṣa | sya | te | madhumām̐ | indra | somo | vṛṣā | vṛṣṇe | pari | pavitre | akṣāḥ |
sahasrasāḥ | śatasā | bhūridāvā | śaśvattamaṁ | barhirā | vājyasthāt |
ete | somābhi | gavyā | sahasrā | mahe | vājāyāmṛtāya | śravāṁsi |
pavitrebhiḥ | pavamānāsṛgrañchravasyavo | na | pṛtanājo | atyāḥ |
pari | hi | ṣmā | puruhūto | janānāṁ | viśvāsaradbhojanā | pūyamānaḥ |
athā | bhara | śyenabhṛta | prayāṁsi | rayiṁ | tuñjāno | abhi | vājamarṣa |
eṣa | suvānaḥ | pari | somaḥ | pavitre | sargo | na | sṛṣṭo | adadhāvadarvā |
