tigme | śiśāno | mahiṣo | na | śṛṅge | gā | gavyannabhi | śūro | na | satvā |
eṣā | yayau | paramādantaradreḥ | kūcitsatīrūrve | gā | viveda |
divo | na | vidyutstanayantyabhraiḥ | somasya | te | pavatendra | dhārā |
uta | sma | rāśiṁ | pari | yāsi | gonāmindreṇa | soma | sarathaṁ | punānaḥ |
pūrvīriṣo | bṛhatīrjīradāno | śikṣā | śacīvastava | topaṣṭut |
ayaṁ | somendra | tubhyaṁ | sunve | tubhyaṁ | pavate | tvamasya | pāhi |
tvaṁ | ha | yaṁ | cakṛṣe | tvaṁ | vavṛṣenduṁ | madāya | yujyāya | somam |
seṁ | ratho | na | bhuriṣāḻayoji | mahaḥ | purūṇi | sātaye | vasūni |
ādīṁ | viśvā | nahuṣyāṇi | jātā | svarṣātā | vanordhvā | navanta |
vāyurna | yo | niyutvām̐ | iṣṭayāmā | nāsatyeva | havā | śaṁbhaviṣṭhaḥ |
viśvavāro | draviṇodeva | tmanpūṣeva | dhījavano'si | soma |
indro | na | yo | mahā | karmāṇi | cakrirhantā | vṛtrāṇāmasi | soma | pūrbhit |
paidvo | na | hi | tvamahināmnāṁ | hantā | viśvasyāsi | soma | dasyoḥ |
agnirna | yo | vanā | sṛjyamāno | vṛthā | pājāṁsi | kṛṇute | nadīṣu |
jano | na | yudhvā | mahatopabdiriyarti | somaḥ | pavamānormim |
ete | somāti | vārāṇyavyā | divyā | na | kośāso | abhravarṣāḥ |
vṛthā | samudraṁ | sindhavo | na | nīcīḥ | sutāso | abhi | kalaśām̐ | asṛgran |
śuṣmī | śardho | na | mārutaṁ | pavasvānabhiśastā | divyā | yathā | viṭ |
āpo | na | makṣū | sumatirbhavā | naḥ | sahasrāpsāḥ | pṛtanāṣāṇna | yajñaḥ |
rājño | nu | te | varuṇasya | vratāni | bṛhadgabhīraṁ | tava | soma | dhāma |
śuciṣṭvamasi | priyo | na | mitro | dakṣāyyo | aryamevāsi | soma |
pro | sya | vahniḥ | pathyābhirasyāndivo | na | vṛṣṭiḥ | pavamāno | akṣāḥ |
sahasradhāro | asadannyasme | māturupasthe | vanā | ca | somaḥ |
rājā | sindhūnāmavasiṣṭa | vāsa | ṛtasya | nāvamāruhadrajiṣṭhām |
apsu | drapso | vāvṛdhe | śyenajūto | duheṁ | pitā | duheṁ | piturjām |
siṁhaṁ | nasanta | madhvo | ayāsaṁ | harimaruṣaṁ | divo | asya | patim |
śūro | yutsu | prathamaḥ | pṛcchate | gāsya | cakṣasā | pari | pātyukṣā |
madhupṛṣṭhaṁ | ghoramayāsamaśvaṁ | rathe | yuñjantyurucakra | ṛṣvam |
svasāreṁ | jāmayo | marjayanti | sanābhayo | vājinamūrjayanti |
catasreṁ | ghṛtaduhaḥ | sacante | samāne | antardharuṇe | niṣattāḥ |
temarṣanti | namasā | punānāsteṁ | viśvataḥ | pari | ṣanti | pūrvīḥ |
viṣṭambho | divo | dharuṇaḥ | pṛthivyā | viśvota | kṣitayo | haste | asya |
asattotso | gṛṇate | niyutvānmadhvo | aṁśuḥ | pavatendriyāya |
vanvannavāto | abhi | devavītimindrāya | soma | vṛtrahā | pavasva |
śagdhi | mahaḥ | puruścandrasya | rāyaḥ | suvīryasya | patayaḥ | syāma |
pra | hinvāno | janitā | rodasyo | ratho | na | vājaṁ | saniṣyannayāsīt |
indraṁ | gacchannāyudhā | saṁśiśāno | viśvā | vasu | hastayorādadhānaḥ |
abhi | tripṛṣṭhaṁ | vṛṣaṇaṁ | vayodhāmāṅgūṣāṇāmavāvaśanta | vāṇīḥ |
vanā | vasāno | varuṇo | na | sindhūnvi | ratnadhā | dayate | vāryāṇi |
śūragrāmaḥ | sarvavīraḥ | sahāvāñjetā | pavasva | sanitā | dhanāni |
tigmāyudhaḥ | kṣipradhanvā | samatsvaṣāḻhaḥ | sāhvānpṛtanāsu | śatrūn |
urugavyūtirabhayāni | kṛṇvantsamīcīne | ā | pavasvā | puraṁdhī |
apaḥ | siṣāsannuṣasaḥ | svargāḥ | saṁ | cikrado | maho | asmabhyaṁ | vājān |
matsi | soma | varuṇaṁ | matsi | mitraṁ | matsīndramindo | pavamāna | viṣṇum |
matsi | śardho | mārutaṁ | matsi | devānmatsi | mahāmindramindo | madāya |
evā | rājeva | kratumām̐ | amena | viśvā | ghanighnadduritā | pavasva |
indo | sūktāya | vacase | vayo | dhā | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
asarji | vakvā | rathye | yathājau | dhiyā | manotā | prathamo | manīṣī |
daśa | svasāro | adhi | sāno | avye'janti | vahniṁ | sadanānyaccha |
vītī | janasya | divyasya | kavyairadhi | suvāno | nahuṣyebhirinduḥ |
pra | yo | nṛbhiramṛto | martyebhirmarmṛjāno'vibhirgobhiradbhiḥ |
vṛṣā | vṛṣṇe | roruvadaṁśurasmai | pavamāno | ruśadīrte | payo | goḥ |
sahasramṛkvā | pathibhirvacovidadhvasmabhiḥ | sūro | aṇvaṁ | vi | yāti |
rujā | dṛḻhā | cidrakṣasaḥ | sadāṁsi | punānenda | ūrṇuhi | vi | vājān |
vṛścopariṣṭāttujatā | vadhena | ye | anti | dūrādupanāyameṣām |
sa | pratnavannavyase | viśvavāra | sūktāya | pathaḥ | kṛṇuhi | prācaḥ |
ye | duḥṣahāso | vanuṣā | bṛhantastām̐ste | aśyāma | purukṛtpurukṣo |
evā | punāno | apaḥ | svargāsmabhyaṁ | tokā | tanayāni | bhūri |
śaṁ | naḥ | kṣetramuru | jyotīṁṣi | soma | jyoṅnaḥ | sūryaṁ | dṛśaye | rirīhi |
pari | suvāno | hariraṁśuḥ | pavitre | ratho | na | sarji | sanaye | hiyānaḥ |
āpacchlokamindriyaṁ | pūyamānaḥ | prati | devām̐ | ajuṣata | prayobhiḥ |
acchā | nṛcakṣāsaratpavitre | nāma | dadhānaḥ | kavirasya | yonau |
sīdanhoteva | sadane | camūṣūpemagmannṛṣayaḥ | sapta | viprāḥ |
pra | sumedhā | gātuvidviśvadevaḥ | somaḥ | punānaḥ | sadaiti | nityam |
bhuvadviśveṣu | kāvyeṣu | rantānu | janānyatate | pañca | dhīraḥ |
tava | tye | soma | pavamāna | niṇye | viśve | devāstrayaikādaśāsaḥ |
daśa | svadhābhiradhi | sāno | avye | mṛjanti | tvā | nadyaḥ | sapta | yahvīḥ |
tannu | satyaṁ | pavamānasyāstu | yatra | viśve | kāravaḥ | saṁnasanta |
jyotiryadahne | akṛṇodu | lokaṁ | prāvanmanuṁ | dasyave | karabhīkam |
pari | sadmeva | paśumānti | hotā | rājā | na | satyaḥ | samitīriyānaḥ |
somaḥ | punānaḥ | kalaśām̐ | ayāsītsīdanmṛgo | na | mahiṣo | vaneṣu |
sākamukṣo | marjayanta | svasāro | daśa | dhīrasya | dhītayo | dhanutrīḥ |
hariḥ | paryadravajjāḥ | sūryasya | droṇaṁ | nanakṣe | atyo | na | vājī |
saṁ | mātṛbhirna | śiśurvāvaśāno | vṛṣā | dadhanve | puruvāro | adbhiḥ |
maryo | na | yoṣāmabhi | niṣkṛtaṁ | yantsaṁ | gacchate | kalaśosriyābhiḥ |
uta | pra | pipyodharaghnyāyā | indurdhārābhiḥ | sacate | sumedhāḥ |
mūrdhānaṁ | gāvaḥ | payasā | camūṣvabhi | śrīṇanti | vasubhirna | niktaiḥ |
sa | no | devebhiḥ | pavamāna | radendo | rayimaśvinaṁ | vāvaśānaḥ |
rathirāyatāmuśatī | puraṁdhirasmadryagā | dāvane | vasūnām |
nū | no | rayimupa | māsva | nṛvantaṁ | punāno | vātāpyaṁ | viśvaścandram |
pra | vanditurindo | tāryāyuḥ | prātarmakṣū | dhiyāvasurjagamyāt |
adhi | yadasminvājinīva | śubhaḥ | spardhante | dhiyaḥ | sūrye | na | viśaḥ |
apo | vṛṇānaḥ | pavate | kavīyanvrajaṁ | na | paśuvardhanāya | manma |
dvitā | vyūrṇvannamṛtasya | dhāma | svarvide | bhuvanāni | prathanta |
dhiyaḥ | pinvānāḥ | svasare | na | gāva | ṛtāyantīrabhi | vāvaśrendum |
pari | yatkaviḥ | kāvyā | bharate | śūro | na | ratho | bhuvanāni | viśvā |
deveṣu | yaśo | martāya | bhūṣandakṣāya | rāyaḥ | purubhūṣu | navyaḥ |
śriye | jātaḥ | śriyā | niriyāya | śriyaṁ | vayo | jaritṛbhyo | dadhāti |
śriyaṁ | vasānāmṛtatvamāyanbhavanti | satyā | samithā | mitadrau |
iṣamūrjamabhyarṣāśvaṁ | gāmuru | jyotiḥ | kṛṇuhi | matsi | devān |
viśvāni | hi | suṣahā | tāni | tubhyaṁ | pavamāna | bādhase | soma | śatrūn |
kanikranti | harirā | sṛjyamānaḥ | sīdanvanasya | jaṭhare | punānaḥ |
nṛbhiryataḥ | kṛṇute | nirṇijaṁ | gāto | matīrjanayata | svadhābhiḥ |
hariḥ | sṛjānaḥ | pathyāmṛtasyeyarti | vācamariteva | nāvam |
devo | devānāṁ | guhyāni | nāmāviṣkṛṇoti | barhiṣi | pravāce |
apāmivedūrmayastarturāṇāḥ | pra | manīṣerate | somamaccha |
namasyantīrupa | ca | yanti | saṁ | cā | ca | viśantyuśatīruśantam |
taṁ | marmṛjānaṁ | mahiṣaṁ | na | sānāvaṁśuṁ | duhantyukṣaṇaṁ | giriṣṭhām |
taṁ | vāvaśānaṁ | matayaḥ | sacante | trito | bibharti | varuṇaṁ | samudre |
iṣyanvācamupavakteva | hotuḥ | punānendo | vi | ṣyā | manīṣām |
indraśca | yatkṣayathaḥ | saubhagāya | suvīryasya | patayaḥ | syāma |
pra | senānīḥ | śūro | agre | rathānāṁ | gavyanneti | harṣate | asya | senā |
bhadrānkṛṇvannindrahavāntsakhibhyā | somo | vastrā | rabhasāni | datte |
samasya | hariṁ | harayo | mṛjantyaśvahayairaniśitaṁ | namobhiḥ |
ā | tiṣṭhati | rathamindrasya | sakhā | vidvām̐ | enā | sumatiṁ | yātyaccha |
sa | no | deva | devatāte | pavasva | mahe | soma | psarasendrapānaḥ |
kṛṇvannapo | varṣayandyāmutemāmurorā | no | varivasyā | punānaḥ |
ajītaye'hataye | pavasva | svastaye | sarvatātaye | bṛhate |
taduśanti | viśveme | sakhāyastadahaṁ | vaśmi | pavamāna | soma |
somaḥ | pavate | janitā | matīnāṁ | janitā | divo | janitā | pṛthivyāḥ |
janitāgnerjanitā | sūryasya | janitendrasya | janitota | viṣṇoḥ |
brahmā | devānāṁ | padavīḥ | kavīnāmṛṣirviprāṇāṁ | mahiṣo | mṛgāṇām |
śyeno | gṛdhrāṇāṁ | svadhitirvanānāṁ | somaḥ | pavitramatyeti | rebhan |
prāvīvipadvācormiṁ | na | sindhurgiraḥ | somaḥ | pavamāno | manīṣāḥ |
antaḥ | paśyanvṛjanemāvarāṇyā | tiṣṭhati | vṛṣabho | goṣu | jānan |
sa | matsaraḥ | pṛtsu | vanvannavātaḥ | sahasraretābhi | vājamarṣa |
indrāyendo | pavamāno | manīṣyaṁśorūrmimīraya | geṣaṇyan |
pari | priyaḥ | kalaśe | devavātendrāya | somo | raṇyo | madāya |
sahasradhāraḥ | śatavājendurvājī | na | saptiḥ | samanā | jigāti |
sa | pūrvyo | vasuvijjāyamāno | mṛjāno | apsu | duduhāno | adrau |
abhiśastipā | bhuvanasya | rājā | vidadgātuṁ | brahmaṇe | pūyamānaḥ |
tvayā | hi | naḥ | pitaraḥ | soma | pūrve | karmāṇi | cakruḥ | pavamāna | dhīrāḥ |
vanvannavātaḥ | paridhīm̐raporṇu | vīrebhiraśvairmaghavā | bhavā | naḥ |
yathāpavathā | manave | vayodhāmitrahā | varivoviddhaviṣmān |
evā | pavasva | draviṇaṁ | dadhānendre | saṁ | tiṣṭha | janayāyudhāni |
pavasva | soma | madhumām̐ | ṛtāvāpo | vasāno | adhi | sāno | avye |
ava | droṇāni | ghṛtavānti | sīda | madintamo | matsarendrapānaḥ |
vṛṣṭiṁ | divaḥ | śatadhāraḥ | pavasva | sahasrasā | vājayurdevavītau |
saṁ | sindhubhiḥ | kalaśe | vāvaśānaḥ | samusriyābhiḥ | pratirannāyuḥ |
eṣa | sya | somo | matibhiḥ | punāno'tyo | na | vājī | taratīdarātīḥ |
payo | na | dugdhamaditeriṣiramurviva | gātuḥ | suyamo | na | voḻhā |
svāyudhaḥ | sotṛbhiḥ | pūyamāno'bhyarṣa | guhyaṁ | cāru | nāma |
abhi | vājaṁ | saptiriva | śravasyābhi | vāyumabhi | gā | deva | soma |
śiśuṁ | jajñānaṁ | haryataṁ | mṛjanti | śumbhanti | vahniṁ | maruto | gaṇena |
kavirgīrbhiḥ | kāvyenā | kaviḥ | santsomaḥ | pavitramatyeti | rebhan |
ṛṣimanā | ya | ṛṣikṛtsvarṣāḥ | sahasraṇīthaḥ | padavīḥ | kavīnām |
tṛtīyaṁ | dhāma | mahiṣaḥ | siṣāsantsomo | virājamanu | rājati | ṣṭup |
camūṣacchyenaḥ | śakuno | vibhṛtvā | govindurdrapsāyudhāni | bibhrat |
apāmūrmiṁ | sacamānaḥ | samudraṁ | turīyaṁ | dhāma | mahiṣo | vivakti |
maryo | na | śubhrastanvaṁ | mṛjāno'tyo | na | sṛtvā | sanaye | dhanānām |
vṛṣeva | yūthā | pari | kośamarṣankanikradaccamvorā | viveśa |
pavasvendo | pavamāno | mahobhiḥ | kanikradatpari | vārāṇyarṣa |
krīḻañcamvorā | viśa | pūyamānendraṁ | te | raso | madiro | mamattu |
prāsya | dhārā | bṛhatīrasṛgrannakto | gobhiḥ | kalaśām̐ | ā | viveśa |
sāma | kṛṇvantsāmanyo | vipaścitkrandannetyabhi | sakhyurna | jāmim |
apaghnanneṣi | pavamāna | śatrūnpriyāṁ | na | jāro | abhigītenduḥ |
sīdanvaneṣu | śakuno | na | patvā | somaḥ | punānaḥ | kalaśeṣu | sattā |
ā | te | rucaḥ | pavamānasya | soma | yoṣeva | yanti | sudughāḥ | sudhārāḥ |
harirānītaḥ | puruvāro | apsvacikradatkalaśe | devayūnām |
asya | preṣā | hemanā | pūyamāno | devo | devebhiḥ | samapṛkta | rasam |
sutaḥ | pavitraṁ | paryeti | rebhanmiteva | sadma | paśumānti | hotā |
bhadrā | vastrā | samanyā | vasāno | mahānkavirnivacanāni | śaṁsan |
ā | vacyasva | camvoḥ | pūyamāno | vicakṣaṇo | jāgṛvirdevavītau |
samu | priyo | mṛjyate | sāno | avye | yaśastaro | yaśasāṁ | kṣaito | asme |
abhi | svara | dhanvā | pūyamāno | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
pra | gāyatābhyarcāma | devāntsomaṁ | hinota | mahate | dhanāya |
svāduḥ | pavāte | ati | vāramavyamā | sīdāti | kalaśaṁ | devayurnaḥ |
indurdevānāmupa | sakhyamāyantsahasradhāraḥ | pavate | madāya |
nṛbhiḥ | stavāno | anu | dhāma | pūrvamagannindraṁ | mahate | saubhagāya |
stotre | rāye | harirarṣā | punānendraṁ | mado | gacchatu | te | bharāya |
devairyāhi | sarathaṁ | rādho | acchā | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |
pra | kāvyamuśaneva | bruvāṇo | devo | devānāṁ | janimā | vivakti |
mahivrataḥ | śucibandhuḥ | pāvakaḥ | padā | varāho | abhyeti | rebhan |
pra | haṁsāsastṛpalaṁ | manyumacchāmādastaṁ | vṛṣagaṇāyāsuḥ |
āṅgūṣyaṁ | pavamānaṁ | sakhāyo | durmarṣaṁ | sākaṁ | pra | vadanti | vāṇam |
sa | raṁhatorugāyasya | jūtiṁ | vṛthā | krīḻantaṁ | mimate | na | gāvaḥ |
parīṇasaṁ | kṛṇute | tigmaśṛṅgo | divā | harirdadṛśe | naktamṛjraḥ |
indurvājī | pavate | gonyoghendre | somaḥ | sahenvanmadāya |
hanti | rakṣo | bādhate | paryarātīrvarivaḥ | kṛṇvanvṛjanasya | rājā |
adha | dhārayā | madhvā | pṛcānastiro | roma | pavate | adridugdhaḥ |
indurindrasya | sakhyaṁ | juṣāṇo | devo | devasya | matsaro | madāya |
abhi | priyāṇi | pavate | punāno | devo | devāntsvena | rasena | pṛñcan |
indurdharmāṇyṛtuthā | vasāno | daśa | kṣipo | avyata | sāno | avye |
vṛṣā | śoṇo | abhikanikradadgā | nadayanneti | pṛthivīmuta | dyām |
indrasyeva | vagnurā | śṛṇvājau | pracetayannarṣati | vācamemām |
rasāyyaḥ | payasā | pinvamānerayanneṣi | madhumantamaṁśum |
pavamānaḥ | saṁtanimeṣi | kṛṇvannindrāya | soma | pariṣicyamānaḥ |
evā | pavasva | madiro | madāyodagrābhasya | namayanvadhasnaiḥ |
pari | varṇaṁ | bharamāṇo | ruśantaṁ | gavyurno | arṣa | pari | soma | siktaḥ |
juṣṭvī | nendo | supathā | sugānyurau | pavasva | varivāṁsi | kṛṇvan |
ghaneva | viṣvagduritāni | vighnannadhi | ṣṇunā | dhanva | sāno | avye |
vṛṣṭiṁ | no | arṣa | divyāṁ | jigatnumiḻāvatīṁ | śaṁgayīṁ | jīradānum |
stukeva | vītā | dhanvā | vicinvanbandhūm̐rimām̐ | avarām̐ | indo | vāyūn |
granthiṁ | na | vi | ṣya | grathitaṁ | punāna | ṛjuṁ | ca | gātuṁ | vṛjinaṁ | ca | soma |
atyo | na | krado | harirā | sṛjāno | maryo | deva | dhanva | pastyāvān |
juṣṭo | madāya | devatātendo | pari | ṣṇunā | dhanva | sāno | avye |
sahasradhāraḥ | surabhiradabdhaḥ | pari | srava | vājasātau | nṛṣahye |
araśmāno | ye'rathāyuktā | atyāso | na | sasṛjānāsājau |
ete | śukrāso | dhanvanti | somā | devāsastām̐ | upa | yātā | pibadhyai |
evā | nendo | abhi | devavītiṁ | pari | srava | nabho | arṇaścamūṣu |
somo | asmabhyaṁ | kāmyaṁ | bṛhantaṁ | rayiṁ | dadātu | vīravantamugram |
takṣadyadī | manaso | venato | vāgjyeṣṭhasya | vā | dharmaṇi | kṣoranīke |
ādīmāyanvaramā | vāvaśānā | juṣṭaṁ | patiṁ | kalaśe | gāvendum |
pra | dānudo | divyo | dānupinva | ṛtamṛtāya | pavate | sumedhāḥ |
dharmā | bhuvadvṛjanyasya | rājā | pra | raśmibhirdaśabhirbhāri | bhūma |
pavitrebhiḥ | pavamāno | nṛcakṣā | rājā | devānāmuta | martyānām |
dvitā | bhuvadrayipatī | rayīṇāmṛtaṁ | bharatsubhṛtaṁ | cārvinduḥ |
arvām̐ | iva | śravase | sātimacchendrasya | vāyorabhi | vītimarṣa |
sa | naḥ | sahasrā | bṛhatīriṣo | dā | bhavā | soma | draviṇovitpunānaḥ |
devāvyo | naḥ | pariṣicyamānāḥ | kṣayaṁ | suvīraṁ | dhanvantu | somāḥ |
āyajyavaḥ | sumatiṁ | viśvavārā | hotāro | na | diviyajo | mandratamāḥ |
evā | deva | devatāte | pavasva | mahe | soma | psarase | devapānaḥ |
mahaściddhi | ṣmasi | hitāḥ | samarye | kṛdhi | suṣṭhāne | rodasī | punānaḥ |
aśvo | na | krado | vṛṣabhiryujānaḥ | siṁho | na | bhīmo | manaso | javīyān |
arvācīnaiḥ | pathibhirye | rajiṣṭhā | pavasva | saumanasaṁ | nendo |
śataṁ | dhārā | devajātāsṛgrantsahasramenāḥ | kavayo | mṛjanti |
indo | sanitraṁ | divā | pavasva | puraetāsi | mahato | dhanasya |
divo | na | sargāsasṛgramahnāṁ | rājā | na | mitraṁ | pra | mināti | dhīraḥ |
piturna | putraḥ | kratubhiryatānā | pavasva | viśe | asyājītim |
pra | te | dhārā | madhumatīrasṛgranvārānyatpūto | atyeṣyavyān |
pavamāna | pavase | dhāma | gonāṁ | jajñānaḥ | sūryamapinvo | arkaiḥ |
kanikradadanu | panthāmṛtasya | śukro | vi | bhāsyamṛtasya | dhāma |
sendrāya | pavase | matsaravānhinvāno | vācaṁ | matibhiḥ | kavīnām |
divyaḥ | suparṇo'va | cakṣi | soma | pinvandhārāḥ | karmaṇā | devavītau |
endo | viśa | kalaśaṁ | somadhānaṁ | krandannihi | sūryasyopa | raśmim |
tisro | vācerayati | pra | vahnirṛtasya | dhītiṁ | brahmaṇo | manīṣām |
gāvo | yanti | gopatiṁ | pṛcchamānāḥ | somaṁ | yanti | matayo | vāvaśānāḥ |
somaṁ | gāvo | dhenavo | vāvaśānāḥ | somaṁ | viprā | matibhiḥ | pṛcchamānāḥ |
somaḥ | sutaḥ | pūyate | ajyamānaḥ | some | arkāstriṣṭubhaḥ | saṁ | navante |
evā | naḥ | soma | pariṣicyamānā | pavasva | pūyamānaḥ | svasti |
indramā | viśa | bṛhatā | raveṇa | vardhayā | vācaṁ | janayā | puraṁdhim |
ā | jāgṛvirvipra | ṛtā | matīnāṁ | somaḥ | punāno | asadaccamūṣu |
sapanti | yaṁ | mithunāso | nikāmādhvaryavo | rathirāsaḥ | suhastāḥ |
sa | punānopa | sūre | na | dhātobhe | aprā | rodasī | vi | ṣāvaḥ |
priyā | cidyasya | priyasāsotī | sa | tū | dhanaṁ | kāriṇe | na | pra | yaṁsat |
sa | vardhitā | vardhanaḥ | pūyamānaḥ | somo | mīḍhvām̐ | abhi | no | jyotiṣāvīt |
yenā | naḥ | pūrve | pitaraḥ | padajñāḥ | svarvido | abhi | gādrimuṣṇan |
akrāntsamudraḥ | prathame | vidharmañjanayanprajā | bhuvanasya | rājā |
vṛṣā | pavitre | adhi | sāno | avye | bṛhatsomo | vāvṛdhe | suvānenduḥ |
mahattatsomo | mahiṣaścakārāpāṁ | yadgarbho'vṛṇīta | devān |
adadhādindre | pavamānaujo'janayatsūrye | jyotirinduḥ |
matsi | vāyumiṣṭaye | rādhase | ca | matsi | mitrāvaruṇā | pūyamānaḥ |
matsi | śardho | mārutaṁ | matsi | devānmatsi | dyāvāpṛthivī | deva | soma |
ṛjuḥ | pavasva | vṛjinasya | hantāpāmīvāṁ | bādhamāno | mṛdhaśca |
abhiśrīṇanpayaḥ | payasābhi | gonāmindrasya | tvaṁ | tava | vayaṁ | sakhāyaḥ |
madhvaḥ | sūdaṁ | pavasva | vasvotsaṁ | vīraṁ | ca | nā | pavasvā | bhagaṁ | ca |
svadasvendrāya | pavamānendo | rayiṁ | ca | nā | pavasvā | samudrāt |
somaḥ | suto | dhārayātyo | na | hitvā | sindhurna | nimnamabhi | vājyakṣāḥ |
ā | yoniṁ | vanyamasadatpunānaḥ | samindurgobhirasaratsamadbhiḥ |
eṣa | sya | te | pavatendra | somaścamūṣu | dhīrośate | tavasvān |
svarcakṣā | rathiraḥ | satyaśuṣmaḥ | kāmo | na | yo | devayatāmasarji |
eṣa | pratnena | vayasā | punānastiro | varpāṁsi | duhiturdadhānaḥ |
vasānaḥ | śarma | trivarūthamapsu | hoteva | yāti | samaneṣu | rebhan |
nū | nastvaṁ | rathiro | deva | soma | pari | srava | camvoḥ | pūyamānaḥ |
apsu | svādiṣṭho | madhumām̐ | ṛtāvā | devo | na | yaḥ | savitā | satyamanmā |
abhi | vāyuṁ | vītyarṣā | gṛṇāno'bhi | mitrāvaruṇā | pūyamānaḥ |
abhī | naraṁ | dhījavanaṁ | ratheṣṭhāmabhīndraṁ | vṛṣaṇaṁ | vajrabāhum |
abhi | vastrā | suvasanānyarṣābhi | dhenūḥ | sudughāḥ | pūyamānaḥ |
abhi | candrā | bhartave | no | hiraṇyābhyaśvānrathino | deva | soma |
abhī | no | arṣa | divyā | vasūnyabhi | viśvā | pārthivā | pūyamānaḥ |
abhi | yena | draviṇamaśnavāmābhyārṣeyaṁ | jamadagnivannaḥ |
ayā | pavā | pavasvainā | vasūni | mām̐ścatvendo | sarasi | pra | dhanva |
bradhnaścidatra | vāto | na | jūtaḥ | purumedhaścittakave | naraṁ | dāt |
uta | nainā | pavayā | pavasvādhi | śrute | śravāyyasya | tīrthe |
ṣaṣṭiṁ | sahasrā | naiguto | vasūni | vṛkṣaṁ | na | pakvaṁ | dhūnavadraṇāya |
mahīme | asya | vṛṣanāma | śūṣe | mām̐ścatve | vā | pṛśane | vā | vadhatre |
asvāpayannigutaḥ | snehayaccāpāmitrām̐ | apācito | acetaḥ |
saṁ | trī | pavitrā | vitatānyeṣyanvekaṁ | dhāvasi | pūyamānaḥ |
asi | bhago | asi | dātrasya | dātāsi | maghavā | maghavadbhyendo |
eṣa | viśvavitpavate | manīṣī | somo | viśvasya | bhuvanasya | rājā |
drapsām̐ | īrayanvidatheṣvindurvi | vāramavyaṁ | samayāti | yāti |
induṁ | rihanti | mahiṣādabdhāḥ | pade | rebhanti | kavayo | na | gṛdhrāḥ |
hinvanti | dhīrā | daśabhiḥ | kṣipābhiḥ | samañjate | rūpamapāṁ | rasena |
tvayā | vayaṁ | pavamānena | soma | bhare | kṛtaṁ | vi | cinuyāma | śaśvat |
tanno | mitro | varuṇo | māmahantāmaditiḥ | sindhuḥ | pṛthivī | uta | dyauḥ |
abhi | no | vājasātamaṁ | rayimarṣa | puruspṛham |
indo | sahasrabharṇasaṁ | tuvidyumnaṁ | vibhvāsaham |
pari | ṣya | suvāno | avyayaṁ | rathe | na | varmāvyata |
indurabhi | druṇā | hito | hiyāno | dhārābhirakṣāḥ |
pari | ṣya | suvāno | akṣenduravye | madacyutaḥ |
dhārā | yordhvo | adhvare | bhrājā | naiti | gavyayuḥ |
sa | hi | tvaṁ | deva | śaśvate | vasu | martāya | dāśuṣe |
indo | sahasriṇaṁ | rayiṁ | śatātmānaṁ | vivāsasi |
vayaṁ | te | asya | vṛtrahanvaso | vasvaḥ | puruspṛhaḥ |
ni | nediṣṭhatameṣaḥ | syāma | sumnasyādhrigo |
dviryaṁ | pañca | svayaśasaṁ | svasāro | adrisaṁhatam |
priyamindrasya | kāmyaṁ | prasnāpayantyūrmiṇam |
pari | tyaṁ | haryataṁ | hariṁ | babhruṁ | punanti | vāreṇa |
yo | devānviśvām̐ | itpari | madena | saha | gacchati |
asya | vo | hyavasā | pānto | dakṣasādhanam |
yaḥ | sūriṣu | śravo | bṛhaddadhe | svarṇa | haryataḥ |
sa | vāṁ | yajñeṣu | mānavīndurjaniṣṭa | rodasī |
devo | devī | giriṣṭhāsredhantaṁ | tuviṣvaṇi |
indrāya | soma | pātave | vṛtraghne | pari | ṣicyase |
nare | ca | dakṣiṇāvate | devāya | sadanāsade |
te | pratnāso | vyuṣṭiṣu | somāḥ | pavitre | akṣaran |
apaprothantaḥ | sanutarhuraścitaḥ | prātastām̐ | apracetasaḥ |
taṁ | sakhāyaḥ | purorucaṁ | yūyaṁ | vayaṁ | ca | sūrayaḥ |
aśyāma | vājagandhyaṁ | sanema | vājapastyam |
ā | haryatāya | dhṛṣṇave | dhanustanvanti | pauṁsyam |
śukrāṁ | vayantyasurāya | nirṇijaṁ | vipāmagre | mahīyuvaḥ |
adha | kṣapā | pariṣkṛto | vājām̐ | abhi | pra | gāhate |
yadī | vivasvato | dhiyo | hariṁ | hinvanti | yātave |
tamasya | marjayāmasi | mado | yendrapātamaḥ |
yaṁ | gāvāsabhirdadhuḥ | purā | nūnaṁ | ca | sūrayaḥ |
taṁ | gāthayā | purāṇyā | punānamabhyanūṣata |
uto | kṛpanta | dhītayo | devānāṁ | nāma | bibhratīḥ |
tamukṣamāṇamavyaye | vāre | punanti | dharṇasim |
dūtaṁ | na | pūrvacittayā | śāsate | manīṣiṇaḥ |
sa | punāno | madintamaḥ | somaścamūṣu | sīdati |
paśau | na | retādadhatpatirvacasyate | dhiyaḥ |
sa | mṛjyate | sukarmabhirdevo | devebhyaḥ | sutaḥ |
vide | yadāsu | saṁdadirmahīrapo | vi | gāhate |
sutendo | pavitrā | nṛbhiryato | vi | nīyase |
indrāya | matsarintamaścamūṣvā | ni | ṣīdasi |
abhī | navante | adruhaḥ | priyamindrasya | kāmyam |
vatsaṁ | na | pūrvāyuni | jātaṁ | rihanti | mātaraḥ |
punānendavā | bhara | soma | dvibarhasaṁ | rayim |
tvaṁ | vasūni | puṣyasi | viśvāni | dāśuṣo | gṛhe |
tvaṁ | dhiyaṁ | manoyujaṁ | sṛjā | vṛṣṭiṁ | na | tanyatuḥ |
tvaṁ | vasūni | pārthivā | divyā | ca | soma | puṣyasi |
pari | te | jigyuṣo | yathā | dhārā | sutasya | dhāvati |
raṁhamāṇā | vyavyayaṁ | vāraṁ | vājīva | sānasiḥ |
kratve | dakṣāya | naḥ | kave | pavasva | soma | dhārayā |
indrāya | pātave | suto | mitrāya | varuṇāya | ca |
pavasva | vājasātamaḥ | pavitre | dhārayā | sutaḥ |
indrāya | soma | viṣṇave | devebhyo | madhumattamaḥ |
tvāṁ | rihanti | mātaro | hariṁ | pavitre | adruhaḥ |
vatsaṁ | jātaṁ | na | dhenavaḥ | pavamāna | vidharmaṇi |
pavamāna | mahi | śravaścitrebhiryāsi | raśmibhiḥ |
śardhantamāṁsi | jighnase | viśvāni | dāśuṣo | gṛhe |
tvaṁ | dyāṁ | ca | mahivrata | pṛthivīṁ | cāti | jabhriṣe |
prati | drāpimamuñcathāḥ | pavamāna | mahitvanā |
purojitī | vo | andhasaḥ | sutāya | mādayitnave |
apa | śvānaṁ | śnathiṣṭana | sakhāyo | dīrghajihvyam |
yo | dhārayā | pāvakayā | pariprasyandate | sutaḥ |
induraśvo | na | kṛtvyaḥ |
taṁ | duroṣamabhī | naraḥ | somaṁ | viśvācyā | dhiyā |
yajñaṁ | hinvantyadribhiḥ |
sutāso | madhumattamāḥ | somendrāya | mandinaḥ |
pavitravanto | akṣarandevāngacchantu | vo | madāḥ |
indurindrāya | pavateti | devāso | abruvan |
vācaspatirmakhasyate | viśvasyeśānaujasā |
sahasradhāraḥ | pavate | samudro | vācamīṅkhayaḥ |
somaḥ | patī | rayīṇāṁ | sakhendrasya | divedive |
ayaṁ | pūṣā | rayirbhagaḥ | somaḥ | punāno | arṣati |
patirviśvasya | bhūmano | vyakhyadrodasī | ubhe |
samu | priyānūṣata | gāvo | madāya | ghṛṣvayaḥ |
somāsaḥ | kṛṇvate | pathaḥ | pavamānāsendavaḥ |
yaujiṣṭhastamā | bhara | pavamāna | śravāyyam |
yaḥ | pañca | carṣaṇīrabhi | rayiṁ | yena | vanāmahai |
somāḥ | pavantendavo'smabhyaṁ | gātuvittamāḥ |
mitrāḥ | suvānārepasaḥ | svādhyaḥ | svarvidaḥ |
suṣvāṇāso | vyadribhiścitānā | goradhi | tvaci |
iṣamasmabhyamabhitaḥ | samasvaranvasuvidaḥ |
ete | pūtā | vipaścitaḥ | somāso | dadhyāśiraḥ |
sūryāso | na | darśatāso | jigatnavo | dhruvā | ghṛte |
pra | sunvānasyāndhaso | marto | na | vṛta | tadvacaḥ |
apa | śvānamarādhasaṁ | hatā | makhaṁ | na | bhṛgavaḥ |
ā | jāmiratke | avyata | bhuje | na | putrauṇyoḥ |
sarajjāro | na | yoṣaṇāṁ | varo | na | yonimāsadam |
sa | vīro | dakṣasādhano | vi | yastastambha | rodasī |
hariḥ | pavitre | avyata | vedhā | na | yonimāsadam |
avyo | vārebhiḥ | pavate | somo | gavye | adhi | tvaci |
kanikradadvṛṣā | haririndrasyābhyeti | niṣkṛtam |
krāṇā | śiśurmahīnāṁ | hinvannṛtasya | dīdhitim |
viśvā | pari | priyā | bhuvadadha | dvitā |
upa | tritasya | pāṣyorabhakta | yadguhā | padam |
yajñasya | sapta | dhāmabhiradha | priyam |
trīṇi | tritasya | dhārayā | pṛṣṭheṣverayā | rayim |
mimīte | asya | yojanā | vi | sukratuḥ |
jajñānaṁ | sapta | mātaro | vedhāmaśāsata | śriye |
ayaṁ | dhruvo | rayīṇāṁ | ciketa | yat |
asya | vrate | sajoṣaso | viśve | devāso | adruhaḥ |
spārhā | bhavanti | rantayo | juṣanta | yat |
yamī | garbhamṛtāvṛdho | dṛśe | cārumajījanan |
kaviṁ | maṁhiṣṭhamadhvare | puruspṛham |
samīcīne | abhi | tmanā | yahvī | ṛtasya | mātarā |
tanvānā | yajñamānuṣagyadañjate |
kratvā | śukrebhirakṣabhirṛṇorapa | vrajaṁ | divaḥ |
hinvannṛtasya | dīdhitiṁ | prādhvare |
pra | punānāya | vedhase | somāya | vacodyatam |
bhṛtiṁ | na | bharā | matibhirjujoṣate |
pari | vārāṇyavyayā | gobhirañjāno | arṣati |
trī | ṣadhasthā | punānaḥ | kṛṇute | hariḥ |
pari | kośaṁ | madhuścutamavyaye | vāre | arṣati |
abhi | vāṇīrṛṣīṇāṁ | sapta | nūṣata |
pari | ṇetā | matīnāṁ | viśvadevo | adābhyaḥ |
somaḥ | punānaścamvorviśaddhariḥ |
pari | daivīranu | svadhendreṇa | yāhi | saratham |
punāno | vāghadvāghadbhiramartyaḥ |
pari | saptirna | vājayurdevo | devebhyaḥ | sutaḥ |
vyānaśiḥ | pavamāno | vi | dhāvati |
sakhāyā | ni | ṣīdata | punānāya | pra | gāyata |
śiśuṁ | na | yajñaiḥ | pari | bhūṣata | śriye |
samī | vatsaṁ | na | mātṛbhiḥ | sṛjatā | gayasādhanam |
devāvyaṁ | madamabhi | dviśavasam |
punātā | dakṣasādhanaṁ | yathā | śardhāya | vītaye |
yathā | mitrāya | varuṇāya | śaṁtamaḥ |
asmabhyaṁ | tvā | vasuvidamabhi | vāṇīranūṣata |
gobhiṣṭe | varṇamabhi | vāsayāmasi |
sa | no | madānāṁ | patendo | devapsarāsi |
sakheva | sakhye | gātuvittamo | bhava |
sanemi | kṛdhyasmadā | rakṣasaṁ | kaṁ | cidatriṇam |
apādevaṁ | dvayumaṁho | yuyodhi | naḥ |
taṁ | vaḥ | sakhāyo | madāya | punānamabhi | gāyata |
śiśuṁ | na | yajñaiḥ | svadayanta | gūrtibhiḥ |
saṁ | vatseva | mātṛbhirindurhinvāno | ajyate |
devāvīrmado | matibhiḥ | pariṣkṛtaḥ |
ayaṁ | dakṣāya | sādhano'yaṁ | śardhāya | vītaye |
ayaṁ | devebhyo | madhumattamaḥ | sutaḥ |
gomannendo | aśvavatsutaḥ | sudakṣa | dhanva |
śuciṁ | te | varṇamadhi | goṣu | dīdharam |
sa | no | harīṇāṁ | patendo | devapsarastamaḥ |
sakheva | sakhye | naryo | ruce | bhava |
sanemi | tvamasmadām̐ | adevaṁ | kaṁ | cidatriṇam |
sāhvām̐ | indo | pari | bādho | apa | dvayum |
indramaccha | suteme | vṛṣaṇaṁ | yantu | harayaḥ |
śruṣṭī | jātāsendavaḥ | svarvidaḥ |
ayaṁ | bharāya | sānasirindrāya | pavate | sutaḥ |
somo | jaitrasya | cetati | yathā | vide |
asyedindro | madeṣvā | grābhaṁ | gṛbhṇīta | sānasim |
vajraṁ | ca | vṛṣaṇaṁ | bharatsamapsujit |
pra | dhanvā | soma | jāgṛvirindrāyendo | pari | srava |
dyumantaṁ | śuṣmamā | bharā | svarvidam |
indrāya | vṛṣaṇaṁ | madaṁ | pavasva | viśvadarśataḥ |
sahasrayāmā | pathikṛdvicakṣaṇaḥ |
asmabhyaṁ | gātuvittamo | devebhyo | madhumattamaḥ |
sahasraṁ | yāhi | pathibhiḥ | kanikradat |
pavasva | devavītayendo | dhārābhirojasā |
ā | kalaśaṁ | madhumāntsoma | naḥ | sadaḥ |
tava | drapsodapruta | indraṁ | madāya | vāvṛdhuḥ |
tvāṁ | devāso | amṛtāya | kaṁ | papuḥ |
ā | naḥ | sutāsendavaḥ | punānā | dhāvatā | rayim |
vṛṣṭidyāvo | rītyāpaḥ | svarvidaḥ |
somaḥ | punānormiṇāvyo | vāraṁ | vi | dhāvati |
agre | vācaḥ | pavamānaḥ | kanikradat |
dhībhirhinvanti | vājinaṁ | vane | krīḻantamatyavim |
abhi | tripṛṣṭhaṁ | matayaḥ | samasvaran |
asarji | kalaśām̐ | abhi | mīḻhe | saptirna | vājayuḥ |
punāno | vācaṁ | janayannasiṣyadat |
pavate | haryato | harirati | hvarāṁsi | raṁhyā |
abhyarṣantstotṛbhyo | vīravadyaśaḥ |
ayā | pavasva | devayurmadhordhārāsṛkṣata |
rebhanpavitraṁ | paryeṣi | viśvataḥ |
parīto | ṣiñcatā | sutaṁ | somo | yottamaṁ | haviḥ |
dadhanvām̐ | yo | naryo | apsvantarā | suṣāva | somamadribhiḥ |
nūnaṁ | punāno'vibhiḥ | pari | sravādabdhaḥ | surabhiṁtaraḥ |
sute | cittvāpsu | madāmo | andhasā | śrīṇanto | gobhiruttaram |
pari | suvānaścakṣase | devamādanaḥ | kraturindurvicakṣaṇaḥ |
punānaḥ | soma | dhārayāpo | vasāno | arṣasi |
ā | ratnadhā | yonimṛtasya | sīdasyutso | deva | hiraṇyayaḥ |
duhānodhardivyaṁ | madhu | priyaṁ | pratnaṁ | sadhasthamāsadat |
āpṛcchyaṁ | dharuṇaṁ | vājyarṣati | nṛbhirdhūto | vicakṣaṇaḥ |
punānaḥ | soma | jāgṛviravyo | vāre | pari | priyaḥ |
tvaṁ | vipro | abhavo'ṅgirastamo | madhvā | yajñaṁ | mimikṣa | naḥ |
somo | mīḍhvānpavate | gātuvittama | ṛṣirvipro | vicakṣaṇaḥ |
tvaṁ | kavirabhavo | devavītamā | sūryaṁ | rohayo | divi |
somo | ṣuvāṇaḥ | sotṛbhiradhi | ṣṇubhiravīnām |
aśvayeva | haritā | yāti | dhārayā | mandrayā | yāti | dhārayā |
anūpe | gomāngobhirakṣāḥ | somo | dugdhābhirakṣāḥ |
samudraṁ | na | saṁvaraṇānyagmanmandī | madāya | tośate |
ā | soma | suvāno | adribhistiro | vārāṇyavyayā |
jano | na | puri | camvorviśaddhariḥ | sado | vaneṣu | dadhiṣe |
sa | māmṛje | tiro | aṇvāni | meṣyo | mīḻhe | saptirna | vājayuḥ |
anumādyaḥ | pavamāno | manīṣibhiḥ | somo | viprebhirṛkvabhiḥ |
pra | soma | devavītaye | sindhurna | pipye | arṇasā |
aṁśoḥ | payasā | madiro | na | jāgṛviracchā | kośaṁ | madhuścutam |
ā | haryato | arjune | atke | avyata | priyaḥ | sūnurna | marjyaḥ |
tamīṁ | hinvantyapaso | yathā | rathaṁ | nadīṣvā | gabhastyoḥ |
abhi | somāsāyavaḥ | pavante | madyaṁ | madam |
samudrasyādhi | viṣṭapi | manīṣiṇo | matsarāsaḥ | svarvidaḥ |
taratsamudraṁ | pavamānormiṇā | rājā | deva | ṛtaṁ | bṛhat |
arṣanmitrasya | varuṇasya | dharmaṇā | pra | hinvāna | ṛtaṁ | bṛhat |
nṛbhiryemāno | haryato | vicakṣaṇo | rājā | devaḥ | samudriyaḥ |
indrāya | pavate | madaḥ | somo | marutvate | sutaḥ |
sahasradhāro | atyavyamarṣati | tamī | mṛjantyāyavaḥ |
punānaścamū | janayanmatiṁ | kaviḥ | somo | deveṣu | raṇyati |
apo | vasānaḥ | pari | gobhiruttaraḥ | sīdanvaneṣvavyata |
tavāhaṁ | soma | rāraṇa | sakhyendo | divedive |
purūṇi | babhro | ni | caranti | māmava | paridhīm̐rati | tām̐ | ihi |
utāhaṁ | naktamuta | soma | te | divā | sakhyāya | babhrodhani |
ghṛṇā | tapantamati | sūryaṁ | paraḥ | śakuneva | paptima |
mṛjyamānaḥ | suhastya | samudre | vācaminvasi |
rayiṁ | piśaṅgaṁ | bahulaṁ | puruspṛhaṁ | pavamānābhyarṣasi |
mṛjāno | vāre | pavamāno | avyaye | vṛṣāva | cakrado | vane |
devānāṁ | soma | pavamāna | niṣkṛtaṁ | gobhirañjāno | arṣasi |
pavasva | vājasātaye'bhi | viśvāni | kāvyā |
tvaṁ | samudraṁ | prathamo | vi | dhārayo | devebhyaḥ | soma | matsaraḥ |
sa | tū | pavasva | pari | pārthivaṁ | rajo | divyā | ca | soma | dharmabhiḥ |
tvāṁ | viprāso | matibhirvicakṣaṇa | śubhraṁ | hinvanti | dhītibhiḥ |
pavamānāsṛkṣata | pavitramati | dhārayā |
marutvanto | matsarendriyā | hayā | medhāmabhi | prayāṁsi | ca |
apo | vasānaḥ | pari | kośamarṣatīndurhiyānaḥ | sotṛbhiḥ |
janayañjyotirmandanāvīvaśadgāḥ | kṛṇvāno | na | nirṇijam |
pavasva | madhumattamendrāya | soma | kratuvittamo | madaḥ |
mahi | dyukṣatamo | madaḥ |
yasya | te | pītvā | vṛṣabho | vṛṣāyate'sya | pītā | svarvidaḥ |
sa | supraketo | abhyakramīdiṣo'cchā | vājaṁ | naitaśaḥ |
tvaṁ | hyaṅga | daivyā | pavamāna | janimāni | dyumattamaḥ |
amṛtatvāya | ghoṣayaḥ |
yenā | navagvo | dadhyaṅṅaporṇute | yena | viprāsāpire |
devānāṁ | sumne | amṛtasya | cāruṇo | yena | śravāṁsyānaśuḥ |
eṣa | sya | dhārayā | suto'vyo | vārebhiḥ | pavate | madintamaḥ |
krīḻannūrmirapāmiva |
yosriyā | apyāntaraśmano | nirgākṛntadojasā |
abhi | vrajaṁ | tatniṣe | gavyamaśvyaṁ | varmīva | dhṛṣṇavā | ruja |
ā | sotā | pari | ṣiñcatāśvaṁ | na | stomamapturaṁ | rajasturam |
vanakrakṣamudaprutam |
sahasradhāraṁ | vṛṣabhaṁ | payovṛdhaṁ | priyaṁ | devāya | janmane |
ṛtena | ya | ṛtajāto | vivāvṛdhe | rājā | deva | ṛtaṁ | bṛhat |
abhi | dyumnaṁ | bṛhadyaśeṣaspate | didīhi | deva | devayuḥ |
vi | kośaṁ | madhyamaṁ | yuva |
ā | vacyasva | sudakṣa | camvoḥ | suto | viśāṁ | vahnirna | viśpatiḥ |
vṛṣṭiṁ | divaḥ | pavasva | rītimapāṁ | jinvā | gaviṣṭaye | dhiyaḥ |
etamu | tyaṁ | madacyutaṁ | sahasradhāraṁ | vṛṣabhaṁ | divo | duhuḥ |
viśvā | vasūni | bibhratam |
vṛṣā | vi | jajñe | janayannamartyaḥ | pratapañjyotiṣā | tamaḥ |
sa | suṣṭutaḥ | kavibhirnirṇijaṁ | dadhe | tridhātvasya | daṁsasā |
sa | sunve | yo | vasūnāṁ | yo | rāyāmānetā | yeḻānām |
somo | yaḥ | sukṣitīnām |
yasya | nendraḥ | pibādyasya | maruto | yasya | vāryamaṇā | bhagaḥ |
ā | yena | mitrāvaruṇā | karāmahaindramavase | mahe |
indrāya | soma | pātave | nṛbhiryataḥ | svāyudho | madintamaḥ |
pavasva | madhumattamaḥ |
indrasya | hārdi | somadhānamā | viśa | samudramiva | sindhavaḥ |
juṣṭo | mitrāya | varuṇāya | vāyave | divo | viṣṭambhottamaḥ |
pari | pra | dhanvendrāya | soma | svādurmitrāya | pūṣṇe | bhagāya |
indraste | soma | sutasya | peyāḥ | kratve | dakṣāya | viśve | ca | devāḥ |
evāmṛtāya | mahe | kṣayāya | sa | śukro | arṣa | divyaḥ | pīyūṣaḥ |
pavasva | soma | mahāntsamudraḥ | pitā | devānāṁ | viśvābhi | dhāma |
śukraḥ | pavasva | devebhyaḥ | soma | dive | pṛthivyai | śaṁ | ca | prajāyai |
divo | dhartāsi | śukraḥ | pīyūṣaḥ | satye | vidharmanvājī | pavasva |
pavasva | soma | dyumnī | sudhāro | mahāmavīnāmanu | pūrvyaḥ |
nṛbhiryemāno | jajñānaḥ | pūtaḥ | kṣaradviśvāni | mandraḥ | svarvit |
induḥ | punānaḥ | prajāmurāṇaḥ | karadviśvāni | draviṇāni | naḥ |
pavasva | soma | kratve | dakṣāyāśvo | na | nikto | vājī | dhanāya |
taṁ | te | sotāro | rasaṁ | madāya | punanti | somaṁ | mahe | dyumnāya |
śiśuṁ | jajñānaṁ | hariṁ | mṛjanti | pavitre | somaṁ | devebhyendum |
induḥ | paviṣṭa | cārurmadāyāpāmupasthe | kavirbhagāya |
bibharti | cārvindrasya | nāma | yena | viśvāni | vṛtrā | jaghāna |
pibantyasya | viśve | devāso | gobhiḥ | śrītasya | nṛbhiḥ | sutasya |
pra | suvāno | akṣāḥ | sahasradhārastiraḥ | pavitraṁ | vi | vāramavyam |
sa | vājyakṣāḥ | sahasraretādbhirmṛjāno | gobhiḥ | śrīṇānaḥ |
pra | soma | yāhīndrasya | kukṣā | nṛbhiryemāno | adribhiḥ | sutaḥ |
asarji | vājī | tiraḥ | pavitramindrāya | somaḥ | sahasradhāraḥ |
añjantyenaṁ | madhvo | rasenendrāya | vṛṣṇenduṁ | madāya |
devebhyastvā | vṛthā | pājase'po | vasānaṁ | hariṁ | mṛjanti |
indurindrāya | tośate | ni | tośate | śrīṇannugro | riṇannapaḥ |
paryū | ṣu | pra | dhanva | vājasātaye | pari | vṛtrāṇi | sakṣaṇiḥ |
dviṣastaradhyā | ṛṇayā | neyase |
anu | hi | tvā | sutaṁ | soma | madāmasi | mahe | samaryarājye |
vājām̐ | abhi | pavamāna | pra | gāhase |
ajījano | hi | pavamāna | sūryaṁ | vidhāre | śakmanā | payaḥ |
gojīrayā | raṁhamāṇaḥ | puraṁdhyā |
ajījano | amṛta | martyeṣvām̐ | ṛtasya | dharmannamṛtasya | cāruṇaḥ |
sadāsaro | vājamacchā | saniṣyadat |
abhyabhi | hi | śravasā | tatardithotsaṁ | na | kaṁ | cijjanapānamakṣitam |
śaryābhirna | bharamāṇo | gabhastyoḥ |
ādīṁ | ke | citpaśyamānāsāpyaṁ | vasuruco | divyābhyanūṣata |
vāraṁ | na | devaḥ | savitā | vyūrṇute |
tve | soma | prathamā | vṛktabarhiṣo | mahe | vājāya | śravase | dhiyaṁ | dadhuḥ |
sa | tvaṁ | no | vīra | vīryāya | codaya |
divaḥ | pīyūṣaṁ | pūrvyaṁ | yadukthyaṁ | maho | gāhāddivā | niradhukṣata |
indramabhi | jāyamānaṁ | samasvaran |
adha | yadime | pavamāna | rodasīmā | ca | viśvā | bhuvanābhi | majmanā |
yūthe | na | niṣṭhā | vṛṣabho | vi | tiṣṭhase |
somaḥ | punāno | avyaye | vāre | śiśurna | krīḻanpavamāno | akṣāḥ |
sahasradhāraḥ | śatavājenduḥ |
eṣa | punāno | madhumām̐ | ṛtāvendrāyenduḥ | pavate | svādurūrmiḥ |
vājasanirvarivovidvayodhāḥ |
sa | pavasva | sahamānaḥ | pṛtanyūntsedhanrakṣāṁsyapa | durgahāṇi |
svāyudhaḥ | sāsahvāntsoma | śatrūn |
ayā | rucā | hariṇyā | punāno | viśvā | dveṣāṁsi | tarati | svayugvabhiḥ | sūro | na | svayugvabhiḥ |
dhārā | sutasya | rocate | punāno | aruṣo | hariḥ |
viśvā | yadrūpā | pariyātyṛkvabhiḥ | saptāsyebhirṛkvabhiḥ |
tvaṁ | tyatpaṇīnāṁ | vido | vasu | saṁ | mātṛbhirmarjayasi | svā | dama | ṛtasya | dhītibhirdame |
parāvato | na | sāma | tadyatrā | raṇanti | dhītayaḥ |
tridhātubhiraruṣībhirvayo | dadhe | rocamāno | vayo | dadhe |
pūrvāmanu | pradiśaṁ | yāti | cekitatsaṁ | raśmibhiryatate | darśato | ratho | daivyo | darśato | rathaḥ |
agmannukthāni | pauṁsyendraṁ | jaitrāya | harṣayan |
vajraśca | yadbhavatho | anapacyutā | samatsvanapacyutā |
nānānaṁ | vo | no | dhiyo | vi | vratāni | janānām |
takṣā | riṣṭaṁ | rutaṁ | bhiṣagbrahmā | sunvantamicchatīndrāyendo | pari | srava |
jaratībhiroṣadhībhiḥ | parṇebhiḥ | śakunānām |
kārmāro | aśmabhirdyubhirhiraṇyavantamicchatīndrāyendo | pari | srava |
kārurahaṁ | tato | bhiṣagupalaprakṣiṇī | nanā |
nānādhiyo | vasūyavo'nu | geva | tasthimendrāyendo | pari | srava |
aśvo | voḻhā | sukhaṁ | rathaṁ | hasanāmupamantriṇaḥ |
śepo | romaṇvantau | bhedau | vārinmaṇḍūkecchatīndrāyendo | pari | srava |
śaryaṇāvati | somamindraḥ | pibatu | vṛtrahā |
balaṁ | dadhānātmani | kariṣyanvīryaṁ | mahadindrāyendo | pari | srava |
ā | pavasva | diśāṁ | patārjīkātsoma | mīḍhvaḥ |
ṛtavākena | satyena | śraddhayā | tapasā | sutendrāyendo | pari | srava |
parjanyavṛddhaṁ | mahiṣaṁ | taṁ | sūryasya | duhitābharat |
taṁ | gandharvāḥ | pratyagṛbhṇantaṁ | some | rasamādadhurindrāyendo | pari | srava |
ṛtaṁ | vadannṛtadyumna | satyaṁ | vadantsatyakarman |
śraddhāṁ | vadantsoma | rājandhātrā | soma | pariṣkṛtendrāyendo | pari | srava |
satyamugrasya | bṛhataḥ | saṁ | sravanti | saṁsravāḥ |
saṁ | yanti | rasino | rasāḥ | punāno | brahmaṇā | harendrāyendo | pari | srava |
yatra | brahmā | pavamāna | chandasyāṁ | vācaṁ | vadan |
grāvṇā | some | mahīyate | somenānandaṁ | janayannindrāyendo | pari | srava |
yatra | jyotirajasraṁ | yasmim̐lloke | svarhitam |
tasminmāṁ | dhehi | pavamānāmṛte | loke | akṣitendrāyendo | pari | srava |
yatra | rājā | vaivasvato | yatrāvarodhanaṁ | divaḥ |
yatrāmūryahvatīrāpastatra | māmamṛtaṁ | kṛdhīndrāyendo | pari | srava |
yatrānukāmaṁ | caraṇaṁ | trināke | tridive | divaḥ |
lokā | yatra | jyotiṣmantastatra | māmamṛtaṁ | kṛdhīndrāyendo | pari | srava |
yatra | kāmā | nikāmāśca | yatra | bradhnasya | viṣṭapam |
svadhā | ca | yatra | tṛptiśca | tatra | māmamṛtaṁ | kṛdhīndrāyendo | pari | srava |
yatrānandāśca | modāśca | mudaḥ | pramudāsate |
kāmasya | yatrāptāḥ | kāmāstatra | māmamṛtaṁ | kṛdhīndrāyendo | pari | srava |
yendoḥ | pavamānasyānu | dhāmānyakramīt |
tamāhuḥ | suprajeti | yaste | somāvidhanmanendrāyendo | pari | srava |
ṛṣe | mantrakṛtāṁ | stomaiḥ | kaśyapodvardhayangiraḥ |
somaṁ | namasya | rājānaṁ | yo | jajñe | vīrudhāṁ | patirindrāyendo | pari | srava |
sapta | diśo | nānāsūryāḥ | sapta | hotāra | ṛtvijaḥ |
devādityā | ye | sapta | tebhiḥ | somābhi | rakṣa | nendrāyendo | pari | srava |
yatte | rājañchṛtaṁ | havistena | somābhi | rakṣa | naḥ |
arātīvā | mā | nastārīnmo | ca | naḥ | kiṁ | canāmamadindrāyendo | pari | srava |
agre | bṛhannuṣasāmūrdhvo | asthānnirjaganvāntamaso | jyotiṣāgāt |
agnirbhānunā | ruśatā | svaṅgā | jāto | viśvā | sadmānyaprāḥ |
sa | jāto | garbho | asi | rodasyoragne | cārurvibhṛtauṣadhīṣu |
citraḥ | śiśuḥ | pari | tamāṁsyaktūnpra | mātṛbhyo | adhi | kanikradadgāḥ |
viṣṇuritthā | paramamasya | vidvāñjāto | bṛhannabhi | pāti | tṛtīyam |
āsā | yadasya | payo | akrata | svaṁ | sacetaso | abhyarcantyatra |
ato | tvā | pitubhṛto | janitrīrannāvṛdhaṁ | prati | carantyannaiḥ |
teṁ | pratyeṣi | punaranyarūpāsi | tvaṁ | vikṣu | mānuṣīṣu | hotā |
hotāraṁ | citrarathamadhvarasya | yajñasyayajñasya | ketuṁ | ruśantam |
pratyardhiṁ | devasyadevasya | mahnā | śriyā | tvagnimatithiṁ | janānām |
sa | tu | vastrāṇyadha | peśanāni | vasāno | agnirnābhā | pṛthivyāḥ |
aruṣo | jātaḥ | padeḻāyāḥ | purohito | rājanyakṣīha | devān |
ā | hi | dyāvāpṛthivī | agnobhe | sadā | putro | na | mātarā | tatantha |
pra | yāhyacchośato | yaviṣṭhāthā | vaha | sahasyeha | devān |
piprīhi | devām̐ | uśato | yaviṣṭha | vidvām̐ | ṛtūm̐rṛtupate | yajeha |
ye | daivyā | ṛtvijastebhiragne | tvaṁ | hotṝṇāmasyāyajiṣṭhaḥ |
veṣi | hotramuta | potraṁ | janānāṁ | mandhātāsi | draviṇodā | ṛtāvā |
svāhā | vayaṁ | kṛṇavāmā | havīṁṣi | devo | devānyajatvagnirarhan |
ā | devānāmapi | panthāmaganma | yacchaknavāma | tadanu | pravoḻhum |
agnirvidvāntsa | yajātsedu | hotā | so | adhvarāntsa | ṛtūnkalpayāti |
yadvo | vayaṁ | pramināma | vratāni | viduṣāṁ | devāviduṣṭarāsaḥ |
agniṣṭadviśvamā | pṛṇāti | vidvānyebhirdevām̐ | ṛtubhiḥ | kalpayāti |
yatpākatrā | manasā | dīnadakṣā | na | yajñasya | manvate | martyāsaḥ |
agniṣṭaddhotā | kratuvidvijānanyajiṣṭho | devām̐ | ṛtuśo | yajāti |
viśveṣāṁ | hyadhvarāṇāmanīkaṁ | citraṁ | ketuṁ | janitā | tvā | jajāna |
sā | yajasva | nṛvatīranu | kṣāḥ | spārheṣaḥ | kṣumatīrviśvajanyāḥ |
yaṁ | tvā | dyāvāpṛthivī | yaṁ | tvāpastvaṣṭā | yaṁ | tvā | sujanimā | jajāna |
panthāmanu | pravidvānpitṛyāṇaṁ | dyumadagne | samidhāno | vi | bhāhi |
ino | rājannaratiḥ | samiddho | raudro | dakṣāya | suṣumām̐ | adarśi |
cikidvi | bhāti | bhāsā | bṛhatāsiknīmeti | ruśatīmapājan |
kṛṣṇāṁ | yadenīmabhi | varpasā | bhūjjanayanyoṣāṁ | bṛhataḥ | piturjām |
ūrdhvaṁ | bhānuṁ | sūryasya | stabhāyandivo | vasubhiraratirvi | bhāti |
bhadro | bhadrayā | sacamānāgātsvasāraṁ | jāro | abhyeti | paścāt |
supraketairdyubhiragnirvitiṣṭhanruśadbhirvarṇairabhi | rāmamasthāt |
asya | yāmāso | bṛhato | na | vagnūnindhānāgneḥ | sakhyuḥ | śivasya |
īḍyasya | vṛṣṇo | bṛhataḥ | svāso | bhāmāso | yāmannaktavaścikitre |
svanā | na | yasya | bhāmāsaḥ | pavante | rocamānasya | bṛhataḥ | sudivaḥ |
jyeṣṭhebhiryastejiṣṭhaiḥ | krīḻumadbhirvarṣiṣṭhebhirbhānubhirnakṣati | dyām |
asya | śuṣmāso | dadṛśānapaverjehamānasya | svanayanniyudbhiḥ |
pratnebhiryo | ruśadbhirdevatamo | vi | rebhadbhiraratirbhāti | vibhvā |
sā | vakṣi | mahi | nā | ca | satsi | divaspṛthivyoraratiryuvatyoḥ |
agniḥ | sutukaḥ | sutukebhiraśvai | rabhasvadbhī | rabhasvām̐ | eha | gamyāḥ |
pra | te | yakṣi | pra | teyarmi | manma | bhuvo | yathā | vandyo | no | haveṣu |
dhanvanniva | prapāsi | tvamagneyakṣave | pūrave | pratna | rājan |
yaṁ | tvā | janāso | abhi | saṁcaranti | gāvoṣṇamiva | vrajaṁ | yaviṣṭha |
dūto | devānāmasi | martyānāmantarmahām̐ścarasi | rocanena |
śiśuṁ | na | tvā | jenyaṁ | vardhayantī | mātā | bibharti | sacanasyamānā |
dhanoradhi | pravatā | yāsi | haryañjigīṣase | paśurivāvasṛṣṭaḥ |
mūrāmūra | na | vayaṁ | cikitvo | mahitvamagne | tvamaṅga | vitse |
śaye | vavriścarati | jihvayādanrerihyate | yuvatiṁ | viśpatiḥ | san |
kūcijjāyate | sanayāsu | navyo | vane | tasthau | palito | dhūmaketuḥ |
asnātāpo | vṛṣabho | na | pra | veti | sacetaso | yaṁ | praṇayanta | martāḥ |
tanūtyajeva | taskarā | vanargū | raśanābhirdaśabhirabhyadhītām |
iyaṁ | te | agne | navyasī | manīṣā | yukṣvā | rathaṁ | na | śucayadbhiraṅgaiḥ |
brahma | ca | te | jātavedo | namaśceyaṁ | ca | gīḥ | sadamidvardhanī | bhūt |
rakṣā | ṇo | agne | tanayāni | tokā | rakṣota | nastanvo | aprayucchan |
ekaḥ | samudro | dharuṇo | rayīṇāmasmaddhṛdo | bhūrijanmā | vi | caṣṭe |
siṣaktyūdharniṇyorupasthotsasya | madhye | nihitaṁ | padaṁ | veḥ |
samānaṁ | nīḻaṁ | vṛṣaṇo | vasānāḥ | saṁ | jagmire | mahiṣārvatībhiḥ |
ṛtasya | padaṁ | kavayo | ni | pānti | guhā | nāmāni | dadhire | parāṇi |
ṛtāyinī | māyinī | saṁ | dadhāte | mitvā | śiśuṁ | jajñaturvardhayantī |
viśvasya | nābhiṁ | carato | dhruvasya | kaveścittantuṁ | manasā | viyantaḥ |
ṛtasya | hi | vartanayaḥ | sujātamiṣo | vājāya | pradivaḥ | sacante |
adhīvāsaṁ | rodasī | vāvasāne | ghṛtairannairvāvṛdhāte | madhūnām |
sapta | svasṝraruṣīrvāvaśāno | vidvānmadhvojjabhārā | dṛśe | kam |
antaryeme | antarikṣe | purājecchanvavrimavidatpūṣaṇasya |
sapta | maryādāḥ | kavayastatakṣustāsāmekāmidabhyaṁhuro | gāt |
āyorha | skambhopamasya | nīḻe | pathāṁ | visarge | dharuṇeṣu | tasthau |
asacca | sacca | parame | vyomandakṣasya | janmannaditerupasthe |
agnirha | naḥ | prathamajā | ṛtasya | pūrvāyuni | vṛṣabhaśca | dhenuḥ |
ayaṁ | sa | yasya | śarmannavobhiragneredhate | jaritābhiṣṭau |
jyeṣṭhebhiryo | bhānubhirṛṣūṇāṁ | paryeti | parivīto | vibhāvā |
yo | bhānubhirvibhāvā | vibhātyagnirdevebhirṛtāvājasraḥ |
ā | yo | vivāya | sakhyā | sakhibhyo'parihvṛto | atyo | na | saptiḥ |
īśe | yo | viśvasyā | devavīterīśe | viśvāyuruṣaso | vyuṣṭau |
ā | yasminmanā | havīṁṣyagnāvariṣṭarathaḥ | skabhnāti | śūṣaiḥ |
śūṣebhirvṛdho | juṣāṇo | arkairdevām̐ | acchā | raghupatvā | jigāti |
mandro | hotā | sa | juhvā | yajiṣṭhaḥ | saṁmiślo | agnirā | jigharti | devān |
tamusrāmindraṁ | na | rejamānamagniṁ | gīrbhirnamobhirā | kṛṇudhvam |
ā | yaṁ | viprāso | matibhirgṛṇanti | jātavedasaṁ | juhvaṁ | sahānām |
saṁ | yasminviśvā | vasūni | jagmurvāje | nāśvāḥ | saptīvantaivaiḥ |
asme | ūtīrindravātatamārvācīnā | agnā | kṛṇuṣva |
adhā | hyagne | mahnā | niṣadyā | sadyo | jajñāno | havyo | babhūtha |
taṁ | te | devāso | anu | ketamāyannadhāvardhanta | prathamāsomāḥ |
svasti | no | divo | agne | pṛthivyā | viśvāyurdhehi | yajathāya | deva |
sacemahi | tava | dasma | praketairuruṣyā | ṇorubhirdeva | śaṁsaiḥ |
imāgne | matayastubhyaṁ | jātā | gobhiraśvairabhi | gṛṇanti | rādhaḥ |
yadā | te | marto | anu | bhogamānaḍvaso | dadhāno | matibhiḥ | sujāta |
agniṁ | manye | pitaramagnimāpimagniṁ | bhrātaraṁ | sadamitsakhāyam |
agneranīkaṁ | bṛhataḥ | saparyaṁ | divi | śukraṁ | yajataṁ | sūryasya |
sidhrāgne | dhiyo | asme | sanutrīryaṁ | trāyase | damā | nityahotā |
ṛtāvā | sa | rohidaśvaḥ | purukṣurdyubhirasmāhabhirvāmamastu |
dyubhirhitaṁ | mitramiva | prayogaṁ | pratnamṛtvijamadhvarasya | jāram |
bāhubhyāmagnimāyavo'jananta | vikṣu | hotāraṁ | nyasādayanta |
svayaṁ | yajasva | divi | deva | devānkiṁ | te | pākaḥ | kṛṇavadapracetāḥ |
yathāyaja | ṛtubhirdeva | devānevā | yajasva | tanvaṁ | sujāta |
bhavā | no | agne'vitota | gopā | bhavā | vayaskṛduta | no | vayodhāḥ |
rāsvā | ca | naḥ | sumaho | havyadātiṁ | trāsvota | nastanvo | aprayucchan |
pra | ketunā | bṛhatā | yātyagnirā | rodasī | vṛṣabho | roravīti |
divaścidantām̐ | upamām̐ | udānaḻapāmupasthe | mahiṣo | vavardha |
mumoda | garbho | vṛṣabhaḥ | kakudmānasremā | vatsaḥ | śimīvām̐ | arāvīt |
sa | devatātyudyatāni | kṛṇvantsveṣu | kṣayeṣu | prathamo | jigāti |
ā | yo | mūrdhānaṁ | pitrorarabdha | nyadhvare | dadhire | sūro | arṇaḥ |
asya | patmannaruṣīraśvabudhnā | ṛtasya | yonau | tanvo | juṣanta |
uṣaüṣo | hi | vaso | agrameṣi | tvaṁ | yamayorabhavo | vibhāvā |
ṛtāya | sapta | dadhiṣe | padāni | janayanmitraṁ | tanve | svāyai |
bhuvaścakṣurmaha | ṛtasya | gopā | bhuvo | varuṇo | yadṛtāya | veṣi |
bhuvo | apāṁ | napājjātavedo | bhuvo | dūto | yasya | havyaṁ | jujoṣaḥ |
bhuvo | yajñasya | rajasaśca | netā | yatrā | niyudbhiḥ | sacase | śivābhiḥ |
divi | mūrdhānaṁ | dadhiṣe | svarṣāṁ | jihvāmagne | cakṛṣe | havyavāham |
asya | tritaḥ | kratunā | vavre | antaricchandhītiṁ | piturevaiḥ | parasya |
sacasyamānaḥ | pitrorupasthe | jāmi | bruvāṇāyudhāni | veti |
sa | pitryāṇyāyudhāni | vidvānindreṣitāptyo | abhyayudhyat |
triśīrṣāṇaṁ | saptaraśmiṁ | jaghanvāntvāṣṭrasya | cinniḥ | sasṛje | trito | gāḥ |
bhūrīdindrodinakṣantamojo'vābhinatsatpatirmanyamānam |
tvāṣṭrasya | cidviśvarūpasya | gonāmācakrāṇastrīṇi | śīrṣā | parā | vark |
āpo | hi | ṣṭhā | mayobhuvastā | norje | dadhātana |
mahe | raṇāya | cakṣase |
yo | vaḥ | śivatamo | rasastasya | bhājayateha | naḥ |
uśatīriva | mātaraḥ |
tasmāraṁ | gamāma | vo | yasya | kṣayāya | jinvatha |
āpo | janayathā | ca | naḥ |
śaṁ | no | devīrabhiṣṭayāpo | bhavantu | pītaye |
śaṁ | yorabhi | sravantu | naḥ |
īśānā | vāryāṇāṁ | kṣayantīścarṣaṇīnām |
apo | yācāmi | bheṣajam |
apsu | me | somo | abravīdantarviśvāni | bheṣajā |
agniṁ | ca | viśvaśaṁbhuvam |
āpaḥ | pṛṇīta | bheṣajaṁ | varūthaṁ | tanve | mama |
jyokca | sūryaṁ | dṛśe |
idamāpaḥ | pra | vahata | yatkiṁ | ca | duritaṁ | mayi |
yadvāhamabhidudroha | yadvā | śepotānṛtam |
āpo | adyānvacāriṣaṁ | rasena | samagasmahi |
payasvānagnā | gahi | taṁ | mā | saṁ | sṛja | varcasā |
o | citsakhāyaṁ | sakhyā | vavṛtyāṁ | tiraḥ | purū | cidarṇavaṁ | jaganvān |
piturnapātamā | dadhīta | vedhādhi | kṣami | prataraṁ | dīdhyānaḥ |
na | te | sakhā | sakhyaṁ | vaṣṭyetatsalakṣmā | yadviṣurūpā | bhavāti |
mahasputrāso | asurasya | vīrā | divo | dhartārorviyā | pari | khyan |
uśanti | ghā | te | amṛtāsaitadekasya | cittyajasaṁ | martyasya |
ni | te | mano | manasi | dhāyyasme | janyuḥ | patistanvamā | viviśyāḥ |
na | yatpurā | cakṛmā | kaddha | nūnamṛtā | vadanto | anṛtaṁ | rapema |
gandharvo | apsvapyā | ca | yoṣā | sā | no | nābhiḥ | paramaṁ | jāmi | tannau |
garbhe | nu | nau | janitā | daṁpatī | kardevastvaṣṭā | savitā | viśvarūpaḥ |
nakirasya | pra | minanti | vratāni | veda | nāvasya | pṛthivī | uta | dyauḥ |
ko | asya | veda | prathamasyāhnaḥ | keṁ | dadarśa | keha | pra | vocat |
bṛhanmitrasya | varuṇasya | dhāma | kadu | bravāhano | vīcyā | nṝn |
yamasya | mā | yamyaṁ | kāmāgantsamāne | yonau | sahaśeyyāya |
jāyeva | patye | tanvaṁ | riricyāṁ | vi | cidvṛheva | rathyeva | cakrā |
na | tiṣṭhanti | na | ni | miṣantyete | devānāṁ | spaśeha | ye | caranti |
anyena | madāhano | yāhi | tūyaṁ | tena | vi | vṛha | rathyeva | cakrā |
rātrībhirasmāhabhirdaśasyetsūryasya | cakṣurmuhurunmimīyāt |
divā | pṛthivyā | mithunā | sabandhū | yamīryamasya | bibhṛyādajāmi |
ā | ghā | tā | gacchānuttarā | yugāni | yatra | jāmayaḥ | kṛṇavannajāmi |
upa | barbṛhi | vṛṣabhāya | bāhumanyamicchasva | subhage | patiṁ | mat |
kiṁ | bhrātāsadyadanāthaṁ | bhavāti | kimu | svasā | yannirṛtirnigacchāt |
kāmamūtā | bahvetadrapāmi | tanvā | me | tanvaṁ | saṁ | pipṛgdhi |
na | vo | te | tanvā | tanvaṁ | saṁ | papṛcyāṁ | pāpamāhuryaḥ | svasāraṁ | nigacchāt |
anyena | matpramudaḥ | kalpayasva | na | te | bhrātā | subhage | vaṣṭyetat |
bato | batāsi | yama | naiva | te | mano | hṛdayaṁ | cāvidāma |
anyā | kila | tvāṁ | kakṣyeva | yuktaṁ | pari | ṣvajāte | libujeva | vṛkṣam |
anyamū | ṣu | tvaṁ | yamyanyo | tvāṁ | pari | ṣvajāte | libujeva | vṛkṣam |
tasya | vā | tvaṁ | manecchā | sa | vā | tavādhā | kṛṇuṣva | saṁvidaṁ | subhadrām |
vṛṣā | vṛṣṇe | duduhe | dohasā | divaḥ | payāṁsi | yahvo | aditeradābhyaḥ |
viśvaṁ | sa | veda | varuṇo | yathā | dhiyā | sa | yajñiyo | yajatu | yajñiyām̐ | ṛtūn |
rapadgandharvīrapyā | ca | yoṣaṇā | nadasya | nāde | pari | pātu | me | manaḥ |
iṣṭasya | madhye | aditirni | dhātu | no | bhrātā | no | jyeṣṭhaḥ | prathamo | vi | vocati |
so | cinnu | bhadrā | kṣumatī | yaśasvatyuṣovāsa | manave | svarvatī |
yadīmuśantamuśatāmanu | kratumagniṁ | hotāraṁ | vidathāya | jījanan |
adha | tyaṁ | drapsaṁ | vibhvaṁ | vicakṣaṇaṁ | virābharadiṣitaḥ | śyeno | adhvare |
yadī | viśo | vṛṇate | dasmamāryāgniṁ | hotāramadha | dhīrajāyata |
sadāsi | raṇvo | yavaseva | puṣyate | hotrābhiragne | manuṣaḥ | svadhvaraḥ |
viprasya | vā | yacchaśamānokthyaṁ | vājaṁ | sasavām̐ | upayāsi | bhūribhiḥ |
udīraya | pitarā | jārā | bhagamiyakṣati | haryato | hṛtteṣyati |
vivakti | vahniḥ | svapasyate | makhastaviṣyate | asuro | vepate | matī |
yaste | agne | sumatiṁ | marto | akṣatsahasaḥ | sūno | ati | sa | pra | śṛṇve |
iṣaṁ | dadhāno | vahamāno | aśvairā | sa | dyumām̐ | amavānbhūṣati | dyūn |
yadagnaiṣā | samitirbhavāti | devī | deveṣu | yajatā | yajatra |
ratnā | ca | yadvibhajāsi | svadhāvo | bhāgaṁ | no | atra | vasumantaṁ | vītāt |
śrudhī | no | agne | sadane | sadhasthe | yukṣvā | rathamamṛtasya | dravitnum |
ā | no | vaha | rodasī | devaputre | mākirdevānāmapa | bhūriha | syāḥ |
dyāvā | ha | kṣāmā | prathame | ṛtenābhiśrāve | bhavataḥ | satyavācā |
devo | yanmartānyajathāya | kṛṇvantsīdaddhotā | pratyaṅsvamasuṁ | yan |
devo | devānparibhūrṛtena | vahā | no | havyaṁ | prathamaścikitvān |
dhūmaketuḥ | samidhā | bhāṛjīko | mandro | hotā | nityo | vācā | yajīyān |
svāvṛgdevasyāmṛtaṁ | yadī | gorato | jātāso | dhārayantorvī |
viśve | devānu | tatte | yajurgurduhe | yadenī | divyaṁ | ghṛtaṁ | vāḥ |
arcāmi | vāṁ | vardhāyāpo | ghṛtasnū | dyāvābhūmī | śṛṇutaṁ | rodasī | me |
ahā | yaddyāvo'sunītimayanmadhvā | no | atra | pitarā | śiśītām |
kiṁ | svinno | rājā | jagṛhe | kadasyāti | vrataṁ | cakṛmā | ko | vi | veda |
mitraściddhi | ṣmā | juhurāṇo | devāñchloko | na | yātāmapi | vājo | asti |
durmantvatrāmṛtasya | nāma | salakṣmā | yadviṣurūpā | bhavāti |
yamasya | yo | manavate | sumantvagne | tamṛṣva | pāhyaprayucchan |
yasmindevā | vidathe | mādayante | vivasvataḥ | sadane | dhārayante |
sūrye | jyotiradadhurmāsyaktūnpari | dyotaniṁ | carato | ajasrā |
yasmindevā | manmani | saṁcarantyapīcye | na | vayamasya | vidma |
mitro | no | atrāditiranāgāntsavitā | devo | varuṇāya | vocat |
śrudhī | no | agne | sadane | sadhasthe | yukṣvā | rathamamṛtasya | dravitnum |
ā | no | vaha | rodasī | devaputre | mākirdevānāmapa | bhūriha | syāḥ |
yuje | vāṁ | brahma | pūrvyaṁ | namobhirvi | ślokaitu | pathyeva | sūreḥ |
śṛṇvantu | viśve | amṛtasya | putrā | ye | dhāmāni | divyāni | tasthuḥ |
yame | iva | yatamāne | yadaitaṁ | pra | vāṁ | bharanmānuṣā | devayantaḥ |
ā | sīdataṁ | svamu | lokaṁ | vidāne | svāsasthe | bhavatamindave | naḥ |
pañca | padāni | rupo | anvarohaṁ | catuṣpadīmanvemi | vratena |
akṣareṇa | prati | mimaitāmṛtasya | nābhāvadhi | saṁ | punāmi |
devebhyaḥ | kamavṛṇīta | mṛtyuṁ | prajāyai | kamamṛtaṁ | nāvṛṇīta |
bṛhaspatiṁ | yajñamakṛṇvata | ṛṣiṁ | priyāṁ | yamastanvaṁ | prārirecīt |
sapta | kṣaranti | śiśave | marutvate | pitre | putrāso | apyavīvatannṛtam |
ubhe | idasyobhayasya | rājatobhe | yatete | ubhayasya | puṣyataḥ |
pareyivāṁsaṁ | pravato | mahīranu | bahubhyaḥ | panthāmanupaspaśānam |
vaivasvataṁ | saṁgamanaṁ | janānāṁ | yamaṁ | rājānaṁ | haviṣā | duvasya |
yamo | no | gātuṁ | prathamo | viveda | naiṣā | gavyūtirapabhartavo |
yatrā | naḥ | pūrve | pitaraḥ | pareyurenā | jajñānāḥ | pathyānu | svāḥ |
mātalī | kavyairyamo | aṅgirobhirbṛhaspatirṛkvabhirvāvṛdhānaḥ |
yām̐śca | devā | vāvṛdhurye | ca | devāntsvāhānye | svadhayānye | madanti |
imaṁ | yama | prastaramā | hi | sīdāṅgirobhiḥ | pitṛbhiḥ | saṁvidānaḥ |
ā | tvā | mantrāḥ | kaviśastā | vahantvenā | rājanhaviṣā | mādayasva |
aṅgirobhirā | gahi | yajñiyebhiryama | vairūpairiha | mādayasva |
vivasvantaṁ | huve | yaḥ | pitā | te'sminyajñe | barhiṣyā | niṣadya |
aṅgiraso | naḥ | pitaro | navagvātharvāṇo | bhṛgavaḥ | somyāsaḥ |
teṣāṁ | vayaṁ | sumatau | yajñiyānāmapi | bhadre | saumanase | syāma |
prehi | prehi | pathibhiḥ | pūrvyebhiryatrā | naḥ | pūrve | pitaraḥ | pareyuḥ |
ubhā | rājānā | svadhayā | madantā | yamaṁ | paśyāsi | varuṇaṁ | ca | devam |
saṁ | gacchasva | pitṛbhiḥ | saṁ | yameneṣṭāpūrtena | parame | vyoman |
hitvāyāvadyaṁ | punarastamehi | saṁ | gacchasva | tanvā | suvarcāḥ |
apeta | vīta | vi | ca | sarpatāto'smaitaṁ | pitaro | lokamakran |
ahobhiradbhiraktubhirvyaktaṁ | yamo | dadātyavasānamasmai |
ati | drava | sārameyau | śvānau | caturakṣau | śabalau | sādhunā | pathā |
athā | pitṝntsuvidatrām̐ | upehi | yamena | ye | sadhamādaṁ | madanti |
yau | te | śvānau | yama | rakṣitārau | caturakṣau | pathirakṣī | nṛcakṣasau |
tābhyāmenaṁ | pari | dehi | rājantsvasti | cāsmānamīvaṁ | ca | dhehi |
urūṇasāvasutṛpodumbalau | yamasya | dūtau | carato | janām̐ | anu |
tāvasmabhyaṁ | dṛśaye | sūryāya | punardātāmasumadyeha | bhadram |
yamāya | somaṁ | sunuta | yamāya | juhutā | haviḥ |
yamaṁ | ha | yajño | gacchatyagnidūto | araṁkṛtaḥ |
yamāya | ghṛtavaddhavirjuhota | pra | ca | tiṣṭhata |
sa | no | deveṣvā | yamaddīrghamāyuḥ | pra | jīvase |
yamāya | madhumattamaṁ | rājñe | havyaṁ | juhotana |
idaṁ | nama | ṛṣibhyaḥ | pūrvajebhyaḥ | pūrvebhyaḥ | pathikṛdbhyaḥ |
trikadrukebhiḥ | patati | ṣaḻurvīrekamidbṛhat |
triṣṭubgāyatrī | chandāṁsi | sarvā | tā | yamāhitā |
udīratāmavarotparāsa | unmadhyamāḥ | pitaraḥ | somyāsaḥ |
asuṁ | yeyuravṛkā | ṛtajñāste | no'vantu | pitaro | haveṣu |
idaṁ | pitṛbhyo | namo | astvadya | ye | pūrvāso | yoparāsa | īyuḥ |
ye | pārthive | rajasyā | niṣattā | ye | vā | nūnaṁ | suvṛjanāsu | vikṣu |
āhaṁ | pitṝntsuvidatrām̐ | avitsi | napātaṁ | ca | vikramaṇaṁ | ca | viṣṇoḥ |
barhiṣado | ye | svadhayā | sutasya | bhajanta | pitvastehāgamiṣṭhāḥ |
barhiṣadaḥ | pitarotyarvāgimā | vo | havyā | cakṛmā | juṣadhvam |
tā | gatāvasā | śaṁtamenāthā | naḥ | śaṁ | yorarapo | dadhāta |
upahūtāḥ | pitaraḥ | somyāso | barhiṣyeṣu | nidhiṣu | priyeṣu |
tā | gamantu | teha | śruvantvadhi | bruvantu | te'vantvasmān |
ācyā | jānu | dakṣiṇato | niṣadyemaṁ | yajñamabhi | gṛṇīta | viśve |
mā | hiṁsiṣṭa | pitaraḥ | kena | cinno | yadvāgaḥ | puruṣatā | karāma |
āsīnāso | aruṇīnāmupasthe | rayiṁ | dhatta | dāśuṣe | martyāya |
putrebhyaḥ | pitarastasya | vasvaḥ | pra | yacchata | tehorjaṁ | dadhāta |
ye | naḥ | pūrve | pitaraḥ | somyāso'nūhire | somapīthaṁ | vasiṣṭhāḥ |
tebhiryamaḥ | saṁrarāṇo | havīṁṣyuśannuśadbhiḥ | pratikāmamattu |
ye | tātṛṣurdevatrā | jehamānā | hotrāvidaḥ | stomataṣṭāso | arkaiḥ |
āgne | yāhi | suvidatrebhirarvāñtsatyaiḥ | kavyaiḥ | pitṛbhirgharmasadbhiḥ |
ye | satyāso | havirado | haviṣpendreṇa | devaiḥ | sarathaṁ | dadhānāḥ |
āgne | yāhi | sahasraṁ | devavandaiḥ | paraiḥ | pūrvaiḥ | pitṛbhirgharmasadbhiḥ |
agniṣvāttāḥ | pitaraiha | gacchata | sadaḥsadaḥ | sadata | supraṇītayaḥ |
attā | havīṁṣi | prayatāni | barhiṣyathā | rayiṁ | sarvavīraṁ | dadhātana |
tvamagneḻito | jātavedo'vāḍḍhavyāni | surabhīṇi | kṛtvī |
prādāḥ | pitṛbhyaḥ | svadhayā | te | akṣannaddhi | tvaṁ | deva | prayatā | havīṁṣi |
ye | ceha | pitaro | ye | ca | neha | yām̐śca | vidma | yām̐ | u | ca | na | pravidma |
tvaṁ | vettha | yati | te | jātavedaḥ | svadhābhiryajñaṁ | sukṛtaṁ | juṣasva |
ye | agnidagdhā | ye | anagnidagdhā | madhye | divaḥ | svadhayā | mādayante |
tebhiḥ | svarāḻasunītimetāṁ | yathāvaśaṁ | tanvaṁ | kalpayasva |
mainamagne | vi | daho | mābhi | śoco | māsya | tvacaṁ | cikṣipo | mā | śarīram |
yadā | śṛtaṁ | kṛṇavo | jātavedo'themenaṁ | pra | hiṇutātpitṛbhyaḥ |
śṛtaṁ | yadā | karasi | jātavedo'themenaṁ | pari | dattātpitṛbhyaḥ |
yadā | gacchātyasunītimetāmathā | devānāṁ | vaśanīrbhavāti |
sūryaṁ | cakṣurgacchatu | vātamātmā | dyāṁ | ca | gaccha | pṛthivīṁ | ca | dharmaṇā |
apo | vā | gaccha | yadi | tatra | te | hitamoṣadhīṣu | prati | tiṣṭhā | śarīraiḥ |
ajo | bhāgastapasā | taṁ | tapasva | taṁ | te | śocistapatu | taṁ | te | arciḥ |
yāste | śivāstanvo | jātavedastābhirvahainaṁ | sukṛtāmu | lokam |
ava | sṛja | punaragne | pitṛbhyo | yastāhutaścarati | svadhābhiḥ |
āyurvasānopa | vetu | śeṣaḥ | saṁ | gacchatāṁ | tanvā | jātavedaḥ |
yatte | kṛṣṇaḥ | śakunātutoda | pipīlaḥ | sarpota | vā | śvāpadaḥ |
agniṣṭadviśvādagadaṁ | kṛṇotu | somaśca | yo | brāhmaṇām̐ | āviveśa |
agnervarma | pari | gobhirvyayasva | saṁ | prorṇuṣva | pīvasā | medasā | ca |
nettvā | dhṛṣṇurharasā | jarhṛṣāṇo | dadhṛgvidhakṣyanparyaṅkhayāte |
imamagne | camasaṁ | mā | vi | jihvaraḥ | priyo | devānāmuta | somyānām |
eṣa | yaścamaso | devapānastasmindevāmṛtā | mādayante |
kravyādamagniṁ | pra | hiṇomi | dūraṁ | yamarājño | gacchatu | ripravāhaḥ |
ihaivāyamitaro | jātavedā | devebhyo | havyaṁ | vahatu | prajānan |
yo | agniḥ | kravyātpraviveśa | vo | gṛhamimaṁ | paśyannitaraṁ | jātavedasam |
taṁ | harāmi | pitṛyajñāya | devaṁ | sa | gharmaminvātparame | sadhasthe |
yo | agniḥ | kravyavāhanaḥ | pitṝnyakṣadṛtāvṛdhaḥ |
predu | havyāni | vocati | devebhyaśca | pitṛbhyā |
uśantastvā | ni | dhīmahyuśantaḥ | samidhīmahi |
uśannuśatā | vaha | pitṝnhaviṣe | attave |
yaṁ | tvamagne | samadahastamu | nirvāpayā | punaḥ |
kiyāmbvatra | rohatu | pākadūrvā | vyalkaśā |
śītike | śītikāvati | hlādike | hlādikāvati |
maṇḍūkyā | su | saṁ | gamemaṁ | svagniṁ | harṣaya |
tvaṣṭā | duhitre | vahatuṁ | kṛṇotītīdaṁ | viśvaṁ | bhuvanaṁ | sameti |
yamasya | mātā | paryuhyamānā | maho | jāyā | vivasvato | nanāśa |
apāgūhannamṛtāṁ | martyebhyaḥ | kṛtvī | savarṇāmadadurvivasvate |
utāśvināvabharadyattadāsīdajahādu | dvā | mithunā | saraṇyūḥ |
pūṣā | tvetaścyāvayatu | pra | vidvānanaṣṭapaśurbhuvanasya | gopāḥ |
sa | tvaitebhyaḥ | pari | dadatpitṛbhyo'gnirdevebhyaḥ | suvidatriyebhyaḥ |
āyurviśvāyuḥ | pari | pāsati | tvā | pūṣā | tvā | pātu | prapathe | purastāt |
yatrāsate | sukṛto | yatra | te | yayustatra | tvā | devaḥ | savitā | dadhātu |
pūṣemāśā | anu | veda | sarvāḥ | so | asmām̐ | abhayatamena | neṣat |
svastidāghṛṇiḥ | sarvavīro'prayucchanpuraitu | prajānan |
prapathe | pathāmajaniṣṭa | pūṣā | prapathe | divaḥ | prapathe | pṛthivyāḥ |
ubhe | abhi | priyatame | sadhasthe | ā | ca | parā | ca | carati | prajānan |
sarasvatīṁ | devayanto | havante | sarasvatīmadhvare | tāyamāne |
sarasvatīṁ | sukṛto | ahvayanta | sarasvatī | dāśuṣe | vāryaṁ | dāt |
sarasvati | yā | sarathaṁ | yayātha | svadhābhirdevi | pitṛbhirmadantī |
āsadyāsminbarhiṣi | mādayasvānamīveṣa | ā | dhehyasme |
sarasvatīṁ | yāṁ | pitaro | havante | dakṣiṇā | yajñamabhinakṣamāṇāḥ |
sahasrārghamiḻo | atra | bhāgaṁ | rāyaspoṣaṁ | yajamāneṣu | dhehi |
āpo | asmānmātaraḥ | śundhayantu | ghṛtena | no | ghṛtapvaḥ | punantu |
viśvaṁ | hi | ripraṁ | pravahanti | devīrudidābhyaḥ | śucirā | pūtaimi |
drapsaścaskanda | prathamām̐ | anu | dyūnimaṁ | ca | yonimanu | yaśca | pūrvaḥ |
samānaṁ | yonimanu | saṁcarantaṁ | drapsaṁ | juhomyanu | sapta | hotrāḥ |
yaste | drapsaḥ | skandati | yaste | aṁśurbāhucyuto | dhiṣaṇāyopasthāt |
adhvaryorvā | pari | vā | yaḥ | pavitrāttaṁ | te | juhomi | manasā | vaṣaṭkṛtam |
yaste | drapsaḥ | skanno | yaste | aṁśuravaśca | yaḥ | paraḥ | srucā |
ayaṁ | devo | bṛhaspatiḥ | saṁ | taṁ | siñcatu | rādhase |
payasvatīroṣadhayaḥ | payasvanmāmakaṁ | vacaḥ |
apāṁ | payasvaditpayastena | mā | saha | śundhata |
paraṁ | mṛtyo | anu | parehi | panthāṁ | yaste | svetaro | devayānāt |
cakṣuṣmate | śṛṇvate | te | bravīmi | mā | naḥ | prajāṁ | rīriṣo | mota | vīrān |
mṛtyoḥ | padaṁ | yopayanto | yadaita | drāghīyāyuḥ | prataraṁ | dadhānāḥ |
āpyāyamānāḥ | prajayā | dhanena | śuddhāḥ | pūtā | bhavata | yajñiyāsaḥ |
ime | jīvā | vi | mṛtairāvavṛtrannabhūdbhadrā | devahūtirno | adya |
prāñco | agāma | nṛtaye | hasāya | drāghīyāyuḥ | prataraṁ | dadhānāḥ |
imaṁ | jīvebhyaḥ | paridhiṁ | dadhāmi | maiṣāṁ | nu | gādaparo | arthametam |
śataṁ | jīvantu | śaradaḥ | purūcīrantarmṛtyuṁ | dadhatāṁ | parvatena |
yathāhānyanupūrvaṁ | bhavanti | yatha | ṛtava | ṛtubhiryanti | sādhu |
yathā | na | pūrvamaparo | jahātyevā | dhātarāyūṁṣi | kalpayaiṣām |
ā | rohatāyurjarasaṁ | vṛṇānānupūrvaṁ | yatamānā | yati | ṣṭha |
iha | tvaṣṭā | sujanimā | sajoṣā | dīrghamāyuḥ | karati | jīvase | vaḥ |
imā | nārīravidhavāḥ | supatnīrāñjanena | sarpiṣā | saṁ | viśantu |
anaśravo'namīvāḥ | suratnā | rohantu | janayo | yonimagre |
udīrṣva | nāryabhi | jīvalokaṁ | gatāsumetamupa | śeṣaihi |
hastagrābhasya | didhiṣostavedaṁ | patyurjanitvamabhi | saṁ | babhūtha |
dhanurhastādādadāno | mṛtasyāsme | kṣatrāya | varcase | balāya |
atraiva | tvamiha | vayaṁ | suvīrā | viśvāḥ | spṛdho | abhimātīrjayema |
upa | sarpa | mātaraṁ | bhūmimetāmuruvyacasaṁ | pṛthivīṁ | suśevām |
ūrṇamradā | yuvatirdakṣiṇāvataiṣā | tvā | pātu | nirṛterupasthāt |
ucchvañcasva | pṛthivi | mā | ni | bādhathāḥ | sūpāyanāsmai | bhava | sūpavañcanā |
mātā | putraṁ | yathā | sicābhyenaṁ | bhūmorṇuhi |
ucchvañcamānā | pṛthivī | su | tiṣṭhatu | sahasraṁ | mitopa | hi | śrayantām |
te | gṛhāso | ghṛtaścuto | bhavantu | viśvāhāsmai | śaraṇāḥ | santvatra |
utte | stabhnāmi | pṛthivīṁ | tvatparīmaṁ | logaṁ | nidadhanmo | ahaṁ | riṣam |
etāṁ | sthūṇāṁ | pitaro | dhārayantu | te'trā | yamaḥ | sādanā | te | minotu |
pratīcīne | māmahanīṣvāḥ | parṇamivā | dadhuḥ |
pratīcīṁ | jagrabhā | vācamaśvaṁ | raśanayā | yathā |
ni | vartadhvaṁ | mānu | gātāsmāntsiṣakta | revatīḥ |
agnīṣomā | punarvasū | asme | dhārayataṁ | rayim |
punarenā | ni | vartaya | punarenā | nyā | kuru |
indraiṇā | ni | yacchatvagnirenopājatu |
punaretā | ni | vartantāmasminpuṣyantu | gopatau |
ihaivāgne | ni | dhārayeha | tiṣṭhatu | yā | rayiḥ |
yanniyānaṁ | nyayanaṁ | saṁjñānaṁ | yatparāyaṇam |
āvartanaṁ | nivartanaṁ | yo | gopāpi | taṁ | huve |
yodānaḍvyayanaṁ | yodānaṭ | parāyaṇam |
āvartanaṁ | nivartanamapi | gopā | ni | vartatām |
ā | nivarta | ni | vartaya | punarnendra | gā | dehi |
jīvābhirbhunajāmahai |
pari | vo | viśvato | dadhorjā | ghṛtena | payasā |
ye | devāḥ | ke | ca | yajñiyāste | rayyā | saṁ | sṛjantu | naḥ |
ā | nivartana | vartaya | ni | nivartana | vartaya |
bhūmyāścatasraḥ | pradiśastābhyainā | ni | vartaya |
bhadraṁ | no | api | vātaya | manaḥ |
agnimīḻe | bhujāṁ | yaviṣṭhaṁ | śāsā | mitraṁ | durdharītum |
yasya | dharmantsvarenīḥ | saparyanti | māturūdhaḥ |
yamāsā | kṛpanīḻaṁ | bhāsāketuṁ | vardhayanti |
bhrājate | śreṇidan |
aryo | viśāṁ | gātureti | pra | yadānaḍdivo | antān |
kavirabhraṁ | dīdyānaḥ |
juṣaddhavyā | mānuṣasyordhvastasthāvṛbhvā | yajñe |
minvantsadma | puraiti |
sa | hi | kṣemo | haviryajñaḥ | śruṣṭīdasya | gātureti |
agniṁ | devā | vāśīmantam |
yajñāsāhaṁ | duveṣe'gniṁ | pūrvasya | śevasya |
adreḥ | sūnumāyumāhuḥ |
naro | ye | ke | cāsmadā | viśvette | vāmā | syuḥ |
agniṁ | haviṣā | vardhantaḥ |
kṛṣṇaḥ | śveto'ruṣo | yāmo | asya | bradhna | ṛjrota | śoṇo | yaśasvān |
hiraṇyarūpaṁ | janitā | jajāna |
evā | te | agne | vimado | manīṣāmūrjo | napādamṛtebhiḥ | sajoṣāḥ |
girā | vakṣatsumatīriyāneṣamūrjaṁ | sukṣitiṁ | viśvamābhāḥ |
āgniṁ | na | svavṛktibhirhotāraṁ | tvā | vṛṇīmahe |
yajñāya | stīrṇabarhiṣe | vi | vo | made | śīraṁ | pāvakaśociṣaṁ | vivakṣase |
tvāmu | te | svābhuvaḥ | śumbhantyaśvarādhasaḥ |
veti | tvāmupasecanī | vi | vo | mada | ṛjītiragnāhutirvivakṣase |
tve | dharmāṇāsate | juhūbhiḥ | siñcatīriva |
kṛṣṇā | rūpāṇyarjunā | vi | vo | made | viśvādhi | śriyo | dhiṣe | vivakṣase |
yamagne | manyase | rayiṁ | sahasāvannamartya |
tamā | no | vājasātaye | vi | vo | made | yajñeṣu | citramā | bharā | vivakṣase |
agnirjāto | atharvaṇā | vidadviśvāni | kāvyā |
bhuvaddūto | vivasvato | vi | vo | made | priyo | yamasya | kāmyo | vivakṣase |
tvāṁ | yajñeṣvīḻate'gne | prayatyadhvare |
tvaṁ | vasūni | kāmyā | vi | vo | made | viśvā | dadhāsi | dāśuṣe | vivakṣase |
tvāṁ | yajñeṣvṛtvijaṁ | cārumagne | ni | ṣedire |
ghṛtapratīkaṁ | manuṣo | vi | vo | made | śukraṁ | cetiṣṭhamakṣabhirvivakṣase |
agne | śukreṇa | śociṣoru | prathayase | bṛhat |
abhikrandanvṛṣāyase | vi | vo | made | garbhaṁ | dadhāsi | jāmiṣu | vivakṣase |
kuha | śrutendraḥ | kasminnadya | jane | mitro | na | śrūyate |
ṛṣīṇāṁ | vā | yaḥ | kṣaye | guhā | vā | carkṛṣe | girā |
iha | śrutendro | asme | adya | stave | vajryṛcīṣamaḥ |
mitro | na | yo | janeṣvā | yaśaścakre | asāmyā |
maho | yaspatiḥ | śavaso | asāmyā | maho | nṛmṇasya | tūtujiḥ |
bhartā | vajrasya | dhṛṣṇoḥ | pitā | putramiva | priyam |
yujāno | aśvā | vātasya | dhunī | devo | devasya | vajrivaḥ |
syantā | pathā | virukmatā | sṛjānaḥ | stoṣyadhvanaḥ |
tvaṁ | tyā | cidvātasyāśvāgā | ṛjrā | tmanā | vahadhyai |
yayordevo | na | martyo | yantā | nakirvidāyyaḥ |
adha | gmantośanā | pṛcchate | vāṁ | kadarthā | nā | gṛham |
ā | jagmathuḥ | parākāddivaśca | gmaśca | martyam |
ā | nendra | pṛkṣase'smākaṁ | brahmodyatam |
tattvā | yācāmahe'vaḥ | śuṣṇaṁ | yaddhannamānuṣam |
akarmā | dasyurabhi | no | amanturanyavrato | amānuṣaḥ |
tvaṁ | tasyāmitrahanvadhardāsasya | dambhaya |
tvaṁ | nendra | śūra | śūrairuta | tvotāso | barhaṇā |
purutrā | te | vi | pūrtayo | navanta | kṣoṇayo | yathā |
tvaṁ | tānvṛtrahatye | codayo | nṝnkārpāṇe | śūra | vajrivaḥ |
guhā | yadī | kavīnāṁ | viśāṁ | nakṣatraśavasām |
makṣū | tā | tendra | dānāpnasākṣāṇe | śūra | vajrivaḥ |
yaddha | śuṣṇasya | dambhayo | jātaṁ | viśvaṁ | sayāvabhiḥ |
mākudhryagindra | śūra | vasvīrasme | bhūvannabhiṣṭayaḥ |
vayaṁvayaṁ | tāsāṁ | sumne | syāma | vajrivaḥ |
asme | tā | tendra | santu | satyāhiṁsantīrupaspṛśaḥ |
vidyāma | yāsāṁ | bhujo | dhenūnāṁ | na | vajrivaḥ |
ahastā | yadapadī | vardhata | kṣāḥ | śacībhirvedyānām |
śuṣṇaṁ | pari | pradakṣiṇidviśvāyave | ni | śiśnathaḥ |
pibāpibedindra | śūra | somaṁ | mā | riṣaṇyo | vasavāna | vasuḥ | san |
uta | trāyasva | gṛṇato | maghono | mahaśca | rāyo | revataskṛdhī | naḥ |
yajāmahendraṁ | vajradakṣiṇaṁ | harīṇāṁ | rathyaṁ | vivratānām |
pra | śmaśru | dodhuvadūrdhvathā | bhūdvi | senābhirdayamāno | vi | rādhasā |
harī | nvasya | yā | vane | vide | vasvindro | maghairmaghavā | vṛtrahā | bhuvat |
ṛbhurvāja | ṛbhukṣāḥ | patyate | śavo'va | kṣṇaumi | dāsasya | nāma | cit |
yadā | vajraṁ | hiraṇyamidathā | rathaṁ | harī | yamasya | vahato | vi | sūribhiḥ |
ā | tiṣṭhati | maghavā | sanaśrutendro | vājasya | dīrghaśravasaspatiḥ |
so | cinnu | vṛṣṭiryūthyā | svā | sacām̐ | indraḥ | śmaśrūṇi | haritābhi | pruṣṇute |
ava | veti | sukṣayaṁ | sute | madhūdiddhūnoti | vāto | yathā | vanam |
yo | vācā | vivāco | mṛdhravācaḥ | purū | sahasrāśivā | jaghāna |
tattadidasya | pauṁsyaṁ | gṛṇīmasi | piteva | yastaviṣīṁ | vāvṛdhe | śavaḥ |
stomaṁ | tendra | vimadājījanannapūrvyaṁ | purutamaṁ | sudānave |
vidmā | hyasya | bhojanaminasya | yadā | paśuṁ | na | gopāḥ | karāmahe |
mākirnainā | sakhyā | vi | yauṣustava | cendra | vimadasya | ca | ṛṣeḥ |
vidmā | hi | te | pramatiṁ | deva | jāmivadasme | te | santu | sakhyā | śivāni |
indra | somamimaṁ | piba | madhumantaṁ | camū | sutam |
asme | rayiṁ | ni | dhāraya | vi | vo | made | sahasriṇaṁ | purūvaso | vivakṣase |
tvāṁ | yajñebhirukthairupa | havyebhirīmahe |
śacīpate | śacīnāṁ | vi | vo | made | śreṣṭhaṁ | no | dhehi | vāryaṁ | vivakṣase |
yaspatirvāryāṇāmasi | radhrasya | coditā |
indra | stotṝṇāmavitā | vi | vo | made | dviṣo | naḥ | pāhyaṁhaso | vivakṣase |
yuvaṁ | śakrā | māyāvinā | samīcī | niramanthatam |
vimadena | yadīḻitā | nāsatyā | niramanthatam |
viśve | devākṛpanta | samīcyorniṣpatantyoḥ |
nāsatyāvabruvandevāḥ | punarā | vahatāditi |
madhumanme | parāyaṇaṁ | madhumatpunarāyanam |
tā | no | devā | devatayā | yuvaṁ | madhumataskṛtam |
bhadraṁ | no | api | vātaya | mano | dakṣamuta | kratum |
adhā | te | sakhye | andhaso | vi | vo | made | raṇangāvo | na | yavase | vivakṣase |
hṛdispṛśastāsate | viśveṣu | soma | dhāmasu |
adhā | kāmeme | mama | vi | vo | made | vi | tiṣṭhante | vasūyavo | vivakṣase |
uta | vratāni | soma | te | prāhaṁ | mināmi | pākyā |
adhā | piteva | sūnave | vi | vo | made | mṛḻā | no | abhi | cidvadhādvivakṣase |
samu | pra | yanti | dhītayaḥ | sargāso'vatām̐ | iva |
kratuṁ | naḥ | soma | jīvase | vi | vo | made | dhārayā | camasām̐ | iva | vivakṣase |
tava | tye | soma | śaktibhirnikāmāso | vyṛṇvire |
gṛtsasya | dhīrāstavaso | vi | vo | made | vrajaṁ | gomantamaśvinaṁ | vivakṣase |
paśuṁ | naḥ | soma | rakṣasi | purutrā | viṣṭhitaṁ | jagat |
samākṛṇoṣi | jīvase | vi | vo | made | viśvā | saṁpaśyanbhuvanā | vivakṣase |
tvaṁ | naḥ | soma | viśvato | gopādābhyo | bhava |
sedha | rājannapa | sridho | vi | vo | made | mā | no | duḥśaṁseśatā | vivakṣase |
tvaṁ | naḥ | soma | sukraturvayodheyāya | jāgṛhi |
kṣetravittaro | manuṣo | vi | vo | made | druho | naḥ | pāhyaṁhaso | vivakṣase |
tvaṁ | no | vṛtrahantamendrasyendo | śivaḥ | sakhā |
yatsīṁ | havante | samithe | vi | vo | made | yudhyamānāstokasātau | vivakṣase |
ayaṁ | gha | sa | turo | madendrasya | vardhata | priyaḥ |
ayaṁ | kakṣīvato | maho | vi | vo | made | matiṁ | viprasya | vardhayadvivakṣase |
ayaṁ | viprāya | dāśuṣe | vājām̐ | iyarti | gomataḥ |
ayaṁ | saptabhyā | varaṁ | vi | vo | made | prāndhaṁ | śroṇaṁ | ca | tāriṣadvivakṣase |
pra | hyacchā | manīṣāḥ | spārhā | yanti | niyutaḥ |
pra | dasrā | niyudrathaḥ | pūṣāviṣṭu | māhinaḥ |
yasya | tyanmahitvaṁ | vātāpyamayaṁ | janaḥ |
viprā | vaṁsaddhītibhiściketa | suṣṭutīnām |
sa | veda | suṣṭutīnāmindurna | pūṣā | vṛṣā |
abhi | psuraḥ | pruṣāyati | vrajaṁ | nā | pruṣāyati |
maṁsīmahi | tvā | vayamasmākaṁ | deva | pūṣan |
matīnāṁ | ca | sādhanaṁ | viprāṇāṁ | cādhavam |
pratyardhiryajñānāmaśvahayo | rathānām |
ṛṣiḥ | sa | yo | manurhito | viprasya | yāvayatsakhaḥ |
ādhīṣamāṇāyāḥ | patiḥ | śucāyāśca | śucasya | ca |
vāsovāyo'vīnāmā | vāsāṁsi | marmṛjat |
ino | vājānāṁ | patirinaḥ | puṣṭīnāṁ | sakhā |
pra | śmaśru | haryato | dūdhodvi | vṛthā | yo | adābhyaḥ |
ā | te | rathasya | pūṣannajā | dhuraṁ | vavṛtyuḥ |
viśvasyārthinaḥ | sakhā | sanojānapacyutaḥ |
asmākamūrjā | rathaṁ | pūṣāviṣṭu | māhinaḥ |
bhuvadvājānāṁ | vṛdhemaṁ | naḥ | śṛṇavaddhavam |
asatsu | me | jaritaḥ | sābhivego | yatsunvate | yajamānāya | śikṣam |
anāśīrdāmahamasmi | prahantā | satyadhvṛtaṁ | vṛjināyantamābhum |
yadīdahaṁ | yudhaye | saṁnayānyadevayūntanvā | śūśujānān |
amā | te | tumraṁ | vṛṣabhaṁ | pacāni | tīvraṁ | sutaṁ | pañcadaśaṁ | ni | ṣiñcam |
nāhaṁ | taṁ | veda | yeti | bravītyadevayūntsamaraṇe | jaghanvān |
yadāvākhyatsamaraṇamṛghāvadādiddha | me | vṛṣabhā | pra | bruvanti |
yadajñāteṣu | vṛjaneṣvāsaṁ | viśve | sato | maghavāno | māsan |
jināmi | vetkṣemā | santamābhuṁ | pra | taṁ | kṣiṇāṁ | parvate | pādagṛhya |
na | vo | māṁ | vṛjane | vārayante | na | parvatāso | yadahaṁ | manasye |
mama | svanātkṛdhukarṇo | bhayātaivedanu | dyūnkiraṇaḥ | samejāt |
darśannvatra | śṛtapām̐ | anindrānbāhukṣadaḥ | śarave | patyamānān |
ghṛṣuṁ | vā | ye | niniduḥ | sakhāyamadhyū | nveṣu | pavayo | vavṛtyuḥ |
abhūrvaukṣīrvyu | āyurānaḍdarṣannu | pūrvo | aparo | nu | darṣat |
dve | pavaste | pari | taṁ | na | bhūto | yo | asya | pāre | rajaso | viveṣa |
gāvo | yavaṁ | prayutāryo | akṣantāpaśyaṁ | sahagopāścarantīḥ |
havedaryo | abhitaḥ | samāyankiyadāsu | svapatiśchandayāte |
saṁ | yadvayaṁ | yavasādo | janānāmahaṁ | yavādorvajre | antaḥ |
atrā | yukto'vasātāramicchādatho | ayuktaṁ | yunajadvavanvān |
atredu | me | maṁsase | satyamuktaṁ | dvipācca | yaccatuṣpātsaṁsṛjāni |
strībhiryo | atra | vṛṣaṇaṁ | pṛtanyādayuddho | asya | vi | bhajāni | vedaḥ |
yasyānakṣā | duhitā | jātvāsa | kastāṁ | vidvām̐ | abhi | manyāte | andhām |
kataro | meniṁ | prati | taṁ | mucāte | yeṁ | vahāte | yeṁ | vā | vareyāt |
kiyatī | yoṣā | maryato | vadhūyoḥ | pariprītā | panyasā | vāryeṇa |
bhadrā | vadhūrbhavati | yatsupeśāḥ | svayaṁ | sā | mitraṁ | vanute | jane | cit |
patto | jagāra | pratyañcamatti | śīrṣṇā | śiraḥ | prati | dadhau | varūtham |
āsīnordhvāmupasi | kṣiṇāti | nyaṅṅuttānāmanveti | bhūmim |
bṛhannacchāyo | apalāśo | arvā | tasthau | mātā | viṣito | atti | garbhaḥ |
anyasyā | vatsaṁ | rihatī | mimāya | kayā | bhuvā | ni | dadhe | dhenurūdhaḥ |
sapta | vīrāso | adharādudāyannaṣṭottarāttātsamajagmirante |
nava | paścātātsthivimantāyandaśa | prāksānu | vi | tirantyaśnaḥ |
daśānāmekaṁ | kapilaṁ | samānaṁ | taṁ | hinvanti | kratave | pāryāya |
garbhaṁ | mātā | sudhitaṁ | vakṣaṇāsvavenantaṁ | tuṣayantī | bibharti |
pīvānaṁ | meṣamapacanta | vīrā | nyuptākṣā | anu | dīvāsan |
dvā | dhanuṁ | bṛhatīmapsvantaḥ | pavitravantā | carataḥ | punantā |
vi | krośanāso | viṣvañcāyanpacāti | nemo | nahi | pakṣadardhaḥ |
ayaṁ | me | devaḥ | savitā | tadāha | drvannedvanavatsarpirannaḥ |
apaśyaṁ | grāmaṁ | vahamānamārādacakrayā | svadhayā | vartamānam |
siṣaktyaryaḥ | pra | yugā | janānāṁ | sadyaḥ | śiśnā | pramināno | navīyān |
etau | me | gāvau | pramarasya | yuktau | mo | ṣu | pra | sedhīrmuhurinmamandhi |
āpaścidasya | vi | naśantyarthaṁ | sūraśca | markoparo | babhūvān |
ayaṁ | yo | vajraḥ | purudhā | vivṛtto'vaḥ | sūryasya | bṛhataḥ | purīṣāt |
śravedenā | paro | anyadasti | tadavyathī | jarimāṇastaranti |
vṛkṣevṛkṣe | niyatā | mīmayadgaustato | vayaḥ | pra | patānpūruṣādaḥ |
athedaṁ | viśvaṁ | bhuvanaṁ | bhayātendrāya | sunvadṛṣaye | ca | śikṣat |
devānāṁ | māne | prathamātiṣṭhankṛntatrādeṣāmuparā | udāyan |
trayastapanti | pṛthivīmanūpā | dvā | bṛbūkaṁ | vahataḥ | purīṣam |
sā | te | jīvāturuta | tasya | viddhi | mā | smaitādṛgapa | gūhaḥ | samarye |
āviḥ | svaḥ | kṛṇute | gūhate | busaṁ | sa | pādurasya | nirṇijo | na | mucyate |
viśvo | hyanyo | arirājagāma | mamedaha | śvaśuro | nā | jagāma |
jakṣīyāddhānota | somaṁ | papīyātsvāśitaḥ | punarastaṁ | jagāyāt |
sa | roruvadvṛṣabhastigmaśṛṅgo | varṣmantasthau | varimannā | pṛthivyāḥ |
viśveṣvenaṁ | vṛjaneṣu | pāmi | yo | me | kukṣī | sutasomaḥ | pṛṇāti |
adriṇā | te | mandinendra | tūyāntsunvanti | somānpibasi | tvameṣām |
pacanti | te | vṛṣabhām̐ | atsi | teṣāṁ | pṛkṣeṇa | yanmaghavanhūyamānaḥ |
idaṁ | su | me | jaritarā | cikiddhi | pratīpaṁ | śāpaṁ | nadyo | vahanti |
lopāśaḥ | siṁhaṁ | pratyañcamatsāḥ | kroṣṭā | varāhaṁ | niratakta | kakṣāt |
kathā | taitadahamā | ciketaṁ | gṛtsasya | pākastavaso | manīṣām |
tvaṁ | no | vidvām̐ | ṛtuthā | vi | voco | yamardhaṁ | te | maghavankṣemyā | dhūḥ |
evā | hi | māṁ | tavasaṁ | vardhayanti | divaścinme | bṛhatottarā | dhūḥ |
purū | sahasrā | ni | śiśāmi | sākamaśatruṁ | hi | mā | janitā | jajāna |
evā | hi | māṁ | tavasaṁ | jajñurugraṁ | karmankarmanvṛṣaṇamindra | devāḥ |
vadhīṁ | vṛtraṁ | vajreṇa | mandasāno'pa | vrajaṁ | mahinā | dāśuṣe | vam |
devāsāyanparaśūm̐rabibhranvanā | vṛścanto | abhi | viḍbhirāyan |
ni | sudrvaṁ | dadhato | vakṣaṇāsu | yatrā | kṛpīṭamanu | taddahanti |
śaśaḥ | kṣuraṁ | pratyañcaṁ | jagārādriṁ | logena | vyabhedamārāt |
bṛhantaṁ | cidṛhate | randhayāni | vayadvatso | vṛṣabhaṁ | śūśuvānaḥ |
suparṇetthā | nakhamā | siṣāyāvaruddhaḥ | paripadaṁ | na | siṁhaḥ |
niruddhaścinmahiṣastarṣyāvāngodhā | tasmāyathaṁ | karṣadetat |
tebhyo | godhāyathaṁ | karṣadetadye | brahmaṇaḥ | pratipīyantyannaiḥ |
simokṣṇo'vasṛṣṭām̐ | adanti | svayaṁ | balāni | tanvaḥ | śṛṇānāḥ |
ete | śamībhiḥ | suśamī | abhūvanye | hinvire | tanvaḥ | somokthaiḥ |
nṛvadvadannupa | no | māhi | vājāndivi | śravo | dadhiṣe | nāma | vīraḥ |
vane | na | vā | yo | nyadhāyi | cākañchucirvāṁ | stomo | bhuraṇāvajīgaḥ |
yasyedindraḥ | purudineṣu | hotā | nṛṇāṁ | naryo | nṛtamaḥ | kṣapāvān |
pra | te | asyoṣasaḥ | prāparasyā | nṛtau | syāma | nṛtamasya | nṛṇām |
anu | triśokaḥ | śatamāvahannṝnkutsena | ratho | yo | asatsasavān |
kaste | madendra | rantyo | bhūdduro | giro | abhyugro | vi | dhāva |
kadvāho | arvāgupa | mā | manīṣā | tvā | śakyāmupamaṁ | rādho | annaiḥ |
kadu | dyumnamindra | tvāvato | nṝnkayā | dhiyā | karase | kannāgan |
mitro | na | satyorugāya | bhṛtyānne | samasya | yadasanmanīṣāḥ |
preraya | sūro | arthaṁ | na | pāraṁ | ye | asya | kāmaṁ | janidheva | gman |
giraśca | ye | te | tuvijāta | pūrvīrnarendra | pratiśikṣantyannaiḥ |
mātre | nu | te | sumite | indra | pūrvī | dyaurmajmanā | pṛthivī | kāvyena |
varāya | te | ghṛtavantaḥ | sutāsaḥ | svādmanbhavantu | pītaye | madhūni |
ā | madhvo | asmāsicannamatramindrāya | pūrṇaṁ | sa | hi | satyarādhāḥ |
sa | vāvṛdhe | varimannā | pṛthivyābhi | kratvā | naryaḥ | pauṁsyaiśca |
vyānaḻindraḥ | pṛtanāḥ | svojāsmai | yatante | sakhyāya | pūrvīḥ |
ā | smā | rathaṁ | na | pṛtanāsu | tiṣṭha | yaṁ | bhadrayā | sumatyā | codayāse |
pra | devatrā | brahmaṇe | gāturetvapo | acchā | manaso | na | prayukti |
mahīṁ | mitrasya | varuṇasya | dhāsiṁ | pṛthujrayase | rīradhā | suvṛktim |
adhvaryavo | haviṣmanto | hi | bhūtācchāpetośatīruśantaḥ |
ava | yāścaṣṭe | aruṇaḥ | suparṇastamāsyadhvamūrmimadyā | suhastāḥ |
adhvaryavo'petā | samudramapāṁ | napātaṁ | haviṣā | yajadhvam |
sa | vo | dadadūrmimadyā | supūtaṁ | tasmai | somaṁ | madhumantaṁ | sunota |
yo | anidhmo | dīdayadapsvantaryaṁ | viprāseḻate | adhvareṣu |
apāṁ | napānmadhumatīrapo | dā | yābhirindro | vāvṛdhe | vīryāya |
yābhiḥ | somo | modate | harṣate | ca | kalyāṇībhiryuvatibhirna | maryaḥ |
tādhvaryo | apo | acchā | parehi | yadāsiñcauṣadhībhiḥ | punītāt |
evedyūne | yuvatayo | namanta | yadīmuśannuśatīretyaccha |
saṁ | jānate | manasā | saṁ | cikitre'dhvaryavo | dhiṣaṇāpaśca | devīḥ |
yo | vo | vṛtābhyo | akṛṇodu | lokaṁ | yo | vo | mahyābhiśasteramuñcat |
tasmendrāya | madhumantamūrmiṁ | devamādanaṁ | pra | hiṇotanāpaḥ |
prāsmai | hinota | madhumantamūrmiṁ | garbho | yo | vaḥ | sindhavo | madhvotsaḥ |
ghṛtapṛṣṭhamīḍyamadhvareṣvāpo | revatīḥ | śṛṇutā | havaṁ | me |
taṁ | sindhavo | matsaramindrapānamūrmiṁ | pra | heta | yobhe | iyarti |
madacyutamauśānaṁ | nabhojāṁ | pari | tritantuṁ | vicarantamutsam |
āvarvṛtatīradha | nu | dvidhārā | goṣuyudho | na | niyavaṁ | carantīḥ |
ṛṣe | janitrīrbhuvanasya | patnīrapo | vandasva | savṛdhaḥ | sayonīḥ |
hinotā | no | adhvaraṁ | devayajyā | hinota | brahma | sanaye | dhanānām |
ṛtasya | yoge | vi | ṣyadhvamūdhaḥ | śruṣṭīvarīrbhūtanāsmabhyamāpaḥ |
āpo | revatīḥ | kṣayathā | hi | vasvaḥ | kratuṁ | ca | bhadraṁ | bibhṛthāmṛtaṁ | ca |
rāyaśca | stha | svapatyasya | patnīḥ | sarasvatī | tadgṛṇate | vayo | dhāt |
prati | yadāpo | adṛśramāyatīrghṛtaṁ | payāṁsi | bibhratīrmadhūni |
adhvaryubhirmanasā | saṁvidānendrāya | somaṁ | suṣutaṁ | bharantīḥ |
emāgmanrevatīrjīvadhanyā | adhvaryavaḥ | sādayatā | sakhāyaḥ |
ni | barhiṣi | dhattana | somyāso'pāṁ | naptrā | saṁvidānāsaināḥ |
āgmannāpośatīrbarhiredaṁ | nyadhvare | asadandevayantīḥ |
adhvaryavaḥ | sunutendrāya | somamabhūdu | vaḥ | suśakā | devayajyā |
ā | no | devānāmupa | vetu | śaṁso | viśvebhisturairavase | yajatraḥ |
tebhirvayaṁ | suṣakhāyo | bhavema | taranto | viśvā | duritā | syāma |
pari | cinmarto | draviṇaṁ | mamanyādṛtasya | pathā | namasā | vivāset |
uta | svena | kratunā | saṁ | vadeta | śreyāṁsaṁ | dakṣaṁ | manasā | jagṛbhyāt |
adhāyi | dhītirasasṛgramaṁśāstīrthe | na | dasmamupa | yantyūmāḥ |
abhyānaśma | suvitasya | śūṣaṁ | navedaso | amṛtānāmabhūma |
nityaścākanyātsvapatirdamūnā | yasmo | devaḥ | savitā | jajāna |
bhago | vā | gobhiraryamemanajyātso | asmai | cāruśchadayaduta | syāt |
iyaṁ | sā | bhūyoṣasāmiva | kṣā | yaddha | kṣumantaḥ | śavasā | samāyan |
asya | stutiṁ | jariturbhikṣamāṇā | naḥ | śagmāsopa | yantu | vājāḥ |
asyedeṣā | sumatiḥ | paprathānābhavatpūrvyā | bhūmanā | gauḥ |
asya | sanīḻāsurasya | yonau | samānā | bharaṇe | bibhramāṇāḥ |
kiṁ | svidvanaṁ | ko | sa | vṛkṣāsa | yato | dyāvāpṛthivī | niṣṭatakṣuḥ |
saṁtasthāne | ajare | itaūtī | ahāni | pūrvīruṣaso | jaranta |
naitāvadenā | paro | anyadastyukṣā | sa | dyāvāpṛthivī | bibharti |
tvacaṁ | pavitraṁ | kṛṇuta | svadhāvānyadīṁ | sūryaṁ | na | harito | vahanti |
stego | na | kṣāmatyeti | pṛthvīṁ | mihaṁ | na | vāto | vi | ha | vāti | bhūma |
