gṛhāngaccha | gṛhapatnī | yathāso | vaśinī | tvaṁ | vidathamā | vadāsi |
iha | priyaṁ | prajayā | te | samṛdhyatāmasmingṛhe | gārhapatyāya | jāgṛhi |
enā | patyā | tanvaṁ | saṁ | sṛjasvādhā | jivrī | vidathamā | vadāthaḥ |
nīlalohitaṁ | bhavati | kṛtyāsaktirvyajyate |
edhante | asyā | jñātayaḥ | patirbandheṣu | badhyate |
parā | dehi | śāmulyaṁ | brahmabhyo | vi | bhajā | vasu |
kṛtyaiṣā | padvatī | bhūtvyā | jāyā | viśate | patim |
aśrīrā | tanūrbhavati | ruśatī | pāpayāmuyā |
patiryadvadhvo | vāsasā | svamaṅgamabhidhitsate |
ye | vadhvaścandraṁ | vahatuṁ | yakṣmā | yanti | janādanu |
punastānyajñiyā | devā | nayantu | yatāgatāḥ |
mā | vidanparipanthino | yāsīdanti | daṁpatī |
sugebhirdurgamatītāmapa | drāntvarātayaḥ |
sumaṅgalīriyaṁ | vadhūrimāṁ | sameta | paśyata |
saubhāgyamasyai | dattvāyāthāstaṁ | vi | paretana |
tṛṣṭametatkaṭukametadapāṣṭhavadviṣavannaitadattave |
sūryāṁ | yo | brahmā | vidyātsedvādhūyamarhati |
āśasanaṁ | viśasanamatho | adhivikartanam |
sūryāyāḥ | paśya | rūpāṇi | tāni | brahmā | tu | śundhati |
gṛbhṇāmi | te | saubhagatvāya | hastaṁ | mayā | patyā | jaradaṣṭiryathāsaḥ |
bhago | aryamā | savitā | puraṁdhirmahyaṁ | tvādurgārhapatyāya | devāḥ |
tāṁ | pūṣañchivatamāmerayasva | yasyāṁ | bījaṁ | manuṣyā | vapanti |
yā | norū | uśatī | viśrayāte | yasyāmuśantaḥ | praharāma | śepam |
tubhyamagre | paryavahantsūryāṁ | vahatunā | saha |
punaḥ | patibhyo | jāyāṁ | dāgne | prajayā | saha |
punaḥ | patnīmagniradādāyuṣā | saha | varcasā |
dīrghāyurasyā | yaḥ | patirjīvāti | śaradaḥ | śatam |
somaḥ | prathamo | vivide | gandharvo | vividottaraḥ |
tṛtīyo | agniṣṭe | patisturīyaste | manuṣyajāḥ |
somo | dadadgandharvāya | gandharvo | dadadagnaye |
rayiṁ | ca | putrām̐ścādādagnirmahyamatho | imām |
ihaiva | staṁ | mā | vi | yauṣṭaṁ | viśvamāyurvyaśnutam |
krīḻantau | putrairnaptṛbhirmodamānau | sve | gṛhe |
ā | naḥ | prajāṁ | janayatu | prajāpatirājarasāya | samanaktvaryamā |
adurmaṅgalīḥ | patilokamā | viśa | śaṁ | no | bhava | dvipade | śaṁ | catuṣpade |
aghoracakṣurapatighnyedhi | śivā | paśubhyaḥ | sumanāḥ | suvarcāḥ |
vīrasūrdevakāmā | syonā | śaṁ | no | bhava | dvipade | śaṁ | catuṣpade |
imāṁ | tvamindra | mīḍhvaḥ | suputrāṁ | subhagāṁ | kṛṇu |
daśāsyāṁ | putrānā | dhehi | patimekādaśaṁ | kṛdhi |
samrājñī | śvaśure | bhava | samrājñī | śvaśrvāṁ | bhava |
nanāndari | samrājñī | bhava | samrājñī | adhi | devṛṣu |
samañjantu | viśve | devāḥ | samāpo | hṛdayāni | nau |
saṁ | mātariśvā | saṁ | dhātā | samu | deṣṭrī | dadhātu | nau |
vi | hi | sotorasṛkṣata | nendraṁ | devamamaṁsata |
yatrāmadadvṛṣākapiraryaḥ | puṣṭeṣu | matsakhā | viśvasmādindrottaraḥ |
parā | hīndra | dhāvasi | vṛṣākaperati | vyathiḥ |
no | aha | pra | vindasyanyatra | somapītaye | viśvasmādindrottaraḥ |
kimayaṁ | tvāṁ | vṛṣākapiścakāra | harito | mṛgaḥ |
yasmerasyasīdu | nvaryo | vā | puṣṭimadvasu | viśvasmādindrottaraḥ |
yamimaṁ | tvaṁ | vṛṣākapiṁ | priyamindrābhirakṣasi |
śvā | nvasya | jambhiṣadapi | karṇe | varāhayurviśvasmādindrottaraḥ |
priyā | taṣṭāni | me | kapirvyaktā | vyadūduṣat |
śiro | nvasya | rāviṣaṁ | na | sugaṁ | duṣkṛte | bhuvaṁ | viśvasmādindrottaraḥ |
na | matstrī | subhasattarā | na | suyāśutarā | bhuvat |
na | matpraticyavīyasī | na | sakthyudyamīyasī | viśvasmādindrottaraḥ |
uve | amba | sulābhike | yathevāṅga | bhaviṣyati |
bhasanme | amba | sakthi | me | śiro | me | vīva | hṛṣyati | viśvasmādindrottaraḥ |
kiṁ | subāho | svaṅgure | pṛthuṣṭo | pṛthujāghane |
kiṁ | śūrapatni | nastvamabhyamīṣi | vṛṣākapiṁ | viśvasmādindrottaraḥ |
avīrāmiva | māmayaṁ | śarārurabhi | manyate |
utāhamasmi | vīriṇīndrapatnī | marutsakhā | viśvasmādindrottaraḥ |
saṁhotraṁ | sma | purā | nārī | samanaṁ | vāva | gacchati |
vedhā | ṛtasya | vīriṇīndrapatnī | mahīyate | viśvasmādindrottaraḥ |
indrāṇīmāsu | nāriṣu | subhagāmahamaśravam |
nahyasyāparaṁ | cana | jarasā | marate | patirviśvasmādindrottaraḥ |
nāhamindrāṇi | rāraṇa | sakhyurvṛṣākaperṛte |
yasyedamapyaṁ | haviḥ | priyaṁ | deveṣu | gacchati | viśvasmādindrottaraḥ |
vṛṣākapāyi | revati | suputrādu | susnuṣe |
ghasattendra | ukṣaṇaḥ | priyaṁ | kācitkaraṁ | havirviśvasmādindrottaraḥ |
ukṣṇo | hi | me | pañcadaśa | sākaṁ | pacanti | viṁśatim |
utāhamadmi | pīvedubhā | kukṣī | pṛṇanti | me | viśvasmādindrottaraḥ |
vṛṣabho | na | tigmaśṛṅgo'ntaryūtheṣu | roruvat |
manthastendra | śaṁ | hṛde | yaṁ | te | sunoti | bhāvayurviśvasmādindrottaraḥ |
na | seśe | yasya | rambate'ntarā | sakthyā | kapṛt |
sedīśe | yasya | romaśaṁ | niṣeduṣo | vijṛmbhate | viśvasmādindrottaraḥ |
na | seśe | yasya | romaśaṁ | niṣeduṣo | vijṛmbhate |
sedīśe | yasya | rambate'ntarā | sakthyā | kapṛdviśvasmādindrottaraḥ |
ayamindra | vṛṣākapiḥ | parasvantaṁ | hataṁ | vidat |
asiṁ | sūnāṁ | navaṁ | carumādedhasyānācitaṁ | viśvasmādindrottaraḥ |
ayamemi | vicākaśadvicinvandāsamāryam |
pibāmi | pākasutvano'bhi | dhīramacākaśaṁ | viśvasmādindrottaraḥ |
dhanva | ca | yatkṛntatraṁ | ca | kati | svittā | vi | yojanā |
nedīyaso | vṛṣākape'stamehi | gṛhām̐ | upa | viśvasmādindrottaraḥ |
punarehi | vṛṣākape | suvitā | kalpayāvahai |
yaiṣa | svapnanaṁśano'stameṣi | pathā | punarviśvasmādindrottaraḥ |
yadudañco | vṛṣākape | gṛhamindrājagantana |
kva | sya | pulvagho | mṛgaḥ | kamagañjanayopano | viśvasmādindrottaraḥ |
parśurha | nāma | mānavī | sākaṁ | sasūva | viṁśatim |
bhadraṁ | bhala | tyasyābhūdyasyā | udaramāmayadviśvasmādindrottaraḥ |
rakṣohaṇaṁ | vājinamā | jigharmi | mitraṁ | prathiṣṭhamupa | yāmi | śarma |
śiśāno | agniḥ | kratubhiḥ | samiddhaḥ | sa | no | divā | sa | riṣaḥ | pātu | naktam |
ayodaṁṣṭro | arciṣā | yātudhānānupa | spṛśa | jātavedaḥ | samiddhaḥ |
ā | jihvayā | mūradevānrabhasva | kravyādo | vṛktvyapi | dhatsvāsan |
ubhobhayāvinnupa | dhehi | daṁṣṭrā | hiṁsraḥ | śiśāno'varaṁ | paraṁ | ca |
utāntarikṣe | pari | yāhi | rājañjambhaiḥ | saṁ | dhehyabhi | yātudhānān |
yajñairiṣūḥ | saṁnamamāno | agne | vācā | śalyām̐ | aśanibhirdihānaḥ |
tābhirvidhya | hṛdaye | yātudhānānpratīco | bāhūnprati | bhaṅdhyeṣām |
agne | tvacaṁ | yātudhānasya | bhindhi | hiṁsrāśanirharasā | hantvenam |
pra | parvāṇi | jātavedaḥ | śṛṇīhi | kravyātkraviṣṇurvi | cinotu | vṛkṇam |
yatredānīṁ | paśyasi | jātavedastiṣṭhantamagnota | vā | carantam |
yadvāntarikṣe | pathibhiḥ | patantaṁ | tamastā | vidhya | śarvā | śiśānaḥ |
utālabdhaṁ | spṛṇuhi | jātavedālebhānādṛṣṭibhiryātudhānāt |
agne | pūrvo | ni | jahi | śośucānāmādaḥ | kṣviṅkāstamadantvenīḥ |
iha | pra | brūhi | yatamaḥ | so | agne | yo | yātudhāno | yedaṁ | kṛṇoti |
tamā | rabhasva | samidhā | yaviṣṭha | nṛcakṣasaścakṣuṣe | randhayainam |
tīkṣṇenāgne | cakṣuṣā | rakṣa | yajñaṁ | prāñcaṁ | vasubhyaḥ | pra | ṇaya | pracetaḥ |
hiṁsraṁ | rakṣāṁsyabhi | śośucānaṁ | mā | tvā | dabhanyātudhānā | nṛcakṣaḥ |
nṛcakṣā | rakṣaḥ | pari | paśya | vikṣu | tasya | trīṇi | prati | śṛṇīhyagrā |
tasyāgne | pṛṣṭīrharasā | śṛṇīhi | tredhā | mūlaṁ | yātudhānasya | vṛśca |
triryātudhānaḥ | prasitiṁ | taitvṛtaṁ | yo | agne | anṛtena | hanti |
tamarciṣā | sphūrjayañjātavedaḥ | samakṣamenaṁ | gṛṇate | ni | vṛṅdhi |
tadagne | cakṣuḥ | prati | dhehi | rebhe | śaphārujaṁ | yena | paśyasi | yātudhānam |
atharvavajjyotiṣā | daivyena | satyaṁ | dhūrvantamacitaṁ | nyoṣa |
yadagne | adya | mithunā | śapāto | yadvācastṛṣṭaṁ | janayanta | rebhāḥ |
manyormanasaḥ | śaravyā | jāyate | yā | tayā | vidhya | hṛdaye | yātudhānān |
parā | śṛṇīhi | tapasā | yātudhānānparāgne | rakṣo | harasā | śṛṇīhi |
parārciṣā | mūradevāñchṛṇīhi | parāsutṛpo | abhi | śośucānaḥ |
parādya | devā | vṛjinaṁ | śṛṇantu | pratyagenaṁ | śapathā | yantu | tṛṣṭāḥ |
vācāstenaṁ | śarava | ṛcchantu | marmanviśvasyaitu | prasitiṁ | yātudhānaḥ |
yaḥ | pauruṣeyeṇa | kraviṣā | samaṅkte | yo | aśvyena | paśunā | yātudhānaḥ |
yo | aghnyāyā | bharati | kṣīramagne | teṣāṁ | śīrṣāṇi | harasāpi | vṛśca |
saṁvatsarīṇaṁ | payosriyāyāstasya | māśīdyātudhāno | nṛcakṣaḥ |
pīyūṣamagne | yatamastitṛpsāttaṁ | pratyañcamarciṣā | vidhya | marman |
viṣaṁ | gavāṁ | yātudhānāḥ | pibantvā | vṛścyantāmaditaye | durevāḥ |
paraināndevaḥ | savitā | dadātu | parā | bhāgamoṣadhīnāṁ | jayantām |
sanādagne | mṛṇasi | yātudhānānna | tvā | rakṣāṁsi | pṛtanāsu | jigyuḥ |
anu | daha | sahamūrānkravyādo | mā | te | hetyā | mukṣata | daivyāyāḥ |
tvaṁ | no | agne | adharādudaktāttvaṁ | paścāduta | rakṣā | purastāt |
prati | te | te | ajarāsastapiṣṭhāghaśaṁsaṁ | śośucato | dahantu |
paścātpurastādadharādudaktātkaviḥ | kāvyena | pari | pāhi | rājan |
sakhe | sakhāyamajaro | jarimṇe'gne | martām̐ | amartyastvaṁ | naḥ |
pari | tvāgne | puraṁ | vayaṁ | vipraṁ | sahasya | dhīmahi |
dhṛṣadvarṇaṁ | divedive | hantāraṁ | bhaṅgurāvatām |
viṣeṇa | bhaṅgurāvataḥ | prati | ṣma | rakṣaso | daha |
agne | tigmena | śociṣā | tapuragrābhirṛṣṭibhiḥ |
pratyagne | mithunā | daha | yātudhānā | kimīdinā |
saṁ | tvā | śiśāmi | jāgṛhyadabdhaṁ | vipra | manmabhiḥ |
pratyagne | harasā | haraḥ | śṛṇīhi | viśvataḥ | prati |
yātudhānasya | rakṣaso | balaṁ | vi | ruja | vīryam |
haviṣpāntamajaraṁ | svarvidi | divispṛśyāhutaṁ | juṣṭamagnau |
tasya | bharmaṇe | bhuvanāya | devā | dharmaṇe | kaṁ | svadhayā | paprathanta |
gīrṇaṁ | bhuvanaṁ | tamasāpagūḻhamāviḥ | svarabhavajjāte | agnau |
tasya | devāḥ | pṛthivī | dyaurutāpo'raṇayannoṣadhīḥ | sakhye | asya |
devebhirnviṣito | yajñiyebhiragniṁ | stoṣāṇyajaraṁ | bṛhantam |
yo | bhānunā | pṛthivīṁ | dyāmutemāmātatāna | rodasī | antarikṣam |
yo | hotāsītprathamo | devajuṣṭo | yaṁ | samāñjannājyenā | vṛṇānāḥ |
sa | patatrītvaraṁ | sthā | jagadyacchvātramagnirakṛṇojjātavedāḥ |
yajjātavedo | bhuvanasya | mūrdhannatiṣṭho | agne | saha | rocanena |
taṁ | tvāhema | matibhirgīrbhirukthaiḥ | sa | yajñiyo | abhavo | rodasiprāḥ |
mūrdhā | bhuvo | bhavati | naktamagnistataḥ | sūryo | jāyate | prātarudyan |
māyāmū | tu | yajñiyānāmetāmapo | yattūrṇiścarati | prajānan |
dṛśenyo | yo | mahinā | samiddho'rocata | diviyonirvibhāvā |
tasminnagnau | sūktavākena | devā | havirviśvājuhavustanūpāḥ |
sūktavākaṁ | prathamamādidagnimādiddhavirajanayanta | devāḥ |
saiṣāṁ | yajño | abhavattanūpāstaṁ | dyaurveda | taṁ | pṛthivī | tamāpaḥ |
yaṁ | devāso'janayantāgniṁ | yasminnājuhavurbhuvanāni | viśvā |
so | arciṣā | pṛthivīṁ | dyāmutemāmṛjūyamāno | atapanmahitvā |
stomena | hi | divi | devāso | agnimajījanañchaktibhī | rodasiprām |
tamū | akṛṇvantredhā | bhuve | kaṁ | sauṣadhīḥ | pacati | viśvarūpāḥ |
yadedenamadadhuryajñiyāso | divi | devāḥ | sūryamāditeyam |
yadā | cariṣṇū | mithunāvabhūtāmāditprāpaśyanbhuvanāni | viśvā |
viśvasmāgniṁ | bhuvanāya | devā | vaiśvānaraṁ | ketumahnāmakṛṇvan |
ā | yastatānoṣaso | vibhātīrapo | ūrṇoti | tamo | arciṣā | yan |
vaiśvānaraṁ | kavayo | yajñiyāso'gniṁ | devājanayannajuryam |
nakṣatraṁ | pratnamaminaccariṣṇu | yakṣasyādhyakṣaṁ | taviṣaṁ | bṛhantam |
vaiśvānaraṁ | viśvahā | dīdivāṁsaṁ | mantrairagniṁ | kavimacchā | vadāmaḥ |
yo | mahimnā | paribabhūvorvī | utāvastāduta | devaḥ | parastāt |
dve | srutī | aśṛṇavaṁ | pitṝṇāmahaṁ | devānāmuta | martyānām |
tābhyāmidaṁ | viśvamejatsameti | yadantarā | pitaraṁ | mātaraṁ | ca |
dve | samīcī | bibhṛtaścarantaṁ | śīrṣato | jātaṁ | manasā | vimṛṣṭam |
sa | pratyaṅviśvā | bhuvanāni | tasthāvaprayucchantaraṇirbhrājamānaḥ |
yatrā | vadete | avaraḥ | paraśca | yajñanyoḥ | kataro | nau | vi | veda |
ā | śekuritsadhamādaṁ | sakhāyo | nakṣanta | yajñaṁ | kedaṁ | vi | vocat |
katyagnayaḥ | kati | sūryāsaḥ | katyuṣāsaḥ | katyu | svidāpaḥ |
nopaspijaṁ | vaḥ | pitaro | vadāmi | pṛcchāmi | vaḥ | kavayo | vidmane | kam |
yāvanmātramuṣaso | na | pratīkaṁ | suparṇyo | vasate | mātariśvaḥ |
tāvaddadhātyupa | yajñamāyanbrāhmaṇo | hoturavaro | niṣīdan |
indraṁ | stavā | nṛtamaṁ | yasya | mahnā | vibabādhe | rocanā | vi | jmo | antān |
ā | yaḥ | paprau | carṣaṇīdhṛdvarobhiḥ | pra | sindhubhyo | riricāno | mahitvā |
sa | sūryaḥ | paryurū | varāṁsyendro | vavṛtyādrathyeva | cakrā |
atiṣṭhantamapasyaṁ | na | sargaṁ | kṛṣṇā | tamāṁsi | tviṣyā | jaghāna |
samānamasmānapāvṛdarca | kṣmayā | divo | asamaṁ | brahma | navyam |
vi | yaḥ | pṛṣṭheva | janimānyaryendraścikāya | na | sakhāyamīṣe |
indrāya | giro | aniśitasargāpaḥ | prerayaṁ | sagarasya | budhnāt |
yo | akṣeṇeva | cakriyā | śacībhirviṣvaktastambha | pṛthivīmuta | dyām |
āpāntamanyustṛpalaprabharmā | dhuniḥ | śimīvāñcharumām̐ | ṛjīṣī |
somo | viśvānyatasā | vanāni | nārvāgindraṁ | pratimānāni | debhuḥ |
na | yasya | dyāvāpṛthivī | na | dhanva | nāntarikṣaṁ | nādrayaḥ | somo | akṣāḥ |
yadasya | manyuradhinīyamānaḥ | śṛṇāti | vīḻu | rujati | sthirāṇi |
jaghāna | vṛtraṁ | svadhitirvaneva | ruroja | puro | aradanna | sindhūn |
bibheda | giriṁ | navaminna | kumbhamā | gendro | akṛṇuta | svayugbhiḥ |
tvaṁ | ha | tyadṛṇayendra | dhīro'sirna | parva | vṛjinā | śṛṇāsi |
pra | ye | mitrasya | varuṇasya | dhāma | yujaṁ | na | janā | minanti | mitram |
pra | ye | mitraṁ | prāryamaṇaṁ | durevāḥ | pra | saṁgiraḥ | pra | varuṇaṁ | minanti |
nyamitreṣu | vadhamindra | tumraṁ | vṛṣanvṛṣāṇamaruṣaṁ | śiśīhi |
indro | divendra | īśe | pṛthivyendro | apāmindretparvatānām |
indro | vṛdhāmindrenmedhirāṇāmindraḥ | kṣeme | yoge | havyendraḥ |
prāktubhyendraḥ | pra | vṛdho | ahabhyaḥ | prāntarikṣātpra | samudrasya | dhāseḥ |
pra | vātasya | prathasaḥ | pra | jmo | antātpra | sindhubhyo | ririce | pra | kṣitibhyaḥ |
pra | śośucatyoṣaso | na | keturasinvā | te | vartatāmindra | hetiḥ |
aśmeva | vidhya | divā | sṛjānastapiṣṭhena | heṣasā | droghamitrān |
anvaha | māsānvidvanānyanvoṣadhīranu | parvatāsaḥ |
anvindraṁ | rodasī | vāvaśāne | anvāpo | ajihata | jāyamānam |
karhi | svitsā | tendra | cetyāsadaghasya | yadbhinado | rakṣaiṣat |
mitrakruvo | yacchasane | na | gāvaḥ | pṛthivyāpṛgamuyā | śayante |
śatrūyanto | abhi | ye | nastatasre | mahi | vrādhantaugaṇāsa | indra |
andhenāmitrāstamasā | sacantāṁ | sujyotiṣo | aktavastām̐ | abhi | ṣyuḥ |
purūṇi | hi | tvā | savanā | janānāṁ | brahmāṇi | mandangṛṇatāmṛṣīṇām |
imāmāghoṣannavasā | sahūtiṁ | tiro | viśvām̐ | arcato | yāhyarvāṅ |
evā | te | vayamindra | bhuñjatīnāṁ | vidyāma | sumatīnāṁ | navānām |
vidyāma | vastoravasā | gṛṇanto | viśvāmitrota | tendra | nūnam |
śunaṁ | huvema | maghavānamindramasminbhare | nṛtamaṁ | vājasātau |
śṛṇvantamugramūtaye | samatsu | ghnantaṁ | vṛtrāṇi | saṁjitaṁ | dhanānām |
sahasraśīrṣā | puruṣaḥ | sahasrākṣaḥ | sahasrapāt |
sa | bhūmiṁ | viśvato | vṛtvātyatiṣṭhaddaśāṅgulam |
puruṣaivedaṁ | sarvaṁ | yadbhūtaṁ | yacca | bhavyam |
utāmṛtatvasyeśāno | yadannenātirohati |
etāvānasya | mahimāto | jyāyām̐śca | pūruṣaḥ |
pādo'sya | viśvā | bhūtāni | tripādasyāmṛtaṁ | divi |
tripādūrdhvodaitpuruṣaḥ | pādo'syehābhavatpunaḥ |
tato | viṣvaṅvyakrāmatsāśanānaśane | abhi |
tasmādvirāḻajāyata | virājo | adhi | pūruṣaḥ |
sa | jāto | atyaricyata | paścādbhūmimatho | puraḥ |
yatpuruṣeṇa | haviṣā | devā | yajñamatanvata |
vasanto | asyāsīdājyaṁ | grīṣmedhmaḥ | śaraddhaviḥ |
taṁ | yajñaṁ | barhiṣi | praukṣanpuruṣaṁ | jātamagrataḥ |
tena | devāyajanta | sādhyā | ṛṣayaśca | ye |
tasmādyajñātsarvahutaḥ | saṁbhṛtaṁ | pṛṣadājyam |
paśūntām̐ścakre | vāyavyānāraṇyāngrāmyāśca | ye |
tasmādyajñātsarvahuta | ṛcaḥ | sāmāni | jajñire |
chandāṁsi | jajñire | tasmādyajustasmādajāyata |
tasmādaśvājāyanta | ye | ke | cobhayādataḥ |
gāvo | ha | jajñire | tasmāttasmājjātājāvayaḥ |
yatpuruṣaṁ | vyadadhuḥ | katidhā | vyakalpayan |
mukhaṁ | kimasya | kau | bāhū | korū | pādocyete |
brāhmaṇo'sya | mukhamāsīdbāhū | rājanyaḥ | kṛtaḥ |
ūrū | tadasya | yadvaiśyaḥ | padbhyāṁ | śūdro | ajāyata |
candramā | manaso | jātaścakṣoḥ | sūryo | ajāyata |
mukhādindraścāgniśca | prāṇādvāyurajāyata |
nābhyāsīdantarikṣaṁ | śīrṣṇo | dyauḥ | samavartata |
padbhyāṁ | bhūmirdiśaḥ | śrotrāttathā | lokām̐ | akalpayan |
saptāsyāsanparidhayastriḥ | sapta | samidhaḥ | kṛtāḥ |
devā | yadyajñaṁ | tanvānābadhnanpuruṣaṁ | paśum |
yajñena | yajñamayajanta | devāstāni | dharmāṇi | prathamānyāsan |
te | ha | nākaṁ | mahimānaḥ | sacanta | yatra | pūrve | sādhyāḥ | santi | devāḥ |
saṁ | jāgṛvadbhirjaramāṇedhyate | dame | damūneṣayanniḻaspade |
viśvasya | hotā | haviṣo | vareṇyo | vibhurvibhāvā | suṣakhā | sakhīyate |
sa | darśataśrīratithirgṛhegṛhe | vanevane | śiśriye | takvavīriva |
janaṁjanaṁ | janyo | nāti | manyate | viśā | kṣeti | viśyo | viśaṁviśam |
sudakṣo | dakṣaiḥ | kratunāsi | sukraturagne | kaviḥ | kāvyenāsi | viśvavit |
vasurvasūnāṁ | kṣayasi | tvamekeddyāvā | ca | yāni | pṛthivī | ca | puṣyataḥ |
prajānannagne | tava | yonimṛtviyamiḻāyāspade | ghṛtavantamāsadaḥ |
ā | te | cikitroṣasāmivetayo'repasaḥ | sūryasyeva | raśmayaḥ |
tava | śriyo | varṣyasyeva | vidyutaścitrāścikitroṣasāṁ | na | ketavaḥ |
yadoṣadhīrabhisṛṣṭo | vanāni | ca | pari | svayaṁ | cinuṣe | annamāsye |
tamoṣadhīrdadhire | garbhamṛtviyaṁ | tamāpo | agniṁ | janayanta | mātaraḥ |
tamitsamānaṁ | vaninaśca | vīrudho'ntarvatīśca | suvate | ca | viśvahā |
vātopadhūteṣito | vaśām̐ | anu | tṛṣu | yadannā | veviṣadvitiṣṭhase |
ā | te | yatante | rathyo | yathā | pṛthakchardhāṁsyagne | ajarāṇi | dhakṣataḥ |
medhākāraṁ | vidathasya | prasādhanamagniṁ | hotāraṁ | paribhūtamaṁ | matim |
tamidarbhe | haviṣyā | samānamittaminmahe | vṛṇate | nānyaṁ | tvat |
tvāmidatra | vṛṇate | tvāyavo | hotāramagne | vidatheṣu | vedhasaḥ |
yaddevayanto | dadhati | prayāṁsi | te | haviṣmanto | manavo | vṛktabarhiṣaḥ |
tavāgne | hotraṁ | tava | potramṛtviyaṁ | tava | neṣṭraṁ | tvamagnidṛtāyataḥ |
tava | praśāstraṁ | tvamadhvarīyasi | brahmā | cāsi | gṛhapatiśca | no | dame |
yastubhyamagne | amṛtāya | martyaḥ | samidhā | dāśaduta | vā | haviṣkṛti |
tasya | hotā | bhavasi | yāsi | dūtyamupa | brūṣe | yajasyadhvarīyasi |
imāsmai | matayo | vāco | asmadām̐ | ṛco | giraḥ | suṣṭutayaḥ | samagmata |
vasūyavo | vasave | jātavedase | vṛddhāsu | cidvardhano | yāsu | cākanat |
imāṁ | pratnāya | suṣṭutiṁ | navīyasīṁ | voceyamasmośate | śṛṇotu | naḥ |
bhūyāntarā | hṛdyasya | nispṛśe | jāyeva | patyośatī | suvāsāḥ |
yasminnaśvāsa | ṛṣabhāsokṣaṇo | vaśā | meṣāvasṛṣṭāsa | āhutāḥ |
kīlālape | somapṛṣṭhāya | vedhase | hṛdā | matiṁ | janaye | cārumagnaye |
ahāvyagne | havirāsye | te | srucīva | ghṛtaṁ | camvīva | somaḥ |
vājasaniṁ | rayimasme | suvīraṁ | praśastaṁ | dhehi | yaśasaṁ | bṛhantam |
yajñasya | vo | rathyaṁ | viśpatiṁ | viśāṁ | hotāramaktoratithiṁ | vibhāvasum |
śocañchuṣkāsu | hariṇīṣu | jarbhuradvṛṣā | keturyajato | dyāmaśāyata |
imamañjaspāmubhaye | akṛṇvata | dharmāṇamagniṁ | vidathasya | sādhanam |
aktuṁ | na | yahvamuṣasaḥ | purohitaṁ | tanūnapātamaruṣasya | niṁsate |
baḻasya | nīthā | vi | paṇeśca | manmahe | vayāsya | prahutāsurattave |
yadā | ghorāso | amṛtatvamāśatādijjanasya | daivyasya | carkiran |
ṛtasya | hi | prasitirdyaururu | vyaco | namo | mahyaramatiḥ | panīyasī |
indro | mitro | varuṇaḥ | saṁ | cikitrire'tho | bhagaḥ | savitā | pūtadakṣasaḥ |
pra | rudreṇa | yayinā | yanti | sindhavastiro | mahīmaramatiṁ | dadhanvire |
yebhiḥ | parijmā | pariyannuru | jrayo | vi | roruvajjaṭhare | viśvamukṣate |
krāṇā | rudrā | maruto | viśvakṛṣṭayo | divaḥ | śyenāso | asurasya | nīḻayaḥ |
tebhiścaṣṭe | varuṇo | mitro | aryamendro | devebhirarvaśebhirarvaśaḥ |
indre | bhujaṁ | śaśamānāsāśata | sūro | dṛśīke | vṛṣaṇaśca | pauṁsye |
pra | ye | nvasyārhaṇā | tatakṣire | yujaṁ | vajraṁ | nṛṣadaneṣu | kāravaḥ |
sūraścidā | harito | asya | rīramadindrādā | kaścidbhayate | tavīyasaḥ |
bhīmasya | vṛṣṇo | jaṭharādabhiśvaso | divedive | sahuriḥ | stannabādhitaḥ |
stomaṁ | vo | adya | rudrāya | śikvase | kṣayadvīrāya | namasā | didiṣṭana |
yebhiḥ | śivaḥ | svavām̐ | evayāvabhirdivaḥ | siṣakti | svayaśā | nikāmabhiḥ |
te | hi | prajāyābharanta | vi | śravo | bṛhaspatirvṛṣabhaḥ | somajāmayaḥ |
yajñairatharvā | prathamo | vi | dhārayaddevā | dakṣairbhṛgavaḥ | saṁ | cikitrire |
te | hi | dyāvāpṛthivī | bhūriretasā | narāśaṁsaścaturaṅgo | yamo'ditiḥ |
devastvaṣṭā | draviṇodā | ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ | pra | rodasī | maruto | viṣṇurarhire |
uta | sya | nośijāmurviyā | kavirahiḥ | śṛṇotu | budhnyo | havīmani |
sūryāmāsā | vicarantā | divikṣitā | dhiyā | śamīnahuṣī | asya | bodhatam |
pra | naḥ | pūṣā | carathaṁ | viśvadevyo'pāṁ | napādavatu | vāyuriṣṭaye |
ātmānaṁ | vasyo | abhi | vātamarcata | tadaśvinā | suhavā | yāmani | śrutam |
viśāmāsāmabhayānāmadhikṣitaṁ | gīrbhiru | svayaśasaṁ | gṛṇīmasi |
gnābhirviśvābhiraditimanarvaṇamaktoryuvānaṁ | nṛmaṇādhā | patim |
rebhadatra | januṣā | pūrvo | aṅgirā | grāvāṇordhvā | abhi | cakṣuradhvaram |
yebhirvihāyābhavadvicakṣaṇaḥ | pāthaḥ | sumekaṁ | svadhitirvananvati |
mahi | dyāvāpṛthivī | bhūtamurvī | nārī | yahvī | na | rodasī | sadaṁ | naḥ |
tebhirnaḥ | pātaṁ | sahyasaibhirnaḥ | pātaṁ | śūṣaṇi |
yajñeyajñe | sa | martyo | devāntsaparyati |
yaḥ | sumnairdīrghaśruttamāvivāsatyenān |
viśveṣāmirajyavo | devānāṁ | vārmahaḥ |
viśve | hi | viśvamahaso | viśve | yajñeṣu | yajñiyāḥ |
te | ghā | rājāno | amṛtasya | mandrāryamā | mitro | varuṇaḥ | parijmā |
kadrudro | nṛṇāṁ | stuto | marutaḥ | pūṣaṇo | bhagaḥ |
uta | no | naktamapāṁ | vṛṣaṇvasū | sūryāmāsā | sadanāya | sadhanyā |
sacā | yatsādyeṣāmahirbudhneṣu | budhnyaḥ |
uta | no | devāvaśvinā | śubhaspatī | dhāmabhirmitrāvaruṇoruṣyatām |
mahaḥ | sa | rāyaiṣate'ti | dhanveva | duritā |
uta | no | rudrā | cinmṛḻatāmaśvinā | viśve | devāso | rathaspatirbhagaḥ |
ṛbhurvāja | ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ | parijmā | viśvavedasaḥ |
ṛbhurṛbhukṣā | ṛbhurvidhato | madā | te | harī | jūjuvānasya | vājinā |
duṣṭaraṁ | yasya | sāma | cidṛdhagyajño | na | mānuṣaḥ |
kṛdhī | no | ahrayo | deva | savitaḥ | sa | ca | stuṣe | maghonām |
saho | nendro | vahnibhirnyeṣāṁ | carṣaṇīnāṁ | cakraṁ | raśmiṁ | na | yoyuve |
aiṣu | dyāvāpṛthivī | dhātaṁ | mahadasme | vīreṣu | viśvacarṣaṇi | śravaḥ |
pṛkṣaṁ | vājasya | sātaye | pṛkṣaṁ | rāyota | turvaṇe |
etaṁ | śaṁsamindrāsmayuṣṭvaṁ | kūcitsantaṁ | sahasāvannabhiṣṭaye |
sadā | pāhyabhiṣṭaye | medatāṁ | vedatā | vaso |
etaṁ | me | stomaṁ | tanā | na | sūrye | dyutadyāmānaṁ | vāvṛdhanta | nṛṇām |
saṁvananaṁ | nāśvyaṁ | taṣṭevānapacyutam |
vāvarta | yeṣāṁ | rāyā | yuktaiṣāṁ | hiraṇyayī |
nemadhitā | na | pauṁsyā | vṛtheva | viṣṭāntā |
pra | tadduḥśīme | pṛthavāne | vene | pra | rāme | vocamasure | maghavatsu |
ye | yuktvāya | pañca | śatāsmayu | pathā | viśrāvyeṣām |
adhīnnvatra | saptatiṁ | ca | sapta | ca |
sadyo | didiṣṭa | tānvaḥ | sadyo | didiṣṭa | pārthyaḥ | sadyo | didiṣṭa | māyavaḥ |
praite | vadantu | pra | vayaṁ | vadāma | grāvabhyo | vācaṁ | vadatā | vadadbhyaḥ |
yadadrayaḥ | parvatāḥ | sākamāśavaḥ | ślokaṁ | ghoṣaṁ | bharathendrāya | sominaḥ |
ete | vadanti | śatavatsahasravadabhi | krandanti | haritebhirāsabhiḥ |
viṣṭvī | grāvāṇaḥ | sukṛtaḥ | sukṛtyayā | hotuścitpūrve | haviradyamāśata |
ete | vadantyavidannanā | madhu | nyūṅkhayante | adhi | pakvāmiṣi |
vṛkṣasya | śākhāmaruṇasya | bapsataste | sūbharvā | vṛṣabhāḥ | premarāviṣuḥ |
bṛhadvadanti | madireṇa | mandinendraṁ | krośanto'vidannanā | madhu |
saṁrabhyā | dhīrāḥ | svasṛbhiranartiṣurāghoṣayantaḥ | pṛthivīmupabdibhiḥ |
suparṇā | vācamakratopa | dyavyākhare | kṛṣṇeṣirā | anartiṣuḥ |
nyaṅni | yantyuparasya | niṣkṛtaṁ | purū | reto | dadhire | sūryaśvitaḥ |
ugreva | pravahantaḥ | samāyamuḥ | sākaṁ | yuktā | vṛṣaṇo | bibhrato | dhuraḥ |
yacchvasanto | jagrasānārāviṣuḥ | śṛṇvaiṣāṁ | prothatho | arvatāmiva |
daśāvanibhyo | daśakakṣyebhyo | daśayoktrebhyo | daśayojanebhyaḥ |
daśābhīśubhyo | arcatājarebhyo | daśa | dhuro | daśa | yuktā | vahadbhyaḥ |
te | adrayo | daśayantrāsāśavasteṣāmādhānaṁ | paryeti | haryatam |
to | sutasya | somyasyāndhasoṁ'śoḥ | pīyūṣaṁ | prathamasya | bhejire |
te | somādo | harīndrasya | niṁsateṁ'śuṁ | duhanto | adhyāsate | gavi |
tebhirdugdhaṁ | papivāntsomyaṁ | madhvindro | vardhate | prathate | vṛṣāyate |
vṛṣā | vo | aṁśurna | kilā | riṣāthaneḻāvantaḥ | sadamitsthanāśitāḥ |
raivatyeva | mahasā | cāravaḥ | sthana | yasya | grāvāṇo | ajuṣadhvamadhvaram |
tṛdilātṛdilāso | adrayo'śramaṇāśṛthitā | amṛtyavaḥ |
anāturājarāḥ | sthāmaviṣṇavaḥ | supīvaso | atṛṣitātṛṣṇajaḥ |
dhruvaiva | vaḥ | pitaro | yugeyuge | kṣemakāmāsaḥ | sadaso | na | yuñjate |
ajuryāso | hariṣāco | haridravā | dyāṁ | raveṇa | pṛthivīmaśuśravuḥ |
tadidvadantyadrayo | vimocane | yāmannañjaspeva | ghedupabdibhiḥ |
vapanto | bījamiva | dhānyākṛtaḥ | pṛñcanti | somaṁ | na | minanti | bapsataḥ |
sute | adhvare | adhi | vācamakratā | krīḻayo | na | mātaraṁ | tudantaḥ |
vi | ṣū | muñcā | suṣuvuṣo | manīṣāṁ | vi | vartantāmadrayaścāyamānāḥ |
haye | jāye | manasā | tiṣṭha | ghore | vacāṁsi | miśrā | kṛṇavāvahai | nu |
na | nau | mantrānuditāsa | ete | mayaskaranparatare | canāhan |
kimetā | vācā | kṛṇavā | tavāhaṁ | prākramiṣamuṣasāmagriyeva |
purūravaḥ | punarastaṁ | parehi | durāpanā | vātevāhamasmi |
iṣurna | śriyeṣudherasanā | goṣāḥ | śatasā | na | raṁhiḥ |
avīre | kratau | vi | davidyutannorā | na | māyuṁ | citayanta | dhunayaḥ |
sā | vasu | dadhatī | śvaśurāya | vayoṣo | yadi | vaṣṭyantigṛhāt |
astaṁ | nanakṣe | yasmiñcākandivā | naktaṁ | śnathitā | vaitasena |
triḥ | sma | māhnaḥ | śnathayo | vaitasenota | sma | me'vyatyai | pṛṇāsi |
purūravo'nu | te | ketamāyaṁ | rājā | me | vīra | tanvastadāsīḥ |
yā | sujūrṇiḥ | śreṇiḥ | sumnaāpirhradecakṣurna | granthinī | caraṇyuḥ |
tāñjayo'ruṇayo | na | sasruḥ | śriye | gāvo | na | dhenavo'navanta |
samasmiñjāyamānāsata | gnotemavardhannadyaḥ | svagūrtāḥ |
mahe | yattvā | purūravo | raṇāyāvardhayandasyuhatyāya | devāḥ |
sacā | yadāsu | jahatīṣvatkamamānuṣīṣu | mānuṣo | niṣeve |
apa | sma | mattarasantī | na | bhujyustātrasanrathaspṛśo | nāśvāḥ |
yadāsu | marto | amṛtāsu | nispṛksaṁ | kṣoṇībhiḥ | kratubhirna | pṛṅkte |
tātayo | na | tanvaḥ | śumbhata | svāśvāso | na | krīḻayo | dandaśānāḥ |
vidyunna | yā | patantī | davidyodbharantī | me | apyā | kāmyāni |
janiṣṭo | apo | naryaḥ | sujātaḥ | prorvaśī | tirata | dīrghamāyuḥ |
jajñiṣetthā | gopīthyāya | hi | dadhātha | tatpurūravo | maujaḥ |
aśāsaṁ | tvā | viduṣī | sasminnahanna | māśṛṇoḥ | kimabhugvadāsi |
kadā | sūnuḥ | pitaraṁ | jātecchāccakrannāśru | vartayadvijānan |
ko | daṁpatī | samanasā | vi | yūyodadha | yadagniḥ | śvaśureṣu | dīdayat |
prati | bravāṇi | vartayate | aśru | cakranna | krandadādhye | śivāyai |
pra | tatte | hinavā | yatte | asme | parehyastaṁ | nahi | mūra | māpaḥ |
sudevo | adya | prapatedanāvṛtparāvataṁ | paramāṁ | gantavo |
adhā | śayīta | nirṛterupasthe'dhainaṁ | vṛkā | rabhasāso | adyuḥ |
purūravo | mā | mṛthā | mā | pra | papto | mā | tvā | vṛkāso | aśivāso | kṣan |
na | vai | straiṇāni | sakhyāni | santi | sālāvṛkāṇāṁ | hṛdayānyetā |
yadvirūpācaraṁ | martyeṣvavasaṁ | rātrīḥ | śaradaścatasraḥ |
ghṛtasya | stokaṁ | sakṛdahnāśnāṁ | tādevedaṁ | tātṛpāṇā | carāmi |
antarikṣaprāṁ | rajaso | vimānīmupa | śikṣāmyurvaśīṁ | vasiṣṭhaḥ |
upa | tvā | rātiḥ | sukṛtasya | tiṣṭhānni | vartasva | hṛdayaṁ | tapyate | me |
iti | tvā | devema | āhuraiḻa | yathemetadbhavasi | mṛtyubandhuḥ |
prajā | te | devānhaviṣā | yajāti | svargo | tvamapi | mādayāse |
pra | te | mahe | vidathe | śaṁsiṣaṁ | harī | pra | te | vanve | vanuṣo | haryataṁ | madam |
ghṛtaṁ | na | yo | haribhiścāru | secatā | tvā | viśantu | harivarpasaṁ | giraḥ |
hariṁ | hi | yonimabhi | ye | samasvaranhinvanto | harī | divyaṁ | yathā | sadaḥ |
ā | yaṁ | pṛṇanti | haribhirna | dhenavendrāya | śūṣaṁ | harivantamarcata |
so | asya | vajro | harito | yāyaso | harirnikāmo | harirā | gabhastyoḥ |
dyumnī | suśipro | harimanyusāyakendre | ni | rūpā | haritā | mimikṣire |
divi | na | keturadhi | dhāyi | haryato | vivyacadvajro | harito | na | raṁhyā |
tudadahiṁ | hariśipro | yāyasaḥ | sahasraśokābhavaddhariṁbharaḥ |
tvaṁtvamaharyathopastutaḥ | pūrvebhirindra | harikeśa | yajvabhiḥ |
tvaṁ | haryasi | tava | viśvamukthyamasāmi | rādho | harijāta | haryatam |
tā | vajriṇaṁ | mandinaṁ | stomyaṁ | madendraṁ | rathe | vahato | haryatā | harī |
purūṇyasmai | savanāni | haryatendrāya | somā | harayo | dadhanvire |
araṁ | kāmāya | harayo | dadhanvire | sthirāya | hinvanharayo | harī | turā |
arvadbhiryo | haribhirjoṣamīyate | so | asya | kāmaṁ | harivantamānaśe |
hariśmaśārurharikeśāyasasturaspeye | yo | haripāvardhata |
arvadbhiryo | haribhirvājinīvasurati | viśvā | duritā | pāriṣaddharī |
sruveva | yasya | hariṇī | vipetatuḥ | śipre | vājāya | hariṇī | davidhvataḥ |
pra | yatkṛte | camase | marmṛjaddharī | pītvā | madasya | haryatasyāndhasaḥ |
uta | sma | sadma | haryatasya | pastyoratyo | na | vājaṁ | harivām̐ | acikradat |
mahī | ciddhi | dhiṣaṇāharyadojasā | bṛhadvayo | dadhiṣe | haryataścidā |
ā | rodasī | haryamāṇo | mahitvā | navyaṁnavyaṁ | haryasi | manma | nu | priyam |
pra | pastyamasura | haryataṁ | gorāviṣkṛdhi | haraye | sūryāya |
ā | tvā | haryantaṁ | prayujo | janānāṁ | rathe | vahantu | hariśipramindra |
pibā | yathā | pratibhṛtasya | madhvo | haryanyajñaṁ | sadhamāde | daśoṇim |
apāḥ | pūrveṣāṁ | harivaḥ | sutānāmatho | idaṁ | savanaṁ | kevalaṁ | te |
mamaddhi | somaṁ | madhumantamindra | satrā | vṛṣañjaṭharā | vṛṣasva |
yauṣadhīḥ | pūrvā | jātā | devebhyastriyugaṁ | purā |
manai | nu | babhrūṇāmahaṁ | śataṁ | dhāmāni | sapta | ca |
śataṁ | vo | amba | dhāmāni | sahasramuta | vo | ruhaḥ |
adhā | śatakratvo | yūyamimaṁ | me | agadaṁ | kṛta |
oṣadhīḥ | prati | modadhvaṁ | puṣpavatīḥ | prasūvarīḥ |
aśveva | sajitvarīrvīrudhaḥ | pārayiṣṇvaḥ |
oṣadhīriti | mātarastadvo | devīrupa | bruve |
saneyamaśvaṁ | gāṁ | vāsātmānaṁ | tava | pūruṣa |
aśvatthe | vo | niṣadanaṁ | parṇe | vo | vasatiṣkṛtā |
gobhājetkilāsatha | yatsanavatha | pūruṣam |
yatrauṣadhīḥ | samagmata | rājānaḥ | samitāviva |
vipraḥ | socyate | bhiṣagrakṣohāmīvacātanaḥ |
aśvāvatīṁ | somāvatīmūrjayantīmudojasam |
āvitsi | sarvauṣadhīrasmā | ariṣṭatātaye |
ucchuṣmauṣadhīnāṁ | gāvo | goṣṭhādiverate |
dhanaṁ | saniṣyantīnāmātmānaṁ | tava | pūruṣa |
iṣkṛtirnāma | vo | mātātho | yūyaṁ | stha | niṣkṛtīḥ |
sīrāḥ | patatriṇīḥ | sthana | yadāmayati | niṣkṛtha |
ati | viśvāḥ | pariṣṭhāḥ | steneva | vrajamakramuḥ |
oṣadhīḥ | prācucyavuryatkiṁ | ca | tanvo | rapaḥ |
yadimā | vājayannahamoṣadhīrhastādadhe |
ātmā | yakṣmasya | naśyati | purā | jīvagṛbho | yathā |
yasyauṣadhīḥ | prasarpathāṅgamaṅgaṁ | paruṣparuḥ |
tato | yakṣmaṁ | vi | bādhadhvogro | madhyamaśīriva |
sākaṁ | yakṣma | pra | pata | cāṣeṇa | kikidīvinā |
sākaṁ | vātasya | dhrājyā | sākaṁ | naśya | nihākayā |
anyā | vo | anyāmavatvanyānyasyopāvata |
tāḥ | sarvāḥ | saṁvidānedaṁ | me | prāvatā | vacaḥ |
yāḥ | phalinīryāphalā | apuṣpā | yāśca | puṣpiṇīḥ |
bṛhaspatiprasūtāstā | no | muñcantvaṁhasaḥ |
muñcantu | mā | śapathyādatho | varuṇyāduta |
atho | yamasya | paḍbīśātsarvasmāddevakilbiṣāt |
avapatantīravadandivauṣadhayaspari |
yaṁ | jīvamaśnavāmahai | na | sa | riṣyāti | pūruṣaḥ |
yauṣadhīḥ | somarājñīrbahvīḥ | śatavicakṣaṇāḥ |
tāsāṁ | tvamasyuttamāraṁ | kāmāya | śaṁ | hṛde |
yauṣadhīḥ | somarājñīrviṣṭhitāḥ | pṛthivīmanu |
bṛhaspatiprasūtāsyai | saṁ | datta | vīryam |
mā | vo | riṣatkhanitā | yasmai | cāhaṁ | khanāmi | vaḥ |
dvipaccatuṣpadasmākaṁ | sarvamastvanāturam |
yāścedamupaśṛṇvanti | yāśca | dūraṁ | parāgatāḥ |
sarvāḥ | saṁgatya | vīrudho'syai | saṁ | datta | vīryam |
oṣadhayaḥ | saṁ | vadante | somena | saha | rājñā |
yasmai | kṛṇoti | brāhmaṇastaṁ | rājanpārayāmasi |
tvamuttamāsyoṣadhe | tava | vṛkṣopastayaḥ |
upastirastu | so'smākaṁ | yo | asmām̐ | abhidāsati |
bṛhaspate | prati | me | devatāmihi | mitro | vā | yadvaruṇo | vāsi | pūṣā |
ādityairvā | yadvasubhirmarutvāntsa | parjanyaṁ | śaṁtanave | vṛṣāya |
ā | devo | dūto | ajiraścikitvāntvaddevāpe | abhi | māmagacchat |
pratīcīnaḥ | prati | māmā | vavṛtsva | dadhāmi | te | dyumatīṁ | vācamāsan |
asme | dhehi | dyumatīṁ | vācamāsanbṛhaspate | anamīvāmiṣirām |
yayā | vṛṣṭiṁ | śaṁtanave | vanāva | divo | drapso | madhumām̐ | ā | viveśa |
ā | no | drapsā | madhumanto | viśantvindra | dehyadhirathaṁ | sahasram |
ni | ṣīda | hotramṛtuthā | yajasva | devāndevāpe | haviṣā | saparya |
ārṣṭiṣeṇo | hotramṛṣirniṣīdandevāpirdevasumatiṁ | cikitvān |
sottarasmādadharaṁ | samudramapo | divyāsṛjadvarṣyā | abhi |
asmintsamudre | adhyuttarasminnāpo | devebhirnivṛtātiṣṭhan |
tādravannārṣṭiṣeṇena | sṛṣṭā | devāpinā | preṣitā | mṛkṣiṇīṣu |
yaddevāpiḥ | śaṁtanave | purohito | hotrāya | vṛtaḥ | kṛpayannadīdhet |
devaśrutaṁ | vṛṣṭivaniṁ | rarāṇo | bṛhaspatirvācamasmāyacchat |
yaṁ | tvā | devāpiḥ | śuśucāno | agnārṣṭiṣeṇo | manuṣyaḥ | samīdhe |
viśvebhirdevairanumadyamānaḥ | pra | parjanyamīrayā | vṛṣṭimantam |
tvāṁ | pūrva | ṛṣayo | gīrbhirāyantvāmadhvareṣu | puruhūta | viśve |
sahasrāṇyadhirathānyasme | ā | no | yajñaṁ | rohidaśvopa | yāhi |
etānyagne | navatirnava | tve | āhutānyadhirathā | sahasrā |
tebhirvardhasva | tanvaḥ | śūra | pūrvīrdivo | no | vṛṣṭimiṣito | rirīhi |
etānyagne | navatiṁ | sahasrā | saṁ | pra | yaccha | vṛṣṇendrāya | bhāgam |
vidvānpatha | ṛtuśo | devayānānapyaulānaṁ | divi | deveṣu | dhehi |
agne | bādhasva | vi | mṛdho | vi | durgahāpāmīvāmapa | rakṣāṁsi | sedha |
asmātsamudrādbṛhato | divo | no'pāṁ | bhūmānamupa | naḥ | sṛjeha |
kaṁ | naścitramiṣaṇyasi | cikitvānpṛthugmānaṁ | vāśraṁ | vāvṛdhadhyai |
kattasya | dātu | śavaso | vyuṣṭau | takṣadvajraṁ | vṛtraturamapinvat |
sa | hi | dyutā | vidyutā | veti | sāma | pṛthuṁ | yonimasuratvā | sasāda |
sa | sanīḻebhiḥ | prasahāno | asya | bhrāturna | ṛte | saptathasya | māyāḥ |
sa | vājaṁ | yātāpaduṣpadā | yantsvarṣātā | pari | ṣadatsaniṣyan |
anarvā | yacchatadurasya | vedo | ghnañchiśnadevām̐ | abhi | varpasā | bhūt |
sa | yahvyo'vanīrgoṣvarvā | juhoti | pradhanyāsu | sasriḥ |
apādo | yatra | yujyāso'rathā | droṇyaśvāserate | ghṛtaṁ | vāḥ |
sa | rudrebhiraśastavāra | ṛbhvā | hitvī | gayamāreavadyāgāt |
vamrasya | manye | mithunā | vivavrī | annamabhītyārodayanmuṣāyan |
seddāsaṁ | tuvīravaṁ | patirdantśaḻakṣaṁ | triśīrṣāṇaṁ | damanyat |
asya | trito | nvojasā | vṛdhāno | vipā | varāhamayoagrayā | han |
sa | druhvaṇe | manuṣordhvasāna | ā | sāviṣadarśasānāya | śarum |
sa | nṛtamo | nahuṣo'smatsujātaḥ | puro'bhinadarhandasyuhatye |
so | abhriyo | na | yavasodanyankṣayāya | gātuṁ | vidanno | asme |
upa | yatsīdadinduṁ | śarīraiḥ | śyeno'yopāṣṭirhanti | dasyūn |
sa | vrādhataḥ | śavasānebhirasya | kutsāya | śuṣṇaṁ | kṛpaṇe | parādāt |
ayaṁ | kavimanayacchasyamānamatkaṁ | yo | asya | sanitota | nṛṇām |
ayaṁ | daśasyannaryebhirasya | dasmo | devebhirvaruṇo | na | māyī |
ayaṁ | kanīna | ṛtupāvedyamimītāraruṁ | yaścatuṣpāt |
asya | stomebhirauśija | ṛjiśvā | vrajaṁ | darayadvṛṣabheṇa | piproḥ |
sutvā | yadyajato | dīdayadgīḥ | pureyāno | abhi | varpasā | bhūt |
evā | maho | asura | vakṣathāya | vamrakaḥ | paḍbhirupa | sarpadindram |
seyānaḥ | karati | svastimasmeṣamūrjaṁ | sukṣitiṁ | viśvamābhāḥ |
indra | dṛhya | maghavantvāvadidbhujeha | stutaḥ | sutapā | bodhi | no | vṛdhe |
devebhirnaḥ | savitā | prāvatu | śrutamā | sarvatātimaditiṁ | vṛṇīmahe |
bharāya | su | bharata | bhāgamṛtviyaṁ | pra | vāyave | śucipe | krandadiṣṭaye |
gaurasya | yaḥ | payasaḥ | pītimānaśā | sarvatātimaditiṁ | vṛṇīmahe |
ā | no | devaḥ | savitā | sāviṣadvaya | ṛjūyate | yajamānāya | sunvate |
yathā | devānpratibhūṣema | pākavadā | sarvatātimaditiṁ | vṛṇīmahe |
indro | asme | sumanāstu | viśvahā | rājā | somaḥ | suvitasyādhyetu | naḥ |
yathāyathā | mitradhitāni | saṁdadhurā | sarvatātimaditiṁ | vṛṇīmahe |
indrokthena | śavasā | parurdadhe | bṛhaspate | pratarītāsyāyuṣaḥ |
yajño | manuḥ | pramatirnaḥ | pitā | hi | kamā | sarvatātimaditiṁ | vṛṇīmahe |
indrasya | nu | sukṛtaṁ | daivyaṁ | saho'gnirgṛhe | jaritā | medhiraḥ | kaviḥ |
yajñaśca | bhūdvidathe | cārurantamā | sarvatātimaditiṁ | vṛṇīmahe |
na | vo | guhā | cakṛma | bhūri | duṣkṛtaṁ | nāviṣṭyaṁ | vasavo | devaheḻanam |
mākirno | devānṛtasya | varpasā | sarvatātimaditiṁ | vṛṇīmahe |
apāmīvāṁ | savitā | sāviṣannyagvarīyedapa | sedhantvadrayaḥ |
grāvā | yatra | madhuṣuducyate | bṛhadā | sarvatātimaditiṁ | vṛṇīmahe |
ūrdhvo | grāvā | vasavo'stu | sotari | viśvā | dveṣāṁsi | sanutaryuyota |
sa | no | devaḥ | savitā | pāyurīḍyā | sarvatātimaditiṁ | vṛṇīmahe |
ūrjaṁ | gāvo | yavase | pīvo | attana | ṛtasya | yāḥ | sadane | kośe | aṅgdhve |
tanūreva | tanvo | astu | bheṣajamā | sarvatātimaditiṁ | vṛṇīmahe |
kratuprāvā | jaritā | śaśvatāmavendra | idbhadrā | pramatiḥ | sutāvatām |
pūrṇamūdhardivyaṁ | yasya | siktayā | sarvatātimaditiṁ | vṛṇīmahe |
citraste | bhānuḥ | kratuprābhiṣṭiḥ | santi | spṛdho | jaraṇiprādhṛṣṭāḥ |
rajiṣṭhayā | rajyā | paśvā | gostūtūrṣati | paryagraṁ | duvasyuḥ |
udbudhyadhvaṁ | samanasaḥ | sakhāyaḥ | samagnimindhvaṁ | bahavaḥ | sanīḻāḥ |
dadhikrāmagnimuṣasaṁ | ca | devīmindrāvato'vase | ni | hvaye | vaḥ |
mandrā | kṛṇudhvaṁ | dhiyā | tanudhvaṁ | nāvamaritraparaṇīṁ | kṛṇudhvam |
iṣkṛṇudhvamāyudhāraṁ | kṛṇudhvaṁ | prāñcaṁ | yajñaṁ | pra | ṇayatā | sakhāyaḥ |
yunakta | sīrā | vi | yugā | tanudhvaṁ | kṛte | yonau | vapateha | bījam |
girā | ca | śruṣṭiḥ | sabharāsanno | nedīyetsṛṇyaḥ | pakvameyāt |
sīrā | yuñjanti | kavayo | yugā | vi | tanvate | pṛthak |
dhīrā | deveṣu | sumnayā |
nirāhāvānkṛṇotana | saṁ | varatrā | dadhātana |
siñcāmahāvatamudriṇaṁ | vayaṁ | suṣekamanupakṣitam |
iṣkṛtāhāvamavataṁ | suvaratraṁ | suṣecanam |
udriṇaṁ | siñce | akṣitam |
prīṇītāśvānhitaṁ | jayātha | svastivāhaṁ | rathamitkṛṇudhvam |
droṇāhāvamavatamaśmacakramaṁsatrakośaṁ | siñcatā | nṛpāṇam |
vrajaṁ | kṛṇudhvaṁ | sa | hi | vo | nṛpāṇo | varma | sīvyadhvaṁ | bahulā | pṛthūni |
puraḥ | kṛṇudhvamāyasīradhṛṣṭā | mā | vaḥ | susroccamaso | dṛṁhatā | tam |
ā | vo | dhiyaṁ | yajñiyāṁ | vartotaye | devā | devīṁ | yajatāṁ | yajñiyāmiha |
sā | no | duhīyadyavaseva | gatvī | sahasradhārā | payasā | mahī | gauḥ |
ā | tū | ṣiñca | harimīṁ | drorupasthe | vāśībhistakṣatāśmanmayībhiḥ |
pari | ṣvajadhvaṁ | daśa | kakṣyābhirubhe | dhurau | prati | vahniṁ | yunakta |
ubhe | dhurau | vahnirāpibdamāno'ntaryoneva | carati | dvijāniḥ |
vanaspatiṁ | vanāsthāpayadhvaṁ | ni | ṣū | dadhidhvamakhanantotsam |
kapṛnnaraḥ | kapṛthamuddadhātana | codayata | khudata | vājasātaye |
niṣṭigryaḥ | putramā | cyāvayotayendraṁ | sabādheha | somapītaye |
pra | te | rathaṁ | mithūkṛtamindro'vatu | dhṛṣṇuyā |
asminnājau | puruhūta | śravāyye | dhanabhakṣeṣu | no'va |
utsma | vāto | vahati | vāso | asyādhirathaṁ | yadajayatsahasram |
rathīrabhūnmudgalānī | gaviṣṭau | bhare | kṛtaṁ | vyacedindrasenā |
antaryaccha | jighāṁsato | vajramindrābhidāsataḥ |
dāsasya | vā | maghavannāryasya | vā | sanutaryavayā | vadham |
udno | hradamapibajjarhṛṣāṇaḥ | kūṭaṁ | sma | tṛṁhadabhimātimeti |
pra | muṣkabhāraḥ | śravecchamāno'jiraṁ | bāhū | abharatsiṣāsan |
nyakrandayannupayantainamamehayanvṛṣabhaṁ | madhyājeḥ |
tena | sūbharvaṁ | śatavatsahasraṁ | gavāṁ | mudgalaḥ | pradhane | jigāya |
kakardave | vṛṣabho | yuktāsīdavāvacītsārathirasya | keśī |
dudheryuktasya | dravataḥ | sahānasa | ṛcchanti | ṣmā | niṣpado | mudgalānīm |
uta | pradhimudahannasya | vidvānupāyunagvaṁsagamatra | śikṣan |
indrodāvatpatimaghnyānāmaraṁhata | padyābhiḥ | kakudmān |
śunamaṣṭrāvyacaratkapardī | varatrāyāṁ | dārvānahyamānaḥ |
nṛmṇāni | kṛṇvanbahave | janāya | gāḥ | paspaśānastaviṣīradhatta |
imaṁ | taṁ | paśya | vṛṣabhasya | yuñjaṁ | kāṣṭhāyā | madhye | drughaṇaṁ | śayānam |
yena | jigāya | śatavatsahasraṁ | gavāṁ | mudgalaḥ | pṛtanājyeṣu |
āre | aghā | ko | nvitthā | dadarśa | yaṁ | yuñjanti | tamvā | sthāpayanti |
nāsmai | tṛṇaṁ | nodakamā | bharantyuttaro | dhuro | vahati | pradediśat |
parivṛkteva | patividyamānaṭ | pīpyānā | kūcakreṇeva | siñcan |
eṣaiṣyā | cidrathyā | jayema | sumaṅgalaṁ | sinavadastu | sātam |
tvaṁ | viśvasya | jagataścakṣurindrāsi | cakṣuṣaḥ |
vṛṣā | yadājiṁ | vṛṣaṇā | siṣāsasi | codayanvadhriṇā | yujā |
āśuḥ | śiśāno | vṛṣabho | na | bhīmo | ghanāghanaḥ | kṣobhaṇaścarṣaṇīnām |
saṁkrandano'nimiṣaikavīraḥ | śataṁ | senājayatsākamindraḥ |
saṁkrandanenānimiṣeṇa | jiṣṇunā | yutkāreṇa | duścyavanena | dhṛṣṇunā |
tadindreṇa | jayata | tatsahadhvaṁ | yudho | nareṣuhastena | vṛṣṇā |
seṣuhastaiḥ | sa | niṣaṅgibhirvaśī | saṁsraṣṭā | sa | yudhendro | gaṇena |
saṁsṛṣṭajitsomapā | bāhuśardhyugradhanvā | pratihitābhirastā |
bṛhaspate | pari | dīyā | rathena | rakṣohāmitrām̐ | apabādhamānaḥ |
prabhañjantsenāḥ | pramṛṇo | yudhā | jayannasmākamedhyavitā | rathānām |
balavijñāyaḥ | sthaviraḥ | pravīraḥ | sahasvānvājī | sahamānograḥ |
abhivīro | abhisatvā | sahojā | jaitramindra | rathamā | tiṣṭha | govit |
gotrabhidaṁ | govidaṁ | vajrabāhuṁ | jayantamajma | pramṛṇantamojasā |
imaṁ | sajātānu | vīrayadhvamindraṁ | sakhāyo | anu | saṁ | rabhadhvam |
abhi | gotrāṇi | sahasā | gāhamāno'dayo | vīraḥ | śatamanyurindraḥ |
duścyavanaḥ | pṛtanāṣāḻayudhyo'smākaṁ | senāvatu | pra | yutsu |
indrāsāṁ | netā | bṛhaspatirdakṣiṇā | yajñaḥ | puraitu | somaḥ |
devasenānāmabhibhañjatīnāṁ | jayantīnāṁ | maruto | yantvagram |
indrasya | vṛṣṇo | varuṇasya | rājñādityānāṁ | marutāṁ | śardhogram |
mahāmanasāṁ | bhuvanacyavānāṁ | ghoṣo | devānāṁ | jayatāmudasthāt |
uddharṣaya | maghavannāyudhānyutsatvanāṁ | māmakānāṁ | manāṁsi |
udvṛtrahanvājināṁ | vājinānyudrathānāṁ | jayatāṁ | yantu | ghoṣāḥ |
asmākamindraḥ | samṛteṣu | dhvajeṣvasmākaṁ | yeṣavastā | jayantu |
asmākaṁ | vīrottare | bhavantvasmām̐ | u | devāvatā | haveṣu |
amīṣāṁ | cittaṁ | pratilobhayantī | gṛhāṇāṅgānyapve | parehi |
abhi | prehi | nirdaha | hṛtsu | śokairandhenāmitrāstamasā | sacantām |
pretā | jayatā | narendro | vaḥ | śarma | yacchatu |
ugrā | vaḥ | santu | bāhavo'nādhṛṣyā | yathāsatha |
asāvi | somaḥ | puruhūta | tubhyaṁ | haribhyāṁ | yajñamupa | yāhi | tūyam |
tubhyaṁ | giro | vipravīreyānā | dadhanvirendra | pibā | sutasya |
apsu | dhūtasya | harivaḥ | pibeha | nṛbhiḥ | sutasya | jaṭharaṁ | pṛṇasva |
mimikṣuryamadrayendra | tubhyaṁ | tebhirvardhasva | madamukthavāhaḥ |
progrāṁ | pītiṁ | vṛṣṇeyarmi | satyāṁ | prayai | sutasya | haryaśva | tubhyam |
indra | dhenābhiriha | mādayasva | dhībhirviśvābhiḥ | śacyā | gṛṇānaḥ |
ūtī | śacīvastava | vīryeṇa | vayo | dadhānośija | ṛtajñāḥ |
prajāvadindra | manuṣo | duroṇe | tasthurgṛṇantaḥ | sadhamādyāsaḥ |
praṇītibhiṣṭe | haryaśva | suṣṭoḥ | suṣumnasya | pururuco | janāsaḥ |
maṁhiṣṭhāmūtiṁ | vitire | dadhānāḥ | stotārendra | tava | sūnṛtābhiḥ |
upa | brahmāṇi | harivo | haribhyāṁ | somasya | yāhi | pītaye | sutasya |
indra | tvā | yajñaḥ | kṣamamāṇamānaḍdāśvām̐ | asyadhvarasya | praketaḥ |
sahasravājamabhimātiṣāhaṁ | suteraṇaṁ | maghavānaṁ | suvṛktim |
upa | bhūṣanti | giro | apratītamindraṁ | namasyā | jarituḥ | pananta |
saptāpo | devīḥ | suraṇāmṛktā | yābhiḥ | sindhumatarendra | pūrbhit |
navatiṁ | srotyā | nava | ca | sravantīrdevebhyo | gātuṁ | manuṣe | ca | vindaḥ |
apo | mahīrabhiśasteramuñco'jāgarāsvadhi | devaikaḥ |
indra | yāstvaṁ | vṛtratūrye | cakartha | tābhirviśvāyustanvaṁ | pupuṣyāḥ |
vīreṇyaḥ | kraturindraḥ | suśastirutāpi | dhenā | puruhūtamīṭṭe |
ārdayadvṛtramakṛṇodu | lokaṁ | sasāhe | śakraḥ | pṛtanābhiṣṭiḥ |
śunaṁ | huvema | maghavānamindramasminbhare | nṛtamaṁ | vājasātau |
śṛṇvantamugramūtaye | samatsu | ghnantaṁ | vṛtrāṇi | saṁjitaṁ | dhanānām |
kadā | vaso | stotraṁ | haryatāva | śmaśā | rudhadvāḥ |
dīrghaṁ | sutaṁ | vātāpyāya |
harī | yasya | suyujā | vivratā | verarvantānu | śepā |
ubhā | rajī | na | keśinā | patirdan |
apa | yorindraḥ | pāpajā | marto | na | śaśramāṇo | bibhīvān |
śubhe | yadyuyuje | taviṣīvān |
sacāyorindraścarkṛṣām̐ | upānasaḥ | saparyan |
nadayorvivratayoḥ | śūrendraḥ |
adhi | yastasthau | keśavantā | vyacasvantā | na | puṣṭyai |
vanoti | śiprābhyāṁ | śipriṇīvān |
prāstaudṛṣvaujā | ṛṣvebhistatakṣa | śūraḥ | śavasā |
ṛbhurna | kratubhirmātariśvā |
vajraṁ | yaścakre | suhanāya | dasyave | hirīmaśo | hirīmān |
arutahanuradbhutaṁ | na | rajaḥ |
ava | no | vṛjinā | śiśīhyṛcā | vanemānṛcaḥ |
nābrahmā | yajña | ṛdhagjoṣati | tve |
ūrdhvā | yatte | tretinī | bhūdyajñasya | dhūrṣu | sadman |
sajūrnāvaṁ | svayaśasaṁ | sacāyoḥ |
śriye | te | pṛśnirupasecanī | bhūcchriye | darvirarepāḥ |
yayā | sve | pātre | siñcasot |
śataṁ | vā | yadasurya | prati | tvā | sumitretthāstauddurmitra | itthāstaut |
āvo | yaddasyuhatye | kutsaputraṁ | prāvo | yaddasyuhatye | kutsavatsam |
ubho | nūnaṁ | tadidarthayethe | vi | tanvāthe | dhiyo | vastrāpaseva |
sadhrīcīnā | yātave | premajīgaḥ | sudineva | pṛkṣā | taṁsayethe |
uṣṭāreva | pharvareṣu | śrayethe | prāyogeva | śvātryā | śāsurethaḥ |
dūteva | hi | ṣṭho | yaśasā | janeṣu | māpa | sthātaṁ | mahiṣevāvapānāt |
sākaṁyujā | śakunasyeva | pakṣā | paśveva | citrā | yajurā | gamiṣṭam |
agniriva | devayordīdivāṁsā | parijmāneva | yajathaḥ | purutrā |
āpī | vo | asme | pitareva | putrogreva | rucā | nṛpatīva | turyai |
iryeva | puṣṭyai | kiraṇeva | bhujyai | śruṣṭīvāneva | havamā | gamiṣṭam |
vaṁsageva | pūṣaryā | śimbātā | mitreva | ṛtā | śatarā | śātapantā |
vājevoccā | vayasā | gharmyeṣṭhā | meṣeveṣā | saparyā | purīṣā |
sṛṇyeva | jarbharī | turpharītū | naitośeva | turpharī | parpharīkā |
udanyajeva | jemanā | maderū | tā | me | jarāyvajaraṁ | marāyu |
pajreva | carcaraṁ | jāraṁ | marāyu | kṣadmevārtheṣu | tartarīthogrā |
ṛbhū | nāpatkharamajrā | kharajrurvāyurna | parpharatkṣayadrayīṇām |
gharmeva | madhu | jaṭhare | sanerū | bhagevitā | turpharī | phārivāram |
patareva | cacarā | candranirṇiṅmanaṛṅgā | mananyā | na | jagmī |
bṛhanteva | gambhareṣu | pratiṣṭhāṁ | pādeva | gādhaṁ | tarate | vidāthaḥ |
karṇeva | śāsuranu | hi | smarāthoṁ'śeva | no | bhajataṁ | citramapnaḥ |
āraṅgareva | madhverayethe | sāragheva | gavi | nīcīnabāre |
kīnāreva | svedamāsiṣvidānā | kṣāmevorjā | sūyavasātsacethe |
ṛdhyāma | stomaṁ | sanuyāma | vājamā | no | mantraṁ | sarathehopa | yātam |
yaśo | na | pakvaṁ | madhu | goṣvantarā | bhūtāṁśo | aśvinoḥ | kāmamaprāḥ |
āvirabhūnmahi | māghonameṣāṁ | viśvaṁ | jīvaṁ | tamaso | niramoci |
mahi | jyotiḥ | pitṛbhirdattamāgāduruḥ | panthā | dakṣiṇāyādarśi |
uccā | divi | dakṣiṇāvanto | asthurye | aśvadāḥ | saha | te | sūryeṇa |
hiraṇyadāmṛtatvaṁ | bhajante | vāsodāḥ | soma | pra | tirantāyuḥ |
daivī | pūrtirdakṣiṇā | devayajyā | na | kavāribhyo | nahi | te | pṛṇanti |
athā | naraḥ | prayatadakṣiṇāso'vadyabhiyā | bahavaḥ | pṛṇanti |
śatadhāraṁ | vāyumarkaṁ | svarvidaṁ | nṛcakṣasaste | abhi | cakṣate | haviḥ |
ye | pṛṇanti | pra | ca | yacchanti | saṁgame | te | dakṣiṇāṁ | duhate | saptamātaram |
dakṣiṇāvānprathamo | hūtaiti | dakṣiṇāvāngrāmaṇīragrameti |
tameva | manye | nṛpatiṁ | janānāṁ | yaḥ | prathamo | dakṣiṇāmāvivāya |
tameva | ṛṣiṁ | tamu | brahmāṇamāhuryajñanyaṁ | sāmagāmukthaśāsam |
sa | śukrasya | tanvo | veda | tisro | yaḥ | prathamo | dakṣiṇayā | rarādha |
dakṣiṇāśvaṁ | dakṣiṇā | gāṁ | dadāti | dakṣiṇā | candramuta | yaddhiraṇyam |
dakṣiṇānnaṁ | vanute | yo | nātmā | dakṣiṇāṁ | varma | kṛṇute | vijānan |
na | bhojā | mamrurna | nyarthamīyurna | riṣyanti | na | vyathante | ha | bhojāḥ |
idaṁ | yadviśvaṁ | bhuvanaṁ | svaścaitatsarvaṁ | dakṣiṇaibhyo | dadāti |
bhojā | jigyuḥ | surabhiṁ | yonimagre | bhojā | jigyurvadhvaṁ | yā | suvāsāḥ |
bhojā | jigyurantaḥpeyaṁ | surāyā | bhojā | jigyurye | ahūtāḥ | prayanti |
bhojāyāśvaṁ | saṁ | mṛjantyāśuṁ | bhojāyāste | kanyā | śumbhamānā |
bhojasyedaṁ | puṣkariṇīva | veśma | pariṣkṛtaṁ | devamāneva | citram |
bhojamaśvāḥ | suṣṭhuvāho | vahanti | suvṛdratho | vartate | dakṣiṇāyāḥ |
bhojaṁ | devāso'vatā | bhareṣu | bhojaḥ | śatrūntsamanīkeṣu | jetā |
kimicchantī | saramā | predamānaḍdūre | hyadhvā | jaguriḥ | parācaiḥ |
kāsmehitiḥ | kā | paritakmyāsītkathaṁ | rasāyātaraḥ | payāṁsi |
indrasya | dūtīriṣitā | carāmi | mahecchantī | paṇayo | nidhīnvaḥ |
atiṣkado | bhiyasā | tannāvattathā | rasāyātaraṁ | payāṁsi |
kīdṛṅṅindraḥ | sarame | kā | dṛśīkā | yasyedaṁ | dūtīrasaraḥ | parākāt |
ā | ca | gacchānmitramenā | dadhāmāthā | gavāṁ | gopatirno | bhavāti |
nāhaṁ | taṁ | veda | dabhyaṁ | dabhatsa | yasyedaṁ | dūtīrasaraṁ | parākāt |
na | taṁ | gūhanti | sravato | gabhīrā | hatendreṇa | paṇayaḥ | śayadhve |
imā | gāvaḥ | sarame | yāicchaḥ | pari | divo | antāntsubhage | patantī |
kastainā | ava | sṛjādayudhvyutāsmākamāyudhā | santi | tigmā |
asenyā | vaḥ | paṇayo | vacāṁsyaniṣavyāstanvaḥ | santu | pāpīḥ |
adhṛṣṭo | vaitavā | astu | panthā | bṛhaspatirvobhayā | na | mṛḻāt |
ayaṁ | nidhiḥ | sarame | adribudhno | gobhiraśvebhirvasubhirnyṛṣṭaḥ |
rakṣanti | taṁ | paṇayo | ye | sugopā | reku | padamalakamā | jagantha |
eha | gamannṛṣayaḥ | somaśitāyāsyo | aṅgiraso | navagvāḥ |
taitamūrvaṁ | vi | bhajanta | gonāmathaitadvacaḥ | paṇayo | vamannit |
evā | ca | tvaṁ | saramājagantha | prabādhitā | sahasā | daivyena |
svasāraṁ | tvā | kṛṇavai | mā | punargāpa | te | gavāṁ | subhage | bhajāma |
nāhaṁ | veda | bhrātṛtvaṁ | no | svasṛtvamindro | viduraṅgirasaśca | ghorāḥ |
gokāmā | me | acchadayanyadāyamapāteta | paṇayo | varīyaḥ |
dūramita | paṇayo | varīyodgāvo | yantu | minatīrṛtena |
bṛhaspatiryāvindannigūḻhāḥ | somo | grāvāṇa | ṛṣayaśca | viprāḥ |
te'vadanprathamā | brahmakilbiṣe'kūpāraḥ | salilo | mātariśvā |
vīḻuharāstapogro | mayobhūrāpo | devīḥ | prathamajā | ṛtena |
somo | rājā | prathamo | brahmajāyāṁ | punaḥ | prāyacchadahṛṇīyamānaḥ |
anvartitā | varuṇo | mitrāsīdagnirhotā | hastagṛhyā | nināya |
hastenaiva | grāhyādhirasyā | brahmajāyeyamiti | cedavocan |
na | dūtāya | prahye | tasthaiṣā | tathā | rāṣṭraṁ | gupitaṁ | kṣatriyasya |
devaitasyāmavadanta | pūrve | saptaṛṣayastapase | ye | niṣeduḥ |
bhīmā | jāyā | brāhmaṇasyopanītā | durdhāṁ | dadhāti | parame | vyoman |
brahmacārī | carati | veviṣadviṣaḥ | sa | devānāṁ | bhavatyekamaṅgam |
tena | jāyāmanvavindadbṛhaspatiḥ | somena | nītāṁ | juhvaṁ | na | devāḥ |
punarvai | devādaduḥ | punarmanuṣyota |
rājānaḥ | satyaṁ | kṛṇvānā | brahmajāyāṁ | punardaduḥ |
punardāya | brahmajāyāṁ | kṛtvī | devairnikilbiṣam |
ūrjaṁ | pṛthivyā | bhaktvāyorugāyamupāsate |
samiddho | adya | manuṣo | duroṇe | devo | devānyajasi | jātavedaḥ |
ā | ca | vaha | mitramahaścikitvāntvaṁ | dūtaḥ | kavirasi | pracetāḥ |
tanūnapātpatha | ṛtasya | yānānmadhvā | samañjantsvadayā | sujihva |
manmāni | dhībhiruta | yajñamṛndhandevatrā | ca | kṛṇuhyadhvaraṁ | naḥ |
ājuhvāneḍyo | vandyaścā | yāhyagne | vasubhiḥ | sajoṣāḥ |
tvaṁ | devānāmasi | yahva | hotā | sainānyakṣīṣito | yajīyān |
prācīnaṁ | barhiḥ | pradiśā | pṛthivyā | vastorasyā | vṛjyate | agre | ahnām |
vyu | prathate | vitaraṁ | varīyo | devebhyo | aditaye | syonam |
vyacasvatīrurviyā | vi | śrayantāṁ | patibhyo | na | janayaḥ | śumbhamānāḥ |
devīrdvāro | bṛhatīrviśvaminvā | devebhyo | bhavata | suprāyaṇāḥ |
ā | suṣvayantī | yajate | upāke | uṣāsānaktā | sadatāṁ | ni | yonau |
divye | yoṣaṇe | bṛhatī | surukme | adhi | śriyaṁ | śukrapiśaṁ | dadhāne |
daivyā | hotārā | prathamā | suvācā | mimānā | yajñaṁ | manuṣo | yajadhyai |
pracodayantā | vidatheṣu | kārū | prācīnaṁ | jyotiḥ | pradiśā | diśantā |
ā | no | yajñaṁ | bhāratī | tūyametviḻā | manuṣvadiha | cetayantī |
tisro | devīrbarhiredaṁ | syonaṁ | sarasvatī | svapasaḥ | sadantu |
yeme | dyāvāpṛthivī | janitrī | rūpairapiṁśadbhuvanāni | viśvā |
tamadya | hotariṣito | yajīyāndevaṁ | tvaṣṭāramiha | yakṣi | vidvān |
upāvasṛja | tmanyā | samañjandevānāṁ | pātha | ṛtuthā | havīṁṣi |
vanaspatiḥ | śamitā | devo | agniḥ | svadantu | havyaṁ | madhunā | ghṛtena |
sadyo | jāto | vyamimīta | yajñamagnirdevānāmabhavatpurogāḥ |
asya | hotuḥ | pradiśyṛtasya | vāci | svāhākṛtaṁ | haviradantu | devāḥ |
manīṣiṇaḥ | pra | bharadhvaṁ | manīṣāṁ | yathāyathā | matayaḥ | santi | nṛṇām |
indraṁ | satyairerayāmā | kṛtebhiḥ | sa | hi | vīro | girvaṇasyurvidānaḥ |
ṛtasya | hi | sadaso | dhītiradyautsaṁ | gārṣṭeyo | vṛṣabho | gobhirānaṭ |
udatiṣṭhattaviṣeṇā | raveṇa | mahānti | citsaṁ | vivyācā | rajāṁsi |
indraḥ | kila | śrutyāsya | veda | sa | hi | jiṣṇuḥ | pathikṛtsūryāya |
ānmenāṁ | kṛṇvannacyuto | bhuvadgoḥ | patirdivaḥ | sanajāpratītaḥ |
indro | mahnā | mahato | arṇavasya | vratāminādaṅgirobhirgṛṇānaḥ |
purūṇi | cinni | tatānā | rajāṁsi | dādhāra | yo | dharuṇaṁ | satyatātā |
indro | divaḥ | pratimānaṁ | pṛthivyā | viśvā | veda | savanā | hanti | śuṣṇam |
mahīṁ | ciddyāmātanotsūryeṇa | cāskambha | citkambhanena | skabhīyān |
vajreṇa | hi | vṛtrahā | vṛtramastaradevasya | śūśuvānasya | māyāḥ |
vi | dhṛṣṇo | atra | dhṛṣatā | jaghanthāthābhavo | maghavanbāhvojāḥ |
sacanta | yaduṣasaḥ | sūryeṇa | citrāmasya | ketavo | rāmavindan |
ā | yannakṣatraṁ | dadṛśe | divo | na | punaryato | nakiraddhā | nu | veda |
dūraṁ | kila | prathamā | jagmurāsāmindrasya | yāḥ | prasave | sasrurāpaḥ |
kva | svidagraṁ | kva | budhnāsāmāpo | madhyaṁ | kva | vo | nūnamantaḥ |
sṛjaḥ | sindhūm̐rahinā | jagrasānām̐ | ādidetāḥ | pra | vivijre | javena |
mumukṣamāṇota | yā | mumucre'dhedetā | na | ramante | nitiktāḥ |
sadhrīcīḥ | sindhumuśatīrivāyantsanājjārāritaḥ | pūrbhidāsām |
astamā | te | pārthivā | vasūnyasme | jagmuḥ | sūnṛtendra | pūrvīḥ |
indra | piba | pratikāmaṁ | sutasya | prātaḥsāvastava | hi | pūrvapītiḥ |
harṣasva | hantave | śūra | śatrūnukthebhiṣṭe | vīryā | pra | bravāma |
yaste | ratho | manaso | javīyānendra | tena | somapeyāya | yāhi |
tūyamā | te | harayaḥ | pra | dravantu | yebhiryāsi | vṛṣabhirmandamānaḥ |
haritvatā | varcasā | sūryasya | śreṣṭhai | rūpaistanvaṁ | sparśayasva |
asmābhirindra | sakhibhirhuvānaḥ | sadhrīcīno | mādayasvā | niṣadya |
yasya | tyatte | mahimānaṁ | madeṣvime | mahī | rodasī | nāviviktām |
tadokā | haribhirindra | yuktaiḥ | priyebhiryāhi | priyamannamaccha |
yasya | śaśvatpapivām̐ | indra | śatrūnanānukṛtyā | raṇyā | cakartha |
sa | te | puraṁdhiṁ | taviṣīmiyarti | sa | te | madāya | sutendra | somaḥ |
idaṁ | te | pātraṁ | sanavittamindra | pibā | somamenā | śatakrato |
pūrṇāhāvo | madirasya | madhvo | yaṁ | viśvedabhiharyanti | devāḥ |
vi | hi | tvāmindra | purudhā | janāso | hitaprayaso | vṛṣabha | hvayante |
asmākaṁ | te | madhumattamānīmā | bhuvantsavanā | teṣu | harya |
pra | tendra | pūrvyāṇi | pra | nūnaṁ | vīryā | vocaṁ | prathamā | kṛtāni |
satīnamanyuraśrathāyo | adriṁ | suvedanāmakṛṇorbrahmaṇe | gām |
ni | ṣu | sīda | gaṇapate | gaṇeṣu | tvāmāhurvipratamaṁ | kavīnām |
na | ṛte | tvatkriyate | kiṁ | canāre | mahāmarkaṁ | maghavañcitramarca |
abhikhyā | no | maghavannādhamānāntsakhe | bodhi | vasupate | sakhīnām |
raṇaṁ | kṛdhi | raṇakṛtsatyaśuṣmābhakte | cidā | bhajā | rāye | asmān |
tamasya | dyāvāpṛthivī | sacetasā | viśvebhirdevairanu | śuṣmamāvatām |
yadaitkṛṇvāno | mahimānamindriyaṁ | pītvī | somasya | kratumām̐ | avardhata |
tamasya | viṣṇurmahimānamojasāṁśuṁ | dadhanvānmadhuno | vi | rapśate |
devebhirindro | maghavā | sayāvabhirvṛtraṁ | jaghanvām̐ | abhavadvareṇyaḥ |
vṛtreṇa | yadahinā | bibhradāyudhā | samasthithā | yudhaye | śaṁsamāvide |
viśve | te | atra | marutaḥ | saha | tmanāvardhannugra | mahimānamindriyam |
jajñānaiva | vyabādhata | spṛdhaḥ | prāpaśyadvīro | abhi | pauṁsyaṁ | raṇam |
avṛścadadrimava | sasyadaḥ | sṛjadastabhnānnākaṁ | svapasyayā | pṛthum |
ādindraḥ | satrā | taviṣīrapatyata | varīyo | dyāvāpṛthivī | abādhata |
avābharaddhṛṣito | vajramāyasaṁ | śevaṁ | mitrāya | varuṇāya | dāśuṣe |
indrasyātra | taviṣībhyo | virapśina | ṛghāyato | araṁhayanta | manyave |
vṛtraṁ | yadugro | vyavṛścadojasāpo | bibhrataṁ | tamasā | parīvṛtam |
yā | vīryāṇi | prathamāni | kartvā | mahitvebhiryatamānau | samīyatuḥ |
dhvāntaṁ | tamo'va | dadhvase | hatendro | mahnā | pūrvahūtāvapatyata |
viśve | devāso | adha | vṛṣṇyāni | te'vardhayantsomavatyā | vacasyayā |
raddhaṁ | vṛtramahimindrasya | hanmanāgnirna | jambhaistṛṣvannamāvayat |
bhūri | dakṣebhirvacanebhirṛkvabhiḥ | sakhyebhiḥ | sakhyāni | pra | vocata |
indro | dhuniṁ | ca | cumuriṁ | ca | dambhayañchraddhāmanasyā | śṛṇute | dabhītaye |
tvaṁ | purūṇyā | bharā | svaśvyā | yebhirmaṁsai | nivacanāni | śaṁsan |
sugebhirviśvā | duritā | tarema | vido | ṣu | ṇorviyā | gādhamadya |
gharmā | samantā | trivṛtaṁ | vyāpatustayorjuṣṭiṁ | mātariśvā | jagāma |
divaspayo | didhiṣāṇāveṣanvidurdevāḥ | sahasāmānamarkam |
tisro | deṣṭrāya | nirṛtīrupāsate | dīrghaśruto | vi | hi | jānanti | vahnayaḥ |
tāsāṁ | ni | cikyuḥ | kavayo | nidānaṁ | pareṣu | yā | guhyeṣu | vrateṣu |
catuṣkapardā | yuvatiḥ | supeśā | ghṛtapratīkā | vayunāni | vaste |
tasyāṁ | suparṇā | vṛṣaṇā | ni | ṣedaturyatra | devā | dadhire | bhāgadheyam |
ekaḥ | suparṇaḥ | sa | samudramā | viveśa | sedaṁ | viśvaṁ | bhuvanaṁ | vi | caṣṭe |
taṁ | pākena | manasāpaśyamantitastaṁ | mātā | reḻhi | so | reḻhi | mātaram |
suparṇaṁ | viprāḥ | kavayo | vacobhirekaṁ | santaṁ | bahudhā | kalpayanti |
chandāṁsi | ca | dadhato | adhvareṣu | grahāntsomasya | mimate | dvādaśa |
ṣaṭtriṁśām̐śca | caturaḥ | kalpayantaśchandāṁsi | ca | dadhatādvādaśam |
yajñaṁ | vimāya | kavayo | manīṣa | ṛksāmābhyāṁ | pra | rathaṁ | vartayanti |
caturdaśānye | mahimāno | asya | taṁ | dhīrā | vācā | pra | ṇayanti | sapta |
āpnānaṁ | tīrthaṁ | keha | pra | vocadyena | pathā | prapibante | sutasya |
sahasradhā | pañcadaśānyukthā | yāvaddyāvāpṛthivī | tāvadittat |
sahasradhā | mahimānaḥ | sahasraṁ | yāvadbrahma | viṣṭhitaṁ | tāvatī | vāk |
kaśchandasāṁ | yogamā | veda | dhīraḥ | ko | dhiṣṇyāṁ | prati | vācaṁ | papāda |
kamṛtvijāmaṣṭamaṁ | śūramāhurharīndrasya | ni | cikāya | kaḥ | svit |
bhūmyāntaṁ | paryeke | caranti | rathasya | dhūrṣu | yuktāso | asthuḥ |
śramasya | dāyaṁ | vi | bhajantyebhyo | yadā | yamo | bhavati | harmye | hitaḥ |
citrecchiśostaruṇasya | vakṣatho | na | yo | mātarāvapyeti | dhātave |
anūdhā | yadi | jījanadadhā | ca | nu | vavakṣa | sadyo | mahi | dūtyaṁ | caran |
agnirha | nāma | dhāyi | dannapastamaḥ | saṁ | yo | vanā | yuvate | bhasmanā | datā |
abhipramurā | juhvā | svadhvareno | na | prothamāno | yavase | vṛṣā |
taṁ | vo | viṁ | na | druṣadaṁ | devamandhasenduṁ | prothantaṁ | pravapantamarṇavam |
āsā | vahniṁ | na | śociṣā | virapśinaṁ | mahivrataṁ | na | sarajantamadhvanaḥ |
vi | yasya | te | jrayasānasyājara | dhakṣorna | vātāḥ | pari | santyacyutāḥ |
ā | raṇvāso | yuyudhayo | na | satvanaṁ | tritaṁ | naśanta | pra | śiṣanteṣṭaye |
sedagniḥ | kaṇvatamaḥ | kaṇvasakhāryaḥ | parasyāntarasya | taruṣaḥ |
agniḥ | pātu | gṛṇato | agniḥ | sūrīnagnirdadātu | teṣāmavo | naḥ |
vājintamāya | sahyase | supitrya | tṛṣu | cyavāno | anu | jātavedase |
anudre | cidyo | dhṛṣatā | varaṁ | sate | mahintamāya | dhanvanedaviṣyate |
evāgnirmartaiḥ | saha | sūribhirvasuḥ | ṣṭave | sahasaḥ | sūnaro | nṛbhiḥ |
mitrāso | na | ye | sudhitā | ṛtāyavo | dyāvo | na | dyumnairabhi | santi | mānuṣān |
ūrjo | napātsahasāvanniti | tvopastutasya | vandate | vṛṣā | vāk |
tvāṁ | stoṣāma | tvayā | suvīrā | drāghīyāyuḥ | prataraṁ | dadhānāḥ |
iti | tvāgne | vṛṣṭihavyasya | putropastutāsa | ṛṣayo'vocan |
tām̐śca | pāhi | gṛṇataśca | sūrīnvaṣaḍvaṣaḻityūrdhvāso | anakṣannamo | nametyūrdhvāso | anakṣan |
pibā | somaṁ | mahatendriyāya | pibā | vṛtrāya | hantave | śaviṣṭha |
piba | rāye | śavase | hūyamānaḥ | piba | madhvastṛpadindrā | vṛṣasva |
asya | piba | kṣumataḥ | prasthitasyendra | somasya | varamā | sutasya |
svastidā | manasā | mādayasvārvācīno | revate | saubhagāya |
mamattu | tvā | divyaḥ | somendra | mamattu | yaḥ | sūyate | pārthiveṣu |
mamattu | yena | varivaścakartha | mamattu | yena | niriṇāsi | śatrūn |
ā | dvibarhāmino | yātvindro | vṛṣā | haribhyāṁ | pariṣiktamandhaḥ |
gavyā | sutasya | prabhṛtasya | madhvaḥ | satrā | khedāmaruśahā | vṛṣasva |
ni | tigmāni | bhrāśayanbhrāśyānyava | sthirā | tanuhi | yātujūnām |
ugrāya | te | saho | balaṁ | dadāmi | pratītyā | śatrūnvigadeṣu | vṛśca |
vyaryendra | tanuhi | śravāṁsyojaḥ | sthireva | dhanvano'bhimātīḥ |
asmadryagvāvṛdhānaḥ | sahobhiranibhṛṣṭastanvaṁ | vāvṛdhasva |
idaṁ | havirmaghavantubhyaṁ | rātaṁ | prati | samrāḻahṛṇāno | gṛbhāya |
tubhyaṁ | suto | maghavantubhyaṁ | pakvo'ddhīndra | piba | ca | prasthitasya |
addhīdindra | prasthitemā | havīṁṣi | cano | dadhiṣva | pacatota | somam |
prayasvantaḥ | prati | haryāmasi | tvā | satyāḥ | santu | yajamānasya | kāmāḥ |
prendrāgnibhyāṁ | suvacasyāmiyarmi | sindhāviva | prerayaṁ | nāvamarkaiḥ |
ayeva | pari | caranti | devā | ye | asmabhyaṁ | dhanadodbhidaśca |
na | vo | devāḥ | kṣudhamidvadhaṁ | dadurutāśitamupa | gacchanti | mṛtyavaḥ |
uto | rayiḥ | pṛṇato | nopa | dasyatyutāpṛṇanmarḍitāraṁ | na | vindate |
yādhrāya | cakamānāya | pitvo'nnavāntsanraphitāyopajagmuṣe |
sthiraṁ | manaḥ | kṛṇute | sevate | puroto | citsa | marḍitāraṁ | na | vindate |
sedbhojo | yo | gṛhave | dadātyannakāmāya | carate | kṛśāya |
aramasmai | bhavati | yāmahūtotāparīṣu | kṛṇute | sakhāyam |
na | sa | sakhā | yo | na | dadāti | sakhye | sacābhuve | sacamānāya | pitvaḥ |
apāsmātpreyānna | tadoko | asti | pṛṇantamanyamaraṇaṁ | cidicchet |
pṛṇīyādinnādhamānāya | tavyāndrāghīyāṁsamanu | paśyeta | panthām |
o | hi | vartante | rathyeva | cakrānyamanyamupa | tiṣṭhanta | rāyaḥ |
moghamannaṁ | vindate | apracetāḥ | satyaṁ | bravīmi | vadhetsa | tasya |
nāryamaṇaṁ | puṣyati | no | sakhāyaṁ | kevalāgho | bhavati | kevalādī |
kṛṣannitphālāśitaṁ | kṛṇoti | yannadhvānamapa | vṛṅkte | caritraiḥ |
vadanbrahmāvadato | vanīyānpṛṇannāpirapṛṇantamabhi | ṣyāt |
ekapādbhūyo | dvipado | vi | cakrame | dvipāttripādamabhyeti | paścāt |
catuṣpādeti | dvipadāmabhisvare | saṁpaśyanpaṅktīrupatiṣṭhamānaḥ |
samau | ciddhastau | na | samaṁ | viviṣṭaḥ | saṁmātarā | cinna | samaṁ | duhāte |
yamayościnna | samā | vīryāṇi | jñātī | citsantau | na | samaṁ | pṛṇītaḥ |
agne | haṁsi | nyatriṇaṁ | dīdyanmartyeṣvā |
sve | kṣaye | śucivrata |
uttiṣṭhasi | svāhuto | ghṛtāni | prati | modase |
yattvā | srucaḥ | samasthiran |
sāhuto | vi | rocate'gnirīḻenyo | girā |
srucā | pratīkamajyate |
ghṛtenāgniḥ | samajyate | madhupratīkāhutaḥ |
rocamāno | vibhāvasuḥ |
jaramāṇaḥ | samidhyase | devebhyo | havyavāhana |
taṁ | tvā | havanta | martyāḥ |
taṁ | martāmartyaṁ | ghṛtenāgniṁ | saparyata |
adābhyaṁ | gṛhapatim |
adābhyena | śociṣāgne | rakṣastvaṁ | daha |
gopā | ṛtasya | dīdihi |
sa | tvamagne | pratīkena | pratyoṣa | yātudhānyaḥ |
urukṣayeṣu | dīdyat |
taṁ | tvā | gīrbhirurukṣayā | havyavāhaṁ | samīdhire |
yajiṣṭhaṁ | mānuṣe | jane |
iti | veti | me | mano | gāmaśvaṁ | sanuyāmiti |
kuvitsomasyāpāmiti |
pra | vāteva | dodhatonmā | pītāyaṁsata |
kuvitsomasyāpāmiti |
unmā | pītāyaṁsata | rathamaśvevāśavaḥ |
kuvitsomasyāpāmiti |
upa | mā | matirasthita | vāśrā | putramiva | priyam |
kuvitsomasyāpāmiti |
ahaṁ | taṣṭeva | vandhuraṁ | paryacāmi | hṛdā | matim |
kuvitsomasyāpāmiti |
nahi | me | akṣipaccanācchāntsuḥ | pañca | kṛṣṭayaḥ |
kuvitsomasyāpāmiti |
nahi | me | rodasī | ubhe | anyaṁ | pakṣaṁ | cana | prati |
kuvitsomasyāpāmiti |
abhi | dyāṁ | mahinā | bhuvamabhīmāṁ | pṛthivīṁ | mahīm |
kuvitsomasyāpāmiti |
hantāhaṁ | pṛthivīmimāṁ | ni | dadhānīha | veha | vā |
kuvitsomasyāpāmiti |
oṣamitpṛthivīmahaṁ | jaṅghanānīha | veha | vā |
kuvitsomasyāpāmiti |
divi | me | anyaḥ | pakṣo'dho | anyamacīkṛṣam |
kuvitsomasyāpāmiti |
ahamasmi | mahāmaho'bhinabhyamudīṣitaḥ |
kuvitsomasyāpāmiti |
gṛho | yāmyaraṁkṛto | devebhyo | havyavāhanaḥ |
kuvitsomasyāpāmiti |
tadidāsa | bhuvaneṣu | jyeṣṭhaṁ | yato | jajñograstveṣanṛmṇaḥ |
sadyo | jajñāno | ni | riṇāti | śatrūnanu | yaṁ | viśve | madantyūmāḥ |
vāvṛdhānaḥ | śavasā | bhūryojāḥ | śatrurdāsāya | bhiyasaṁ | dadhāti |
avyanacca | vyanacca | sasni | saṁ | te | navanta | prabhṛtā | madeṣu |
tve | kratumapi | vṛñjanti | viśve | dviryadete | trirbhavantyūmāḥ |
svādoḥ | svādīyaḥ | svādunā | sṛjā | samadaḥ | su | madhu | madhunābhi | yodhīḥ |
iti | ciddhi | tvā | dhanā | jayantaṁ | mademade | anumadanti | viprāḥ |
ojīyo | dhṛṣṇo | sthiramā | tanuṣva | mā | tvā | dabhanyātudhānā | durevāḥ |
tvayā | vayaṁ | śāśadmahe | raṇeṣu | prapaśyanto | yudhenyāni | bhūri |
codayāmi | tāyudhā | vacobhiḥ | saṁ | te | śiśāmi | brahmaṇā | vayāṁsi |
stuṣeyyaṁ | puruvarpasamṛbhvaminatamamāptyamāptyānām |
ā | darṣate | śavasā | sapta | dānūnpra | sākṣate | pratimānāni | bhūri |
ni | taddadhiṣe'varaṁ | paraṁ | ca | yasminnāvithāvasā | duroṇe |
ā | mātarā | sthāpayase | jigatnū | atenoṣi | karvarā | purūṇi |
imā | brahma | bṛhaddivo | vivaktīndrāya | śūṣamagriyaḥ | svarṣāḥ |
maho | gotrasya | kṣayati | svarājo | duraśca | viśvāvṛṇodapa | svāḥ |
evā | mahānbṛhaddivo | atharvāvocatsvāṁ | tanvamindrameva |
svasāro | mātaribhvarīrariprā | hinvanti | ca | śavasā | vardhayanti | ca |
hiraṇyagarbhaḥ | samavartatāgre | bhūtasya | jātaḥ | patirekāsīt |
sa | dādhāra | pṛthivīṁ | dyāmutemāṁ | kasmai | devāya | haviṣā | vidhema |
yātmadā | baladā | yasya | viśvopāsate | praśiṣaṁ | yasya | devāḥ |
yasya | chāyāmṛtaṁ | yasya | mṛtyuḥ | kasmai | devāya | haviṣā | vidhema |
yaḥ | prāṇato | nimiṣato | mahitvaikedrājā | jagato | babhūva |
yeśe | asya | dvipadaścatuṣpadaḥ | kasmai | devāya | haviṣā | vidhema |
yasyeme | himavanto | mahitvā | yasya | samudraṁ | rasayā | sahāhuḥ |
yasyemāḥ | pradiśo | yasya | bāhū | kasmai | devāya | haviṣā | vidhema |
yena | dyaurugrā | pṛthivī | ca | dṛḻhā | yena | svaḥ | stabhitaṁ | yena | nākaḥ |
yo | antarikṣe | rajaso | vimānaḥ | kasmai | devāya | haviṣā | vidhema |
yaṁ | krandasī | avasā | tastabhāne | abhyaikṣetāṁ | manasā | rejamāne |
yatrādhi | sūrodito | vibhāti | kasmai | devāya | haviṣā | vidhema |
āpo | ha | yadbṛhatīrviśvamāyangarbhaṁ | dadhānā | janayantīragnim |
tato | devānāṁ | samavartatāsurekaḥ | kasmai | devāya | haviṣā | vidhema |
yaścidāpo | mahinā | paryapaśyaddakṣaṁ | dadhānā | janayantīryajñam |
yo | deveṣvadhi | devaika | āsītkasmai | devāya | haviṣā | vidhema |
mā | no | hiṁsījjanitā | yaḥ | pṛthivyā | yo | vā | divaṁ | satyadharmā | jajāna |
yaścāpaścandrā | bṛhatīrjajāna | kasmai | devāya | haviṣā | vidhema |
prajāpate | na | tvadetānyanyo | viśvā | jātāni | pari | tā | babhūva |
yatkāmāste | juhumastanno | astu | vayaṁ | syāma | patayo | rayīṇām |
vasuṁ | na | citramahasaṁ | gṛṇīṣe | vāmaṁ | śevamatithimadviṣeṇyam |
sa | rāsate | śurudho | viśvadhāyaso'gnirhotā | gṛhapatiḥ | suvīryam |
juṣāṇo | agne | prati | harya | me | vaco | viśvāni | vidvānvayunāni | sukrato |
ghṛtanirṇigbrahmaṇe | gātumeraya | tava | devājanayannanu | vratam |
sapta | dhāmāni | pariyannamartyo | dāśaddāśuṣe | sukṛte | māmahasva |
suvīreṇa | rayiṇāgne | svābhuvā | yastānaṭ | samidhā | taṁ | juṣasva |
yajñasya | ketuṁ | prathamaṁ | purohitaṁ | haviṣmanteḻate | sapta | vājinam |
śṛṇvantamagniṁ | ghṛtapṛṣṭhamukṣaṇaṁ | pṛṇantaṁ | devaṁ | pṛṇate | suvīryam |
tvaṁ | dūtaḥ | prathamo | vareṇyaḥ | sa | hūyamāno | amṛtāya | matsva |
tvāṁ | marjayanmaruto | dāśuṣo | gṛhe | tvāṁ | stomebhirbhṛgavo | vi | rurucuḥ |
iṣaṁ | duhantsudughāṁ | viśvadhāyasaṁ | yajñapriye | yajamānāya | sukrato |
agne | ghṛtasnustrirṛtāni | dīdyadvartiryajñaṁ | pariyantsukratūyase |
tvāmidasyoṣaso | vyuṣṭiṣu | dūtaṁ | kṛṇvānāyajanta | mānuṣāḥ |
tvāṁ | devā | mahayāyyāya | vāvṛdhurājyamagne | nimṛjanto | adhvare |
ni | tvā | vasiṣṭhāhvanta | vājinaṁ | gṛṇanto | agne | vidatheṣu | vedhasaḥ |
rāyaspoṣaṁ | yajamāneṣu | dhāraya | yūyaṁ | pāta | svastibhiḥ | sadā | naḥ |

imamapāṁ | saṁgame | sūryasya | śiśuṁ | na | viprā | matibhī | rihanti |
samudrādūrmimudiyarti | veno | nabhojāḥ | pṛṣṭhaṁ | haryatasya | darśi |

samānaṁ | pūrvīrabhi | vāvaśānāstiṣṭhanvatsasya | mātaraḥ | sanīḻāḥ |

adevāddevaḥ | pracatā | guhā | yanprapaśyamāno | amṛtatvamemi |

paśyannanyasyātithiṁ | vayāyā | ṛtasya | dhāma | vi | mime | purūṇi |

bahvīḥ | samākaramantarasminnindraṁ | vṛṇānaḥ | pitaraṁ | jahāmi |

idaṁ | svaridamidāsa | vāmamayaṁ | prakāśorvantarikṣam |
hanāva | vṛtraṁ | nirehi | soma | haviṣṭvā | santaṁ | haviṣā | yajāma |
kaviḥ | kavitvā | divi | rūpamāsajadaprabhūtī | varuṇo | nirapaḥ | sṛjat |

ahaṁ | rudrebhirvasubhiścarāmyahamādityairuta | viśvadevaiḥ |
ahaṁ | mitrāvaruṇobhā | bibharmyahamindrāgnī | ahamaśvinobhā |

tāṁ | mā | devā | vyadadhuḥ | purutrā | bhūristhātrāṁ | bhūryāveśayantīm |
mayā | so | annamatti | yo | vipaśyati | yaḥ | prāṇiti | yeṁ | śṛṇotyuktam |
amantavo | māṁ | topa | kṣiyanti | śrudhi | śruta | śraddhivaṁ | te | vadāmi |

yaṁ | kāmaye | taṁtamugraṁ | kṛṇomi | taṁ | brahmāṇaṁ | tamṛṣiṁ | taṁ | sumedhām |
ahaṁ | rudrāya | dhanurā | tanomi | brahmadviṣe | śarave | hantavo |
ahaṁ | janāya | samadaṁ | kṛṇomyahaṁ | dyāvāpṛthivī | ā | viveśa |
ahaṁ | suve | pitaramasya | mūrdhanmama | yonirapsvantaḥ | samudre |
tato | vi | tiṣṭhe | bhuvanānu | viśvotāmūṁ | dyāṁ | varṣmaṇopa | spṛśāmi |

paro | divā | parainā | pṛthivyaitāvatī | mahinā | saṁ | babhūva |
na | tamaṁho | na | duritaṁ | devāso | aṣṭa | martyam |
sajoṣaso | yamaryamā | mitro | nayanti | varuṇo | ati | dviṣaḥ |
taddhi | vayaṁ | vṛṇīmahe | varuṇa | mitrāryaman |
yenā | niraṁhaso | yūyaṁ | pātha | nethā | ca | martyamati | dviṣaḥ |
te | nūnaṁ | no'yamūtaye | varuṇo | mitro | aryamā |
nayiṣṭho | no | neṣaṇi | parṣiṣṭho | naḥ | parṣaṇyati | dviṣaḥ |
yūyaṁ | viśvaṁ | pari | pātha | varuṇo | mitro | aryamā |
yuṣmākaṁ | śarmaṇi | priye | syāma | supraṇītayo'ti | dviṣaḥ |
ādityāso | ati | sridho | varuṇo | mitro | aryamā |
ugraṁ | marudbhī | rudraṁ | huvemendramagniṁ | svastaye'ti | dviṣaḥ |

śarma | yacchantu | saprathādityāso | yadīmahe | ati | dviṣaḥ |
yathā | ha | tyadvasavo | gauryaṁ | citpadi | ṣitāmamuñcatā | yajatrāḥ |
evo | ṣvasmanmuñcatā | vyaṁhaḥ | pra | tāryagne | prataraṁ | nāyuḥ |
rātrī | vyakhyadāyatī | purutrā | devyakṣabhiḥ |
viśvādhi | śriyo'dhita |
orvaprāmartyā | nivato | devyudvataḥ |
jyotiṣā | bādhate | tamaḥ |
niru | svasāramaskṛtoṣasaṁ | devyāyatī |
apedu | hāsate | tamaḥ |
sā | no | adya | yasyā | vayaṁ | ni | te | yāmannavikṣmahi |
vṛkṣe | na | vasatiṁ | vayaḥ |
ni | grāmāso | avikṣata | ni | padvanto | ni | pakṣiṇaḥ |
ni | śyenāsaścidarthinaḥ |
yāvayā | vṛkyaṁ | vṛkaṁ | yavaya | stenamūrmye |
athā | naḥ | sutarā | bhava |
upa | mā | pepiśattamaḥ | kṛṣṇaṁ | vyaktamasthita |
uṣa | ṛṇeva | yātaya |
upa | te | gevākaraṁ | vṛṇīṣva | duhitardivaḥ |
rātri | stomaṁ | na | jigyuṣe |
mamāgne | varco | vihaveṣvastu | vayaṁ | tvendhānāstanvaṁ | puṣema |
mahyaṁ | namantāṁ | pradiśaścatasrastvayādhyakṣeṇa | pṛtanā | jayema |
mama | devā | vihave | santu | sarvendravanto | maruto | viṣṇuragniḥ |
mamāntarikṣamurulokamastu | mahyaṁ | vātaḥ | pavatāṁ | kāme | asmin |
mayi | devā | draviṇamā | yajantāṁ | mayyāśīrastu | mayi | devahūtiḥ |
daivyā | hotāro | vanuṣanta | pūrve'riṣṭāḥ | syāma | tanvā | suvīrāḥ |
mahyaṁ | yajantu | mama | yāni | havyākūtiḥ | satyā | manaso | me | astu |

devīḥ | ṣaḻurvīruru | naḥ | kṛṇota | viśve | devāseha | vīrayadhvam |
mā | hāsmahi | prajayā | mā | tanūbhirmā | radhāma | dviṣate | soma | rājan |
agne | manyuṁ | pratinudanpareṣāmadabdho | gopāḥ | pari | pāhi | nastvam |
pratyañco | yantu | nigutaḥ | punaste'maiṣāṁ | cittaṁ | prabudhāṁ | vi | neśat |
dhātā | dhātṝṇāṁ | bhuvanasya | yaspatirdevaṁ | trātāramabhimātiṣāham |
imaṁ | yajñamaśvinobhā | bṛhaspatirdevāḥ | pāntu | yajamānaṁ | nyarthāt |
uruvyacā | no | mahiṣaḥ | śarma | yaṁsadasminhave | puruhūtaḥ | purukṣuḥ |
sa | naḥ | prajāyai | haryaśva | mṛḻayendra | mā | no | rīriṣo | mā | parā | dāḥ |
ye | naḥ | sapatnāpa | te | bhavantvindrāgnibhyāmava | bādhāmahe | tān |
vasavo | rudrādityā | uparispṛśaṁ | mograṁ | cettāramadhirājamakran |
nāsadāsīnno | sadāsīttadānīṁ | nāsīdrajo | no | vyomā | paro | yat |
kimāvarīvaḥ | kuha | kasya | śarmannambhaḥ | kimāsīdgahanaṁ | gabhīram |
na | mṛtyurāsīdamṛtaṁ | na | tarhi | na | rātryāhna | āsītpraketaḥ |
ānīdavātaṁ | svadhayā | tadekaṁ | tasmāddhānyanna | paraḥ | kiṁ | canāsa |
tamāsīttamasā | gūḻhamagre'praketaṁ | salilaṁ | sarvamedam |
tucchyenābhvapihitaṁ | yadāsīttapasastanmahinājāyataikam |
kāmastadagre | samavartatādhi | manaso | retaḥ | prathamaṁ | yadāsīt |
sato | bandhumasati | niravindanhṛdi | pratīṣyā | kavayo | manīṣā |
tiraścīno | vitato | raśmireṣāmadhaḥ | svidāsī3dupari | svidāsī3t |
retodhāsanmahimāna | āsantsvadhāvastātprayatiḥ | parastāt |
ko | addhā | veda | keha | pra | vocatkutājātā | kuteyaṁ | visṛṣṭiḥ |
arvāgdevāsya | visarjanenāthā | ko | veda | yatābabhūva |
iyaṁ | visṛṣṭiryatābabhūva | yadi | vā | dadhe | yadi | vā | na |
yo | asyādhyakṣaḥ | parame | vyomantso | aṅga | veda | yadi | vā | na | veda |
yo | yajño | viśvatastantubhistataikaśataṁ | devakarmebhirāyataḥ |
ime | vayanti | pitaro | yāyayuḥ | pra | vayāpa | vayetyāsate | tate |
pumām̐ | enaṁ | tanutotkṛṇatti | pumānvi | tatne | adhi | nāke | asmin |
ime | mayūkhopa | sedurū | sadaḥ | sāmāni | cakrustasarāṇyotave |
kāsītpramā | pratimā | kiṁ | nidānamājyaṁ | kimāsītparidhiḥ | kāsīt |
chandaḥ | kimāsītpraügaṁ | kimukthaṁ | yaddevā | devamayajanta | viśve |
agnergāyatryabhavatsayugvoṣṇihayā | savitā | saṁ | babhūva |
anuṣṭubhā | somokthairmahasvānbṛhaspaterbṛhatī | vācamāvat |
virāṇmitrāvaruṇayorabhiśrīrindrasya | triṣṭubiha | bhāgo | ahnaḥ |
viśvāndevāñjagatyā | viveśa | tena | cākḷpra | ṛṣayo | manuṣyāḥ |
cākḷpre | tena | ṛṣayo | manuṣyā | yajñe | jāte | pitaro | naḥ | purāṇe |
paśyanmanye | manasā | cakṣasā | tānyemaṁ | yajñamayajanta | pūrve |
sahastomāḥ | sahachandasāvṛtaḥ | sahapramā | ṛṣayaḥ | sapta | daivyāḥ |
pūrveṣāṁ | panthāmanudṛśya | dhīrānvālebhire | rathyo | na | raśmīn |
apa | prācendra | viśvām̐ | amitrānapāpāco | abhibhūte | nudasva |
apodīco | apa | śūrādharācorau | yathā | tava | śarmanmadema |
kuvidaṅga | yavamanto | yavaṁ | cidyathā | dāntyanupūrvaṁ | viyūya |
ihehaiṣāṁ | kṛṇuhi | bhojanāni | ye | barhiṣo | namovṛktiṁ | na | jagmuḥ |
nahi | sthūryṛtuthā | yātamasti | nota | śravo | vivide | saṁgameṣu |
gavyantendraṁ | sakhyāya | viprāśvāyanto | vṛṣaṇaṁ | vājayantaḥ |
yuvaṁ | surāmamaśvinā | namucāvāsure | sacā |
vipipānā | śubhaspatīndraṁ | karmasvāvatam |
putramiva | pitarāvaśvinobhendrāvathuḥ | kāvyairdaṁsanābhiḥ |
yatsurāmaṁ | vyapibaḥ | śacībhiḥ | sarasvatī | tvā | maghavannabhiṣṇak |
indraḥ | sutrāmā | svavām̐ | avobhiḥ | sumṛḻīko | bhavatu | viśvavedāḥ |
bādhatāṁ | dveṣo | abhayaṁ | kṛṇotu | suvīryasya | patayaḥ | syāma |
tasya | vayaṁ | sumatau | yajñiyasyāpi | bhadre | saumanase | syāma |
sa | sutrāmā | svavām̐ | indro | asme | ārācciddveṣaḥ | sanutaryuyotu |
ījānamiddyaurgūrtāvasurījānaṁ | bhūmirabhi | prabhūṣaṇi |
ījānaṁ | devāvaśvināvabhi | sumnairavardhatām |
tā | vāṁ | mitrāvaruṇā | dhārayatkṣitī | suṣumneṣitatvatā | yajāmasi |
yuvoḥ | krāṇāya | sakhyairabhi | ṣyāma | rakṣasaḥ |
adhā | cinnu | yaddidhiṣāmahe | vāmabhi | priyaṁ | rekṇaḥ | patyamānāḥ |
dadvām̐ | vā | yatpuṣyati | rekṇaḥ | samvārannakirasya | maghāni |
asāvanyo | asura | sūyata | dyaustvaṁ | viśveṣāṁ | varuṇāsi | rājā |
mūrdhā | rathasya | cākannaitāvatainasāntakadhruk |
asmintsvetacchakapūtaino | hite | mitre | nigatānhanti | vīrān |
avorvā | yaddhāttanūṣvavaḥ | priyāsu | yajñiyāsvarvā |
yuvorhi | mātāditirvicetasā | dyaurna | bhūmiḥ | payasā | pupūtani |
ava | priyā | didiṣṭana | sūro | ninikta | raśmibhiḥ |
yuvaṁ | hyapnarājāvasīdataṁ | tiṣṭhadrathaṁ | na | dhūrṣadaṁ | vanarṣadam |
tā | naḥ | kaṇūkayantīrnṛmedhastatre | aṁhasaḥ | sumedhastatre | aṁhasaḥ |
pro | ṣvasmai | purorathamindrāya | śūṣamarcata |
abhīke | cidu | lokakṛtsaṁge | samatsu | vṛtrahāsmākaṁ | bodhi | coditā | nabhantāmanyakeṣāṁ | jyākādhi | dhanvasu |
tvaṁ | sindhūm̐ravāsṛjo'dharāco | ahannahim |
aśatrurindra | jajñiṣe | viśvaṁ | puṣyasi | vāryaṁ | taṁ | tvā | pari | ṣvajāmahe | nabhantāmanyakeṣāṁ | jyākādhi | dhanvasu |
vi | ṣu | viśvārātayo'ryo | naśanta | no | dhiyaḥ |
astāsi | śatrave | vadhaṁ | yo | nendra | jighāṁsati | yā | te | rātirdadirvasu | nabhantāmanyakeṣāṁ | jyākādhi | dhanvasu |
yo | nendrābhito | jano | vṛkāyurādideśati |
adhaspadaṁ | tamīṁ | kṛdhi | vibādho | asi | sāsahirnabhantāmanyakeṣāṁ | jyākādhi | dhanvasu |
yo | nendrābhidāsati | sanābhiryaśca | niṣṭyaḥ |
ava | tasya | balaṁ | tira | mahīva | dyauradha | tmanā | nabhantāmanyakeṣāṁ | jyākādhi | dhanvasu |
vayamindra | tvāyavaḥ | sakhitvamā | rabhāmahe |
ṛtasya | naḥ | pathā | nayāti | viśvāni | duritā | nabhantāmanyakeṣāṁ | jyākādhi | dhanvasu |
asmabhyaṁ | su | tvamindra | tāṁ | śikṣa | yā | dohate | prati | varaṁ | jaritre |
acchidrodhnī | pīpayadyathā | naḥ | sahasradhārā | payasā | mahī | gauḥ |
ubhe | yadindra | rodasī | āpaprāthoṣeva |
mahāntaṁ | tvā | mahīnāṁ | samrājaṁ | carṣaṇīnāṁ | devī | janitryajījanadbhadrā | janitryajījanat |
ava | sma | durhaṇāyato | martasya | tanuhi | sthiram |
adhaspadaṁ | tamīṁ | kṛdhi | yo | asmām̐ | ādideśati | devī | janitryajījanadbhadrā | janitryajījanat |
ava | tyā | bṛhatīriṣo | viśvaścandrāmitrahan |
śacībhiḥ | śakra | dhūnuhīndra | viśvābhirūtibhirdevī | janitryajījanadbhadrā | janitryajījanat |
ava | yattvaṁ | śatakratavindra | viśvāni | dhūnuṣe |
rayiṁ | na | sunvate | sacā | sahasriṇībhirūtibhirdevī | janitryajījanadbhadrā | janitryajījanat |
ava | svedevābhito | viṣvakpatantu | didyavaḥ |
dūrvāyeva | tantavo | vyasmadetu | durmatirdevī | janitryajījanadbhadrā | janitryajījanat |
dīrghaṁ | hyaṅkuśaṁ | yathā | śaktiṁ | bibharṣi | mantumaḥ |
pūrveṇa | maghavanpadājo | vayāṁ | yathā | yamo | devī | janitryajījanadbhadrā | janitryajījanat |
nakirdevā | minīmasi | nakirā | yopayāmasi | mantraśrutyaṁ | carāmasi |
pakṣebhirapikakṣebhiratrābhi | saṁ | rabhāmahe |
yasminvṛkṣe | supalāśe | devaiḥ | saṁpibate | yamaḥ |
atrā | no | viśpatiḥ | pitā | purāṇām̐ | anu | venati |
purāṇām̐ | anuvenantaṁ | carantaṁ | pāpayāmuyā |
asūyannabhyacākaśaṁ | tasmāspṛhayaṁ | punaḥ |
yaṁ | kumāra | navaṁ | rathamacakraṁ | manasākṛṇoḥ |
ekeṣaṁ | viśvataḥ | prāñcamapaśyannadhi | tiṣṭhasi |
yaṁ | kumāra | prāvartayo | rathaṁ | viprebhyaspari |
taṁ | sāmānu | prāvartata | samito | nāvyāhitam |
kaḥ | kumāramajanayadrathaṁ | ko | niravartayat |
kaḥ | svittadadya | no | brūyādanudeyī | yathābhavat |
yathābhavadanudeyī | tato | agramajāyata |
purastādbudhnātataḥ | paścānnirayaṇaṁ | kṛtam |
idaṁ | yamasya | sādanaṁ | devamānaṁ | yaducyate |
iyamasya | dhamyate | nāḻīrayaṁ | gīrbhiḥ | pariṣkṛtaḥ |
keśyagniṁ | keśī | viṣaṁ | keśī | bibharti | rodasī |
keśī | viśvaṁ | svardṛśe | keśīdaṁ | jyotirucyate |
munayo | vātaraśanāḥ | piśaṅgā | vasate | malā |
vātasyānu | dhrājiṁ | yanti | yaddevāso | avikṣata |
unmaditā | mauneyena | vātām̐ | ā | tasthimā | vayam |
śarīredasmākaṁ | yūyaṁ | martāso | abhi | paśyatha |
antarikṣeṇa | patati | viśvā | rūpāvacākaśat |
munirdevasyadevasya | saukṛtyāya | sakhā | hitaḥ |
vātasyāśvo | vāyoḥ | sakhātho | deveṣito | muniḥ |
ubhau | samudrāvā | kṣeti | yaśca | pūrvotāparaḥ |
apsarasāṁ | gandharvāṇāṁ | mṛgāṇāṁ | caraṇe | caran |
keśī | ketasya | vidvāntsakhā | svādurmadintamaḥ |
vāyurasmopāmanthatpinaṣṭi | smā | kunannamā |
keśī | viṣasya | pātreṇa | yadrudreṇāpibatsaha |
uta | devāvahitaṁ | devonnayathā | punaḥ |
utāgaścakruṣaṁ | devā | devā | jīvayathā | punaḥ |
dvāvimau | vātau | vātā | sindhorā | parāvataḥ |
dakṣaṁ | te | anyā | vātu | parānyo | vātu | yadrapaḥ |
ā | vāta | vāhi | bheṣajaṁ | vi | vāta | vāhi | yadrapaḥ |
tvaṁ | hi | viśvabheṣajo | devānāṁ | dūteyase |
ā | tvāgamaṁ | śaṁtātibhiratho | ariṣṭatātibhiḥ |
dakṣaṁ | te | bhadramābhārṣaṁ | parā | yakṣmaṁ | suvāmi | te |
trāyantāmiha | devāstrāyatāṁ | marutāṁ | gaṇaḥ |
trāyantāṁ | viśvā | bhūtāni | yathāyamarapāsat |
āpedvā | u | bheṣajīrāpo | amīvacātanīḥ |
āpaḥ | sarvasya | bheṣajīstāste | kṛṇvantu | bheṣajam |
hastābhyāṁ | daśaśākhābhyāṁ | jihvā | vācaḥ | purogavī |
anāmayitnubhyāṁ | tvā | tābhyāṁ | tvopa | spṛśāmasi |
tava | tyendra | sakhyeṣu | vahnaya | ṛtaṁ | manvānā | vyadardirurvalam |
yatrā | daśasyannuṣaso | riṇannapaḥ | kutsāya | manmannahyaśca | daṁsayaḥ |
avāsṛjaḥ | prasvaḥ | śvañcayo | girīnudājosrā | apibo | madhu | priyam |
avardhayo | vanino | asya | daṁsasā | śuśoca | sūrya | ṛtajātayā | girā |
vi | sūryo | madhye | amucadrathaṁ | divo | vidaddāsāya | pratimānamāryaḥ |
dṛḻhāni | piprorasurasya | māyinendro | vyāsyaccakṛvām̐ | ṛjiśvanā |
anādhṛṣṭāni | dhṛṣito | vyāsyannidhīm̐radevām̐ | amṛṇadayāsyaḥ |

ayuddhaseno | vibhvā | vibhindatā | dāśadvṛtrahā | tujyāni | tejate |
indrasya | vajrādabibhedabhiśnathaḥ | prākrāmacchundhyūrajahāduṣānaḥ |
etā | tyā | te | śrutyāni | kevalā | yadekaikamakṛṇorayajñam |

tasya | pūṣā | prasave | yāti | vidvāntsaṁpaśyanviśvā | bhuvanāni | gopāḥ |
nṛcakṣaiṣa | divo | madhyāsta | āpaprivānrodasī | antarikṣam |
sa | viśvācīrabhi | caṣṭe | ghṛtācīrantarā | pūrvamaparaṁ | ca | ketum |
rāyo | budhnaḥ | saṁgamano | vasūnāṁ | viśvā | rūpābhi | caṣṭe | śacībhiḥ |
deveva | savitā | satyadharmendro | na | tasthau | samare | dhanānām |

rātiṁ | vāmasya | subhagāṁ | mahīmiṣaṁ | dadhāsi | sānasiṁ | rayim |

agne | acchā | vadeha | naḥ | pratyaṅnaḥ | sumanā | bhava |
pra | no | yaccha | viśaspate | dhanadāsi | nastvam |
pra | no | yacchatvaryamā | pra | bhagaḥ | pra | bṛhaspatiḥ |
pra | devāḥ | prota | sūnṛtā | rāyo | devī | dadātu | naḥ |
somaṁ | rājānamavase'gniṁ | gīrbhirhavāmahe |
ādityānviṣṇuṁ | sūryaṁ | brahmāṇaṁ | ca | bṛhaspatim |
indravāyū | bṛhaspatiṁ | suhaveha | havāmahe |
